tika-abh08t0:4_7: Tassa pana cittassa ko vacanattho ko saddattho.
tika-abh08t0:4_14: Aññesaṃ javanānaṃ aggahaṇaṃ kāmāvacarajavanāni eva yebhuyyavasena sattakkhattuṃ javantīti ñāpanatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:5_5: ubhayapasse ida”nti cintetvā yathācintitena kamena sesacittarūpanipphādanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:5_6: evaṃ yaṃ kiñci loke vicittaṃ sippajātaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:5_12: Taṃ attano cittatāya aññadeva sarāgaṃ cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:5_29: tasmā yassa imesaṃ sampayuttabhūmiārammaṇahīnamajjhimapaṇītādhipatīnaṃ vasena attano cittatāya cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:5_32: Paññattiyampi viññāṇe vicitte cittassa kammaṃ cittakammaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:5_34: cittakammake vicitte idha imasmiṃ adhikāre cittasammuti cittasaddo viññāṇe citte viññunā daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:6_0: Taṃ pana sabbasaṅgāhakavasena cintetītiādinā vuttappakāraṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:6_3: Tattha tasmiṃ duvidhe citte savipākaṃ nāma cittaṃ kusalākusalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:7_0: Tattha tasmiṃ vacane “kusala”nti etassa saddassa pana ko vacanattho.
tika-abh08t0:8_1: Kucchitānaṃ salanato pāpakānaṃ dhammānaṃ kampanato viddhaṃsanato.
tika-abh08t0:9_1: Kusalasaddoyaṃ ayaṃ kusalasaddo cheke atthe ārogyatthe anavajjatthe iṭṭhavipāke atthepi diṭṭho amhehi.
tika-abh08t0:9_2: Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre anavajjādike atthe diṭṭho. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:9_6: Natthi avajjaṃ kilesāvajjaṃ kilesadoso kilesadaratho etassāti anavajjaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:9_9: attano sabhāvena ca iṭṭho vipāko etassāti iṭṭhavipākaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:9_11: taṃ lakkhīyati anena aviññātaṃ lakkhitabbaṃ kusalanti lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:9_14: Nanu kathaṃ sayameva attano lakkhaṇaṃ bhaveyyāti codanā bhaveyya viññātāviññātasaddatthabhāvena lakkhaṇalakkhitabbabhāvayuttito.
tika-abh08t0:9_15: Kusalasaddatthavasena hi aviññātaṃ apākaṭaṃ kusalaṃ lakkhitabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:9_16: Anavajjaiṭṭhavipākasaddatthavasena viññātaṃ pākaṭaṃ kusalaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:10_1: Tadubhayaviparītaṃ tehi ubhayehi kusalākusalehi viparītaṃ avipākalakkhaṇaṃ etassāti tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ abyākataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:12_1: Uddānato saṅkhepavasena kilesavatthuvasena duve kāmā honti.
tika-abh08t0:13_2: vatthu kilesakāmena kāmīyati icchīyatīti kattukārakakammakārakadvaye sādhanadvaye esa eso duvidhopi kāmo sijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:14_1: So ayaṃ duvidhopi kāmo yasmiṃ padese sampattīnaṃ vasena avacarati,
tika-abh08t0:14_2: iti tasmā kāraṇā so pana padeso catupāyānaṃ channaṃ devānaṃ manussānaṃ vasena eva ekādasavidho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:15_1: Kāmovacaratīti ettha etasmiṃ ekādasavidhe padese kāmo avacarati,
tika-abh08t0:15_2: iti tasmā kāraṇā so padeso assa kāmassa anena kāmena abhilakkhitattā kāmāvacarasaññito.
tika-abh08t0:15_3: Abhilakkhitasaddappayoge tatiyatthe “assā”ti chaṭṭhī hotīti saddasatthavidū paṭhanti.
tika-abh08t0:15_4: Sasatthāvacaro padeso viya satte sasanti hiṃsanti tehīti satthā,
tika-abh08t0:15_7: Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti,
tika-abh08t0:15_8: so padeso vijjamānesupi aññesu dvipadacatuppadesu avacarantesu tesaṃ upalakkhitattā “sasatthāvacaro”tveva vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:15_9: evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu tattha avacarantesu tesaṃ abhilakkhitattā ayaṃ padeso “kāmāvacaro”tveva vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:16_1: Yathā rūpabhavo uttarapadassa lopaṃ katvā rūpanti vutto,
tika-abh08t0:16_2: evaṃ tathā svāyaṃ so ayaṃ eso kāmāvacaro uttarapadassa lopaṃ katvā kāmo iti saññito kāmo nāma udīrito paṇḍitena kathito.
tika-abh08t0:17_1: Tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ tasmiṃ kāmāvacare sadā avacarati,
tika-abh08t0:17_2: iti tasmā kāraṇā kāmāvacaraṃ iti evaṃ kāmaghātinā kāmānaṃ vināsakena buddhena kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:17_4: yathā pana saṅgāme yebhuyyena avacaraṇato “saṅgāmāvacaro”ti laddhanāmo nāgo nagare carantopi “saṅgāmāvacaro”tveva vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:17_5: thalacarajalacarā pāṇino athale ajale ṭhitāpi “thalacarajalacarā”tveva vuccanti,
tika-abh08t0:17_6: evaṃ idaṃ aññattha avacarantampi kāmāvacaramevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:17_7: Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā ettha kāmo avacaratītipi kāmāvacaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:17_10: mahiyaṃ setīti mahiṃsoti vutte na yattakā vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:18_1: Paṭisandhiṃ bhave kāme kāmabhavasaṅkhāte kāme paṭisandhiṃ avacārayati,
tika-abh08t0:18_3: Iti evaṃ vā ayaṃ añño nayo.
tika-abh08t0:19_1: Aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:19_2: Dasapuññakiriyavatthuvaseneva puññakiriyā eva tesaṃ tesaṃ phalānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni kāraṇānīti puññakiriyavatthūni,
tika-abh08t0:20_1: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā pattidānaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ dhammadesanā anumodanā diṭṭhijubhāvo saṃsuti dhammassavanañca apacāyo apacāyanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:20_2: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññāni eva vatthūni puññavatthūni,
tika-abh08t0:20_3: tesaṃ pabhedo puññavatthuppabhedo ñeyyo paṇḍitena jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:21_1: Gacchanti saṅgahaṃ dāne pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:21_3: dhammadesanā dhammassavanaṃ diṭṭhiujukā bhāvanāmaye puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:21_4: dasa puññakiriyāpi ca tīṇi eva sambhonti.
tika-abh08t0:22_1: Sabbānussatipuññañca pasaṃsā saraṇattayaṃ ratanattayaguṇapasaṃsā ca ete diṭṭhijukammamhi saṅgayhanti,
tika-abh08t0:23_1: Purimā cetanā tato pubbabhāge pavattā cetanā,
tika-abh08t0:23_5: Evanti yathā tissopi cetanā dānamaye puññe honti,
tika-abh08t0:23_6: evaṃ tathā dānamayapuññato sesesupi sīlamayabhāvanāmayesu tisso cetanā paṇḍito dīpaye katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:24_0: Hi saccaṃ yadā pana yo puggalo deyyadhammapaṭiggāhakādisampattiṃ āgamma paṭicca.
tika-abh08t0:24_5: Atthi dinnaṃ dānassa phalaṃ atthi. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:24_8: Parehi anussāhito acodito dānādīni puññāni karoti.
tika-abh08t0:24_9: Dānādīnīti vacanena deyyadhammaṃ nissāya pavattadānacetanā gahetabbā.
tika-abh08t0:24_16: Imasmiṃ panatthe saṅkharotīti saṅkhāro nāma attano vā pavattassa pubbappayogassa adhivacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:24_19: yadā yo “dānādīni karissāmī”ti cittaṃ samuppādetvā nākāsi,
tika-abh08t0:24_23: Paṭipattidassanena paṭipajjitabbā sīlādīhi paṭipajjanti jānanti gacchanti vā nibbānaṃ etāyāti paṭipatti,
tika-abh08t0:25_1: Dasapuññakriyādīnaṃ vasena ca bahūnipi bhavanti etāni pana cittāni dasapuññakiriyādīnaṃ vasenapi bahūnipi
tika-abh08t0:25_2: bhavanti iti evaṃ pakāsaye bhagavā pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t0:27_0: Sattarasa sahassāni, dve satāni asīti ca;
tika-abh08t0:29_0: Kāmāvacarapuññāni sattarasa sahassāni ca dve satāni ca asīti ca bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:31_0: Kāyādīhi ca tīheva, hīnādīhi ca tīhi tu.
tika-abh08t0:32_5: Rūpāvacarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ rūpāvacare pavattassa bhāvanāpuññassa vasena pavattaṃ rūpāvacarūpapattinipphādakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:34_2: tasmiṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:34_3: Ākiñcaññāyatanassa tassa apagamo tassa ākāsānañcāyatanassa apagamo abhāvo vohāro ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:35_3: Paṭighe dvārārammaṇānaṃ saṅghaṭṭane pavattā saññā paṭighasaññā.
tika-abh08t0:35_9: nānā attā sabhāvo etissāti vā nānattā,
tika-abh08t0:36_2: Itare pana tayo maggā aniyatavatthukā. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:37_1: taṃ puggalaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃ saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanā.
tika-abh08t0:37_9: Uddhaccaṃ pana ekadesatopi apāyagāmikampi na pahiyyati.
tika-abh08t0:37_11: Sotāpattimaggena nāsitasaṃyojanānaṃ pahānaṃ kasmā na vuttanti ce?
tika-abh08t0:37_12: Paṭhamamaggato dutiyamaggassa mahantattā paṭhamamaggena nāsitā saṃyojanā dutiyamaggena nāsitāti paññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:37_18: Maggānurūpanti vacanaṃ paṭhamamaggassa paṭhamaphalañca anurūpanti viññāpanatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:38_1: Kāme aṭṭheva kāmāvacare aṭṭha eva cittāni,
tika-abh08t0:38_5: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kusalāni cittāni ekavīsati honti.
tika-abh08t0:39_2: akusalato ca apagatena satā satisampannena kusale kusalena chekena vasinā pañcavasīhi samannāgatena yaṃ
tika-abh08t0:39_3: kusalacittaṃ catubhūmigataṃ catūsu bhūmīsu pavattaṃ sakalaṃ sabbaṃ lapitaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:39_4: taṃ kusalacittaṃ mayāpi buddhadattācariyena lapitaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:40_0: Niyatāniyatavatthuvasenāti paṭighasampayuttadvayaṃ kāmeyeva hadayavatthuṃ nissāya jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:40_3: Itarāni pana akusalāni kāmarūpesu uppajjanakāle hadayavatthuṃ nissāya jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:40_6: Paṭisandhijanakājanakavasena cāti uddhaccasahagataṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti.
tika-abh08t0:40_12: Aññe pana kilesā ekadesavasena apāyagāmikā jahitā,
tika-abh08t0:42_0: Assa pana paṭighasampayuttassa pāṇātipātādīsu akusalakammesu tikkhappavattikāle asaṅkhārikassa uppatti,
tika-abh08t0:45_4: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena akusalāni dvādasappakārāni siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:46_1: Yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ yaṃ akusalacittaṃ pāpāpāpesu pāpaapāpesu kusalākusalesu apāpena appavattena pāpāpāpappahīnena vuttaṃ īritaṃ kathitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:46_2: taṃ pāpamānasaṃ taṃ akusalacittaṃ mayā samudāhaṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:47_0: Yathā panassa yathā pana assa vipākassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena dānādīnaṃ dasapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:47_2: Hi saccaṃ idaṃ vipākaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesu kāmāvacaradhammantogadhesu chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:47_3: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi kusalasampayuttadhammato assa vipākassa,
tika-abh08t0:47_4: sampayuttadhammānañca nānatte asatipi idaṃ vipākaṃ ādāsatalādīsu dhammajātesu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:47_6: yathā ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ mukhe calite calati,
tika-abh08t0:47_8: mukhassa kāraṇaṃ vinā mukhanimittassa viya kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:47_9: evaṃ kusalakāraṇā vipākassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:48_1: Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ manussānaṃ ime aṭṭha mahāvipākā duhetukatihetukānaṃ kāmāvacaradevānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:49_1: Tato paraṃ pavattiyaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā balavārammaṇe atimahantavibhūtārammaṇe tadārammaṇañca
tika-abh08t0:49_2: hutvā tato paraṃ maraṇakālasmiṃ cuti hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:49_3: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena catūsu ṭhānesu vipaccanti vipākabhāvena jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:50_1: Sabhūmikusaleheva mahāpākā samā vinā mahāpākā kammadvāraṃ kammakāraṇaṃ vinā,
tika-abh08t0:50_2: kammañca mahāpuññānaṃ kiriyavatthukaṃ vinā vajjetvā sabhūmikusaleheva attano bhūmiyaṃ pavattehi kusalehi eva samā sadisā.
tika-abh08t0:51_1: Pākā kusalavipākā aviññattijanattā ca viññatti ca viññatti ca viññattiviññattiyoti vattabbe sarūpekasesaṃ katvā “viññattī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:51_5: Tasmā aviññattijanattā kāyaviññattivacīviññattisaṅkhātānaṃ kammadvārānaṃ ajanakattā manodvārasaṅkhātassa
tika-abh08t0:51_6: kammadvārassa vasena ca appavattanato avipākasabhāvato ca akammabhāvato ca appavattanato ceva puññakiriyavatthuvasena
tika-abh08t0:51_7: appavattanato ceva puññehi no samā asadisā.
tika-abh08t0:52_1: Parittārammaṇattā hi tesamekantato tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ekantato parittārammaṇattā kāmāvacarārammaṇattā tesu
tika-abh08t0:52_2: vipākesu sattapaññattikārammaṇā karuṇāmuditā kadāci kismiñci kāle na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:52_3: tathā evaṃ tisso pana viratiyo etesu vipākesu na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:52_5: pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti kusalā nāmāti satthunā vuttā yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:52_7: Tathādhipatinopettha tathā evameva cattāro adhipatinopi etesu vipākesu na santi. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:52_8: Chandādīni dhammajātāni puretaraṃ katvā anuppajjanato na santi,
tika-abh08t0:53_1: Asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ pana puññato vipākesu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ puññato kusalato āgamanavasena ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:53_2: Tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittacalanaṃ viya asaṅkhārassa kusalassa vipāko asaṅkhāro hoti,
tika-abh08t0:53_5: Paccayato ceva ñeyyaṃ tattha ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ matena balavantehi vibhūtehi paccayehi kammādīhi uppanno
tika-abh08t0:53_6: asaṅkhāro dubbalehi sasaṅkhāroti evaṃ paccayavasena viññeyyaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:54_1: Hīnādīnaṃ puññānaṃ vipākattā hīnādayo vipākā puññavādinā jinena paridīpitā bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:54_2: iti evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena pavattaṃ idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ ekantena savatthukaṃ kāmalokasmiṃ jāyate,
tika-abh08t0:54_3: aññattha pana aññāsu bhūmīsu na jāyate.
tika-abh08t0:55_2: Sesattayaṃ yadā cakkhuviññāṇena gahitaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:56_0: Rūpārammaṇāya kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamo padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ etassāti apagamapadaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:56_1: tāya āvajjanaṃ katvā ṭhitāya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccaṃ karīyatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:57_3: taṃ vacanaṃ tihetukapuññassa ukkaṭṭhassa vasena ācariyo paridīpaye.
tika-abh08t0:57_5: chandādhipateyyādīnaṃ vasena ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetukakusalavipākāni,
tika-abh08t0:58_1: Kusalānugataṃ katvā bhājitaṃ kiṃ mahaggataṃ vipākacittaṃ kusalānugataṃ kusalaṃ anugataṃ katvā mahaggatakusalacittena
tika-abh08t0:58_4: Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ iva asamānaphalaṃ natthi yato yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:58_5: tasmā vipākaṃ kusalānugataṃ katvā bhagavatā bhājitaṃ desitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:58_6: Kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti yathā aṭṭhavidhesu kāmāvacarakusalesu ukkaṭṭhatihetukakusalaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ tihetukapaṭisandhiṃ
tika-abh08t0:58_8: tihetukaomakañca duhetukaukkaṭṭhañca kāmasugatiyaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte tihetukavirahitāni
tika-abh08t0:58_10: duhetukaomakaṃ pana kāmasugatiyaṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte aṭṭha ahetukavipākāni nipphādeti,
tika-abh08t0:59_2: evaṃ mahaggatavipākaṃ sabbathā sabbapakārena attano kusaleheva samānaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:60_1: Kāmāvacarapuññaṃva nāparāpariyavedanaṃ idaṃ mahaggatakusalaṃ kāmāvacarapuññaṃva aparāpariyavedanaṃ aparasmiṃ bhave phaladāyakaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:60_2: jhānā aparihīnassa bhavagāmino paṭisandhigāmino sattassa kusalānantaraṃyeva phalaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:60_3: iti ca ñāpanatthaṃ etassa mahaggatavipākassa kusalānugataṃ kusalānugamanaṃ bhagavatā kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:61_1: Ettha etasmiṃ mahaggatavipāke paṭipadākkamo tesañca hīnādīnaṃ bhedato jhānāgamanato mahaggatakusalajhānassa
tika-abh08t0:62_2: ayameva visesato kusalato ayaṃ eva viseso,
tika-abh08t0:62_3: sesaṃ sabbapakāraṃ avisesena kusalena samaṃ mataṃ kathitaṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:63_4: appaṇihitaṃ dukkhaṃ iti etāni tīṇi nāmāni maggassa anantare catubbidhassa maggassa anantare catubbidhe phale honti.
tika-abh08t0:64_1: Labbhanti parabhāgasmiṃ maggānantare pavattaphalato aññasmiṃ kāle vaḷañjanaphalesu phalasamāpattisamāpajjanakālesu etāni tīṇi nāmāni na labbhante,
tika-abh08t0:64_2: phalehi vipassanāvaseneva anattaaniccadukkhasaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vipassanānaṃ vasena eva tāni tīṇi nāmāni labbhare phalehi labbhante.
tika-abh08t0:65_1: Honti sādhipatīneva lokuttaraphalāni tu ekantato sādhipatīni eva honti,
tika-abh08t0:65_2: lokuttaraphalāni ṭhapetvā aññasmiṃ vipāke adhipatī natthi.
tika-abh08t0:66_1: Maggo attano maggabhāvena maggo nāma vuccate bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:66_2: Phalaṃ maggaṃ upādāya aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ nissayaṃ katvā maggo nāma iti vacanaṃ vuccate bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:67_7: Sukhādittayayuttā te te aṭṭha ahetukakusalavipākā sukhādittayayuttā sukhasomanassaupekkhāvedanāhi sahagatā.
tika-abh08t0:67_8: Dukkhupekkhāyutā ime ime satta ahetukaakusalavipākā dukkhupekkhāvedanāhi sahagatā.
tika-abh08t0:68_5: pākena attano puññaphalena deve anusāsatīti vā pākasāsano, ko so? Sakko.
tika-abh08t0:68_6: Tena pākasāsanena pūjito savipākāvipākesu kusalavipākakiriyesu kusalo cheko evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pākaṃ cittaṃ chattiṃsappakāraṃ abrvi avoca.
tika-abh08t0:69_2: Sabbaññutaññāṇassa gati viya gati etissāti sabbaññutaññāṇagatikā.
tika-abh08t0:70_2: kusalākusalāni ca somanassayuttāni aṭṭha kusalākusalāni ca,
tika-abh08t0:70_3: kriyato pana pañca evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena hāsacittāni terasa.
tika-abh08t0:71_1: Puthujjanā hasantettha ettha etesu terasacittesu puthujjanā pana aṭṭhahi cittehi hasanti.
tika-abh08t0:71_2: Sekhā satta ariyā chahi cittehi hasanti.
tika-abh08t0:72_1: Imāni rūpārūpakiriyāni khīṇāsavānaṃ bhāvanāyeva kāro bhāvanākāro,
tika-abh08t0:72_5: Imesaṃ rūpārūpakiriyānaṃ tesañca rūpārūpakusalānaṃ ayameva viseso.
tika-abh08t0:73_2: abhinibbattitā pana puthujjanakālasmiṃ puthujjanabhāvaṭṭhitena yoginā abhinibbattitā yā rūpārūpasamāpatti,
tika-abh08t0:73_3: sā rūpārūpasamāpatti so yogī khīṇāsavo bhikkhu hutvā naṃ rūpārūpasamāpattiṃ yāva yattakaṃ kālaṃ na samāpajjate,
tika-abh08t0:73_4: tāva tattakena kālena tassa khīṇāsavabhikkhuno kusalā eva rūpārūpakusalā eva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:73_5: Khīṇāsavena sā rūpārūpasamāpatti sace yadi samāpannā samāpajjitā,
tika-abh08t0:74_3: arūpisu cattāri iti sabbāni kriyacittāni vīsati.
tika-abh08t0:76_14: paccayesu paresu kammatthe chaṭṭhī hotīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:76_16: Kriyākriyāpattivibhāgadesako hitāhitānaṃ sakriyākriyārato hitassa sakriyāya rato,
tika-abh08t0:76_20: akriyaṃ nāma kusalākusalavipākacittaṃ icchanti eke. Taṃ na. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:76_21: Kusalādhikāre “kusalaṃ muninā lapitaṃ” akusalādhikāre “pāpamānasaṃ pāpāpāpesvapāpena vuttaṃ” vipākādhikāre
tika-abh08t0:76_22: “pākaṃ sugato abravī”ti vatvā puna kriyādhikāre “kusalākusalavipākāni avocā”ti vacanassa vattabbābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:76_26: Yaṃ kriyākriyaṃ cittaṃ kriyākriyāsabhāvaṃ avoca desesi,
tika-abh08t0:77_2: cittuppādā mahesinā lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ekūnanavuti sabbe cittuppādā mahesinā tathāgatena samāsato saṅkhepato niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t0:78_2: ye bhikkhū pāṭavatthino abhidhammapiṭake paṭuno bhāvo pāṭavaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:78_6: tehi bhikkhūhi ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro uggahetabbo sikkhitabbo punappunaṃ cintitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:79_1: Ye janā tassaṅkāsena taṃsannibhena abhidhammāvatārena abhidhammamahodadhiṃ mahāsāgarasannibhaṃ abhidhammaṃ taranti,
tika-abh08t0:85_2: ye ca cetasikā mayā ye ca cetasikā cittānantaraṃ mayā uddiṭṭhā,
tika-abh08t0:85_3: ito paraṃ idāni tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ vibhājanaṃ karissāmi ahaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:86_0: Imesu pana karuṇāmuditāvasena bhāvanākāle karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā,
tika-abh08t0:86_5: Muditāpubbabhāge vā appanāpattāya muditāya pubbabhāge ekā muditā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:86_6: Iminā kāmāvacaracittena yogī micchākammantādīhi dhammehi viramati. Ramu-
tika-abh08t0:87_2: tettiṃsa niyatā matā ādinā puññacittena paṭhamamahākusalacittena saha niyatā tettiṃsa cetasikā bhagavatā matāti,
tika-abh08t0:87_3: atha vā karuṇāmuditā aniyatā ekena dhammena saha catuttiṃsa dhammā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:88_2: upekkhā ca na uddhaṭā ettha etesu yevāpanakadhammesu,
tika-abh08t0:88_4: mettā ca upekkhā ca dhammarājena satthunā na uddhaṭā na vuttā kasmā kāraṇā.
tika-abh08t0:89_2: upekkhāti tatramajjhattatāya ca gahitā yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:90_2: buddhenādiccabandhunā sabbe te yevāpanā dhammā yevāpananāmakā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpena eva.
tika-abh08t0:90_5: tena ādiccabandhunā buddhena na ca uddhaṭā na desitā.
tika-abh08t0:91_3: yasmā kāraṇā rāsiṃ dukavaggādirāsiṃ na bhajanti na sevanti,
tika-abh08t0:96_0: Chandādhimokkho muditā manasikāro majjhattatā karuṇā viratittayañca puññesukusalesu niyatā cattāro aniyatā
tika-abh08t0:96_1: pañca sabbe yevāpanā na ca eva tena munivarena vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:97_7: ārammaṇe cittassa paṭhamaṃ abhinipātattā phasso paṭhamaṃ samudīrito,
tika-abh08t0:97_8: phusitvā pana phassena phassena ārammaṇaṃ phusitvā yogino vedanāya ārammaṇaṃ vedaye,
tika-abh08t0:97_11: Sahajātānaṃ cetasikānaṃ phassova idha imasmiṃ citte mahesinā paṭhamaṃ vutto.
tika-abh08t0:97_16: cittānaṃ tu saheva ca “paṭhamābhinipātattā”ti ca “balavapaccayattā”ti ca idaṃ sabbaṃ vacanaṃ akāraṇaṃ ahetukaṃ ayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:97_21: ayaṃ pacchāti natthidaṃ ayaṃ dhammo paṭhamuppanno,
tika-abh08t0:97_22: ayaṃ dhammo pacchākāle uppanno iti idaṃ vacanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:97_24: Desanākkamato ceva paṭhamaṃ samudīrito iccevaṃ iti evaṃ iti iminā mayā vuttappakārena phassassa paṭhamaṃ samudīritataṃ viññunā vibhāvinā viññeyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:97_27: tasmā pubbāparakkamo yasmā kāraṇā ayaṃ pubbāparakkamo viññunā na ca pariyesitabbo na gavesitabbo,
tika-abh08t0:97_28: dhammā eva vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhi vijānatā paṇḍitena pariyesitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:98_0: Iṭṭhākārānubhavanarasā iṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanakiccā subhojanarasaṃ anubhavanto rājā viya.
tika-abh08t0:99_0: Paccābhiññāṇakaraṇarasā paṭijānanakiccā vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamiva vaḍḍhakino sakiṃ sañjānitvāpi
tika-abh08t0:100_1: Mahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viya yathā mahāvaḍḍhakī sayampi dāruṃ tacchati,
tika-abh08t0:101_0: Āhananaṃ bhuso hananaṃ, pariyāhananaṃ samantā hananaṃ, taṃ raso etassāti āhananapariyāhananaraso.
tika-abh08t0:105_0: Araññagatasudesako viya araññe gato maggasudesako viya.
tika-abh08t0:106_2: Santepi ca tesaṃ cetasikānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ tesaṃ pāletabbānaṃ cetasikānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:106_3: pavattakkhaṇeyeva taṃ jīvitaṃ te dhamme pāletabbe cetasike anupāleti.
tika-abh08t0:106_4: Udakaṃ viyāti yathā udakaṃ attani uppalādīni anupāleti,
tika-abh08t0:106_5: tathā anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne santepi tesaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva anupāleti,
tika-abh08t0:106_8: dhāti viya kumāraṃ aññāya janitaṃ kumāraṃ rakkhantī dhāti viya,
tika-abh08t0:106_10: Sayaṃpavattitadhammasambandheneva pavattati attanā pavattitehi dhammehi sampavattati.
tika-abh08t0:106_11: Niyāmako viya yathā niyāmako ekanāvāya vutthehi janehi saha pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:106_12: bhaṅgato uddhaṃ taṃ jīvitaṃ na pavattayati,
tika-abh08t0:106_13: attano ca abhāvā ṭhapayitabbānaṃ cetasikānañca abhāvā,
tika-abh08t0:106_14: bhaṅgakkhaṇe cetasike na ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā,
tika-abh08t0:106_15: vaṭṭisneho khīyamāno padīpasikhaṃ na karoti yathā.
tika-abh08t0:108_0: Kāyoti cettha vedanādayo tayo khandhā vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandho ime khandhā gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:115_2: buddhenādiccabandhunā ye sabbe cetasikā ādiccabandhunā buddhena vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:115_3: te sabbe cetasikā nāmasāmaññato nāmasamānabhāvena dvepaññāsabhavanti te,
tika-abh08t0:116_2: rūpe pañcadaseritā kāme kāmāvacare catupaññāsa cittāni īritā.
tika-abh08t0:116_3: Rūpe rūpāvacare pañcadasa cittāni īritā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:116_6: ekavīsasataṃ sabbe cittuppādā samāsato saṅkhepato ekavīsasataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:116_7: Etesu tesamuppattiṃ ito paraṃ etesu mayā vuttesu cittesu tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:116_8: uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya ahaṃ pavakkhāmi desissāmi.
tika-abh08t0:117_1: Ekaggatā cittekaggatā manakkāro manasikāro jīvitaṃ phassapañcakaṃ ete aṭṭha cetasikā avinibbhogā aññamaññato
tika-abh08t0:118_2: cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ ekaggatā manakkāro ime cetasikā sabbasādhāraṇā sabbacittehi sādhāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:119_3: Cāro chasaṭṭhicittesu vitakko tāva dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaresu ceva ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu
tika-abh08t0:119_5: Vicāro dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitakāmāvacaracittesu ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānacittesu ca ekādasasu dutiyajjhānacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:121_4: Tathekamhi sukhindriyaṃ tathā ekasmiṃ puññapāke kāyaviññāṇe hoti.
tika-abh08t0:122_2: vīriyaṃ āha nāyako jino pañcadvārāvajjanadvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇavajjite pañcuttarasate citte vīriyaṃ āha kathesi.
tika-abh08t0:123_2: ṭhapetvā cekahetuke sabbāni aṭṭhārasa ahetukacittāni ekahetukacittadvayañca ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ ekuttarasate
tika-abh08t0:123_3: citte chandassa uppattiṃ uddise paṇḍito katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:124_1: Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇādike dasa viññāṇe ca vicikicchāyutampi cittaṃ ṭhapetvā sesasmiṃ dasuttarasate citte adhimokkho bhagavatā udīrito.
tika-abh08t0:125_1: Saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso tatramajjhattaṃ cha yugaḷā ca iti ime ekūnavīsati dhammā niyatā hutvā ekanavutiyā citte jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:125_2: Ekūnavīsati dhammā ahetukesu aṭṭhārasasu apuññesu dvādasasu akusalesu na jāyare na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:126_7: rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānavajjitesu dvādasarūpāvacaresu cāti aṭṭhavīsatiyā cittesu siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:127_2: sabbalokuttaresu ca kāmāvacaramahākusalesu cittesu sabbesu lokuttaresu cāti saha aṭṭhake cattālīsavidhe citte viratittayaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:128_0: 105. Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ alobhādittayampi ca yugaḷāni cha ca majjhattaṃ karuṇāmuditāpi ca.
tika-abh08t0:129_1: Tathā tisso viratiyo sabbe te pañcavīsati dhammā mahākusalacittasampayuttaabyākatacittasampayuttāti kusalena
tika-abh08t0:130_2: moho uddhaccameva cāti ime cattāro dhammā niyatā hutvā dvādasāpuññacittesuyeva dvādasaakusalacittesuyeva jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:131_2: māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo vicikicchā middhaṃ uddhaccaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ macchariyampi ca ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ
tika-abh08t0:131_3: issā ca domanassakaṃ ete dhammā akusalā akusalacittasampayuttā ekantena mahesinā vijitaṅgaṇavigatamalena vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:132_1: Lobho aṭṭhasu lobhamūlesu cittesu bhagavatā niddiṭṭho dassito.
tika-abh08t0:132_4: Doso dvīsu eva paṭighasampayuttesu cittesu munindena vutto.
tika-abh08t0:133_4: Vicikicchā panekasmiṃ vicikicchā pana ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:134_2: cetanā jīvitaṃ mano vitakko ca vicāro ca pīti vīriyaṃ samādhi ca chando cevādhimokkho ca manasikāro ca
tika-abh08t0:134_3: cuddasa dhammā kusalā ca kusalacetasikā ca honti.
tika-abh08t0:134_4: Akusalā ceva akusalacetasikā ceva abyākatāpi ca abyākatacetasikā ca honti.
tika-abh08t0:135_6: aṭṭhasu lokuttarapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti ekūnatiṃsacittesu pañcaṅgikaṃ pañcāvayavajhānayuttaṃ jhānaṃ sugatena mataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:135_7: Upekkhāsahagatāni cattāri lobhamūlāni ca dve dosamūlāni ca dve mohamūlāni ca manodhātuttikañca upekkhāsahagatā
tika-abh08t0:135_8: tisso ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo ca dvādasupekkhāsahagatāni mahākusalamahāvipākakiriyacittāni tīṇi rūpadutiyajjhānacittāni
tika-abh08t0:135_9: aṭṭha lokuttaradutiyajjhānacittāni cāti sattatiṃsa cittāni catujhānaṅgayuttāni catujhānāvayavayuttāni
tika-abh08t0:136_3: aṭṭhalokuttaratatiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ tiavayavajhānayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:136_6: soḷasa lokuttaracatutthajjhānapañcamajjhānacittāni cāti catutiṃsavidhaṃ cittaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ dviavayavajhānayuttaṃ udīritaṃ jinena īritaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:137_2: jhānaṅgāni na uddhare sabhāvena pakatiyā avitakkesu vitakkavirahitesu dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgāni jhānāvayavāni jino na uddhare.
tika-abh08t0:137_6: pakatiyā vitakkavirahitāni dvipañcaviññāṇāni sabbāhetukacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni jino na uddhare na deseyya.
tika-abh08t0:138_1: Budho jino dvipañcaviññāṇesu manodhātuttike ca tīsu santīraṇesu cāti soḷasacittesu tīṇindriyāni vade katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:138_2: Ekasmiṃ pana cattāri ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagatacitte cattāri indriyāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:138_3: ekādasasu akusalacittesu vicikicchāyuttacittavajjitesu hasituppāde ceva voṭṭhabbanacitte cāti terasasu
tika-abh08t0:138_4: cittesu pañca indriyāni budho bhagavā uddhare uddhareyya.
tika-abh08t0:139_2: indriyāni jinobrvi jino buddho ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasacittesu satta indriyāni abrvi kathesi,
tika-abh08t0:139_6: dvādasasu arūpesu cāti ekenūnesu cattālīsamanesu aṭṭheva indriyāni abrvi.
tika-abh08t0:140_1: Cattālīsāya lokuttaracittesu navakaṃ indriyanavakaṃ nāyako abrvi kathesi.
tika-abh08t0:140_3: veditabbo vibhāvinā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittesu indriyayogo vibhāvinā visesena paññaṃ bhāvetuṃ pakāsetuṃ sīlametassāti vibhāvī,
tika-abh08t0:141_2: aṭṭhārasa ahetukā ettha etesu cittesu aṭṭhārasa ahetukā natthi maggo etesūti amaggaṅgāni nāma,
tika-abh08t0:141_4: viññāṇesu dvipañcasu dvipañcaviññāṇesu jhānaṅgānipi na saṃvijjanti.
tika-abh08t0:142_1: Ekaṃ cittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ ekaṃ vicikicchāsahagatacittaṃ dumaggaṅgaṃ dumaggāvayavaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:142_2: catūsu diṭṭhivippayuttākusalacittesu ca dvīsu paṭighayuttesu ca uddhaccayuttesu cāti sattasu cittesu ca timaggaṅgāni timaggāvayavāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:142_6: dvādasasu arūpāvacaresu cāti cattālīsāya cittesu caturaṅgiko maggo caturāvayavo maggo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:143_3: tīsu rūpapaṭhamajjhānacittesu cāti pañcaddasasu cittesu pañcaṅgiko pañcāvayavo maggo bhagavatā mato.
tika-abh08t0:143_4: Dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgikopi ca lokuttaradutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātesu dvattiṃsacittesu maggo sattaṅgiko sattāvayavo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:144_1: Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu maggaphalavasena aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko aṭṭhāvayavo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:144_4: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sabbacittesu maggaṅgāni maggāvayavāni dhīro uddhareyya,
tika-abh08t0:145_1: Balāni dve dvicittesu hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanasaṅkhātesu dvīsu cittesu dve balāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:145_2: Ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye ekasmiṃ vicikicchāyutte tīṇi balāni dhīro dīpaye pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t0:145_3: Vicikicchāyuttato sesesu ekādasasu akusalesu cattāri balāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:145_4: Cha dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttamahākusalamahāvipākamahākiriyāsaṅkhātesu dvādasasu cittesu cha balāni hontīti dhīro niddise katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:146_3: cattālīsalokuttaracittesu cāti ekūnāsītiyā cittesu satta balāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:146_4: Soḷasevābalāni tu dvipañcaviññāṇāni ca tisso manodhātuyo ca tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti soḷasa eva cittāni abalāni balavirahitāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:146_5: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittaṃ sabalaṃ balena sahagataṃ abalampi ca balavirahitañcāpi cittaṃ viññeyyaṃ dhīrena vijānitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:147_2: cittesu jāyanti hi yesu yāni yesu cittesu yāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalaindriyāni jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:147_3: mayā samāsena samuddharitvā asaṃsaṭṭhaṃ uddharitvā tesu cittesu sabbānipi tāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalaindriyāni
tika-abh08t0:147_4: samāsena saṅkhepena mayā buddhadattācariyena vuttāni kathitāni.
tika-abh08t0:156_0: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ ito paricchedato paraṃ ekavidhādikaṃ nayaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ buddhiyā vuddhitthāya pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
tika-abh08t0:157_3: duvidhañca bhave cittaṃ ahetukasahetukato idaṃ cittaṃ duvidhaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:158_2: kāme dasa ca pañca ca hi saccaṃ kāme kāmāvacare kusalākusalavipākā dasa pañca ca kiriyā tisso iti sabbe aṭṭhārasa cittuppādā ahetukā.
tika-abh08t0:159_1: Ahetukato cittuppādato sesā ekasattati cittuppādā sahetukāti sahetukā nāmāti mahesinā tādinā aviparītasabhāvena hetuvādinā paccayavādinā niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t0:160_2: avatthukavasena ca sabbaṃ vuttappakārena ca mānasaṃ tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:161_2: rūpe pañcadasāpi ca cittuppādā ādimaggo paṭhamamaggo hasituppādo manodhātukiriyāpi ca domanassadvayañcāpi
tika-abh08t0:161_3: tecattālīsa mānasā vinā vatthuṃ vatthuṃ vajjetvā na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:161_6: mayā vuttato cittuppādato sesāni dvecattālīsa cittāni ubhayathā savatthukāvatthukavasena siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:162_2: pañcārammaṇameva ca cittaṃ chaḷārammaṇakañceti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārenāpi tividhaṃ cittaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:163_2: aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca abhiññāmānasaṃ ṭhapetvā sabbaṃ mahaggatañcevāti tecattālīsa cittuppādā pana ekekārammaṇā viññeyyā dhīrena.
tika-abh08t0:163_3: Tattha citte manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇaṃ īritaṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:163_4: Mayā vuttacittato sesāni tecattālīsa cittāni chaḷārammaṇikāni matāni satthunā,
tika-abh08t0:163_5: tathā evaṃ cittaṃ kusalākusalādito tividhaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:164_1: Ahetukaṃ cittaṃ ekahetukañca cittaṃ dvihetukañca cittaṃ tihetukañca cittanti evaṃ iminā pakārena cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:165_1: Heṭṭhā mayāpi niddiṭṭhā aṭṭhārasa cittuppādā ahetukā,
tika-abh08t0:165_2: vicikicchuddhaccasaṃyuttaṃ cittaṃ ekahetukaṃ evaṃ udīritaṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:165_3: Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato kusalavasena ca vipākavasena ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā
tika-abh08t0:165_4: akusalā ca dasadhā cāti bāvīsati cittuppādā duhetukā.
tika-abh08t0:165_5: Kāme kāmāvacare puññavipākakriyato puññavasena ca vipākavasena ca kiriyāvasena ca dvādasadhā cittuppādā.
tika-abh08t0:166_3: ca tikiccājanakavasena cātiādīhi pakārehi sabbaṃ cittaṃ catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:166_15: Copanaṃ na pāpenti viññattiṃ na janayantīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:166_17: dasa viññāṇe ṭhapetvā dvīsu bhūmīsu vipākā manodhātudvayasantīraṇattayamahāvipākarūpavipākānaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:166_18: aṭṭhārasa pākā manodhātu kiriyā cevāti imāni ekūnavīsati cittāni rūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti,
tika-abh08t0:166_20: puna dvepañcaviññāṇā paṭhamaṃ “dasa viññāṇe”ti vuttattā “punā”ti vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:166_21: Arūpīsu vipākā ca sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhicittañca arahato cuticittañca ime soḷasa mānasā tikiccāni na karonti.
tika-abh08t0:167_2: pañcaṭṭhānappabhedato ekakiccadvikiccatikiccacatukiccapañcakiccabhedena pañcadhā cittaṃ pañcapakāraṃ cittaṃ pañcanimmalalocano buddho akkhāsi kathesi.
tika-abh08t0:171_1: Sabbeva pañcapaññāsa cittuppādā javanaṭṭhānatoyeva javanakiccavaseneva ekaṭṭhāne ekakicce nippapañcena
tika-abh08t0:172_1: Puna dvepañcaviññāṇā cittuppādā dassane savane tathā ghāyane sāyanaṭṭhāne phusane paṭipāṭiyā satthunā niyāmitā.
tika-abh08t0:173_2: ete aṭṭhasaṭṭhi cittuppādā ekaṭṭhānikataṃ ekakiccabhāvaṃ gatā pattā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:174_3: Chadvāre tadālambaṇañca balavārammaṇe atimahantārammaṇe sati siyā,
tika-abh08t0:174_5: Manodvāresu pana sabbesaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ āvajjanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:175_1: Paṭisandhiyā ṭhānato paṭisandhiyā kiccavasena bhavaṅgassa ṭhānato bhavaṅgassa kiccavasena cutiyā ṭhānato
tika-abh08t0:175_2: cutiyā kiccavasena te mahaggatavipākā nava tiṭṭhānikā tikiccāti muninā matā.
tika-abh08t0:176_2: paṭisandhibhavaṅgato paṭisandhibhavaṅgavasena tadārammaṇato ceva tadārammaṇavasena ca eva cutiṭṭhānavasena
tika-abh08t0:176_7: Paṭisandhibhavaṅgānaṃ ṭhānavasena ca cutiṭṭhānavasena ca idaṃ cittadvayaṃ pañcaṭṭhānikacittaṃ nāmāti udīritaṃ muninā.
tika-abh08t0:177_5: imesaṃ imehi cittuppādehi sesaṃ ekakaṃ kiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:181_1: Chabbidhaṃ hoti taṃ channaṃ taṃ cittaṃ channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyamanoviññāṇānaṃ pabhedato chabbidhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:182_2: pañcārammaṇabhedato chaḷārammaṇato ceva chaḷārammaṇacittavasena mano cittaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:183_1: Tattha tasmiṃ citte dvepañcaviññāṇā ekekagocarā honti,
tika-abh08t0:184_2: sabbaṃ lokuttarañca iti idaṃ cittaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh08t0:185_0: 170. Idaṃ chakkaṃ ekekārammaṇaṃ vibhāvinā ñeyyaṃ, manodhātuttayaṃ pañcārammaṇikaṃ nāma bhave.
tika-abh08t0:186_1: Kāmāvacaracittāni cattālīsaṃ tathā ekekaṃ sabbāni abhiññāni ca chaḷārammaṇikānīti chaḷārammaṇikāni nāma paṇḍitena viññeyyāni.
tika-abh08t0:187_1: Sattaviññāṇadhātūsu pacchimaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tidhā katvā navavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:188_0: 173. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā bhedo puññāpuññavaseneva vipākakiriyabhedato chasattatividho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:189_0: 174. Manodhātuṃ vipākakiriyabhedato dvidhā katvā pubbe vuttehi navadhā cittehi mānasaṃ dasadhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:190_3: manoviññāṇadhātuñca kusalākusalābyākatavasena tividhā katvā cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi saha cittaṃ ekādasavidhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:191_1: Manoviññāṇadhātumpi kusalākusalādito kusalākusalavipākakiriyāvasena catudhā vibhajitvāna taṃ cittaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyaviññāṇehi
tika-abh08t0:191_2: saha tippakārāya manodhātuyā ca saha dvādasadhāpi dhīro vade.
tika-abh08t0:192_2: paṭisandhiyā vasena ca bhavaṅgavasena ca cutiyā vasena ca āvajjanassa vasena ca pañcannaṃ dassanādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:192_3: kiccānaṃ vasena ca sampaṭicchanacetaso vasena ca santīraṇassa vasena ca voṭṭhabbanajavanānaṃ vasena ca,
tika-abh08t0:192_4: yathā evaṃ tadārammaṇacittassa vasena cāti evaṃ iminā pakārena ṭhānabhedato kiccabhedena cuddasadhā cittaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:192_5: iti idaṃ vacanaṃ dhīro paridīpaye paridīpeyya.
tika-abh08t0:193_2: puggalanānattavasena ca cittānaṃ pavattito idaṃ cittaṃ bahudhā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:194_1: Idha imasmiṃ sāsane yo bhikkhu matimā imasmiṃ ekavidhādinaye kusalo cheko hoti,
tika-abh08t0:194_2: abhidhamme pavattā atthā tassa bhikkhuno hatthagatā hatthapaviṭṭhā āmalakā viya suddhamaṇikā viya honti.
tika-abh08t0:203_0: Ahaṃ ito paraṃ buddhivuddhikaraṃ nayaṃ mativaddhikaraṃ nayaṃ pavakkhāmi desessāmi.
tika-abh08t0:203_1: Cittānaṃ bhūmisuppattiṃ puggalānaṃ vasena ca bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:203_2: puggalānaṃ vasena bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca pavakkhāmi.
tika-abh08t0:204_3: gatiyo pañca tesaṃ devamanussatiracchānapetanirayagatīnaṃ vasena pañca gatiyo niddiṭṭhā satthunā dassitā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:204_4: Tayo bhavā pana kāmarūpārūpabhavavasena tayo satthunā niddiṭṭhā dassitā.
tika-abh08t0:205_2: tāsu tiṃseva puggalā tattha tesu tīsu bhavesu tiṃsa eva bhūmiyo honti,
tika-abh08t0:205_3: tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā tiṃsa eva honti,
tika-abh08t0:205_4: etāsu bhūmīsu uppannā sabbe ca pana puggalā paṭisandhikacittānaṃ vasena ekūnavīsati honti.
tika-abh08t0:205_5: Paṭisandhi ca nāmesā esā paṭisandhi ca nāma duvidhā dvippakārā samudīritā satthunā kathitā.
tika-abh08t0:206_2: sacittakā paṭisandhi ca iti duvidhā paṭisandhi hoti,
tika-abh08t0:206_4: Sesā rūpapaṭisandhito sesā sacittakā sacittakapaṭisandhi ñeyyā paṇḍitena jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:206_5: Sā pana sacittakā paṭisandhi ekūnavīsati hoti.
tika-abh08t0:207_1: Paṭisandhivaseneva sacittakapaṭisandhivasena eva vīsati puggalā honti.
tika-abh08t0:207_2: Idha imasmiṃ cittādhikāre cittādhikārattā acittakapaṭisandhi rūpapaṭisandhi na ca uddhaṭā na ca kathitā mayā.
tika-abh08t0:208_2: puggalā tividhā siyuṃ ahetukadvihetukatihetukā iti tividhā tippakārā puggalā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:208_3: Ariyā pana puggalā aṭṭha iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sabbe puggalā ekādasa īritā kathitā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:209_1: Bhūmīsu tiṃsabhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiṃ etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pabhedato bhūmīsu cittānaṃ uppattiñca
tika-abh08t0:210_2: Me mayhaṃ vada tāni cittāni tvaṃ kathehi,
tika-abh08t0:213_2: kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ vīsati cittāni kāmeyeva bhave sadā sabbasmiṃ kāle siyuṃ bhaveyyunti.
tika-abh08t0:216_1: Pākā apuññajā akusalato jātā ahetukā satta vipākā.
tika-abh08t0:216_2: Pañca rūpabhaveyeva pañca cittāni rūpabhaveyeva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:216_3: Cattāreva arūpisu cattāri cittāni arūpīsuyeva honti.
tika-abh08t0:226_0: Dvecattālīsa cittāni, honti tīsu bhavesupi dvecattālīsa cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:232_2: catassopāyabhūmiyo catasso apāyabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā vajjetvā apāyato sesānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ chabbīsabhūmīsu terasa eva cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:236_2: ṭhapetvāruppabhūmiyo catasso arūpabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu chabbīsabhūmīsu aparāni cha cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:240_2: ṭhapetvā pañca bhūmiyo pañca bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā pañcavīsatibhūmīsu pañca cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:246_0: Catassopāyabhūmiyo nevasaññānāsaññañca ṭhapetvāyeva pañcavīsatibhūmīsu aparāni duve cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:249_2: catuvīsatibhūmisu catassopāyabhūmiyo ākiñcaññañca nevasaññañca ṭhapetvā sesāsu catuvīsatibhūmīsu dvepi cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:252_1: Apāyabhūmiyo hitvā catasso apāyabhūmiyo tisso upari arūpabhūmiyo hitvā chaḍḍetvā sesāsu tevīsatibhūmīsu dveyeva pana cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:255_1: Arūpe ca apāye ca aṭṭha bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu bāvīsatibhūmīsu ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:258_1: Suddhāvāse apāye ca nava bhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekavīsāsu bhūmīsu niccampi cattāro eva mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t0:262_2: cittaṃ jāyati bhūmisu suddhāvāsaapāyāruppabhūmiyo ṭhapetvā avasesāsu sattarasasu bhūmīsu ekaṃ cittaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:267_0: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā. –
tika-abh08t0:268_0: Ekūnavīsatibhūmiyo ṭhapetvā sesāsu ekādasasu bhūmīsu dvādasa cittāni jāyanti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:271_1: Kāmāvacaradevānaṃ vasena ca manussānaṃ vasena ca sattasu kāmāvacarabhūmīsu aṭṭha cittāni sabbadā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:273_0: Sadā sattasu etāni, hitvā tevīsa bhūmiyo.
tika-abh08t0:274_2: jāyate chasu bhūmisu eko pañcamajjhānavipāko vehapphalādīsu chasu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:274_3: Cattāri pana rūpavipākacittāni tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:274_7: eko tatiyarūpavipāko ca parittābhāappamāṇābhāābhassarānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:274_8: eko catuttharūpavipāko parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:275_2: honti ekekabhūmisu arūpāvacaravipākānaṃ vasena cattāri pana cittāni ekekabhūmīsu ekekāsu bhūmīsu honti,
tika-abh08t0:275_3: iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sabbāsu bhūmīsu cittuppādaṃ paridīpaye paṇḍito katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:276_2: tesaṃ pākā ahetukā tesaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ ahetukā pañcadasa vipākā āvajjanadvayañca iti evaṃ iminā mayā
tika-abh08t0:276_3: vuttappakārena sattatiṃsa mānasā narakādīsu catūsu apāyesupi jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:276_4: Avasesāni dvipaññāsa cittāni kadācipi kismiñci kālepi nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:281_1: Kāme devamanussānaṃ kāmāvacare devamanussānaṃ mahaggatā nava pākā neva jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:286_1: Kāme kāmāvacare aṭṭha mahāvipākā domanassadvayampi ca tathā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ kusalavipākaṃ apuññajā satta pākā.
tika-abh08t0:286_3: rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ arūpapākā ca cattāro rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:286_5: rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ aṭṭha mahāvipākā kāmasugatisattānaṃ dvinnaṃ vipākacittattā na honti,
tika-abh08t0:286_8: aniṭṭhārammaṇānaṃ abhāvato satta akusalavipākā ca natthi,
tika-abh08t0:286_11: Imehi saha cittehi imehi catuvīsaticittehi saha tayo maggā phaladvayaṃ sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo
tika-abh08t0:286_12: anāgāmimaggo ca sotāpattiphalasakadāgāmiphalāni ca cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā vicikicchāsaṃyuttampi ca cattāro
tika-abh08t0:286_13: heṭṭhimā pākā ca suddhāvāse na labbhare na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:286_16: atha vā ghorātikkamaṭṭhitattā anāgāmipuggalā suddhā nāma,
tika-abh08t0:286_18: tesaṃ suddhānaṃ dvinnaṃ uttamasattānaṃ āvāsotipi suddhāvāso, tasmiṃ.
tika-abh08t0:287_3: Anāgāmiphalaṭṭhānaṃyeva tasmiṃ uppajjanato cattāro diṭṭhisaṃyuttā ca vicikicchāyuttañca pañca akusalacittānaṃ sotāpannena vināsitattā,
tika-abh08t0:287_5: Cattāro heṭṭhimavipākā heṭṭhimānaṃ rūpabrahmānaṃ vipākacittattā natthi.
tika-abh08t0:287_6: Sesāni ekapaññāsa cittāni suddhāvāse pana labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:289_0: Kāmapuññāni aṭṭha ca, rūpapuññāni pañca vā.
tika-abh08t0:294_0: Rūpāvacarikā sabbe sabbāni rūpāvacarāni pañcadasa cittāni, kāmadhātuyā sabbe tevīsati vipākā.
tika-abh08t0:295_1: Domanassādimaggo ca domanassadvayañca ādimaggo ca sotāpattimaggo ca,
tika-abh08t0:295_2: kriyā ca dve ahetukā pañcadvārāvajjanahasituppādāni kiriyāni cāti tecattālīsa cittāni arūpabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:295_7: Kusalavipākā manodhātu cakkhādiggahitapañcārammaṇattā arūpānaṃ dhammārammaṇattā natthi,
tika-abh08t0:295_8: asati cakkhādiviññāṇe sā ca puññajā manodhātu tāya ca asatiyā cakkhādiviññāṇampi natthiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:296_2: cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmivasena cittuppattiṃ vibhāvaye dhīro katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:296_3: Tathā evaṃ ekādasannaṃ puggalānaṃ vasena cittuppattiṃ dhīro vibhāvaye katheyya.
tika-abh08t0:303_1: Evaṃ catūsvapāyabhūmīsu manussabhūmiyañcāti pañcabhūmīsu ahetukassa sattassa jāyante uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:303_3: na jāyanti kadācipi avasesāni dvepaññāsa cittāni kadācipi na jāyanti na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:304_1: Ahetukassa sattassa uppajjantehi sattatiṃsacittehi saha duhetukā,
tika-abh08t0:304_2: catumahāvipākā cāti cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekakaṃ duhetukassa sattassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:305_1: Sabbe mahaggatā ceva sabbe sattavīsatividhā mahaggatā ceva sabbepi ca anāsavā sabbe aṭṭha lokuttarā ceva
tika-abh08t0:305_2: cattāro tihetukavipākā ca kāme hasituppādo sahetukamahākiriyā cāti nava kriyāpi ceti cattālīsaṃ tathā
tika-abh08t0:305_3: aṭṭha ca duhetuno sattassa na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:306_1: duhetuno rūpārūpasamāpattiyā asamatthatāya sattavīsa mahaggatā na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:306_2: maggaphalaṃ adhigantuṃ asamatthatāya aṭṭha lokuttarā na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:306_3: tihetukavipākā tihetukānaṃ sattānaṃ vipākacittattā na jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:306_4: nava kiriyāni khīṇāsavānaṃyeva uppajjamānattā na jāyantīti.
tika-abh08t0:306_8: Duhetukassa vuttāni cattālīsa cittāni tathā ekañca kāmadhātuyaṃ cattāro ñāṇasampayuttavipākā rūpārūpesu nava puññāni cāti catupaññāsa mānasā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:306_9: Puthujjanassa tihetuno kāmasattassa pañcatiṃsa cittāni na jāyare na jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:308_0: Nava mahaggatā pākā, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh08t0:311_0: Chadevesu manussesu cāti sattasu bhūmīsu jātassa sotāpannassa dehino sattassa paññāsa cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:316_0: Assa sotāpannassa navatiṃseva cittāni na uppajjanti. Iti vacanaṃ dhīro dīpaye deseyya. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:318_0: Nava mahaggatā pākā, satta lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh08t0:321_1: Paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā sotāpannassa puggalassa vuttāni cittāni attano sakadāgāmino phalena sakadāgāmiphalena saha sakadāgāmipuggalassa siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:322_2: ṭhapetvā paṭighadvayaṃ dutiyañca phalaṃ sakadāgāmiphalañca hitvā attano anāgāmiphalena saha sotāpannassa
tika-abh08t0:322_3: sattassa vuttāni yāni aṭṭhacattālīsa cittāni atthi,
tika-abh08t0:323_2: kāme arahato pana kāme sattasu kāmabhūmīsu jātassa arahato khīṇāsavassa kati cittāni jāyanti?
tika-abh08t0:323_3: Cattāri ca cattārīsañca cittāni kāme sattasu kāmabhūmīsu jātassa arahato siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:326_1: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ catunnampi tesaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ maggacittaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:326_2: Ekacittakkhaṇā hi te hi saccaṃ taṃ mayā vuttaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:327_2: paṭhamajjhānabhūmisu tīsu eva paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa puthujjanassa brahmuno pañcatiṃsa eva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:333_1: Ghānādīsu pasādesu pavattaṃ kusalavipākaṃ viññāṇattayaṃ satta apuññajā pākā aṭṭha mahāpākā tathā uparijhānabhūmīsu
tika-abh08t0:333_2: jātā pākā āruppā cattāro vipākāpi ca domanassadvayampi ca āvajjanadvayavajjā aṭṭhārasa kriyā ceva aṭṭha
tika-abh08t0:333_3: lokuttarāni ca etāni catupaññāsa cittāni paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu tīsu nibbattassa puthujjanassa dehino sattassa
tika-abh08t0:333_5: Tāsu tīsu bhūmīsu nibbattassa puthujjanassa brahmuno vuttesu cittesu apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā tattha tīsu
tika-abh08t0:333_6: paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu nibbattassa sotāpannassa brahmuno paṭhamaphalena saha ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:333_7: Sakadāgāmino tattha tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa sakadāgāmino brahmuno tesu cittesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ
tika-abh08t0:333_8: ṭhapetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ pakkhipitvā ekatiṃseva cittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:333_9: Anāgāmissa tattheva tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu eva jātassa anāgāmissa dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalacittena saha ekatiṃseva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:337_1: Arahattaphalaṃ paṭhamajjhānato sambhavo pāko sattavīsati cittāni arahantassa khīṇāsavassa jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:337_2: Puthujjanassa tīsveva tīsu eva dutiyajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa puthujjanassa brahmuno dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānapākena saha chattiṃsa cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:344_2: hitvā vāpuññapañcakaṃ attano phalena saha bāttiṃsa cittāni sotāpannassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:344_4: ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ sotāpannassa vuttesu paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalacittena saha bāttiṃsa cittāni,
tika-abh08t0:344_5: sakadāgāmissa vuttesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā anāgāmiphalena saha bāttiṃseva cittāni assa anāgāmino bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:344_7: aṭṭhavīsati attano tīsu eva dutiyajjhānabhūmīsu jātassa arahato attano phalena dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānapākato pākehi saha aṭṭhavīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:349_2: devānaṃ tīsu bhūmīsu catutthajjhānavipākena saha pañcatiṃseva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:349_4: tiṃsa cittāni jāyaretattha tāsu tīsu parittakasubhādīnaṃ bhūmīsu sotāpannassa ca ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:349_5: Yathā evaṃ sakadāgāmino ekatiṃsa cittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:349_7: Tattheva tāsu tīsu bhūmīsu eva jātassa khīṇāsavassa sattavīsati mānasā honti,
tika-abh08t0:349_8: tathā evaṃ vehapphale vehapphalabhūmiyaṃ jātānaṃ puthujjanasekkhānaṃ pañcannaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t0:349_9: Pañcasu suddhāvāsikabhūmīsu jātassa anāgāmino sattassa ekatiṃseva cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:349_11: Tattheva tāsu suddhāvāsabhūmīsu eva jātassa arahato sattavīsati mānasā honti.
tika-abh08t0:349_12: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena rūpīsu pañcadasasu rūpibhūmīsu jātānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ cittāni vibhāvinā dhīrena viññeyyāni jānitabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:350_2: paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ paṭhamaāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa catuvīsati cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:354_2: ṭhapetvāpuññapañcakaṃtattha tissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ eva sotāpannassa puggalassa apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā attano phalena saha vīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:354_4: anāgāminopi ca puggalassa pubbaṃ pubbaṃ phalaṃ vinā vajjetvā attano phalena saha vīsati cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:354_5: Khīṇāsavassa tattheva tattha tissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ eva jātassa khīṇāsavassa dasa pañca mānasā ca jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:357_0: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa tevīsati cittāni honti. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:361_0: Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena vatvā kathetvā dhīro paṇḍito vibhāvaye deseyya.
tika-abh08t0:361_1: Ettha etissaṃ dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātānaṃ tiṇṇannaṃ sekkhānampi ekūnavīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:366_1: Cuddaseva tu cittāni dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa kiriyacittāni dvādasa eko pāko arahattaphalañcāti cuddaseva cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:369_2: tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ tatiyaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa bāvīsati cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:373_0: 254-5. Aṭṭhāraseva cittāni, sotāpannassa puggalassa aṭṭhārasa eva cittāni jāyare. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:378_0: Sakadāgāmino paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena tāni aṭṭhārasa cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:378_1: Sakadāgāmino vuttesu cittesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena saha aṭṭhārasa cittāni eva anāgāmissa jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:379_2: tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ tatiyaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa teraseva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:382_2: catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ catutthaarūpabhūmiyaṃ jātassa puthujjanassa sattassa ekavīsati cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:386_0: 258-260. Sotāpannassa sattassa, sattarasa cittāni dhīro pakāsaye. Taṃ yathā –
tika-abh08t0:390_0: Sakadāgāmino paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā tāni eva cittāni saphalena honti.
tika-abh08t0:390_1: Sakadāgāmino vuttesu cittesu dutiyaṃ phalaṃ ṭhapetvā attano phalena sattarasa mānasā anāgāmissa honti.
tika-abh08t0:390_3: catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa arahantassa dvādasa eva cittāni jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:393_0: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puggalānaṃ vasena bhūmīsu cittappavattiṃ vidū dhīro vibhāvaye.
tika-abh08t0:394_2: brahmānaṃ uparūpari jātā arūpakusalā ceva kiriyāpi ca uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:394_3: Uddhaṃ uddhaṃ bhāge jātānaṃ arūpīnaṃ brahmānaṃ heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā āruppā heṭṭhābhāge jātā arūpāvacarā pana neva jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:395_1: Ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ sotāpattimaggaṃ ṭhapetvā kusalānuttarā tayo tayo anuttarā kusalā tayo maggā,
tika-abh08t0:395_8: etāni pana tecattālīsa mānasā paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:396_4: domanassadvayampi ca ādimaggo ca tathā upari jātā tayo arūpapākā cāti chacattālīsa cittāni ettha etissaṃ paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:397_2: paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ vuttesu cittesu kusalapākakiriyāvasena paṭhamāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pāko cāti
tika-abh08t0:397_4: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena sesadvaye paṭhamadutiyāruppato sesaākiñcaññāyatananevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmidvaye
tika-abh08t0:397_5: heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena heṭṭhābhāge jātaṃ arūpattayaṃ hitvā attano attano pākā evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:397_6: iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena ñeyyā jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:398_3: sabbe sabbāni ca catūsu āruppabhūmīsu honti.
tika-abh08t0:398_4: Voṭṭhabbanena cittena saha kāme aṭṭha mahākiriyā,
tika-abh08t0:398_5: catasso arūpakiriyāpi cāti terasa eva kiriyā paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:398_6: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ hitvā dvādasa eva kiriyā honti.
tika-abh08t0:398_7: Tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamadutiyāruppakiriyāni hitvā ekādasa kiriyā honti.
tika-abh08t0:398_8: Catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ jātassa khīṇāsavassa paṭhamadutiyatatiyāruppakiriyāni hitvā daseva kiriyā ñeyyā jānitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:402_1: arahattaphalañcāti ekūnavīsati cittāni arahato pana honti.
tika-abh08t0:403_1: Catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānañca tihetukaputhujjane ca teraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:403_5: nava rūpārūpapākā ca ime teraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:404_1: Catunnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānañca duhetukaputhujjane ca ñāṇaparihīnāni cattāri vipākāni eva jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:404_3: catunnaṃ ariyadehinaṃ ariyagatānaṃ sattannaṃ puggalānaṃ sattaraseva cittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:405_2: tihetukaputhujjane catunnaṃ puggalānaṃ mahaggatāni eva kusalāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:405_4: ādito tiṇṇaṃ ariyānaṃ heṭṭhā ariyānaṃ teraseva cittāni uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:405_9: Heṭṭhā dvinnaṃ phalaṭṭhānaṃ sotāpannasakadāgāmipuggalānaṃ sabbaputhujjane ahetukaduhetukatihetukaputhujjane domanassayuttaṃ dvayameva cittaṃ jāyate.
tika-abh08t0:408_0: Tesaṃ catunnaṃ maggaṭṭhānaṃ puggalānaṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ ekameva maggacittaṃ bhave bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:408_1: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena dhīro paṇḍito vibhāvaye cittappavattiṃ pakāsaye.
tika-abh08t0:409_4: puggalānaṃ vasena ca cittappavatti bhikkhūnaṃ ābhidhammikabhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya chekabhāvāya mayā pakāsitā.
tika-abh08t0:409_6: bhūmipuggalabhedato evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena bhūmipuggalabhedato idaṃ sabbaṃ cittaṃ bahudhāpi ca bahuppakārampi ca hoti.
tika-abh08t0:409_8: Sakkā vuttānusārena mayā vuttassa anusārena bhedo cittabhedo vibhāvinā ñātuṃ vijānituṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t0:409_11: cintetvā ca punappunaṃ atthaṃ upaparikkhitvā vibhāvinā gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:410_2: varaṃ sattamohandhakārappadīpaṃ imañca abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ susāraṃ sundarasārabhūtaṃ varaṃ sattaandhakārasadise
tika-abh08t0:410_3: mohe padīpaṃ pajjotappadīpaṃ yo naro sādhukaṃ cinteti vācetipi,
tika-abh08t0:410_4: taṃ naraṃ rāgadosā ciraṃ cirakālaṃ nopayanti na upagacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:418_0: Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.
tika-abh08t0:419_0: Ito paraṃ ito paricchedato paraṃ ahaṃ etesaṃ pana cittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassayissāmi. Hi kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:419_1: Tena vinā taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā cittānaṃ sambhavo natthi yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:421_0: Rūpaṃ saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;
tika-abh08t0:423_0: Chaḷārammaṇesu chekā paṇḍitā ārammaṇaṃ chadhā chappakāraṃ āhu kathesuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:424_2: Tattha tesu ārammaṇesu bhūte upādāya bhūte paṭicca vaṇṇo catusamuṭṭhito kammacittautuāhārasaṅkhātehi
tika-abh08t0:424_3: catūhi paccayehi samuṭṭhito nibbatto nidassanena saha pavatto paṭighena saha pavatto rūpārammaṇasaññito.
tika-abh08t0:425_2: saddo cittotusambhavo saddo duvidhopi muninā samuddiṭṭho cittotusambhavo,
tika-abh08t0:425_4: Vacībhedakacittena bhūtāya jātāya bhūmiyā pathavīdhātuyā vikāratā pathavīlakkhaṇabhāvato atithaddhalakkhaṇatā vikāratā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:425_5: Sā vacīviññatti viññāyatīti viññattiyā upādiṇṇaghaṭṭanassa kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanassa kāraṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:425_6: cittajapathavīdhātuyā kammajapathavīdhātuyā ghaṭṭanañca saddo ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:426_1: Aviññāṇakasaddo yo so aviññāṇakasaddo utusamuṭṭhito hoti.
tika-abh08t0:426_2: Ayaṃ duvidhopi saddo saddārammaṇataṃ gato saddārammaṇabhāvaṃ patto.
tika-abh08t0:427_1: Dharīyatīti gacchanto gacchanto janehi dharīyateti gandho.
tika-abh08t0:427_4: Sūcanato attano sādhāraṇassa pupphādino vatthussa pakāsanatopi vā gandho nāma.
tika-abh08t0:427_6: Ayaṃ gandho catūhi samuṭṭhānaṃ etassāti catusamuṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:428_2: rasoti parikittito janā rasamānā yaṃ dhammajātaṃ rasanti anubhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:428_4: tasmā kāraṇā raso iti raso nāma paṇḍitehi parikittito,
tika-abh08t0:429_1: Phusīyatīti phoṭṭhabbaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ janehi phusīyatīti tasmā phoṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:430_2: hitvā rūpādipañcakaṃ rūpādipañcakaṃ hitvā sabbaṃ nāmañca cittacetasikanibbānanāmañca rūpañca pañcapasādasukhumarūpañca
tika-abh08t0:430_3: lakkhaṇāni ca aniccadukkhaanattalakkhaṇāni ca paññatti ca dhammārammaṇasaññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:432_2: āpāthaṃ na vajanti ye ye rūpādayo pañca visayā khaṇavatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ khaṇassa parittattā
tika-abh08t0:432_3: mandattā tesaṃ appāyukattā vatthuparittattā pañcārammaṇānaṃ atikhuddakavatthukattā āpāthaṃ pañcadvāresu
tika-abh08t0:432_6: te rūpādayo pañca visayā dhammārammaṇaṃ honti.
tika-abh08t0:432_7: Iti yesaṃ ekaccānaṃ ācariyānaṃ mataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:432_9: Te paṭikkhipitabbāva te evaṃ vādino ekacce ācariyā paṭikkhipitabbā,
tika-abh08t0:432_11: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ saddaṃ na paṭianubhoti,
tika-abh08t0:432_12: sotaviññāṇaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa gocarabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ na paṭianubhoti.
tika-abh08t0:432_13: Iti aññamaññassa gocaraṃ neva paccanubhontānaṃ tesaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viññāṇānaṃ tañca gocaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:432_16: Rūpādayo pana visayā rūpādipañcārammaṇāni eva honti.
tika-abh08t0:433_2: rūpādīneva gocarā tāni rūpādīni eva gocarā dibbacakkhādiñāṇānaṃ anāpāthagatānaṃ eva pākaṭabhāvaṃ appattāneva.
tika-abh08t0:433_5: taṃ dhammajātaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena dhammārammaṇaṃ bhaveyya?
tika-abh08t0:433_6: Evaṃ sati rūpārammaṇassa dhammārammaṇatte sati etesaṃ rūpārammaṇadhammārammaṇānaṃ niyamopi kathaṃ bhave kena pakārena bhaveyya?
tika-abh08t0:433_7: Sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ etaṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ chabbidhaṃ chappakāraṃ bhagavatā samudīritaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:434_1: Sabbo kāmavipāko ca sabbo tevīsatikāmavipāko ca kriyāhetudvayampi ca manodhātuhasituppādavasena kiriyāhetudvayampi
tika-abh08t0:434_2: cāti pañcavīsati cittuppādā ekantaparittārammaṇā ekantakāmāvacarārammaṇā siyuṃ bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:435_2: rūpasaddādayo pana dvipañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paṭipāṭiyā anukkamena gocarā honti.
tika-abh08t0:435_4: manodhātuttayassa tu manodhātuttayassa pana sabbaṃ rūpādipañcakaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:435_5: etesaṃ terasannaṃ pana cittānaṃ rūpakkhandhova gocaro ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:435_7: Na ca paññattiṃ paññattiṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti.
tika-abh08t0:435_9: Na canāgataṃ anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karonti eva.
tika-abh08t0:435_10: Hi saccaṃ vattamāno gocaro etesaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:435_11: manodhātuttayassa cāti terasannaṃ cittānaṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ vattamānaṃ eva paccuppannaṃ eva.
tika-abh08t0:436_2: jāyante kāmadhātuyaṃ etāni terasa cittāni kāmadhātuyaṃ jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:436_5: Arūpisu arūpabhūmīsu neva kiñcipi ekampi cittaṃ neva jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:437_1: Mahāpākānamaṭṭhannaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ mahāvipākānaṃ pavattiyaṃ chasu dvāresu tadārammaṇakiccānaṃ rūpādichaparittāni gocarā.
tika-abh08t0:437_5: hasituppādagocarā hasituppādassa rūpādayo cha parittā gocarā honti.
tika-abh08t0:437_6: Pañcadvāre paṭuppannā pañcasu dvāresu ye gocarā paccuppannā,
tika-abh08t0:437_7: manodvāre tikālikā ye gocarā tikālikā tīsu kālesu niyuttā.
tika-abh08t0:438_2: catutthāruppamānasaṃ kusalavipākakiriyāvasena chabbidhaṃ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ niyataṃ niyatārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:438_3: taṃ chabbidhaṃ cittaṃ mahaggatagocaraṃ pubbe attanā adhigataākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanakusalārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:438_4: tesu dve dutiyacatutthāruppapākā “yassa yassa kusalajhānassa yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi
tika-abh08t0:438_5: hotī”ti vacanato sakasakakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ eva tesaṃ vipākānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:438_7: ekantena anaññato aṭṭhānāsavacittānaṃ appamāṇova nibbānaṃ eva gocaraṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:439_2: kāmāvacarapuññato kāmāvacarakusalavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca kriyato kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇahīnā ca
tika-abh08t0:439_3: dvādasākusalāni ca te parittārammaṇā ceva mahaggatagocarā ca,
tika-abh08t0:439_4: te na vattabbā ca honti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:439_8: kriyato kiriyavasena cattāro ñāṇasampayuttā ca tathā abhiññādvayañca kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi ca ekādasannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:439_9: etesaṃ cittānaṃ gocaro parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena tividho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:439_10: Ime ekādasa na vattabbāpi honti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:439_12: Yāni vuttāvasesāni vuttato cittato sesāni yāni cittāni,
tika-abh08t0:444_2: manodhātuttayassa ca terasannaṃ cittānaṃ gocarā rūpādayo pañca dhammā paccuppannāva,
tika-abh08t0:444_13: Iti ete dvādasa mānasā pana siyātītārammaṇā atītārammaṇā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:444_15: Kāme vīsati kusalākusalā kriyato kiriyavasena kāme nava mānasā,
tika-abh08t0:444_21: Ime mānasā paññattikālepi sante navattabbā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:444_22: Rūpārūpabhavesu mayā vuttato sesāni sabbāni cittāni atītārammaṇādinā atītārammaṇādivasena paṇḍitena na vattabbāni na kathitabbāni honti eva,
tika-abh08t0:445_1: Kāmato ca kriyā pañca kāmāvacaravasena pañca kiriyā,
tika-abh08t0:445_3: etesaṃ channaṃ cittānaṃ natthi kiñci ekampi agocaraṃ anārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:446_2: maggaṃ rūpañca arūpaṃ cittacetasikasaṅkhātaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ yāni cittāni sakkonti,
tika-abh08t0:447_5: kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi cāti ekādasa cittāni nibbānañca phalañca maggañca rūpañca arūpaṃ nāmañca gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:448_1: Cittesu pana sabbesu yāni cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti,
tika-abh08t0:448_2: tāni kati cittāni me vada tāni mayhaṃ tvaṃ kathehi.
tika-abh08t0:448_7: sabbesu pana cittesu cha cittāni arahattaphalaṃ arahattamaggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:448_9: kiriyā ca voṭṭhabbanampi ca kiriyābhiññāmano cāti cha ca cittāni gocaraṃ kātuṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:448_11: puññato puññavasena abhiññācittañca arahattaphalaṃ maggaṃ gocaraṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:449_1: Arahato khīṇāsavassa maggacittaṃ phalamānasaṃ vā puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā vijānituṃ na sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:449_7: Heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo puggalo uparūpari ṭhitassa puggalassa mānasaṃ neva jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:449_8: uparūpari ṭhito puggalopi heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa puggalassa mānasaṃ jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:450_1: Yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_2: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ekaṃ ekaṃ uddharitvā ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi.
tika-abh08t0:450_3: Kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme kāme aṭṭhavidhaṃ kusalaṃ aṭṭhavidhassa kāmāvacarakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:450_4: Pubbeva kataṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ mahākusalaṃ pacchā somanassasahagatañāṇasampayuttacittadvayena vā somanassasahagatañāṇavippayuttacittadvayena
tika-abh08t0:450_5: vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇasampayuttadvayena vā upekkhāsahagatañāṇavippayuttadvayena vā anussaraṇakaālādīsu
tika-abh08t0:450_6: tassa aṭṭhavidhassa kusalassa javanakiccavasena ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_8: kusalassa abhiññāmānasassa ca kiriyassa abhiññāmānasassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_10: Tathā kāmakriyassāti javanakiccavasena hasanassa āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa javanakiccavasena mahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_11: etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:450_12: Rūpāvacarapuññāni pañca tato charāsito kāmavipākaṃ vajjetvā pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:450_13: Tadā lobhamūlamohamūlavasena attanā paṭiladdhajhānānaṃ anussaraṇakāle tassa dasavidhassa akusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_14: tihetukapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa jhānaṃ paccavekkhato jhānārammaṇaṃ domanassayuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:450_16: Kāmakriyassāti ekantaparittārammaṇāni kiriyāmanodhātuhasanāni vajjetvā āvajjanakiccavasena voṭṭhabbanassa,
tika-abh08t0:451_2: tebhūmakusalassa ca mahākusalassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakusalassa ca dutiyacatutthaarūpakusalassa
tika-abh08t0:451_3: ca tebhūmakakriyassāpi voṭṭhabbanassa mahākiriyassa ca abhiññākiccavasena pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca dutiyacatutthāruppakiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:451_7: evañca sati kathaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:451_8: tatiyāruppakusalañca catutthāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti ce vattabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:451_9: yadā puthujjanayogī vā sekkho vā yogī rūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā ākāsānañcāyatanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:451_10: paṭhamāruppasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā vītarāgo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā puthujjanasekkhakāle
tika-abh08t0:451_12: tadā khīṇāsavakāle samāpajjitaṃ dutiyaṃ arūpakiriyaṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:452_0: Yadā yogī rūpasamāpattiyo samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhahitvā paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppakusalaṃ tatiyāruppakusalañca
tika-abh08t0:452_1: samāpajjitvā khīṇāsavo hutvā attanā adhigatā samāpattiyo gahetvā attanā anadhigataṃ catutthaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:453_5: tadā dvinnaṃ arūpapākānaṃ paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppajavanāni ārammaṇāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:453_6: “yassa kusalassa jhānassa yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā brahmaloke paṭisandhi hotī”ti vacanato sakasakakusalānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:453_7: ārammaṇabhūtāni ākāsānañcāyatanaākiñcaññāyatanāni tesaṃ dutiyacatutthāruppapākānaṃ ārammaṇāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:453_8: evaṃ arūpakusalaṃ imesaṃ aṭṭharāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:453_9: Apariyāpannapuññampi catubbidhalokuttarakusalampi kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa ca kriyassa voṭṭhabbanassa,
tika-abh08t0:453_10: ñāṇasampayuttato kiriyassa ca rūpato rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa cāti catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ sadā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:453_14: pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca tividhaṃ lokuttarapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:453_17: pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca arahattapuññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:453_18: Yathā tathā eva sabbaṃ akusalaṃ kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:453_19: kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato pana rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:453_21: yathā tathā eva sabbassa akusalassa ca kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ tadārammaṇakiccavasena ekādasannañcāti channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ bhagavatā īritaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:454_1: Vipākārammaṇaṃ kāme sabbaṃ vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi kāmāvacaravasenapi kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:454_2: kriyassa hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:454_3: pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca kāmāvacarapākānaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekādasannañca tatheva akusalassa ca channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:454_4: Rūpe vipākārammaṇaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi ca kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:454_5: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa ca apuññassa cāti pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocaro hoti,
tika-abh08t0:454_8: tesaṃ puggalānaṃ pākāpi kāmato kāmāvacaravasena kusalassa ñāṇasampayuttamahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:454_9: kriyassa ca voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa ca rūpatopi rūpāvacaravasenapi kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:454_10: kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca evaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:455_1: Kāme idaṃ sabbakiriyacittaṃ kāmāvacaratopi ca kāmāvacaravasenapi ca kusalassa mahākusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:455_2: kriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ca rūpāvacarato ceva rūpāvacaravasena ca eva kusalassa pañcamassa rūpakusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:455_3: kriyassa ca pañcamassa rūpakiriyassa ca ekādasakāmāvacarapākassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:455_4: Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe rūpāvacare yaṃ kiriyāmānasaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:455_5: kāmapākaṃ tato vinā tato rāsito kāmapākaṃ vinā vajjetvā pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:455_6: Kāmāvacarato kāmāvacaravasena kiriyassa voṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:455_7: hasanaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā rūpakiriyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na karoti.
tika-abh08t0:455_8: Kriyācittaṃ panāruppe arūpakiriyācittaṃ pana tesaṃ pañcannaṃ eva ca rāsīnaṃ āruppakriyassāpi paṭhamāruppakiriyaṃ dutiyāruppakiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:460_1: ca channaṃ etesaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:461_2: rūpāvacaravasena pañcamassa rūpakusalassa ca kāmarūpakiriyassa ca khīṇāsavānaṃ voṭṭhabbanañāṇasampayuttamahākiriyassa
tika-abh08t0:461_3: ca pañcamarūpakiriyassa ca ubhayassāpi cittassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:461_4: Apariyāpannato ceva lokuttaravasena ca eva phalassa,
tika-abh08t0:461_5: kusalassa ca etesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:462_4: paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakusalassa ca tatheva akusalassa ca rūpārūpavipākassa sabbassa rūpavipākassa,
tika-abh08t0:462_5: paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppavipākassa ca tebhūmakakriyassa ca hasanavoṭṭhabbanamahākiriyassa sabbassa rūpakiriyassa,
tika-abh08t0:462_6: paṭhamāruppatatiyāruppakiriyassa cāti navannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:463_1: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu dve cittuppādā rūpārammaṇikā,
tika-abh08t0:463_2: dve dve saddādigocarā dve dve cittuppādā saddārammaṇādigocarā,
tika-abh08t0:463_3: tayo manodhātusaṅkhātā cittuppādā pañcārammaṇikā nāma matā bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:463_4: Idha imasmiṃ kāmāvacarādhikāre ekacattālīseva cittuppādā chaḷārammaṇikā matā.
tika-abh08t0:464_2: rūpārūpā anāsavā ime sabbe cittuppādā dhammārammaṇagocarā honti.
tika-abh08t0:464_6: Dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa paṭhamāruppakusalārammaṇabhāve kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva.
tika-abh08t0:464_8: dutiyāruppacetaso kusalassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso vipākassa ca dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ na hoti. Hi kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:464_10: Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ paṭhamaṃ kiriyācittaṃ pana dutiyāruppacetaso puññassa ārammaṇaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:464_12: Rūpārūpabhavesu hi khīṇāsavā vipākacittāni cutivasena sakasakakusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karonti.
tika-abh08t0:464_13: Paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācittaṃ pana dutiyāruppacetaso kiriyassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:464_14: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena cittānaṃ ārammaṇuppatti vibhāvinā dhīrena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:465_2: arūpārammaṇaṃ dvidhā dvippakāraṃ kusalaṃ kusalassa dutiyāruppakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:465_3: taṃ paṭhamāruppakusalaṃ dutiyāruppavipākassa ārammaṇaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:465_8: Kusalampi paṭhamāruppakusalampi dutiyāruppakiriyassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:465_10: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:465_12: catutthāruppacetaso vipākassa ca taṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:465_13: Evameva yathā paṭhamāruppamānasaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:465_14: evameva tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dvidhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:465_16: evameva tathā tatiyāruppacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tidhā siyā.
tika-abh08t0:466_1: Yaṃ yaṃ pana idhārabbha idha imasmiṃ adhikāre yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha paṭicca ye ye cittuppādā jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:466_2: so so gocaro tesañca tesañca cittuppādānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:467_1: Yo pana naro imassa abhidhammāvatārassa kira pāraṃ duttaraṃ idha imasmiṃ loke uttarati,
tika-abh08t0:467_2: so naro abhidhammamahaṇṇave pāraṃ duttaraṃ uttaraṃ uttarati eva.
tika-abh08t0:478_0: Yena jinena anantañāṇena nikkilesena guṇesinā kāruṇikena tena jinena vutte vipākasmiṃ matipāṭavatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:478_1: matichekabhāvatthāya vipākacittappabhavaṃ mayā bhaṇamānaṃ vipākacittappavattiṃ tumhe suṇātha.
tika-abh08t0:480_7: Ekāya cetanāya ekā paṭisandhi bhagavatā pakāsitā.
tika-abh08t0:481_1: Tihetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana kāmāvacarasaññitaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ duhetuñca vipākaṃ ahetuñca vipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t0:481_2: Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ duhetukaṃ yaṃ kammaṃ pana,
tika-abh08t0:481_3: taṃ kammaṃ tihetukaṃ vipākaṃ na deti,
tika-abh08t0:484_1: Ekāya cetanāyettha ettha etāsu cetanāsu ekāya kusalāya cetanāya soḷasavidhā vipākacittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:485_3: somanassayutte kusale javane javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:485_5: Kāmāvacaracittena kusalenādinā paṭhamena kusalena tulyena vipākacittena.
tika-abh08t0:485_7: Yena sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce yadi,
tika-abh08t0:485_8: iṭṭhe balavārammaṇe manāpe atimahantārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhussa cakkhupasādassa āpāthaṃ pākaṭabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:485_9: āgate sati manodhātuyā tāya bhavaṅgasmiṃ āvaṭṭite bhavaṅgasote chindite sati cakkhuviññāṇakādīsu vīthicittesu
tika-abh08t0:485_10: jātesu paṭhamaṃ kusalaṃ kāmamānasaṃ javanaṃ hutvā jāyate.
tika-abh08t0:485_11: Sattakkhattuvārāni javitvāna paṭhame mahākusale gate tadeva taṃ eva iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā teneva paṭhamamahākusalena sadisaṃ tadārammaṇavipākacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:485_12: Sandhiyā tulyato paṭisandhiyā tulyabhāvena mūlabhavaṅganti mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā pavuccate.
tika-abh08t0:485_13: Tañca tadārammaṇacittaṃ santīraṇaṃ somanassayuttaṃ santīraṇaṃ dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ ettha etasmiṃ vīthicitte
tika-abh08t0:485_14: gaṇanūpagacittāni gaṇanaṃ upagatāni cittāni cattāri eva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:486_2: kusalaṃ javanaṃ yadā yasmiṃ kāle tasseva somanassatihetuno puggalassa dutiyaṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ javanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:486_3: tadā tasmiṃ kāle tena javanena tulyavipākaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:486_4: Tassa sandhiyā asamānattā tassa tadārammaṇacittassa sandhiyā asamānattā dve nāmāni assa vipākacittassa anena vipākacittena labbhare labbhanti,
tika-abh08t0:486_5: “āgantukabhavaṅga”nti nāmaṃ “tadārammaṇaka”nti ca nāmaṃ iti dve nāmāni labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:487_1: Yadā tasseva puggalassa tatiyaṃ puññaṃ javanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:487_2: tadā tena javanena sadisaṃ tatiyaṃ pākaṃ tadārammaṇikaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:487_3: Idaṃ vipākacittaṃ āgantukabhavaṅganti āgantubhavaṅgaṃ nāma bhagavatā vuccate,
tika-abh08t0:487_4: purimāni ca pañca vipākacittāni iminā pana tatiyavipākena pana saddhiṃ cha cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:488_2: tadā tena javanena tulyaṃ catutthavipākaṃ tadārammaṇabhāvaṃ vaje gaccheyya.
tika-abh08t0:488_4: purimāni cha pākāni iminā saha catutthapākena satta cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:489_1: Yadā yasmiṃ kāle tasmiṃ cakkhudvāre iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇaṃ pana tathā āpāthaṃ āgacchati ca,
tika-abh08t0:489_2: tadā vuttanayena āvajjanadassanasampaṭicchanacittesu jātesu idha imasmiṃ majjhattārammaṇe ārammaṇavasena vedanā parivattati,
tika-abh08t0:489_4: Upekkhāsahagatesu eva catūsupi javanesu javitesu tehi javanehi tulyāni cattāri vipākacittāni jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:489_5: Accantaṃ ekantena vedanāya upekkhāvedanāya purimehi somanassasahagatehi cittehi asamānattā cattāri cittāni nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni nāma honti,
tika-abh08t0:489_7: Imāni upekkhāsahagatāni pañca vipākāni purimehi sattahi vipākehi saddhiṃ dvādasa vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:490_2: tathā evaṃ sotādīsu dvāresupi dvādasa pākāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:490_4: ime mayā vuttā vipākā samasaṭṭhi bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:490_5: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite samasaṭṭhi vipākāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:490_7: Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre dvādasa pākā,
tika-abh08t0:490_8: sotaviññāṇakādīni cattāri cāti soḷasa pākāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:491_1: Ekena tihetukakusalena asaṅkhārikena kammena āyūhite yathā,
tika-abh08t0:491_2: evameva sasaṅkhāratihetukakusalenāpi asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraupekkhāsahagatehipi kusalehi kamme āyūhite pavattite
tika-abh08t0:491_3: tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākehi tīhipi dinnāya paṭisandhiyā eseva nayo paṇḍitena jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:491_4: Idha imasmiṃ upekkhāsahagatadvaye iṭṭhamajjhattagocarassa vasena vipākacittappavattiṃ paṭhamaṃ dassetvā dassetabbātha pacchā tu,
tika-abh08t0:491_5: iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha atha pacchā mayā vuttacittappavattito pacchākāle pana idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhagocare
tika-abh08t0:491_6: ekekasmiṃ pana dvādasa dvādasa pākā paṇḍitena dassetabbā.
tika-abh08t0:491_7: Gahitāggahaṇenettha ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena soḷasa pākacittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:491_8: Pubbe kāle mayā vuttanayeneva sabbaṃ vacanaṃ asesato asesabhāvena paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:492_3: iti ayaṃ vāro ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.
tika-abh08t0:492_4: Ekaṃ kammaṃ ekasmiṃ bhave ekaṃ paṭisandhiṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t0:492_5: tato paṭisandhito aparaṃ aññaṃ dutiyaṃ paṭisandhiṃ na janeti,
tika-abh08t0:492_8: Ekasmā bījā ekato bījato ekaṃ aṅkuraṃ jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:492_9: assa bījassa bahūni phalāni hetuppavattito salilādihetuppattiyā honti.
tika-abh08t0:493_3: iti vacanaṃ ayaṃ vāro anupubbena anupaṭipāṭiyā āgato.
tika-abh08t0:493_4: Idha imasmiṃ adhikāre duhetukena puññena somanassayuttena asaṅkhārikena cittena kamme āyūhite pana duhetukena
tika-abh08t0:493_5: somanassayuttakusalena tulyena pākena yena sattena gahitā paṭisandhi ce,
tika-abh08t0:493_6: iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tassa sattassa cakkhudvāre āpāthaṃ āgate somanassayutte ñāṇahīne kusalamānase tasmiṃ duhetuke
tika-abh08t0:493_7: sattakkhattuṃ javitvāna gate taṃ eva ārammaṇaṃ katvā tadanantaraṃ tassa javanassa anantaraṃ taṃsarikkhakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:493_8: tena javanena sadisaṃ ekantaṃ asaṅkhārikamānasaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:493_9: Tanti taṃ cittaṃ mūlabhavaṅganti mūlabhavaṅgaṃ nāma tadārammaṇamiccapi tadārammaṇaṃ nāma ubhayampi nāmaṃ tasseva nāmaṃ tassa cittassa eva nāmaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:493_10: Iti evaṃ iminā pakārena bhagavatā paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:493_11: Duhetuke sasaṅkhāre kusale javane javitepi ca taṃsamaṃ tena cittena sadisaṃ āgantukasaṅkhātaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:494_1: Tatheva ca tathā eva ca iṭṭhamajjhattagocare duhetūnaṃ dvinnaṃ upekkhāyuttānaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ tādisāni
tika-abh08t0:494_2: tehi javanehi sadisāni dve tadārammaṇamānasāni jāyante,
tika-abh08t0:494_5: Santīraṇadvayañceva dassanaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ imāni dve bhavaṅgāni cāti aṭṭha vipākā cakkhudvāre honti.
tika-abh08t0:494_6: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi ca aṭṭha aṭṭha vipāke katvā pavattiyaṃ cattālīsa vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:494_8: cakkhudvāre panaṭṭha ca ettha etesu vipākesu gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre aṭṭha ca vipākā
tika-abh08t0:494_9: sotaghānādinā vipākena saddhiṃ dvādasa eva vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:494_10: Ekāya cetanāyevaṃ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena ekāya cetanāya kamme āyūhite pavattite pana sati dvādaseva vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:494_13: sesena sadisena tu mayā vuttato duhetuto sesena duhetukattayenāpi sadisena pākena ādinnasandhino gahitapaṭisandhikassa
tika-abh08t0:494_14: sattassa evaṃ nayo mato kathito niraṅgaṇena.
tika-abh08t0:494_16: Iti ayaṃ vāro ca ettāvatā ettakena vacanena mayā vutto.
tika-abh08t0:495_2: iti ayaṃ vāro anupubbena paṭipāṭiyā āgato.
tika-abh08t0:495_3: Tesu catūsupi duhetukesu kusalesu cittesu aññatareneva hetukena kamme āyūhite pavattite sati tasseva
tika-abh08t0:495_4: duhetukassa kusalajavanassa pākabhūtāya upekkhāsahagatāhetukāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā ādinnapaṭisandhino
tika-abh08t0:495_5: sattassa sā paṭisandhi kammasadisā nāma na vattabbā paṇḍitehi.
tika-abh08t0:495_9: Tassa dehino sattassa vuḍḍhimupetassa vuḍḍhiṃ upagatassa cakkhudvāre pana iṭṭhamajjhattagocare āpāthamāgate
tika-abh08t0:495_10: sati duhetukānaṃ catunnaṃ puññānaṃ yassa kassaci javanassa avasānamhi idaṃ ahetukaṃ mano tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:495_11: Ettha etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo sandeho natthi,
tika-abh08t0:495_12: taṃ ahetukacittaṃ mūlabhavaṅgañca tadārammaṇameva ca hoti.
tika-abh08t0:495_13: Cakkhuviññāṇakādīsupi vīthicittesu jātesu upekkhāsahagataṃyeva santīraṇampi ca hoti.
tika-abh08t0:495_15: gahitāggahaṇenidha tesu dvīsu santīraṇatadārammaṇakiccesu vipākesu ekaṃ santīraṇakiccaṃ tadārammaṇakiccaṃ
tika-abh08t0:495_16: taṃ cittaṃ ṭhapetvā gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena idha iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe gaṇanūpagacittāni tīṇiyeva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:496_2: dvāre āpāthamāgate tadā santīraṇañceva somanassayuttaṃyeva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:496_5: tadārammaṇakiccaṃ vā cittaṃ gahetvā purimāni ca tīṇi cattāri eva vipākāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:496_6: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pañcasu dvāresupi cattāri cattāri vipākacittānīti pavattiyaṃ vipākāni vīsati cittāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:497_2: gahitāggahaṇenidha gahitānaṃ vipākānaṃ aggahaṇena cakkhudvāre pana cattāri vipākāni idha imasmiṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:497_3: sotaghānādinā vipākena saddhiṃ ahetukaṃ aṭṭhakaṃ hoti eva.
tika-abh08t0:497_5: tihetukaṃ vā tadārammaṇaṃ na bhave na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:497_6: duhetupaṭisandhino sattassa tihetukaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na bhave.
tika-abh08t0:497_8: pākena paṭisandhi tu sugatiyaṃ yena pākena paṭisandhi jātā,
tika-abh08t0:497_12: vuttañcāhetukaṭṭhakaṃ sugatiyaṃ ahetukaṭṭhakañca manussalokañca sandhāya paṭicca kāraṇaṃ katvā mayā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:497_13: Catūsupi apāyesu pana apeto ayo patiṭṭhā etehīti apāyo, tesu.
tika-abh08t0:497_16: dhammaṃ deseti vassati thiro thirakāradhammo yasmiṃ atthīti thero,
tika-abh08t0:497_17: dutiyaaggasāvakabhūto iddhimā moggallānatthero nerayikānaṃ niraye jātānaṃ sattānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti vassati,
tika-abh08t0:497_18: “ucchaṅge maṃ nisīditvā”tiādīsu viya devaṃ vassāpetīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:497_20: tadā pana tesaṃ nerayikānaṃ sattānaṃ tehi nerayikasattehi theraṃ disvā,
tika-abh08t0:497_22: gandhañca ghāyitvā jalaṃ udakañca pivataṃ pivantānaṃ muduṃ vāyuñca tehi phusataṃ phusantānaṃ tesaṃ nerayikasattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:497_23: cakkhuviññāṇakādīni pañcapi puññajāni eva kusalavipākāni eva santīraṇadvayaṃ puññajaṃ eva kusalavipākaṃ
tika-abh08t0:497_24: eva puññajā eva ekā manodhātu iti aṭṭhakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:498_1: Ayaṃ tāva kathā “cakkhuviññāṇakādīni puññajānevā”tiādikā ayaṃ kathā iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattagocare kāmāvacare puññānaṃ javanānaṃ vasena mayā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:498_2: Tadārammaṇacetaso tadārammaṇacittassa yaṃ niyamattaṃ “tadārammaṇamānasaṃ javanena niyāmita”ntiādivacanena mayā vuttaṃ,
