tika-abh08t0:498_4: Somanassayutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi somanassayuttameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:498_5: upekkhāyutte kāmāvacarakusale javite tadārammaṇampi upekkhāyuttameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:498_6: netaṃ akusale upekkhāyutte vicikicchādike akusale javane pana javite somanassayuttampi tadārammaṇaṃ hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:499_1: Idha imasmiṃ adhippāye akusalacittesu somanassayuttesu catūsupi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe tesu cittesu javitesu
tika-abh08t0:499_2: somanassayuttā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu tadanantaraṃ tesaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:499_3: Upekkhāyuttesu chasu akusalacittesu iṭṭhamajjhatte gocare javitesu puññajā upekkhāsahagatā ahetumanoviññāṇadhātu
tika-abh08t0:499_4: eva tadanantaraṃ vā tesaṃ upekkhāsahagatānaṃ channaṃ akusalajavanānaṃ anantaraṃ tadārammaṇabhāvena jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:499_6: no buddho”ti kaṅkhantassa sattassa uddhatassa vā sattassa tadārammaṇamānasaṃ somanassayuttaṃ ahetukaṃ vipākaṃ hoti piṭṭhibhavaṅgaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:499_8: javane javite pana somanassayuttā eva pañca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:499_9: Upekkhāsahagate citte javane pana javite sati upekkhāsahagatā cha ca tadārammaṇamānasā paṇḍitena gavesitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:500_2: ādinnapaṭisandhino sattassa jhānato parihīnassa vippaṭisārino taṃ jhānaṃ paccavekkhato paccavekkhantassa domanassayuttaṃ cittaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:500_3: Tassa domanassassa anantaraṃ kiṃ mānasaṃ jāyate,
tika-abh08t0:500_5: Paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā hi domanassassānantaraṃ somanassassa uppatti paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhā paṭṭhānappakaraṇe bhagavatā nivāritā,
tika-abh08t0:500_6: assa somanassassa vā anantaraṃ domanassassa uppatti paṭṭhāne paṭṭhānappakaraṇe paṭisiddhā bhagavatā nivāritā.
tika-abh08t0:500_7: Mahaggataṃ panārabbha mahaggataṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇamānasaṃ tattheva tasmiṃ paṭṭhāne eva paṭisiddhaṃ bhagavatā nivāritaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:500_8: Tasmā kāraṇā bhavaṅgapāto vā tadārammaṇameva vā na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:500_9: Kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ tesaṃ bhavaṅgatadārammaṇānaṃ abhāve kāraṇaṃ yaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:500_10: amhehi taṃ kāraṇaṃ kiṃ nu pucchāma,
tika-abh08t0:500_11: taṃ tadatthaṃ ābhidhammikabhāvena ābhidhammika taṃ kāraṇaṃ vada vadāhi.
tika-abh08t0:501_2: Taṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena jāyate?
tika-abh08t0:501_4: Maggassa anantarassa ca phalassāpi kiṃ āvajjanaṃ natthi?
tika-abh08t0:501_5: Nirodhā ca nirodhato vuṭṭhahantassa bhikkhuno phalacittassa vāti mayā sutaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:501_6: evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena āvajjanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:501_8: hotu jāyatu mānasaṃ cittaṃ āvajjanena vinā āvajjanaṃ vajjetvā hotu jāyatu,
tika-abh08t0:501_9: kimassārammaṇaṃ assa tadārammaṇamānasassa kiṃ ārammaṇaṃ, paṇḍita,
tika-abh08t0:501_12: Vinā ārammaṇenetaṃ etaṃ mānasaṃ ārammaṇena vinā ārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā na jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:501_14: tadārammaṇamānasaṃ yadā domanassayuttaṃ javanaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ javati,
tika-abh08t0:501_15: tadā tasmiṃyeva javanacittakkhaṇe parittesu kāmāvacarārammaṇesu yaṃ kiñci parittārammaṇaṃ ārabbha paṭicca jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:502_1: Utubījaniyāmo ca utuniyāmo bījaniyāmo ca kammadhammaniyāmatā ca kammaniyāmatā ca sīlādipāramīdhammaniyāmatā
tika-abh08t0:502_2: ca cittassa niyāmo cāti pañca niyāmatā paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:502_3: Tattha tesu pañcasu niyāmesu sabbesaṃ pana rukkhānaṃ ekappahārena phalapupphādidhāraṇaṃ utu,
tika-abh08t0:502_6: taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavo tesaṃ tesaṃ bījānaṃ pana tehi tehi bījehi tulyānampi sassānaṃ phalānaṃ uppatti,
tika-abh08t0:502_8: Matthake nāḷikerassa nāḷikeraphalassa matthake chiddattaṃ chiddabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:502_10: Tihetukakammaṃ tihetukañca vipākaṃ duhetukañca vipākaṃ ahetukañca vipākaṃ yato yaṃ kammaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t0:502_12: Bodhisattassa jātiyaṃ jinaṅkurassa jātikkhaṇe medanīkampanādikaṃ anekavisesattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:502_14: Tena gocarena pasādasmiṃ ghaṭṭite sati idha imasmiṃ cittavīthiyaṃ āvajjanādīnaṃ cittānaṃ uppatti,
tika-abh08t0:503_1: Yo puggalo dhīro dhīrasampanno guṇasampanno vikkhittapāpo mohandhakārāpagamaṃ andhakāramanissāya avijjānissaraṇaṃ yadicche sace iccheyya,
tika-abh08t0:503_2: so dhīro imaṃ abhidhammāvatārappakaraṇaṃ andhajjanānaṃ andhasadisabālajanānaṃ hadayandhakāraṃ viddhaṃsanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:503_3: andhakārasannissitassa yassa hadayassa viddhaṃsanakaraṃ jalantaṃ dīpaṃ jalamānaṃ dīpaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:503_4: Payattoti pakārena yatati vīriyaṃ karotīti payatto,
tika-abh08t0:510_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;
tika-abh08t0:512_0: Idāni pana kāle etesaṃ tihetukadvihetukaahetukānaṃ sabbesaṃ puggalānaṃ pakiṇṇakaṃ mānasaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:512_1: pāṭavatthāya bhikkhūnaṃ chekabhāvatthāya mayā kathīyate uccate.
tika-abh08t0:513_1: Panthamakkaṭako uṇṇanābhi panthamakkaṭako nāma pañcasu disāsu tassa suttaṃ pasāretvā jālamajjhe nipajjati.
tika-abh08t0:513_2: Paṭhamāya disāyettha ettha etāsu disāsu paṭhamāya disāya pasārite sutte pāṇakena paṭaṅgena vā makkhikāya
tika-abh08t0:513_3: vā ghaṭṭite sati sā uṇṇanābhi kiñci calitvā phandanaṃ katvā nipannaṭṭhānato suttānusārena suttaṃ anusāretvā
tika-abh08t0:513_4: tassa pāṇakassa yūsaṃ yūsasaṅkhātaṃ soṇitaṃ pivati.
tika-abh08t0:513_5: Punāgantvā tattheva tasmiṃ jālamajjheyeva yathāsukhaṃ nipajjati,
tika-abh08t0:513_6: yathā paṭhamāya disāya calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:513_7: evameva dutiyādīsu catūsu disāsu calanādikaṃ kiriyaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:513_8: evaṃ pañcasu disāsu suttaṃ viya pañca pasādā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t0:513_9: majjhe makkaṭako viya ca cittaṃ pana paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:513_10: Pāṇakādīhi khuddakatiracchānehi tassa saṅghaṭṭanā viya ārammaṇe pana pasādānaṃ saṅghaṭṭanā paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:513_11: Jālamajjhe nipannāya uṇṇanābhiyā taṃ calanaṃ viya pasāde ghaṭṭetīti pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ, kiṃ taṃ?
tika-abh08t0:513_13: Tattha tissaṃ vīthiyaṃ pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodhātukiriyācittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetīti bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:513_14: Tassa panthamakkaṭakassa suttānusāraṃva suttaṃ anugamanaṃ viya vīthicittappavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:513_15: Sīse pana vijjhitvā assa makkaṭassa yūsapānaṃ viya javanassa cittassa ārammaṇesu pavattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:513_16: Puna āgantvā suttajālamajjhe nipajjanaṃ yathā vatthuṃyeva hadayavatthuṃ eva nissāya cittassa parivattanaṃ paṇḍitena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:514_2: atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi idaṃ opammaṃ kaṃ atthaṃ dīpeti pakāseti?
tika-abh08t0:514_3: Paṭhamaṃ pasāde ārammaṇena ghaṭṭite sati pasādavatthuto pasādo vatthu nissayo etassāti pasādavatthu, cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:514_5: paṭhamaṃ eva vatthusannissitaṃ bhavaṅgasaṅkhātaṃ mano jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:514_7: Ekekārammaṇaṃ dvīsu dvīsu dvāresu sabbaso sabbappakārena pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-abh08t0:514_8: ayamatthopi tena opammena dīpito “dvīsu dvīsu dvāresū”ti,
tika-abh08t0:514_10: manodvāre cāti dvīsu dvāresu āpāthaṃ āgacchatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:514_12: Rūpaṃ cakkhupasādamhi ghaṭṭetvā taṅkhaṇe pana tassa khaṇe pana tathā manodvāre pana āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-abh08t0:514_14: Na saṃsayo etasmiṃ vacane saṃsayo natthi.
tika-abh08t0:514_17: Rukkhagge rukkhakoṭiyaṃ nilīyantova sākhino sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti,
tika-abh08t0:514_18: tassa chāyā bhūmiyaṃ pathaviyaṃ pharati paṭihaññati.
tika-abh08t0:514_20: Sākhāya sakuṇena ghaṭṭanaṃ bhūmiyaṃ chāyāpharaṇāpi ca apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇasmiṃyeva jāyare jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:514_23: tatheva atthato atthavasena bhavaṅgacalanassāpi paccayattena paccayabhāvena manodvāre āpāthaṃ āgamanaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:515_1: Tato paraṃ bhavaṅgasotaṃ chinditvā cakkhudvāre cakkhupasāde yathākkamaṃ āvajjane samuppanne,
tika-abh08t0:515_5: tathā voṭṭhabbane ca samuppanne kusalaṃ javanacittaṃ javati,
tika-abh08t0:515_7: Sotadvārādīsupi saddādīnaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ ghaṭṭane eseva nayo avisesena viññunā viññeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:515_8: Etassa atthassa dīpane dovārikopamādīni vacanāni uddharitvā tato pakaraṇato nīharitvā ettha etasmiṃ vīthiyādhikāre viññunā dassetabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:516_1: Asambhedena cakkhussāti tassāpi cakkhu asambhinnaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:516_2: Jīvitā niruddhampi pittena vā semhena vā ruhirena vā palibuddhaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ sambhinnaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t0:516_5: Tena tividhena paccayena samanakkārahetunā pañcadvārāvajjanapaccayena saha pavattanena.
tika-abh08t0:516_6: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi saṃ ekato inti pavattantīti sametā,
tika-abh08t0:516_8: taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ cakkhupasādanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi cetasikehi saha jāyate.
tika-abh08t0:517_1: Asambhedena sotassa sotapasādassa asambhinnena saddāpāthagamena ca saddassa āpāthagamanena ca.
tika-abh08t0:517_5: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ sotaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:518_1: Asambhedena ghānassa ghānapasādassa asambhinnena gandhāpāthagamena ca gandhassa āpāthagamanena ca.
tika-abh08t0:518_5: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ ghānaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:519_1: Asambhedena jivhāya jivhāya asambhinnena rasāpāthagamena ca rasassa āpāthagamanena ca.
tika-abh08t0:519_2: Āposannissayenāpīti jivhātemanaṃ āpaṃ laddhā ca uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:519_3: tena vinā sukkhakhādanīye jivhāya sāyitepi jivhāviññāṇaṃ nuppajjatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:519_6: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ jivhāviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:520_2: Pathavīnissayenāpīti tena vinā kāyadvārampīti bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikaṃ kāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati.
tika-abh08t0:520_5: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ kāyaviññāṇaṃ sampayuttehi saha jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:521_2: Taṃ niruddhampi āvajjanacittassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthaṃ mandatamagatameva vattamānampi sambhinnaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:521_3: Āvajjanassa paccayo bhavituṃ samatthaṃ asambhinnaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:521_4: Manassa asambhedena dhammassa āpāthagamanena ca vatthusannissayena hadayavatthusannissayena.
tika-abh08t0:521_7: Etehi pana catūhi paccayehi sametehi sahagatehi samāgamaṃ ekībhāvaṃ āgatehi taṃ manoviññāṇaṃ taṃ manoviññāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:522_2: Āvajjanakriyācittaṃ āvajjanakiriyācittadvayaṃ samanakkāro nāma vibhāvinā saññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:522_3: Vatthusannissayena iti ayaṃ pāṭho sabbattha sabbesu bhavesu na gacchati.
tika-abh08t0:522_5: pañcavokārabhavaṃ sandhāya kāraṇaṃ katvā “vatthusannissayenā”ti ayaṃ pāṭho pana kathito mayā,
tika-abh08t0:522_9: Ayaṃ pāṭho catuvokāraarūpabhavaṃ sandhāya na kathitoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:522_10: Vatthussa rūpattā arūpabhave kathaṃ vatthusannissayo bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:523_8: Kammanimittaṃ nāma rūpāni pañcārammaṇāni paññatti ca mahaggatacittañca.
tika-abh08t0:523_11: Iti evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena tesaṃ paṭisandhādicittānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ tividhaṃ bhagavatā udīritaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:524_2: tīṇi santīraṇāni cāti ekādasavidhaṃ cittaṃ tadārammaṇasaññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:524_3: Ekādasavidhe citte tadārammaṇasaññite puññavipākāni kusalavipākā dasa honti,
tika-abh08t0:524_8: tesu tadārammaṇacittesu ekampi tadārammaṇacittaṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadācipi nappavattati.
tika-abh08t0:524_10: Tattha tasmiṃ rūpārūpabhavadvaye “tadārammaṇaṃ na hotī”ti vacanaṃ codako bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:524_12: Akāmāvacarārammaṇe akāmāvacaradhamme idaṃ tadārammaṇamānasaṃ neva anubandhati.
tika-abh08t0:524_14: Parittārammaṇattā ca ekantena avassaṃ tadārammaṇamānasassa kāmāvacarārammaṇattā ca tathā aparicitattā ca sabbadā nānubandhati.
tika-abh08t0:524_15: Tañhi yathā pitaraṃ vā pitusadisaṃ vā ñātiṃ anubandhantopi taruṇadārako gharadvārantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anubandhati,
tika-abh08t0:524_16: na araññaṃ vā yuddhabhūmiṃ vā gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:524_17: evaṃ kāmāvacare dhamme anubandhantampi mahaggatalokuttaradhammamārabbha pavattamāne dhamme nānubandhati.
tika-abh08t0:524_18: Yasmā cassa sabbo kāmāvacarapāko ca kiriyāmanodhātu kiriyāahetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā ime
tika-abh08t0:524_19: dhammā parittārammaṇāti evaṃ accantaṃ parittameva ārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:524_20: tasmā cetaṃ mahaggatalokuttarārammaṇe kāmāvacaradhammepi nānubandhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:525_2: vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi “janakaṃ tena tulya”ntiādikena tena,
tika-abh08t0:525_4: “janakaṃ tena tulya”ntiādikāya yuttikathāya kiṃ payojanaṃ vuttaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:525_5: Aṭṭhakathāsu hi saccaṃ “kiṃ tena yuttivādenā”ti vacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:525_6: “atthakathāsū”ti vattabbe samāse hi ttha- ssa ṭṭha-
tika-abh08t0:525_8: Kāmāvacare dhamme paṭicca tadārammaṇabhāvadīpakaṃ vacanaṃ ācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:525_10: ekādasapi sabbaso sabbappakārenapi tadārammaṇacittāni nāmagottaṃ panārabbha tissādikaṃ nāmapaññattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:525_11: paṭicca kaccāyanagottakassapagottādikaṃ gottapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane javitepi ca tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t0:525_14: javane javitepi vā yadā mayā vuttāya paññattiyā sesapaññattiṃ paṭicca javane javitepi vā tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena,
tika-abh08t0:525_15: tathā dukkhaaniccaanattalakkhaṇārammaṇikāya vipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena.
tika-abh08t0:525_17: micchattaniyatesupi micchatte micchāsabhāve “natthi dinna”ntyādivasena niyatāni cattāri diṭṭhiyuttajavanāni micchattaniyatāni,
tika-abh08t0:525_19: lokuttaradhamme ārabbha javane gatepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena.
tika-abh08t0:525_20: Tathā mahaggate dhamme ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena,
tika-abh08t0:525_21: paṭisambhidāñāṇaṃ ārabbha javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhate ācariyena.
tika-abh08t0:525_22: Manodvārepi sabbesaṃ javanānaṃ anantaraṃ anupubbato tadārammaṇacittāni bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:526_2: Bhavaṅgato cetaso vīthicittassa vuṭṭhānaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena hoti?
tika-abh08t0:526_3: Manodvārepi ghaṭṭanāya vinā ghaṭṭanaṃ vajjetvā āpāthaṃ āgacchanteva yasmā kāraṇā,
tika-abh08t0:527_1: Dvādasāpuññacittānaṃ dvādasaakusalacittānaṃ vipākā sattasattati pāpapākā dvādasapāpacittānaṃ vipākā caturāsīti pavattiyaṃ honti.
tika-abh08t0:527_5: Tathā sesānaṃ ekādasannaṃ akusalānampi satta vipākā honti.
tika-abh08t0:527_7: hitvā uddhaccamānasaṃ uddhaccamānasaṃ hitvā ekādasavidhānaṃ paṭisandhiyo ekādasavidhā ceva bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:528_1: Kriyacittesu sabbesu yaṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ javanaṃ na ca hoti,
tika-abh08t0:528_2: taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ karaṇamattattā kiriyāmattattā vātapupphasamaṃ vātapupphena sadisaṃ mataṃ bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:528_4: khīṇāsave uppannakāle vā taṃ āvajjanadvayaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:528_5: Sabbesu puthujjanesu uppannakāle kathaṃ kiriyā hotīti ce?
tika-abh08t0:528_6: Karaṇamattattā aphaladāyakaṃ vātapupphaṃ viya aphaladāyakaṃ kiriyacittaṃ bhavituṃ yuttihāro kiriyā pana hoti.
tika-abh08t0:528_7: Yaṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ kiccasādhanato javanakiccasādhanavasena javanattaṃ javanabhāvaṃ pattaṃ chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ aphalaṃ hoti yathā,
tika-abh08t0:528_8: evaṃ chinnāvijjātaṇhāmūlassa vītarāgassa taṃ sabbaṃ kiriyacittaṃ aphalaṃ vipākavirahitaṃ siyā bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:529_2: phalametīti paccayo ekaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca etasmā dhammato phalaṃ eti pavattati tasmā paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:529_3: yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ṭhitiyā uppattiyāpi upakāro nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:529_4: so dhammo tassa dhammassa paccayoti paccayo nāma paṇḍitena pavuccate.
tika-abh08t0:529_5: Sambhavo pabhavo hetu kāraṇaṃ paccayo mato bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:530_2: mūlaṭṭhenupakārako yo lobhādi pana dhammo mūlabhāvena phaladhammassa upakārako,
tika-abh08t0:530_3: so lobhādidhammo phaladhammassa hetūti hetu nāma vibhāvinā viññātabbo.
tika-abh08t0:531_1: Lobho doso ca moho ca tathā alobhādayo tayo hetū,
tika-abh08t0:531_3: jātito jātivasena kusalajātiakusalajātiabyākatajātivasena navadhā navahi koṭṭhāsehi siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:532_2: kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako kusalādibhāvasādhako,
tika-abh08t0:532_4: Evaṃ vacanaṃ eke ekacce ācariyā vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:532_5: Evaṃ sante kusalākusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhakavasena mūlaṭṭhe sante taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpīsu tehi
tika-abh08t0:532_6: cittehi samuṭṭhānarūpesu tehi cittehi samuṭṭhitesu cittajarūpesu hetūnaṃ lobhādihetūnaṃ hetupaccayatā
tika-abh08t0:532_9: yadi cittesu rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentesu te lobhādayopi cittānaṃ sampayuttacittānaṃ ekuppādattā ca rūpāni samuṭṭhāpentiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:532_10: Tadā tesaṃ mate tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādittaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:532_11: Na ca kadāci rūpāni kusalādināmakāni dissanti yasmā,
tika-abh08t0:532_12: tasmā cittajarūpānaṃ kusalādibhāvañāpanatthaṃ tesaṃ cittajarūpānaṃ te lobhādayo hetupaccayā na honti,
tika-abh08t0:532_14: Evañca sati cittajarūpāni nāma kadācipi viyuttāni caranti,
tika-abh08t0:533_1: Hi saccaṃ “evaṃ sante tu hetūna”ntiādikaṃ vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:533_2: Te lobhādayo hetū tesaṃ rūpānaṃ kusalāditaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ na sādhenti na nipphādenti.
tika-abh08t0:533_3: Te hetū tesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ paccayā na ca na hontiyeva,
tika-abh08t0:533_4: tasmā kāraṇā kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādittasādhako yo dhammo,
tika-abh08t0:533_5: so dhammo mūlaṭṭhoti mūlasabhāvo nāma samayaññunā samayavijānanasīlena viññunā gantabbo jānitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:534_2: sādhanenupakārako suppatiṭṭhitabhāvaṃ sādhanena upakārako yo attho,
tika-abh08t0:534_3: so attho hetūnaṃ lobhādīnaṃ mūlaṭṭho mūlasabhāvo iti ca gahaṇaṃ vibhāvinā viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:535_3: kriyāhetū sabbaso sabbappakārena sabbe kiriyāhetuyo ca sampayuttānaṃ pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:535_6: ete hetū catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ sampayuttānaṃ eva dhammānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā gatā.
tika-abh08t0:536_1: Kāme vipākahetūpi attanā sampayuttānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ yātā,
tika-abh08t0:536_4: yasmā kāraṇā pavattiyaṃ cittajānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayataṃ gatā.
tika-abh08t0:537_1: Rūpe vipākahetū kāmāvacarabhūmiyaṃ hetuyo viya hetupaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:537_2: pañcavokāre lokuttaravipākahetavo cittajānaṃ rūpānañca sampayuttānañca pañcavokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:537_3: Catuvokāre lokuttaravipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva catuvokārabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:537_4: Itare catuvokāre arūpabhave vipākajā hetavo sampayuttānaṃ eva sabhūmiyaṃ attano bhūmiyaṃ arūpabhūmiyaṃ hetupaccayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:537_5: Hetuttho hetūnaṃ attho hetuyo ceva hetupaccayo ceva hetupaccayasambhavo hetupaccayuppatti,
tika-abh08t0:538_1: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ vīmaṃsā cāti catudhādhipatī lokādhipatinā satthunā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:538_2: Chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittassa uppattikālasmiṃ yo chando,
tika-abh08t0:538_4: chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā samādhikaraṇacittassa eseva nayo sesesupi ca tīsu mayā vuttato chandādhipatito sesesupi ca adhipatīsu.
tika-abh08t0:538_6: so dhammo adhipatīti adhipati nāma bhagavatā niddiṭṭho.
tika-abh08t0:544_0: Yo yo jano imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ sumatimativibodhanaṃ sumatīnaṃ sundaramatīnaṃ paṇḍitānaṃ matiyā vibodhanakaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:544_1: vicittaṃ kumatīnaṃ kucchitamatīnaṃ bālānaṃ matiindhane padhānaṃ pāvakaṃ atimadhurakaraṃ avedi jāni,
tika-abh08t0:544_2: so so jano sakalaṃ jinavacanaṃ avedi jāni.
tika-abh08t0:553_0: Yāni lokikāni eva bāttiṃsa pākacittāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:553_1: etesaṃ pākacittānaṃ puññāpuññādisaṅkhārā bhavādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā yena pakārena paccayā honti eva,
tika-abh08t0:553_2: imesaṃ vipākacittānaṃ tepi saṅkhārā bhavādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu paṭisandhipavattīsu tathā tena pakārena vibhāvinā paṇḍitena viññātabbā.
tika-abh08t0:553_3: Tayo bhavā catasso ca yoniyo kāmabhavarūpabhavaarūpabhavavasena tayo bhavā,
tika-abh08t0:553_7: kāyassāpi ca rūpakāyassāpi ca nānattā nānābhāvato kāmasugatiyo,
tika-abh08t0:553_13: paṭhamajjhānabhūmi ca caturāpāyabhūmiyo ca nānattakāyaekattasaññī nāma,
tika-abh08t0:553_22: catutthāruppabhūmiñca pana gahetvā te sattāvāsā nava eva honti.
tika-abh08t0:554_1: Kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā aṭṭha cetanā pūrenti attano kārakaṃ pūrenti ca,
tika-abh08t0:554_8: Navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ upekkhāyuttāhetukamahāvipākavasena navannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kāmasugatiyaṃ pana nānā
tika-abh08t0:554_17: Dvedhā dvīhi pakārehi tesaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paccayā bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:554_18: tā aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā upekkhāsahitāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuyā vinā upekkhāsahagatāhetumanoviññāṇadhātuṃ
tika-abh08t0:554_21: Tāyeva cetanā tā eva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā rūpabhave pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:554_25: kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā aṭṭhannaṃ parittānaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:554_26: dvinnaṃ santīraṇānañca pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:554_27: paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe pana paccayā na honti.
tika-abh08t0:554_28: Vuttappakārāva kāme sugatiyaṃ yathāvuttappakārāva aṭṭha kāmāvacaramahākusalacetanā kāmasugatiyaṃ tathā
tika-abh08t0:554_29: soḷasannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:554_30: pavatte pavattikkhaṇe sattannaṃ kusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:554_31: Paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe navannaṃ kusalavipākacittānaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:555_2: rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ pañcannaṃ pākacittānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayā hontimāpuññasaṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:555_4: imā kusalapaṭipakkhā uddhaccavajjā ekādasa cetanā kāmaduggatiyaṃ ekassa paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paṭisandhiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_6: Dvādasa akusalacetanā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe eva channaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyasampaṭicchanānaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:555_8: Sattannampi bhavanteva pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe akusalavipākāni sattannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_11: sattannampi tatheva ca dvādasākusalacetanā kāme sugatiyaṃ tatheva ca tesaṃ sattannaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:555_14: tesaṃ rūpabhave tathā tāyeva dvādasākusalacetanā rūpabhave tesaṃ catunnaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ cakkhusotasampaṭicchanasantīraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:555_15: viññāṇānaṃ tathā pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:555_17: So ca kāmabhaveniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ so ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādiupaladdhiyaṃ amanāparūpādīni
tika-abh08t0:555_18: ārammaṇāni upaladdhiyaṃ tesaṃ catunnaṃ apuññajānaṃ viññāṇānaṃ paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:555_21: Aniṭṭharūpādayo nāma visayā brahmaloke na vijjare na vijjanti.
tika-abh08t0:556_1: Tathevāneñjasaṅkhāro na iñjati na phandati na calatīti āneñjaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:556_3: tathā eva āneñjasaṅkhāro arūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ catunnaṃ pākacittānaṃ pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:556_4: Bhavesvete bhavesu ete vuttappakārā paccayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīsu yathā ca yena yena ca
tika-abh08t0:556_6: tena paccayā tathā tena tena pakārena vibhāvinā vijānantena paṇḍitena ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:557_2: yoniādīsu yonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu eseva ca nayo bhavesu mayā vutto eva nayo paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:557_3: Tatridaṃ tatra bhavesu ādito paṭṭhāya vuttaṃ idaṃ vacanaṃ mukhamattanidassanaṃ upāyamattadīpanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:558_3: rūpapuññābhisaṅkhāravasena ca puññābhisaṅkhāro avisesena samānabhāvena dvīsu bhavesu kāmarūpabhavesu
tika-abh08t0:558_4: paṭisandhiṃ datvā so saṅkhāro sabbapākaṃ janeti nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t0:558_6: aṇḍajādīsu yonisu dvibhavesu puññābhisaṅkhāro viya tathā catūsu aṇḍajādīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:558_8: Bahudevamanussānaṃ vasena dvīsu gatīsu eva ca tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:558_11: vasena catūsu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:558_13: catubbidhe sattāvāse tathā so puññābhisaṅkhāro paṇḍitena ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:558_14: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena puññābhisaṅkhāro bhavādīsu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu yathārahaṃ soḷasannaṃ kāmakusalapākānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:558_15: pañcannaṃ rūpapākānañcāti ekavīsatipākānaṃ dvidhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayena paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:559_1: Kāme apuññasaṅkhāro kāmabhave aṇḍajajalābujasaṃsedajaopapātikayonivasena aṇḍajādīsu yonīsu nirayagatipetagatitiracchānagativasena
tika-abh08t0:559_2: tīsu gatīsu nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ekissā viññāṇaṭṭhitiyā nānattakāyaekattasaññīvasena ca ekasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:559_3: pana sattāvāse dvidhā nānakkhaṇikakammūpanissayapaccayehi pavatte pavattikkhaṇe paṭisandhiyaṃ paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:560_2: ekārūpabhave ekasmiṃ arūpabhave ekissā opapātikayoniyā ceva ekissā devagatiyāpi ca ākāsānañcāyatanabhūmi
tika-abh08t0:560_3: viññāṇañcāyatanabhūmi ākiñcaññāyatanabhūmivasena tīsu eva cittaṭṭhitīsu catunnaṃ arūpabhūmīnaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:560_4: catubbidhe sattāvāse catunnaṃ arūpapākacittānaṃ dvedhā nānakkhaṇikakammopanissayapaccayehi so āneñjābhisaṅkhāro
tika-abh08t0:560_7: vasenevaṃ bhavādīsu evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ vasena bhavādīsu yathā ye saṅkhārā esaṃ pākacittānaṃ paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:560_8: tathā te saṅkhārā evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paṇḍitena vijānitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:561_3: cittacetasikasaṅkhātānaṃ nāmadhammānañca saṅkanti pana saṅkamanaṃ pana na vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:561_4: Saṅkantibhāve asati atītabhavato idha imasmiṃ bhave rūpadhammānaṃ saṅkamanabhāve asati paṭisandhicittaṃ kathaṃ kena pakārena siyā bhaveyya?
tika-abh08t0:561_6: atītabhavato idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa saṅkanti saṅkamanaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:561_7: tato atītabhavato atītaṃ hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā idha imasmiṃ bhave cittassa pātubhāvo na vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:561_8: Suladdhapaccayaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ suṭṭhu laddhapaccayaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:561_9: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ rūpanāmamattaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:561_10: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena paccayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamānaṃ rūpārūpamattaṃ bhavantaraṃ aññabhavaṃ paṭisandhiṃ upeti upagacchati.
tika-abh08t0:562_2: paṭisandhikkamaṃ pana tassa sattassa idaṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ sudubbudhaṃ atidubbijānaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā ahaṃ dassayissāmi,
tika-abh08t0:562_5: vividhesu ārammaṇesu lobhavasena cittaṃ anāmetvā vajiramañjūsāya anagghamaṇiratanaṃ pakkhipanto viya citte ṭhapetvāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:562_7: āsannamaraṇassa hiito bhavato atītasmiṃ bhave āsannamaraṇassa tassa sarīrasmiṃ ātape pakkhittaṃ haritaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_8: tālapaṇṇaṃ viya sussamāne sati cakkhundriyādike indriye naṭṭhe hadayavatthumattasmiṃ ṭhite kāyappasādike
tika-abh08t0:562_11: Pubbānusevitanti ito kālā pubbakāle tena pana anusevitaṃ anuciṇṇaṃ puññaṃ kammaṃ vā apuññaṃ eva vā kammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_12: kammanimittaṃ gatinimittaṃ vā kammaphalena dvāresu paccupaṭṭhitaṃ ālambitvā manodvārāvajjanajavanavasena
tika-abh08t0:562_14: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena pavattamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ taṃ javanacittaṃ laddhapaccayaṃ laddhārammaṇapaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:562_15: Avijjāya paṭicchannādīnave visayeti akusalajavane javite tassa javanassa avijjāya appaṭicchannadose tasmiṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_16: kammādike ārammaṇe kusalajavane javite tato cittavīthito pubbabhāge pavattāya avijjāya paṭicchannadose
tika-abh08t0:562_19: akusalajavane vā javite tato vīthicittato pubbabhāge pavatto lobho taṇhā.
tika-abh08t0:562_20: Nametīti aññaṃ ārammaṇaṃ aggāhāpetvā daḷhaggāhavasena taṃ eva kammanimittagatinimittasaṅkhātaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhāpetīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:562_21: Sahajā saṅkhārā pana tassa cittassa sahajā ekato jātā cetanā pana tasmiṃ yevārammaṇe khipanti pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:562_22: Imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave ekasantativasā pavattāya taṇhāya namīyamānaṃ taṃ viññāṇaṃ orimā tīramhā rajjukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:562_23: ālambitvā mātikātikkamo puriso viya etaṃ purimaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ jahati chaḍḍeti,
tika-abh08t0:562_25: Aparaṃ kammasambhūtaṃ nissayaṃ aparaṃ aññakammato sambhūtaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthuṃ labhitvā vā alabhitvāpi
tika-abh08t0:562_26: vā ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi taṃ paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ mānasaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:562_29: Ettha etesu cittesu purimaṃ “jahatī”ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:562_30: cuticittaṃ pacchimaṃ “ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi pavattatī”ti vacanena vuttañceva cittaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ paṇḍitena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:563_1: Tadetaṃ taṃ etaṃ paṭisandhicittaṃ purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ pacchimabhave nāpi āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:563_2: kammādiñca hetuṃ vinā vajjetvā paṭisandhicittaṃ pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ ettha etasmiṃ vacane etassa paṭisandhicittassa
tika-abh08t0:563_3: purimā bhavato idha imasmiṃ paccuppannabhave anāgamane atītabhavahetūhi atītabhave kammādipaccayehi etassa
tika-abh08t0:563_6: bhavantettha nidassanā ettha etasmiṃ tassa paṭisandhicittassa atītabhavato anāgamane atītabhave hetūhi
tika-abh08t0:563_8: Aññatra aññasmiṃ paṭighosādīnaṃ atthānaṃ pavattiṭṭhāne āgantvā saddādihetukā saddādayo paccayā honti yathā.
tika-abh08t0:563_10: imasmiṃ ṭhāne janehi pavattāpitā saddadīpamuddādayo atthā pabbatantarādīsu aññesu ṭhānesu pavattānaṃ paṭighosadīpamuddādīnaṃ atthānaṃ hetukā honti.
tika-abh08t0:563_11: Tesu saddādīsu paccayesu santesu ye te paṭighosādayo honti,
tika-abh08t0:563_13: evameva ca viññāṇaṃ atītabhavato paccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattaṃ viññāṇaṃ vibhāvinā veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:563_14: Santānabandhato santānabandhavasena ekatā atītabhavapaccuppannabhavaviññāṇavasena pavattassa viññāṇassa ekībhāvo natthi,
tika-abh08t0:563_15: nānatāpi tassa viññāṇassa nānābhāvopi paccekabhāvo api.
tika-abh08t0:563_17: ekantenekatā siyā santānabandhe sati ekantena tassa viññāṇassa ekatā ekībhāvo siyā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:563_18: khīrasabhāvato paggharaṇasabhāvato khīrato sambhūtaṃ ghanasabhāvaṃ kadācipi kismiñcipi kāle na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:563_20: Athāpi aparo nayopi sā ekantanānatā tassa viññāṇassa so ekantanānābhāvo yadi bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:563_21: khīrasāmiko so puggalo dadhisāmi na bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:563_22: Khīrakāle khīrassa issarabhūto sāmiko paggharaṇasabhāvaṃ jahitvā dadhissa uppajjamānakāle tassa dadhissa issaro na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:563_23: tato khīrasāmiko añño puggalo tassa dadhissa anissaro asāmiko bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:563_24: Yasmā kāraṇā ettha etasmiṃ paṭisandhikkamavinicchaye ekantaekatāpi vā ekantanānatāpi vā samayaññunā viññunā na ceva upagantabbā.
tika-abh08t0:564_1: Evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena asaṅkantipātubhāve saṅkantipātubhāvarahite bhave sati imasmiṃ manussattabhāve
tika-abh08t0:564_3: etesaṃ idha imasmiṃ manussattabhāve niruddhattā idha imasmiṃ manussattabhāve janehi katassa tassa kammassa
tika-abh08t0:564_4: phalahetuno phalassa paccayabhūtassa parattha parasmiṃ loke āgamato ceva evaṃ aññassa sattassa aññato
tika-abh08t0:564_5: kammato hi tato sattato aññena sattena katato aññato ceva kammato taṃ phalaṃ siyā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:564_6: “aññassa sattassā”ti vacanena titthiyasattassapi kammaṃ aññassa ca phalaṃ dadeyyāti attho,
tika-abh08t0:564_7: tasmā kāraṇā etaṃ sabbaṃ eva ca tumhehi vuttavidhānaṃ na sundaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:564_8: Etthāhāti etasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhatvā codako āha –
tika-abh08t0:564_9: nanu evaṃ “asaṅkantipātubhāve bhave satī”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ niyatīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:564_10: santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ ekasmiṃ santāne pavattamānaṃ yaṃ etaṃ phalaṃ aññassa sattassa na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:564_12: bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ santāne”tiādikassa etassa atthassa sādhako nipphādako hoti.
tika-abh08t0:565_2: vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana aññassa sattassāpi vā na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:565_3: taṃ phalaṃ aññato kammato na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:565_4: Bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāro etassatthassa “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādikassa etassa atthassa sādhako nipphādako hoti,
tika-abh08t0:565_5: bījānaṃ abhisaṅkhāre madhuādinā vatthunā janehi kate tassa bījassa santāne paṭhamaṃ laddhapaccayo paṭhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:565_6: laddhamadhuādipaccayo tassa bījassa phalaṃ kālantare madhuādinā bījābhisaṅkharaṇato aññasmiṃ kāle madhuro hoti.
tika-abh08t0:565_8: Tāni hi tāni eva paṭhamaṃ madhuādinā janehi ropitāni bījāni abhisaṅkharaṇato kālantare madhurabhāvaṃ phalampi vā phalaṭṭhaṃ vā na pāpuṇanti.
tika-abh08t0:565_9: Evaṃ iminā pakārena idaṃ mayā vuttaṃ “ekasmiṃ pana santāne”tiādikaṃ vacanaṃ paṇḍitena ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:565_11: Bālakāle taruṇakāle tena taruṇena payuttena vijjāsipposadhādinā kammenāpi tassa vuddhakālasmiṃ phaladānasīlena

tika-abh08t0:566_2: evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ evaṃ iminā mayā vuttappakārena kamme santepi saṃvijjamānepi taṃ kammaṃ etasmiṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:566_3: khaṇe vijjamānampi vā phalassa paccayo hoti.

tika-abh08t0:566_6: Sace yadi vijjamānaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:566_7: tappavattikkhaṇe pana tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇe tassa kammassa vijjamānakāle pana hetunā kammeneva saddhiṃ pākena bhavitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:566_9: Vijjamānaṃ niruddhaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa paccayo yadi bhaveyya,

tika-abh08t0:566_11: tassa kammassa pavattikkhaṇato pacchā vā avijjamānakāleti attho.
tika-abh08t0:566_12: Niccaphalaṃ siyāti sabbadā kammapaccayavirahitaṃ phalaṃ siyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:566_16: sotāpattipaṭilābhāya ahameva pāṭibhogo”tiādīsu pāṭhesu pāṭibhogo viya kammaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:566_17: Sotāpattiphalaṃ viya kammato sambhūtaṃ phalaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:566_18: Kaṭattāyeva janehi kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ phalassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:566_20: tassa avijjamānassa kammassa vijjamānatā vā na ca neva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:567_1: Abhidhammāvatāroyaṃ abhidhammāvatāro ayaṃ paramatthappakāsano bhūtatthadīpano sotūnaṃ puggalānaṃ pītibuddhivivaḍḍhano
tika-abh08t0:567_2: paṇḍitehi vividhesu ārammaṇesu cittaṃ anāmetvā sakkaccena manasikārena sotabbo.

tika-abh08t0:574_1: Yaṃ ruppatīti rūpanti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ ruppati sītādinā viruddhapaccayena vikāramāpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:574_2: Tathā rūpayatīti rūpaṃ yaṃ dhammajātaṃ vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānaṃ hadayaṅgatabhāvaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ pakāseti,

tika-abh08t0:582_2: atthi iti ayaṃ eko anto koṭṭhāso,

tika-abh08t0:596_0: 681. Ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ heṭṭhā chahi cittehi vāyodhātusamuṭṭhitaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvā.
tika-abh08t0:598_1: Etāsaṃ pana lahutādīnaṃ tissannaṃ pavattiyaṃ nidassanaṃ kamato ārogyaṃ lahutā,
tika-abh08t0:598_4: Lahutādittayaṃ pana kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,

tika-abh08t0:599_2: Veneyyānaṃ vasena vāti eke veneyyā ācayavasena jātirūpaṃ jānanti,
tika-abh08t0:599_4: Iti veneyyānaṃ jānanavasena jātirūpaṃ dvidhā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:601_2: natthi nīvaraṇā tavāti yo tvaṃ addhā ekantena muni asi sambuddho asi nīvaraṇā dhammā tava tuyhaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:601_3: iti vacane sace middhaṃ nīvaraṇaṃ rūpe paviṭṭhaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:601_4: Bhagavatā rūpakāyassa vijjamānattā “natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti vacanaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:601_7: Iti sampayuttavacanato sampayuttassa rūpassa abhāvato tampi na vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:601_13: Iti vacanena ca na middharūpaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:601_16: Arūpepi etassa middhassa uppattiyā sādhakavacanato niṭṭhaṃ ettha ca avagantabbaṃ “arūpa”nti viññunā.
tika-abh08t0:603_1: Jāyeyyuṃ yadi tānipīti tāni jaratāaniccatārūpā yadi jāyeyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:603_2: evaṃ sante tu tesaṃ jaratāaniccatā bhedā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:603_3: Hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ pāko na paccati,
tika-abh08t0:603_4: bhedo vā na ca bhijjati yasmā,
tika-abh08t0:603_7: Etaṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jātassa nipphannarūpassa pākabhedattā na jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:603_8: Siyā kassaci buddhetthāti ettha jaratāaniccatāvinicchayādhikāre kassaci janassa buddhi ñāṇaṃ yadi siyā,
tika-abh08t0:603_15: Jāti jāyamānassa nipphannarūpassa nibbatti nāma pakāsitā.
tika-abh08t0:603_16: Tattha yassa siyā tattha vacane yassa janassa buddhi siyā.
tika-abh08t0:603_18: sā jāti abhinibbattisammutiṃ tappaccayattavohāraṃ tesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṭṭhena laddhavohāraṃ kammajādikaṃ vohāraṃ labhateva yathā,
tika-abh08t0:603_19: tathā tesaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ te pākabhedā abhinibbattisammutiṃ nāma tappaccayattavohāraṃ labhanti,
tika-abh08t0:603_23: evaṃ pākabhedā taṃ kammādisambhavavohāraṃ kadācipi na labhanti.
tika-abh08t0:603_24: Hi saccaṃ vacanaṃ kasmā kāraṇā janakānaṃ kammādipaccayānaṃ ānubhāvasaṅkhāte khaṇuppāde tesaṃ pākabhedānaṃ abhāvato na labhanti.
tika-abh08t0:603_25: Vuttappakārena khaṇuppāde jātiparamparābhāvato sā jāti labbhate,
tika-abh08t0:603_26: tasmā kāraṇā jāti eva abhinibbattisammutiṃ paccayattavohāraṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t0:603_28: Taṃ jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jiyyati iti bhijjati iti vā na vattabbaṃ hoti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:603_29: Kammādipaccayānaṃ ānubhāvakkhaṇe tassa jaratāaniccatādvayassa paccayānaṃ abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:604_1: Aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcetaṃ jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccasaṅkhātaṃ itipi vacanassa bhagavatā vuttattā jaratāaniccatādvayaṃ jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:604_3: evaṃ “jāyati evā”ti vacanaṃ bhagavatā na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:604_6: jarāmaraṇamiccapī”tivuttabhāvādinā ākāradesanāpariyāyena lesena bhagavatā aniccānaṃ nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:604_7: jarāmaraṇasaṅkhātaṃ sabhāvato jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccaṃ saṅkhatañcāpi cittajānaṃ vikārattā viññattiyo “cittajā”ti
tika-abh08t0:604_10: Yadi evaṃ atthe sati etaṃ ruppanalakkhaṇattayaṃ ajātattā ca sabbathā sabbākārena khaṃpupphaṃva natthi,
tika-abh08t0:604_11: asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ viya niccaṃvāti ca codako vadeyya,
tika-abh08t0:604_12: natthi niccanti idaṃ ubhayavacanaṃ no bhagavatā vattabbaṃ. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:604_13: Nissayadhammānaṃ āyattabhāvena pavattito pathaviyādīnaṃ nissayānaṃ bhāve sati tassa lakkhaṇattayassa bhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:604_14: tasmā khaṃpupphaṃva taṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ na natthi,
tika-abh08t0:604_16: Pathavīādīnaṃ abhāve taṃ lakkhaṇattayaṃ na ca labbhati yasmā,
tika-abh08t0:605_2: Tesameva ca rūpānaṃ tesameva nipphannarūpadhammānaṃ vikārattā nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā sesavasena vuttānaṃ pabhedakatoti dassanato.
tika-abh08t0:611_0: Yo bhikkhu abhidhamme piṭake dhammasenāpatinā samattaṃ sabhāvaṃ gantuṃ pāpuṇituṃ iccheyya,
tika-abh08t0:611_1: tena ca bhikkhunā hitatthinā sakkaccaṃ ādarena sammā tīraṇacintanasajjhāyanehi ayaṃ abhidhammāvatāro sikkhitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:617_5: Nibbānaṃ puṭṭhenāti sugatena nibbānaṃ puṭṭhena sāriputtattherena.
tika-abh08t0:617_6: Ubhinnaṃ suttānanti dhammasenāpativuttānaṃ dvinnaṃ suttānanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:617_8: Puthūnaṃ dhammānaṃ appamattakkhaṇe rāgādikkhayamattaṃ nibbānaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:617_10: Kiñca bhiyyo kiṃ uttari kāraṇañca atthīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:617_11: Rāgādīnaṃ saṅkhatattā tesaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ nibbānaṃ saṅkhatalakkhaṇaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:617_12: Kiṃ panetthāti etesu khaṇesu kiṃ pana khaṇe tvaṃ vadesi.
tika-abh08t0:618_0: 771. Assaddhoti bāhirasaddhāya virahito. Vantāsoti vantā vamitā āsā taṇhā yenāti vantāso.
tika-abh08t0:619_1: Yadidaṃ nekkhammaṃ yaṃ idaṃ kāmānaṃ etaṃ nissaraṇaṃ nirodho,
tika-abh08t0:619_2: tassa kiñcibhūtassa saṅkhatassa paṭiccasamuppannadhammajātassa nirodho nissaraṇanti,
tika-abh08t0:619_3: evaṃ iminā pakārena vuttassa tassa nissaraṇanāmakassa abhāvappattidosato nissaraṇanāmakānaṃ paṭhamajjhānaākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:622_1: Saddhābuddhikaraṃ tathāgatamate jinavacane sammohaviddhaṃsanaṃ paññāsambhavaṃ paññākāraṇaṃ sampasādanakaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:622_2: Atthabyañjanasālinanti atthabyañjanasāravantaṃ sumadhuraṃ sāraññu jinasāsanasāraññū vimhāpanaṃ accherakaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:622_3: imaṃ evaṃ vuttappakāraṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ yo jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:622_4: so jano gambhīre nipuṇe nipuṇañāṇagocare abhidhammapiṭake padaṃ niṭṭhaṃ uttamasanniṭṭhānaṃ yāti pāpuṇāti.
tika-abh08t0:628_0: Saṅkhāyatīti saṅkhā, kathīyatīti attho. Kinti kiṃ iti kathīyati. “Aha”nti “mama”nti kathīyati.
tika-abh08t0:629_0: Tajjāpaññattīti tassa cakkhusotādikassa anurūpavasena jātā paññattīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:630_0: Ekassavāti ekassa nāmadhammassa “accho”ti nāmaṃ gahetvā bahūnaṃ nāmadhammānaṃ “accho”ti nāmaṃ gahetvā.
tika-abh08t0:631_0: Gahito pubbe saṅketo etenāti gahitapubbasaṅketaṃ. Kiṃ taṃ?
tika-abh08t0:632_0: Itthī ca puriso ca itthipurisā, te ādayo yesaṃ te itthipurisādayo, tesaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:639_1: Tadāyattavuttīnanti tesaṃ āyattā paṭibaddhā yesaṃ vipākānaṃ te tadāyattavuttino, tesaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:639_2: Atra imasmiṃ ṭhāne ācariyena parihāro vuccate.
tika-abh08t0:639_3: Kutoyaṃ tava tatthānurodhoti tattha tasmiṃ aññassa attakārakassa abhāvepi sattusaṅkhātassa attano bhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:639_4: ayaṃ tava anurodho anunayo kuto kena kāraṇena idha imasmiṃ asati kattari kusalādīnaṃ atthibhāve kammavirodho
tika-abh08t0:639_7: Kiñcetthāti ettha etissaṃ codanāyaṃ kiñci vattabbaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t0:640_0: Atha na bhavatīti attano anāse cetanāpi anāso yadi na bhavati.
tika-abh08t0:640_1: Paṭiññā hīnāti “cetanāya anañño attā”ti paṭiññā hīnā.
tika-abh08t0:640_2: Vuttappakāratoti “attano anāse cetanāya nāso na bhavati”iti vuttappakārato.
tika-abh08t0:640_3: Viparītanti “attano anāse cetanāya anāso”iti viparītaggahaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:640_6: atha pana evaṃ na bhavatīti attā nassatu,
tika-abh08t0:641_1: Evañca satīti evaṃ ubhinnaṃ ekadesassa abhāve sati ko doso iti tvaṃ ce vadeyyāsi.
tika-abh08t0:641_2: Yaṃ pana tayā vuttaṃ yathā rūparasagandhādīnaṃ ekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattanti yaṃ vacanaṃ pana tayā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:641_5: Tava paṭiññā hīnāti “ekadese vattamānānaṃ cetanattānaṃ lakkhaṇato aññatta”nti paṭiññā hīnā.
tika-abh08t0:642_0: Evañca satīti etaṃ cetanāya aññabhāve sati ko doso iti ce bhavaṃ vadeyya.
tika-abh08t0:645_0: 783. Ekassa puggalassa aṭṭhisañcayo aṭṭhisamūho ekena kappena pabbatasamo rāsi siyā.
tika-abh08t0:647_1: Yo bhikkhu imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ satatampi cinteti,
tika-abh08t0:647_2: tassa bhikkhuno paramā paññā vepulaṃ vipulabhāvaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh08t0:648_1: Yo bhikkhu imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ atimatikaraṃ uttamaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṃ vimativināsakaraṃ kaṅkhacchedakaraṃ piyakkaraṃ pemakaraṃ sadā paṭhati, suṇāti,

tika-abh08t0:660_2: caritānanti vaṇṇitāti yaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ saddhācaritassa anukūlaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:660_4: Idaṃ sabbaṃ pana vacanaṃ ekantavipaccanīkabhāvato ekantapaṭipakkhabhāvato atisappāyato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:661_2: sukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ vipassanāsampattisukhānaṃ bhavasampattisukhānaṃ paccayā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:662_0: 838. Sammaṭṭhānaṃ manobhunoti manobhuhadayo tassa hadayassa sammaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:664_2: Tatraṭṭhakanti tasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ ito cito ca anāharitabbaṃ kasiṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:665_1: Vivaṭṭaṃ pana micchatāti nibbānaṃ icchantena vidatthicaturaṅgulaṃ vaṭṭaṃ kātuṃ taṃ kasiṇaṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:666_2: tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalāti tato kasiṇamaṇḍalato hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padese vidatthicaturaṅgule ucce.
tika-abh08t0:667_2: Khemato daṭṭhuṃ disvā ahaṃ imāya paṭipattiyā addhā ekantena pavivekasukhassa nibbānasukhassa bhāgī assaṃ bhaveyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:668_1: So kasiṇassa vaṇṇo tena yoginā na pekkhitabbo,
tika-abh08t0:668_2: kasiṇassa lakkhaṇaṃ na pekkhitabbaṃ ussadassa vasena vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā.
tika-abh08t0:669_1: Evaṃ iminā vuttappakārena ekaggacetaso ekaggacittassa yogino nimīletvā āvajjantassa yathā yena pakārena kammaṭṭhānaṃ hoti ummīlite kālepi,
tika-abh08t0:669_2: tathā tena pakārena taṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ āpāthaṃ yāti ce yadi āgacchati,
tika-abh08t0:672_3: Takkāhaṭanti vitakkena āhaṭaṃ phusitaṃ kare kareyya.
tika-abh08t0:674_6: Tadā taṃ uggahanimittaṃ padāletvāva niggataṃ paṭibhāganimittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:675_2: Nīvaraṇappahānena samādhino paṭilābhakkhaṇe pana aṅgānaṃ vitakkādīnaṃ pātubhāvena iti dvīhi ākārehi.
tika-abh08t0:677_0: 882. Cakkavattiyagabbhova ratanaṃ viya assa anena sudullabhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:679_2: Layaṃ līnabhāvaṃ īsakampi yantaṃ gacchantaṃ mānasaṃ āvajjanacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:680_1: Bhavaṅgaṃ pana pacchijja ucchinditvā tadeva pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā yogino manodvāramhi jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:680_2: Tatoti āvajjanato tatrevārammaṇe tasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇasaṅkhāte ārammaṇe tassa yogino javanāni cattāri vā pañca vā jāyante.
tika-abh08t0:680_5: Aññehi aññesaṃ cittānaṃ aññehi vitakkādīhi balavatarā honti.
tika-abh08t0:680_6: Tāni appanābhāvaṃ appattāni appanācetaso parikammopacārato parikammabhāvato parikammānīti vuccante,

tika-abh08t0:860_0: 1405. Tividhā byappathānañhi gatiyoti byappathānaṃ vacanānaṃ atthaganthayuttivasena tividhā gatiyo.
tika-abh08t0:861_0: 1406. Nikāyantaraladdhīhīti aññasmiṃ nikāye laddhīhi. Vācanāmagganissitoti vacanappabandhanissito.
tika-abh08t0:866_0: 1414. Sallekhāti sallekhavutti. Sākhalyeti sakhilabhāve. Satāti satisampannena.
tika-abh08t0:891_2: pakaraṇamidamārabhantoyamācariyo paṭhamaṃ tāva ratanattayappaṇāmakaraṇena antarāyanivāraṇañceva paññāpāṭavañca pattheti.
tika-abh08t0:891_4: Sā ca vandaneyyavandakānaṃ khettajjhāsayasampadāhi diṭṭhadhammavedanīyabhūtā yathāladdhasampattinimittakassa
tika-abh08t0:891_7: rāgādimalavikkhālanena ca cittasantānaṃ parisodhetvā tannissitāya paññāya yathādhippetasiddhisampādakaṃ tikkhavisadabhāvamāvahati.
tika-abh08t0:891_10: tasmā sappurisācārānurakkhaṇatthañca ādimhi ratanattayavandanā āraddhāti evamādinā aññānipi bahūni payojanāni niddhāretabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:891_11: Tāni pana tattha tattha bahudhā vitthāritānīti taṃ papañcaparissamaṃ ṭhapetvā yathānuppattameva tāva vaṇṇayissāma.
tika-abh08t0:892_0: Ettha ca ratanattayappaṇāmaṃ kattukāmo tathāgatamūlakattā sesaratanānaṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva tathāgatassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:892_5: khettaṅgatāya ca vandanāya yathādhippetanipphattiyā hetubhāvo ca dassito hoti.
tika-abh08t0:893_1: Tassa pana osānagāthāyaṃ “pavakkhāmī”ti iminā aparakālakiriyāvacanena saha sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:893_8: paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ kampanaṃ hadayakhedaṃ janayatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:894_0: Ettha ca uppādavayantatāvasena ceva santatipariyosānavasena ca satipi bhagavato karuṇāpaññānaṃ sapariyantabhāve
tika-abh08t0:894_2: Sammāsambuddhassa hi sabbasattānaṃ dukkhāpanayanākārappavattā anaññasādhāraṇā mahākaruṇā kañci sattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:894_4: tathā sabbadhammasabhāvabodhanasamatthā sabbaññutaññāṇasaṅkhātā paññāpi sakalañeyyadhammesu anavasesato pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:894_6: Karuṇāpaññāggahaṇena cettha bhagavato sabbalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampatti dassitā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:894_7: Tathā hi karuṇāggahaṇena lokiyesu mahaggatabhāvappattāsādhāraṇaguṇadīpanato sakalalokiyaguṇasampatti dassitā,
tika-abh08t0:895_2: Mahākaruṇāsañcoditamānaso hi bhagavā saṃsārapaṅkato sattānaṃ samuddharaṇatthāya katābhinīhāro anupubbena
tika-abh08t0:895_3: pāramiyo pūretvā anuttarasammāsambodhiyā adhigamena sakalabuddhaguṇe paṭilabhi.
tika-abh08t0:895_5: sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānassa pana maggañāṇassa paṭilabhanato uttarikaraṇīyābhāvato paññā pariyosānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:895_6: Ādipariyosānadassanena ca sakalabuddhaguṇā nayato dassitā honti.
tika-abh08t0:895_8: itarathā tādisassa sabbaññubuddhassapi vacanapathātītaṃ tathāgataguṇaṃ anupadaṃ vaṇṇento ko nāma pariyosānamāharituṃ sakkuṇeyyāti.
tika-abh08t0:896_0: Evaṃ karuṇāpaññāmukhena saṅkhepato sakalabuddhaguṇehi bhagavantaṃ thometvāpi puna attano buddhaguṇasaṃkittane
tika-abh08t0:896_1: atittābhāvena ceva paresañca pasādabāhullajananatthaṃ tadantogadhepi visiṭṭhaguṇe padhānabhāvena nīharitvā
tika-abh08t0:896_3: Tattha “tathāgata”nti tathā āgatatādīhi aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi tathāgataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:898_1: Yathā sabbalokahitāya ussukkamāpannā purimakā sammāsambuddhā āgatā,
tika-abh08t0:898_3: Manussattādiaṭṭhaṅgasamannāgatena yena abhinīhārena te bhagavanto āgatā,
tika-abh08t0:898_4: teneva ca abhinīhārena ayampi bhagavā āgato,
tika-abh08t0:898_5: yathā ca te bhagavanto samatiṃsa pāramiyo pūretvā pañcamahāpariccāgādīni sampādetvā āgatā,
tika-abh08t0:898_6: yathā ca te sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhamme bhāvetvā brūhetvā āgatā,
tika-abh08t0:898_7: tathā ayampi bhagavā āgatoti evaṃ tāva tathā āgato”ti tathāgato. (1)
tika-abh08t0:899_1: Yathā sampatijātā te bhagavanto sattapadavītihārena gatā,
tika-abh08t0:899_2: yathā vā te samathavipassanāmaggehi taṃ taṃ akusalapakkhaṃ vidhamitvā gatā,
tika-abh08t0:900_1: Yasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ yaṃ sabhāvasarasalakkhaṇaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:900_3: tasmā tathalakkhaṇaṃ āgatoti tathāgato gamanatthānaṃ bujjhanatthasambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:901_3: tathametaṃ avitathameta’ntiādivacanato ‘avijjāya saṅkhārānaṃ paccayaṭṭho saṅkhārānaṃ avijjāpaccayasambhūtasamudāgataṭṭho
tika-abh08t0:901_4: tatho avitatho anaññatho’tiādivacanato ca tathadhammasaṅkhāte saccapaṭiccasamuppāde yāthāvato āgato abhisambuddho,
tika-abh08t0:902_1: Yasmā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ chadvāraggahite ārammaṇe aviparītameva passati jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:902_3: yaṃ catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyā’tiādinā tathamesa aviparītaṃ vibhajati dasseti,
tika-abh08t0:902_5: taṃ vā āgamayati dassetīti tathāgatoti evaṃ tathadassitāya tathāgato. (5)
tika-abh08t0:903_1: Yasmā esa abhisambodhito yāva parinibbānā rāgamadādinimmathanavasena ekasadisameva dhammaṃ tathaṃ avitathaṃ bhāsati,
tika-abh08t0:903_5: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuttoti evaṃ tathavāditāya tathāgato. (6)
tika-abh08t0:904_1: Bhagavā hi ‘yathā vādī tathā kārī’ti vacanato attano vācāya anurūpameva karoti,
tika-abh08t0:904_3: tathā kāyopi gato pavatto imassāti tathāgatoti evaṃ tathākāritāya tathāgato. (7)
tika-abh08t0:905_1: Yasmā panesa anupamāya sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇasampadāya samannāgatattā sadevakaṃ lokaṃ abhibhuyya pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:906_3: Tena hesa mahānubhāvo bhisakko viya dibbāgadena sappe sabbaparappavādino,
tika-abh08t0:906_5: Iti sabbalokābhibhavane tatho aviparīto yathāvutto agado etassāti da-
tika-abh08t0:906_7: kāraṃ katvā tathāgatoti vuccatīti ayamettha saṅkhepo.
tika-abh08t0:931_0: Kenaci guṇena attano visiṭṭhassa kassaci abhāvato natthi etassa uttaroti anuttaro.
tika-abh08t0:931_1: Bhagavato hi avīcito paṭṭhāya yāva bhavaggaṃ tiriyaṃ aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu na koci kenaci guṇena samasamopi atthi,
tika-abh08t0:934_7: Tattha buddhādiguṇārammaṇā kāmāvacarakusalakiriyānamaññatarā cetanā kāyaviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā kāyadvārappavattivasena
tika-abh08t0:934_9: sāyeva vacīviññattiṃ samuṭṭhāpetvā vacīdvārappavattivasena uppannā vacīvandanāti,
tika-abh08t0:934_10: ubhayaviññattiyo pana asamuṭṭhāpetvā kevalaṃ manodvārappavattivasena uppannā manovandanāti.
tika-abh08t0:934_19: saddassa jāgaraṇavikasanatthesupi pavattanato abujjhi savāsanasammohaniddāya accantaṃ vigato,
tika-abh08t0:934_21: Bhagavā hi vatthusabhāvadassanavibandhikāya avijjāsaṅkhātāya niddāya ariyamaggañāṇena saha vāsanāya samucchinnattā tato accantaṃ vigato.
tika-abh08t0:935_0: Ettāvatā ca dvīhi ākārehi bhagavato thomanā katā hoti attahitasampattito,
tika-abh08t0:935_2: Tāsu attahitasampatti anāvaraṇañāṇādhigamo savāsanasakalasaṃkilesānamaccantappahānaṃ anupādisesanibbānādhigamo ca,
tika-abh08t0:935_4: Tattha dhammadesanāya abhājanesu devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṃ hitajjhāsayatā aparipākagatindriyānaṃ indriyaparipākakālāgamanañca āsayo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:935_5: Tadaññasattānaṃ pana lābhasakkārādinirapekkhacittassa yānattayamukhena sabbadukkhaniyyānikadhammadesanā payogo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:935_11: tathadassanaṭṭhena ca tathāgataṭṭhena ca tathāgatasaddena payogavasena,
tika-abh08t0:936_0: Apica hetuphalasattūpakārasampadāvasena tīhākārehipi bhagavato thomanā pavattatīti taṃvasenapettha thomanā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:936_10: Aggamaggabhāvanāya sabbakilesānaṃ saha vāsanāhi anuppattidhammatāpādanaṃ pahānasampadā.
tika-abh08t0:936_13: Sakalalokanayanābhisekabhūtā pana lakkhaṇānubyañjanapaṭimaṇḍitā attabhāvasampatti rūpakāyasampadā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:936_18: Phalasampadāsu ñāṇasampadā ceva pahānasampadā ca anantapaññā- vacanena,
tika-abh08t0:937_0: Evaṃ buddharatanassa thomanāpubbaṅgamaṃ paṇāmaṃ katvā idāni sesaratanānampi paṇāmamārabhanto āha “dhammaṃ sādhugaṇampi cā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:937_2: suppaṭipannatādayo saṅghaguṇā ca dassitā honti tappabhavassa anaññathābhāvatoti na tesaṃ visuṃ thomanā katā.
tika-abh08t0:937_3: Adhigatamagge sacchikatanirodhe puggale yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne ca apāyadukkhesu ceva vaṭṭadukkhesu ca apatamāne katvā dhāretīti dhammo,
tika-abh08t0:942_0: Ettha hi kāmarāgādibhedo sabbopi rāgo virajjati etenāti “rāgavirāgo”ti maggo kathito.
tika-abh08t0:942_2: antonijjhānalakkhaṇassa ca sokassa taduppattiyaṃ sabbaso parikkhīṇattā “anejamasoka”nti phalaṃ kathitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:942_5: pakaṭṭhaguṇavibhāvanato suṭṭhu vibhajitattā ca “appaṭikūla”ntiādinā sabbopi pariyattidhammo kathito.
tika-abh08t0:942_6: Tattha ariyamagganibbānāni nippariyāyeneva apāyādito dhāraṇato dhammo,
tika-abh08t0:942_10: nibbānassa ca ālambaṇabhāvena tassa tadatthasiddhihetutāyapi ubhinnampi nippariyāyato labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:942_11: Itaresu pana ariyaphalassa maggena samucchinnakilesānaṃ paṭipassaddhakiccatāya,
tika-abh08t0:942_12: maggānukūlappavattito pariyattidhammassa ca tadadhigamahetutāyāti ubhinnampi pariyāyatova labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:943_2: sādhu cāyaṃ gaṇo cāti vā sādhugaṇo,
tika-abh08t0:943_3: sādhuno vā sammāsambuddhassa āyatto gaṇo tassa orasaputtabhāvatoti sādhugaṇo.
tika-abh08t0:943_10: Keci “gaṇo”ti idha pakaraṇatova ariyagaṇapuggalova labbhatīti sādhūti bhāvanapuṃsakavasena “vanditvā”ti iminā saha yojenti,
tika-abh08t0:943_11: tadā pana sādhūti bhayalābhādivirahena sakkaccaṃ ādaranti attho.
tika-abh08t0:944_1: Evaṃ pakaraṇārambhe yathādhippetaṃ ratanattayappaṇāmaṃ katvā idāni yattha pāṭavatthāya idaṃ pakaraṇaṃ paṭṭhapīyati,
tika-abh08t0:944_2: taṃ saddhiṃ desakadesapaṭiggāhakasampattīhi vibhāvetvā dassento āha “paṇḍukambalanāmāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:944_3: Tattha devarājassa paṇḍukambalanāmāya silāya vimale sītale tale nisinno atulavikkamo devadevehi pūjito
tika-abh08t0:944_4: devadevo devapurakkhato devānaṃ devalokasmiṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ desesīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:945_2: Sā hi sakkassa tādisapuññānubhāvena nibbattā paṇḍukambalajayasumanapupphasamānena vaṇṇena sabbakālaṃ virocati,
tika-abh08t0:945_12: appamāṇena ca ñāṇabalena na kassaci devabrahmādīsu aññatarassa balatulanāya upanetabbaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t0:945_13: Atha vā anaññasādhāraṇattā atulyo parakkamasaṅkhāto aparimāṇaguṇavisesāvahena anaññasādhāraṇena sammappadhānena
tika-abh08t0:945_14: samannāgatattā vā atulyo sammappadhānasaṅkhāto vikkamo imassāti atulyavikkamo.
tika-abh08t0:945_18: kārapaccayassāpi sambhavato atulo vikkamo assāti “atulavikkamo”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:946_9: Atha vā devanīyā taṃtaṃbyasananittharaṇatthikehi “saraṇaṃ parāyaṇa”nti gamanīyā,
tika-abh08t0:946_23: Na hi aññesaṃ devalokesu nisinno bhagavā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desesīti.
tika-abh08t0:947_3: Yathāvuttānaṃ tiṇṇampi devānaṃ uttamo devo tehi sabbehi adhikataraṃ kīḷanādiyogatoti devadevo, bhagavā.
tika-abh08t0:947_4: So hi niratisayāya abhiññākīḷāya uttamehi dibbabrahmaariyavihārehi saparasantānasiddhāya pañcavidhamāravijayicchānibbattiyā
tika-abh08t0:947_6: yathāparādhayathānulomayathādhammānusāsanasaṅkhātena ca vohārātisayena paramāya paññāya ca sarīrappabhāsaṅkhātāya
tika-abh08t0:947_8: ca samannāgatattā sadevakena vā lokena “saraṇa”nti gamanīyato,
tika-abh08t0:947_10: bhattivasena kamanīyato ca sabbe te deve tehi tehi guṇehi abhibhuyya ṭhitoti sabbadevehi pūjanīyataro devo,
tika-abh08t0:947_11: visuddhidevabhāvasaṅkhātassa vā sabbaññuguṇālaṅkārassa adhigatattā aññesañca devānaṃ atisayena devoti devadevo.
tika-abh08t0:947_12: Devānanti tadā dhammapaṭiggāhakānaṃ dasasahassacakkavāḷādhivāsīnaṃ mātudevaputtappamukhānaṃ upapattidevānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:947_14: Te pana upapattidevesveva saṅgahitā manussaarahantānaṃ tattha abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:947_16: Visuddhidevā hi vuttanayena itaradevehi sātisayaṃ kīḷanādiyogato idha “devadevā”ti adhippetā, tehi.
tika-abh08t0:948_0: Nanu ca “devāna”nti vacaneneva devapurakkhatabhāvo siddhoti kiṃ “devapurakkhato”ti vacanena?
tika-abh08t0:948_2: Bhagavā hi kadāci cūḷapanthakattherādīnaṃ viya parammukhepi nisīditvā obhāsaṃ vissajjetvā sattānaṃ sammukhe nisinnaṃ viya dassento dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-abh08t0:948_3: kadācipi pārāyanikabrāhmaṇādīnaṃ viya sammukhepi nisīditvā aññehi ca parivuto aññesampi dhammaṃ deseti,
tika-abh08t0:948_5: devehiyeva parivuto devānaṃ desetīti dassanatthaṃ “devapurakkhato”tipi vattabbamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:949_1: Evametasmiṃ pakaraṇe gāravajananatthaṃ tena sampādetabbapāṭavavisayaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ desakādisampattīhi
tika-abh08t0:949_9: Tathā hi yo paro na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:950_3: Taṃ sandhāya vividhanayaggahaṇasamatthassa sutamayañāṇassa uppādanatthanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:950_5: bhindanti vā pāpake akusale dhammeti bhikkhū, tesaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:950_11: Tattha pariyattibhājanatthatoti pariyattiatthena ceva bhājanatthena ca.
tika-abh08t0:950_12: Tathā hi “mā piṭakasampadānenā”tiādīsu pariyatti piṭakanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:950_13: “Atha puriso āgaccheyya kudālapiṭaka”ntiādīsu yaṃ kiñci bhājanampi.
tika-abh08t0:955_2: Ettha hi “satto puggalo bhikkhū”tiādikaṃ lokavohāramatikkamma “khandhadhātuāyatana”ntiādinā yathādhammavaseneva bāhulladesanā pavattā,
tika-abh08t0:955_6: tasmā tiṇṇampi piṭakānaṃ buddhavacanabhāvepi yathāsabhāvānatikkamadesanādito idameva tīsu piṭakesu visiṭṭhanti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:955_8: Abhidhamme hi nippadesato khandhāyatanādidhammānaṃ vibhattattā itaradvayato atirekatarā,
tika-abh08t0:955_11: visiṭṭhassa ca pāḷidhammassa vasena idameva tīsu piṭakesu uttamanti vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:955_14: Apica vuḍḍhimantādidhammānaṃ ettha vuttattā cetaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:957_0: Vuttādhikā ca dhammā, abhidhammo tena akkhāto”ti. ;
tika-abh08t0:958_1: mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā vuḍḍhimantopi dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:958_2: “rūpārammaṇaṃ vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā”tiādinā nayena ārammaṇādīhi lakkhitabbattā salakkhaṇāpi “sekkhā dhammā asekkhā dhammā,
tika-abh08t0:958_3: lokuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena pūjitā pūjārahāpi “phasso hoti,
tika-abh08t0:958_4: vedanā hotī”tiādinā nayena sabhāvaparicchinnattā paricchinnāpi “mahaggatā dhammā appamāṇā dhammā,
tika-abh08t0:958_5: anuttarā dhammā”tiādinā nayena adhikā visiṭṭhāpi dhammā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:958_7: saddassa vuḍḍhiādiatthesupi pavattanato “vuḍḍhimanto dhammā etthā”tiādinā nibbacanena idaṃ piṭakaṃ “abhidhamma”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:958_8: Abhidhammaṃ otaranti anenāti abhidhammāvatāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:958_11: Ācariyena hi gāthāpadapūraṇatthaṃ yebhuyyena tattha tattha nipātā vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:958_16: idha pana iṭṭhabhāvasāmaññena atthabyañjanasampatti madhurasaddena vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:958_19: Tena pana madhurena yogato idampi madhuraṃ yathā nīlaguṇayogato nīluppalanti.
tika-abh08t0:958_20: Nipuṇagambhīrāya byañjanasampattiyā ceva atthasampattiyā ca abhidhammavisayaṃ matiṃ vaḍḍhetīti mativaḍḍhanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:959_5: mohoyeva abhidhammamahāpuraṃ pavisantānaṃ pavesananivāraṇattā kavāṭabhūtoti mohakavāṭaṃ, tassa.
tika-abh08t0:959_11: Kāraṇakāraṇampi hi kāraṇavasena vuccati yathā “corehi gāmo daḍḍho,

tika-abh08t0:996_3: “anuppannānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ anuppādāya chandaṃ janeti, vāyamati,
tika-abh08t0:996_7: Kusā viya lunātīti ettha “ku”iti bhūmi vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:996_8: dhammānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvena taṃsadisatāya idha rūpārūpakkhandho vutto.
tika-abh08t0:996_10: āyatiñca anudahanato vināsanato kuṃ sāyantīti kusā, rāgādayo,
tika-abh08t0:996_11: te viya attano nissayaṃ lunāti chindatīti kusalaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:996_12: Payogasampāditā hi kusaladhammā accantameva rūpārūpadhamme appavattikaraṇena samucchindanti anupādisesanibbānadhātupāpanatoti.
tika-abh08t0:996_13: Vuttanayena pana “ku”nti laddhanāmassa rūpārūpakkhandhassa salanato apanayanato kuṃ saletīti kusalaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:996_14: Kusaṃ lunātīti pana kucchitā ettha sayantīti kuso, kāyo,
tika-abh08t0:997_14: yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”ti ca evamādīsu anavajje.
tika-abh08t0:997_16: kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā”ti ca ādīsu iṭṭhavipāke.
tika-abh08t0:997_20: Kilesarogassa hi abhāvato kusalaṃ ārogyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:999_1: vuttaniyāmena pana anavajjaiṭṭhavipākato aññaṃ kusalaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:999_2: Na hi sayameva attano lakkhaṇanti sakkā vattunti?
tika-abh08t0:999_6: Evañca yena sabhāvena pariññātavacanatthassa saddassa attho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:999_8: tesaṃ pariññātāpariññātavacanatthasabhāvānaṃ bhedena taṃsamaṅgissa kusalassa ekassāpi bhedo parikappīyati yathā “pure bhavaṃ paṭu āsi,
tika-abh08t0:999_12: apariññātavacanatthabhāvena lakkhitabbanti evaṃ parikappitabhede pariggayhamāne na koci doso āpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1000_7: tasmā anavajjo ca iṭṭhavipāko ca anavajjaiṭṭhavipākaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1000_16: yathā bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti kusalesu dhammesū”tiādīsu viya vajjarahitattā abyākatassāpi pasaṅgo siyāti iṭṭhavipāka-
tika-abh08t0:1000_18: “iṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇa”nti pana vutte itaraṃ na vattabbaṃ abyākatassa vipākārahabhāvena iṭṭhavipākatāpasaṅgabhāvato?
tika-abh08t0:1000_22: padena ca vipākasukhataṃ dassetuṃ padadvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1000_25: Atha vā kusalassa atthavisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ purimapadaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1000_30: lakkhaṇa”nti vacanena kusalassa sāmaññalakkhaṇaṃ vuttaṃ anavajjaiṭṭhavipākasabhāvassa kusalajātiyā sādhāraṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:1001_3: dānādipuññakiriyavatthugatena tena tena kusalaṅgena tassa tassa maccherādiakusalaṅgassa pahānaṃ tadaṅgappahānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1001_5: kāmāvacarakusalānaṃ parittānubhāvatāya tehi attano ṭhitikkhaṇe viddhaṃsitānamakusalānaṃ tadapagame sati puna āgamena vottharaṇato.
tika-abh08t0:1001_6: Tesaṃ tesaṃ nīvaraṇadhammānaṃ vikkhambhanasaṅkhātaṃ pavattinivāraṇavasena pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1001_7: taṃ ghaṭappahārena jalatale sevālaviyūhanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1001_8: Yathā hi balavatā ghaṭappahārena dūrīkataṃ sevālaṃ tasmiṃ apanītepi taṃpahāravegena sahasā na ottharati,
tika-abh08t0:1001_9: evameva upacārappanābhedena jhānena vikkhambhitā kāmacchandādayo tadappavattikālepi tassa balena sahasā na ottharantīti.
tika-abh08t0:1001_11: taṃ pana asanisampātena rukkhādīnaṃ samūlaviddhaṃsanaṃ viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1001_12: Na hi ariyamaggena samucchinnakilesā anusayamattakenāpi santāne pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1001_13: Yathā pana ekavārappavattenapi indagginā saha mūlehi viddhaṃsitā rukkhādayo na puna viruhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1001_14: evamevaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikenapi tena attano uppādamatteneva anusayamattaṭṭhāyinopi kilesā sabbena sabbaṃ viddhaṃsitāyeva honti.
tika-abh08t0:1002_3: parisuddhākārena yogino ñāṇassa upaṭṭhātīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1003_1: kiccaupaṭṭhānākāravasena ca rasapaccupaṭṭhānāni vatvā puna vajjapaṭipakkhabhāvavasena ca lakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1003_8: vajjato aññaṃ vā anavajjanti abyākatassāpi taṃlakkhaṇatāpasaṅgo siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1003_9: “Vajjapaṭipakkhattā”ti pana vutte yasmā kusalākusalānameva pahāyakappahātabbabhāvena ālokandhakārānaṃ viya aññamaññaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1004_1: sati ca tasmiṃ uppajjanato tassa so āsannakāraṇanti āha “yonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1004_2: Tattha yoniso pathena upāyena manasikāro yonisomanasikāro,
tika-abh08t0:1004_3: atthato pana sānusayasantānavato channaṃ dvārānamāpāthagatesvārammaṇesu patirūpadesavāsādisampattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1004_4: kusaladhammānaṃ paccayabhāvena bhavaṅgaṃ āvaṭṭetvā uppannamāvajjanaṃ yonisomanasikāro nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1004_6: Yaṃ pana niranusayasantānasamaṅgissa kiriyacittānaṃ paccayabhāvena uppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1004_7: taṃ ṭhapetvā niravajjadhammaṃ sāvajjadhammassa kassaci paccayabhāvānupagamanato yonisomanasikārapakkhaṃ vā bhajeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1004_8: Khīṇāsavasantānagatattā yonisoayonisobhāvamanapekkhitvā āpāthagatārammaṇesu uppattimattaṃ vinā na kassaci
tika-abh08t0:1004_9: kusalākusalabhāvassa paccayo hotīti tadubhayavasena navattabbattā abyākatamanasikāroti vā saṅkhaṃ gaccheyyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1005_16: Itarathā hi tikaṃ na siyā, dukaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1005_18: Tathā hi yadi kusalato aññamakusalaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1005_22: tena na kāci jāti gayhatīti kusalābyākatajātibhedato dukameva vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1005_24: evaṃ sati tassa jātiyā abhāvato jāti-
tika-abh08t0:1005_28: evaṃ abyākatassāpi abhāvo atthīti anabyākatajātipi vattabbāti catukkaṃ āpajjeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1005_29: Na cetamiṭṭhaṃ kusalādivasena tividhajātiyā eva icchitattā,
tika-abh08t0:1005_30: pāḷiyañca “kusalā dhammā akusalā dhammā abyākatā dhammā”ti tikavaseneva vuttattā “kusalapaṭipakkha”nti pana vuccamāne mittapaṭipakkho amitto viya,
tika-abh08t0:1005_31: lobhapaṭipakkho alobho viya ca yaṃ dhammajātaṃ kusalassa ujuvipaccanīkabhūtaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1005_32: taṃ akusalanti tassa vasena tikaṃ upapannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1006_1: abyākatanti yaṃ dhammajātaṃ kusalaṃ viya na anavajjaiṭṭhavipākalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1006_5: Nanu ca “tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇa”nti vutte sukhadukkhavedanānaṃ viparītā upekkhāvedanā viya iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1006_6: viparīto añño koci vipāko yassa atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1006_9: Yathā hi ālokandhakārānaṃ viparīto añño koci natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1006_10: evamiṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākānaṃ viparīto na koci vipāko atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:1006_12: saddo idha iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākanirapekkhaṃ kusalākusalamattameva paccāmasatīti kusalākusalānaṃ savipākattā tadubhayaviparītalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1006_15: Kusalākusalañhi vatvā abyākatassa vuttattā kusalākusalabhāveneva avuttattāti viññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1006_22: tasmā attano paccayehi aññamaññaṃ virodhābhimukhataṃ kataṃ lakkhaṇavirodhato pahāyakappahātabbabhāvato vāti byākataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1006_25: Tañhi lakkhaṇato aññamaññaṃ kusalākusalaṃ viya na tassa viruddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1006_27: iṭṭhavipākatāya iṭṭhavipākatā viya ca aniṭṭhavipākatāya iṭṭhāniṭṭhavipākatāhi virujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1006_28: na cāpi abyākataṃ kusalākusalesu kiñci pajahati,
tika-abh08t0:1006_33: na bhavissati kammavipākoti iminā tikena saṅgahitassa gatiupadhikālappayogavipattīhi avipākassa diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādikammassa
tika-abh08t0:1006_34: bhāvanāyapahātabbassa akusalassa ca abhiññākusalassa ca vipākuppādanābhāvato “siyā nu kho abyākatabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1006_35: vā”ti kadāci koci cinteyyāti tannivāraṇatthamāha “avipākārahaṃ vā”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1006_36: vipākaṃ dātuṃ nārahati tattha sāmatthiyābhāvatoti avipākārahaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1006_42: atha kho yena kenaci ākārena vipākadāne asamatthatāyeva vipākārahaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1007_0: Idāni evaṃ tikavasena niddiṭṭhesu kusalādīsu paṭhamaṃ tāva kusalacittaṃ vibhajanto “tattha kusalacitta”ntiādinā tassa gaṇanaparicchedaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1007_5: Bhūmito catubbidhanti kāmarūpārūpalokuttarabhūmisaṅkhātānaṃ catunnaṃ bhūmīnaṃ vasena tattha pavattamānaṃ cittampi catubbidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1007_8: Avatthāpi hi avatthavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānaṃ viya gayhati.
tika-abh08t0:1007_11: Tattha purimā tisso bhūmiyo ubhayavasena veditabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1007_13: Na hi lokuttaradhammānaṃ kāmabhavādito aññaṃ ṭhānamupalabbhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1008_0: Aññattha pavattamānassāpi vakkhamānanayena kāmabhūmipariyāpannattā bhūmito ekavidhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1008_3: Kusalassa pana cakkhādinissitattābhāvato hadayavatthu idha vatthūti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1008_7: arūpadhātuyaṃ pana rūpābhāvato vatthuvirahitameva pavattatīti tattha pavattamānaṃ avatthukaṃ. Hīna…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1008_13: Tattha hīnena chandena cittena vīriyena vīmaṃsāya vā pavattitaṃ hīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1008_22: “puññaṃ nāmetaṃ sādhūhi kattabbamevā”ti evaṃ ariyabhāvaṃ nissāya kataṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1008_24: ime panaññe dānadāsādayo”tiādinā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanāhi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ pavattitaṃ vā hīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1009_4: Nanu ca somanassupekkhābhedo tāva yutto tesaṃ bhinnasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:1009_6: ñāṇappayogakato bhedo ñāṇappayogabhedo tesaṃ bhāvābhāvamupādāya pavattattā.
tika-abh08t0:1009_7: Idāni tameva somanassupekkhādibhedaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ “seyyathida”nti pucchitvā “somanassasahagata”ntiādinā vissajjeti.
tika-abh08t0:1010_4: somanassena uppādato yāva nirodhā sahagataṃ pavattaṃ saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayuttanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1010_5: Atha vā somanassena saha ekuppādādibhāvaṃ gatanti somanassasahagataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1010_7: tena samaṃ ekuppādādīhi pakārehi yuttanti ñāṇasampayuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1010_13: parassa vā pubbappayogo “saṅkharoti tikkhabhāvasaṅkhātena maṇḍanavisesena sajjeti,
tika-abh08t0:1010_14: saṅkharīyati vā sajjīyati cittaṃ etenā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1010_15: Tattha dānādipuññakaraṇakāle maccheramalathinamiddhādīhi upakkilesehi saṃsīdamāne citte upakkilesavūpasamavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1010_16: cittassa ca ussāhajananavasena tīsu dvāresu pavatto sammāvāyāmo attano payogo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1010_23: tañhi te atthāya hitāya sukhāya bhavissatī”tiādinā kusalakaraṇatthāya ussāhajananavasena paresaṃ kāyavacīdvāresu pavattā āṇatti parappayogo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1010_25: pacchimo paresaṃ cittasantāneyeva sambhavatīti tannibbattito cittassa tikkhabhāvasaṅkhāto viseso idha upacārato saṅkhāroti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1013_0: Atha vā “sasaṅkhārikamasaṅkhārika”nti ca etaṃ kevalaṃ saṅkhārassa bhāvābhāvamattāpekkhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1013_1: na tassa sahappavattisabbhāvābhāvatoti bhinnasantānappavattinopi saṅkhārassa idamatthitāya taṃvasena
tika-abh08t0:1013_2: nibbattaṃ cittaṃ saṅkhāro assa atthīti sasaṅkhārikaṃ saha-
tika-abh08t0:1013_6: saṅkharīyati vā etena āgantukasambhūtena cittasaṃsīdanasabhāvāpanayanavaseneva sajjīyati,
tika-abh08t0:1013_7: saṅkharoti vā taṃ yathāvuttavasenevāti saṅkhāroti ujukameva pubbappayogajanito tikkhabhāvo vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1013_15: Paṇītautubhojanādiko vā balavapaccayo saṅkhāro “saṅkharoti cittaṃ tikkhabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:1013_16: saṅkharīyati vā taṃ etenā”ti katvā. A-
tika-abh08t0:1013_17: kārassa vuḍḍhatthavuttitāya vuḍḍhippatto saṅkhāro assāti asaṅkhārikaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1013_20: kārena avisesitattā sasaṅkhārikaṃ sappaccayaṃ dubbalapaccayanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1014_4: aniṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe pakkhapātābhāvena upapattito yuttito ikkhati anubhavatīti upekkhā.
tika-abh08t0:1014_5: Atha vā upetā sukhadukkhānaṃ aviruddhā ikkhā anubhavananti upekkhā.
tika-abh08t0:1014_7: Sukhadukkhavedanā pana visuṃ visuṃ viruddhasabhāvattā nāññamaññaṃ anantaraṃ pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1014_8: Teneva hi paṭṭhāne somanassassa anantaraṃ domanassassa,
tika-abh08t0:1014_9: domanassassa anantaraṃ somanassassa ca uppatti paṭisiddhā.
tika-abh08t0:1015_0: Nanu ca aññepi phassādayo sampayuttadhammā atthīti somanassādīnaṃ vaseneva pana aṭṭhavidhatā kasmā gahitāti?
tika-abh08t0:1015_3: saddhādīnañca sabbakusalasādhāraṇattā na tehi cittassa vibhāgo,
tika-abh08t0:1015_5: katthaci na hontīti pākaṭova tehi cittassa vibhāgoti.
tika-abh08t0:1015_12: Nanu ca iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ lobhassa vatthu rajjanīyattāti kathaṃ tattha kusalaṃ uppajjatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1015_13: Nayidamekantikaṃ iṭṭhepi ārammaṇe niyamitādivasena kusalassa uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1015_14: Yassa hi “kusalameva mayā kattabba”nti kusalakaraṇeyeva cittaṃ niyamitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1018_0: Apica saddhābahulatādīhi ca kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1018_2: hi micchādiṭṭhikānañca ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇabhūtaṃ tathāgatarūpampi disvā somanassaṃ na uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1018_3: Ye ca kusalappavattiyaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ na passanti,
tika-abh08t0:1018_4: tesaṃ parehi ussāhitānaṃ kusalaṃ karontānampi somanassaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1018_5: tasmā saddhābahulatā visuddhidiṭṭhitā ānisaṃsadassāvitāti imehipi kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1019_0: Apica ye te ekādasa dhammā pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1019_2: buddhānussati dhammānussati saṃghānussati sīlānussati cāgānussati devatānussati upasamānussati lūkhapuggalaparivajjanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1019_3: siniddhapuggalasevanā pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇā tadadhimuttatāti imehipi kāraṇehi cittassa somanassasahagatabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1019_5: Buddhādiguṇe anussarantassa hi yāva upacāruppādā sakalasarīraṃ pharamānā pīti uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1019_6: Tathā dīgharattaṃ akkhaṇḍatādivasena attanā rakkhitaṃ catupārisuddhisīlaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1019_8: dubbhikkhabhayādīsu paṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ datvā “evaṃnāma dānaṃ adāsi”nti attanocāgaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1019_9: gihinopi tathārūpe kāle sīlavantānaṃ dinnadānaṃ paccavekkhantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1019_10: yehi guṇehi samannāgatā devā devattaṃ gatā,
tika-abh08t0:1019_12: samathavipassanāhi vikkhambhitakilese saṭṭhipi sattatipi vassāni asamudācarante disvā “aho mayhaṃ kilesā na samudācarantī”ti cintentassa,
tika-abh08t0:1019_13: cetiyadassanatheradassanesu asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsucitalūkhabhāvena buddhādīsu pasādasinehābhāvena gadrabhapiṭṭhe
tika-abh08t0:1019_17: ṭhānanisajjādīsupi pītiuppādanatthaṃ tanninnatādivasena pavattentassa yebhuyyena pīti uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1019_18: Pītiyā ca somanassena saha avinābhāvato taduppattiyā tassāpi uppatti niyatāti evaṃ pītikāraṇānipi somanassakāraṇānīti daṭṭhabbāni. Kiñca –
tika-abh08t0:1019_20: somanassapaṭisandhikatāti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi somanassasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1019_23: yo ca somanassapaṭisandhiko appasannesu ārammaṇesupi appaṭikkūladassāvī,
tika-abh08t0:1019_25: Yathāvuttānaṃ pana somanassakāraṇānamabhāvena majjhattārammaṇatāya ca upekkhāsahagatatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1020_0: Ñāṇasampayuttassa pana kammato upapattito indriyaparipākato kilesadūrībhāvatoti imehi kāraṇehi hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1020_1: Yo hi paresaṃ hitajjhāsayena dhammaṃ deseti hīnukkaṭṭhādīni ca naḷakāramuddāgaṇanādīni sippāyatanāni,
tika-abh08t0:1020_3: visaharaṇādīni ca vijjāyatanānīti evaṃ niravajjasippāyatanādīni sikkhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1020_6: “āyatiṃ paññavā bhavissāmī”ti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nānappakāraṃ puññakammaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:1020_7: tassevaṃ nānappakāraṃ paññāsaṃvattanikakammaṃ sampādentassa taṃ kammaṃ upanissāya uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1020_8: Tathā abyāpajje loke uppannassa uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1021_3: atha so satto khippameva visesabhāgī hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1022_0: Tathā paññādasakaṃ sampattassa indriyaparipākaṃ nissāya uppajjamānaṃ kusalaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1022_2: tassa kilesadūrībhāvaṃ nissāya uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ uppajjati. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1024_0: Apica ye te dhammā dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1024_3: gambhīrañāṇacariyapaccavekkhaṇā tadadhimuttatāti imehi kāraṇehi ñāṇasampayuttabhāvo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1024_4: Tathā hi yo paññavante upasaṅkamma khandhadhātuāyatanaindriyabalabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgajhānaṅgasamathavipassanādīnaṃ paripucchābahulo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1024_5: tassa taṃvasena uppannaṃ sutamayañāṇaṃ ādiṃ katvā uppajjamānaṃ cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1024_6: Yena pana nakhakesacīvarasenāsanādīni ajjhattikabāhiravatthūni pubbe avisadāni chedanamalaharaṇādinā visadāni katāni,
tika-abh08t0:1024_7: tassevaṃ visadavatthukassa uppannesu cittacetasikesu visadaṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti parisuddhāni dīpakapallakādīni nissāya uppannadīpasikhāya obhāso viya.
tika-abh08t0:1024_8: Yassa ca saddhindriyādīsu aññataraṃ balavaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1024_10: tato tāni sakasakakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh08t0:1024_11: tasmā so tassa bojjhaṅgavibhaṅge āgatanayena tena tena ākārena samattaṃ paṭipādeti,
tika-abh08t0:1024_12: tassevaṃ indriyānaṃ samattaṃ paṭipādentassa vipassanāñāṇādīnaṃ vasena cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1024_15: khandhādīsu ogāḷhaṃ bhagavato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ vā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:1024_18: Apica buddhādiguṇānussaraṇenapi cittaṃ ñāṇasahagataṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1025_2: nevassa tasmiṃ samaye rāgapariyuṭṭhitaṃ cittaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1025_5: ujugatamevassa tasmiṃ samaye cittaṃ hoti tathāgataṃ ārabbha.
tika-abh08t0:1026_0: Evaṃ buddhānussatiādayopi rāgādimalavisodhanena ñāṇuppattihetukāyevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñca –
tika-abh08t0:1026_2: Paṭisandhipaññā hi ādito paṭṭhāya bhavaṅgasantativasena bahulaṃ pavattamānā santānaparibhāvanena ñāṇuppattiyā savisesaupanissayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1039_0: Evaṃ vedanāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ kāmāvacaracittaṃ niddisitvā idāni taṃ nigamento āha “idaṃ…pe… nāmā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1040_5: Kiñcāpi avasiṭṭhakilesādayo viya kilesakāmopi assādetabbatāya vatthukāme saṅgahito ñāṇaṃ viya ñeyyeti saṅkhepato ekoyeva kāmo siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1040_6: tathāpi kilesakāmo vatthukāmabhāvaṃ gacchanto kāmanīyaṭṭhena gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:1040_11: ko kilesakāmoti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya “chando kāmo,
tika-abh08t0:1040_16: saṅkapparāgo kāmo”ti evaṃ niddesapāḷiyaṃ āgatā niddiṭṭhā kāmataṇhāva idha kilesakāmo.
tika-abh08t0:1040_22: kāmā”ti tattheva niddiṭṭhā saviññāṇāviññāṇappabhedā tebhūmakadhammāti dassento āha “kileso…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1040_24: “Chandarāgovā”ti avadhāraṇena kilesabhāvena niruḷhesu lobhadosamohādīsu dasasu dosamohādayo nava kilese paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh08t0:1041_10: vatthukāmo cāti duvidhopi esa kāmo kārakadvaye kattari,
tika-abh08t0:1041_14: Atha vā duvidhoti dvinnaṃ kāmānaṃ vācakato duvidho.
tika-abh08t0:1041_15: “Kāmo”ti ayaṃ saddo kārakadvaye sijjhati yathāvuttakārakayugaḷe nipphajjati, kattari,
tika-abh08t0:1041_16: kammani ca “kāmo”ti padasambhavo hotīti attho. Vo-
tika-abh08t0:1041_17: kāro pana nipātamattaṃ “evaṃ vo kālāmā”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh08t0:1041_20: vatthukāmo ca vakkhamānanayena pañcakāmaguṇabhūto rūpasabhāvattā rūpakkhandheti evaṃ duvidhopesa kāmo khandhadvaye sijjhati nipphajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1042_5: yattha duvidhopi kāmo visayavisayībhāvena sahito pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1042_7: Yattha pana rūpārūpadhātuyaṃ kevalaṃ vatthukāmova pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1042_9: Nanu ca duvidhopi sahito rūpārūpadhātūsu pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1042_12: Nayidamevaṃ orambhāgiyabhūtassa bahalakilesasseva kāmarāgassa idha kilesakāmabhāvena adhippetattā.
tika-abh08t0:1042_13: “Uddānato duve kāmā”ti sabbe kāme uddisitvāpi hi “padeso catupāyāna”ntiādinā visayaniyamanena “duvidhopi
tika-abh08t0:1042_14: aya”nti ettha kāmekadesabhūto nīvaraṇāvatthāya kathito kāmarāgo kilesakāmabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:1042_18: Evañca katvā upari vakkhamānā sasatthāvacarūpamā upapannā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1042_20: kāmāvacaradhammesu pavatto chandarāgo kilesakāmo nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1042_21: na ca tabbatthubhūtaṃ vimānakapparukkhādiparittadhammajātaṃ vatthukāmo nāmāti siddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1042_22: Tenevāha “kāmo vā kāmasaññā vā brahmaloke na vijjatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1042_23: Kāmāvacarasattasantānagatataṇhāya visayabhāve sati pana taṃyogena rūpārūpadhātūsupi pavattamāno parittadhammo vatthukāmoyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1042_24: Atha vā niddese āgatanayena niravaseso kilesakāmo kāmataṇhābhavataṇhāvibhavataṇhānirodhataṇhāpabhedo idha pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1042_25: Vatthukāmesupi appakaṃ rūpārūpavipākamattaṃ ṭhapetvā sabboyeva idha pavattatīti anavasesappavattiṃ sandhāya “kāmoyaṃ duvidhopi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1042_27: tesu pana bahalakilesakāmabhūto bahalakāmarāgo ca tabbatthukā pañca kāmaguṇā ca idha gahitāti dassanatthaṃ “sampattīnaṃ vasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1042_33: tasmā kāmo ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacarasaññitoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1043_1: Saggamokkhahetubhūtā puññasammatā ayā yebhuyyena apetāti apāyā.
tika-abh08t0:1043_4: Merupādavāsino pana asurā tāvatiṃsesuyeva saṅgayhantīti na tehi saddhiṃ sattannanti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1043_7: te pana nippariyāyato jambudīpavāsino veditabbā. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1044_2: ṭhānehi jambudīpakā manussā uttarakuruke ca manusse adhiggaṇhanti deve ca tāvatiṃse.
tika-abh08t0:1045_0: Tehi pana samānarūpāditāya saddhiṃ parittadīpavāsīhi itaramahādīpavāsinopi “manussā”icceva paññāyiṃsu.
tika-abh08t0:1045_2: Ekādasavidhoti caturāpāyesu tiracchānapettivisayānaṃ visuṃ paricchinnassa okāsassa abhāvepi yattha te
tika-abh08t0:1046_1: Nanu cettha aññesampi dhammānaṃ pavattisambhavato kāmasseva avacaraṇavasena kathaṃ nāmalābhoti āha “assābhilakkhitattā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1046_5: tasmā anena duvidhena kāmena ekādasavidhassa padesassa abhilakkhitattā,
tika-abh08t0:1046_7: Atha vā upayogatthe sāmivacanavasena assa ekādasavidhassa padesassa tena duvidhena abhilakkhitattāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1046_11: Yathā hi yasmiṃ padese sasatthā purisā avacaranti,
tika-abh08t0:1046_12: so vijjamānesupi aññesu dvipadacatuppadādīsu avacarantesu tesaṃ tattha pākaṭattā,
tika-abh08t0:1046_14: evaṃ vijjamānesupi aññesu rūpāvacarādīsu avacarantesu abhilakkhaṇavasena ayaṃ padeso “kāmāvacaro”tveva saññitoti.
tika-abh08t0:1047_2: yathāvuttanayena pana padesassa gahitattā kathaṃ tattha avacarantaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nāmāti āha “svāya”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1047_7: Yathā “rūpūpapattiyā maggaṃ bhāvetī”ti ettha “rūpabhavūpapattiyā”ti vattabbe rūpabhavo “rūpa”nti saññitoti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh08t0:1047_9: Atha vā yathā uttarassa padassa lopaṃ katvā udīrito esa rūpabhavo “rūpa”nti saññito,
tika-abh08t0:1047_11: Tasmiṃ kāmeti tasmiṃ uttarapadalopavasena kāmasaññite padese.
tika-abh08t0:1047_13: Adhikāravasena pana tassa gahaṇepi sabbesameva parittacittānamayamattho labbhati sabbesampi kāme avacaraṇato.
tika-abh08t0:1047_17: yathā saṅgāme yebhuyyena avacaranto “saṅgāmāvacaro”ti laddhanāmo hatthī aññattha avacarantopi bāhullappavattivasena “saṅgāmāvacaro”tveva paññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1047_18: evamidaṃ aññattha avacarantampi kāmaloke bāhullavuttito “kāmāvacara”micceva vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1047_19: Tena pana nanu cetaṃ rūpārūpabhavesupi avacaraṇato rūpāvacarādināmampi labheyyāti idaṃ codanaṃ pariharati.
