tika-abh08t0:1050_4: yasmā ca tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ sadā avacarati,
tika-abh08t0:1050_8: Kāmaghātināti desanāñāṇena vineyyasantānagatassa kilesakāmassa hananasīlena sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t0:1051_2: avacārayatīti vāti atha vā yasmā yattha katthaci uppannampi kāme bhaveyeva paṭisandhiṃ avacārayati,
tika-abh08t0:1051_3: tasmā idaṃ kāme avacārayatīti “kāmāvacara”nti kathitaṃ cā-
tika-abh08t0:1051_5: Evaṃ uttarapadalopavasena padasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni vināpi uttarapadalopaṃ kāmāvacara-
tika-abh08t0:1051_6: saddassa sambhavaṃ dassetuṃ “pariyāpannanti tatra vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1052_1: Heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ katvā uparito paranimmitavasavattī deve antokaritvā yaṃ etasmiṃ antare
tika-abh08t0:1052_2: etthāvacarā ettha pariyāpannā khandhadhātuāyatanā rūpaṃ vedanā saññā saṅkhārā viññāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1053_0: Vuttattā yathā manussitthiyā kucchismiṃ nibbattopi tiracchānagatiko tiracchānayoniyameva pariyāpannattā “tiracchāno”tveva vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1053_2: Tappariyāpannatā cassa avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsaninnāya kāmataṇhāya visayabhāvatoti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1053_3: Tathā hi vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena nikkhepakaṇḍepi “‘etthāvacarā’ti vacanaṃ avīciparanimmitaparicchinnokāsāya
tika-abh08t0:1053_13: avīciādiekādasokāsaninnatāya yaṃkiñci taṇhaṃ kāmataṇhābhāvena gahetvā taṃsabhāvāya taṇhāya visayabhāvena kāmāvacaradhammānaṃ upalakkhetabbabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1053_14: Atha vā kilesavatthuvasena duvidhopi kāmo yathārahaṃ sahajātavasena ettha avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1053_15: ārammaṇakaraṇavasena vā duvidhepi kāme etaṃ avacaratīti kāmāvacaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1053_16: Atha vā mañcanissitakesu ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontesu nissayanissitānaṃ abhedassa buddhiyā gahitattā nissitakesu
tika-abh08t0:1053_18: evametampi kāmāvacarabhave pavattanavasena tannissitattā nissayavohārena “kāmāvacara”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1056_4: tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthutāya vatthūni cāti puññakiriyavatthūni.
tika-abh08t0:1056_5: Gaṇanato dasaparimāṇattā dasa ca tāni puññakiriyavatthūni cāti dasa puññakiriyavatthūni,
tika-abh08t0:1056_8: kārena pana rūpārūpalokuttaraṃ viya na kevalaṃ bhāvanāvasenevāti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1057_2: yesaṃ vasena idaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti vuttanti imaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya tāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “dānaṃ sīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1057_10: āyatiñca hitasukhāvahāni sammā ṭhapitāni samāhitāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:1057_13: Bhāveti kusaladhamme āsevati vaḍḍheti etāyāti bhāvanā.
tika-abh08t0:1057_14: Attano santāne nipphannā patti diyyati etenāti pattidānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1057_21: parassa vā hitajjhāsayavasena sammā suṇanti etāyāti saṃsuti.
tika-abh08t0:1057_22: Pūjāvasena apacāyati sāmīciṃ karoti etenāti apacāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1057_24: Majjhapadalopavasena pana “puññavatthuppabhedo”ti vuttaṃ yathā ājaññayutto ratho “ājaññaratho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1058_1: tattha sekhaputhujjanānaṃ paraṃ uddissa pūjānuggahakāmatāya attano vijjamānavatthupariccajanavasena pavattā cetanā dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1058_3: sā pana puññakiriyā nāma na hotīti na idha adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:1058_6: na ca khīṇāsavasantāne pavattā phalanibbattikā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1059_0: Yā pana niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañcasīlaṃ aṭṭhasīlaṃ dasasīlaṃ samādiyantassa,
tika-abh08t0:1059_8: “dānaṃ nāmetaṃ mayhaṃ kulavaṃso kulacāritta”nti evaṃ cārittasīle ṭhatvā dentassa pavattā dānamayapuññakiriyavatthu kiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1059_11: Deyyadhammapariccāgavasena pavattāpi hesā pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge cetanāya ca tathā pavattattā sīlamayameva puññakiriyavatthu,
tika-abh08t0:1060_0: “Cakkhu anicca”ntiādinā pana cakkhādike tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sammasantassa pavattā gotrabhuvodānapariyosānā vipassanācetanā,
tika-abh08t0:1060_1: kasiṇādīsu ārammaṇesu appanaṃ appattā gotrabhupariyosānā parikammacetanā cāti ayaṃ bhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1060_3: sā pana na kāmāvacarāti idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:1060_5: Yā cettha deyyadhammaṃ khayato vayato sammasitvā dadato pavattā,
tika-abh08t0:1060_6: sāpi pubbe viya ubhayabhāge cetanānaṃ tathā pavattattā bhāvanāmayapuññakiriyavatthuyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1061_0: Dānādikaṃ yaṃ kiñci sucaritakammaṃ katvā “asukassa ca nāma patti hotu,
tika-abh08t0:1061_1: sabbasattānaṃ vā hotū”ti evaṃ attanā katassa parehi sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ paccāsīsanavasena pavattā pattidānamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1061_2: Kiṃ panevaṃ pattiṃ dadato puññakkhayo hotīti? Na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1061_3: yathā pana ekaṃ dīpaṃ jāletvā tato dīpasahassaṃ jālentassa paṭhamadīpo khīṇoti na vattabbo,
tika-abh08t0:1061_4: purimālokena pana saddhiṃ pacchimālokassa ekībhāve atimahāva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1061_5: evameva pattiṃ dadato parihāni nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1061_10: pacchāpi vā vacībhedaṃ karontena manasā eva vā cintentena dinnā nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1061_12: tassa phalaṃ ‘dammī’ti vuttepi patti dinnāva hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1061_13: Kusalakammādhikārattā pana parehi ca kammasseva anumoditabbattā kammameva dātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1061_14: anumodentenapi kammameva anumoditabbanti idamettha ācariyānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1062_0: Cīvarādīsu paccāsārahitassa asaṃkiliṭṭhena ajjhāsayena samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vattapaṭivattakaraṇavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1063_0: Āmisakiñcakkhādinirapekkhacittassa attano paguṇaṃ dhammaṃ vimuttāyatanasīse ṭhatvā desentassa,
tika-abh08t0:1063_1: tatheva niravajjavijjāyatanādikaṃ upadisantassa ca pavattā desanāmayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1063_2: Parehi kataṃ yaṃ kiñci sucaritakammaṃ dinnamadinnampi vā issāmaccheramalaṃ pahāya “sādhu suṭṭhū”ti anumodantassa
tika-abh08t0:1063_4: “atthi dinna”ntiādinā kammassakatāñāṇavasena diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karontassa pavattā diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1063_5: Yadi evaṃ ñāṇavippayuttacittassa diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyatā na labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1063_6: No na labbhati purimapacchimacetanānampi taṃtaṃpuññakiriyāsveva saṅgaṇhanato.
tika-abh08t0:1065_0: Hoti dānamayaṃ puññaṃ, evaṃ sesesu dīpaye”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1066_0: Tasmā kiñcāpi ujukaraṇavelāyaṃ ñāṇasampayuttameva cittaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1066_1: purimapacchābhāge pana ñāṇavippayuttampi hotīti tassāpi diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyabhāvo uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1067_7: Dānādisampayuttaṃ pana ñāṇaṃ dānādīsveva antogadhanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1067_8: “Evamimaṃ dhammaṃ sutvā tattha vuttanayena paṭipajjanto lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesaṃ adhigamissāmi,
tika-abh08t0:1067_9: bahussuto vā hutvā pare dhammadesanāya anuggaṇhissāmī”ti evaṃ attano,
tika-abh08t0:1067_10: paresaṃ vā vimuttāyatanasīsena saddhammaṃ suṇantassa pavattā savanamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1067_14: karontassa ca pavattā bahumānacetanā apacitisahagatapuññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1068_1: Evaṃ aṭṭhakathāya āgatanayena dasapuññakiriyavatthūni dassetvā idāni sutte āgatanayena dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanāti
tika-abh08t0:1068_2: tīṇiyeva dassetuṃ tesu itaresampi saṅgahaṃ dīpento āha “gacchanti saṅgaha”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1068_3: Tattha pattidānānumodanā dāne saṅgahaṃ gacchanti taṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:1068_5: tasmā samānapaṭipakkhatāya dānena saha ekalakkhaṇattā ete dānamayapuññakiriyavatthumhi saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1068_6: Veyyāvaccāpacāyanā sīlamaye puññe saṅgahaṃ gacchanti cārittasīlasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:1068_7: Desanāsavanadiṭṭhiujukā pana kusaladhammāsevanato bhāvanato bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1068_9: suṇanto ca desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjha deseti,
tika-abh08t0:1068_11: tāni ca desanāsavanāni paṭivedhameva āharantīti desanāsavanaṃ bhāvanāmaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1068_12: Dhammadānabhāvato “desanā dānamaye saṅgahaṃ gacchatī”tipi sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1068_14: Dānādīsu hi yaṃ kiñci “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyāva visodhitaṃ mahapphalaṃ hoti mahānisaṃsanti.
tika-abh08t0:1068_15: Evañca katvā dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “diṭṭhijukammaṃ pana sabbesaṃ niyamanalakkhaṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1068_16: Mahāsaṃghiyā pana abhayagirivāsino ca diṭṭhijukammaṃ visuṃ puññakiriyabhāvena na gaṇhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1068_17: Tathā hi te dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā saṃsuti desanānussatimodanaṃ veyyāvaccapūjāsaraṇappattipasaṃsā cāti attanā
tika-abh08t0:1068_18: katapuññānussaraṇaṃ buddhādīsu saraṇagamanaṃ paraguṇapasaṃsāti imāni tīṇi pakkhipitvā diṭṭhijukammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1068_20: Puna tīṇevāti paṭhamaṃ dasāpi samānā puna saṅkhepato tīṇeva sambhonti.
tika-abh08t0:1069_1: Idāni parehi niddisiyamānānaṃ puññānussaraṇādīnaṃ attanā niddiṭṭhesveva samodhānaṃ dassetuṃ “sabbānussatipuññañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1069_2: Tattha sabbasseva attanā katasucaritassa anussaraṇaṃ sabbānussatipuññaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1069_8: Tāni hi saraṇagatānaṃ teneva saraṇagamanena bhayaṃ santāsaṃ duggatiparikkilesaṃ hiṃsanti vināsenti.
tika-abh08t0:1069_13: Na hi avayavavinimutto samudāyo nāma koci atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:1069_16: Na hi saraṇattayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1069_19: suppaṭipanno saṃgho”tiādinā buddhādīsu pasādapaṭilābhavasena pavattā cetanā diṭṭhijukammasmiṃ saṅgahaṃ yanti taṃvaseneva tesaṃ ijjhato.
tika-abh08t0:1069_20: Na hi viparītadiṭṭhikassa imāni tīṇi sambhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:1069_21: tasmā te ekantena diṭṭhijukammapuññakiriyavatthusmiṃ saṅgahaṃ gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:1069_25: vitthāranayena pana “kattha nu kho”ti saṃsayo siyāti imesaṃ bhāvanāmayasaṅgaho na vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1069_26: Diṭṭhijukammassa vā sabbesaṃ mahapphalabhāvaniyāmakattena mūlabhūtattā tassa padhānabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ visuṃ tattha saṅgayhantīti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1069_28: gaṇhanto ‘muñcatī’ti vacanato saraṇagamanassa sīlasamādāne viya gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti sīlamaye saṅgayhatī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1070_1: Idāni yathāvuttapuññakiriyavatthūnaṃ purimapacchimabhāgavasena pavattamānāpi cetanā tattha tattheva saṅgahaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1070_3: Tattha purimāti dānatthāya deyyadhammaṃ dhammena samena uppādentassa,
tika-abh08t0:1070_5: dakkhiṇeyyaṃ pariyesantassa ca yāva vatthuno paṭiggāhakassa hatthe vissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1070_12: Parāti attanā vissaṭṭhavatthumhi ālayaṃ akatvā “sādhu suṭṭhu aggaṃ dānaṃ me dinna”nti somanassacittena paccavekkhantassa uppannā aparabhāgacetanā.
tika-abh08t0:1070_13: Tissopi cetanāti iti ayañca purimā cetanā,
tika-abh08t0:1070_15: ayañca aparacetanāti tissopi cetanā ekato hutvā dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1070_18: Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ sesesupi atidisanto āha “evaṃ sesesu dīpaye”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1070_19: Sesesūti sīlādīsu puññakiriyavatthūsu evaṃ yathāvuttanayena “sīlaṃ ‘rakkhissāmī’ti cintentassa,
tika-abh08t0:1070_24: ‘pūritaṃ me’ti paccavekkhantassa uppannā aparacetanāti evaṃ tissopi cetanā ekato hutvā sīlamayapuññakiriyavatthu nāmā”tiādinā dīpaye,
tika-abh08t0:1070_27: ayañca aparacetanā sāyevāti kathamassā tattha saṅgahoti?
tika-abh08t0:1070_31: Ayaṃ pana tabbatthuvisayāti pākaṭoyeva dvinnaṃ visesoti.
tika-abh08t0:1071_2: saṅgahato ca niddisitvā idāni tathāpavattamānassa cassa pāṭekkaṃ pavattākāravisayaṃ dassetuṃ “idānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1074_0: Paṭiggāhako ādi yesaṃ desakālamittādīnaṃ te paṭiggāhakādayo,
tika-abh08t0:1074_3: Tattha deyyadhammassa paṇītamanāpabhāvo dhammena samena uppannabhāvo deyyadhammasampatti.
tika-abh08t0:1074_8: kāle vā dinnaṃ ajjhāsayassa balavatāya mahapphalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1074_12: Kalyāṇamittañhi nissāya dānādīsu cittaṃ odagyappattaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1074_13: Paricārikasampatti pana anāṇattiyāpi taṃtaṃkiccasampādane appamattassa paricārikajanassa paṭilābho.
tika-abh08t0:1074_14: Aññaṃ vā somanassahetunti saddhābahulatāvisuddhidiṭṭhitādibhedaṃ aññaṃ somanassakāraṇaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t0:1074_17: Haṭṭhapahaṭṭhoti somanassavasena haṭṭho ceva pahaṭṭho ca.
tika-abh08t0:1074_29: ye imañca lokaṃ parañca lokaṃ sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharantī”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ dasavidhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1074_30: sammādiṭṭhivatthuvasena ceva dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgaṭṭhāniyādīnaṃ vasena ca pavattaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1074_31: saddena hi na kevalaṃ navannaṃyeva sammādiṭṭhivatthūnaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1074_36: Tañca kho sahajātapubbaṅgamavasena “manopubbaṅgamā dhammā”tiādīsu viya sampayogassa adhippetattā.
tika-abh08t0:1075_0: Anussāhitoti lobhamacchariyādivasena puññakiriyāya saṅkocaṃ anāpajjanato attanā,
tika-abh08t0:1075_7: Atha vā pacchimabhavikabodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanato mahantaṃ pūjitaṃ kusalacittanti mahākusalacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1075_8: Sabbesampi hi sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ paṭisandhi mettāpubbaṅgamassa tihetukasomanassamayassa asaṅkhārikacittassa vipākoti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1076_1: aññaṃ vā somanassakāraṇaṃ āgammā”ti evaṃ vuttanayena.
tika-abh08t0:1076_3: sīlasampadādīsu anadhimuttatādīhi ca puññakiriyāya saṅkocāpajjanato attanā,
tika-abh08t0:1076_8: Hoti hi taṃsadisepi taṃvohāro yathā ca “sāyeva tittirī,
tika-abh08t0:1076_14: Pubbappayogassāti puññakiriyāya saṅkoce jāyamāne tato vivecetvā samussāhanavasena pavattassa cittappayogassa. Pubba-
tika-abh08t0:1076_15: ggahaṇaṃ panettha tathāpavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena so payogo hotīti katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1077_5: Te pana idha “atthi dinna”ntiādinayappavattāya sammādiṭṭhiyā abhāvena asañjātabuddhino dārakā.
tika-abh08t0:1077_7: Sahasā karaṇādikāle pana itaresampi ñāṇavippayuttaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1078_8: jātā”ti ca imehi ñāṇavippayuttasomanassasahagatabhāvassa ca dīpitattā “sahasā”ti vacanena yathāvuttameva ñāṇavippayuttaasaṅkhārikabhāvaṃ pakāseti.
tika-abh08t0:1078_9: Evaṃ sati paṭilomato somanassasahagatādibhāvo dassito hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1078_13: disvā”ti ettāvatā pana somanassasahagatādibhāvassa kāraṇaṃ vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1078_17: Majjhattārammaṇaṃ tathārūpe cetobhisaṅkhārādayopi hi upekkhāsahagatatāya kāraṇamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1079_0: Imesu pana aṭṭhasu viññāṇesu somanassasahagatato upekkhāsahagataṃ balavataraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1080_1: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatanayena vedanāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhataṃ niddisitvā idāni aṭṭhakathāyaṃ āgatapuññakiriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1080_2: vasenapi pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “dasa puññakriyādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1083_1: Idāni tathāpavattamānassa tassa yo yo tesaṃ tesaṃ vasena labbhamāno gaṇanaparicchedo,
tika-abh08t0:1083_4: imāni tāva aṭṭha viññāṇāni dasannaṃ puññakiriyavatthūnaṃ vasena pavattanato paccekaṃ dasa dasāti katvā asīti cittāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:1083_5: tāni ca chasu ārammaṇesu pavattanato chagguṇitāni sāsītikāni cattāri satāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:1083_6: tāni catunnaṃ adhipatīnaṃ sahayogavasena catugguṇitāni sahassaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1083_8: tāni ca kāyavacīmanosaṅkhātānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ kammānaṃ vasena tiguṇitāni sasaṭṭhisattasatādhikāni pañca sahassāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:1083_9: tāni ca hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedato tiguṇitāni sāsītikadvisatādhikāni sattarasa sahassāni hontīti.
tika-abh08t0:1083_10: Nanu ca ñāṇavippayuttacittānaṃ vīmaṃsādhipatisahayogābhāvato adhipativasena sahassaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1083_11: sāsītikāni ca cha satāni hontīti tāni kammādīnaṃ vasena sampiṇḍitāni vīsasatādhikāni pannarasa sahassāni bhavantīti?
tika-abh08t0:1083_13: sotapatitavasena pana taṃ anādiyitvā adhipatigaṇanā gahitāti na tassa vasena gaṇanahāni katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1084_3: Yasmā tihetukaṃ kusalaṃ tihetukaṃ vā duhetukaṃ vā paṭisandhiṃ deti,
tika-abh08t0:1084_29: bhogo sesavipākakaṭattārūpehi saha pavattiyaṃ paṭilabhitabbā sampatti,
tika-abh08t0:1084_34: janakavasena ca upanissayavasena ca sādhetīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1084_35: Ettha ca bhavabhogasampattīnaṃ niravasesato labbhamānaṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya “kāmāvacarasugatiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1084_38: bhogasampadameva vā avisesena sugatiyaṃ duggatiyampi abhinipphādetiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1084_41: suvaṇṇatāsussaratādi ca taṃ sabbaṃ kāmāvacarakusalasseva phalaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1084_45: yaṃ akusalassa iṭṭho kanto vipāko saṃvijjatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1087_0: Idāni yasmā kāmāvacarakusalānantaraṃ uddiṭṭhassa rūpāvacarakusalassa niddesāvakāso anuppatto,
tika-abh08t0:1087_5: Na hi arūpadhātuyaṃ rūpāvacaradhammā labbhanti rūpavirāgabhāvanāya nibbattattā puna rūpāvacarajjhānasamāpattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1088_0: Hīnamajjhimapaṇītabhedatoti ettha pubbe viya adhipatīnaṃ hīnādibhāvehi jhānassa hīnādibhāvo yojetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1088_3: ativiya subhāvitaṃ pana sabbaso paripuṇṇavasibhāvaṃ paṇītaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1090_2: pathavī”ti vā “āpo āpo”ti vā evaṃ pavattapaṭhamasamannāhārato paṭṭhāya yāva tassa tassa jhānassa upacāruppattiyā
tika-abh08t0:1090_5: tāva pavattā pubbabhāgabhāvanā paṭipadā nāma “paṭipajjati jhānaṃ etāyā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1090_7: pana vikkhambhitajhānanikantikassa ca ñāṇakiccassa paribyattabhāvato upacārajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva appanāya uppatti,
tika-abh08t0:1090_8: tāva pavattā paññā pubbabhāgapaññāya visiṭṭhabhāvato abhiññā nāma,
tika-abh08t0:1090_9: tasmā yo ādito kilese jhānanikantiñca vikkhambhento dukkhena sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kilamanto vikkhambheti,
tika-abh08t0:1090_10: vikkhambhitakilesajhānanikanti ca appanāparivāsaṃ vasanto cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1090_13: Yo pana sasaṅkhārena kilesādike vikkhambhetvā na cirena aṅgapātubhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1090_16: Yo kilesādike vikkhambhento sukhena akilamanto vikkhambheti,
tika-abh08t0:1090_20: Yo pana sukheneva kilesādike vikkhambhetvā sīghameva appanaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1091_0: So panāyaṃ paṭipadābhiññānaṃ bhedo kilesindriyādhikāravasena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1091_1: Yassa hi rāgādayo kilesā tibbā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1091_6: Tassa hi kilesasamudācāratibbatāya nīvaraṇavikkhambhanassa kicchena kasirena samijjhanato paṭipadā dukkhā asukhā,
tika-abh08t0:1091_7: tasseva saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ mudutāya abhiññāpi dandhā mandā asīghappavattinī hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1091_8: Bhavantare vā samathe akatādhikārattā paṭipadā dukkhā,
tika-abh08t0:1091_12: indriyānañca tikhīṇatāya samathavipassanāsu katādhikāratāya yathākkamaṃ sukhapaṭipadā,
tika-abh08t0:1091_14: Bhavantare kataparicayassa hi yathā paguṇaṃ katvā vissaṭṭhagantho appamattakena payogena suppavatti vācuggato ca hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1091_17: kato ca adhikāro samathanissito paṭipadāyaṃ vutto samādhippadhānattā paṭipadāya.
tika-abh08t0:1092_0: Yo pana tibbakileso tikkhindriyo vipassanāyameva vā katādhikāro hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1092_6: pubbaparicayassa ca sambhavāsambhavavasenāti evaṃ kilesindriyādhikāravasena imāsaṃ bhedo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1093_9: Yo pana tato pubbabhāge asappāyaṃ sevitvā aparabhāge sappāyasevī hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1094_0: Tathā palibodhupacchedādipubbakiccaṃ asampādetvā bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saparipanthatāya dukkhā paṭipadā,
tika-abh08t0:1094_2: Appanākosallāni asampādentassa ñāṇassa avisadatāya dandhā abhiññā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1094_5: Taṇhābhibhūtassa hi dukkhā paṭipadā hoti tassā samādhissa ujupaṭipakkhattā samathapaṭipadāya paripanthakabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1094_7: Avijjābhibhūtassa ca tassā paññāya ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato dandhā abhiññā,
tika-abh08t0:1094_9: So panāyaṃ paṭipadābhedo kevalaṃ samathabhāvanāvasena paṭiladdhajjhānassa,
tika-abh08t0:1094_11: Keci pana maggavaseneva tassa paṭipadādibhedaṃ vaṇṇenti “maggassa hi dukkhapaṭipadādibhāve tasmiṃ dukkhapaṭipadādika”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1095_0: Adhipatibhedādīsu pana chandādhipateyyaṃ cittādhipateyyaṃ vīriyādhipateyyaṃ vīmaṃsādhipateyyanti evaṃ adhipatibhedato,
tika-abh08t0:1095_5: hānabhāgiyaṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ visesabhāgiyaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyanti evaṃ hānabhāgiyādibhedato ca catubbidhatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1095_7: mayhampi nibbattissatī”ti evaṃ chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā uppannaṃ chandādhipateyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1095_9: Appaguṇaṃ pana uparijhānassa paccayo bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ parittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1096_4: katthaci aparāni dveti evaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ sampayogabhedato.
tika-abh08t0:1096_5: Nanu cettha kāmāvacarakusale viya saṅkhārabhedo kasmā na gahito.
tika-abh08t0:1096_6: Idampi hi kevalaṃ samathānuyogavasena paṭiladdhaṃ sasaṅkhāraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1096_10: maggādhigamavasena sattito paṭiladdhassāpi aparabhāge parikammavaseneva uppajjanato,
tika-abh08t0:1096_11: tasmā sabbassapi jhānassa parikammasaṅkhātapubbābhisaṅkhārena vinā kevalaṃ adhikāravasena anuppajjanato “asaṅkhāra”ntipi vattuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh08t0:1096_12: adhikārena ca vinā kevalaṃ parikammābhisaṅkhāreneva anuppajjanato “sasaṅkhāra”ntipi vattuṃ na sakkāti jhānaṅgayogabhedato pañcavidhatā ca vuttāti.
tika-abh08t0:1097_0: Kāmacchando byāpādo thinamiddhaṃ uddhaccakukkuccaṃ vicikicchāti imāni pañca nīvaraṇāni vippahīnāni etassāti kāmacchanda…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1097_5: Kāmacchandādīhi vā vippahīnaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ tesaṃ pahāyakabhāvenāti kāmacchanda…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1097_13: Nanu aññepi akusalā dhammā iminā jhānena pahīyanti,
tika-abh08t0:1097_16: Kāmacchandavasena hi nānāvisayapalobhitaṃ cittaṃ na ekattārammaṇe samādhiyati.
tika-abh08t0:1097_17: Kāmacchandābhibhūtaṃ vā nānāvisayasamupabyūḷhāya kāmadhātuyā pahānapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1097_18: byāpādena ca ārammaṇe paṭihaññamānaṃ na samāhitaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1097_23: pathavī pathavī”tiādinā pavattamanasikārena “jhānaṃ siyā nu kho,
tika-abh08t0:1097_24: na nu kho”tiādinā vicikicchantassa jhānādhigamapaṭipadāya asaṃsijjhanato.
tika-abh08t0:1100_0: Tasmā samādhiādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvena visesena jhānādhigamassa antarāyakaraṇato etāneva pahānaṅgānīti vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1103_0: Evamidaṃ pahānaṅgavasena dassetvā idāni sampayogaṅgavasena dassetuṃ “vitakka…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1103_3: Yasmā pana imesu uppannesu jhānaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1103_5: tasmā na etehi samannāgataṃ aññadeva jhānaṃ nāma atthīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1103_8: Vuttampi hetaṃ vibhaṅge “jhānanti vitakko vicāro pīti sukhaṃ cittassekaggatā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1103_9: Kasmā pana aññesupi phassādīsu sampayuttadhammesu vijjamānesu imāniyeva pañca jhānaṅgavasena vuttānīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1103_14: Evaṃ jhānādhigamassa visesapaccayabhūtehi tehi avikkhepāya samādahitapayogassa cetaso payogasampattisamuṭṭhānā pīti pīṇanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1103_16: Atha naṃ sasampayuttadhammaṃ etehi abhiniropanānubandhanapīṇanaupabrūhanehi anuggahitā ekaggatā samādhānakiccena
tika-abh08t0:1103_20: paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ dūrībhāvena līnuddhaccābhāvena sammā ca ṭhapetīti evametesameva upanijjhānakiccaṃ āveṇikaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1103_23: kāmacchandādīnaṃ ujupaṭipakkhabhāvato ca imeyeva pañca jhānaṅgabhāvena vavatthitāti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t0:1106_3: Taṃ pana na ekantalakkhaṇaṃ jhānapaṭilomādivasena samāpajjane asambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1107_0: Purimapacchimacittesu uppajjamānassāpi appanākkhaṇe anuppajjanato vitakko vippahīno etassa,
tika-abh08t0:1107_2: Bhāvanāya hi pahīnattā vitakko jhānakkhaṇe nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1107_3: Asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvattā pana upacārabhāvanāya ca taṃ pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato purimabhāge,
tika-abh08t0:1108_2: Na hi kusalehi asaṃkiliṭṭhadhammassa pahānaṃ atthi rāgādisaṃkiliṭṭhānaṃ pāpadhammānametassa ujupaṭipakkhabhāvatoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1108_3: asaṃkiliṭṭhasabhāvassāpi etassa oḷārikatāya dubbalabhāvato jhānakkhaṇe anuppattisabhāvāpādanatthaṃ tattha
tika-abh08t0:1108_4: nikantivikkhambhanavasena dutiyajjhānabhāvanā hotīti tassā balena taṃ jhānakkhaṇe anuppajjantaṃ nikantivikkhambhanavasena
tika-abh08t0:1108_6: Yadi evaṃ upacārenapi nikanti vikkhambhīyatīti tatthapissa pahānaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1108_9: nīvaraṇappahānassa viya vitakkārammaṇikanikanti vikkhambhanassa upacārena sātisayaṃ anipphajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1108_10: Sātisayañhi tattha nikantippahānaṃ appanāya eva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1108_11: tasmā yadavocumhā “upacārabhāvanāya ca taṃ pahātuṃ asamatthabhāvato”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1108_14: Dutiyajjhāneyeva pahīnassa vitakkassa idha appavattimattadassanatthaṃ “vitakkavicāravippahīna”nti vitakka-
tika-abh08t0:1109_0: Yathāsambhavanti pathavīkasiṇādīsu yaṃ yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yassa yassa sambhavati,
tika-abh08t0:1110_2: atha kho asubhādīnampi appanāvahakammaṭṭhānānaṃ saṅgahoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1110_4: ārammaṇato pana kasiṇāyatanāneva hontīti kasiṇāyatanajhāneheva tāni saṅgahitāni.
tika-abh08t0:1110_6: anekavidha”nti vā vacanena rūpāvacarajjhāne sabbopi labbhamānakabhedo saṅgahitoti abhibhāyatanavimokkhajhānāni visuṃ na vuttāni,
tika-abh08t0:1111_0: Tattha ñāṇuttarassa yogāvacarassa pathavīkasiṇādiārammaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā “na mettha appanānibbattane bhāro”ti
tika-abh08t0:1111_2: catutthapañcamavīthiyaṃ vā paṭiladdhaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1111_13: ñāṇaṃ vā ālambaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā pavattamānaṃ upacāruppattito pañcamavīthimanatikkamitvā appanaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1111_14: Pañcamavīthito paraṃ nibbattaṃ pana abhibhavitukāmatāya nibbattitampi abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1111_16: Imameva hi sīghatarappavattiṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1111_18: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ yathārutavaseneva attho kasmā na gayhati.
tika-abh08t0:1111_19: “Saha nimittuppādenevā”ti hi vuttattā nimittuppattiyā sahuppannaṃ jhānamabhibhāyatananti viññāyatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1111_22: Nimittuppādoti hi idha paṭibhāganimittassa uppatti tadārammaṇassa vā upacārajjhānassa,
tika-abh08t0:1111_23: kiṃ tāva paṭibhāganimittuppattiyā saha appanāya nibbatti upacārajjhāne asati tassā asambhavato,
tika-abh08t0:1111_24: nāpi upacārajjhānena saha ekavīthiyaṃ nibbatti tassā upacārabhāvanāpabandhasevitabbabhāvena tadā asambhavato,
tika-abh08t0:1111_25: tasmā nāticirāyanappavattidassanatthaṃ samīpimhi samīpakārīyūpacārena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1111_27: kathaṃ tassa dandhābhiññākhippābhiññābhedo pāḷiyaṃ vuttoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1111_33: vasibhāvappattiyā nimittuppattito dūratarabhāvena “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ nibbattetī”ti aṭṭhakathāvacanena saha virujjhanato.
tika-abh08t0:1112_0: Apica vasibhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ abhibhavanakāraṇanirapekkhaṃ vasibhāvabaleneva sakkaccaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkāti na taṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1112_1: tasmā appattavasibhāvā paṭhamuppannāyeva abhibhāyatananti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1112_7: Paṭhamaṃ abhibhāyatanavasena paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ pacchā vasibhāvappattampi abhibhāyatananāmameva labhatīti vasibhāvappattamabhibhāyatanaṃ appamāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1113_0: Atha vā vasibhāvappattaṃ appamāṇanti ukkaṃsagatipariggahavasena vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1113_2: taṃ appamāṇanti imassa atthassa upalakkhaṇaṃ katvā vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1113_4: Balavabhāvo ca paṭhamaappanāvārato pacchimapacchimaappanāvārānaṃ balavatāya avasitāpattepi jhāne sambhavatīti balavantaṃ appamāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1113_5: itaraṃ parittanti evaṃ avasitāpattepi jhāne appamāṇādibhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1113_6: Atha vā appanāya balavabhāvo nāma upacārassa balavatāya sati hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1113_9: tasmā khippābhiññānaṃ dvinnaṃ abhibhāyatanajhānānaṃ upacāravīthiyā anantaraṃ dutiyavīthiyaṃ uppannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1113_10: upacārajjhānassa balavatāya sayampi balavataranti appamāṇaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1113_14: Atha vā yattha katthaci appanāvīthiyaṃ pañcamaṃ uppajjanakaappanāto catutthaṃ uppajjamānāya balavabhāvoti taṃvasenāpettha parittaappamāṇatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1114_0: Taṃ panetaṃ gaṇanato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1115_2: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:1115_3: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:1115_4: Ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:1116_0: Tattha ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññīti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattesu kesādīsu parikammaappanāsaññāvirahito.
tika-abh08t0:1116_1: Bahiddhā rūpāni passatīti bahiddhā aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu,
tika-abh08t0:1116_2: catūsu bhūtakasiṇesu eva vā kataparikammakatāya parikammavasena ceva appanāvasena ca tāni bahiddhā aṭṭha,
tika-abh08t0:1116_5: Abhibhuyyāti yathā mahagghaso sampannagahaṇiko puriso kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1116_6: bhattaṃ atthī”ti saṅkaḍḍhitvā sabbaṃ ekakabaḷameva karoti,
tika-abh08t0:1116_7: evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo “kiṃ ettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1116_8: nāyaṃ mama bhāro”ti tāni rūpāni parikammena,
tika-abh08t0:1116_13: Itarathā anena ābhogamatte kathite tena sādhitabbaṃ jhānaṃ na vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1116_15: Āgamaṭṭhakathāsu pana samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa pubbabhāgabhāvanāvasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattamabhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattamābhogaṃ sandhāya –
tika-abh08t0:1117_0: “Iminā panassa ābhogo kathito. So ca kho samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiya”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1119_1: Vaḍḍhanavasena panettha appamāṇatā na gahitā kasiṇavaḍḍhanassa idha asambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1119_4: Tattha na tāva idha upacārabhūmiyaṃ vaḍḍhanaṃ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t0:1119_5: Nimittuppattiyā samakālaṃ viya uppajjamāne jhāne kuto tassa okāsoti,
tika-abh08t0:1119_8: tasmā sabhāvamahantāneva ālambaṇāni idha appamāṇānīti adhippetāni.
tika-abh08t0:1119_9: Keci pana “vaḍḍhitavaseneva appamāṇānīti gahetvā paṭhamaṃ abhibhavanicchāya abhāvena vaḍḍhetvā pacchā
tika-abh08t0:1119_10: abhibhavanicchāya sati abhibhavanākārena pavatto tasmiṃ appanaṃ nibbattetīti appanaṃ paṭilabhitvā vaḍḍhitanimittesu
tika-abh08t0:1120_1: Yathā nāma sampannagahaṇiko mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā “‘aññopi hotu,
tika-abh08t0:1120_2: aññopi hotū’ti kiṃ esa mayhaṃ karissatī”ti na taṃ mahantato passati,
tika-abh08t0:1120_3: evameva ñāṇuttaro visadañāṇo puggalo “‘kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1120_4: nayidaṃ appamāṇa’nti mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe bhāro”ti abhibhavitvā samāpajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1121_1: nīlanibhāsānīti etāni pariyāyanāmānīti tattha “nīlānī”ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1121_2: Ettakeyeva pana vutte taṃyogato tabbohārena guṇayuttepi pasaṅgo siyāti tannivāraṇatthaṃ “nīlavaṇṇānī”ti vaṇṇavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1121_3: Evampi hi bahubbīhivasena guṇopi pasaṅgo hotīti “nīlanidassanānī”ti nidassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1121_7: saddena saha samāso katoti apaññāyamānacīvarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissamānānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1121_12: Aṭṭhasu cetesu purimaṃ abhibhavanākārena vaṇṇābhogarahitāni aṭṭhapi kasiṇāni parittāni ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppannaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1121_15: na pana vaṇṇakasiṇavasena uppannaṃ tassa visuṃ vakkhamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1122_0: Pañcamādīni pana tesu katādhikāre sandhāya suvisuddhavaṇṇavaseneva desitāni.
tika-abh08t0:1122_5: Nanu ca āgamaṭṭhakathāsu “suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā,
tika-abh08t0:1122_6: parittaappamāṇavaseneva imāni abhibhāyatanāni desitānī”ti vuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1122_7: taṃ pana āgame abhibhāyatanānaṃ aññathā āgatattā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1123_0: “Ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:1123_2: ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:1124_1: tasmā tadaṭṭhakathāsu vaṇṇābhoge vijjamāne avijjamānepi parittaappamāṇatāvaseneva imesaṃ desitabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1124_2: Parittaappamāṇatā hi imesu catūsu abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ vaṇṇābhoge vijjamāne avijjamānepīti.
tika-abh08t0:1124_3: Nanu ca sabbattha “suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vacanato vaṇṇābhogasahitāniyeva tattha gahitānīti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1124_5: sahitāni ca sabbāni parittāni ekato katvā “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-abh08t0:1124_17: yadidaṃ vaṇṇābhogajanitājanitaṃ visesaṃ aggahetvā parittabhāvasāmaññena ekattaṃ netvā “parittāni abhibhuyyā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1124_18: vatvā puna tadantogadhameva pabhedaṃ vineyyavasena dassetuṃ tāni ca kadāci vaṇṇavasena āvajjitāni honti,
tika-abh08t0:1124_20: sahitāni ca visuṃ manasi katvā ubhayatthāpi vaṇṇābhogarahitaparittābhibhavane,
tika-abh08t0:1124_21: taṃsahitaparittābhibhavane ca parittābhibhavanasāmaññaṃ gahetvā ekattaṃ katanti.
tika-abh08t0:1124_26: evaṃ suttābhidhammapāṭhavisesato aṭṭhakathāya pāṭhabhede pana ko adhippāyoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1124_27: suttante hi paṭhamavimokkhaṃ dvedhā bhinditvā paṭhamadutiyaabhibhāyatanāni vuttāni,
tika-abh08t0:1124_28: pariyāyadesanattā vimokkhānampi abhibhavanapariyāyo vijjatīti “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti abhibhāyatanadvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1125_2: idha pana nippariyāyadesanattā vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
tika-abh08t0:1125_4: tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī”ti sutte āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme avacanato “rūpī rūpāni
tika-abh08t0:1125_7: na sampaṭicchantehi suttābhidhammapāṭhabhede aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1125_9: nanu aṭṭhakathāyameva “kasmā pana yathā suttante ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānī’tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1125_10: evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti vatvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti kāraṇaṃ vuttanti?
tika-abh08t0:1125_12: atha kho katthaci “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1125_14: Teneva hi tattha vā idha vā “bahiddhā rūpāniyeva abhibhavitabbānī”ti tattheva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1125_15: anabhibhavanīyatā ca ajjhattarūpānaṃ bahiddhā rūpāni viya avibhūtattā.
tika-abh08t0:1125_16: Na hi suṭṭhu vibhūtabhāvamantarena ñāṇuttarānaṃ ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ sambhavatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1125_17: Nanu ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pāṭhadvayavisesassa desanāvilāso kāraṇabhāvena vuttoti?
tika-abh08t0:1125_20: Desanāvilāso hi nāma vineyyajjhāsayānurūpaṃ vijjamānasseva pariyāyassa vibhāvanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1126_1: pituaṅke vissaṭṭhaaṅgapaccaṅgassa viya dārakassa ārammaṇe nirāsaṅkameva hutvā paṭhamakappanā viya ca
tika-abh08t0:1126_2: lahuṃ avuṭṭhahitvā antamaso catupañcacittakkhaṇato anosakkitvā ārammaṇe abhirativasena pavattassa vasibhāvappattassa
tika-abh08t0:1126_4: Tañhi kasiṇāyatanavasena vā abhibhāyatanavasena vā uppannaṃ paccanīkadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā,
tika-abh08t0:1128_4: paripuṇṇavasibhāvappattaṃ sandhāya aparipuṇṇavasibhāvappattassa parittabhāvena tattha adhippetattā,
tika-abh08t0:1128_11: Keci pana “paṭhamaappanāto pacchimapacchimāya paṭipakkhato suṭṭhu vimuttattā kasiṇāyatanavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1128_12: abhibhāyatanavasena ca uppannaṃ paṭhamakappanaṃ ṭhapetvā sesaṃ vimokkhoyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1130_0: “Rūpī rūpāni passati, ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati, subhanteva adhimutto hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1131_0: Tattha rūpīti ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1131_2: Rūpāni passatīti bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādirūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati.
tika-abh08t0:1131_6: Iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva paṭiladdhajjhānatā dassitā.
tika-abh08t0:1131_7: “Subha”nti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni.
tika-abh08t0:1131_9: yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhakasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati,
tika-abh08t0:1131_10: so yasmā “subha”nti adhimuccanavasena paṭhamajjhānaṃ upasampajjitvā viharati,
tika-abh08t0:1131_13: Paṭisambhidāmagge pana “idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādinā brahmavihāravasena subhavimokkho vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1131_14: Dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ pana brahmavihārānaṃ visuṃyeva āgatattā taṃ nayaṃ paṭikkhipitvā sunīlakādivaseneva subhavimokkho
tika-abh08t0:1131_15: aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātoti idhāpi tattha vuttanayeneva vavatthānaṃ katanti evaṃ tāva vimokkhajhānaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1132_1: Paṭhamajjhānañhi hīnaṃ kappassa tatiyabhāgāyuke brahmapārisajje upapattiṃ nipphādeti,
tika-abh08t0:1132_11: Pañcamajjhānaṃ pana tividhampi pañcakappasatāyuke vehapphale upapattiṃ nipphādeti,
tika-abh08t0:1132_12: tadeva titthiyehi saññāvirāgavasena bhāvitaṃ pañcakappasatāyukeyeva asaññasatte.
tika-abh08t0:1132_13: Anāgāmīhi pana puthujjanādikāle pacchāpi bhāvitaṃ saddhādiindriyādhimuttatānukkamena yathākkamaṃ sahassadvisahassacatusahassaaṭṭhasahassasoḷasasahassakappāyukesu
tika-abh08t0:1133_0: Yasmā pana rūpabhavepi pavattiyaṃ labhitabbā upabhogasampatti kāmāvacarasseva phalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1133_1: tasmā idha “bhavabhogasampattiṃ nipphādetī”ti avatvā upapattinipphādanameva vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1133_2: Ettha ca dutiyajjhānabhūmiṃ upādāya sabbattha paripuṇṇassa mahākappassa vasena paricchedo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh08t0:1133_4: Na hi tattha itaravasena paricchedo sambhavati ekakappepi avināsābhāvena mahākappassa catutthabhāgeyeva tassa saṇṭhahanato.
tika-abh08t0:1136_0: Idāni arūpāvacarakusalassa niddesāvakāso anuppattoti tanniddesatthamāha “sesesu panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1136_1: Ākāsakasiṇavajjitassa yassa kassaci kasiṇassa ugghāṭanato laddhamākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1136_7: tesu eva vā rūpanimittesu nikantippahānaasamāpajjitukāmatādinā ākārenāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1136_11: Rūpāvacarajjhānampi hi “rūpa”nti vuccati uttarapadalopena “rūpī rūpāni passatī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-abh08t0:1136_14: tasmā idha rūpe rūpajjhāne taṃsahagatasaññā rūpasaññāti gahitā,
tika-abh08t0:1136_18: Taṃgahitena pathavīkasiṇādibhedassa tadārammaṇassa cetaṃ nāmanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1136_24: etesañca pathavīkasiṇādivasena navannaṃ ārammaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpasaññānaṃ anavasesānaṃ sabbākārena ca,
tika-abh08t0:1136_25: tesu eva vā nikantippahānaasamāpajjitukāmatādinā ākārena virāgā,
tika-abh08t0:1136_26: nirodhā ca jigucchanato ceva tappaṭibandhachandarāgavikkhambhanato ca nibbattaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāya sahagataṃ arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1136_27: Na hi sakkā sabbaso anatikkantarūpasaññena taṃ nibbattetunti.
tika-abh08t0:1137_0: Na kevalaṃ etāsaṃyeva samatikkamanato idaṃ nibbattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1137_3: rūpādīnañca ārammaṇānaṃ paṭighātena aññamaññasamodhānasaṅkhātena paṭihananena uppannā saññā paṭighasaññā,
tika-abh08t0:1139_0: Tāsaṃ kusalākusalavipākabhūtānaṃ atthaṅgamā pahānā asamuppādā appavattikaraṇenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1139_1: Nanu ca etā rūpāvacarajjhānasamāpannassāpi na santi.
tika-abh08t0:1139_2: Na hi paṭhamajjhānādisamāpannakāle pañcadvāravasena cittaṃ pavattatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1139_4: yathā pana “sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā adukkhamasukhaṃ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṃ catutthajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1139_5: upasampajja viharatī”ti ettha pasaṃsāvasena aññattha pahīnānampi sukhadukkhānaṃ catutthajjhāne,
tika-abh08t0:1139_6: “sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchānaṃ pahānā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmimaggaṃ upasampajja viharatī”ti ettha
tika-abh08t0:1139_7: paṭhamamaggeyeva pahīnānaṃ sakkāyadiṭṭhādīnaṃ dutiyamagge ca vacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1139_8: evameva imasmiṃ jhāne paṭipajjanakānaṃ ussāhajananatthaṃ imassa jhānassa pasaṃsāvasena etāsaṃ ettha vacananti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1139_9: Atha vā kiñcāpi tā rūpāvacarasamāpannassāpi na santi,
tika-abh08t0:1139_16: Tathā hi etāsaṃ ito pubbe appahīnattāyeva “paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpannassa saddo kaṇṭako”ti vutto bhagavatā.
tika-abh08t0:1139_17: Idha ca pahīnattā eva arūpasamāpattīnaṃ āneñjābhisaṅkhāravacanādīhi,
tika-abh08t0:1139_18: “ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe arūpā”tiādinā ca āneñjatā,
tika-abh08t0:1141_1: Asamāpannassa manodhātusamaṅgissa vā manoviññāṇadhātusamaṅgissa vā saññā sañjānanā sañjānitattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1142_1: Tā pana yasmā rūpasaddādibhede nānatte nānāsabhāve ārammaṇe pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1142_9: Amanasikārāti sabbaso anāvajjanā asamannāhārā apaccavekkhaṇahetu javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgacittassa
tika-abh08t0:1142_10: anto akaraṇā ṭhapetvā kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ nānārammaṇe cittassa asaṅkharaṇatoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1142_11: Iminā hi nānattasaññāmanasikārahetūnaṃ rūpadhammānaṃ samatikkamopi vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1142_12: rūpajjhāne pana tadabhāvato “nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”ti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1142_15: paṭighasaññā ca iminā jhānena nibbattitabhavepi na vijjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1142_16: arūpasaññāya bhāvanāya abhāve cutito uddhaṃ uppattirahānaṃ rūpasaññāpaṭighasaññānaṃ yāva attano vipākuppatti,
tika-abh08t0:1142_21: Nānattasaññāsu pana yā tasmiṃ bhave na uppajjanti ekantarūpanissitattā,
tika-abh08t0:1142_25: tasmā tāsaṃ amanasikāro anāvajjanaṃ apaccavekkhaṇaṃ javanapaṭipādakena vā bhavaṅgamanassa anto akaraṇaṃ appavesanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1142_26: Tatra pavattamānānampi hi jhānaṃ samāpannassa tāsaṃ amanasikāroyeva itarathā jhānasamāpattiyā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1142_27: Iti saṅkhepato “rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā”ti iminā sabbarūpāvacaradhammānaṃ pahānaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1142_28: “paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā”ti sabbesaṃ kāmāvacaracittacetasikānaṃ pahānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1143_0: Ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagatanti ettha pana nāssa antoti anantaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1143_3: anantatā pana uppādavayantābhāvato anantamanasikāravasena vā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1143_8: Na ca panetaṃ manasi karonto yogāvacaro tassa paricchedasaṅkhātamantaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1143_9: atha kho rūpavivekamattasseva gahaṇena anantapharaṇākāreneva manasikāraṃ pavatteti,
tika-abh08t0:1143_10: tasmā uppādavayantavirahato manasikāravasena vā etamanantanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1143_16: tadeva āyatanaṃ sasampayuttadhammassa jhānassa ārammaṇabhāvato adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena devāyatanaṃ viyāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1143_19: Atha vā ākāsānañcaṃ āyatanamassā sasampayuttadhammāya saññāyāti ākāsānañcāyatanā,
tika-abh08t0:1144_2: taṃsabhāvadhammattā uppādādiantavantampi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anantākāse pharaṇato attānaṃ ārabbha antassa
tika-abh08t0:1144_3: aggahaṇavasena pavattamanasikārato vā anantaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇānantaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1144_5: saddo tadatthe nirūḷho ā- kāra na-
tika-abh08t0:1146_0: Atha vā dutiyāruppaviññāṇena añcitabbaṃ ārammaṇavasena pāpuṇitabbanti viññāṇañcaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1147_2: antamaso bhaṅgamattampi avasiṭṭhaṃ natthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1147_3: Sati hi bhaṅgamattepi tassa sakiñcanatā siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1148_1: sahagatanti heṭṭhimajhānesu viya oḷārikāya saññāya abhāvato nevassa saññā atthīti nevasaññaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1148_2: sukhumāya ca saññāya atthitāya nāssa saññā natthīti nāsaññaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1148_8: Atha vā nevassa saññā nāsaññāti evaṃ ekajjhaṃ bahubbīhisamāsavasena “nevasaññānāsañña”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1148_11: Atha vā saññāyeva paṭusaññākiccakaraṇe asamatthatāya nevasaññā,
tika-abh08t0:1148_12: uṇhodake tejodhātu viya saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā nāsaññāti nevasaññānāsaññā,
tika-abh08t0:1148_14: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena dhammāyatanapariyāpannatāya eva vā āyatananti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1149_2: dutiyāruppabhūmiyā dutiya”ntiādinā attano anurūpavasena catūsu arūpabhūmīsu upapattisādhakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1152_0: Evaṃ tividhampi lokiyakusalaṃ niddisitvā idāni lokuttarakusalaṃ niddisanto āha “itaraṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1152_5: Cattāropi hi maggā upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātasaṅkhāralokato uttaranti anāsavabhāvena.
tika-abh08t0:1152_14: Iti catubbidhampi maggacittaṃ tividhalokato uttaratīti lokuttaraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1152_18: ubhayampi vā saha nibbānena upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātalokato uttaraṃ visiṭṭhataranti lokuttaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1153_0: Niyatāniyatavatthukabhedatoti sotāpattimaggassa paratoghosapaccayena vinā anuppajjanato arūpabhave sambhavo natthīti taṃ niyatavatthukaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1153_1: itaraṃ pana sattavidhampi paratoghosaṃ vināpi vipassanābaleneva nipphajjanato tatthāpi sambhavatīti aniyatavatthukaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1154_1: tividhanti lokuttaravimokkhānaṃ dvārabhāvato vimokkhamukhasaṅkhātāhi suññatānupassanādīhi tīhi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāhi
tika-abh08t0:1154_2: pattabbato idaṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ tividhaṃ suññataṃ animittaṃ appaṇihitanti.
tika-abh08t0:1154_5: Yathāha “cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca,
tika-abh08t0:1154_7: Imāni hi saṃkilesadhammehi suṭṭhu vimuttattā vimokkhā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1154_17: Idha pana kusalādhikārattā catumaggasaṅkhātāyeva lokuttaradhammā adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:1155_10: Idha pana maggassa āgatattā maggāgamanaṃ gahitanti.
tika-abh08t0:1156_0: Yo hi sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ anattalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya anattānupassanāya vasena maggaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t0:1156_1: tassa sā anupassanā asuññattakarānaṃ attābhinivesapaccayānaṃ diṭṭhekaṭṭhakilesānaṃ vikkhambhitabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1156_2: tebhūmakadhammānaṃ attasuññatāya yāthāvato gahaṇato suññatānupassanā nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1156_3: Tāya pana paṭiladdhamaggo suññatāya āgatattā suññato nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1157_0: Yo pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ aniccalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya aniccānupassanāya maggaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t0:1157_1: tassa sā anupassanā niccanimittādigāhakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ vikkhambhitattā dhuvabhāvūpaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaniccanimittādino aggahaṇato animittānupassanā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1157_2: Tāya pana laddhamaggo animittāya āgatattā animitto nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1158_0: Yo pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ dukkhalakkhaṇapaṭivedhavasappavattāya dukkhānupassanāya vasena maggaṃ paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t0:1158_1: tassa sā anupassanā taṇhāpaṇidhānassa vikkhambhanena paṇidhivirahitattā appaṇihitānupassanā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1158_2: Tāya pana laddhamaggo appaṇihitāya āgatattā appaṇihito nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1159_5: paṇidhivippamuttassa ca nibbānassa ārammaṇakaraṇato ārammaṇato ca suññatādivimokkho nāma hotīti evamassa saguṇārammaṇehi nāmalābho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1159_10: tasmā saguṇārammaṇato nāmassa sabbasādhāraṇabhāvena avavatthānakarattā pariyāyabhāvato suttantapariyāyeneva lābho,
tika-abh08t0:1159_12: Teneva hi ācariyena “tīhi vimokkhamukhehi pattabbato tividha”nti vimokkhamukhameva dhuraṃ katvā vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1159_14: Animittanāmaṃ panettha āgamanatopi suttantapariyāyeneva labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhatattā.
tika-abh08t0:1159_16: atha kho nippariyāyato tassa magge alabbhanato.
tika-abh08t0:1159_17: Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ vipassanā niccanimittaṃ ugghāṭentī pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1159_18: saṅkhāranimittassa pana anissajjanato na nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ labhati.
tika-abh08t0:1162_2: Abhidhamme pana yā sayampi nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t0:1162_3: sā kathaṃ maggassa taṃ dadeyyāti maggassa animittanāmaṃ na uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1162_6: dhammasuññataṃ pana na gaṇhātīti sayaṃ nippariyāyena suññatānupassanā nāma na hotīti suññatanāmampi maggassa na dadeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1162_7: Atha puggalasuññatāggahaṇamattena sayaṃ suññatānupassanā hutvā maggassa taṃ dadeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1162_8: aniccānupassanāpi saṅkhāranimittassa gahaṇepi niccanimittādiugghāṭanato sayaṃ animittānupassanā hutvā maggassa animittanāmaṃ dadeyyāti?
tika-abh08t0:1162_10: niccādinimittugghāṭanena animittabhāvassa nippariyāyena magge alabbhanato niccādinimittugghāṭanassapi pariyāyabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1162_12: Suññataappaṇihitabhāvopi hi nippariyāyena amagge na labbhati puggalasuññataggahaṇassa,
tika-abh08t0:1162_14: tasmā suññatānupassanāpi appaṇihitānupassanāpi pariyāyeneva taṃ taṃ nāmaṃ labhantīti maggassa nippariyāyato nāmaṃ na dentīti? Na,
tika-abh08t0:1162_15: tato laddhaariyamaggassa nippariyāyato sampayuttadhammavaseneva suññataappaṇihitanāmasambhavato. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1162_16: Ṭhapetvā buddhuppādaṃ sarabhaṅgasatthārādikālepi dubbijānīyabhāvena sukhumassa anattalakkhaṇassa paññāya
tika-abh08t0:1162_17: eva gocarabhāvato anattānupassanāya anupassanato maggakkhaṇe paññindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1163_2: Dukkhānupassanāya samādhivipaccanīkassa paṇidhisaṅkhātarāgassa sosanato tassā vasena anupassantassa maggakkhaṇe samādhindriyaṃ adhimattaṃ hoti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1163_6: Sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ pana aniccabhāvaṃ āgamanato sutvā pacchā sayaṃ paccakkhato passato “aniccameva vata
tika-abh08t0:1163_7: so bhagavā ‘anicca’nti āhā”ti bhagavati saddhābāhullapaṭilābhato aniccānupassanāya manasikaroto maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1163_10: Taṃ pana sayaṃ saṅkhāranimittato vuṭṭhahantampi ariyamaggapariyāpannaṃ na hotīti nippariyāyato animittanāmaṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t0:1163_14: saddhindriyādhimatto pana saddhāya animittanāmālābhato sayampi taṃ na labhati.
tika-abh08t0:1163_17: āgamanato adhimattassa pana indriyassa vasena laddhanāmampi āgamanatova laddhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1164_0: Atha vā abhidhammapariyāyenapi suññatabhāvo nāma puggalasuññatāyevāti puggalasuññataggāhitāya anattānupassanāya suññatanāmaṃ nippariyāyatova labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1164_1: Paṇidhi nāma rāgādikā evāti rāgādisositāya dukkhānupassanāya appaṇihitanāmampi nippariyāyatova labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1165_0: Nimittanti pana ṭhapetvā suttantapariyāyaṃ abhidhammapariyāyena saṅkhāranimittaṃ hotīti saṅkhāranimittaggāhitāya
tika-abh08t0:1165_2: tasmā nippariyāyato suññataappaṇihitanāmikānaṃ anattadukkhānupassanānaṃ vasena paṭiladdhamaggo āgamanato suññataappaṇihitanāmaṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t0:1165_5: “animittanāmaṃ panettha āgamanatopi suttantapariyāyeneva labbhati abhidhamme maggaṃ pati animittanāmassa anuddhaṭattā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1165_6: Iti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vimokkhānaṃ pavesanadvārabhāvato suññatānupassanādināmikā anattānupassanādikā tisso
tika-abh08t0:1165_7: anukkamena balavabhāvaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanābhūtā tīṇi vimokkhamukhānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1166_1: sabbasaṅkhāre paricchedaparivaṭumato samanupassanatāya animittāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1166_2: sabbasaṅkhāresu manosamuttejanatāya appaṇihitāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1166_3: sabbadhamme parato samanupassanatāya suññatāya ca dhātuyā cittasampakkhandanatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1167_0: Ettha hi paricchedaparivaṭumatoti udayabbayavasena paricchedato ceva parivaṭumato ca.
tika-abh08t0:1167_1: Aniccānupassanā hi “udayato pubbe saṅkhārā natthī”ti paricchinditvā tesaṃ gatiṃ samannesamānā vayato paraṃ na gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:1167_8: Iti imāni tīṇi padāni aniccānupassanādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vasena vuttānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1169_1: Nanu cettha abhidhammāvatārassa bhāsamānattā abhidhammapariyāyeneva vimokkhamukhāni ca vavatthapetuṃ yuttanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1169_2: aniccānupassanāyapi pana maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti pakāsanatthaṃ suttantapariyāyenapi ekaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1169_3: tathā vuṭṭhito pana maggo abhidhammapariyāyena suddhikapaṭipadāyameva saṅgayhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1170_2: tesañca sabbalokuttare atthitāya bhaṅgavasena abhedepi indriyānaṃ apāṭavapāṭavataratamabhāvena sacchikiriyāvisesato
tika-abh08t0:1170_3: kilesānaṃ pahānabhedo hotīti taṃvasena catubbidhatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1170_5: Sati vijjamāne pañcakkhandhasaṅkhāte kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
tika-abh08t0:1170_6: sayaṃ vā tattha sati diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
tika-abh08t0:1170_7: pañcasu khandhesu attattaniyābhinivesavasena pavattāya micchādiṭṭhiyā etaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1170_8: Sā pana ekekasmiṃ khandhe catudhā abhinivesanavasena vīsatividhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1170_9: Tathā hi koci rūpaṃ attato samanupassati “yaṃ rūpaṃ, so attā, yo attā,
tika-abh08t0:1171_0: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto tāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā,
tika-abh08t0:1171_1: tikicchituṃ dukkaratāya vā vigatā cikicchā ñāṇapatikāro imissāti vicikicchā. Sā pana –
tika-abh08t0:1172_0: “Satthari kaṅkhati vicikicchati, dhamme, saṅghe, sikkhāya, pubbante, aparante,
tika-abh08t0:1174_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1174_9: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1174_10: etarahi vā pana paccuppannamaddhānaṃ ajjhattaṃ kathaṃkathī hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1174_15: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
tika-abh08t0:1175_0: Evaṃ pubbantādayo ārabbha pavattivasena soḷasavatthukā ca niddiṭṭhā.
tika-abh08t0:1176_0: Tattha satthari kaṅkhanto tassa rūpakāyadhammakāyānaṃ vijjamānataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1176_14: yuttaṃ pana taṃ ārabbha kaṅkhājanananti? Yuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1176_18: Teneva ca soḷasavatthukavicikicchāniddese “etarahi vā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1176_19: Ācariyā pana “pubbantāparantoti atītānāgate ekajjhaṃ gahetvā tadubhayamārabbha kaṅkhanto pubbantāparante kaṅkhatī”tipi vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1176_20: Idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhanto pana avijjādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1176_21: saṅkhārādīnañca paccayuppannānaṃ hetuhetusamuppannabhāvassa sabbhāvāsabbhāvaṃ kaṅkhatīti evaṃ tāva aṭṭhavatthukakaṅkhāya pavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1177_1: na nu kho ahosi”nti kaṅkhanto vuttanayeneva atīte attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_2: Kiṃ nu kho ahosinti jātiliṅgupapattiyo nissāya “khattiyo nu kho ahosiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1177_3: brāhmaṇādīsu gahaṭṭhādīsu devādīsu aññataro nu kho”ti kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_4: Kathaṃ nu khoti saṇṭhānākāraṃ nissāya “dīgho nu kho ahosiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1177_6: Issaranimmānādīni nissāya “kena nu kho pakārena ahosi”nti nibbattanākārato kaṅkhatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1177_7: Kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosinti jātiādīni nissāya “khattiyo hutvā nu kho brāhmaṇo ahosiṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1177_8: devo hutvā nu kho manusso ahosi”nti attano aparāparaṃ pavattiṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_10: na nu khoti heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva anāgate attano vijjamānāvijjamānataṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_13: na nu khosmīti idāni attano atthibhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1177_16: Kiṃ nu khosmīti khattiyādikova samāno attano khattiyādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_18: Kathaṃ nu khosmīti “abbhantare jīvo nāma atthī”ti gahetvā tassa dīghādibhāvaṃ kaṅkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1177_19: Paccuppannaṃ pana attano sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ ajānanto nāma natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1177_21: kuhiṃ gāmī bhavissatīti attabhāvassa āgatagataṭṭhānāni kaṅkhatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1178_10: Sabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato āmasanaṃ gahaṇanti parāmāso,
tika-abh08t0:1178_14: sīlabbatena suddhīti evaṃ asuddhimagge “suddhimaggo”ti pavattassa micchābhinivesassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1178_15: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi ca vicikicchā ca sīlabbataparāmāso cāti sakkāya…pe… parāmāso,
tika-abh08t0:1178_17: vaṭṭasmiṃ vā satte saṃyojenti bandhantīti saṃyojanāni,
tika-abh08t0:1178_18: tesaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiādīhi tadaṅgavasena pahīnānaṃ anuppattidhammatāpādanena accantasamucchedappahānaṃ karotīti sakkā…pe…ppahānakaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1179_0: Nibbānaṃ pati savanato sandanato soto vuccati ariyo aṭṭhaṅgikamaggo,
tika-abh08t0:1179_6: Atha vā sotaṃ ādito pajjati adhigacchatīti sotāpatti,
tika-abh08t0:1180_7: Etesaṃ kilesānaṃ tanuttaṃ tanubhāvaṃ karotīti rāga…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1180_11: Sakadāgāmissa hi vaṭṭānusārimahājanassa viya kilesā abhiṇhaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1180_13: tathā uppajjantāpi maddantā chādentā andhakāraṃ karontā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1180_14: Dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā mandamandā tanukatanukā uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1180_15: Keci pana sakadāgāmissa kilesā cirena uppajjantāpi bahalāva uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1180_19: tasmā vuttanayeneva dvīhi kāraṇehi nesaṃ tanubhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1180_22: itarathā heṭṭhā tīhipi maggehi uparimaggavajjhakilesānaṃ bahalābahalāvatthāya pahīyamānattā idha sabbesameva
tika-abh08t0:1180_24: teneva ca pāḷiyampi “kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā”ti vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1180_26: sutte pana uparimaggavajjhānaṃ tanubhāvapariyāyaṃ gahetvā “rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hotī”ti
tika-abh08t0:1180_31: Paṭisandhivasena sakideva imaṃ manussalokaṃ āgacchatīti sakadāgāmī,
tika-abh08t0:1180_33: Kiñcāpi hi maggaṭṭhassa paṭisandhivasena āgamanāsambhavato phalaṭṭhoyeva sakadāgāmī nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1180_34: tassa pana āgamanabhūto maggo maggantarāvacchedanatthaṃ tadāyattabhāvūpanayanena sakadāgāmimaggoti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1181_3: Paṭisandhivasena imaṃ kāmadhātuṃ na āgacchatīti anāgāmī.
tika-abh08t0:1181_7: Uddhaccampi “ko me bhāro kilesasamucchedane”ti evamākārappavattaṃ cittassa avūpasamamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1181_15: rahitabbato jahitabbato “rahā”ti laddhanāmānaṃ vā pāpadhammānaṃ abhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1181_17: rahasaṅkhātassa vā gamanassa saṃsāre abhāvato arahā,
tika-abh08t0:1181_22: buddhiyā ca pavattinibandhanattā arahato bhāvoti katvā “arahatta”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1182_0: Jhānaṅgayogabhedatoti rūpāvacaraṃ viya pañcahi jhānaṅgehi sampayogabhedato.
tika-abh08t0:1182_3: tayo ca theravādāti cattāro vādā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1182_4: Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tāva “saṅkhārupekkhābhāvaṃ patvā vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāmaggassa jhānaṅgaṃ niyametī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1182_5: Tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero pana “maggāsannavipassanāya padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ niyametī”ti āha.
tika-abh08t0:1182_11: caturaṅgikaṃ vā maggaṃ pāpuṇeyya’ntiādinā yathā yathāssa ajjhāsayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1183_2: tasmā cattāropi vādā aññamaññaṃ appaṭibāhanavasena evaṃ veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1183_3: Kāmāvacaradhamme tāva sammasitvā sukkhavipassakassa uppannamaggopi samāpattilābhino jhānaṃ pādakaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t0:1183_5: Sace pana kiñci jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā uppādito hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1183_6: tassa vasena aṅgapariṇāmo hotīti taṃtaṃjhānasadiso hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1183_7: Yasmā panettha kāmāvacarakkhandhe ārabbha pavattā vipassanā kāmāvacaradhammesu ca mahaggatadhammesu viya bhāvanāvisesato jhānaṅgaviseso natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1183_8: tasmā “vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentī”ti evaṃ pavatto dutiyattheravādo imaṃ vādaṃ na pavisati.
tika-abh08t0:1183_9: Jhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sace pādakajjhānaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1183_11: Sace paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya dutiyādijhāne sammasitvā uppādito,
tika-abh08t0:1183_13: Sace pana puggalassa tathāvidho ajjhāsayo natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1183_15: Ettha tāva keci “nānāvajjanavīthiyameva nivattamānapādakajjhānato ekāvajjanavīthiyaṃ gotrabhubhāvaṃ patvā
tika-abh08t0:1183_17: tasmā sammasitakkhandhaniyāmena taṃsadiso maggo hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1183_18: Evañca sati “pādakajjhānaniyāmena hotī”ti evaṃ pavatto paṭhamattheravādo pādakajjhānato vuṭṭhāya kāmāvacarakkhandhe
tika-abh08t0:1184_0: Apare pana “pādakajjhānaṃ maggassa mūlakāraṇavasena paccayo hoti āsannakāraṇavasenapi,
tika-abh08t0:1184_2: tasmā sammasitakkhandhato pādakajjhānameva balavataranti pādakajjhānasadiso maggo hotī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1184_3: Evaṃ sante pana “sammasitakkhandhaniyāmenā”ti evaṃ pavatto dutiyattheravādo samāpattiṃ pādakaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t0:1184_4: kevalaṃ jhānadhammeyeva sammasitvā uppāditamaggameva sandhāya tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:1184_5: Yasmā pana heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato uparūparijhānaṃ balappattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1184_6: tasmā heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānato vuṭṭhāya uparūparijhānadhamme vipassato uppannamaggo pādakajjhānaṃ anapekkhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1184_8: Uparūparijhānato pana vuṭṭhāya heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimajjhānadhamme sammasitvā uppāditamaggo sammasitajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1184_10: Evañhi sati dvinnampi therānaṃ vādā nippadesavisayā samaphalā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1185_1: sammasitajjhānaṃ vā vinā ajjhāsayamatteneva na ijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:1185_2: Tīsupi vādesu ṭhapetvā sesajhānaṅgapariṇāmaṃ vedanāpariṇāmo vipassanāniyāmeneva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1185_3: Tayopi theravādā vipassanāniyāmena vinā na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1185_5: tasmā tāyapi pādakajjhānaniyāmeneva bhavitabbanti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1185_6: vedanāyapi pādakajjhānaniyāmena pariṇāme sati vipassanāniyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā pādakajjhānaniyāmeneva maggakkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1185_8: tathā pana ahutvā ekāvajjanavīthiyā āditova pariṇāmanato maggavuṭṭhānavīthiyā āsannatarappavattāya vipassanāya vasena vedanāniyāmo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1186_0: Atha vā pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānānaṃ sambhave tesu anuppannā vedanā vipassanāya na hotīti pādakajjhānasammasitajjhānaniyāmena
tika-abh08t0:1186_8: Yo hi bhikkhu aṭṭhasamāpattilābhī paṭhamajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sotāpattimaggaphalāni nibbattetvā aparihīnajjhāno
tika-abh08t0:1186_9: kālaṃ katvā arūpabhave nibbatto paṭhamajjhānikāya sotāpattiphalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhāya vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:1186_13: Arūpepi hi lokuttaraṃ tikacatukkajjhānaṃ uppajjatīti evamettha ekekassa lokuttarakusalassa jhānaṅgayogabhedo veditabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1187_1: nipphādetīti tebhūmakakusalaṃ viya paṭisandhippavattīsu avipaccavantampi attano attano anurūpassa phalassa
tika-abh08t0:1187_2: nipphādanena taṃtaṃphalappatte sotāpanno sakadāgāmī anāgāmī arahāti sāmaññato cattāro ariyapuggale abhinipphādetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1187_3: Visesato pana sattakkhattuparamatādike anekepi sotāpannādayo nipphādeti.
tika-abh08t0:1190_1: Evaṃ catubhūmakakusalacittaṃ sarūpato niddisitvā idāni taṃ nigamento āha “kāme aṭṭhevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1191_2: Aggamaggassa hi uppannakālato paṭṭhāya arahato sabbāni kusalākusalakammāni pahīnāni nāma honti paccayavekallena paṭisandhidāne asamatthabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1191_4: Atha vā ahetuapaccayavisujjhanassa abhāvato kilesasamucchedakena maggakusalena akusalehi apagatena.
tika-abh08t0:1191_5: Kusale kusalenāti kucchitānaṃ salanādīhi kusalasaṅkhātāya paṭipattiyaṃ desanuppādanādīsu chekena.
tika-abh08t0:1192_0: “Yo munāti ubho loke, muni tena pavuccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1196_0: Ettāvatā ca yaṃ “kusalākusalābyākatajātibhedato tividha”nti ettha vuttaṃ kusalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1196_1: taṃ sarūpato niddisitvā idāni tadanantaruddiṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ niddisanto āha “akusalaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1196_3: Nikāyantarikā pana rūpārūpāvacarampi akusalaṃ icchantīti tesaṃ matinisedhanatthaṃ avadhāraṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1196_4: Mahaggatabhūmiyaṃ uppajjantampi hetaṃ tattha rūpadhātuyaṃ pavattivipākaṃ dentampi ekantena kāmāvacaramevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1196_7: Kāmataṇhāvisayatā hi kāmāvacarabhāvassa kāraṇaṃ yathā rūpārūpataṇhāvisayatā rūpārūpabhāvassa.
tika-abh08t0:1196_11: evaṃ sati anārammaṇānaṃ saṅgaho na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1197_0: Domanassassa anīvaraṇāvatthāya abhāvena taṃsahagatacittuppādo kāmabhūmiyaṃyeva pavattatīti so niyatavatthuko,
tika-abh08t0:1200_0: Yena pana kāraṇena taṃ paṭisandhiṃ nākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh08t0:1200_1: taṃ paṭisandhivinicchayakathāhi imissā gāthāya vaṇṇanāpadeseyeva vakkhāma.
tika-abh08t0:1200_2: Tīhi vedanāhīti sukhadukkhopekkhāsaṅkhātāhi tīhi vedanāhi. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1200_11: akusalapakkhikañca dukkhe pakkhipitvā pariyāyena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1200_15: so pana sabbākusalasādhāraṇattā vavatthānakaro na hotīti asādhāraṇadhammavasena “lobhamūla”ntveva vuttaṃ yathā “bherisaddo yavaṅkuro”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1202_3: yāva indriyagocaroti paralokaṃ paṭikkhipitvā “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”ti gaṇhanti. Ādi- saddena –
tika-abh08t0:1207_0: Ādinā nayena puttamukhadassanaṃ saggamokkhamaggoti evamādikaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1207_10: bhāratayuddhasītāharaṇādikathā pāpavūpasamāya hotī”ti evamādike micchāgāhe saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1207_12: Sārato paccetīti vuḍḍhiyā pubbanimittabhāvena aggahetvā “idameva vuḍḍhikāraṇa”nti evaṃ sāravasena gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1207_14: micchābhinivesassa vā vasena saraseneva tikhiṇena kururena.
tika-abh08t0:1208_6: Dasaakusalakammapathesu hi kāmesumicchācāraabhijjhāmicchādiṭṭhisaṅkhātā tayova kammapathā iminā na sijjhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1208_7: Sabhāvatikkhaṃ hutvā pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ asaṅkhārameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1208_9: Mandaṃ pana hutvā pavattamānaṃ ekaṃsena sasaṅkhāramevāti na sakkāva viññātuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1208_11: taṃ mandameva hotīti katvā tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1209_0: Mohamūlaṃ cittaṃ mūlantaravirahato atimūḷhaṃ vicikicchuddhaccayogato cañcalañcāti upekkhāsahagatameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1209_3: vikkhipanavasena ca pavattamānassa cittadvayassa kiṃ tādise kicce sabhāvatikkhatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1209_7: kasmā pana etameva tena visesetvā vuttaṃ “uddhaccasahagata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1209_10: tasmā sampayuttadhammesu padhānaṃ hutvā pavattatīti idameva tena visesitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1209_11: Teneva hi pāḷiyaṃ sesākusalesu uddhaccaṃ yevāpanakavasena āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1209_13: Evaṃ asādhāraṇappadhānadhammavasena mohamūlaṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ uddhaccasampayuttanti duvidhaṃ vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1210_2: Atha vā yathānurūpanti yo yassa hetu,
tika-abh08t0:1210_5: dosamūlakena doso viya caṇḍajātatāya taṃsarikkhake niraye,
tika-abh08t0:1210_7: tasmā lobhādihetuanurūpato tattha tattha apāye upapattiṃ nipphādetīti āha “yathānurūpaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1211_1: Apāpena alāmakena pāpāpāpappahīnena pāpāpāpesu mānasesu yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1211_2: pāpāpāpesu puggalesu apāpena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti vā sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1211_3: Atha vā pāpāpāpesu mānasesu pāpena pāpamānasena pāpavasena pāpāpāpappahīnena yaṃ pāpamānasaṃ vuttanti yojanā.
tika-abh08t0:1211_5: asammāsambuddhena tāva dhammasabhāvassa dubbijānīyattā kusalampi akusalato,
tika-abh08t0:1211_7: bhagavato pana saha vāsanāhi viddhaṃsitākusalassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena paccayavekallato viddhaṃsitakusalakammassa
tika-abh08t0:1214_2: Yathā hi loke sālibījādīnaṃ phalāni taṃsadisāni nibbattāni vipakkāni nāma honti,
tika-abh08t0:1214_6: sārammaṇabhāvena ca taṃsadisāni vipakkabhāvamāpannānīti vipākaniruttiṃ labhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1214_10: Yena pana kāraṇena tassa phaladānaṃ na sambhavati,
tika-abh08t0:1214_13: Vipākassa kāmāvacarādibhāvo kusale vuttanayena yathāsambhavaṃ veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1215_0: Sakakusalaṃ viyāti attano janakaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:1215_1: Janakajanitabbasambandhavasena hi taṃ taṃ kusalaṃ tassa tassa vipākassa sakaṃ nāmaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1216_0: “Sakakusalaṃ viyā”ti vuttattā pavattākāraārammaṇādito cassa taṃsadisatā āpajjeyyāti taṃnivāraṇatthamāha “yathā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1216_7: oḷārikāhi vā kāmataṇhādīhi parito gahitattā “parittā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:1216_8: Vipākassa saṅkappetvā ārammaṇaggahaṇābhāvato kammānurūpameva pavattatīti parittakammavipāko parittārammaṇeyeva pavattitumarahati,
tika-abh08t0:1216_12: saññāyattārammaṇassa samādhippadhānassa kammassa appanāpattassa tādiseneva vipākena bhavitabbattā.
tika-abh08t0:1216_13: Vaṇṇalakkhaṇādikañhi aggahetvā lokasaññānurodheneva gahite pathavādike parikammasaññāya samuppāditaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1216_15: tasmā tadārammaṇassa samādhippadhānassa appanāpattassa kammassa vipākena samādhippadhānaappanāpattehi
tika-abh08t0:1217_0: Mukhanimittaṃ viyāti mukhaṃ paṭicca uppannanimittaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:1217_1: Yathā hi taṃ nirīhaṃ aparaṃ mukhanimittaṃ uppādetuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1217_2: aññaṃ vā kiñci attano balena kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1217_8: So vipāke natthi kammavegukkhittattā patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānassa tassa ekantena dubbalabhāvatoti taṃ nirussāhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1218_11: Yasmā panetaṃ ṭhānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃtaṃkiccavasena pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1218_12: tasmā ṭhānaṃ veditabbanti ṭhānaṃ uddharitvā pākaṭakiccavaseneva taṃ pakāsetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1218_13: Atha vā kiccampi kiccavantānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena gayhatīti ṭhānantipi kiccameva uddhaṭanti taṃ sarūpato dassetuṃ “imāni hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1219_3: Paṭisandhiviññāṇasampayuttā dve alobhādayo hetū yesaṃ te duhetukā.
tika-abh08t0:1219_8: Yena yena hi cittena paṭisandhi hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1219_10: Tadārammaṇaṃ pana avisesena daṭṭhabbaṃ duhetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇassa icchitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1219_11: Nanu cetaṃ asamapekkhitābhidhānaṃ ācariyeneva imassa paṭisiddhattā.
tika-abh08t0:1222_1: Yena hi kammena yā paṭisandhi ādinnā,
tika-abh08t0:1222_2: na taṃ tato adhikataraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ pavatte abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh08t0:1222_3: Yaṃ pana aññampi kiñci kammaṃ tadāladdhāvakāsaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1222_4: na taṃ tattha tato adhikatarampi vipākaṃ na nibbattetīti atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1222_5: “Sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti hi paṭṭhānavacanena ahetukassāpi
tika-abh08t0:1224_2: Ācariyajotipālatthero pana “sahetuka”nti avisesena vuttattā ahetukānampi tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t0:1224_6: yañcarahi atthasamāse ahetukānaṃ tihetukaphalāni detī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1224_10: Apare pana “mūlasandhiyā jaḷattā tassa tihetukatadālambaṇaṃ na labbhatiyevā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1225_3: Satipi antarantarā vīthicittuppāde tadavasāne uppajjamānassa yāvatāyukaṃ anivattanato vuttaṃ “yāvatāyuka”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1225_5: Pañcadvāre hi atimahantārammaṇe manodvāre vibhūtārammaṇe tadārammaṇamuppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1225_7: Ekārammaṇappavattiyā paṭisandhādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi ekaṭṭhāne dassanatthaṃ uddese tadārammaṇassa avasānakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1225_8: idha pana pavattikkamavasena cutiyā avasānakaraṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1226_1: Kammadvāranti kāyavacīkammadvārassa janakavasena na pavattantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1226_5: Kiñcāpi hi kāyo kammassa catuvīsatiyā paccayesu na kenaci paccayena paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1226_6: tathāpi taṃsamuṭṭhānassa tassa sabbhāveyeva kāyakammādivohāroti taṃ tena katanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1226_10: Taṃ pana “dvāre caranti kammānī”ti vacanato vacīdvārepi sijjhatīti dvārena kammavavatthānaṃ na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1226_11: tathā vacīkammaṃ kāyadvārepi sijjhatīti kammena dvāravavatthānampi na siyāti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1226_12: tabbahulavuttiyā ceva yebhuyyena vuttiyā ca vavatthitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1226_15: tasmā kāyadvāre bahulappavattanato etassa kāyakammabhāvo siddho vanacarakādīnaṃ vanacarakādibhāvo viya.
tika-abh08t0:1226_18: tasmā kāyakammassa yebhuyyena ettheva pavattito assa kāyakammadvārabhāvo siddho brāhmaṇagāmādīnaṃ brāhmaṇagāmādibhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1227_0: Manokammadvāraṃ pana sayaṃ manoyeva samānaṃ attanā sahagatacetanāanabhijjhādikammānaṃ pavattidvārabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1227_1: manodvārasaṅkhaṃ labhatīti na taṃ cittassa uppattidvāravasena gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1227_4: tadā tesaṃ kammadvārabhāvo manasmiṃ na upacārīyatīti sampayuttadhammānaṃ cittādhipatibhāvo citte viyāti cittaṃ “manokammadvāra”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1227_5: Sabhāvato pana kammadvāraṃ nāma sampayuttadhammāyevāti cittaṃ tato pavattanato manokammadvāravasena pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1227_7: Idha pana “aviññattijanattā”ti vacanena kāyavacīkammadvāravaseneva appavattiyā sādhitattā manokammadvāraṃ na gahitameva.
tika-abh08t0:1227_8: Na hi “aviññattijanattā”ti kāraṇaṃ manokammadvāravasenapi appavattiṃ sādheti.
tika-abh08t0:1227_9: Atha vā “avipākasabhāvato”ti vacanena manokammadvāravasenapi appavatti sādhitā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1227_10: “Kammadvāra”nti ettha kammaggahanena nānakkhaṇikakammassa adhippetattā tassāpi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1227_12: manokammadvārena saha tīsu eva vā yathā kusalaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1227_14: yathā ca kusalaṃ kāyavacīmanokammassa āyūhanavasena dānādipuññakiriyavatthuvasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1227_16: Ayaṃ pana neva kāyavacīkammadvāresu pavattati viññattisamuṭṭhāpakattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1227_19: na puññakiriyavasena pavattati dānādivasena appavattanatoti dassetuṃ “kammadvārañca…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1228_4: tasmā dvinnamālambaṇānaṃ ekacittassa visayabhāvānanugamanato na tesu karuṇāmuditā kadācipi jāyantīti ayamettha paṭhamagāthāya adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1229_6: bhagavatā hi sikkhāpadavibhaṅge “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalā”ti evaṃ “pāṇātipātā veramaṇī”tiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ kusalabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1229_7: te ca viratisabhāvā eva ādito tiṇṇaṃ sikkhāpadānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1229_10: pañcannampi micchājīvahetukapañcaduccaritato viramaṇavasena pavattānaṃ sammāājīve ca antobhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1229_11: tasmā tā ekantakusalabhūtānaṃ kadāci abyākate labhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1229_16: No na labbhanti lokiyaviratīnameva tattha ekantakusalabhāvassa vuttattā,
tika-abh08t0:1229_17: lokuttaraviratiyo pana phalassa maggapaṭibimbabhūtattā maggasadisato aṭṭhaṅgikatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1229_18: sattaṅgikatāya ca bhavitabbanti na ca ekantakusalabhāvena vavatthāpetuṃ yuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1229_19: Evañca katvā upari lokuttaraphalesupi aṭṭhaṅgikatādibhedo maggo uddhaṭoti.
tika-abh08t0:1230_4: tasmā na tāni attano vipākehi adhipatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ sakkontīti na te chandādīni dhuraṃ katvā pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1230_6: vipaccanakālassa ca antarābhāvato attano chandādīnaṃ balassa avūpasantakāleyeva vipākaṃ nibbattentīti
tika-abh08t0:1230_7: anantarapaccayā hutvā vipākehi adhipatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ sakkontīti.
tika-abh08t0:1230_8: Evañca katvā upari lokuttaravipākānaṃ adhipatiyogaṃ vakkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1231_1: Yasmā moravāpivāsimahādattattherena vipākānaṃ āgamanato asaṅkhārikasasaṅkhārikabhāvo icchito,
tika-abh08t0:1231_4: Purimatthero hi yathā mukhe calite ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ calati,
tika-abh08t0:1231_9: Dutiyatthero pana asaṅkhārikādīsu yena kenacipi cittena kamme āyūhite āsannamaraṇassa attano,
tika-abh08t0:1231_10: paresaṃ vā payogena vinā asaṅkhārena appayogena kammakammanimittagatinimittapaccupaṭṭhāne paṭisandhi uppajjamānā asaṅkhārikā.
tika-abh08t0:1231_11: Yassa kassaci sasaṅkhārena sappayogena kammādipaccupaṭṭhāne sasaṅkhārikā.
tika-abh08t0:1231_14: anantaraniruddhakusalākusalassa vasena vā asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāranti evaṃ paccayato asaṅkhārikādividhānatamāha,
tika-abh08t0:1231_15: tasmā tassa matidassanatthaṃ “ñeyyaṃ paccayato cevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1232_1: Hīnādīnaṃ vipākattāti adhipatiyogābhāvepi hīnamajjhimapaṇītānaṃ kusalānaṃ vipākattā.
tika-abh08t0:1232_3: Vineyyasantānagatakilesamalavidhamanena tassa punanato puñño vādo vacīghoso etassa,
tika-abh08t0:1232_6: “Ekantena savatthuka”nti vuttepi rūpaloke pavatti anivāritāti āha “kāmalokasmi”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1232_7: “Na panaññattha jāyate”ti iminā pana byatirekato laddhamatthaṃ dassetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1233_0: Evaṃ tāva sahetukavipāke niddisitvā idāni ahetuke niddisituṃ “ahetukavipākacittaṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1233_1: Kasmā pana sahetukassa kammassa ahetukavipāko hotīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1233_2: cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva pañcannaṃ ārammaṇābhinipātamattattā alobhādisampayogo na sambhavati,
tika-abh08t0:1233_3: tathā mandatarakiccesu sampaṭicchanasantīraṇesūti evaṃ hetūnaṃ uppattiyā asambhavato ca nesaṃ ahetukatā daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1233_4: Upekkhādiyoge pana cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ tāva catunnaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇepi pavattamānānaṃ vatthārammaṇasaṅghaṭṭanāya dubbalabhāvato upekkhāsahagatatā,
tika-abh08t0:1233_5: kāyaviññāṇassa ca tāya balavabhāvato sukhasahagatatā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1233_7: catucittakkhaṇātītavasena cirajātattā ca dubbalamattano nissayena saha asamānajātikañca cakkhādivatthuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1233_9: apubbanissayatāya ca ārammaṇarasassāde dubbalanti iṭṭhādīsu ārammaṇesu upekkhāsahagatameva.
tika-abh08t0:1233_12: Manoviññāṇadhātu viya visiṭṭhamananakiccābhāvato manomattā nissattanijjīvādiatthehi dhātu cāti manodhātu.
tika-abh08t0:1233_13: Sā hi satipi viññāṇabhāve manoviññāṇato sambhavassa visiṭṭhamananakiccassa akaraṇato mananamattāyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1233_14: Vuttalakkhaṇaviparītato pana mano ca taṃ viññāṇañcāti manoviññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1235_7: Cakkhādīhi vinā kevalaṃ manasā eva vijānitabbatāya viññātaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1235_9: Anāmaṭṭhakālavisesavacanattā ca nesaṃ atītānāgatāpi rūpādayo diṭṭhādisaddehi vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:1235_10: Teneva hi “daṭṭhabbatāyā”tiādinā kālasāmaññena nesaṃ nibbacanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1236_0: Cakkhuto pavattanti cakkhudvāratova pavattaṃ sabbavākyānaṃ avadhāraṇaphalattā.
tika-abh08t0:1236_1: Tena manodhātuādīnaṃ cakkhuviññāṇabhāvo nivārito hoti tesaṃ dvārantaratopi pavattisambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1236_2: Atha vā “cakkhuto pavatta”nti idaṃ sañjātippavattiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1236_4: tasmā yathā kuṇḍamukhato udakaṃ sañcaraṇavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1236_6: Yathā pana candakantapāsāṇato udakaṃ sañjātivasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1236_9: Yathā kucchito samuṭṭhitaṃ pittasemharuhirādi mukhato sandantampi “mukhassavo”ti na vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1236_10: mukhatoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato savantaṃ kheḷaṃ “mukhassavo”ti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1236_11: evaṃ hadayavatthusannissayato samuṭṭhahitvā cakkhuto pavattamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1236_12: Cakkhutoyeva pana samuṭṭhahitvā tato pavattamānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ nāmāti.
tika-abh08t0:1236_13: Yo pana imamatthaṃ asallakkhetvā byañjanamattasseva abhinivisitvā taṃdvārappavattānaṃ sesānampi cakkhuviññāṇabhāvaṃ maññeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1236_14: taṃ nivāretuṃ pakārantarenapi viggahaṃ dassento āha “cakkhumhi sannissita”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1236_18: sotasmiṃ sannissitaṃ vā viññāṇaṃ sotaviññāṇa”ntiādinā yojanaṃ atidisanto āha “tathā sotaviññāṇādīnī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1237_1: Tattha cakkhusannissitavacanena dibbacakkhādikaṃ aññaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ nivatteti. Vijānana-
tika-abh08t0:1237_6: Yadi hi cakkhu nāma na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1237_9: Yadi ca nīlādirūpaṃ nāma na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1237_12: Ekantasārammaṇatā ca cittassa vuttāti ārammaṇena vinā nīlādiābhāsaṃ cittaṃ pavattatīti evaṃ pavatto vādo micchāvādoti gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1237_13: Tenāha bhagavā “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1237_16: rūpañca viññāṇassa paccayo hontaṃ ekameva paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1237_22: Cakkhu hi cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayapurejātaindriyavippayuttapaccayehi paccayo hontaṃ atthibhāveneva hoti tasmiṃ sati tassa bhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1237_25: svāyaṃ paccayabhāvo na ekasmiṃ na sambhavatīti ekampi cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1237_26: Rūpaṃ pana yadipi cakkhu viya purejātaatthiavigatapaccayehi paccayo hoti puretaraṃ uppannaṃ hutvā vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva upakārakattā,
tika-abh08t0:1237_27: tathāpi anekameva saṅgataṃ hutvā paccayo hoti ārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1237_28: Yañhi taṃ ārammaṇaṃ tassa yathā tathā upalabbhanīyavaseneva ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1237_29: viññāṇassa ca indriyādhīnavuttikassa ārammaṇasabhāvūpaladdhi na ekadvikalāpagatavaṇṇavasena hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1237_31: atha kho ābhogānurūpaṃ āpāthagatavaṇṇavasenāti anekameva rūpaṃ saṃhaccakāritāya viññāṇassa paccayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1237_32: Amumeva hi visesaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe cā”ti pāḷiyaṃ vacanabhedo katoti.
tika-abh08t0:1237_34: Ghānaviññāṇādīnaṃ pana sampattaggāhatāya attano nissayena saha allīnasseva gahaṇato ekakalāpagatampi gandhādikaṃ tesaṃ uppattiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_2: evaṃ rūpāyatanepi labbhamāne ekacce visese nivatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_3: Na hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ vaṇṇamattato aññaṃ kiñci nīlādivisesaṃ tattha gahetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_5: “pañcahi viññāṇehi na kiñci dhammaṃ paṭivijānāti aññatra abhinipātamattā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_6: Cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjamānaṃ rūpārammaṇe eva uppajjanato tadabhimukhabhāvena gaṇhātīti vuttaṃ “rūpābhimukhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_7: Attano anantaraṃ uppajjamānānaṃ arūpadhammānaṃ samanantaravigatā arūpadhammā pavattiokāsadānena anantarasamanantaranatthivigatapaccayehi upakārakā,
tika-abh08t0:1238_8: nissayārammaṇā dhammā viya āsannakāraṇāti dassento āha “rūpārammaṇāya kiriyāmanodhātuyā apagamapadaṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1238_11: Cakkhuviññāṇādīhi gahitaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ tadanantarameva aparipatantaṃ katvā sampaṭicchantaṃ gaṇhantaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1239_0: Chasu ārammaṇesu kadāci pañcannaṃ jaccandhādivasena tatopi ūnānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1239_1: brahmaloke ca dvinnameva vijānanasabhāvāpi chaḷārammaṇavijānanalakkhaṇā vuttā taṃsabhāvānativattanato,
tika-abh08t0:1239_5: “Hadayavatthupadaṭṭhānā”ti idaṃ imāsaṃ dvinnaṃ manoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ anibaddhaṭṭhānatāya nibaddhakāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1239_7: Ahetukacittānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ lakkhaṇādikassa dassitattā parisesato sahetukacittānaṃ ekasadisameva lakkhaṇādikanti viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1240_0: Idāni imāsaṃ ārammaṇādito bhedaṃ dassetuṃ “tattha paṭhamā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1240_6: Kiñcāpi somanassapaṭisandhikassa domanassajavanāvasāne tadārammaṇasambhave asati yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1240_8: tathā pana uppajjamānassa kadāciyeva sambhavato yebhuyyappavattiṃ gahetvā cha ṭhānāni avatvā pañceva vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1240_9: Atha vā taṃ uppajjamānaṃ tadārammaṇaṭṭhāneyeva nibbattatīti taṃvaseneva tassāpi ṭhānaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1240_11: Kiñcāpi hi jātikkhaṇe aṇḍajajalābujānaṃ sabbesampi cakkhu natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1240_13: tathāpi cakkhussa uppajjamānārahakālepi cakkhuvipattivibandhakena kammunā paṭihatasāmatthiyena paṭisandhidāyakena
tika-abh08t0:1240_14: itarenāpi vā kammena tassa anupādiyamānattā satto “jaccandho”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1240_17: Tena duhetukatihetukānaṃ mātukucchigatakālepi cakkhussa avipajjanaṃ siddhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1240_21: tassa pana pavattiyaṃ paññā sambhavatīti vuttanayena yebhuyyato pavattiyampi paññāyāsambhavato jaccajaḷo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1240_24: So pañcavidho āsittapaṇḍako usūyapaṇḍako pakkhapaṇḍako opakkamikapaṇḍako napuṃsakapaṇḍakoti.
tika-abh08t0:1240_26: napuṃsakassa ca visuṃ gahaṇato tayo paṇḍakā adhippetā. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1240_28: Keci pana “ekacce ahetukapaṭisandhikā avikalindriyā hutvā thokaṃ vicāraṇapakatikāpi honti,
tika-abh08t0:1240_31: Ettha ca jaccandhādīnameva ayaṃ paṭisandhīti na gahetabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1240_32: Jaccandhādayo pana iminā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1241_2: Duhetukammassa pana sabbathāpi soḷasannaṃ vipākānaṃ asambhavato tappaṭikkhepaparattā cetanāya “tihetukapuññassā”ti avisesato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1244_1: na pana bhāvanāvisesenāti tesaṃ pahānaṅgāni anuddhaṭāni.
tika-abh08t0:1246_2: Yathā kāmāvacaravipākaṃ kusalato visadisampi katvā vibhattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1246_4: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana kusalānantaraṃ katvā mahaggatavipākānaṃ bhājitapāḷiṃ sandhāya “kusalānugataṃ katvā bhājita”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1247_1: Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādinā –
tika-abh08t0:1249_7: tasseva rūpāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ vivicceva kāmehi…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1250_0: Evaṃ kusalaṃ uddisitvā tadanantaraṃ katvā mahaggataṃ vipākaṃ vibhattaṃ,
