tika-abh08t0:1250_2: evaṃ avibhajitvā idaṃ kusalānantaraṃ katvā vibhattanti imamatthaṃ jotetuṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kusalānugataṃ katvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1250_3: Imināpi ca ācariyena parihāramukhena vakkhamānaatthavisesavacanicchāya tattha vuttanayeneva codanā katā.
tika-abh08t0:1250_4: Evañhi sati kusalānantaraṃyeva phalaṃ uppajjatīti ñāpanaṃ suṭṭhūpapannaṃ hotīti ayamettha amhākaṃ ācariyassa maggo.
tika-abh08t0:1251_2: yatoti yasmā kāmāvacarakusalaṃ asamānaphalaṃ hoti tihetukassa duhetukāhetukavipākānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1251_7: Ettha ca “kusala”nti avuttepi kāmāvacarapuññaṃvāti upamitattā upameyyassapi kusalabhāvo viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1251_11: tasmā tadūpanissayakusalaṃ tadanurūpato nānāvatthukaṃ vipākaṃ janeti.
tika-abh08t0:1251_12: Mahaggataṃ pana ācinanto ekavatthukāyeva bhavataṇhāya vasena ācinatīti tadanurūpato taṃ nānāvatthuṃ ajanetvā ekavatthumeva janetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1252_2: Tathā hi ye phassādayo kusale ca labbhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1252_9: mahantassa pana kusalavipākassa mahantāhiyeva upamāhi bhavitabbanti “gajādīna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1252_10: Apare apare attabhāve bhavaṃ vedanamassāti aparāpariyavedanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1253_4: saddena upacārato gahito kammānantaraṃyeva phalassa asambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1253_5: Na hi taṃ lokuttarakusalaṃ viya anantaraphalanipphādakaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1253_6: atha kho ekaccakāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya aparāpariyavedanaṃ ahutvā satipi anekeyeva kāmāvacarakamme mahogho
tika-abh08t0:1253_7: viya parittaṃ udakaṃ tamajjhottharitvā attanoyeva vipākadānena ekantena anantarabhaveyeva phalaṃ nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1253_8: Nanu ca aparihīnajjhānasseva kassaci nikantivasena kāmabhave paṭisandhi hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1253_9: Tathā hi tissamahābrahmā uparibrahmalokūpapattiyā bhāvitamaggo bhikkhūhi yācito tato cavitvā moggalibrāhmaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1253_10: gehe paṭisandhiṃ aggahesīti vuttanti taṃ kathanti?
tika-abh08t0:1253_11: Nikantibaleneva jhānaṃ parihāyatīti tato parihīnajjhāno nibbattatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1253_12: Apare pana ācariyā “anīvaraṇāvatthāya nikantiyā jhānassa parihāni vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbā”ti vatvā “satipi
tika-abh08t0:1253_15: sīlavato cetopaṇidhi visuddhattā’ti vacanato kāmabhave cetopaṇidhi mahaggatakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1254_1: Evaṃ avisesena kusalasadisataṃ atidisitvā idāni visesaṃ dassetuṃ “paṭipadākkamo cevā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1254_2: Yathā hi dukkhapaṭipadaṃ dandhābhiññaṃ jhānaṃ uppādetvā punappunaṃ samāpajjantassa taṃ jhānaṃ taṃpaṭipadameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1254_3: evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ aparihīne tassa tassa vipāko nibbattamāno taṃtaṃpaṭipadova bhavituṃ arahati.
tika-abh08t0:1254_4: Chandādhipateyyādibhāvo pana tasmiṃ khaṇe vijjamānānaṃ chandādīnaṃ adhipatipaccayabhāvena hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1254_6: Tathā hi ekameva jhānaṃ nānakkhaṇesu nānādhipateyyaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1254_7: tasmā vipākassa āgamanavasena chandādhipateyyāditā na gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:1254_9: Tadabhāvatova sarasato tassa hīnāditā na sambhavatīti sāpi jhānāgamanatova vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1257_0: Maggacittassa viya phalacittassa maggayogato bhedābhāvena “catumaggayogato”ti avatvā “catumaggasampayuttacittaphalattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1257_5: tikkhattuṃ vā phalasamāpattiyā aparicchinnaparimāṇaṃ pavattamānampi dvīsveva ṭhānesu pavattiyā duvidhameva
tika-abh08t0:1258_2: Maggo hi āgamanato “suññato”ti laddhanāmo saguṇālambaṇavasena animittaappaṇihitanāmampi labhatīti phalassa nāmattayampi deti,
tika-abh08t0:1258_3: tathā āgamanato appaṇihito maggo saguṇārammaṇavasena animittasuññataappaṇihitanāmakoti phalassa nāmattayampi deti.
tika-abh08t0:1258_4: Evañca katvā abhidhamme ekekassa phalassa tīṇi tīṇi nāmāni vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1258_5: Nanu ca abhidhamme “saguṇārammaṇato nāmaṃ anadhippeta”nti vuttaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1258_11: Idha pana ekekassa phalaṃ nāmattayampi labhatīti vavatthānappayojanābhāvato saguṇārammaṇehi laddhanāmadānassa adhippetattā tividhampi nāmaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t0:1258_13: itarathā vipassanāpi vipassato laddhanāmamaggassa taṃ na dadeyyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1258_17: Vaḷañjanaphalañhi visuṃ vipassanāvaseneva nibbattatīti tassa taṃvasena nāmalābho.
tika-abh08t0:1258_18: Yadi evaṃ maggassa viya animittanāmalābho na siyā? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1258_19: yathā maggānantarassa phalassa viya vaḷañjanakaphalasamāpattiyāpi maggāgamanato ca jhānapaṭipadābhedo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1259_7: taṃsadisatāya vā tamupādāya maggoti vuccati “maggaṅgaṃ maggapariyāpanna”ntiādīsūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1262_0: Yathā atiiṭṭhe iṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedasambhavato kusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu duvidhā hoti somanassasahagatā,
tika-abh08t0:1262_2: evaṃ atianiṭṭhe aniṭṭhamajjhatte ca ārammaṇe vedanābhedo natthīti akusalavipākamanoviññāṇadhātu ekavidhāvāti “sattākusalavipākānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1262_3: Sati hi tattha vedanābhede atianiṭṭhe domanassena bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1262_4: na ca paṭighena vinā domanassaṃ uppajjatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1262_6: Ettha ca akusalavipākesu labbhamānadukkhaṃ viya nātikaṭukāpi upekkhā ekantanihīnassa akusalassa vipākabhāvato dukkhasabhāvattā hīnā eva.
tika-abh08t0:1262_7: Na hi akusalassa vipāko adukkho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1262_8: upekkhābhāvo panassa balavatā bādhiyamānassa paṭipaharituṃ asakkontassa dubbalapurisassa tena kariyamānabādhassa upekkhanā viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Imāni…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1262_9: cittānīti imāni satta ekekassa akusalassa vipākacittāni,
tika-abh08t0:1262_11: Uddhaccasahagatassapi hi pavattiyaṃ satteva vipākā labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1262_12: Kasmā panettha yathā kusalavipākaṃ sahetukampi uddhaṭaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1262_16: alobhādīnampi ekantamanavajjasabhāvānaṃ vā kāraṇassa tabbidūratāya nattheva akusalavipākabhāvo.
tika-abh08t0:1262_17: Na hi alobhādīnaṃ paṭipakkhalobhādayo te abhinipphādenti,
tika-abh08t0:1262_18: tasmā idaṃ sabbathā sahetuppavattiyā asambhavato ahetukamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1264_2: Tesaṃ aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu pavattivacanena tabbipariyāyena kusalavipākānaṃ iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattavisayesu
tika-abh08t0:1264_3: pavatti atthato āpannāti sā visuṃ na vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1268_2: pākasaṅkhātassa vā asurassa vināsanato pākasāsano vuccati sakko devarājā,
tika-abh08t0:1270_1: na pana puññakiriyavatthuvasena khīṇāsavasantānagatassa puññakiriyabhāvābhāvatoti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh08t0:1271_1: ābhuñjati oṇojeti pariṇāmeti vāretīti vā attho.
tika-abh08t0:1271_5: anuppabandhato pavattanakaṃ bhavaṅgacittasantānaṃ parato pavattituṃ adatvā āpāthagataṃ vā ārammaṇaṃ aññattha gantuṃ adatvā vāreti.
tika-abh08t0:1271_12: āvajjanaṃ tāva apubbārammaṇe sakideva ca pavattamānasantativicchedavasena pavattanato,
tika-abh08t0:1271_13: dubbalabhavaṅgapaccayaṃ vā sabbathā visayarasamanubhavituṃ na sakkotīti iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha upekkhāyuttameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1271_14: Voṭṭhabbanañca vuttavipariyāyena vedanābhedārahampi samānaṃ vipākappabandhaṃ vicchinditvā visadisacittappabandhassa
tika-abh08t0:1271_15: nibbattanato santatipariṇāmaneyeva kiccantare byāvaṭattā vipākaṃ viya ārammaṇarasassāde asamatthamevāti
tika-abh08t0:1271_17: Hasituppādaṃ pana vuttaviparītato parihīnavipallāsānaṃ khīṇāsavānaṃ santāne iṭṭhārammaṇeyeva uppajjanato sabbathā somanassasahagatamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1272_0: Lakkhaṇādito panetāsu purimaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purecaraṃ rūpādivijānanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1273_7: Padhānasāruppañhi ṭhānaṃ disvā diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthāya “sāruppamidaṃ ṭhānaṃ mayā laddha”nti tusantassa cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t0:1273_8: bhaṇḍabhājanaṭṭhāne mahāsaddaṃ sutvā “evarūpā loluppataṇhā me pahīnā”ti tusantassa sotadvāre saddārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t0:1273_9: gandhehi vā pupphehi vā cetiyapūjanakāle “evarūpena vata sugandhena bhagavantaṃ pūjemī”ti tusantassa ghānadvāre gandhārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t0:1273_10: rasasampannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ sabrahmacārīhi saha bhājetvā paribhuñjanakāle “sāraṇīyadhammo vata me pūrito”ti tusantassa jivhādvāre rasārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t0:1273_11: ābhisamācārikavattapūraṇakāle “kāyena vattapaṭivattaṃ pūremī”ti tusantassa kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇeti evaṃ pañcadvāresu pañcārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1274_0: Manodvāre pana yathāvuttesveva pañcasu paccuppannārammaṇesu ghaṭikārasuttādīsu viya bhagavato pubbenivāsañāṇena pariññāte atītārammaṇe,
tika-abh08t0:1274_1: “aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho bhavissatī”ti āgataṭṭhānādīsu viya anāgataṃsañāṇena paricchinne anāgatārammaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1274_2: cāti evaṃ chasvevārammaṇesu hasitaṃ uppādetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1274_3: Nanu ca atītaṃsādīsu appaṭihatādīsu appaṭihatañāṇaṃ vatvā “imehi tīhi dhammehi samannāgatassa buddhassa
tika-abh08t0:1274_4: bhagavato sabbaṃ kāyakammaṃ ñāṇapubbaṅgamaṃ ñāṇānuparivatta”nti vacanato vicāraṇapaññārahitāya etāya
tika-abh08t0:1274_6: Hasituppādacittena pavattiyamānampi bhagavato sitakaraṇaṃ pubbenivāsaanāgataṃsasabbaññutaññāṇānaṃ anuvattakattā ñāṇānuparivattiyeva,
tika-abh08t0:1274_7: evaṃ pana ñāṇānuparivattibhāve sati na koci pāḷivirodho.
tika-abh08t0:1274_8: Evañca katvā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “tesaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ciṇṇapariyante idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1274_10: itarathā aññassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa ahetukacittassa bhagavato uppatti na yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1274_11: Na hi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakassa taṃsamuṭṭhitāya viññattiyā kāyakammādibhāvaṃ āpajjanabhāvo vibandhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1274_12: Evañca katvā pañcadvāre iminā cittena somanassuppādanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1274_15: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pañcadvāre “somanassito hotī”ti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1274_17: Idha pana “hasituppādakiccā”ti avisesavacanaṃ pañcadvāre somanassakaraṇavasena pavattassapi manodvāre
tika-abh08t0:1275_5: anāvaraṇañāṇanti imāni cha paccekabuddhādīhi asādhāraṇāni ñāṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:1275_8: tathā hi yadi sabbaññutaññāṇato aññamanāvaraṇañāṇaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1275_9: tassa sāvaraṇattā sāvaraṇe ca visaye sabhāvapaṭivedhābhāvato sabbaññubhāvaṃ na sijjheyya,
tika-abh08t0:1275_10: anāvaraṇañāṇassa ca asabbadhammārammaṇabhāvena yattha taṃ na pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1275_14: tattha ca āvaraṇābhāvato nissaṅgavāramupādāya anāvaraṇañāṇanti evaṃ visayapavattibhedena aññehi asādhāraṇabhāvadassanatthaṃ dvedhā vuttanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1277_0: Idha ṭhatvāti hasitassa uppādanato hasitassa uppādananti vuttacittassa āgataṭṭhāne ṭhatvā.
tika-abh08t0:1277_2: Kiñcāpi rūpāvacarakiriyānaṃ jhānaṅgappahānaṃ vipāke viya āgamanato ahutvā kusale viya bhāvanāvisesena pavattākāramattaṃva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1277_3: paṭhamajjhānassa pana pahānaṅgasambhavābhāvato ekassa vaseneva niddisituṃ sesānampi pahānaṅgaṃ avatvā sampayogaṅgameva tesu dassitanti.
tika-abh08t0:1278_1: Yasmā pana bhāvanāvasena pavattākāramattaṃ vinā bhāvanāya kātabbassa nīvaraṇappahānādikiccassa abhāvato ujukaṃ bhāvanā nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1279_2: Samāpannā sace kriyāti ettha kiñcāpi sā eva samāpatti samāpajjituṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh08t0:1279_5: paṭhamajjhānādikameva paṭilabhitvā dutiyajjhānādikaṃ samāpajjituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvato ca,
tika-abh08t0:1279_6: pubbe paṭiladdhasamāpattisadisaṃ puna samāpajjanato puthujjanakālasmiṃ abhinibbattitasamāpattisadisā ettha sā eva tathā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1280_3: tadāssa arahato uppattiyā kiriyabhāvo icchitabbo siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1280_4: Sakiṃyeva pana pavattati catusaccapaṭivedhakiccassa ekavāreneva pariniṭṭhānato,
tika-abh08t0:1280_5: takkiccena ca vinā tassa anupalabbhanīyattā. Tenāha –
tika-abh08t0:1280_7: tasmā natthi lokuttaraṃ kiriyacittanti ayamettha adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1281_1: desakoti yā āpattiyo kāyavācāhi akātabbaṃ katvā āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1281_3: yā pana āpattiyo kāyavācāhi kātabbaṃ akaronto āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1281_6: kiriyākiriyā ca tā āpajjitabbato āpattiyo cāti kiriyākiriyāpattiyo,
tika-abh08t0:1281_17: Atha vā ekantamiṭṭhavipākattā hitāti kusalānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1281_22: tesaṃ kiriyākiriyāmattamavipākabhāvaṃ kātuṃ icchatīti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato.
tika-abh08t0:1281_23: Atha vā hitāhitānaṃ puggalānaṃ sakiriyākiriyāya attano attano kiccassa idhalokaparalokanipphādanassa karaṇe rato abhiratoti hitāhitānaṃ…pe… rato.
tika-abh08t0:1282_1: Sabbe lokuttare aṭṭha katvā ye ekūnanavuti cittuppādā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1282_6: uggaṇhitvā pana na kevalaṃ uggahaṇamatteyeva ṭhātabbanti dassento āha “cintetabbo punappuna”nti,
tika-abh08t0:1282_7: na hi sakkā uggahaṇamattenevettha sabbathā sanniṭṭhānaṃ gantunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1282_15: Idha lokasmiñhi chandarāgappahānavasena imaṃ lokaṃ taranti,
tika-abh08t0:1282_16: āyatiṃ bhavūpapādakassa kammassa kammakkhayakarañāṇena vināsanato paralokaṃ taranti,
tika-abh08t0:1288_1: Ettāvatā ca cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ nibbānanti evaṃ uddiṭṭhesu catūsu dhammesu cittaṃ tāva jātibhūmisampayogappavattākārādivasena
tika-abh08t0:1288_2: vibhāgena niddisitvā idāni tadanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhe cetasikadhamme niddisituṃ “cittānantaramuddiṭṭhā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1288_4: tesu tesu cittesu yathārahaṃ sampayogavasena visuṃ visuṃ bhājanañca.
tika-abh08t0:1289_1: yesaṃ vibhājanaṃ vuccatīti te saha nibbacanena sarūpato dassetuṃ “tattha cittasampayuttā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1289_3: Tena ye cittena saha sampayogalakkhaṇena yuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1289_8: Tattha yadi ekuppādatāmatteneva ca sampayuttatā adhippetā,
tika-abh08t0:1289_9: sahuppattikānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1289_10: Evampi avinibbhogarūpānaṃ aññamaññasampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekavatthuka- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1289_11: Evampi “avinibbhogarūpesu ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ sesamahābhūtopādārūpānaṃ nissayapaccayo hotīti tasmā tāni ekavatthukānīti,
tika-abh08t0:1289_12: cakkhādīnaṃ nissayabhūtāni vā bhūtāni ekaṃ vatthu etesu nissitanti ekavatthukānī”ti kappentassa tesaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1290_1: nānāvīthiyaṃ parasantāne ca ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ bhinnavatthukānaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekavatthuka- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1290_2: Evampi maraṇāsannavīthiyaṃ sampaṭicchanasantīraṇādīnaṃ sampayuttatā āpajjeyyāti ekanirodha- ggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1290_3: Kiṃ pana nānuppādāpi evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1290_4: atha ekuppādā evāti vicāraṇāya ekuppādā eva evaṃ tividhalakkhaṇā hontīti dassanatthaṃ “ekuppādā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1290_5: Iti imehi catūhi sampayogalakkhaṇehi ye cittasampayuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1290_6: te cetasikā nāmāti evaṃ cetasikalakkhaṇaṃ ṭhapitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1290_7: Kathaṃ panete cetasikā nāmāti āha “citte bhavā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1290_10: saddena saha samānatthatāya atthamattaṃ dassetuṃ “citte bhavā cetasikā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1291_1: karuṇāmuditādayo viya kadāci anuppajjitvā yadā yadā taṃ cittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1291_2: tadā tadāva tena avinibhuttā hutvā jāyamānāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1291_3: Sarūpena āgatāti chandādayo viya “ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1291_7: Ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti kiccabhedaṃ anāmasitvā kevalaṃ asambhinnadhammavaseneva ekenūnā tiṃsa dhammā.
tika-abh08t0:1291_8: Pāḷiyaṃ pana cittena saha tiṃsa dhamme gahetvā tesaṃ kiccabhedato gahaṇena chappaññāsa dhammā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1291_15: Tettiṃsa hontīti teyeva ekūnatiṃsa dhammāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1292_7: saddassa drabyavuttitāya tappurisassa ca uttarapadatthappadhānatāya “karuṇāpubbabhāgo”tiādinā pulliṅgena vuttaṃ. Eta-
tika-abh08t0:1292_8: saddassa pana guṇavuttitāya guṇavisesavati vattamāno tassa liṅgavasena pariṇamatīti karuṇāmuditāpekkhāya “etā”ti itthiliṅgavasena vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1292_11: Teneva hi “karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā”ti vikappo vuttoti.
tika-abh08t0:1292_14: Karuṇā hi dukkhitasatte ārabbha tesaṃ dukkhāpanayanakāmatāvasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1292_16: tasmā ubhinnampi bhinnavisayattā na ekasmiṃ citte uppatti sambhavatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1292_20: Ko viratīti tīsu ekā virati uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1292_23: sammāājīvaṃ pūrentī tatiyā virati uppajjatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1292_24: Karuṇāmuditāhi saha na uppajjanti tāsaṃ paññattārammaṇattā,
tika-abh08t0:1292_26: Aññamaññena ca na uppajjanti aññamaññassapi bhinnavisayattā.
tika-abh08t0:1292_27: Micchākammantādīnañhi ārammaṇāneva yathākkamaṃ sammākammantādīnaṃ ārammaṇāni tato viratibhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1294_7: Abyāpādena mettā gahitā tasseva hitākārappavattikāle mettābhāvūpagamanato.
tika-abh08t0:1294_9: Tatramajjhattatāya upekkhā gahitā tāyeva sattesu majjhattākārappavattāya upekkhābrahmavihārabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1294_11: ariyasāvakabhāvena vā tassa bhagavato puttatāya ādicco bandhu imassa,
tika-abh08t0:1297_0: Evaṃ dhammuddhāraṃ karontena bhagavatā phassādayo tiṃsa dhamme chappaññāsa katvā phassapañcakarāsi jhānapañcakarāsi
tika-abh08t0:1297_1: indriyaṭṭhakarāsi maggapañcakarāsi balasattakarāsi hetuttikarāsi kammapathatikarāsi lokapāladukarāsi
tika-abh08t0:1297_2: chayugaḷadukarāsi upakāradukarāsi yuganandhadukarāsi vīriyasamathadukarāsīti sattarasannaṃ rāsīnaṃ vasena
tika-abh08t0:1298_1: Etesupi cittaṃ tāva phassapañcakaṃ patvā “cittaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1298_15: Vedanā pana phassapañcakaṃ patvā “vedanā hotī”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1298_18: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo tīsu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
tika-abh08t0:1298_19: Vīriyaṃ pana indriyāni patvā “vīriyindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1298_27: Evaṃ ime dve dhammā catūsu ṭhānesu vibhattā.
tika-abh08t0:1298_28: Samādhi pana jhānaṅgāni patvā “cittassekaggatā hotī”ti vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1298_34: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo chasu ṭhānesu vibhatto.
tika-abh08t0:1298_35: Paññā pana indriyāni patvā “paññindriyaṃ hotī”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1298_42: Evamayaṃ eko dhammo sattasu ṭhānesu vibhattoti evamete dvādasa dhammā indriyāditaṃtaṃkiccavantatāya dviṭṭhānikādibhedena sattarasasu rāsīsu vibhattā.
tika-abh08t0:1298_43: Itare aṭṭhārasa kiccavasena bhedābhāvato ekaṭṭhānikāyevāti imesu sattarasasu rāsīsu yevāpanakadhammā
tika-abh08t0:1298_44: ekarāsimpi na bhajanti taṃtaṃkiccabhāvatoti katvā vuttaṃ “rāsiṃ bhajanti nā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1299_0: Nanu cete kiñcāpi sesarāsayo na bhajanti tesaṃ sadisakiccasaṅgahavasena ṭhitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1299_1: Phassapañcakarāsi pana khandhasaṅgahavaseneva ṭhapitoti cetanāya viya nesaṃ saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahato tattha samavarodho yuttoti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1299_2: khandhasaṅgahavasena ṭhapitopi hi phassapañcakarāsi sabbacittasādhāraṇadhamme saṅgahetvā ṭhapitoti chandādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1299_4: manasikārassa ca satipi sabbacittasādhāraṇatte nippariyāyato saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahābhāvato na etesaṃ phassapañcakarāsibhajanampi yuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1299_5: Kasmā pana manasikārassa nippariyāyato saṅkhārakkhandhasaṅgahābhāvoti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1299_6: ṭhapetvā cetanaṃ sesadhammānaṃ sakasakakiccesupi parādhīnabhāvena pavattanato abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nippariyāyato na labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1299_8: cittekaggatājīvitindriyānaṃ sabbacittasādhāraṇattā vedanāviññāṇāni viya tāni phassapañcake vattabbāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1299_10: tasmā ṭhapetvā cetanaṃ sesadhammānaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇaṃ nippariyāyato na labbhatīti na tesaṃ nippariyāyato khandhasaṅgaho labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1299_11: Cetanāyayeva pana sakiccaparakiccasādhanavasena pavattanato nippariyāyato abhisaṅkharaṇalakkhaṇassa atthitāya khandhasaṅgaho labbhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1299_12: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ phasso phassapañcake vuttoti?
tika-abh08t0:1299_15: phuṭṭho sañjānātī”tiādivacanato vedanā saññā cetanā viññāṇanti imesaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ uddesaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā
tika-abh08t0:1299_16: tesaṃ paccayassapi uddisitukāmatāya phasso tattha vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1299_18: Adhimokkho hi samādhissa paribyattabhāve paribyattabhāvato samādhāyattavutti,
tika-abh08t0:1299_19: manasikāropi cetanāya paribyattabhāvato cetanāyattavuttīti parāyattāva te honti.
tika-abh08t0:1301_2: Sabbepi cetasikā cittāyattā cittakiriyabhāvena vuccantīti “cittassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1301_4: Evaṃ mahāsaṃghikamataṃ dassetvā idāni tameva vitthāretuṃ “phusitvā panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1301_6: atha tena phuṭṭhaṃ dutiyaṃ vedanā vediyati,
tika-abh08t0:1301_7: evaṃ etehi phuṭṭhaveditaṃ tatiyaṃ saññā sañjānāti,
tika-abh08t0:1301_8: tehi pana phuṭṭhaveditasaññāte catutthaṃ cetanāya sampayuttadhamme abhisandahatī”tiādinā vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1301_9: Balavapaccayattāti yathā pāsādaṃ patvā thambhā sesadabbasambhārānaṃ balavapaccayā,
tika-abh08t0:1302_2: so “cittajāna”nti imassa anantaraṃ daṭṭhabbo. Kasmā? Cittānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1302_3: cittajānañca ekuppādādibhāvena saheva pavattitoti evamettha padasambandho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1302_5: evaṃ “paṭhamābhinipātattā”ti kāraṇaṃ pariharitvā idāni “balavapaccayattā”ti idaṃ pariharanto āha “balava…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1302_9: Sesadhammānampi hi sahajātapaccayabhāvassa sādhāraṇattā tasseva balavapaccayabhāve na kiñci kāraṇaṃ dissatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1302_24: desanāvārena pana phassova paṭhamaṃ vuttoti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1302_26: evaṃ sesadhammesupi pubbāparakkamo nāma na pariyesitabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1303_3: Sampayuttadhammā hi ārammaṇe pavattamānā taṃ phusanalakkhaṇena phassena phusantā viya honti,
tika-abh08t0:1303_8: Ayañhi ārammaṇe anallīyamānopi rūpaṃ viya cakkhuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1303_9: saddo viya ca sotaṃ cittamārammaṇañca ghaṭṭeti.
tika-abh08t0:1303_10: Pañcadvāresu vā vatthārammaṇasaṃghaṭṭanena sampajjatīti saṃghaṭṭanasampattiko phasso “saṃghaṭṭanaraso”ti vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1303_11: Yathā “dve pāṇī vajjeyyu”ntiādīsu pāṇimhi ghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūtā rūpadhammā,
tika-abh08t0:1303_12: evaṃ cittassa ārammaṇe saṃghaṭṭanaṃ tabbisesabhūto eko cetasikadhammo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1303_13: Tiṇṇaṃ sannipātasaṅkhātassa attano kāraṇassa vasena paveditattā sannipātapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1303_15: tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso”ti hi vacanato cakkhurūpaviññāṇādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ sannipātavasena gahetabbatāya upaṭṭhānato
tika-abh08t0:1303_16: sannipātasaṅkhātassa kāraṇassa vasena upaṭṭhānamassāti upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena paccupaṭṭhānena sannipātapaccupaṭṭhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1303_18: Tajjasamannāhārena ceva indriyena ca parikkhate visaye anantarāyeneva uppajjanato āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1303_19: Ayañhi tassa phassassa kāraṇabhūto tadanurūpabhūto samannāhāroti tajjasamannāhārasaṅkhātena āvajjanena
tika-abh08t0:1303_20: ceva cakkhādiindriyena ca yathākkamaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇatadabhimukhabhāvavasena parikkhate abhisaṅkhāte āpāthagateyeva
tika-abh08t0:1303_21: visaye ekantena uppajjanato āpāthagato visayo padaṭṭhānaṃ āsannakāraṇaṃ imassāti āpāthagatavisayapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1304_1: svāyaṃ arūpadhammo samāno kathaṃ phusanalakkhaṇo hotīti antolīnacodanaṃ manasi katvā tassā sodhanatthaṃ “arūpadhammopi samāno”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1304_2: Tattha “phusanākāreneva pavattatī”ti iminā arūpassāpi sato tassa dhammassa ayaṃ sabhāvoti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1304_3: Sā ca tassa phusanākārappavatti ambilaṃ ambapakkādiṃ khādantaṃ passantassa parassa kheḷuppattiparaṃ bādhiyamānaṃ disvā dayālukassa sarīrakampanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1304_4: rukkhasākhagge duṭṭhitaṃ purisaṃ disvā bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitassa purisassa jaṅghacalanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1304_5: pisācādibhāyitabbaṃ disvā ūrupatthambhoti evamādi viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1305_12: tattha iṭṭhākārānubhavanaṃ kusalākusalacittasampayuttavedanāya labbhati tassā aniṭṭhassapi kappanāvasena iṭṭhākārena gahaṇato,
tika-abh08t0:1305_13: sabhāvato pana iṭṭhānubhavanaṃ abyākatacittasampayuttāyapi labbhati tassā vipallāsaggāhābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1305_19: ekaṃsato pana issaravatāya sāmibhāvena vedanāva ārammaṇarasaṃ anubhavati,
tika-abh08t0:1306_0: Nīlādibhedassa ārammaṇassa sañjānanaṃ tameva saññaṃ katvā jānanaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti sañjānanalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1306_4: Sā hi uppajjamānā pacchā sañjānanassa kāraṇabhūtaṃ saṇṭhānādikaṃ ākāraṃ gahetvā uppajjatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1306_5: Idañca nimittakārikāya nimittena sañjānantiyā ca sabbāya samānasaññāya yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1306_6: Nimittena sañjānantīpi hi puna aparāya saññāya ca sañjānanassa nimittaṃ karotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1306_8: Taṃ panetaṃ abhiññāṇakaraṇaṃ kathaṃ daṭṭhabbanti āha “vaḍḍhakissa abhiññāṇakaraṇamivā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1306_10: idaṃ adho”ti evaṃ pacchā sañjānanapaccayabhūtassa saññāṇassa karaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1306_12: Hatthidassakaandho viya “idameva sacca”nti saññāya yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesakaraṇato yathā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1306_14: Etena saññāya ākāraggahaṇaṃ katvā ṭhitassa diṭṭhiādīnaṃ uppajjanato akusalasaññāya anurūpavasena phalapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1306_16: tasmā upaparikkhābhāvena yathāgahitanimittavasena abhinivesākārena upaṭṭhānato ākārapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1306_17: Tiṇapurisakesu migapotakānaṃ “purisā”ti uppannasaññā viya avikappasabhāvattā yathāupaṭṭhitavisayapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1306_18: Ettha ca ñāṇavippayuttasaññāya ākāraggahaṇavasena uppajjanakāle cittaṃ abbohārikaṃ saññānugatikaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1306_19: Ñāṇasampayutte citte pana sasambhārapathaviyā anugatā sesadhātuyo viya saññācittañca abbohārikaṃ ñāṇānugatikaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1307_1: “gaṇhatha gaṇhathā”ti vadantī viya sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe payojeti,
tika-abh08t0:1307_3: Cetayitalakkhaṇāti niddokkantassa pabuddhakkhaṇe sambhamappavatti viya cetaso ussāhatāva lakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1307_8: Saṃvidahanapaccupaṭṭhānāti “tvaṃ idaṃ karohī”ti vicārentī viya hotīti vicāraṇapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1307_9: Etāya hi pavattamānāya sabbepi sampayuttadhammā yathā sakiccapasutā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1307_11: Jeṭṭhasisso pare sajjhāyane uyyojento sayampi sajjhāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1307_13: Mahāvaḍḍhakismimpi vaḍḍhakikammaṃ kātuṃ āraddhe itarepi karonti yevāti āha “jeṭṭhasissamahāvaḍḍhakiādayo viyā”ti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1308_0: Yathāpaccayaṃ pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ natthi kāci vasavattitāti vasavattibhāvanivāraṇatthaṃ “vitakkanaṃ vitakko”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1308_3: Yasmā cittaṃ vitakkabalena ārammaṇaṃ abhiruḷhaṃ viya hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1308_5: Yathā hi koci gāmavāsī puriso rājavallabhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1308_6: taṃsambandhinaṃ mittaṃ vā nissāya rājagehaṃ ārohati anupavisati,
tika-abh08t0:1308_7: evaṃ vitakkaṃ nissāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh08t0:1308_8: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati,
tika-abh08t0:1308_11: tasmā sabhāvato bhāvanābalena tattha anuppajjanako? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1308_13: Yathā hi so puriso paricayena tena vināpi nirāsaṅko rājagehaṃ pavisati,
tika-abh08t0:1308_14: evaṃ paricayena vitakkena vināpi avitakkacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārohati.
tika-abh08t0:1308_15: Paricayoti cettha santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattacittabhāvanāsaṅkhāto paricayo.
tika-abh08t0:1308_16: Vitakkassa hi santāne abhiṇhaṃ pavattassa vasena cittassa ārammaṇābhirohanaṃ ciraparicitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1308_17: tena taṃ cittaṃ kadāci vitakkena vināpi tattha vattateva.
tika-abh08t0:1308_18: Yathā taṃ ñāṇasahitaṃ hutvā sammasanavasena ciraparicitaṃ kadāci ñāṇarahitampi sammasanavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1308_19: yathā vā kilesasahitaṃ hutvā pavattaṃ sabbaso kilesarahitampi paricayena kilesavāsanāvasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1309_0: Atha vā dvipañcaviññāṇaṃ avitakkampi vatthārammaṇaghaṭṭanassa balavatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1309_1: dutiyajjhānādīni ca heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimabhāvanāya balavatāya ārammaṇaṃ ārohatīti. Ādito,
tika-abh08t0:1309_2: abhimukhaṃ vā hananaṃ paharaṇamattaṃ āhananaṃ, parito,
tika-abh08t0:1309_3: parivattetvā vā hananaṃ visesena paharaṇaṃ pariyāhananaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1309_5: Tathā hi tena yogāvacaro ārammaṇaṃ vitakkāhataṃ vitakkapariyāhataṃ karotīti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1310_1: hetubhūtena vā cittaṃ ārammaṇe vicarati anuvicarati,
tika-abh08t0:1310_2: avicāracittassa pana avitakkacitte vuttānusārena pavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1310_4: Svāyaṃ viseso santānamhi labbhamāno javanasantāne pākaṭo hotīti daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1310_6: Ārammaṇassa anumajjanaṃ anumasanaṃ parimajjanamassa lakkhaṇanti ārammaṇānumajjanalakkhaṇo.
tika-abh08t0:1310_11: Dhammānañhi sabhāvavinimuttā kāci kiriyā nāma natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1310_12: Tathāgahetabbākāro bodhaneyyajanānurodhena paramatthato ekasabhāvopi sabhāvadhammo pariyāyavacanehi visayasamāropitarūpehi bahūhi pakārehi pakāsīyati.
tika-abh08t0:1310_14: Anupabandhapaccupaṭṭhānoti ārammaṇe cittassa avicchinnassa viya pavattipaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1311_0: Ettha ca vicārato oḷārikaṭṭhena tasseva pubbaṅgamaṭṭhena paṭhamaghaṇṭābhiravo viya cetaso paṭhamābhinipāto vitakko,
tika-abh08t0:1311_2: Yathā hi ghaṇṭābhighātajo paṭhamābhiravo anuravato oḷāriko,
tika-abh08t0:1311_6: Tato sukhumaṭṭhena anumajjanasabhāvena ca ghaṇṭānuravo viya anupabandho vicāro.
tika-abh08t0:1311_7: Vipphāravā cettha vitakko cittassa paṭhamuppattikāle cittassa paripphandanabhūto ākāse uppatitukāmassa sakuṇassa pakkhavikkhepo viya,
tika-abh08t0:1311_11: padumassa uparibhāge paribbhamanaṃ viya ca padumābhimukhapatitassa bhamarassa.
tika-abh08t0:1312_0: “Ākāse gacchato mahāsakuṇassa ubhohi pakkhehi vātaṃ gahetvā pakkhe sannisīdāpetvā gamanaṃ viya ārammaṇe cetaso abhiniropanabhāvena pavatto vitakko,
tika-abh08t0:1312_1: vātaggahaṇatthaṃ pakkhe phandāpayamānassa gamanaṃ viya anumajjanabhāvena pavatto vicāro”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1313_2: appanāyaṃ vā santānena pavattiyaṃ vitakko niccalo hutvā ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1314_5: attanā sampayuttacittasamuṭṭhānehi rūpehi sakalarūpakāyabyāpanaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1314_6: Na hi aññathā imissā pharaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1315_1: yena pana dhammena yogato taṃ ekaggaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1315_5: nivāte dīpasikhāya ṭhiti viya cittassa ṭhitīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1315_12: Avūpasamalakkhaṇassa vikkhepassa paṭipakkhatāya cittassa upasamanākārena paccupaṭṭhātīti upasamapaccupaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1315_14: Sukhavirahitopi hi atthi samādhīti so yebhuyyena sukhapadaṭṭhāno hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1315_16: “Sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti vacanato hi sukhaṃ samādhissa visesakāraṇaṃ sukhavirahitassapi tadupanissayeneva samijjhanato.
tika-abh08t0:1316_0: Saddahanti etāyāti kammaphalādisaddahanakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena saddhāya paccayataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1316_1: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathā paccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo “saddahatī”ti voharīyati.
tika-abh08t0:1316_5: puggalasseva vā pasādaṃ anāvilabhāvakāraṇaṃ kiccametissāti pasādanarasā.
tika-abh08t0:1316_10: Na hi saddhāya avatthubhūtesu titthiyādīsu sā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1316_11: Sā panāyaṃ kusaladhammānaṃ ādāne hattho viya,
tika-abh08t0:1317_0: Saranti 237 etāyāti saraṇakiriyāya pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ tattha ādhipaccabhāvena satiyā paccayataṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1317_1: Tassā hi dhammānaṃ tathā paccayabhāve sati taṃsamaṅgipuggalo “saratī”ti voharīyati.
tika-abh08t0:1317_2: Udake alābu viya pilavitvā gantuṃ adatvā pāsāṇassa viya niccalassa ārammaṇassa ṭhapanaṃ asammuṭṭhatākaraṇaṃ apilāpanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1317_4: Sā hi ārammaṇe daḷhaṃ patiṭṭhitattā esikā viya vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1317_7: “Satārakkhena cetasā viharatī”ti vuttattā cetoguṇaratanahārakānaṃ kilesacorānaṃ nivāraṇato āha “ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1317_8: Tathā hesā cakkhudvārādirakkhanato dovāriko viyāti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1317_9: Paṭhamaṃ saññāya thiruppannabhāve pacchā satiyā patiṭṭhānabhāvato āha “thirasaññāpadaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1317_13: paṭhamaṃ aggahite pana saññākiccaṃ appadhānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1317_14: sati pana paṭhamaṃ aggahitanimittampi sarati gahitanimittampi,
tika-abh08t0:1317_15: gahitanimitte pana satikiccaṃ guṇabhūtaṃ hotīti idameva tāsaṃ nānattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1318_0: Vīrabhāvoti yena vīriyena vīro nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1318_2: Vīrānaṃ vā kammanti yena kammena vīro nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1318_5: Dhammavinimuttaṃ vā kiñci kammaṃ natthīti vīriyameva kammabhāvena vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1318_9: Upatthambhanaṃ pana sampayuttadhammānaṃ kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā dhāraṇaṃ anubalappadānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1319_7: Gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati,
tika-abh08t0:1319_8: lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ labhati…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1320_0: Evaṃ vuttāni etāni anurūpapaccavekkhaṇasahitāni aṭṭha vīriyārambhavatthūni,
tika-abh08t0:1320_2: Ettha ca vitakko sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇaṃ āropeti.
tika-abh08t0:1320_4: Vīriyaṃ pana te saṃsīdituṃ adatvā ussāhetīti ayaṃ vitakkacetanāvīriyānaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1321_2: Visayassa ārammaṇassa obhāsanaṃ pakāsanaṃ tappaṭicchādakasammohandhakārassa vidhamanatoti visayobhāsanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1321_4: Katthaci visaye asammuyhanākārena sammohapaṭipakkhatāya vā paccupaṭṭhānato sammohābhāvassa paccupaṭṭhānato vā asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1322_0: Attanā anupāletabbānaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ anupālanaṃ jīvitassa byāpāro,
tika-abh08t0:1322_1: tañca tesaṃ jīvananti taṃ tassa kāraṇabhāvaṃ purakkhatvā vuttaṃ “jīvanti tenā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1322_2: Rūpārūpajīvitindriyassa anurūpato lakkhaṇādikaṃ dassetuṃ “attanā avinibhuttāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1322_3: “Sampayuttāna”nti hi vuccamāne rūpadhammānaṃ sampayogābhāvato rūpajīvitindriyassa saṅgaho na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1322_4: “Avinibhuttāna”nti pana vuttattā yāni avinibbhogarūpāni rūpajīvitindriyena saddhiṃ avinibhuttāni avisaṃsaṭṭhāni.
tika-abh08t0:1322_7: Pavattanarasanti uppādato yāva bhaṅgā anupālanato antarā anivattanasabhāvasādhanena tesaṃ pavattanakiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1322_9: arūpajīvitindriyaṃ uppādato paṭṭhāya pavattiyā paccayo”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1322_11: Paṭṭhāne hi “abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca indriyapaccayaṃ kammapaccayasadisa”nti
tika-abh08t0:1322_13: tasmā rūpajīvitindriyampi uppādato paṭṭhāya paccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1322_15: Anupālanavasena yāpayitabbā pavattetabbā dhammā padaṭṭhānamassāti yāpayitabbadhammapadaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1322_25: Tattha taḷākagataudakassa gahaṇe attanā anupāletabbadhammānaṃ atthikkhaṇe anupālanaṃ sādhitaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1322_26: daṇḍagatajalassa pana gahaṇe attano atthikkhaṇe anupālanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1322_27: Attanā anuppāditadhamme kathaṃ pāletīti āha “dhāti viya kumāra”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1322_34: bhaṅgato uddhampi kiṃ pana pavattetīti āha “na bhaṅgato uddha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1322_36: Bhaṅgakkhaṇe pana kathanti āha “na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapetī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1323_5: atthato vā alubbhanākāro eva ca so hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1323_8: Alaggabhāvo ārammaṇaṃ nissāya pavattantassapi tattha anāsattatā.
tika-abh08t0:1323_12: So hi muttarāgattā katthaci mamāyanarahito hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1323_15: Yathā hi tassa purisassa satipi kāyena allīyane bhāvo anallīno,
tika-abh08t0:1323_16: evaṃ alobhopi ārammaṇakaraṇavasena gahitepi ārammaṇe alaggabhāvena anallīnabhāvo anallīnākāroyeva pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1324_5: Āghātavinayanarasoti ettha āghāto nāma parassa attānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1324_7: parasseva ca paraṃ uddissa pavatto upanāho balavakopo.
tika-abh08t0:1325_4: Hirī pāpe gūthe viya passantī jigucchatīti āha “pāpato jigucchanalakkhaṇā hirī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1325_5: Ottappaṃ te uṇhaṃ viya passantaṃ tato uttasatīti vuttaṃ “uttāsalakkhaṇaṃ ottappa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1325_6: Ubhopi pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasāti lajjanākārena pāpānaṃ akaraṇarasā hirī,
tika-abh08t0:1325_8: Pāpato saṅkocanapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttappakāreneva pāpato saṅkocanākārena paccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1325_13: Attānañhi garuṃ katvā hiriyā pāpaṃ pajahati kulavadhū viya.
tika-abh08t0:1325_14: Paraṃ garuṃ katvā ottappena pāpaṃ pajahati vesiyā viya.
tika-abh08t0:1325_15: Ajjhattasamuṭṭhānāditā ca nesaṃ tattha tattha pākaṭabhāvena veditabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1325_17: Na hi lajjanaṃ nibbhayaṃ vā pāpabhayaṃ vā alajjanaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:1325_18: Hiriyā balavabhāve pana ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1325_20: Ime ca dve dhammā “lokapālā”ti vuccanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1326_6: dve sukkā dhammā lokaṃ na pāleyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1327_3: Vatticchāvasena hi saddo visiṭṭhavutti hotīti āha “kāyoti cetthā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1327_4: Vedanādayoti vedanākkhandho saññākkhandho saṅkhārakkhandhoti tayo khandhā.
tika-abh08t0:1327_5: Tathā ca vuttaṃ tattha “katamā tasmiṃ samaye kāyapassaddhi hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1327_8: tathā pavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1327_16: Uddhaccaṃ vā ādiṃ katvā sabbeyeva kilesā uddhaccādikilesā.
tika-abh08t0:1328_1: thinamiddhādhikānaṃ tathā pavattānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1329_2: tappadhānānaṃ vā catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1329_4: sampayuttānaṃ vā tattha appaṭighātaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpentīti appaṭighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1330_9: Imā pana dve vinibandhanimmaddanena pasādanīyavatthūsu pasādāvahā,
tika-abh08t0:1331_3: Gelaññanimmaddaneneva natthi etāsaṃ ādīnavo doso upaddavo vā,
tika-abh08t0:1331_4: na vā etā ādīnaṃ kapaṇaṃ vanti pavattantīti nirādīnavā,
tika-abh08t0:1332_1: cittasambandhī ca ujubhāvoti lakkhitabbatāya kāyacittānaṃ ajjavalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1333_0: Nanu ca kāyapassaddhiādīnaṃ dvinnaṃ dvinnaṃ dhammānaṃ ekekapaṭipakkhattā darathanimmaddanādikiccaṃ ekekameva karoti.
tika-abh08t0:1333_1: Kasmā pana dve dve dhammā vuttāti?
tika-abh08t0:1333_2: Na kho panevaṃ cintitabbaṃ bhagavatāpi tatheva desitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1333_5: Na hi bhagavatā pubbe avijjamānā ete dhammā desanāvasena uppāditā,
tika-abh08t0:1333_6: atha kho sabhāvato vijjamānāyeva sayambhuñāṇena sammā sacchikatvā yathāsabhāvā desitā,
tika-abh08t0:1333_7: tasmā kathamettha bhagavatā sabhāvato vijjamānassa hāpanaṃ kātuṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t0:1333_8: Sabhāvato vijjamānatāya cettha bhagavato vacanameva pamāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1333_9: Na hi bhagavā yathādhammasāsanādhikāre ayathādhammaṃ katheyyāti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_14: Yathā pana dvinnaṃ purisānaṃ ekoyeva veriko hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_15: tassa te purisā otāraṃ disvā ekato hutvāva hananti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_16: evameva dve dve dhammā ekato hutvā ekaṃ paṭipakkhadhammaṃ hananti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_17: yathā ca panete visuṃ disvāpi taṃ veriṃ hananti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_18: na evamete taṃ visuṃ hananti tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ avinābhāvatoti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_19: tasmā ete paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ ekekabhāvepi dve dveyeva vuttāti,
tika-abh08t0:1333_20: apica cittapassaddhiādīhi cittameva passaddhi lahu mudu kammaññaṃ paguṇaṃ ujuñca hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1333_21: Kāyapassaddhiādīhi pana rūpakāyopīti tadatthadassanatthaṃ bhagavatā ettheva duvidhatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1334_3: “Chandaṃ janeti vāyamatī”tiādīsu vīriyampīti tato nivattanatthaṃ vuttaṃ “kattukamyatāyetaṃ adhivacana”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1334_5: Cetasikassa dhammassa sārammaṇattā karaṇicchā nāma ārammaṇassa ālambitukāmatāmukheneva hotīti ārammaṇakaraṇicchālakkhaṇo
tika-abh08t0:1334_11: Tena tesaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇe cetaso hatthappasāraṇaṃ viyāti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1334_12: Kathaṃ pana dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattamānacetanāsampayutto chando ārammaṇena atthiko hotīti?
tika-abh08t0:1334_14: tasmā saṅgāmagataissāsassa khipitabbausūnaṃ gahaṇe atthikatā viya dānavatthuvissajjanavasena pavattacchandopi vissajjitabbena tena atthikoyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1334_15: Svāyaṃ kusalesu uppanno kusalacchando nāma hoti yonisomanasikārasamuṭṭhānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1335_3: Yathā tathā hi ārammaṇe nicchayanaṃ adhimuccanaṃ anadhimuccantassa pāṇātipātādīsu,
tika-abh08t0:1335_5: saddhā pana pasādanīyesu pasādādhimokkhoti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1335_6: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana yathā santīrite atthe nicchayanākārena pavattitvā parato pavattamānānaṃ tathā pavattiyā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1335_9: dārakassa viya ito cito ca saṃsappanassa “karissāmi,
tika-abh08t0:1336_0: Tesu tesu dhammesūti yesu dhammesu sayaṃ uppannā,
tika-abh08t0:1336_2: Anārammaṇattepi hi tesu samappavattesu udāsīnabhāvo “tatramajjhattatā”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1336_3: Samaṃ avisamaṃ vāhitaṃ attanā pavattitasampayuttānaṃ vā yathāsakakiccesu pavattanaṃ lakkhaṇametissāti samavāhitalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1336_4: Tattha samaṃ hutvā pavattanalakkhaṇāti atthe apakkhapatitabhāvo vutto hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1336_6: Udāsīnabhāvena pavattamānāpi hi esā sampayuttadhamme samaṃ katvā yathāsakakiccesu pavatteti,
tika-abh08t0:1336_7: yathā rājā tuṇhī nisinnopi adhikaraṇadhammaṭṭhe yathāsakakiccesu samaṃ appamatte pavatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1336_8: Alīnānuddhatappavattipaccayānaṃ dhammānaṃ ūnādhikatāya līnuddhatabhāvassa nivāraṇakiccāti vuttaṃ “ūnādhikatānivāraṇarasā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1336_14: Yathā hi raṅgamaṇḍalaṃ gato naṭakācariyo te te naṭake yathāsakaṃ anurūpaṃ bhūmiyaṃ yojeti,
tika-abh08t0:1336_15: evamesāpi attanā sampayuttadhammesu adhipatibhāve ṭhite adhipatibhāve yojeti,
tika-abh08t0:1336_20: idaṃ atirekakicca”nti evaṃ pakkhapātavasena viya pavatti pakkhapāto.
tika-abh08t0:1336_22: Sā cittacetasikānaṃ ajjhupekkhanena samappavattesu ājānīyesu sārathi viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1337_5: Yena hi mano ārammaṇe karīyati ārammaṇenassa saṃyojanato,
tika-abh08t0:1337_6: tato eva tena ārammaṇampi manasi karīyatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1337_13: Sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ sārento payojento viya hotīti manasikāro sāraṇalakkhaṇoti vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1337_15: Vitakko sampayuttānaṃ ārammaṇe abhiniropanasabhāvattā ārammaṇe cittaṃ pakkhipanto viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1337_16: Cetanā attano ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhantī sampayuttepi sakasakakiccaṃ kāretīti attanā karaṇena balaṃ niyojento balanāyako viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1337_17: Manasikāro sampayutte ārammaṇe payojetīti ājānīyappayojanakasārathi viyāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1338_4: Mahisāsakā pana “āvajjanassa viññāṇabhāve sabbaññutaññāṇassa sabbavisayatā parihāyeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1338_8: paccuppannacittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattassa tassa anantaraṃ uppajjamānajavanānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇatā na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1338_10: evañca sati sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi paccuppannacittārammaṇatāya abhāvato asabbavisayatā āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1338_12: tadaggena sāvaraṇampi hoti yattha na pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1338_16: javanasampayuttabhāve pana sati āvajjanassa nāyaṃ iṭṭhavighāto āpajjatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1338_18: akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanena tassānantaraṃ kusalākusaluppattiyā dīpitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1338_20: atītādivasena hi vibhāgamakatvā “imassa cittaṃ jānāmī”ti pavattassa āvajjanaṃ sāmaññena yaṃ kiñci abhimukhībhūtaṃ cittamāvajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1338_21: tato javanānipi attano attano abhimukhībhūtaṃ cittamārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1338_22: na cettha javanānaṃ bhinnārammaṇatā āsaṅkitabbā cittasāmaññena ārammaṇassa abhinnattā,
tika-abh08t0:1338_23: tasmā sabbaññutaññāṇassa paccuppannacittārammaṇataṃ paṭicca na kāci vihesā anubhavitabbāti.
tika-abh08t0:1338_27: tasmā aparimitapuññasambhārekaphalassa acinteyyasabhāvattā āvajjanena vināpi visayaggahaṇe vibandhanābhāvato yattha katthaci pavatti appaṭihatāyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1338_30: Yasmā pana “anāgatārammaṇā āvajjanā paccuppannārammaṇānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti pāḷi natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1339_2: kesaṃ kiṃ nimittanti āha “paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampana”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1339_3: Kampananti ca paresaṃ dukkhaṃ disvā tassa asahanākārena cittassa aññathattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1339_9: Paresaṃ dukkhassa apanayanaṃ hotu vā, mā vā,
tika-abh08t0:1339_12: Apanetukāmatāya paresaṃ dukkhassa asahanaṃ anadhivāsanaṃ paradukkhāsahanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1340_9: tassā vighātaṃ vā vūpasamaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti arativighātapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1341_3: Kāyaduccaritādivatthuto saṅkocanakiriyāpadesena kāyaduccaritāditoyeva saṅkocanakiriyā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1341_4: Na hi viratiyo duccaritavatthuno akiriyapaccupaṭṭhānā yujjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1341_7: akiriyā ca hirottappānaṃ jigucchādivasenāti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1341_9: padaṭṭhānāti ettha saddhādayo sabbeva dhammā kāyasucaritādīnaṃ padaṭṭhānāti eke.
tika-abh08t0:1341_12: appicchasantuṭṭhīsallekhaguṇasamannāgatassa micchājīvavivajjanato ca saddhādayo tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ yathākkamena padaṭṭhānā”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1341_15: Ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti aññaṃ ekaṃ catutthaniyataviratimicchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1341_16: Atha vā niddhāraṇatthe bhummavasena imāsaṃ antare ekaṃ niyataṃ viratimicchantīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1341_17: Ubhayathāpi pana tesaṃ icchā na yujjati aparāya viratiyā dhammasenāpatināpi adesitattā,
tika-abh08t0:1341_18: visayassa ca sadā sannihitattābhāvena niyatāya eva ekissā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1341_19: Teneva hi abhayagirivāsinoyeva ca keci imāsaṃ tividhattaṃ aniyatattameva ca icchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1344_0: Ettha pana “yebhuyyato”ti vacanaṃ lokuttaracittesu sabbadā ekatoyeva ca labbhamānataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1345_2: evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpīti dutiye sasaṅkhārā evāti āha “sasaṅkhārabhāvamattameva hettha viseso”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1345_6: Nanu ca “karuṇāmuditā upekkhāsahagate na sambhavantī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1345_11: Karuṇāmuditābhāvanākāle hi appanāvīthito pubbe upekkhāsahagatacittenāpi parikammaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1345_13: tasmā pubbabhāgavaseneva karuṇāmuditānampi upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavo hotīti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:1345_14: Apare pana sabbadāpi tāsaṃ upekkhāsahagatesu sambhavaṃ na icchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1345_15: “Avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchantī”ti avisesena vuttattā idāni visesadassanatthamāha “somanassaṭṭhāne cā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1347_0: Evaṃ kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayutte dassetvā idāni rūpāvacarakusalacittasampayuttadhamme dassetuṃ “avasesesu panā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:1347_6: Tathā hi nīvaraṇādidhammānaṃ avatthattayaṃ hoti vītikkamāvatthā pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā anusayāvatthāti.
tika-abh08t0:1347_7: Tattha vītikkamāvatthāya paṭipakkhaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ pariyuṭṭhānāvatthāya rūpārūpāvacaraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1347_10: anusayāvatthañca vītikkamāvatthāya visuṃ pariyuṭṭhānāvatthā na upalabbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1347_12: tasmā taṃ neva kāmāvacarakusalaṃ viya tesaṃ vītikkamāvatthaṃ sodheti,
tika-abh08t0:1347_13: na ca lokuttaraṃ viya anusayāvatthaṃ samucchindati,
tika-abh08t0:1347_16: yogino cittasamādhānavasena pavattatīti mahaggatacittuppāde viratīnaṃ asambhavoyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1347_17: Imameva hi atthaṃ sādhetuṃ “viratiyo panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1348_1: Yadi evaṃ rūpāvacarato ko visesoti āha “arūpāvacarabhāvovettha viseso”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1348_3: idha pana rūpasaññāsamatikkamena pattabbattā arūpāvacarabhāvoti ayamevassa tato visesoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1350_0: Evaṃ kusalacetasikānaṃ sampayogavacanatthalakkhaṇādīni dassetvā idāni akusalacetasikāni dassetuṃ “akusalā panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1350_1: Cha yevāpanakāti kiñcāpi paṭhame aniyatayevāpanakā na labbhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1350_2: akusalesu pana labbhamānakayevāpanadhamme ekattha dassetuṃ tesampi idheva vacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1350_3: Evañca katvā upari dhammānaṃ uddesānantaraṃ “evaṃ yevāpanā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1350_5: uddhaccasahagate chandassa ca abhāvato vuttaṃ “paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesū”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1351_2: Hatā vihatā viddhastā pāpā apāyādidukkhapāpanato “pāpā”ti saṅkhātā akusaladhammā yena so bhagavā hatapāpo, tena.
tika-abh08t0:1351_6: sukhaṃ dukkhanti imesu aṭṭhasu lokadhammesu akampanaṭṭhena tādinā sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t0:1352_12: Rasādīni hiriottappesu vuttapaṭipakkhavasena gahetabbānīti na tāni idha vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1352_13: Tesu hi alajjanākārena pāpānaṃ karaṇarasaṃ ahirikaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1352_17: Gāmasūkarassa viya asucito kilesāsucito ajigucchanaṃ ahirikena hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1352_18: Salabhassa viya aggito pāpato anuttāso anottappena hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1354_0: Na bhāyati anottappo, salabho viya pāvakā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1355_0: Ettha ca yathā hiriyā balavabhāve ottappaṃ abbohārikaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1355_3: anottappassa balavabhāve ahirikaṃ abbohārikaṃ hotīti keci,
tika-abh08t0:1355_6: sappamukhe hatthaṃ pavesento bāladārako tattha paṭikkūlabhāvassa,
tika-abh08t0:1355_9: evamevaṃ dhammasabhāvassa aññāṇato moho pāpato neva jigucchati,
tika-abh08t0:1356_2: Ārammaṇaggahaṇalakkhaṇoti ettha ārammaṇaggahaṇaṃ nāma “mama ida”nti taṇhābhinivesavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa avissajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1356_6: Telañjanarāgo viyāti dhovitvāpi pariccajituṃ asakkuṇeyyo telamakkhitaañjanarāgo viya.
tika-abh08t0:1356_9: Nanu ca assādadassanampi atthato lobhoyevāti kathaṃ sayaṃ attano padaṭṭhānaṃ hotīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1356_10: paṭhamaṃ nātibalavalobhavasena assādadassano pacchā balavalobho hotīti tassa taṃpadaṭṭhānatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1356_14: Sukhavedanāya vā kāraṇabhūtaṃ subhanimittaṃ assādo nāma,
tika-abh08t0:1356_15: asubhe “subha”nti pavattā tayo vipallāsā assādadassanaṃ nāmāti keci.
tika-abh08t0:1357_9: mohasamaṅgipuggalo vā ārammaṇasabhāvaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ na labhati,
tika-abh08t0:1357_11: Ettha ca ñāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ yathāsabhāvato jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:1357_14: Yadi evaṃ ārammaṇaggahaṇakālo kathaṃ tadā so ārammaṇaṃ jānātevāti?
tika-abh08t0:1357_16: Yathā pana phassādayo phusanākārādimattavaseneva ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1357_18: evamayaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjamāno paṭicchādanākāreneva gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1358_0: Micchā passantīti dhammasabhāvassa viparītavasena aniccādiṃ niccādivasena passanti.
tika-abh08t0:1358_2: Dhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamitvā parato niccādito vā parappaccayato vā āmasanaṃ parāmāso,
tika-abh08t0:1359_0: Yassa dhammassa vasena uddhataṃ hoti cittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1359_5: paṭākā viyāti yathā paṭākā yottabalena dhajayaṭṭhiṃ amuñcantīpi vātābhighātena ettha avaṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1359_6: evamidampi adhimokkhabalena ārammaṇaṃ amuñcantampi ayonisomanasikārabalena ārammaṇe acalaṃ avaṭṭhātuṃ
tika-abh08t0:1359_7: na sakkotīti vātappahāreneva caladhajapaṭākā viya anavaṭṭhānakiccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1359_10: aññesañca akusalasādhāraṇānaṃ visuṃ padaṭṭhānassa labbhamānattā vuttaṃ “ayoniso…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1359_14: Atha vā uddhaccanimittassa ārammaṇassa manasikaraṇaṃ idha ayonisomanasikāro.
tika-abh08t0:1360_6: Abhibhussahanavasena hīnassa attānaṃ nīcaṃ katvā gahaṇampi paggaṇhanavasenevāti veditabbaṃ. Ketu…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1360_13: “Aha”nti pavattanato mānassa diṭṭhisadisī pavattatīti diṭṭhimānā ekacittuppāde na pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1360_15: tasmā māno diṭṭhivippayuttacitte sabbadā anuppajjamānopi diṭṭhisampayuttacitte niyamena anuppajjanato diṭṭhivippayuttalobhapadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1360_16: Māno dhammasamūhaggahaṇe balavaṃ hutvā attukkaṃsanabhāvena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1364_2: Niruttinayena pana “mā idaṃ acchariyaṃ aññesaṃ hotu,
tika-abh08t0:1364_5: Saṅkocanaṃ attasampattīnaṃ parehi sādhāraṇabhāvakaraṇassa aruccanākārena paṭikuṭanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1364_6: “Mā idaṃ parassa hotū”ti paresu paṭihananavasena attasantakassa ārammaṇakaraṇato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesveva labbhatīti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1364_7: taṃ na yuttaṃ ekasseva dhammassa aññattha paṭihaññitvā aññārammaṇabhāvappasaṅgato.
tika-abh08t0:1364_8: Parehi sādhāraṇabhāve paṭihananavasena pana taṃ ārabbha pavattanato maccheraṃ paṭighacittesu uppajjatīti yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1365_0: Kucchitaṃ katanti ettha katampi akatampi garahitabbattā kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1365_1: Evañhi vattāro honti “yaṃ mayā na kataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1365_4: Evaṃ katākataṃ duccaritaṃ sucaritampi kucchitaṃ kataṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1365_5: Sucaritampi hi garahantassa kucchitaṃ katanti hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1365_7: evaṃ kukataṃ ārabbha vippaṭisāravasena pavattaṃ cittaṃ taṃsahacaritatāya idha kukatanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1365_8: Atha vā katākataṃ ārabbha uppajjanakavippaṭisāracittaṃyeva garahitabbato “kucchitaṃ kataṃ kukata”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1365_9: Yassa dhammassa vasena taṃ cittaṃ kukataṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1365_17: ito dāni paṭṭhāya karomī”ti pavattaṃ pana kusalapakkhikaṃ vīriyameva,
tika-abh08t0:1365_19: katākatākāravisiṭṭhassa sucaritaduccaritassa anusocanavasena virūpaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ vippaṭisāro.
tika-abh08t0:1365_22: Yathā hi dāsabye sati dāso parāyatto hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1365_24: Na hi so attano dhammatāya kusale pavattituṃ sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:1365_25: Atha vā katākatakusalākusalānusocanavasena āyattatāya tadubhayavasena kukkuccena taṃsamaṅgī hotīti taṃ dāsabyaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1366_6: Yasmā middhavaseneva tena sampayuttadhammā medhitā vihatasāmatthiyā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1366_12: Asattivighātoti yasmā taṃ middhaṃ uppajjamānameva sattivināsavasena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1366_13: tasmā natthi etassa sattīti taṃ sampayuttacittaṃ asatti,
tika-abh08t0:1367_10: Yā kāyassa akallatā akammaññatā”ti ca ādinā imesaṃ niddeso pavatto.
tika-abh08t0:1367_17: tasmā taṃ pacalāyikāniddaṃ paccupaṭṭhāpetīti pacalāyikāniddāpaccupaṭṭhānantipi vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:1367_19: Mukhe bandhapaṭo viya sampayuttadhamme pattharituṃ adentaṃ middhanti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1368_2: Na koci ettha viseso atthīti ce,
tika-abh08t0:1368_4: vitakkādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ yathākkamaṃ micchāsaṅkappādināmamattameva visesoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1368_5: Ekūnavīsatīti ṭhapetvā mānādayo cha aniyatayevāpanake sesā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa chandādayo ca cattāro
tika-abh08t0:1368_6: niyatayevāpanakāti ime ekena ūnā vīsati cetasikā.
tika-abh08t0:1368_7: Aniyatayevāpanakānaṃ pana idha alabhantānampi ettha vacane kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh08t0:1369_0: Thinamiddhassa aniyatabhāvoti thinamiddhassa aniyatassa idha uppajjanakabhāvamāha,
tika-abh08t0:1369_1: na pana paṭhame niyatabhāvaṃ tattha sabbasova anuppajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1369_2: Na hi sabhāvatikhiṇaṃ cittaṃ thinamiddhayogī hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1369_3: Tatiye mānassa aniyatassa sambhavepi niyatadhamme sandhāya “aṭṭhārasā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1369_5: Diṭṭhiyā saha na uppajjatīti ettha kāraṇaṃ vuttameva.
tika-abh08t0:1369_7: pañcame ṭhapetvā pītiṃ diṭṭhiyā saha aṭṭhāraseva,
tika-abh08t0:1370_0: Etepi tayoti na kevalaṃ karuṇāmuditā eva,
tika-abh08t0:1370_1: etepi tayo ekato na uppajjanti aññamaññaṃ visayabhedatoyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1370_5: tasmā yaṃ abhayagirivāsino vadanti “issāmaccheraṃ yadicchāvasena ekatopi uppajjatī”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1371_1: parikappanato vā aniṭṭhassa ārammaṇassa aniṭṭhākāraṃ vā ārammaṇassa anubhavanaṃ sambhuñjanaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇānubhavanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1371_4: yathābhūtena vā ayathābhūtena vā aniṭṭhākārena ārammaṇassa sambhuñjanarasaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1371_6: Titthiyādīnañhi sabhāvato iṭṭhe buddhādiārammaṇepi aniṭṭhākārato gahaṇavasena domanassaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1371_8: Tassa hi anīvaraṇāvatthāya abhāvato rūpārūpadhātuyaṃ asambhavo.
tika-abh08t0:1372_0: Attano pavattiākāravasena aniṭṭharūpasamuṭṭhāpanavasena vā virūpaṃ sappanaṃ visappanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1372_5: sakalasseva vā kāyassa vijjhattabhāvāpādanato āha “attano nissayadahanaraso vā”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1372_8: So hi vanaghaṭeyeva uppanno tameva dahati.
tika-abh08t0:1372_15: “Anatthaṃ me acarī”tiādīni nava āghātavatthūni padaṭṭhānamassāti āghātavatthupadaṭṭhāno.
tika-abh08t0:1372_16: So upayogaphalakālesu aniṭṭhattā visasaṃsaṭṭhapūtimuttaṃ viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1372_17: Aṭṭhārasa vāti issādīsu aniyatesu ekena saddhiṃ aṭṭhārasa vā.
tika-abh08t0:1373_4: Cittaṭṭhiti viya santānaṭṭhitiyā paccayo bhavituṃ asamatthattā nicchayābhāvena asaṇṭhahanato cetaso pavattipaccayamattatāya
tika-abh08t0:1373_5: pavattiṭṭhitimattā khaṇaṭṭhitimattā pavattipaccayamattā ṭhiti pavattiṭṭhitīti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1373_6: Vigatā cikicchāti nissakke paccattavacanaṃ “pisuṇā vācā paṭivirato”tiādīsu viya,
tika-abh08t0:1373_15: Uddhaccañhi attanā gahitākāreyeva ṭhatvā bhamatīti ekārammaṇasmiṃ eva vipphandanavasena pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1373_16: vicikicchā pana yadipi ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1373_18: na nu kho”ti aññaṃ gahetabbākāraṃ apekkhatīti nānārammaṇe kampanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1374_2: Sā hi ārammaṇe cittassa sammā ādhānato “samādhī”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1374_3: Balavā hotīti balavamittena dinnapiṭṭhibalo puriso viya balavā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1375_1: Nanu paññattārammaṇāpi vipākā hontīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha “kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1375_2: Kuto pana viratīnaṃ kusalattamevāti cāritanti āha “pañca sikkhāpadā kusalāti hi vutta”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1375_3: Yadi evaṃ lokuttaravipākesu viratiyo na labbhantīti?
tika-abh08t0:1375_4: No na labbhanti sikkhāpadavibhaṅge lokiyaviratiyoyeva sandhāya vuttattā.
tika-abh08t0:1375_5: Tena lokiyavipākesuyeva viratiyo na sambhavantīti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1376_0: Kāyapasādasannissitattā kāye bhavo sātabhāvo lakkhaṇamassāti kāyikasātalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1376_1: Cetasikasukhe vuttanayena paccupaṭṭhānādayo netabbāti āha “sesā vuttanayā evā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1377_1: Nanu ca iṭṭhe ārammaṇe sukhavedanā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1377_8: na cāpi etaṃ sakkā vattuṃ parikappanāvasena iṭṭhārammaṇampi iṭṭhamajjhattato gaṇhanti yathā “kammaviññāṇa”nti vipākānaṃ avañcanīyabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1377_10: iṭṭhamajjhatte ca uppajjamānesu cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇesu upekkhāvedanāyeva sambhavati,
tika-abh08t0:1377_12: yato tesu upekkhāvedanā vuttāti imaṃ codanaṃ saṅkhepato dassetuṃ “iṭṭhārammaṇayogasmi”ntiādiṃ vatvā puna
tika-abh08t0:1377_14: Bhūtarūpaṃ upādāya nissāya pavattaṃ rūpaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1377_15: “Upādāya ca rūpenā”ti pana “manasī ca kāro”ti ettha vuttanayameva.
tika-abh08t0:1377_18: tathā sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthubhūtena sotapasādādinā ca upādāyarūpenāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1377_21: yathākkamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ ārammaṇabhūte rūpasaddādike upādāyarūpeti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1377_23: Saṃghaṭṭanāyeva aññamaññavisayavisayībhāvassa anurūpadesuppattisaṅkhātanighaṃso viyāti nighaṃsoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1377_24: Atha vā sampattāsampattaggahaṇavasena saṃghaṭṭanāya nighaṃsassa cāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1377_25: Cakkhurūpasotasaddā hi aññamaññaṃ asampattāyeva anurūpadesuppattiyā aññamaññaṃ ghaṭṭanti nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1377_26: Tato tesaṃ vasena ghaṭṭanākārabhūto aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo “saṃghaṭṭanā”ti vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1377_28: pana jivhārasā ca aññamaññaṃ sampattāyeva āsannataradese uppannā aññamaññaṃ nighaṃsenti āhacca tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1377_30: Dubbalattāti adhikaraṇīmatthake picupiṇḍakaṃ ṭhapetvā picupiṇḍeneva pahatakāle viya phuṭṭhamattabhāvena dubbalattā.
tika-abh08t0:1377_31: Dīpayeti evaṃ saṃghaṭṭanānighaṃsassa dubbalattā vedanā majjhattaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhatīti upekkhāyogaṃ pakāseyya.
tika-abh08t0:1377_34: Yathā hi adhikaraṇīmatthake kappāsapicupiṇḍaṃ ṭhapetvā kūṭena paharantassa kūṭaṃ picupiṇḍamatikkamma adhikaraṇiṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1377_35: evamevaṃ kāyadvāre bahiddhā mahābhūtārammaṇaṃ ajjhattikakāyapasādaṃ ghaṭṭetvā taṃ atikkamma pasādapaccayesu mahābhūtesu paṭihaññati,
tika-abh08t0:1377_38: aniṭṭhārammaṇe pana vuttanayena dukkhavedanāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1378_2: imināyeva pana ācariyassa vacanena pulliṅgo atthīti siddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1379_2: idha panassā lakkhaṇādidassanatthaṃ puna “kāyaviññāṇe dukkhavedanā”ti upaññāso kato,
tika-abh08t0:1379_3: rasādayo panassa kusalavipāke sukhavedanāya vuttavipariyāyena yojetabbāti idha na vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1380_2: Yadi evaṃ kasmā cetasikavibhāganiddese “balāni dve dvicittesū”ti vuttaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1380_3: Tattha hi kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇayugaḷaṃ sandhāya tathā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1381_0: “Katamā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ekaggatā hoti? Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhitī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1383_1: Yā tasmiṃ samaye cittassa ṭhiti saṇṭhiti avaṭṭhiti avisāhāro avikkhepo avisāhaṭamānasatā samatho samādhindriyaṃ samādhibala”nti –
tika-abh08t0:1385_1: Yo tasmiṃ samaye cetasiko vīriyārambho nikkamo parakkamo uyyāmo vāyāmo ussāho ussoḷhī thāmo dhiti asithilaparakkamatā
tika-abh08t0:1385_2: anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā dhurasampaggāho vīriyaṃ vīriyindriyaṃ vīriyabala”nti –
tika-abh08t0:1386_0: Balapariyosānaṃ katvā vibhajitattā vibhaṅgavāre āgataṃ samādhibalaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1386_2: na pana dhammuddesavāre balarāsiyaṃ āgatabalaṃ sandhāya sabbāhetukacittesu dhammuddesassa maggarāsito paṭṭhāya parihīnattā.
tika-abh08t0:1387_2: Hadayaṃ mano mānasaṃ cittanti hi pariyāyavacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1387_4: Bhagavato hi vineyyajanūpasaṅkamanaṃ ekantena tesaṃ hitasukhanipphādanato sobhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1387_7: Atha vā sakalampi lokaṃ pariññābhisamayavasena sayambhuñāṇena parijānanto sammā gato avagatoti sugato,
tika-abh08t0:1387_8: tathā lokasamudayaṃ pahānābhisamayavasena pajahanto anuppattidhammataṃ āpādento sammā gato atītoti sugato,
tika-abh08t0:1387_9: lokanirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena sammā gato adhigatoti sugato,
tika-abh08t0:1387_10: lokanirodhagāminipaṭipadāsaṅkhātaṃ maggaṃ bhāvanābhisamayavasena sammā gato pattoti sugato.
tika-abh08t0:1387_12: Bhagavā hi bhūtaṃ tacchaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ vineyyānaṃ yathārahaṃ kālayuttameva dhammaṃ bhāsati,
tika-abh08t0:1388_1: “Avagacchatī”tiādīsu yo bhikkhu anūnaṃ atthato vā byañjanato vā anūnaṃ suparipuṇṇaṃ tatoyeva paramaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1388_2: visiṭṭhaṃ imaṃ abhidhammāvatāraṃ nāma pakaraṇaṃ avagacchati avabujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1388_4: Atha vā paramanayadīpanato paramaṃ imaṃ pakaraṇaṃ yo anūnaṃ katvā avagacchati jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:1388_5: tassevaṃ avagacchato yathāsabhāvaṃ mananato matisaṅkhātā paññā durāsade maṃsacakkhunā paramāṇu viya lokiyañāṇena
tika-abh08t0:1388_7: atigambhīraṭṭhāne ṭhapetvā sinerupabbatarājānaṃ rāhuādīhi mahākāyehipi sabbena sabbaṃ ajjhogāhituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya
tika-abh08t0:1388_8: mahāsamudde viya ṭhapetvā sammāsambuddhaṃ sāriputtādīhipi mahāñāṇehi sāvakehi sabbena sabbaṃ ajjhogāhituṃ
tika-abh08t0:1388_9: asakkuṇeyyarūpe abhidhammanaye vijambhate hemantasālapanti viya pattharati,
tika-abh08t0:1394_1: Nāmasāmaññatoyeva dvepaññāsāti phassādināmasāmaññena dvīhi adhikā paṇṇāsa honti,
tika-abh08t0:1394_2: sampayuttadhammabhedato pana ekūnanavuticittasampayutto phasso ekūnanavutividhoti evamādinā bahuvidhāpi hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1395_0: Nanu ca phassādayo heṭṭhā pāḷikkamena dassitā,
tika-abh08t0:1395_1: idha pana kasmā na tathā vuttāti?
tika-abh08t0:1395_3: Phassādayo hi manakkārāvasānā terasa kusalākusalābyākatasāmaññato ekato vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1395_5: lobhādayo pana anottappāvasānā akusalabhāvasāmaññatoti evaṃ taṃtaṃsāmaññāpekkhāya samānasabhāvā dhammā ekato vuttāti.
tika-abh08t0:1396_1: Evaṃ phassādayo dhamme uddisitvā idāni “ettakesu ayaṃ dhammo samupalabbhatī”ti cittuppādesu tesaṃ payogaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1396_2: dassetuṃ paṭhamaṃ tāva cittagaṇanaṃ dassento āha “catupaññāsadhā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1396_5: Āsavavisayattābhāvato na vijjanti etesu āsavāti anāsavā.
tika-abh08t0:1397_5: Tesaṃ phassādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ uppattiṃ ekekaṃ uddharitvā cittacetasikesu bhikkhūnaṃ pāṭavatthāya pavakkhāmīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1398_1: Cetasikavibhāgaṃ vattukāmopi avinibbhogadhamme dassetuṃ cittena saha ekato katvā āha “phassapañcaka”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1399_2: Kiñcāpi anantaragāthāya cittena saha ekuppādādibhāvakathaneneva imesaṃ sabbasādhāraṇatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1399_5: Vuttopi vāyamattho tattha apākaṭattā puna pākaṭaṃ katvā idha vuttoti.
tika-abh08t0:1400_2: lokiyalokuttaravasena ekādasasu paṭhamajjhānikacittesu cāti pañcapaññāsacittesu vitakkassa desitattā āha “vitakko…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1400_4: Vicāro pañcapaññāsasavitakkacittesu ceva ekādasasu dutiyajjhānikacittesu cāti chasaṭṭhicittesu uppajjatīti āha “cāro…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1401_0: Ekapaññāsacittesu pītīti kāyaviññāṇavajjitesu aṭṭhārasasu somanassasahagatakāmāvacaracittesu ceva catutthapañcamajjhānavajjitatettiṃsarūpajjhānikacittesu
tika-abh08t0:1401_2: Tesaṭṭhiyā sukhanti ekapaṇṇāsasappītikacittesu ceva ekādasasu catutthajjhānikacittesu,
tika-abh08t0:1401_3: kusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tesaṭṭhiyā cittesu sukhaṃ jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1401_4: Tesaṭṭhisukhasahagatacittāni ceva tīṇi ca dukkhasahagatānīti chasaṭṭhicitte vajjetvā avasesapañcapaṇṇāsacittesu
tika-abh08t0:1401_6: Dukkhaṃ tīsūti dvīsu paṭighacittesu ceva akusalavipākakāyaviññāṇe cāti tīsu cittesu dukkhaṃ jāyati. Hoti…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1401_7: somanassindriyanti tesaṭṭhiyā sukhasahagatacittesu ekameva kāyaviññāṇaṃ apanetvā avasesesu somanassindriyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1402_0: Ahetukavipākakiriyāmanodhātuvajjitesu majjhimagaṇanāya pañcādhikasataparimitesu kusalākusalavipākakiriyācittesu vīriyaṃ desitanti āha “pañcuttara…pe… āhā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1402_4: visesena vā vineyyasatte nibbānapuraṃ netīti vināyako.
tika-abh08t0:1403_1: dve ekahetukacittāni ca vajjetvā avasesaekuttarasate citte chando uppajjatīti dassetuṃ “sabbāhetukacittānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1403_2: Dasa viññāṇeti kusalākusalavipākavasena dviguṇite cakkhādike pañcaviññāṇe.
tika-abh08t0:1404_1: Niyatā na yevāpanakā viya kadācīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1404_2: Kathaṃ panete ekanavutiyā cittesveva jāyantīti āha “ahetukesū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1404_13: abyākatacittasampayogato abyākatāti kusalenapakāsanavidhānesu chekena satthunā pakāsitā desitāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1405_11: Dvīsu jāyanti no sahāti dosamūlesveva dvīsu jāyanti,
tika-abh08t0:1406_1: Cittassa cetasikattābhāvepi kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ gaṇanaṭṭhānato “mano”ti cittampi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1407_1: Ettāvatā cetasikavibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni ekekasmiṃ cittuppāde labbhamānarāsīsu aṅgavibhāgadassanatthaṃ “ekūnatiṃsacittesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1407_10: sukhasantīraṇahasituppādāni dveti ekūnatiṃsacittesu pañcaṅgikaṃ jhānaṃ pañcakarāsisaṅkhātaṃ mataṃ. Catu…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1407_14: dvipañcaviññāṇavajjitaupekkhāsahagatāni cha ahetukacittāni cāti imāni sattatiṃsa cittāni yathāyogaṃ catūhi jhānaṅgehi yuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1407_15: Ettha hi ekādasa dutiyajjhānikāni vicārapītisukhasamādhīhi sahagatāni,
tika-abh08t0:1407_16: itarāni yathāyogaṃ upekkhādomanassesu ekekena vitakkavicārasamādhīhīti catūhi sampayuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1408_3: dvāvīsati catutthapañcamajjhānikāni sāsavānāsavānīti catuttiṃsa cittāni yathāyogaṃ upekkhekaggatāyogato,
tika-abh08t0:1409_1: Sabhāvenāvitakkesūti dutiyajjhānādayo viya bhāvanābalena vinā sabhāveneva avitakkesu dvipañcaviññāṇesu.
tika-abh08t0:1409_2: Tesu hi vijjamānānipi sesajhānaṅgāni vitakkavirahena upanijjhānakiccesu asamatthāni.
tika-abh08t0:1409_3: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyampi “vitakkapacchimakañhi jhānaṅgaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1409_4: Bhāvanāya avitakkabhāvappattāni pana bhāvanābaleneva upanijjhānakiccesu paṭutarā,
tika-abh08t0:1410_0: Yadi evaṃ kasmā dvipañcaviññāṇesu sarūpeneva cittekaggatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1410_1: nanu tassā vitakkavirahena jhānaṅgakicce asamatthatāya rāsibhajanābhāvato yevāpanakavasena vacanaṃ yuttanti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1410_2: kusalākusalesu avijjamānadhammassa vipākesupi anupalabbhanato jhānaṅgakiccassa akaraṇepi kusalākusalesu desitaniyāmeneva sarūpena idhāpi vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1410_8: vedanā pana sabbavedanānaṃ sāmaññasabhāvena phassapañcake āgatavedanā ca aparena visesavacanena tattha niddiṭṭhā,
tika-abh08t0:1410_10: Teneva hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ dvipañcaviññāṇesu saṅgahavāre jhānaṅgarāsi na uddhaṭāti rūpadhātuyaṃ tiṇṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1410_11: mahābhūtānaṃ appaṭighabhāvepi kāmadhātuyaṃ sappaṭighamahābhūtehi samānabhāvato tatthāpi sappaṭighabhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1410_12: viya dvipañcaviññāṇesu vedanācittekaggatānaṃ vitakkaviyogena jhānakiccākaraṇepi savitakkacittesu jhānacittasamaṅgīvedanādīhi
tika-abh08t0:1410_16: dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena dhammasabhāvaṃ avirajjhitvā desitanti na ettha anuyogo kātabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1411_1: Tīṇi soḷasacittesūti pannarasasu ahetukavipākacittesu ceva kiriyāmanodhātumhi cāti soḷasasu cittesu.
tika-abh08t0:1411_2: Manindriyaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ vedanindriyesu labbhamānamekanti tīṇindriyāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:1411_7: Ettha cittanti sasampayuttadhammassa cittuppādassa adhippetattā manindriyassāpi ādhārabhāvo yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1411_8: Itarathā hi manindriyanti cittasseva gahaṇe tassa attano ca ādhārabhāvo na yujjatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1411_9: Ekasmiṃ pana cattārīti ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagate vīriyindriyamanindriyajīvitindriyaupekkhindriyavasena cattāri.
tika-abh08t0:1411_10: Pañca terasasūti ṭhapetvā vicikicchāsahagataṃ avasesāni ekādasa akusalacittāni,
tika-abh08t0:1411_15: pañcasu somanassasahagatesu purimāni cattāri somanassindriyena saddhiṃ pañca,
tika-abh08t0:1412_1: Satta dvādasacittesūti dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttacittesu saddhāsatisamādhivīriyajīvitamanindriyāni ca vedanindriyesu labbhamānamekanti satta indriyāni.
tika-abh08t0:1412_2: Tattha hi chasu somanassasahagatesu saddhindriyādīni cha somanassindriyena saddhiṃ satta,
tika-abh08t0:1412_3: itaresu chasu upekkhindriyena saddhiṃ satta honti.
tika-abh08t0:1412_6: sattavīsati lokiyajjhānacittāni cāti ekūnacattālīsavidhesu lokiyacittesu purimāni satta,
tika-abh08t0:1412_10: sesesu ca upekkhindriyena saddhiṃ yojetvā aṭṭhindriyāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1413_1: Cattālīsāya cittesu navakanti samacattālīsavidhesu lokuttaracittesu purimāni aṭṭhaindriyāni,
tika-abh08t0:1413_2: anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ aññātāvindriyanti imesu labbhamānamekanti indriyānaṃ navakā.
tika-abh08t0:1413_4: Sotāpattiphalato paṭṭhāya arahattamaggapariyosānesu taṃ na labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1413_8: Evanti chahi indriyehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci tīṇi,
tika-abh08t0:1413_13: katthaci navindriyānīti evaṃ chahi ākārehi indriyayogopi,
tika-abh08t0:1413_15: atha kho indriyehi saha cittuppādānaṃ sampayogopi veditabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1414_1: Idāni maggaṅgasampayogaṃ dassento paṭhamaṃ tāva yesu cittesu maggaṅgāni na labbhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1415_1: Tañhi micchāsaṅkappamicchāvāyāmayogato dve maggaṅgāni etthāti dumaggaṅgaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1415_8: paṭhamajjhānikavajjāni catuvīsati mahaggatacittānīti cattālīsacittesu yo maggo labbhati,
tika-abh08t0:1416_1: pañcaṅgikoti dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaresu ceva tīsu lokiyapaṭhamajjhānikesu cāti pannarasasu
tika-abh08t0:1416_7: Sattaṅgikoti avitakkattā sammāsaṅkappo na labbhatīti taṃ pariccajitvā avasesasattamaggaṅgavasena sattaṅgiko vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1417_1: tattha tena saha aṭṭhaṅgikoti āha “maggo aṭṭhasū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1417_2: Tattha aṭṭhasu cittesūti paṭhamajjhānikesu aṭṭhasu lokuttaracittesu.
tika-abh08t0:1417_3: Evanti chahi maggaṅgehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci dve maggaṅgāni,
tika-abh08t0:1418_2: Tattha vīriyabalasamādhibalavasena dve balāni kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātudvaye vibhaṅgavāre āgatāni
tika-abh08t0:1418_4: Ekasmiṃ tīṇīti ekasmiṃ vicikicchāsahagate vīriyabalaahirikabalaanottappabalavasena tīṇi balāni.
tika-abh08t0:1418_5: Ekādasasu cattārīti vicikicchāsahagatavajjesu ekādasasu akusalacittesu samādhibalañceva pubbe vuttāni tīṇīti cattāribalāni.
tika-abh08t0:1418_6: Cha dvādasasūti dvādasasu ñāṇavippayuttacittesu saddhāvīriyasatisamādhihiriottappavasena cha balāni.
tika-abh08t0:1419_0: Ekūnāsītiyā sattāti dvādasasu ñāṇasampayuttakāmāvacaracittesu ceva sattavīsatimahaggatacittesu ca cattālīsāya
tika-abh08t0:1419_1: lokuttaracittesu cāti ekūnāsītividhesu cittesu saddhāvīriyasatisamādhipaññāhiriottappavasena satta balāni.
tika-abh08t0:1419_4: Evanti pañcahi balehi sampayuttassa abhāvato katthaci dve,
tika-abh08t0:1419_9: imesu ekassāpi abhāvato abalampi ca viññeyyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1419_12: Yesu cittesu yāni jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabalindriyāni jāyantīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1425_2: Nanu ca heṭṭhā sārammaṇato ekavidhabhāvo vuttoti?
tika-abh08t0:1425_4: so pana cetasikānañca sādhāraṇoti idha tabbivajjanatthaṃ vijānanalakkhaṇatāva vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1425_8: tesaṃ hetuṃ tathāgato āhā”ti vacanato taṃtaṃpaccayuppannadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃpaccayavādinā.
tika-abh08t0:1426_1: Savatthukāvatthukatoti ekantena sabbavatthunissitabhāvato ceva tadabhāvato ca.
tika-abh08t0:1426_3: taṃ na yujjati savatthukaniddese “sabbo kāmavipāko”ti pasādanissitānampi saṅgahitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1427_0: Sabbo kāmavipāko cāti sahetukāhetukabhinno sabbo tevīsatividho kāmāvacaravipāko ca.
tika-abh08t0:1427_3: aṭṭhasu ariyapuggalesu ādipuggalassa sambandhīti vā “ādimaggo”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1427_5: Teneva hetāni arūpabhave nuppajjanti tattha vatthūnaṃ abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1427_6: “Nuppajjanti vinā vatthu”nti ca idaṃ antobhāvitakāraṇatthaṃ katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1428_1: Kathaṃ pana rūpasannissayena vinā tattha arūpaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1428_4: Yadi evaṃ kabaḷīkārāhārenapi vinā rūpadhātuyaṃ rūpena pavattitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1428_7: Api tu yassa cittasantānassa pavattikāraṇaṃ rūpe avigatataṇhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1428_10: tassa vinā rūpena pavatti kāraṇassa taṃvimukhatāyāti rūpasannissayena vinā tattha arūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1428_11: Dvecattālīsa sesānīti manodvārāvajjanaṃ kusalakiriyāvasena soḷasa kāmāvacarāni,
tika-abh08t0:1429_2: Tassa tassa ārammaṇassa āpāthagatakāle taṃtaṃvijānanavasena pañcapi ārammaṇāni imassāti pañcārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1429_5: Abhiññāvajjitānaṃ sabbamahaggatānampi dhammārammaṇabhāvena ekārammaṇattā āha “sabbaṃ mahaggata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1429_7: Taṃ arūpāvacaradutiyacatutthajjhānāni patvā na yujjati tesaṃ mahaggatārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:1429_9: tassa ca rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānato abhinnattā taṃ pahāya “tecattālīsā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1431_1: Iriyāya kāyikāya kiriyāya pavattipathabhāvato iriyāpatho, gamanādi.
tika-abh08t0:1431_9: tathā iriyāpathupatthambhakaṃ rūpassāti imassa visesassa dassanatthaṃ “rūpīriyāpathaviññatti-
tika-abh08t0:1431_24: Evañcāpi hi taṃ cittanti na kevalaṃ ahetukāditova,
tika-abh08t0:1431_27: Tassa pana ādimhi nikkhittaṃ cittaṃ evañca catubbidhanti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1432_0: Samuṭṭhāpenti rūpānīti attano uppādakkhaṇeyeva attanā janetabbarūpāni samuṭṭhāpenti.
tika-abh08t0:1432_3: Yathā hi antarantarā uppajjamānehi vīthicittehi abbokiṇṇe bhavaṅge pavattamāne aṅgāni osīdanti,
tika-abh08t0:1432_5: na evaṃ dvattiṃsavidhesu vakkhamānesu ca chabbīsatividhesu jāgaraṇacittesu pavattamānesu.
tika-abh08t0:1432_6: Tadā pana aṅgāni upatthaddhāni yathāpavattairiyāpathabhāveneva pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1432_7: Janayanti ca viññattinti manodvāre pavattā eva viññattiṃ janayanti,
tika-abh08t0:1433_2: tesaṃ anubalappadāyakāni maggaṅgādīni tesu vijjamānesu savisesaṃ rūpappavattidassanato.
tika-abh08t0:1433_3: Arūpavipākā pana rūpavirāgabhāvanāya nibbattattā hetuno taṃvimukhatāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpentīti āha “vipākā ca arūpisū”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1434_6: Tathā hi paṭisandhiviññāṇena sahajātaṃ vatthu pacchājātapaccayarahitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1434_9: Yathā ca papāte patito aññassa nissayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1434_10: evaṃ tampi bhinnasantatiyaṃ kammakkhittatāya papāte patitaṃ viya appatiṭṭhitaṃ na rūpasamuṭṭhāpane ussahati
tika-abh08t0:1434_11: ca vatthuno ca attanā saha apacchā apure uppajjamānattā purejātapaccayassa alābhato.
tika-abh08t0:1434_12: Yathā pana āgantuko puriso agatapubbaṃ desaṃ gato aññesaṃ “etha bho antogāme vo annapānagandhamālādīni
tika-abh08t0:1434_13: dassāmī”ti vattuṃ na sakkoti attano avisayatāya,
tika-abh08t0:1434_16: Evaṃ vatthudubbalatādīhi kāraṇehi rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1434_17: Apica āhārindriyādivasena yehākārehi cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ cittacetasikā paccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1434_18: tehi sabbehi paṭisandhiyaṃ cittacetasikā samatiṃsakammajarūpānaṃ yathāyogaṃ paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1435_0: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā āhārā sampayuttānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1436_0: Tasmā samatiṃsakammajarūpāni cittasamuṭṭhānarūpānaṃ ṭhānaṃ gahetvā ṭhitānīti paṭisandhicittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1437_0: Cuticittañcārahatoti ettha khīṇāsavassa cuticittaṃ upasantavaṭṭamūlasmiṃ santāne sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1438_0: “Kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittassa uppādakkhaṇe yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjissati,
tika-abh08t0:1438_7: no ca tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro nirujjhissatīti vacanato aññesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1439_3: nirujjhissatī”ti iminā kāmabhavato cavitvā rūpārūpabhavūpapajjanakānaṃ kāmāvacaracuticittassāpi uppādakkhaṇato
tika-abh08t0:1439_4: uddhaṃ vacīsaṅkhārassa nirodhaṃ vatvā kāyasaṅkhārassa tadabhāvavacanato cuticittassa kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanaṃ siddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1439_5: Yadaggena ca taṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ na samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1439_7: Na hi rūpasamuṭṭhāpakassa gabbhagatatādivibandhābhāve kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpane kāraṇaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1439_8: Na ca yuttaṃ cutito uddhaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānañcassa rūpaṃ pavattatīti,
tika-abh08t0:1439_10: na cāpi vaṭṭamūlānupasamo cuticittassa rūpuppādane kāraṇaṃ cuticittena na uppannānampi tato purimatarehi uppannānaṃ viya bhavantare anuppajjanato,
tika-abh08t0:1439_11: tasmā sabbesampi cuticittaṃ rūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāpetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1439_15: tassa bhāvanābalena sātisayaṃ santavuttitāya kāyasaṅkhārāsamuṭṭhāpanepi maraṇāsannacittānaṃ viya paridubbalattābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:1439_21: tettiṃsamacittakkhaṇe uppannaṃ pacchimasoḷasakato puretarameva nirujjhatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1439_23: tassa cittasaṅkhāro na nirujjhissatī”ti pañhe “pacchimacittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe tesaṃ kāyasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1439_24: cittasaṅkhāro ca na nirujjhissatī”ti pacchimacittasseva vajjitattā cutito dutiyatatiyacittenāpi saha nirujjhatīti apare.
tika-abh08t0:1439_25: Yassa cittassa anantarā kāmāvacarānaṃ pacchimacittaṃ uppajjatīti ettha “yassā”ti kāmāvacaracuticittassa
tika-abh08t0:1439_26: anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ cittaṃ sandhāya vuttanti tassa uppādatopi uddhaṃ kāyasaṅkhārābhāvavacanena heṭṭhimakoṭiyā
tika-abh08t0:1440_1: Ekaṃ dve tīṇi cattāri ṭhānāni imassāti ekadviticatuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1440_4: Tañhi tiṭṭhanti ettha dhammā avaṭṭhitā viya hontīti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1441_0: Nippapañcenāti rāgādipapañcarahitena. Rāgādayo hi saṃsāre papañcanato “papañcā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:1443_0: “Somanassayuttasantīraṇaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇaṃ siyā”ti vattabbe “santīraṇa”nti adhikāratova labbhatīti
tika-abh08t0:1444_0: Balavārammaṇe satīti tadārammaṇakiccassa balavārammaṇeyeva labbhanato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1444_1: na imasseva āveṇikabhāvena sabbesampi tadārammaṇānaṃ balavārammaṇeyeva uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1445_3: pañcadvāresu voṭṭhabbanakiccaṃ kesañcideva sattānaṃ arūpabhave sabbaso pañcadvārikacittappavattiyā,
tika-abh08t0:1445_5: Manodvāre āvajjanakiccaṃ pana sabbesameva sacittakasattānaṃ karotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1445_6: Dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma hotīti yathāvuttaṭṭhānadvayavantatāya dviṭṭhānikacittaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1445_9: taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ paṭṭhāne tathā adīpitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1446_0: “Upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca upekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā”ti ettha “ahetukaṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ
tika-abh08t0:1446_4: ahetukapaṭisandhikkhaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
tika-abh08t0:1448_0: “Pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca pītisahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
tika-abh08t0:1448_1: Ahetukaṃ pītisahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
tika-abh08t0:1448_4: Sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā.
tika-abh08t0:1448_5: Ahetukaṃ sukhasahagataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca tayo khandhā,
tika-abh08t0:1449_2: tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvameva dīpetīti na tassa paṭisandhidānaṃ atthīti dviṭṭhānikatāva vuttāti.
tika-abh08t0:1450_0: 162. Chadvārā eva chadvārikā. Atha vā chadvārikesūti chadvārikacittesūti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1451_6: Sabbacittānaṃ kiccavasena niddesaṭṭhāneyeva kiccānaṃ paṭipāṭimpi dassetuṃ “bhavaṅgāvajjana”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1451_7: Yadi evaṃ paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya cutipariyosānaṃ vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1451_8: cutipaṭisandhīnaṃ pana pākaṭattā tathā na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1451_11: tasmā pākaṭaṭṭhānaṃ pahāya apākaṭaṭṭhānato paṭṭhāya dassetuṃ bhavaṅgameva ādito vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1451_13: atha kho anekantikaṃ kismiñci bhave katthaci javanavīthiyaṃ alabbhanatoti ekantalabbhamānaparidīpanatthaṃ taṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1451_14: Atha vā tadārammaṇacittampi yebhuyyena bhavaṅganāmaṃ labbhatīti purimajavanavīthiyaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ pacchimajavanavīthiyā
tika-abh08t0:1451_17: Keci pana “pañcadvāresu pavattivasena pañcavidhatāya dassanatthaṃ ‘bhavaṅgāvajjana’ntiādi vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1451_18: tattha pana appavattamānānaṃ kesañci sabbhāvato taṃ na yujjati,
tika-abh08t0:1451_21: evaṃ sotadvārādīsupi dassanādiṃ apanetvā savanādiṃ pakkhipitvā kiccappavatti yojetabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1458_0: Evamāgatāhi pañcahi abhiññāhi yuttena rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānacittena vajjitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1458_1: Dibbasotādīnaṃ ekekārammaṇattepi pañcannampi abhiññānaṃ ekasseva cittassa avatthābhedabhāvato vuttaṃ “pañcābhiññāvivajjita”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1458_2: Keci pana “idha ekantena dhammārammaṇikacittānameva vacanato paracittavijānanaṃ vajjetvā anāgataṃsañāṇena saha pañcābhiññānaṃ paṭikkhepo”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1459_1: manodhātuttayassa ca pariccāgena ekacattālīsa hontīti āha “cattālīsaṃ tathekaka”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1459_6: Atha vā abhiññā nāma heṭṭhā ekekārammaṇikesu vuttassa pañcamajjhānasseva avatthāvisesoti abhiññācittānaṃ chaḷārammaṇikesu aggahaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1460_3: saddo yathā “sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1460_4: paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1460_6: tāva manoviññāṇadhātuṃ bhinditvā taṃvasena cittavibhāgadassanatthaṃ nayadānaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1461_2: dutiyaṃ kusalākusalāditoti evaṃ dhātudvayaṃ paccekaṃ tidhā katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1462_2: tattheva tiṃsapuggalānaṃ nānattavasena pavattito ca tiṃsavidhantiādinā idaṃ yathāniddiṭṭhacittaṃ bahudhā hotīti ca vibhāveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1463_2: Hatthagatāmalakā viya hontīti yathā hatthagataṃ āmalakaṃ cakkhumato supākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1463_3: evamimassa matimato bhikkhuno abhidhammapiṭakagatā atthā supākaṭā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1469_4: Taṃ vatvā bhūmīnaṃ ādhāravasena pasaṅgāgataṃ gatibhedaṃ,
