tika-abh08t0:1469_6: “Catassopāyabhūmiyo”ti vatvā asuragatiyā petagatiyaṃyeva saṅgahitattā “gatiyo pañcā”ti vuttanti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1469_8: Na hi esa anākulavacano ācariyo īdisaṃ pubbāparaviruddhaṃ viya sammohajanakaṃ vacanaṃ bhāsati.
tika-abh08t0:1470_0: “Pañca kho imā, sāriputta, gatiyo. Katamā pañca? Nirayo tiracchānayoni pettivisayo manussā devā”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1471_6: catasso arūpabhūmiyoti ekatiṃsabhūmīnamantare cittappavattiadhikārattā asaññabhūmiṃ apanetvā avasesā tiṃseva bhūmiyoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1471_7: Tāsu tiṃseva puggalāti tāsu bhūmīsu uppannā puggalā bhūmigaṇanavasena tiṃseva honti.
tika-abh08t0:1471_8: Bhūmivasena tiṃsavidhāpi pana paṭisandhicittagaṇanāya ekūnavīsati hontīti dassento āha “bhūmīsvetāsū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1473_0: “Asaññasattā devā ahetukā anāhārakā aphassakā avedanakā asaññakā acetanakā acittakā pātubhavantī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1475_0: Na vijjati hetu imesanti ahetū, duve,
tika-abh08t0:1475_12: cittuppādaṃ pana patvā tesaṃ visesasabbhāvato visuṃyeva uddhaṭāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1476_1: “Bhūmīsuppattiṃ bhaṇato me nibodhathā”ti sutvā codako “tiṃsabhūmīsū”tiādinā sabbesaṃ bhūmīnaṃ sādhāraṇacittāni pucchati,
tika-abh08t0:1477_2: kusalavipākacakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇadvayavajjitāni aṭṭhārasa kāmāvacaravipākacittānīti vīsati cittāni sadā kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1477_6: tāni kāmabhave aniṭṭharūpādayo ārabbha uppajjanti brahmaloke tesaṃ abhāvatoti kāmabhaveyeva niyamitāni.
tika-abh08t0:1477_8: cattāro ca arūpāvacaravipākā arūpīsūti āha “pañca rūpabhave”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1478_1: bhavantīti rūpāvacarakusalakiriyacittāni ceva kusalavipākāni ca cakkhusotaviññāṇasampaṭicchanasantīraṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1478_2: voṭṭhabbanavajjāni ca dve ahetukakiriyacittāni paṭhamamaggaviññāṇanti aṭṭhārasa cittāni kāmarūpabhaveyeva bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:1478_4: Tattha hi sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkantattā rūpāvacarakusalakiriyā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1478_13: cattāri arūpāvacarakiriyacittānīti evaṃ dvecattālīsa cittāni tīsu bhavesu honti.
tika-abh08t0:1479_1: Evaṃ bhavavasena cittuppattiṃ dassetvā idāni kālavasena dassento āha “ṭhapetvā panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1479_6: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakusalakiriyāti teraseva cittāni apāyarahitāsu chabbīsabhūmīsu honti apāyesu vipākāvaraṇasabbhāve etesaṃ anuppajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1480_1: Tāni hi pañcasu suddhāvāsabhūmīsu na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1480_3: tesañca paṭhamamaggeneva imesaṃ pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ āpāditattā.
tika-abh08t0:1481_3: Catuvīsatībhūmisu dve cāti viññāṇañcāyatanakusalakiriyāvasena dve cittāni.
tika-abh08t0:1482_1: Sotāpattiphalaṃ yāva anāgāmimaggo cattāri ca cittāni suddhāvāsaapāyavajjāsu ekavīsatibhūmīsu bhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:1482_2: Ekaṃ sotāpattimaggacittaṃ suddhāvāsaapāyaarūpabhūmivajjesu sattarasasu bhūmīsu jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1482_5: satta akusalavipākāti dvādasa cittāni mahaggatabhūmivajjāsu ekādasasu kāmabhūmīsu jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1483_1: bhūmisūti catutthajjhānavipāko parittasubhaappamāṇasubhasubhakiṇhavasena tīsu bhūmīsu jāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1483_4: paṭhamajjhānavipāko brahmapārisajjabrahmapurohitamahābrahmāvasena tīsu bhūmīsu hotīti evaṃ cattāri cittāni ekekavasena tīsu tīsu bhūmīsu jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1484_1: Evaṃ ettakāneva cittāni ettakāsu bhūmīsu uppajjantīti cittaniyamavasena uppattiṃ dassetvā idāni ettakāsu
tika-abh08t0:1484_2: eva bhūmīsu ettakāneva cittāni uppajjantīti bhūminiyamavasena dassetuṃ “kusalākusalā kāme”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1484_5: āvajjanadvayañcāti sattatiṃseva mānasā narakādīsu catūsupi apāyesu jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:1484_7: pañcatiṃsa mahaggatalokuttarānīti dvepaññāsa mānasā kadācipi tesu nuppajjanti abhūmibhāvatoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1485_2: “Apuññajā pākā”ti akusalavipākānaṃ sabbesameva gahitattā ghānādiviññāṇattayaṃ aggahitavisesampi pārisesañāyena kusalavipākameva viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1486_0: 213. Domanassanti domanassasahagataṃ. Kriyā ca dveti voṭṭhabbanavajjitā dve ahetukakiriyā.
tika-abh08t0:1487_2: Puggalānaṃ vasena ca bhūmivasena ca cittuppattiṃ vibhāvayeti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1488_3: aññakammena pana dvihetukatadārammaṇassāpi sambhavato ekacattālīsa honti.
tika-abh08t0:1488_4: Ācariyajotipālattherassa adhippāyena tihetukavipākehipi saddhiṃ pañcacattālīsevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1488_5: Ahetukassa vuttehīti ahetukasattassa vuttehi sattatiṃsamānasehi saha.
tika-abh08t0:1489_1: “Catupaññāsa mānasā”ti vatvā tesaṃ sarūpato dassanatthaṃ āha “dvihetukassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1490_1: Paññāsevassa cittānīti tihetukassa puthujjanassa vuttacatupaññāsacittesu diṭṭhivicikicchāsahagatavajjāni ekūnapaññāsa,
tika-abh08t0:1490_2: sotāpattiphalanti imāni paññāseva cittāni assa kāmāvacarassa sotāpannadehino jāyante.
tika-abh08t0:1491_1: Dutiyañca phalaṃ hitvāti sakadāgāmiphalaṃ hitvā. Ca-
tika-abh08t0:1491_3: Attano phalena saha yāni aṭṭhacattālīsa cittāni,
tika-abh08t0:1491_10: Kasmā pana tesaṃ ekekameva cittaṃ hotīti āha “ekacittakkhaṇāhi te”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1491_15: paṭhamajjhānavipāko cāti pañcatiṃsa cittāni tīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmīsu puthujjanassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1492_3: Tena apuññapañcakaṃ hitvā paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ gahetvā cāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1493_1: Evaṃ paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanasotāpannādivasena cittasambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni tesameva vasena
tika-abh08t0:1493_3: Dutiyajjhānatatiyajjhānavipākānaṃ ekasattasseva asambhavepi dutiyajjhānatale nibbatte puthujjanādayo
tika-abh08t0:1494_1: Parittasubhādito paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhā tatiyacatutthajjhānabhūmīsu paṭhamajjhānabhūmiyaṃ vuttagaṇanāya cittappavatti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1495_5: manodvārāvajjanañcāti catuvīsati cittāni paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1496_5: arahattaphalañcāti pannarasa cittāni paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ arahato honti.
tika-abh08t0:1497_0: Tevīsāti paṭhamāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa vuttesu catuvīsaticittesu ākāsānañcāyatanakusalavipākavajjā
tika-abh08t0:1497_1: bāvīsati ca dutiyāruppavipāko cāti tevīsati dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa honti.
tika-abh08t0:1497_2: Tattheva tiṇṇaṃ phalaṭṭhasekhānaṃ puthujjanassa vuttesu akusalapañcakavajjāni aṭṭhārasa,
tika-abh08t0:1499_1: ākiñcaññāyatanavipāko cāti bāvīsati cittāni tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1500_4: “Ṭhapetvā paṭhamaṃ phala”nti hi vacanato dutiyaphalaṃ pakkhipitvāti ayamattho avuttasiddho.
tika-abh08t0:1500_12: arahattaphalanti terasa cittāni tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ khīṇāsavassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1500_13: Tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa vuttesu dvāvīsaticittesu ākiñcaññāyatanakusalavipākavajjāti vīsati,
tika-abh08t0:1500_14: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavipākoti ekavīsati cittāni catutthāruppabhūmiyaṃ puthujjanassa jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1500_20: arahattaphalañcāti dvādasa cittāni tattheva arahato uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1501_5: ākiñcaññāyatanikānaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇañcāyatanakusalavipākāti evamādinā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā arūpā nuppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1503_1: heṭṭhimanti dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ vuttesu dutiyāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pākena saha tatiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1503_2: ekūnacattālīsa cittāni tatthavuttesu tatiyāruppattayaṃ ṭhapetvā attano pākena saha sattatiṃsāti evaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1503_5: dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ dutiyāruppavipākoti evaṃ attano attano vipākā cattāro ca anāsavā lokuttaravipākāti
tika-abh08t0:1503_6: evaṃ catūsu arūpabhūmīsu ekekāya bhūmiyā pañca pañca vipākā jāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1503_9: Dutiyāruppabhūmiyaṃ khīṇāsavassa paṭhamāruppakiriyacittaṃ vajjetvā dvādaseva kriyā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1504_1: Idāni kevalaṃ puggalavasena tesameva puggalānaṃ āveṇikacittaṃ dassetuṃ “arahato panā”tiādinā arahatoyeva
tika-abh08t0:1504_2: uppajjanakacittaṃ dassetvā anāgāmiādīnaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ sakasakaphalacittaṃ pākaṭamevāti saṃkhittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1504_8: Idāni tesaṃ tesaṃ puggalānaṃ sādhāraṇacittāni dassetuṃ “catunnañca phalaṭṭhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1505_1: Susāranti atthabyañjanavasena pariccajitabbassa pheggussa abhāvato suṭṭhu sāraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1505_7: Rāgadosānaṃ mohena saha avinābhāvato tassa anupagamanaṃ atthasiddhamevāti “mohandhakārappadīpa”nti vatvāpi “naraṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1505_9: “Mohandhakārappadīpa”nti vā vacaneneva mohassa anupagamo vutto hotīti rāgadosānameva anupagamanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1505_10: Mūlabhūtānaṃ pana tiṇṇaṃ anupagamanavacanena sesakilesānampi anupagamanaṃ vuttamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1515_2: Nanu ca “cittaṃ cetasika”ntiādinā cittādīniyeva uddiṭṭhānīti tāneva niddisitabbāni,
tika-abh08t0:1515_4: taṃ kasmā idha vuccatīti codanaṃ manasi karitvā āha “tena vinā natthi hi sambhavo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1515_6: na hi anārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ nāma atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1515_7: tasmā “tayidaṃ cittaṃ kaṃ ārabbha uppajjatī”ti āsaṅkānivāraṇatthaṃ ito paraṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassayissāmīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1516_11: Tattha sayaṃ sampattiṃ phoṭṭhabbassa nissayavasena sampatti gandharasaghānajivhākāyānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1516_15: sanidassano ca so sappaṭigho cāti sanidassanasappaṭigho. Etthāha –
tika-abh08t0:1516_19: Tassa ca rūpāyatanato anaññattā kathaṃ saha nidassanena sanidassanoti yujjatīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1516_20: anaññattepi tassa aññehi dhammehi rūpāyatanaṃ visesetuṃ aññaṃ viya katvā vuttaṃ “saha nidassanena sanidassana”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1516_21: Dhammasabhāvasāmaññena hi ekībhūtesu dhammesu yo nānattakaro viseso,
tika-abh08t0:1516_22: so aññaṃ viya katvā upacārituṃ yutto.
tika-abh08t0:1516_24: Rūpārammaṇasaññitoti ayaṃ evarūpo vaṇṇo rūpārammaṇanti saññito.
tika-abh08t0:1516_26: cattāro mahābhūte upādāya te amuñcitvā pavattamāno kammasamuṭṭhāno cittasamuṭṭhāno utusamuṭṭhāno āhārasamuṭṭhāno
tika-abh08t0:1516_27: ca nīlādivasena dissamāno indriyehi ghaṭṭento ca vaṇṇo rūpārammaṇaṃ nāmāti.
tika-abh08t0:1517_3: te vā sambhavā paccayā imassāti cittotusambhavo.
tika-abh08t0:1517_5: saviññāṇakasaddo pana na kevalaṃ saviññāṇakasantānappavattova kucchisaddādivasena tassa utusamuṭṭhitassāpi sambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1518_4: paṭicchannapupphaphalādīni “idamettha atthī”ti pesuññaṃ karontaṃ viya hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1519_4: Evañhi “rasamānā naṃ asantīti raso”ti niruttinayo sundaro hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1519_5: Itarathā “rasanti assādentī”ti vuccamāne “rasamānā”ti idaṃ niratthakameva siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1520_12: na sītatā nāma koci guṇo atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1520_16: Tathā hi ghammakāle ātape ṭhatvā chāyaṃ paviṭṭhānaṃ sītavuddhi hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1520_18: Kiñcarahi himapātasamayādīsu sītassa paripācakattadassanato ca tejodhātu eva sītatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1520_20: ekasmiṃ kalāpe uṇhabhāvena saddhiṃ upalabbheyya dvinnaṃ dhātūnaṃ avinibbhogappavattito,
tika-abh08t0:1520_24: anicchantānampi pana catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ ekasmiṃ kalāpe kiccadassanena sabhāgavuttitāya sādhitāya idameva uttaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1520_33: te vattabbā “dravabhāvopi nāma phusīyatīti idaṃ āyasmantānaṃ adhimānamattaṃ saṇṭhāne viyā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1525_3: Nibbānaṃ pana cittacetasikassa attānaṃ pati nāmanato nāmaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1526_1: Imāni pana chabbidhāni ārammaṇāni sabbāni sabbattha labbhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1526_3: Tīṇi rūpeti rūpāvacarabhūmiyaṃ rūpasaddadhammavasena tīṇi ārammaṇāni labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1526_4: Ghānādittayassa pana tattha abhāvato gandhārammaṇādīni dhammārammaṇato visuṃ na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1526_5: Arūpabhave pana sabbaso rūpānaṃ abhāvato ekaṃ dhammārammaṇameva labbhati,
tika-abh08t0:1526_7: Nanu ca arūpabhavato cavitvā kāmabhave nibbattantānaṃ arūpabhaveyeva gatinimittavasena rūpārammaṇaṃ upaṭṭhātīti?
tika-abh08t0:1527_2: pavattippabhedato ca dassetvā idāni tesu abhayagirivāsīnaṃ kiñci vippaṭipattiṃ dassetvā taṃ paṭikkhipituṃ “khaṇavatthuparittattā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1527_3: Tattha khaṇavatthuparittattāti khaṇassa ceva vatthuno ca parittattā.
tika-abh08t0:1527_8: Te hi dhammārammaṇaṃ vavatthāpento attanā saha taṃ sambandhenti,
tika-abh08t0:1527_11: ye rūpādayo pañca ārammaṇā santattaayoguḷe patitajalabindu viya parittakkhaṇikā,
tika-abh08t0:1527_13: tato ca sakasakaviññāṇānaṃ āpāthaṃ na gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:1527_18: kuṭṭādiantaritābhāvena ca āpāthaṃ anāgacchantānampi rūpādīnaṃ saṅgaho kato hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1528_1: pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ nānāvisayānaṃ nānāgocarānaṃ na aññamaññassa gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhontānaṃ mano paṭissaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1529_0: Idaṃ suttaṃ āharitvā paṭikkhipitabbāti dassento āha “te paṭikkhipitabbāvā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1529_3: bhontānanti cakkhundriyaṃ sotindriyassa gocaraṃ na paccanubhoti,
tika-abh08t0:1529_4: tathā “sotindriyaṃ cakkhundriyassā”tiādinā aññamaññassa ārammaṇaṃ neva paccanubhontānaṃ nānubhavantānaṃ na gaṇhantānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1530_6: yadi cakkhādīnamāpāthagatāni vinā avasesā dhammārammaṇā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1530_7: tadā taṃvisayaṃ cittaṃ pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhontaṃ nāma na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1530_8: attanoyeva pana visayaṃ paccanubhontaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1530_9: Evañca sati manova tesaṃ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotīti dupparihāriyaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1530_10: na ca taṃ suttavacanaṃ sakkā atikkametuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1530_11: tasmā vuttanayena cakkhādīnaṃ anāpāthagatāpi manogocarā rūpādayo rūpādiārammaṇāneva honti,
tika-abh08t0:1530_13: Yadi rūpārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ attano visayaṃ nānubhoti,
tika-abh08t0:1530_18: Dassanādikiccassa akaraṇepi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi diṭṭhādiākārasseva gahaṇato pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhoti nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1530_19: Yadi hi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi diṭṭhādiākāraṃ na gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1530_21: na pañcaviññāṇānīti tathā jānanameva na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1530_23: anāpāthagatarūpādārammaṇaṃ cittaṃ attano visayaṃ na paccanubhoti nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1530_27: tassa pana anubhavanaṃ dassanādikiccavirahena dhammārammaṇavasenevāti ce? Tampi na,
tika-abh08t0:1530_29: Yadi hi cittaṃ dassanādikiccavirahena pañcindriyavisayaṃ dhammārammaṇavaseneva paccanubhoti,
tika-abh08t0:1530_30: pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhavamānā manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātupi dhammārammaṇāyeva siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1530_31: evañca sati “dhammāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭṭhāne vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1531_0: “Rūpāyatanaṃ saddāyatanaṃ gandhāyatanaṃ rasāyatanaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ manodhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1532_1: dhammāyatanaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuyā taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti ca –
tika-abh08t0:1533_0: Vuttattā pañcindriyānaṃ visayaṃ paccanubhontī manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātu taṃpañcindriyānaṃ visayavasena paccanubhoti,
tika-abh08t0:1534_1: Evaṃ ekenākārena paṭikkhepavidhiṃ dassetvā puna aparenapi kāraṇena dassento āha “dibbacakkhādī”tiādi. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1534_3: Itipi na yujjatīti na kevalaṃ pubbe vutteneva kāraṇena,
tika-abh08t0:1534_4: atha kho imināpi kāraṇena na yujjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1534_5: Yadipi cakkhādīnaṃ anāpāthagatarūpādīni dhammārammaṇā nāma honti,
tika-abh08t0:1534_6: tadā dibbacakkhādīni rūpādiārammaṇāni na siyuṃ tesaṃ pasādavisayānaṃ rūpasaddānaṃ pariggaṇhanato,
tika-abh08t0:1534_7: evañca sati suttesu dibbacakkhudibbasotānaṃ dhammārammaṇatāva vattabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1535_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1535_1: vā saddārammaṇaṃ vā gandhārammaṇaṃ vā rasārammaṇaṃ vā phoṭṭhabbārammaṇaṃ vā dhammārammaṇaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t0:1536_1: Kiñca anāpāthagatānaṃ dhammārammaṇatte sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ na hotīti āpajjatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1536_2: Evaṃ satīti yadi kadāci rūpādiārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadāci dhammārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1536_3: kadāci dhammārammaṇaṃ hutvā kadāci rūpādiārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1536_4: tadā tesaṃ rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ niyamopi kathaṃ bhave “idaṃ rūpādiārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1537_1: Evaṃ chabbidhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ dassetvā idānissa anantarabhedaṃ parittārammaṇādittikavasena dassento āha “sabbaṃ ārammaṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1537_2: Chabbidhaṃ parittattikādikaṃ taṃ etaṃ sabbaṃ ārammaṇanti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1537_4: Parittārammaṇattiko hi idha “parittattiko”ti vutto majjhapadalopavasena. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1537_5: ggahaṇena maggārammaṇattiko atītārammaṇattiko ajjhattārammaṇattikoti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ tikānaṃ saṅgaho.
tika-abh08t0:1538_1: Kriyāhetudvayanti ahetukakiriyadvayaṃ hasituppādamanodhātu itarassa mahaggatādiārammaṇatāvasenāpi vakkhamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1538_7: ttayassa tūti kiriyāmanodhātuyā ceva kusalākusalavipākavibhāgavasena dvinnaṃ manodhātūnañca sabbaṃ rūpādipañcakagocaraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1538_8: Tā hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ purimapacchimā hutvā niyatā rūpādīneva ārabbha pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1539_2: Tattha hi nesaṃ sabbesaṃ vatthārammaṇāni upalabbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1539_7: Neva kiñcīti vatthārammaṇānaṃ sabbaso abhāvato etesu kiñci na jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1541_1: Evaṃ parittārammaṇe dassetvā idāni mahaggatārammaṇe appamāṇārammaṇe ca dassetuṃ “dutiyāruppacittañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1542_4: honti teti aṭṭha ñāṇavippayuttacittuppādā sekhaputhujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ kadāci nirussukkabhāvena ādarākaraṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:1542_12: Paṇṇattidhamme ārabbha pavattanakāle siyā navattabbā parittārammaṇādivasena.
tika-abh08t0:1542_13: Diṭṭhivippayuttāni teyeva dhamme ārabbha vinā parāmāsena assādanābhinandanavasena pavattiyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1542_18: Kriyatopi ca tathāti kiriyacittatopi ñāṇasampayuttā cattāroti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1543_0: Tividho hoti gocaroti parittamahaggataappamāṇavasena tividhopi gocaro hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1543_2: kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattakāle kāmāvacarārammaṇikaabhiññāya parikammānulomakāle ca parittārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1543_3: Paṭhamajjhānādipaccavekkhaṇakāle mahaggatārammaṇajhānādīnaṃ parikammakāle mahaggatadhamme ārabbha sammasanakāle ca mahaggatārammaṇā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1543_4: Yathālābhaṃ gotrabhuvodānakāle pana lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇakāle ca nibbānārammaṇābhiññāya parikammakāle ca appamāṇārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1543_7: Kiriyāvoṭṭhabbanampi yathāvuttadhammānaṃ taṃtaṃārammaṇe pavattamānānaṃ purecaraṃ hutvā taṃ tadeva āvajjantaṃ pavattatīti parittādiārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1544_0: Vuttāvasesānīti yathāvuttehi avasiṭṭhāni pannarasa rūpāvacarāni paṭhamatatiyāni,
tika-abh08t0:1546_1: Evaṃ parittārammaṇattikavasena visayīvibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni yasmā appamāṇārammaṇaniddeseneva maggārammaṇattikasaṅgahitopi
tika-abh08t0:1546_3: tasmā taṃ pahāya atītārammaṇattikavasena dassetuṃ “dutiyāruppacittañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1546_6: Paccuppannāva gocarāti rūpādimhi dharamāneyeva pañcadvārikacittānaṃ uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1546_7: Anāgatārammaṇaṃ pana niyataṃ kiñci natthi anāgataṃsañāṇassapi pañcamajjhānato abhinnattā.
tika-abh08t0:1547_1: nāgatagocarāti aṭṭha tāva mahāvipākā devamanussānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle kammaṃ vā kammanimittaṃ vā ārabbha pavattiyaṃ atītārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1547_3: Gatinimittaṃ pana kadāci kammanimittañca ārabbha paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle,
tika-abh08t0:1547_6: Manodvāre pana atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānaṃ javanānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1547_10: Pañcadvāre ca santīraṇakāle paccuppannārammaṇāva hontīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1547_14: Hasituppādacittaṃ pana khīṇāsavānaṃ pañcadvāre haṭṭhapahaṭṭhākāraṃ kurumānānaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1547_15: manodvāre atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha hasituppādavasena pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1547_23: Paññattinibbānāni hi idha atītādikālavasena navattabbānīti tadārammaṇāni atītārammaṇādivasena navattabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1547_29: Tassa pana apāṭhabhāvaṃ ajānantā atthahānimpi asallakkhetvā vacanavipallāsavasena paññattikālasmiṃ satīti atthaṃ likhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1548_0: Akusalesu cattāro diṭṭhisampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhedānaṃ tebhūmakadhammānaṃ assādanābhinandanaparāmasanakāle atītādiārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1548_4: Dve paṭighasampayuttacittuppādā atītādibhede dhamme ārabbha dussanakāle atītādiārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1548_6: Vicikicchuddhaccasampayuttā tesu dhammesu aniṭṭhaṅgatabhāvena ca avūpasamavikkhepavasena ca pavattiyaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1548_12: Kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu pana upekkhāsahagatā pañcadvāre voṭṭhabbanavasena pavattiyaṃ paccuppannārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1548_13: manodvāre atītānāgatapaccuppannārammaṇānañceva paññattinibbānārammaṇānañca javanānaṃ purecārikakāle atītānāgatapaccuppannanavattabbārammaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1549_3: Rūpato pañcamī kriyāti rūpāvacarapañcamajjhānasaṅkhātā kiriyābhiññā ca.
tika-abh08t0:1549_5: kālavimuttesu ca agocaraṃ nāma kiñci natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1551_0: Vuttanayānusāreneva ajjhattārammaṇattikasaṅgahitopi visayīvibhāgo sakkā viññātunti so visuṃ na uddhaṭo.
tika-abh08t0:1551_2: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti ime tāva kusalavipākakiriyāvasena cha cittuppādā attano santānasambandhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1551_6: lokuttarakusalavipākāni ca niyakajjhattato bahibhāvena bahiddhābhūtāni pathavīkasiṇādīni ārabbha pavattito bahiddhārammaṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:1551_8: Tattha kāmāvacarakusalato cattāro ñāṇasampayuttacittuppādā attano khandhādīni paccavekkhantassa ajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1551_15: parassa khandhādīsu ceva anindriyabaddharūpakasiṇādīsu ca tatheva pavattikāle bahiddhārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1551_18: tisso ca manodhātuyoti ime terasa cittuppādā attano rūpādīni ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1551_21: somanassasahagataṃ santīraṇaṃ pañcadvāre santīraṇatadārammaṇavasena attano pañcarūpādidhamme manodvāre
tika-abh08t0:1551_22: tadārammaṇavasena aññepi ajjhattike kāmāvacaradhamme ārabbha pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1552_0: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ sugatiduggatīsu paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasenāpi ajjhattādibhedesu kammādīsu pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1552_1: Aṭṭha mahāvipākāni paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena ajjhattādibhedesu dhammesu pavattanato ajjhattādiālambaṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:1552_2: Hasituppādampi attano rūpādīni ārabbha pahaṭṭhākārakaraṇavasena pavattiyaṃ ajjhattārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1553_0: 329. “Phalaṃ, magga”nti ca sāmaññena pucchitattā āha “cattāro…pe… puññato”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1554_1: Arahattamaggaphalāni pana te jānituṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh08t0:1554_4: Voṭṭhabbanassa āvajjanakiccasamayaṃ sandhāya gāthābandhasukhatthaṃ “voṭṭhabbanampi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1554_6: puññato”ti idaṃ ñāṇasampayuttassāpi sekhaputhujjanasantānappavattassa aggamaggaphalajānane asamatthatāya nidassanamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1555_4: Yasmā puthujjanā vā sekhā vā arahato maggacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1555_7: Ayañca nesaṃ asamatthatā anadhigatattā anadhigate ca visaye sabbesampi moho atthevāti dassetuṃ “puthujjano na jānātī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1555_11: Tathā hi vuttaṃ “atha kho māro pāpimā bhagavato cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāyā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1555_13: Yatheva heṭṭhimo heṭṭhimo puggalo uparūpari cittaṃ na jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:1555_14: evaṃ uparimo uparimopi heṭṭhimassa heṭṭhimassa cittaṃ na jānātīti ce?
tika-abh08t0:1555_16: so pana attanā adhigatavisayattā jānātiyevāti dassento āha “uparūparī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1556_1: Evampi visayīpadhānavasena vibhāgaṃ dassetvā idāni visayappadhānavasena dassetuṃ “yo dhammo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1556_3: Kāmeti padaṃ ubhayattha sambandhitabbaṃ “kāme kusalārammaṇaṃ kāme kusalākusalassā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1556_4: Kiñcāpi hi akusalassa ekantakāmāvacarattā na etassa visesitabbatā atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1556_5: kusalaṃ pana visesitabbamevāti taṃ apekkhāya “kāme”ti uparipadena sambandhitabbameva.
tika-abh08t0:1556_6: Atha vā akusalasahacariyato kusalampi kāmāvacarameva gayhatīti “kāme”ti idaṃ purimapadasseva visesanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1557_0: Kāmāvacarapākassāti pañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanānaṃ ekantena rūpakkhandhārammaṇattā tadavasesassa ekādasavidhassa kāmāvacaravipākassa.
tika-abh08t0:1557_3: ārammaṇaṃ siyāti ettha kusalassa tāva attanā katassa dānādikāmāvacarakusalassa pasannacittena anussaraṇakāle,
tika-abh08t0:1557_6: cetopariyañāṇādīnaṃ parittakusalārammaṇikaabhiññānaṃ parikammādikāle ca ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1557_7: Akusalesu ca catunnaṃ diṭṭhigatasampayuttānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ ārabbha assādanābhinandanaparāmasanakāle,
tika-abh08t0:1557_8: diṭṭhivippayuttānaṃ kevalaṃ assādanādikāle ca dvinnaṃ paṭighasampayuttānaṃ attanā,
tika-abh08t0:1557_18: karissatī”ti jānanakāle ca kiriyacittassāpi khīṇāsavānaṃ attanā,
tika-abh08t0:1557_21: sabbesampi tadārammaṇānaṃ kāmāvacarakusalārammaṇikajavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇakāle ca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1557_25: manodvārāvajjanassa pana kāmāvacarakusalārammaṇikajavanānaṃ purecārikakāle ca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ kāmāvacarakusalaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1558_3: Ettha ca kiriyacittesu hasituppādo na sambhavati ekantaparittārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:1558_10: “iminā kammena imasmiṃ brahmaloke nibbattissatī”ti jānanakāle ca “anāgate jhānaṃ bhāvessatī”ti vā jānanakāle,
tika-abh08t0:1558_11: kiriyābhiññāya ca khīṇāsavānaṃ yathāvuttavasena pavattikāle ca navavidhassa pana kiriyacittassa khīṇāsavānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1558_12: heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacarakusalapaccavekkhaṇakāleti evaṃ rūpāvacarakusalaṃ pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1559_11: tāva abhiññākusalassa ca rūpāvacarārammaṇesu vuttanayena dutiyacatutthāruppassa paṭhamatatiyavasenāti
tika-abh08t0:1559_12: evaṃ tebhūmakakusalassa tathā sekhaputhujjanakāle attano santānagatassa,
tika-abh08t0:1559_13: parasantānagatassa vā āruppakusalassa pajānanakāle kāmāvacararūpāvacarakiriyacittassa sekhaputhujjanakāleyeva
tika-abh08t0:1559_14: attanā nibbattitaṃ paṭhamatatiyāruppaṃ ārabbha khīṇāsavakāle dutiyacatutthāruppanibbattane arūpakiriyacittassāti
tika-abh08t0:1559_16: catutthadutiyānañca arūpāvacaravipākānanti evametesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ rāsīnaṃ arūpakusalamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1560_7: sadāti sekhānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇikakusalābhiññāya parikammādikāle ñāṇasampayuttakusalassa,
tika-abh08t0:1560_8: khīṇāsavānaṃ maggapaccavekkhaṇakāle maggārammaṇikakiriyābhiññāya ca parikammakāle ñāṇasampayuttakiriyacittassa,
tika-abh08t0:1560_9: tesaṃ tesaṃ javanānaṃ purecaravasena pavattikāle manodvārāvajjanassa,
tika-abh08t0:1560_11: paresaṃ vā maggajānanakāle abhiññādvayassāti evametesaṃ catunnaṃ rāsīnaṃ apariyāpannakusalamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1561_12: kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ anussaraṇakāle sabbampi ekādasatadārammaṇavipākassāti evaṃ kāmāvacaravipākānanti
tika-abh08t0:1562_8: vipākaṃ ārabbha tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ vipākārammaṇikakammunā paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantassa kammanimittavasena pavattiyañca kāmāvacaravipākassa,
tika-abh08t0:1562_9: assādanābhinandanaparāmāsādivasena pavattiyaṃ akusalassāti evametesaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ kāmāvacaravipākamārammaṇapaccayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1562_11: Kevalañhi taṃ kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ kiriyacittesu ca hasituppādassārammaṇaṃ na hotīti ayamettha viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1563_0: Kāmāvacarakiriyacittassa kāmāvacarakusalādīnaṃ channaṃ rāsīnamārammaṇakkamo kusalārammaṇe vuttasadisova.
tika-abh08t0:1563_1: Kevalañhi ettha yadetaṃ khīṇāsavasantānasseva niyataṃ navavidhaṃ kiriyacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1563_3: sasantāneva sekhaputhujjanakāle anāgatārammaṇikaabhiññāya parikammādivasappavattakusalassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1563_4: Vipākesu ca paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutisaṅkhātānaṃ vipākānaṃ kammārammaṇavasena ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti ayameva viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1564_0: Rūpāvacarakiriyacittassa pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇakkamo kusalārammaṇe vuttasadisova.
tika-abh08t0:1564_2: Āruppakiriyacittassāpi tesaṃ pañcannaṃ rāsīnaṃ gocarabhāvo vuttasadisova.
tika-abh08t0:1564_3: Āruppakiriyassa pana paṭhamatatiyaṃ dutiyacatutthasseva gocaro hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1565_4: Kiñcāpi na sabbameva rūpaṃ paccekaṃ catusamuṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1565_5: samudito pana rūpakkhandho catūhi eva samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhātīti katvā vuttaṃ “catusamuṭṭhāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1565_25: pañcadvāre āvajjanakāle pañcadvārāvajjanassa ca ārammaṇaṃ hotīti evaṃ catusamuṭṭhānikaṃ rūpaṃ channaṃ rāsīnamārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1566_5: maggaṭṭhānaṃ tadanantaraphalavaḷañjanaphalakālesu apariyāpannakusalavipākassa cāti evaṃ channaṃ rāsīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1567_8: tatiyāruppakusalādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ abhāvapaññattīti evaṃ paññatti navannaṃ rāsīnaṃ ārammaṇapaccayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1568_1: Evaṃ yo dhammo yassa dhammassa ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1568_2: taṃ ekekuddhāravasena dassetvā idāni sabbe catubhūmakacittuppāde chahi ārammaṇehi yojetvā dassetuṃ “rūpārammaṇikā dve”tiādi gāthāttayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1569_1: “Paṭhamāruppakusala”ntiādi pana heṭṭhā vuttanayampi arūpāvacarārammaṇesu arūpāvacaradhammānaṃ sekhāsekhavasena
tika-abh08t0:1569_4: Vipākassa pana khīṇāsavānaṃ pavattamānassāpi ārammaṇaṃ hoti tassa purimabhave kammanimittārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:1569_5: Arūpabhave atisantabhāvena pavattamānaṃ bhavaṅgacittaṃ na bhāvanāya parisuddhaṃ upaṭṭhātīti āha “paṭhamāruppapāko”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1569_6: Paṭhamaṃ tu kiriyacittaṃ puññassa dutiyāruppacetaso ārammaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1569_7: vipākassa dutiyāruppacetaso ārammaṇaṃ na hotīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1569_8: Tattha khīṇāsavakāle kassaci kusalassa abhāvato “na puññassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1569_9: Ākāsānañcāyatanakiriyāsamaṅgissa viññāṇañcāyatanavipākacittaṃ na pavattatīti “na pākassā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1569_11: nirodhasamāpajjanatthañca samāpattiyo samāpajjantassa paṭhamāruppakiriyacittaṃ dutiyassa ārammaṇaṃ hotīti āha “paṭhamaṃ tu kriyācitta”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1571_1: Yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbhāti rūpārūpanibbānapaññattīsu yaṃ yaṃ gocaraṃ ārabbha.
tika-abh08t0:1571_8: Taṃ imassa paramanipuṇagambhīranayasamaṅgitāya yāthāvato otarantehi akasirena tarituṃ asakkuṇeyyattā duppāpuṇeyyanti katvā āha “duttara”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1571_10: Abhidhammāvatārassa hi uttamatāya tadekadesabhūtapārampi uttamameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1571_13: na pana na sakkoti taṃ uttaritunti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1577_2: Niraṅgaṇenāti ettha rāgādayo akusalā aṅganti etehi taṃsamaṅgino puggalā nihīnabhāvaṃ gacchantīti aṅgaṇāti vuccanti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1578_4: akusalānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ adhivacanaṃ yadidaṃ aṅgaṇa”nti ca ādi.
tika-abh08t0:1579_0: Attano santāne sīlādiguṇe esī gavesīti guṇesī,
tika-abh08t0:1579_9: Ettakena pana thomanena bhagavato vipākadesanāya niyyānikādibhāvaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1579_14: Bhagavato pana sabbaññubhāvato tena desitaṃ niyyānikaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1580_1: Idāni vipākakathāya mātikāvasena aṭṭhakathāya ṭhapite dasappakāre dassetuṃ “ekūnatiṃsa kammānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1580_2: Tattha yathāraddhāya vipākakathāya mūlakāraṇabhāvato “ekūnatiṃsa kammānī”ti paṭhamaṃ kammavavatthānaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1580_3: Kamme pana kathite vipākakathāya adhiṭṭhānabhūtā vipākāpi kathetabbāti “pākā dvattiṃsa dassitā”ti dutiyaṃ vipākavavatthānaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1580_6: Kammavipākānaṃ vacanappasaṅgeyeva ekasseva kammassa taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma anekaphalanipphādanaṃ dassetuṃ “kusalaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1580_7: vividhaṃ phala”nti catutthaṃ kāmāvacarakusalassa pavattipaṭisandhīsu nānāphalanipphādanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1580_8: Evaṃ vutte pana pavattipaṭisandhīnaṃ labbhamānavipākavasena vuttabhāvaṃ ajānantā –
tika-abh08t0:1584_0: Evamādivacanassa byañjanacchāyāya atthaṃ gahetvā dinnapaṭisandhikāyapi cetanāya puna paṭisandhidānaṃ maññeyyunti “ekāya…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1584_1: pakāsitā”ti pañcamaṃ ekena kammena ekissāyeva paṭisandhiyā nibbattanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1584_2: Ekasmiṃ bhave nānākammassa vipākappavattiṃ suṇantā “disvā kumāraṃ satapuññalakkhaṇa”ntiādivacanassa atthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1584_5: Tathā vipaccantassa ca ekassa kammassa soḷasa vipākāni dvādasamaggo ahetukaṭṭhakampīti ayaṃ vipākavibhāgo
tika-abh08t0:1584_7: na ca hoti tihetukā”ti sattamaṃ aṭṭhakathāya āgatahetukittanaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1584_8: Taṃ pana hetukittanaṃ ekekassa kammassa vipākavibhāgadassanatthanti.
tika-abh08t0:1584_11: tipiṭakamahādhammarakkhitattherassāti tiṇṇaṃ therānaṃ vādesu “ekāya cetanāya dvādasa vipākāni ettheva
tika-abh08t0:1584_13: “ekāya cetanāya dasa vipākāni ettheva ahetukaṭṭhakampī”ti āgatassa tatiyattherassa vādassa ca na sammāpatiṭṭhitattā
tika-abh08t0:1584_14: suppatiṭṭhitassa paṭhamattheravādassa vasena dassetuṃ vipākesu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāravidhānaṃ paccayabalena hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1584_16: “asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāra”ntiādinā kammena saha asamānampi katvā saṅkhārabhedo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1584_17: Kammassa somanassupekkhāsahagatabhāvepi ārammaṇavaseneva vipākavedanāya parivattanaṃ dassetuṃ “ārammaṇena…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1584_19: Kammavasena ceva ārammaṇavasena ca aniyatassa tadārammaṇassa javanavasena niyamadassanatthaṃ “tadārammaṇa…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1585_3: tasmā lokuttarakusalaṃ vajjetvā ekūnatiṃseva kammāni vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1585_12: manodvāradvārattayavasena bhinnānaṃ vipākadāyakānameva saṅgaṇhanatthaṃ “tīsu dvāresū”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1586_0: Taṃ taṃ paccayamāgammāti kālasampadādikaṃ taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma. Tenāhu porāṇā –
tika-abh08t0:1589_0: Atha vā taṃ taṃ paccayanti somanassādihetubhūtaṃ taṃ taṃ sahakāripaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1590_8: Yañhi kammaṃ attano pavattikāle purimapacchābhāgappavattehi kusaladhammehi parivāritaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1591_3: paṭisandhiyaṃ pana ayaṃ visesoti dassento āha “tihetukenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1591_5: omakena pana duhetukukkaṭṭhena ca duhetukā paṭisandhi,
tika-abh08t0:1591_6: duhetukomakena pana ahetukāvāti ayaṃ viseso veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1591_9: tasmā taṃsampayuttaṃ kammaṃ jaccandhādivipattipaccayaṃ na hotīti tihetukaṃ atidubbalampi samānaṃ duhetukapaṭisandhimeva ākaḍḍhati,
tika-abh08t0:1591_11: Yasmā paṭisambhidāmagge sugatiyaṃ jaccandhabadhirādivipattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ vajjetvā gatisampattiyā ahetukūpapattiṃ dassentena dhammasenāpatinā –
tika-abh08t0:1592_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1592_1: gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
tika-abh08t0:1592_2: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1592_4: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1592_6: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1593_0: Evaṃ javanakkhaṇe tiṇṇaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttavipākuppatti vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1593_6: yathā “aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hotī”ti vatvā tassa vibhaṅgo kato,
tika-abh08t0:1593_7: evaṃ “gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1593_8: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
tika-abh08t0:1593_9: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:1593_10: nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:1593_11: paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1593_12: nāmarūpa”nti sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā ñāṇasampayuttūpapattiṃ vatvā tassa vibhaṅgo kātabbo siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1595_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte channaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1595_2: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe dve hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1595_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1595_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1596_0: Evaṃ duhetukakammena duhetukūpapattiṃ uddharitvā “gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1596_1: Gatisampattiyā ñāṇavippayutte katamesaṃ sattannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti?
tika-abh08t0:1596_2: Kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1596_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe… saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1596_4: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dve hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1596_5: nāmarūpa”nti evaṃ tihetukakammena duhetukapaṭisandhiyāpi anuddhaṭattā sāpi na hotīti ce?
tika-abh08t0:1596_7: duhetukomakakammena ahetukapaṭisandhiyā viya tihetukomakena duhetukapaṭisandhiyāva dātabbattā,
tika-abh08t0:1596_8: kammasarikkhakavipākadassanatthaṃ pana mahātherena pāṭho sāvaseso kato.
tika-abh08t0:1597_0: Yadi evaṃ purimavuttehi idaṃ samānaṃ kammasarikkhakatābhāvatoti duhetukakammena tihetukapaṭisandhi na uddhaṭā,
tika-abh08t0:1598_1: kiṃ panetaṃ kammameva paṭisandhiṃ dentaṃ attanā sadisavedanameva deti,
tika-abh08t0:1598_5: Tathā hi papañcasūdaniyā majjhimaṭṭhakathāya mahākammavibhaṅgasutte sukhavedanīyādikammavaṇṇanāya –
tika-abh08t0:1599_1: rūpāvacarakusalato catukkajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu sukhavedanāya jananato sukhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1600_0: “Akusalacetanā pavatte kāyadvārappavattadukkhassa jananato dukkhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1601_1: rūpāvacarakusalato catutthajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu tatiyavedanāya jananato adukkhamasukhavedanīyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1601_2: Ettha ca “kāmāvacaraṃ paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t0:1602_3: na ca somanassasahagatakammena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantassa iṭṭhārammaṇameva kammanimittādikamāpāthamāgacchatīti niyamo atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1602_4: upekkhāsahagatakammena vā iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇanti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1602_6: iṭṭhādiārammaṇampi āpāthamāgacchantaṃ kammabaleneva āgacchatīti somanassasahagatakammena paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle
tika-abh08t0:1602_8: upekkhāsahagatakammena iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇanti na na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1602_12: vedanāparivattana”nti idaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ sandhāya vuttanti na tena paṭisandhiyā kammasarikkhakavedanābhāvo paṭikkhipituṃ sakkā,
tika-abh08t0:1602_13: duhetukomakaṃ pana somanassasahagatampi attano nihīnatāya duhetukaphaluppādane asamatthattā,
tika-abh08t0:1602_14: ahetukāya ca attanā sadisavedanāya paṭisandhiyā asambhavato upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhiyā anurūpato iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇamupaṭṭhapetvā
tika-abh08t0:1603_0: Nanu ca “pacchimabhavikamahābodhisattānaṃ mettāpubbabhāgaṃ somanassakammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ detī”ti aṭṭhakathāsu vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1603_4: tena gahitapaṭisandhikā hi mahajjhāsayā honti tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero viyā”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1603_5: tasmā somanassasahagatakusalato upekkhāsahagatapaṭisandhipi labbhati yathā ca,
tika-abh08t0:1603_6: evaṃ tathā upekkhāsahagatato somanassasahagatāpīti kathaṃ kammasadisavedanā paṭisandhīti?
tika-abh08t0:1603_7: Etthāpi ca kammampi upekkhāsahagatamevāti therassa adhippāyo siyāti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1603_9: Tathā hi vuttaṃ saṅgahakārehi “aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ayaṃ therassa manoratho,
tika-abh08t0:1603_10: natthi eta”nti paṭikkhipitvā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ hitūpacāro balavā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1603_12: tasmā paṭikkhittavādaṃ gahetvā na sakkā aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ cāletunti sampaṭicchitabbamevetaṃ kammasadisavedanā paṭisandhīti.
tika-abh08t0:1603_13: Asampaṭicchantehi vā aṭṭhakathāya adhippāyo sādhukaṃ kathetabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1604_0: Asaṅkhāranti asaṅkhārikakammaṃ. Asaṅkhāraṃ sasaṅkhārampi phalaṃ detīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1605_1: Vedanāparivattananti tassa tassa ārammaṇassa anurūpato somanassādivedanāya parivattanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1605_7: Na hi tassa ārammaṇavasena vedanābhedo atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1605_9: Dvipañcaviññāṇasampaṭicchanesu ca ṭhapetvā kāyaviññāṇadvayaṃ sesāni iṭṭhādīsu sabbattha heṭṭhā vuttakāraṇavaseneva upekkhāsahagatāni,
tika-abh08t0:1605_13: Hetuniyamanameva cettha javanavasena hoti vedanābhedassa ārammaṇeneva,
tika-abh08t0:1605_15: Ettha ca akusalavipākānaṃ vibhāgābhāvato kusalavipākatadārammaṇānameva ārammaṇajavanapaccayavasena niyamanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1605_17: tihetukukkaṭṭhakammena hi tadārammaṇaṃ pavattamānaṃ kammavasena niyamābhāvato sabbesupi kusalavipākatadārammaṇesu
tika-abh08t0:1605_19: ārammaṇajavanavaseneva vā niyataṃ ekameva uppajjati. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1605_23: Ahetukesu pana saṅkhārabhedābhāvato paccayavasena niyamanaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1605_24: Tattha ārammaṇena vedanāniyamanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1605_25: Javanavasena hetuniyamane pana kammasarikkhakahetuvasena tihetukāni duhetukāni ahetukānīti tīṇi javanāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1605_26: Tattha kammasarikkhakahetuvasena tihetukajavanāni nāma kāmāvacarakusalakiriyāsu ñāṇasampayuttajavanāni,
tika-abh08t0:1605_29: Akusalajavanānipi hi kusalakammasarikkhakahetuvasena ahetukāni kusalahetūnaṃ tesu abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1606_0: Tattha kammassa javanasadisatadārammaṇābhinipphādanasāmatthiye sati tihetukajavane javite tihetukatadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1606_6: utusampadādīnañca paccayānaṃ balavabhāve sati asaṅkhārikatadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1606_10: tadā upekkhāsahagataṃ tadārammaṇaṃ paṭibāhitvā somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1606_11: Somanassasahagatatadārammaṇesupi aniyamena ārammaṇavasena sabbesu sampattesu javanassa tihetukabhāve
tika-abh08t0:1606_13: Tihetukatadārammaṇesupi aniyamena javanavasena sabbesu sampattesu paccayassa balavabhāve sati sasaṅkhārikatadārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1606_15: Eteneva nayena sesaṃ tadārammaṇampi taṃtaṃjavanānurūpato niyamanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1607_0: Ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ pana paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā ārammaṇavasena ceva javanavasena ca niyamanaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1607_5: Tattha ārammaṇavasena ceva paccayavasena ca niyamanaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
tika-abh08t0:1607_6: Paricitavasena pana niyamane yebhuyyena tihetukakusalappavattiyā tesu paricitassa kadāci duhetuke,
tika-abh08t0:1607_7: ahetuke vā javane javite paricayavasena tihetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1607_8: Yebhuyyena ca duhetukajavanappavattiyā tattha paricitassa kadāci tihetuke,
tika-abh08t0:1607_9: ahetuke vā javane javite paricayavasena duhetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1607_10: Tatheva akusalesu paricitassa kadāci tihetukaduhetukesupi javanesu javitesu paricayavasena ahetukatadārammaṇameva hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1608_1: sahetuke khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
tika-abh08t0:1608_2: kusalākusale niruddhe ahetuko vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1609_3: pana duhetukukkaṭṭhena ca kammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ kammassa tihetukavipākadāne asamatthatāya tihetukajavanepi
tika-abh08t0:1609_6: Duhetukomakena pana kammena tadārammaṇappavattiyaṃ kammassa sahetukatadārammaṇanibbattane asamatthatāya
tika-abh08t0:1610_3: Catubbidhañhi ārammaṇaṃ atimahantaṃ mahantaṃ parittaṃ atiparittanti.
tika-abh08t0:1611_0: “Tathā hi visayaṃ āhu, catudhā ettha paṇḍitā;
tika-abh08t0:1613_1: Tathā hi āpāthagatakkhaṇato paṭṭhāya yāva soḷasacittakkhaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:1613_12: Atimahante hi ārammaṇe pañcadvāresu yathānurūpaṃ aññatarasmiṃ dvāre āpāthagate pasādaghaṭṭanānubhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1613_15: Yathā pana vegena dhāvanto puriso antarā ṭhātukāmopi ekadvepadavāre atikkamitvāva ṭhātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1613_19: vegena javamānā bhavaṅgasantati antarā occhijjamānāpi pasādaghaṭṭanato paraṃ dvattikkhattuṃ uppajjitvāva occhijjati.
tika-abh08t0:1613_20: Tattha paṭhamacittaṃ bhavaṅgasantatiyā calanākārena uppajjanato bhavaṅgacalanaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t0:1616_0: Yadi evaṃ dutiyassapi taṃ atthīti tampi bhavaṅgacalanamicceva vattabbanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1616_1: bhavaṅgassa pana upacchijjanavasena pavattivisesaṃ gahetvā purimassa nāmato visadisanāmaṃ kātuṃ “bhavaṅgupacchedo”ti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1616_2: Nanu ca rūpādīhi pasāde ghaṭṭite pasādanissitasseva calanaṃ yuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1616_5: Yathā hi bheriyā ekasmiṃ tale ṭhitasakkharāya makkhikāya nipannāya aparasmiṃ tale daṇḍādinā pahaṭe anukkamena
tika-abh08t0:1616_6: bhericammavarattādīnaṃ calanena sakkharāya calitāya makkhikāya palāyanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1616_7: evameva rūpādimhi pasāde ghaṭṭite tannissayesu mahābhūtesu calitesu anukkamena taṃsambandhānaṃ sesarūpānampi
tika-abh08t0:1616_8: calanena hadayavatthumhi calite tannissitassa bhavaṅgassa calanākārena pavatti hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1619_0: Evaṃ bhavaṅgacalanabhavaṅgupacchedesu uppajjitvā niruddhesu “kiṃ nāmeta”nti vadantī viya vīthicittāni
tika-abh08t0:1619_2: tassānantaraṃ yathārahaṃ dassanādikiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcaviññāṇadhātūsu aññatarā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1619_3: tadanantaraṃ tāya gahitamevārammaṇaṃ sampaṭicchamānā vipākāhetukamanodhātu uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1619_6: tadanantaraṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyajavanesu yaṃ kiñci laddhapaccayaṃ tadevārammaṇaṃ ārabbha javanaṃ hutvā yebhuyyena sattakkhattuṃ javati,
tika-abh08t0:1619_7: tadanantaraṃ ekādasatadārammaṇacittesu aññataraṃ kammaṃ ārammaṇaṃ javanaṃ paccayo paricitatāti imesaṃ anurūpavasena dvikkhattuṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1620_0: Idha ṭhatvā imissā cittaparamparāya sukhaggahaṇatthaṃ ambopamā veditabbā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1620_1: Eko kira puriso phalitambarukkhassa heṭṭhā sasīsaṃ pārupitvā nipanno niddāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1620_2: athekaṃ ambapakkaṃ vaṇṭato muccitvā tassa kaṇṇasakkhaliṃ puñchamānaṃ viya “ṭha”nti bhūmiyaṃ patati,
tika-abh08t0:1620_3: so tassa saddena pabujjhitvā sīsato vatthaṃ apanetvā cakkhuṃ ummīletvā olokesi,
tika-abh08t0:1620_4: tato hatthaṃ pasāretvā phalaṃ gahetvā madditvā upasiṅghitvā pakkabhāvaṃ ñatvā paribhuñjitvā mukhagataṃ saha semhena assādetvā puna tatheva niddāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1620_5: Tattha tassa purisassa ambarukkhamūle niddāyanakālo viya bhavaṅgasamaṅgikālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_7: patanasaddena pabuddhakālo viya manodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_8: ummīletvā olokitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dassanakiccaṃ sādhanakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_9: hatthaṃ pasāretvā gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇasampaṭicchanakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_10: gahetvā madditakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_13: mukhagataṃ saha semhena assāditakālo viya tadārammaṇassa javanena anubhūtārammaṇaanubhavanakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1620_14: puna niddāyanaṃ viya puna bhavaṅgakāloti evamettha upamāsaṃsandanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1621_7: javanasseva pana ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ tadārammaṇassa etena anubhūtasseva anubhavananti evaṃ kiccavasena dhammānaṃ aññamaññāsaṃkiṇṇataṃ dīpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1621_8: evaṃ pavattamānaṃ pana cittaṃ “tvaṃ āvajjanaṃ nāma hohi,
tika-abh08t0:1621_10: tvaṃ sampaṭicchanaṃ nāmā”tiādinā niyuñjake kārake asatipi cittaniyāmavaseneva pavattatīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1621_11: Taṃ pana cittaniyāmaṃ saddhiṃ utuniyāmādīhi paricchedāvasāne vakkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1622_0: Mahantārammaṇe pana tadārammaṇuppādassa abhāvato tasmiṃ āpāthagate vuttanayena javanapariyosānesu vīthicittesu uppannesu bhavaṅgapātova hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1622_1: ārammaṇassa pana parikkhīṇāyukattā ekacittakkhaṇikappamāṇepi vā āyumhi sati samāsannamaraṇo viya puriso dubbalabhāvato tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1622_4: Ekacittakkhaṇāvasiṭṭhe ca ārammaṇe ekasmiṃ tadārammaṇe uppannesu dutiyassa uppajjanakāle tassa niruddhattā nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1622_5: Na hi dvīsu tadārammaṇesu ekaṃ paccuppannārammaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1622_8: Majjhimaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana sakimpi tadārammaṇassa pavatti vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1622_9: Paramatthavinicchayepi ca tameva vādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā “sakiṃ dve vā tadālamba”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1622_10: Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “cittappavattigaṇanāyaṃ sabbavāresu dve eva cittavārāni āgatānī”ti vatvā taṃ na sampaṭicchitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1623_0: Parittārammaṇe javanuppādassapi abhāvato santīraṇāvasānesu vīthicittesu uppannesu tadanantaraṃ voṭṭhabbanameva
tika-abh08t0:1623_1: āsevanaṃ labhitvā javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā dvikkhattuṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1623_3: Voṭṭhabbanaṃ pana appatvā antarā cakkhuviññāṇādikaṃ patvā nivattissatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:1623_4: Javanaṃ pana ārammaṇassa appāyukabhāvena paridubbalattā nuppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1623_8: tasmā parittārammaṇe natthi javanuppādoti ayaṃ dutiyo moghavāro aṭṭhakathāya vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1623_9: Ṭīkākāro pana tathā asampaṭicchitvā aññathā dutiyamoghavāraṃ pakappeti.
tika-abh08t0:1623_10: Vuttañhi tena tīsu moghavāresu dutiyamoghavāro upaparikkhitvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1624_0: Yadi hi anulome vedanāttike paṭiccavārādīsu “āsevanapaccayā na magge dve,
tika-abh08t0:1624_1: namaggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1624_5: Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayabhāvī dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1624_6: Voṭṭhabbanassa pana kusalākusalānaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1624_7: “Kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā.
tika-abh08t0:1624_8: Akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjati nāsevanapaccayā”ti vacanato paṭikkhittova.
tika-abh08t0:1624_14: “bhūmibhinnassa kāmāvacarassa rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo viya jātibhinnassapi bhaveyyā”ti vattabbo eva siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1624_15: abhinnajātikassa ca vasena yathā “āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1624_18: tasmā vedanāttikepi saṃkhittāya gaṇanāya “āsevanapaccayā namagge ekaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1624_19: namaggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti evaṃ gaṇanāya niddhāriyamānāya voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattābhāvā yathāvuttappakāro
tika-abh08t0:1624_22: Tato visadisassa javanassa karaṇato manasikāro ca.
tika-abh08t0:1624_23: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “voṭṭhabbanaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādi na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1624_25: tasmā voṭṭhabbanato catunnaṃ vā pañcannaṃ vā javanānaṃ ārammaṇapurejātaṃ bhavituṃ asakkontaṃ rūpādiāvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1624_26: ayametassa sabhāvoti javanāpāripūriyā dutiyo moghavāro dassetuṃ yutto siyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1625_2: yathā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati āsevanapaccayā namaggapaccayā”ti anulomapaccaniye,
tika-abh08t0:1625_5: evampi voṭṭhabbanavasena “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭiccā”tiādinā pubbe vuttanayena pāṭho siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1625_6: Tathā ca sati vāradvayavasena gaṇanāya “āsevanapaccayā namagge dve,
tika-abh08t0:1625_7: namaggapaccayā āsevane dve”ti ca vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1625_11: Apica yadi hi voṭṭhabbanampi āsevanapaccayo siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1625_13: Tathā ca sati attano viya kusalākusalānampi siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1625_14: Na hi āsevanapaccayaṃ laddhuṃ yuttassa āsevanapaccayabhāvī dhammo āsevanapaccayo hotīti avutto atthi
tika-abh08t0:1625_16: voṭṭhabbanassa pana avutto “abyākato dhammo kusalassa dhammassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1625_18: atha kho “kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo dhammo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1625_19: akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo dhammo uppajjatī”ti phassādikusalākusaladhamme paṭicca sahajātādipaccayavasena
tika-abh08t0:1625_20: kusalākusalassa uppattiṃ vatvā paṭhamajavanassa voṭṭhabbanato āsevanapaccayālābhaṃ sandhāya “nāsevanapaccayā”ti
tika-abh08t0:1626_1: samānavedanānaṃ eva āsevanapaccayabhāvassa dassanato voṭṭhabbanena asamānavedanānaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ vasenāyaṃ paṭikkhepo katoti.
tika-abh08t0:1626_2: Evampi sati yathā “āvajjanā kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ akusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1626_4: Atha voṭṭhabbanassa kusalākusalehi bhinnajātikattā tassa tesaṃ āsevanapaccayabhāvo na vuttoti ce.
tika-abh08t0:1626_5: Yathā bhūmivasena bhinnassa gotrabhuvodānavasena ṭhitassa kāmāvacarassa rūpāvacarādīnaṃ āsevanabhāvo dissati,
tika-abh08t0:1626_6: evaṃ jātivasena bhinnassa voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayabhāve na koci vibandho,
tika-abh08t0:1626_8: abhinnajātikassa ca upekkhāsahagatamahākiriyacittassa vasena yathā “āvajjanā sahetukānaṃ khandhānaṃ anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1626_11: tasmā vedanāttikepi voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanapaccayattassa abhāvā voṭṭhabbanassa āsevanabhāvadassanavasena vutto dutiyo moghavāro vīmaṃsitvā gahetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1626_12: Voṭṭhabbanāvajjanānaṃ pana anatthantarabhāvato āvajjanāya ca kusalākusalānaṃ anantarapaccayabhāvassa
tika-abh08t0:1626_13: vuttattā sati uppattiyaṃ voṭṭhabbanaṃ kāmāvacarakusalākusalakiriyājavanānaṃ ekantato anantarapaccayabhāveneva vatteyya,
tika-abh08t0:1626_14: na pana aññathāti muñchāmaraṇāsannavelādīsu javanāpāripūriyā mandībhūtavegatāya ayaṃ dassetabboti.
tika-abh08t0:1627_2: taṃ chinnamūlarukkhapupphaṃ viyā”ti vakkhamānattā anupacchinnabhavamūlānaṃ pavattassa voṭṭhabbanassa kiriyabhāvo na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1627_3: vutto ca “yasmiṃ samaye manoviññāṇadhātu uppannā kiriyā nevakusalā, nākusalā,
tika-abh08t0:1627_5: tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “javanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā”ti vacanaṃ javanassa uppajjanaṭṭhāne dvikkhattuṃ pavattitvā na javanabhāvenāti adhippāyena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1627_6: “āsevanaṃ labhitvā”ti ca “āsevanaṃ viya āsevana”nti vutte na koci virodhoti.
tika-abh08t0:1627_7: Vipphārikassa pana sato dvikkhattuṃ pavattiyevettha āsevanasadisatā.
tika-abh08t0:1627_9: Vipphārikampi javanaṃ viya anekakkhattuṃ appavattiyā dubbalattā na nippariyāyato āsevanapaccayabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1627_10: pavatteyyāti na imassa pāṭhe āsevanattaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1627_15: “āvajjanādīnaṃ paccayo bhavituṃ na sakkotī”ti pana vuttattā cittappavattivasena paṭhamamoghavārato etassa na koci visesoti.
tika-abh08t0:1628_1: Tāyāti manodhātuyā bhavaṅgāvaṭṭane pākaṭatāya kiriyāmanodhātuṃ paccāmasati.
tika-abh08t0:1628_7: Tenevāti javanaṃ hutvā niruddhena tena kāmāvacarakusalacittena.
tika-abh08t0:1628_8: Tadārammaṇasaññitanti javanaggahiteyeva ārammaṇe pavattanato “brahmassaro”tiādīsu viya tassa ārammaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1628_12: Tadārammaṇampi bhavaṅgasabhāvattā “bhavaṅga”nti vuccati yathā “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1628_13: Ettha hi paṭisandhicitte eva pavattiyaṃ “bhavaṅga”nti vuccamāne na tassa hetuvasena bhedoti “sahetukaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1628_14: bhavaṅgaṃ ahetukassa bhavaṅgassa anantarapaccayena paccayo”ti na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1628_15: Nāpi cetaṃ “sahetukaṃ cutiṃ ahetukapaṭisandhiñca sandhāya vutta”nti sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1628_16: Bhavassa aṅgabhāvābhāvato cuticittassa bhavaṅgavohārālābhatoti “sahetukaṃ bhavaṅga”nti tadārammaṇaṃ vuttanti viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1628_17: “Tadārammaṇasaññita”nti vatvā “mūlabhavaṅganti vuccatī”ti vuttattā nāmadvayampi imassa labbhatīti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1631_1: Purimāni pañca vipākacittāni iminā saddhiṃ cha hontīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1631_2: Ettha ca yebhuyyato iṭṭhārammaṇe somanassappavattivasena somanassasahagatajavanānantarameva somanassatadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1631_4: vipākassa ca tadabhāvato iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatajavanesupi javitesu somanassasahagatameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1632_2: Vedanā parivattatīti kammassa somanassasahagatabhāvepi ārammaṇassa iṭṭhamajjhattatāya somanassavedanā parivattitvā upekkhāvedanā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1632_3: Atha vā heṭṭhā vipākavedanāya somanassabhāvepi iṭṭhārammaṇassa majjhattabhāvena taṃvasena vedanā parivattatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1633_7: Purimehi saha asamānabhāve vutte tesaṃ sandhiyā saha asamānabhāvopi vuttova hotīti cattāri nāmato piṭṭhibhavaṅgāni ca hontīti yojanā. Ca-
tika-abh08t0:1633_10: Etthāpi ca yebhuyyena iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatajavanassa uppajjanato upekkhāsahagatajavanānantarameva upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1633_12: Ñāṇasampayuttādīsu javitesu ñāṇavippayuttatadārammaṇānaṃ sambhavo heṭṭhā vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1633_14: tathāpi utubhojanādipaccayānaṃ dubbalabhāve javanasseva asaṅkhārikattābhāvato asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhārameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1633_16: Paccayassa pana balavabhāve satipi paresaṃ ussāhabalena sasaṅkhārassa javanassa sambhavato sasaṅkhārajavanāvasāne sasaṅkhārameva tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1633_17: sasaṅkhārikattābhāvato asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhāramevāti niyamo natthīti asaṅkhārajavanāvasāne asaṅkhārampi sasaṅkhārampi tadārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1634_0: Pañcimānīti iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe vuttāni upekkhāsahagatasantīraṇādīni pañca vipākāni.
tika-abh08t0:1634_1: Purimehi sattahīti iṭṭhārammaṇe vuttehi cakkhuviññāṇādīhi sattahi viniddise cakkhudvārasminti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1635_3: Yasmā pana cakkhudvārādīsu anuppajjitvā sotadvārādīsuyeva uppajjamānā sotaviññāṇādayo viya pañcasu dvāresu
tika-abh08t0:1635_6: Atha vā cakkhudvāre gahitānameva manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ sotadvārādīsupi gahaṇena pañcadvāresu gahitāya
tika-abh08t0:1635_8: evaṃ sati chasu dvāresupi samasattati vipākāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:1635_9: Atha vā manodvāre labbhamānāyapi pañcadvārappavattāya manoviññāṇadhātuyā manodvāre aggahaṇena sotadvārādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1635_10: labbhamānānampi cakkhudvāre gahitamanodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ sotadvārādīsu aggahaṇassa nayadassanaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1635_12: evaṃ sati pañcadvāresu soḷasa vipākāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:1636_1: Tīhi vipākehīti tehi tīhi kusalacittehi samānehi tīhi vipākehi dinnāya paṭisandhiyāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1636_4: Ucchupīḷanasamaye kira ekasmā gāmā ekādasa yantavāhā nikkhamitvā ekaṃ ucchuvāṭaṃ disvā tassa paripakkabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1636_6: So “ahaṃ tumheyeva pariyesissāmī”ti ucchusālaṃ gahetvā agamāsi.
tika-abh08t0:1636_7: Te tattha nāḷiyantaṃ yojetvā “mayaṃ ekādasa janā aparampi ekaṃ laddhuṃ vaṭṭati,
tika-abh08t0:1636_9: Ucchusāmiko “ahameva sahāyo bhavissāmī”ti ucchusālaṃ pūrāpetvā tesaṃ sahāyo ahosi.
tika-abh08t0:1636_10: Te attano attano kiccāni katvā phāṇitapācakena ucchurase pakke guḷe baddhe ucchusāmikena tulayitvā bhāgesu
tika-abh08t0:1636_11: dinnesu attano attano bhāgaṃ ādāya sālaṃ sālasāmikaṃ paṭicchāpetvā eteneva upāyena aparāsupi catūsu sālāsu
tika-abh08t0:1636_13: Tattha pañca yantasālā viya pañca pasādā daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1636_17: paṭhamakasālāya sālasāmikena saddhiṃ dvādasannaṃ janānaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya
tika-abh08t0:1636_18: ekādasannaṃ vipākacittānaṃ cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1636_19: sālasāmikassa sālāya sampaṭicchitakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1636_20: dutiyatatiyacatutthapañcamasālāya dvādasannaṃ ekato hutvā katakammānaṃ bhāgaggahaṇakālo viya ekādasannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1636_21: vipākacittānaṃ kāyaviññāṇena saddhiṃ ekato hutvā kāyadvāre phoṭṭhabbārammaṇe sakasakakiccakaraṇakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1636_22: sāmikassa sampaṭicchitakālo viya kāyaviññāṇassa dvārasaṅkantiakaraṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1638_1: Idāni tihetukomakakammena gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikassa vipākappavatti duhetukukkaṭṭhena gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikassa
tika-abh08t0:1638_2: vipākappavattiyā samānāti taṃ ṭhapetvā duhetukakammena gahitaduhetukapaṭisandhikasseva vipākappavattiṃ
tika-abh08t0:1639_1: Duhetukapaṭisandhikassa kāmāvacaratihetukajavanānaṃ sambhavepi kammasarikkhakāneva javanāni dassetuṃ “somanassa…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1639_3: Tihetukajavanāvasānepi panassa paṭisandhidāyakakammaṃ tihetukavipākadāne asamatthanti tihetukatadārammaṇābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1639_4: javanassa ca kammasarikkhakahetuvasena duhetukabhāvato duhetukatadārammaṇameva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1640_0: 424. Imāni ca bhavaṅgānīti imāni cattāri mūlāgantukapiṭṭhibhavaṅgāni. Aṭṭha hīti aṭṭheva.
tika-abh08t0:1641_3: Yantavāhopamāya panettha satta yantavāhā tehi hatthayante nāma sajjite sālasāmikaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ katvā vuttanayānusāreneva yojanā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1642_1: Vuddhimupetassāti mātukucchito nikkhamitvā saṃvarāsaṃvare paṭṭhapetuṃ samatthabhāvena vuḍḍhippattassa.
tika-abh08t0:1643_2: Apāyesu paṭisandhidāyakakammena paṭisandhito hīnatadārammaṇassa anipphannato tassa labbhamānaṭṭhānameva dassetuṃ “sugatiya”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1643_5: “Catūsu apāyesu labbhatī”ti vatvā tassa visayadassanatthaṃ “thero nerayikāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1643_8: Dhammaṃ desetīti niraye padumaṃ māpetvā padumakaṇṇikāya nisinno dhammaṃ deseti.
tika-abh08t0:1643_12: Iminā indanīlapaṭimāvaṇṇassa therassa iṭṭhārammaṇabhāvena kusalavipākacakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā kāraṇaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1643_15: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “candanavane divāvihāraṃ nisinnassa cīvaragandha”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1643_19: iṭṭhārammaṇassa ca niraye sambhavadīpanena sesāpāyattayepi sambhavo dassitova hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1644_3: Kusalaṃ pana sandhāyāti kusalajavanaṃ sandhāya dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1644_7: Paricitavasena pana aññakammenāpi taṃ ahetukatadārammaṇaṃ na hotīti na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1644_8: Na hi paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ tadārammaṇaṃ janeti,
tika-abh08t0:1644_9: atha kho aññakammampi paṭisandhidāyakakammena nibbattetabbatadārammaṇato visadisampi nibbattetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1644_10: Akusalajavanānantarañca ahetukatadārammaṇampi javanassa kammasarikkhakahetukattā tadanurūpato vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1644_11: Yathāvuttanayena pana sahetukatadārammaṇampi na hotīti natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1645_1: Ettāvatā tipiṭakacūḷanāgattheravāde soḷasa vipākacittāni saddhiṃ dvādasakamaggena ceva ahetukaṭṭhakena
tika-abh08t0:1645_2: ca vibhāvetvā moravāpivāsimahādattattheravāde visesābhāvato taṃ anāmasitvā mahādhammarakkhitattheravāde
tika-abh08t0:1645_3: kusalākusalakiriyavasena piṇḍitvā dassitānaṃ piṇḍajavanānaṃ vasena tadārammaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “somanassayute
tika-abh08t0:1645_6: javiteti iṭṭhārammaṇe kusalākusalakiriyābyākatavasena somanassayutesu terasasu javanacittesu javitesu.
tika-abh08t0:1645_8: mānasāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena somanassasahagatāni pañceva tadārammaṇacittāni gavesitabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1645_11: Cha gavesitabbānīti upekkhāsahagatāni cha eva gavesitabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1645_12: Khīṇāsavānaṃ pahīnavipallāsatāya kiriyājavanaṃ iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagataṃ na hotīti somanassasahagatakiriyājavanesu
tika-abh08t0:1645_15: aniṭṭhādīsu ca somanassabhāvato upekkhāsahagatakiriyājavanesu javitesu upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇamevāti idamettha sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1645_17: aniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe ca somanassasahagatajavanaṃ uppajjatīti somanassasahagatajavanāvasāne somanassasahagatatadārammaṇameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1650_1: Duhetukāhetukānaṃ vipākāvaraṇehi samannāgatattā jhānuppādoyeva natthīti āha “tihetusomanassenā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1650_3: Vippaṭisārinoti “mahantena vāyāmena uppādito me paṇītadhammo naṭṭho”ti uppannavippaṭisāravantassa. Kiṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1650_12: tadā “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1650_13: paccayo”tiādi viya “sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1650_18: itaravedanādvayasamaṅgissa ca paccayabhāvaṃ sandhāya “anantare navā”ti vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1650_20: Domanassasomanassavedanāya sampayuttānaṃ pana aññamaññaanantarapaccayavasena gaṇanadvayaṃ parihāpetvā “anantare sattā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1650_21: tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi paṭisedhasadisaṃ abhāvasseva dīpanatoti vuttaṃ “paṭisiddhā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1650_22: Assa vā anantaraṃ domanassassa uppattīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1651_0: Evaṃ bhavaṅgapātābhāve kāraṇaṃ vatvā puna tadārammaṇābhāvaṃ dassento āha “mahaggata”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1651_1: Tattheva paṭisiddhanti “parittārammaṇo dhammo mahaggatārammaṇassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanābhāvato tattheva paṭṭhāne paṭisiddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1651_3: Na hi sakkā ettakena “acittako”ti vattunti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1651_4: Ettha ca mahaggatārammaṇameva domanassajavanaṃ nidassanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1651_5: Iṭṭhārammaṇabhūte pana buddhādiārammaṇepi domanassajavane javite somanassapaṭisandhikassa tadārammaṇasambhavo,
tika-abh08t0:1652_1: Iṭṭhārammaṇe upekkhāsahagatatadārammaṇassa domanassānantarañca somanassassa abhāvato “upekkhāsahitā hetū”tiādinā
tika-abh08t0:1652_2: ācariyena vutte puna codako anubandhanto āha “āvajjanaṃ kimassā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1652_4: tena vināva idaṃ cittaṃ uppajjatīti dīpento āha “natthi ta”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1652_5: Puna codako āvajjanena vinā cittappavattiṃ avisahanto āha “taṃ jāyate katha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1652_6: Evaṃ pana vutte ācariyo kimettha āvajjanena,
tika-abh08t0:1652_7: kiñca āvajjanena vinā cittappavatti natthīti idaṃ na ekantikanti dīpetuṃ nirāvajjanacittānaṃ sambhavaṃ dassento āha “bhavaṅgāvajjanāna”ntiādi,
tika-abh08t0:1652_10: Nanu ca bhavaṅgāvajjanāni tāva sakasakavisayesu ninnattā āvajjanena vinā uppattiyaṃ bahulaṃ ciṇṇattāva uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1652_11: ayaṃ pana kathaṃ uppajjatīti idaṃ anuyogaṃ sandhāya puna nirāvajjanacittāni dassento āha “maggassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1652_13: Anantarassa phalassa cāti maggānantarassa phalassa ca atthāya kiṃ āvajjananti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1653_1: maggānantarāni phalāni ca parikammāvajjanena sāvajjanāni samānāni asatipi nirāvajjanuppattiyaṃ ninnādibhāve
tika-abh08t0:1653_4: yadi hi nibbānārammaṇāvajjanābhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1653_5: gotrabhuvodānāni dassitabbāni siyuṃ teheva etesaṃ nirāvajjanatāsiddhito,
tika-abh08t0:1653_6: phalasamāpattikāle ca “parittārammaṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ anulomaṃ phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1653_7: paccayo”ti vacanato samānārammaṇāvajjanarahitattā maggānantarāni phalacittānīti evaṃ samāpattiphalacittāni
tika-abh08t0:1653_12: Phalasamāpatticittāni ca maggavīthito uddhaṃ tadatthaṃ parikammasabbhāvāti tesaṃ gahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1653_14: na nevasaññānāsaññānantaraṃ maggānantarassa viya tadatthaṃ parikammābhāvāti “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassā”ti tañca nidassitanti.
tika-abh08t0:1654_1: “Kimassārammaṇa”nti vatvā nirāvajjanabhāvaṃ viya anārammaṇabhāvampi vadeyyāti tabbhāvadassanena attano vacanaṃ sādhento āha “vinā ārammaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1654_2: Yaṃ kiñcīti yaṃ kiñci paricitapubbaṃ ārammaṇaṃ ārabbha.
tika-abh08t0:1654_4: tadārammaṇañca javanārammaṇameva gaṇhāti itarathā tadārammaṇabhāvāyogatoti kathamassā parittārammaṇanti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1654_12: Pārisesato pana bhavassa aṅgabhāvato bhavaṅgakiccanti yuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1654_13: paṭisandhibhūtameva cittaṃ bhavaṅganti idaṃ yebhuyyavasena vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1655_1: Avijjamāne kārake kathaṃ kassaci nirāvajjanappavattikassa sāvajjanabhāvenāti codanaṃ sandhāya cittaniyāmanibbattametanti
tika-abh08t0:1655_3: Utubījaniyāmo cāti utuniyāmo ceva bījaniyāmo ca,
tika-abh08t0:1655_6: Ekappahārenāti taṃ taṃ utusamayamanatikkamitvā ekasmiṃyeva kāle.
tika-abh08t0:1655_10: Taṃtaṃtulyaphalubbhavoti tehi tehi bījehi sadisānaṃ phalānaṃ nibbatti,
tika-abh08t0:1655_15: māluvalatāya rukkhābhimukhagamana”nti evamādīnipi ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1655_19: Yato detīti yato yato paccayabhāvaniyāmato deti.
tika-abh08t0:1655_22: visadisassa ca phalassa nibbattane niyāmo. Apica –
tika-abh08t0:1660_0: Imissā gāthāya aṭṭhuppattiyaṃ āgataṃ tiṇakalāpassa gahitaaggino uṭṭhahitvā ākāse gacchato kākassa gīvāya paṭimuccanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1660_1: nāvikassa bhariyāya vālukaghaṭaṃ kaṇṭhe bandhitvā samuddudake pakkhipanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1660_2: pabbatakūṭassa patitvā leṇe vasantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ dvārapidahananti taṃtaṃkammasarikkhakavipākanibbattanampi kammaniyāmoyevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1660_3: Jātiyanti paṭisandhiggahaṇe ceva mātukucchito nikkhamane ca,
tika-abh08t0:1660_7: Visesattamanekampīti pubbanimittato aññaṃ tadā pātubhūtaṃ sabbaṃ acchariyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1660_9: tvaṃ dassana”ntiādinā niyuñjakassa abhāvepi taṃtaṃkiccavasena tesaṃ tesaṃ uppatti.
tika-abh08t0:1661_4: Payuttoti anupādāparinibbānaṃ appatvā anosakkamānena vīriyena vīriyavā.
tika-abh08t0:1672_0: Aṭṭhakathāya āgatamātikāya vasena pakiṇṇakanayaṃ dassetuṃ “idāni panā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1672_4: Panthamakkaṭakoti pāṇakapaṭaṅgādīnaṃ sañcaraṇaṭṭhāne jālaṃ pasāretvā tesaṃ maggarakkhaṇato “panthamakkaṭako”ti laddhanāmo uṇṇanābhi.
tika-abh08t0:1672_5: Disāsu pana pañcasūti upametabbānaṃ pañcapasādānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1673_6: viyāti hadayavatthuṃ nissāya pavattamānacittaṃ jālamajjhe nipannamakkaṭako viya daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1674_3: Dhammato aññā kāci kiriyā nāma natthīti dhammameva calanena saha upameti.
tika-abh08t0:1674_5: Javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanato tassa pavatti yūsapānena saddhiṃ upametvā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1674_6: Vatthuṃyevāti yathā purimacittāni hadayavatthunissitāni pasādavatthuṃ anugatāni aññārammaṇāni ca honti,
tika-abh08t0:1674_8: Taṃ pana vatthārammaṇantararahitaṃ kevalaṃ hadayavatthumeva nissāya pavattatīti dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1674_10: Bhavaṅgāvajjanādīnaṃ dhammato bhedepi santativasena ekattaṃ gahetvā ekeneva makkaṭakena upamāsaṃsandanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1675_5: Sabbasoti sabbesu cakkhādīsu yattha katthacīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1675_6: Idāni ekekārammaṇassa dvīsu dvīsu āpāthagamanaṃ pakāsetuṃ “rūpaṃ cakkhupasādamhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1676_7: āpāthaṃ āgacchantassapi pasādaghaṭṭanena ca bhavaṅgacalanassa paccayabhāvena āpāthaṃ viya upagamananti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1677_6: ko panetaṃ javanaṃ kusalatāya vā akusalatāya vā niyametīti?
tika-abh08t0:1677_13: Yassa pana vuttavipariyāyena ayonisomanasikāro ca hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1677_21: Keci pana “kiriyājavanaṃ pana manasikāro ca niyameti.
tika-abh08t0:1677_22: Yathā hi āvajjanaṃ kusalākusalānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1678_1: Dovārikopamādīnīti ettha eko rājā sayanagato niddāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1678_6: Atheko paccantavāsī manusso paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya dvāraṃ ākoṭesi,
tika-abh08t0:1678_17: tayo paṭihārā viya sampaṭicchanādīni tīṇi vīthicittāni,
tika-abh08t0:1678_18: paccantavāsino paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya dvārākoṭanaṃ viya ārammaṇassa pasādaghaṭṭanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1678_19: pādaparimajjakena saññāya dinnakālo viya kiriyāmanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1678_20: tena dinnasaññāya badhiradovārikassa dvāravivarakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇassa ārammaṇe dassanakiccasādhanakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1678_21: paṭhamapaṭihārena paṇṇākārassa gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1678_22: paṭhamena dutiyassa dinnakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1678_23: dutiyena tatiyassa dinnakālo viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1678_24: tatiyena rañño dinnakālo viya voṭṭhabbanena javanassa niyyātitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1678_25: rañño paribhogakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanakāloti ayaṃ dovārikopamā.
tika-abh08t0:1679_0: “Idaṃ pana opammaṃ kiṃ dīpetī”tiādi ucchuyantūpamāya vuttanayena veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1679_11: Tattha sambahulānaṃ dārakānaṃ antaravīthiyaṃ kīḷantānaṃ sannisinnakālo viya cittappavatti daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1679_12: kahāpaṇassa hatthe paṭihatakālo viya ārammaṇena pasādassa ghaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_13: “kiṃ nu kho eta”nti vuttakālo viya taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā kiriyāmanodhātuyā bhavaṅgassa āvaṭṭitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_14: “paṇḍaraṃ eta”nti vuttakālo viya cakkhuviññāṇena dassanakiccassa sādhitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_15: saha paṃsunā gāḷhaṃ gahitakālo viya vipākamanodhātuyā ārammaṇassa sampaṭicchitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_16: “puthulaṃ caturassaṃ eta”nti vuttakālo viya vipākamanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa santīritakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_17: “kahāpaṇo eso”ti vuttakālo viya kiriyāmanoviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇassa vavatthāpitakālo,
tika-abh08t0:1679_18: mātarā kamme upanītakālo viya javanassa ārammaṇarasānubhavanaṃ veditabbanti ayaṃ gāmadārakopamā.
tika-abh08t0:1680_6: ekantena pana cakkhuviññāṇameva dassanakiccaṃ sādhetīti dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1681_1: Ettakā upamā saṅgahetvā “dovārikopamādīnī”ti vatvā “upanissayamatthaso”ti ettha upanissayabhāvaṃ pakāsetuṃ “asambhedenā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:1681_4: Vātapittādiupahatampi hi cakkhuviññāṇassa paccayabhāvānupagamanato sambhinnameva nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1681_5: pañcindriyānaṃ atthikkhaṇeyeva nissayabhāvūpagamanato khaṇavasena asambhedopi yujjati.
tika-abh08t0:1681_7: Rūpāpāthagamenāti dūre ṭhitassa phalikādīhi antaritassa cakkhuviññāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ yogyadese avaṭṭhitavasena rūpassa āpāthagamanena.
tika-abh08t0:1681_9: parammukhe ṭhitampi dibbacakkhussa āpāthagatameva nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1682_1: Teneva hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “na hi pihitakaṇṇacchiddassa sotaviññāṇaṃ pavattatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1682_3: Tathā hi avivare gehe nisīditvā vuccamānānaṃ bahi ṭhitā na suṇanti.
tika-abh08t0:1683_1: veditabbanti “asambhedā manassā”ti ettha vuttaṃ mano bhavaṅgacittanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1683_2: Taṃ pana cutivasena niruddhampi kiriyāmayacittassa paccayabhāvaṃ anupagantvā kevalaṃ bhavaṅgappavattivasena
tika-abh08t0:1683_6: Tattha pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vokāro etthāti pañcavokāro.
tika-abh08t0:1683_8: Atha vā yathāpaccayaṃ pañcahi khandhehi vokarīyatīti pañcavokāro.
tika-abh08t0:1683_9: “Atthato”ti evamādikaṃ padaṃ cakkhādīni dassanādikiccānīti ettakameva sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1683_10: na aññaṃ kiñci visesananti na tattha vinicchayo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1684_4: Kammanimittanti yaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā āyūhanakāle kammaṃ āyūhati,
tika-abh08t0:1684_8: taṃ pana sugatiyaṃ manussaloke nibbattantassa rattakambalasadisamātukucchivaṇṇavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1684_14: Tathā hi mahaggatavipākāni ekantena kammasadisārammaṇāni vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1685_5: atītakammakammanimittaṃ viya ananubhūtattā ca vibhūtaṃ hutvā nopatiṭṭhātīti atisantabhāvena pavattamānā
tika-abh08t0:1685_6: paṭisandhi taṃ ārabbha pavattituṃ na sakkotīti vuttaṃ “natthi anāgata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1685_7: Mahaggatapaṭisandhīnaṃ ekantena kammasadisārammaṇabhāvena kammassa viya atītanavattabbārammaṇattā na tāsaṃ visuṃ ārammaṇaṃ uddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1685_8: Tattha dutiyacatutthārūpapaṭisandhīnaṃ atītameva ārammaṇaṃ itarāsaṃ navattabbanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1686_1: Mahāvipākānaṃ paṭisandhādicatukiccavaseneva pavattanato rūpārūpabhave paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena taṃtaṃvipākasseva pavattito,
tika-abh08t0:1686_2: tadārammaṇassa ca abhāvena tattha na labbhatīti āha “mahāpākā…pe… dvaye”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1686_3: Aniṭṭharūpānaṃ brahmaloke asambhavepi tattha ṭhatvā idha aniṭṭhārammaṇaṃ passantānaṃ akusalavipākāni
tika-abh08t0:1686_4: na uppajjantīti na vattabbanti rūpabhavepi santīraṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1686_5: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahasaccasaṅkhepādīsupi hi imināva adhippāyena rūpaloke akusalavipākappavatti dassitā.
tika-abh08t0:1687_1: “Bījassābhāvato”ti rūpārūpabhavadvaye tadārammaṇābhāvassa kāraṇaṃ vatvā tameva pakāsetuṃ “paṭisandhibīja”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1688_1: Yadi evaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīnampi kāmāvacarapaṭisandhibījattā tattha abhāvo āpajjatīti codento āha “cakkhuviññāṇādīna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1688_5: cakkhusotaviññāṇānaṃ vatthubhūtāni cakkhusotindriyāni tattha pavattantīti tesaṃ pavattiānubhāvato cakkhusotaviññāṇāni pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1688_6: Sati ca tesaṃ pavattiyaṃ vīthicittuppādo niyatoti cakkhuviññāṇādīnaṃ viya sampaṭicchanasantīraṇānampi tattha sambhavo siddhoti.
tika-abh08t0:1689_4: anubandhatīti yathā nāma gehato nikkhamitvā bahi gantukāmo taruṇadārako attano janakaṃ pitaraṃ vā aññaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1689_5: vā pitusadisaṃ hitakāmaṃ ñātiṃ aṅguliyaṃ gahetvā anubandhati,
tika-abh08t0:1689_7: tathā etampi bhavaṅgārammaṇato bahi nikkhamitukāmasabhāgatāya attano janakaṃ paṭhamakusalādikaṃ sadisaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1689_9: na aññaṃ mahaggataṃ lokuttaranti ayamettha attho.
tika-abh08t0:1689_12: Ānandācariyo pana paṭṭhāne “kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vipākadhammadhammānamevānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1689_13: Vipphāravantañhi javanaṃ nāvaṃ viya nadīsoto bhavaṅgaṃ anubandhati,
tika-abh08t0:1689_14: na pana chaḷaṅgupekkhāvato santavuttiṃ kiriyājavanaṃ paṇṇapuṭaṃ viya nadīsototi kiriyājavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na icchati,
tika-abh08t0:1689_15: ācariyajotipālattherādayo pana “labbhamānassapi kenaci adhippāyena katthaci avacanaṃ dissati,
tika-abh08t0:1689_16: yathā taṃ dhammasaṅgahe akusalaniddese labbhamānopi adhipati na vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1689_18: tadā voṭṭhabbanānantarampi tassa pavattiṃ maññeyyunti kiriyājavanānantaraṃ tadārammaṇaṃ na vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1689_22: nāvāpaṇṇapuṭānañhi nadīsotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ gati ca visadisīti nāvāyaṃ nadīsotassa anubandhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1689_24: idha pana kiriyājavanetarajavanānaṃ bhavaṅgasotassa āvaṭṭanaṃ gati ca sadisīti etassa ananubandhanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1690_2: tathā yadā ete kāmāvacaradhammāpi mahaggatānuttaradhammārammaṇā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1690_9: Parittārammaṇattāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantena parittārammaṇattā.
tika-abh08t0:1690_14: pitusadisaṃ vā kañci anubandhanto taruṇadārako gharadvārantaravīthicatukkādimhi pariciteyeva dese anugacchati,
tika-abh08t0:1690_15: na araññaṃ vā rakkhasabhūmiṃ vā gacchantaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1690_16: evaṃ kāmāvacaradhamme anubandhantampi parittamhi pariciteyeva dese pavattamāne te dhamme anubandhati,
tika-abh08t0:1691_2: aṭṭhakathāpamāṇato cetaṃ gahetabbanti dassento āha “kiṃ tenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1691_4: Tadārammaṇacittāni “tadārammaṇa”nti laddhanāmāni cittāni tadārammaṇabhāvaṃ na gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1691_6: Atha vā nāmagottaṃ ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ tassa javanassa ārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhanti na labbhantīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1691_8: saddena “javane javitepi tadārammaṇaṃ na gaṇhantī”ti ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t0:1691_13: tisso ca paññattiyo kusalattike na labbhantī”ti aṭṭhakathāya vuttattā tiṇṇaṃ lakkhaṇānaṃ dhammato abhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1691_14: taṃ ārabbha pavattāya vipassanāya tadārammaṇāni na labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1691_15: Paṭṭhāne pana “sekhā vā puthujjanā vā kusalaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti,
tika-abh08t0:1691_16: kusalākusale niruddhe vipāko tadārammaṇatā uppajjatī”ti vacanato khandhārammaṇikavipassanāya tadārammaṇaṃ labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1691_18: Cattāro diṭṭhigatasampayuttacittuppādā”ti evamāgatesu micchāgāhavasena pavattesu dhammesu javanaṃ hutvā javitesu.
tika-abh08t0:1691_19: Kasmā pana tesu javitesu tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1691_20: Kāmāvacaravipākānañhi niyatamicchādiṭṭhi viya “attā occhijjatī”tiādinā attaparikappanāvasena appavattanato
tika-abh08t0:1691_21: niyatamicchādiṭṭhivasappavattesu tesu javitesu tadanantaraṃ tadārammaṇāni na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1691_22: aniyatamicchādiṭṭhivasappavattesu pana javitesu tadārammaṇaṃ nuppajjatīti natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1691_23: Atha vā micchattaniyatesūti micchābhāvaniyatasabhāvesu taṃvisayesūti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1691_25: tassa ca vipākānaṃ avibhūtattā micchattaniyatasabhāve ārabbha tadārammaṇā na labbhanti. Pi-
tika-abh08t0:1691_27: “lokuttaradhamme ārabbhā”ti vā etena siddhattā na tesaṃ visuṃ uddharaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1691_28: Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana micchattaniyatasammattaniyatānaṃ aññamaññapaṭipakkhabhāvena balavabhāvato tadārammaṇassa
tika-abh08t0:1691_30: Micchattaniyatasabhāvassa viya paṭisambhidāsabhāvassapi kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ avibhūtabhāvena paṭisambhidāñāṇāni
tika-abh08t0:1691_31: ārabbha javane javite tadārammaṇaṃ na labbhatīti āha “paṭisambhidāñāṇānī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1692_1: Na vijjatīti manodvārassa appaṭighabhāvena na vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:1693_1: Satta sattāti ekekassa satta sattāti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1693_3: “Dvādasāpuññacittāna”nti vatvā “pāpapākā”ti vacanaṃ “tatridaṃ sugatassa sugatacīvarappamāṇa”ntiādīsu viya saññāsaddavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1693_4: Evaṃ pavattiyaṃ akusalavipākānaṃ pavattiṃ dassetvā idāni paṭisandhiyaṃ dassetuṃ “ekādasavidhāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1693_5: Uddhaccacetanāya pavattivipākadānamattaṃ vinā paṭisandhidānābhāvato āha “hitvā uddhaccamānasa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1693_11: dubbalaṃ nākaḍḍhatī”ti hi ayaṃ vicāraṇā paṭisandhidānasabhāvesuyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1694_8: Te hi paṭhamaṃ nibbānadassanato “dassana”nti laddhanāmena sotāpattimaggeneva pahātabbattā “dassanenapahātabbā”ti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:1694_16: Diṭṭhivippayuttadomanassasahagatacittuppādā pana siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1694_18: Ime dhammā siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1694_20: sesāvatthāya uparimaggehi pahīyamānattā siyā dassanenapahātabbā siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1694_21: Tattha siyā dassanenapahātabbampi dassanenapahātabbasāmaññena idha “dassanenapahātabbā”tveva voharanti.
tika-abh08t0:1694_23: tadā akusalapaṭisandhiyā sugatiyaṃ asambhavato apāyesveva dadeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1694_25: itarathā apāyagamanīyassa appahīnattā sekhānaṃ apāyuppatti āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1694_29: sati ca panetassa dassanenapahātabbabhāve “siyā dassanenapahātabbā”ti imassa vibhaṅge vattabbaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1694_31: Atha siyā “apāyagamanīyo rāgo doso moho tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā”ti evaṃ dassanenapahātabbesu vuttattā uddhaccasahagatassāpi tattha saṅgaho sakkā kātunti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1694_32: tassa niyāmato bhāvanāyapahātabbabhāvena vuttattāti tasmā dassanenapahātabbesu avacanameva paṭisandhidānābhāvaṃ sādhetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1696_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye akusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ uddhaccasampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1696_2: dhammārammaṇaṃ vā yaṃ yaṃ vā panārabbha,
tika-abh08t0:1697_0: Evaṃ uddhaccasahagatacittuppādaṃ uddharitvā tassa vipākopi uddhaṭoti kathamassa paṭisandhidānābhāvo sampaṭicchitabboti?
tika-abh08t0:1698_0: “Sahajātā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1698_1: nānakkhaṇikā dassanenapahātabbā cetanā vipākānaṃ khandhānaṃ kaṭattā ca rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1699_1: cetanā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti bhāvanāyapahātabbacetanāya sahajātakammapaccayabhāvova uddhaṭo,
