tika-abh08t0:1700_0: “Dassanenapahātabbo dhammo nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajāta…
tika-abh08t0:1702_0: “Bhāvanāyapahātabbo dhammo nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo, sahajāta…
tika-abh08t0:1703_2: na ca nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayaṃ vinā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1703_4: Pavattivipākaṃ panassa na sakkā nivāretuṃ paṭisambhidāvibhaṅge uddhaccasahagatānampi vipākassa uddhaṭattā,
tika-abh08t0:1703_6: Evañca pana katvā yadeke ācariyā vadanti “uddhaccacetanā ubhayavipākampi na deti paṭṭhāne nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayassa anuddhaṭattā”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1704_3: evaṃ idhāpi uddhaccasahagatānaṃ vipākārahataṃ sandhāya “tesaṃ vipāke ñāṇa”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1704_4: Yathā saddhindriyavinimuttassa adhimuccanaṭṭhassa abhāvepi saddhindriyassa adhimuccanasattivisesaṃ gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1704_6: evamidhāpi dhammavinimuttassa vipākārahabhāvassa abhāvepi dhammānameva vipākārahasāmatthiyaṃ gahetvā tassa atthibhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1704_7: Yadi ca te pavattivipākaṃ dadeyyuṃ, yathā –
tika-abh08t0:1705_0: “Sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo dukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1706_2: Na hi labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthīti tasmā yathādhammasāsane avacanampi abhāvameva dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1706_3: Apica yadi uddhaccasahagatassa pavattivipākadānaṃ adhippetaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1706_4: tadā “anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa na kammapaccayena paccayo”ti paṭisedho na kātabbo siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1706_5: Na hi ṭhapetvā uddhaccaṃ añño koci anupādinnupādāniyo dhammo upādinnupādāniyassa dhammassa paccayo bhavituṃ asamattho atthīti,
tika-abh08t0:1706_7: Tathā hi yaṃ tāva vuttaṃ “vipākārahabhāvaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ vipāketi vutta”nti,
tika-abh08t0:1706_9: Na hi vipākārahabhāve sati abhiññādīnaṃ viya tassa avipākatāya kāraṇaṃ atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:1706_13: Tathā hi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ labbhamānampi hadayavatthu na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1706_14: Tasmā yadi pavattivipākaṃ sandhāya nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo vucceyya,
tika-abh08t0:1706_15: tadā paṭisandhivipākadānampissa maññeyyunti labbhamānassapi pavattivipākassa vasena nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo na vuttoti.
tika-abh08t0:1706_16: Yaṃ pana anupādinnupādāniyassa upādinnupādāniyaṃ pati kammapaccayapaṭikkhepavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1706_17: taṃ abhiññākusalādike sandhāyāti na ettāvatā uddhaccasahagatassa pavattivipākadānaṃ sabbathāpi paṭikkhipituṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh08t0:1706_20: tampi uddhaccacetanāya tattha niddisiyamānāya yathā itarā paṭisandhipavattivasena duvidhassapi vipākaviññāṇassa paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1707_0: Ācariyabuddhamittādayo pana uddhaccasahagataṃ dvidhā vibhajitvā ekassa ubhayavipākadānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_9: Tathā hi dassanabhāvanānaṃ abhāvepi yesaṃ puthujjanānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_11: tesaṃ taduppattikāle tāhi pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā akusalā “dassanenapahātabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1707_13: Puthujjanānaṃ pana bhāvanāya abhāvato bhāvanāyapahātabbacintā natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1707_14: tena tesaṃ pavattamānā te dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyāpi “bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti na vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:1707_16: dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kesañci keci kadāci ārammaṇārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayehi paccayā bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1707_17: Sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnañhi kesañci sakkāyadiṭṭhādayo keci atītādīsu kismiñci kāle ārammaṇādhipatiupanissayehi paccayā hontīti natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1707_18: na ca paṭṭhāne “dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayo”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1707_21: evaṃ sati sekhasantānapavattānampi akusalānaṃ bhāvanāyapahātabbapariyāyo natthīti āpajjatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1707_24: Teneva ca kiñci katvā sekhānaṃ dassanenapahātabbānaṃ akusalānaṃ pahīnabhāvena assādanābhinandanānaṃ vatthūni na honti.
tika-abh08t0:1707_28: Na hi pahīnakilese upanissāya ariyā rāgadosavikkhepe uppādenti.
tika-abh08t0:1707_36: Puthujjanānaṃ pana dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayā na hontīti na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_45: Ettha hi uddhaccanti uddhaccasahagataṃ cittuppādaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_47: Evañca katvā adhipatipaccayaniddese “diṭṭhiṃ garuṃ katvā assādeti abhinandati,
tika-abh08t0:1707_51: tasmā sekhasantānappavattānamakusalānaṃ dassanenapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayattābhāvato puthujjanānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_52: santāneva dassanenapahātabbānamakusalānaṃ paccayā na hontīti na sakkā vattunti paṭṭhāne dassanenapahātabbānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1707_55: tasmā dassanabhāvanāhi pahātabbānaṃ atītādibhāvena navattabbattepi yādisānaṃ tāhi anuppattidhammatā āpādetabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1707_56: te puthujjanesu pavattamānā dassanena pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā dassanamaggāpekkhāya tadappavattiyampi dassanenapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1707_57: Sekhesu pavattamānā bhāvanāya pahātuṃ sakkuṇeyyā tadappavattiyampi tadapekkhāya bhāvanāyapahātabbā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1707_58: Dassanena pahātuṃ asakkuṇeyyā pana puthujjanesu pavattamānā heṭṭhā vuttanayena nevadassanenapahātabbā nabhāvanāyapahātabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1707_59: tesu bhāvanāyapahātabbā sahāyavirahato vipākaṃ na janenti.
tika-abh08t0:1707_60: Tathā hi tesaṃ dassanenapahātabbasaṅkhātaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ sahāyabhūtaṃ natthīti bhāvanāyapahātabbacetanāya nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1707_61: Apekkhitabbadassanabhāvanārahitānaṃ pana puthujjanesu uppajjamānānaṃ sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1707_63: vipākuppādanaṃ na sakkā paṭikkhipitunti uddhaccasahagatadhammānaṃ vipāko vibhaṅge vuttoti.
tika-abh08t0:1708_5: Yadi evaṃ te imasmiṃ tike navattabbāti vattabbā āpajjantīti?
tika-abh08t0:1708_7: cittuppādakaṇḍe dassitānaṃ dvādasākusalacittuppādānaṃ dvīhi padehi saṅgahitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1708_8: Yathā hi uppannattike dhammavasena sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ saṅgahitattā kālavasena asaṅgahitāpi atītā
tika-abh08t0:1708_9: “navattabbā”ti na vuttā cittuppādānurūpena saṅgahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā,
tika-abh08t0:1708_10: evaṃ idhāpi cittuppādabhāvena saṅgahitesu navattabbassa abhāvā “navattabbā”ti na vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1708_11: Sabbena sabbañhi dhammavasena asaṅgahitassa tikadukesu navattabbatāpatti.
tika-abh08t0:1708_12: Yattha hi cittuppādo koci niyogato navattabbo atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1708_13: tattha tesaṃ catuttho koṭṭhāso atthīti yathāvuttapadesu viya tatthāpi bhinditvā bhājetabbe cittuppāde
tika-abh08t0:1709_0: Atha vā yathā sappaṭighehi samānasabhāvattā rūpadhātuyaṃ “tayo mahābhūtā sappaṭighā”ti vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1709_2: evaṃ puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānā bhāvanāyapahātabbasamānasabhāvā “bhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti vucceyyunti natthi navattabbatāpasaṅgo.
tika-abh08t0:1709_3: Evañca sati puthujjanānaṃ pavattamānāpi bhāvanāyapahātabbā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo parabhaṇḍe chandarāgādīnaṃ upanissayapaccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1709_4: rāgo ca rāgadiṭṭhīnaṃ adhipatipaccayoti ayamattho laddho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1711_0: Imissā niddese dassanenapahātabbānaṃ upanissayapaccayabhāvīdhamme niddisantena bhagavatā –
tika-abh08t0:1712_3: bhāvanāyapahātabbo rāgo doso moho māno patthanā dassanenapahātabbassa rāgassa dosassa mohassa mānassa diṭṭhiyā patthanāya upanissayapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh08t0:1712_5: sakapariggahe chandarāgo parapariggahe chandarāgassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1714_0: Evampi yathā aphoṭṭhabbattā rūpadhātuyaṃ tayo mahābhūtā na paramatthato sappaṭighā,
tika-abh08t0:1714_1: evaṃ apekkhitabbabhāvanārahitā puthujjanesu pavattamānā sakabhaṇḍe chandarāgādayo pana paramatthato bhāvanāya
tika-abh08t0:1714_3: na ca “dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ kenaci paccayena paccayo”ti vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1714_6: Dassanenapahātabbapaccayassāpi pana uddhaccasahagatassa sahāyavekallamattameva dassanena kataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_7: na tassa koci bhāvo dassanena anuppattidhammataṃ āpāditoti tassa ekantabhāvanāyapahātabbatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1714_8: tasmā uddhaccabhāvena ekasabhāvasseva tassa sati sahāye vipākuppādanavacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_15: yathā atītārammaṇattike “niyogā anāgatārammaṇā natthī”ti vatvā vibhajja vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_16: evamidhāpi “niyogā bhāvanāyapahātabbā natthī”ti vatvā “uddhaccasahagato siyā bhāvanāyapahātabbo siyā
tika-abh08t0:1714_19: Yā ca “tamatthaṃ paṭipādentehi yadi vucceyyu”ntiādinā yutti vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1714_21: Dassanenapahātabbārammaṇānaṃ rāgadiṭṭhivicikicchāuddhaccānaṃ tena tena pahātabbabhāvavasena icchitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1714_22: Yañca “uddhaccaṃ uppajjatī”ti uddhaccasahagatacittuppādo vuttoti dassetuṃ adhipatipaccayaniddese uddhaccassa anuddharaṇaṃ kāraṇavasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_25: anāgato dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti etesaṃ vibhaṅge cetopariyañāṇaggahaṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1714_26: katvā “paccuppanno dhammo paccuppannassa dhammassā”ti imassa vibhaṅge labbhamānampi cetopariyañāṇaṃ na gahitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1714_27: Yampi bhāvanāyapahātabbassa vipākadānamhi dassanenapahātabbassa sahāyabhāvūpagamanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1714_29: kiṃ avijjādi viya dānasīlādīnaṃ upapattiyaṃyeva vipākadānasāmatthiyā ṭhānavasena dassanenapahātabbā bhāvanāyapahātabbānaṃ sahakārīkāraṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1714_34: pahīnāvijjāmānataṇhānusayasmiṃ santāne dānādi viya sahāyavekallena avipākasabhāvataṃ āpannattā.
tika-abh08t0:1714_38: tasmā amhehi heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva uddhaccasahagatassa vipākadānaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1715_4: yathā taṃ paṭhamasañjātaṃ acchinnamūlepi rukkhe nibbattaṃ purimehi adinnaphalattā phalanibbattakaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1715_5: evamidaṃ anupacchinnabhavamūlepi santāne nibbattaṃ anāsevanabhāvena phaladāyakaṃ na hotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1715_6: Javanattaṃ tu sampattanti aṭṭhārasavidhaṃ khīṇāsavāveṇikaṃ viññāṇamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1715_7: Kiccasādhanatoti bhavataṇhāmūlassa avocchinnabhāve sati kusalākusalakammakiccassa sādhanato,
tika-abh08t0:1715_10: yathā hi chinnamūlassa rukkhassa pupphaṃ pupphanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā aphalameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1715_11: evametampi taṃtaṃkiccasādhanamattaṃ ṭhapetvā samucchinnabhavataṇhāmūle santāne pavattanato aphalamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1716_1: Paṭiccāti hetudhammassa paṭimukhaṃ gantvā taṃ apaccakkhāya.
tika-abh08t0:1716_6: Ekacco hi paccayo ṭhitiyā eva upakārako hoti yathā pacchājātapaccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1716_10: saddassa vacanatthaṃ dassetvā idāni paccayalakkhaṇaṃ dassento āha “yo dhammo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1716_27: Hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:1717_1: Evaṃ paṭṭhāne āgatasabbapaccayānaṃ sādhāraṇavasena atthaṃ vatvā idhādhippetassa hetupaccayasseva sarūpaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1717_4: Chaḷevāti mūlaṭṭhenūpakārakabhāvassa tesameva āveṇikabhāvena ete chaḷeva.
tika-abh08t0:1717_12: evaṃ hetupaccayo yathārahaṃ attano sampayuttānaṃ kusalādittasādhakoti kusalākusalābyākatadhammānaṃ yathākkamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1717_16: Atha vā garumhi bahuvacanampi yujjatīti revatācariyameva sandhāya “eke ācariyā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1718_6: “hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti vutto hetupaccayabhāvo na sampajjatīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1718_7: Yathā kusalākusalā hetū taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpassa kusalādibhāvāya na pariyattā,
tika-abh08t0:1718_8: evaṃ abyākatopi hetu taṃsamuṭṭhānassa rūpassa abyākatabhāvāya na pariyatto.
tika-abh08t0:1718_9: Sabhāvena hi taṃ abyākatanti āha “na hī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1718_11: paccayāpi na hontīti vadeyyāti āha “na tesa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1718_12: “Hetū hetusampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ hetupaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato te alobhādayo tesaṃ rūpānaṃ paccayā na na honti,
tika-abh08t0:1719_3: yadi kusalādihetuyo attano viya attahetukānaṃ dhammānaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ sādhenti,
tika-abh08t0:1719_4: kusalākusalahetupaccayasambhūtā rūpadhammāpi te viya kusalādayo siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1719_5: hetuyo vā rūpānaṃ paccayā na siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1719_7: tasmā kusalādīnaṃ kusalādibhāvasādhako mūlaṭṭhoti na viññātabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:1719_14: evampi momūhacittasampayuttassa hetuno akusalabhāvo na sijjheyya.
tika-abh08t0:1719_21: evaṃ sati alobho kusalo vā siyā abyākato vā.
tika-abh08t0:1719_25: taṃsabhāvattā kusalo na siyā alobhasabhāvassa adosattābhāvo viya.
tika-abh08t0:1719_27: tasmā yathā ubhayathā hontesu saddhādīsu sampayuttesu hetupaṭibaddhaṃ kusalādibhāvaṃ pariyesatha,
tika-abh08t0:1719_31: Sā pana pariyesiyamānā yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddhā hotīti hetūsu viya hetusampayuttadhammesupi yonisomanasikārādipaṭibaddho kusalādibhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1720_2: manasi karoto anuppannā ceva kusalā dhammā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1721_1: Suppatiṭṭhitabhāvassa sādhanenāti attahetukānaṃ dhammānaṃ sammā patiṭṭhitabhāvassa thirabhāvassa sādhanena.
tika-abh08t0:1721_2: Laddhahetupaccayā hi dhammā viruḷhamūlā viya pādapā thirā honti suppatiṭṭhitā,
tika-abh08t0:1723_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ abhāvato attanā sampayuttānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1723_4: Kammassa katattā eva ca upacitattā ca na issarādihetuno sambhūtāni rūpāni kaṭattārūpāni,
tika-abh08t0:1724_1: Lokuttaravipākānaṃ paṭisandhivasena appavattanato natthi kammasamuṭṭhānassa paccayabhāvoti āha “cittajāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1725_6: samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”tiādivacanato sukhaṃ hetu etassāti,
tika-abh08t0:1731_4: Chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvāti “chandavato kiṃ nāma na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā
tika-abh08t0:1731_5: uppajjamāne cittuppāde chando jeṭṭhakabhūto sampayuttadhamme vase vattamāno hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1731_6: sampayuttadhammā ca tassa vase pavattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanatoti āha “chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1731_8: Chandādhipati nāma so vā cittuppādo chandādhipati nāma “chando adhipati imassā”ti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1731_13: kālasmi”ntiādinā kālassa niyamitattā cattāropete ekakkhaṇe adhipatī na hontīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1731_14: Evañca katvā paṭṭhāne “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena
tika-abh08t0:1731_15: paccayo”tiādinā catunnampi adhipatīnaṃ paccayabhāvo visuṃ visuṃyeva uddhaṭo.
tika-abh08t0:1731_16: Yadi hi te ekakkhaṇeyeva adhipatipaccayā siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1731_17: tadā yathā hetupaccayaniddese “hetū hetusampayuttakāna”ntiādinā avisesena vuttaṃ mūlaṭṭhena upakārakabhāvassa vijjamānena dvinnaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1731_19: evaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva bahūnaṃ jeṭṭhakabhāve sati adhipatipaccayaniddesepi “adhipatī adhipatisampayuttakāna”ntiādinā vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1731_20: Yasmā pana evaṃ avatvā “chandādhipati chandasampayuttakāna”ntiādinā cattārova visesetvā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1731_21: tasmā ekekadhammoyeva ekakkhaṇe adhipatipaccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1732_1: sobhanaṃ vā mataṃ etesaṃ atthīti sumatino,
tika-abh08t0:1732_9: sāyeva indhanasadisatāya indhanaṃ tassa pāvakaṃ aggi viyāti kumati…pe… pāvakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1732_10: Atimadhuranti nipuṇagambhīrena attharasena ceva suvimalasakhilena byañjanarasena ca madhuraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1732_13: Jinavacanaṃ sakalaṃ avedīti tepiṭakassapi sakalajinavacanassa gahaṇasamatthatāpaṭilābhena taṃ avagacchati.
tika-abh08t0:1738_2: Puññāpuññādisaṅkhārāti puññābhisaṅkhāro apuññābhisaṅkhāro āneñjābhisaṅkhāroti tayo saṅkhārā.
tika-abh08t0:1738_6: attano phalassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena abhisaṅkhāro cāti puññābhisaṅkhāro,
tika-abh08t0:1738_9: Samādhipaccanīkānaṃ atidūratāya na iñjati na kampatīti āneñjaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1738_12: bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā rūpāvacarakusalacetanā cāti terasa cetanā puññābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1738_13: Pāṇātipātādivasena pavattā dvādasa akusalacetanā apuññābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1738_14: Bhāvanāvaseneva pavattā catasso arūpāvacarakusalacetanā āneñjābhisaṅkhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1739_1: Katame pana te bhavādayoti āha “tayo bhavā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1739_4: pana ekavokārabhavacatuvokārabhavapañcavokārabhavavasena ca tayo bhavā ettheva samodhānaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1739_6: Tattha bījakapāle nibbatto sattanikāyo aṇḍajayoni nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1739_9: Kutoci anuppajjitvā kevalaṃ tattha tattha paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgo hutvā uppajjanakasattanikāyo opapātikayoni nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1739_11: Paṭisandhiviññāṇassa vatthubhūtā ca viññāṇakkhandhā cha viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1739_12: Tā pana nānattakāyādivasena sattavidhāti āha “viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo sattā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1740_6: Seyyathāpi manussā ekacce ca devā ekacce ca vinipātikā,
tika-abh08t0:1740_21: sattā sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ‘ananto ākāso’ti ākāsānañcāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t0:1740_24: sattā sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘anantaṃ viññāṇa’nti viññāṇañcāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t0:1740_27: sattā sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samatikkamma ‘natthi kiñcī’ti ākiñcaññāyatanūpagā,
tika-abh08t0:1741_0: Ettha hi aparimāṇacakkavāḷavāsino manussā kāmāvacaradevā punabbasumātupiyaṅkaramātādayo vinipātikāsurā
tika-abh08t0:1741_1: ca kusalavipākapaṭisandhikā vemānikapetā ceti ime dīgharassakisathūlakāḷaodātādivaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena rūpakāyassa,
tika-abh08t0:1741_2: ahetuduhetutihetuvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca nānābhāvato nānattakāyanānattasaññino nāma,
tika-abh08t0:1741_4: Paṭhamajjhānatalavāsino pana tayo devā uparūparivāsīnaṃ vaṇṇādikamapekkhitvā attano vaṇṇādīnaṃ nihīnatāya rūpakāyassa nānābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1741_8: akusalavipākasaññāvasena saññāya ekasabhāvattā ca dutiyaviññāṇaṭṭhitiyaṃyeva samodhānaṃ gacchantīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1741_9: Dutiyajjhānatalavāsino tayo devā vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena samānattā rūpakāyassa visesābhāvato pañcakanaye
tika-abh08t0:1741_12: Tatiyajjhānatalavāsino pana tayo devā rūpakāyavasena samānattā,
tika-abh08t0:1741_13: pañcakanaye catutthajjhānavipākasaññāvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca ekattā ekattakāyaekattasaññino nāma,
tika-abh08t0:1741_15: Vehapphalavāsino ceva pañca suddhāvāsavāsino ca vaṇṇasaṇṭhānavasena rūpakāyassa,
tika-abh08t0:1741_16: pañcamajjhānavipākasaññāvasena paṭisandhisaññāya ca samānattā catutthaviññāṇaṭṭhitimeva bhajanti.
tika-abh08t0:1741_18: Asaññasattā pana viññāṇābhāvena nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavāsino ca saññāya viya viññāṇassa sukhumabhāveneva viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu na gahitā,
tika-abh08t0:1741_20: Evañca katvā tehi satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo samodhānetvā nava sattāvāsā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1742_1: Idāni evaṃ vuttesu bhavādīsu dvattiṃsavipākānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ abhisaṅkhārānaṃ paccayabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “kāme puññābhisaṅkhārasaññitā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1742_4: paccayehi cāti kusalākusalakammassa atītasseva attanā janetabbavipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena,
tika-abh08t0:1742_6: Vuttañhi tassa upanissayattaṃ “kusalākusalaṃ kammaṃ vipākassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1742_8: Dubbalañhi kammaṃ upanissayo na hotīti paṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyaṃ dassitametaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1743_2: Duggatiyaṃ kusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā abhāvato āha “na honti paṭisandhiya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1743_3: Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīnaṃ asaṅkaravasena paccayavidhiṃ dassetvā idāni samodhānetvā dassetuṃ “hontī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1744_8: Taṃ pana kiṃ navattabbārammaṇaṃ vā uppādeyya parittādiārammaṇaṃ vā?
tika-abh08t0:1744_11: taṃ na yuttaṃ rūpāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantena kammasamānārammaṇatāya dassitattā,
tika-abh08t0:1744_14: tampi na yujjati rūpāvacaravipākānaṃ ekanteneva navattabbārammaṇabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1745_0: “Rūpāvacaratikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca catutthassa jhānassa vipāko ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1746_0: Apica samādhivijjāsambhārabhūtā abhiññā samādhissa ānisaṃsamattaṃ samādhiphalasadisā.
tika-abh08t0:1746_1: Tassa tassa hi adhiṭṭhānavikubbanadibbasaddasavanādikassa yathicchitassa kiccassa nipphādanamattaphalā abhiññācetanā.
tika-abh08t0:1746_2: Tenāha “so evaṃ samāhite citte”tiādi tasmā samādhissa phalasadisā abhiññācetanā na ca phalaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t0:1746_3: dānasīlānisaṃsabhūto tasmiṃ bhave paccayalābho viya natthi tassa vipākuppādananti.
tika-abh08t0:1746_4: Keci pana “samānabhūmikato āsevanalābhena balavantāni jhānāni vipākaṃ uppādenti samāpattibhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1746_5: abhiññā pana satipi jhānabhāve tadabhāvato tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ārammaṇe āgantukāyevāti dubbalā,
tika-abh08t0:1748_0: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccatī”ti. ;
tika-abh08t0:1749_2: Na hi parittaṃ laddhāsevanameva tattha vipākaṃ detīti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1749_3: tasmā samānāsevane laddheyeva jhānassa vipākadānaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1749_4: Apica punappunaṃ parikammavasena abhiññāyapi vasibhāvasabbhāvā tassāpi ca balavabhāvo atthevāti vipākaṃ uppādeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1750_6: Sugatiyaṃ akusalavipākapaṭisandhiyā abhāvato āha “na honti paṭisandhiya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1750_9: Rūpabhave ca kathaṃ aniṭṭhārammaṇasamāyogoti āha “so cā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1750_15: Keci pana “upaladdhiyanti imasseva visesanabhāvena gahetvā brahmūnaṃ kāmabhavaṃ āgatakkhaṇe rūpādiupaladdhiya”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1750_17: na vijjare ekantasukhavatthubhūte tattha vokiṇṇasukhadukkhakāraṇassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1752_2: tato bhavato paṭṭhāya mukhamattappakāsanaṃ kātukāmo āha “tatrida”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1752_15: puññābhisaṅkhārassa bhavādīsu ekavīsativipākānaṃ ekāvatthāya paccayo ahutvā duggatipariyāpannesu bhavayonigativiññāṇaṭṭhitisattāvāsesu
tika-abh08t0:1752_16: paṭisandhiṃ adatvā pavatteyeva aṭṭhannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1752_17: kāmāvacarasugatipariyāpannesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte soḷasannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1752_18: rūpāvacarabhūmipariyāpannesu paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavatte dasannaṃ vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvato vuttaṃ “yathāraha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1754_6: paccayāti saṅkhārā yathā paccayā yesañca paccayā,
tika-abh08t0:1755_1: Nanu ca saṅkhārānaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsupi vipākānaṃ paccayabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1755_2: Tattha paṭisandhiyeva tāva na sakkā viññātuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1755_3: Yadi hi purimabhavato paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ idhāgacchatīti vucceyya,
tika-abh08t0:1755_7: tampi na yujjati ahetukadosāpattitoti iminā adhippāyena codento āha “na rūpārūpadhammāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1755_8: Ācariyo tassādhippāyaṃ sampaṭicchitvā taṃ saññāpetukāmo āha “natthi cittassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1755_9: Tato hetuṃ vināti tattha hetuṃ vinā,
tika-abh08t0:1755_11: Suladdhapaccayanti avijjādisahakārīkāraṇasahitassa saṅkhārassa vasena suṭṭhu avekallato paṭiladdhapaccayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1755_12: Rūpārūpamattanti bāhirakaparikappitassa adhitiṭṭhanakassa sattajīvādino abhāvato rūpārūpadhammamattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1755_16: Atthato pana paccayasāmaggiyā bhavantarabhāvena uppajjanamattanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1756_1: Idāni taṃ paṭisandhikkamaṃ pākaṭāya manussapaṭisandhiyā vasena pakāsetuṃ samārabhanto āha “tayida”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1759_1: Āsannamaraṇassāti parūpakkamena vā āyukkhayādivasena vā samāsannamaraṇassa.
tika-abh08t0:1759_3: Gabbhaseyyakassa āyatanānaṃ anupubbuppatti viya nirodhopi anupubbato hotīti vuttaṃ “naṭṭhe cakkhundriyādike”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1759_6: ke”ti iminā sesakāye kāyindriyassa niruddhabhāvo vuttoti ekakammasamuṭṭhitampi nassatevāti apare.
tika-abh08t0:1759_11: Sacittakānaṃ acakkhukānaṃ cavantānaṃ tesaṃ manāyatanaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1759_14: cakkhāyatanañca nirujjhatī’tiādinā cakkhāyatanādīnaṃ cuticittena saha nirodho vuttoti cakkhundriyādīni cutito pubbe na nassanti.
tika-abh08t0:1759_15: Atimandabhāvūpagamanaṃ pana sandhāya aṭṭhakathāya ‘niruddhesu indriyesū’ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1759_19: Na hi hadayavatthuṃ nissāya kāyindriyaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1760_1: Vatthusannissitanti sesindriyānaṃ niruddhattā viññāṇassa nissayabhāvūpagamanasāmatthiyāyogena mandabhāvato vā hadayavatthumattasannissitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1760_3: Taṃ pana sugatiyaṃ nibbattamānassa kusalaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1761_5: yaṃ dvinnaṃ gatīnaṃ aññataraṃ gatiṃ upapajjeyya nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1763_0: “Gatisampattiyā ñāṇasampayutte katamesaṃ aṭṭhannaṃ hetūnaṃ paccayā upapatti hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1763_1: kusalassa kammassa javanakkhaṇe tayo hetū kusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1763_3: Nikantikkhaṇe dve hetū akusalā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1763_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe tayo hetū abyākatā tasmiṃ khaṇe jātacetanāya sahajātapaccayā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1764_2: atha kho katakammassa taṃ kammaṃ ārabbha assādavasena pavattajavanasampayuttahetuyo sandhāya.
tika-abh08t0:1764_3: Katūpacitampi hi kammaṃ taṇhāya assāditaṃ vipākābhinipphādane samatthanti.
tika-abh08t0:1764_4: Keci pana “kammakaraṇakāle appahīnāvatthāya santāne anusayitahetuyo sandhāya nikantikkhaṇe dve hetuyoti vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1764_7: Pubbānusevitaṃ puññaṃ vā apuññameva vā kammaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1764_8: kammanimittaṃ vā ālambitvā cittaṃ pavattatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1764_15: Dinnapaṭisandhikampi pana aparajātīsu pavattivipākaṃ na nibbattetīti natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1764_22: Evañca katvā pañcadvāraggahitepi ārammaṇe paṭisandhi hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1764_23: Apare pana gatinimittampi chadvāresu labbhatīti vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t0:1766_2: mūlaṭīkādīsu ca “kammabalena upaṭṭhāpitaṃ vaṇṇāyatanaṃ supinaṃ passantassa viya,
tika-abh08t0:1766_3: dibbacakkhukassa viya ca manodvāre eva gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatī”ti niyametvā vuttattā tesaṃ vacanaṃ na sampaṭicchanti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:1766_4: Kammanimittañca panettha paccuppannaṃ pañcadvāre āpāthamāgacchantaṃ cutikālāsanne katakammassa ārammaṇasantāne uppannaṃ taṃsadisanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1766_5: itarathā tadeva paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇupaṭṭhāpakaṃ tadeva paṭisandhijanakaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1766_7: “etasmiṃ tayā pavattitabba”nti paṭisandhiyā ārammaṇaṃ anuppadentāni viya ca pavattāni cutiāsannajavanāni paṭisandhijanakāni bhaveyyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1766_9: Tadā ca paṭisandhiyā ekavīthiyaṃ viya pavattamānāni kathaṃ katūpacitāni siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1766_11: na ca lokiyāni lokuttarāni viya samānavīthiphalāni hontīti.
tika-abh08t0:1766_14: Cutipaṭisandhitadāsannaviññāṇānañhi santativasena viññāṇanti upanītekattaṃ idha taṃ viññāṇanti adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1767_2: Tathābhūte pana kammādivisaye paṭisandhiviññāṇassa ārammaṇabhāvena uppattiṭṭhānabhūte.
tika-abh08t0:1767_3: Taṇhāya appahīnattā eva purimuppannāya ca santatiyā tathāpariṇatattā paṭisandhiṭṭhānābhimukhaṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1767_7: Khipantīti khipantā viya tasmiṃ visaye paṭisandhivasena viññāṇapatiṭṭhānassa hetubhāvena pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1767_11: Sati hi nānattanaye santativasena ekattanayo hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1768_3: Āsannamaraṇassa hi kammabalena manodvāre upaṭṭhāpitaṃ avijjāya paṭicchannādīnavaṃ kammādivisayaṃ ārabbha manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1768_9: Cuticitte pana niruddhe tadeva āpāthagataṃ kammakammanimittādiṃ ārabbha anupacchinnakilesabalavanimittaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1768_10: sahajātasaṅkhārehi kammādiārammaṇe khipiyamānaṃ orimatīrarukkhavinibandhaṃ rajjuṃ ālambitvā mātikātikkāmako
tika-abh08t0:1768_12: aparañca kammasamuṭṭhitaṃ nissayaṃ assādayamānaṃ vā anassādayamānaṃ vā ārammaṇādīhi paccayehi pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:1768_13: Ettha ca orimatīraṃ viya purimabhavo daṭṭhabbo,
tika-abh08t0:1769_1: Yathā puriso paratīre patiṭṭhahamāno paratīrarukkhavinibandhaṃ kiñci assādayamāno vā anassādayamāno vā
tika-abh08t0:1769_4: vā catuvokārabhave anassādayamānaṃ vā kevalaṃ ārammaṇanissayasampayuttadhammeheva pavattatīti taṃ viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1769_19: Daḷhaggāhakaraupādānā nāma maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya upapattibhavassa daḷhaggahaṇavasena pavattā kāmupādānādayo.
tika-abh08t0:1770_1: Saddapaṭighosādīnaṃ satipi paccayapaccayuppannabhāve santānabandho na pākaṭoti tesaṃ ekattanānattabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1770_8: yathā saddādīnaṃ uppattipadesaṃ anupagantvā paṭighoso saddahetuko,
tika-abh08t0:1770_11: mukhanimittādikaṃ ādāsādiabhimukhādihetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā,
tika-abh08t0:1770_12: evamidampi paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ na hetudesaṃ gantvā taṃhetukaṃ hoti tato pubbe abhāvā,
tika-abh08t0:1770_13: tasmā na idaṃ hetudesato purimabhavato idhāgataṃ paṭighosādayo viya saddādidesato,
tika-abh08t0:1770_14: nāpi tato hetuṃ vinā uppannaṃ saddādīhi vinā paṭighosādayo viyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1770_15: Atha vā aññatra agantvāti pubbe paccayapadese sannihitā hutvā tato aññatra gantvā tappaccayā na honti uppattito pubbe abhāvā,
tika-abh08t0:1770_18: Santānabandhato natthīti santānappabandhato natthi ekatā santānekattepi aññasseva viññāṇassa pātubhavanato,
tika-abh08t0:1770_19: nāpi nānatā apubbānaṃ apubbānaṃ uppādepi paṭhamuppannaṃ dhammaṃ vinā pacchimassa anuppajjanato,
tika-abh08t0:1770_21: Khaṇikāpi hi padīpajālā santānekattaṃ upādāya sā evāti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1770_23: “Sati santānabandhe”tiādinā santānabandhe ekantaṃ ekattāya ca nānattāya ca aggahetabbataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1770_26: santānabandhe sati yadi ekantena ekatā siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1770_28: attatoyeva ca sayaṃ anuppajjanato khīrato dadhisambhūtaṃ na bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:1770_29: Athāpi santānabandhe sati ekantaṃ nānatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1770_31: aññassa ca sāmibhāvamattena aparassa sāmibhāvāyogato khīrasāmi naro dadhisāmi na bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1771_4: Ekatte pana adhippete dhammato aggahetvā santānatova gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1771_5: nānatte adhippete santānavasena aggahetvā dhammatova gahetabbanti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1774_0: Ettha ca ekantaṃ ekatāpaṭisedhena “sayaṃkataṃ sukhadukkha”nti imaṃ diṭṭhiṃ nivāreti,
tika-abh08t0:1775_7: atha vā abhisambhavati kammaṃ etesūti abhisambhavā, khandhā,
tika-abh08t0:1775_9: Idha niruddhattāti phalādhiṭṭhānabhūtaṃ paralokaṃ agantvā idheva niruddhattā.
tika-abh08t0:1775_16: Etaṃ vidhānanti idhalokato paralokaṃ gantvā natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1775_17: tattha “aññeva khandhā nibbattantī”ti idaṃ sabbaṃ yathāvuttavidhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1776_2: sādhako”ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ pakāsetuṃ “ekasmiṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1776_3: Ekasmiṃ santāneti yasmiṃ dhammapuñje kammaṃ nibbattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1776_7: Etassatthassāti hetuphalānaṃ atthato aññattepi teneva hetuphalabhāvena sambandhattā taṃ phalaṃ aññassa,
tika-abh08t0:1776_8: aññatoti vā na vattabbanti etassa atthassa.
tika-abh08t0:1776_19: catumadhurena vā yojetvā ropitesu phalaraso madhuro hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1776_20: mātuluṅgabīje ca alattakarasena rajitvā ropite ambilabhaṇḍo ratto hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1776_21: na ca taṃ bījaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ vā phalaṭṭhānaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1776_22: evaṃ santepi kālantare phalaviseso na aññabījasantāne hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1776_23: na ca aññasmiṃ bīje abhisaṅkhārapaccayato hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1776_25: tesu nipphannaṃ kammaṃ vā paralokaṃ na gacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:1776_26: Evampi kālantare vipākakkhandhā aññasmiṃ santāne na nibbattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1777_0: Ettha hi abhisaṅkhataṃ bījaṃ viya kammaṃ vā satto,
tika-abh08t0:1777_3: Tatthuppannassa madhurarasassa ambilabhaṇḍe rattassa ca tasseva bījassa tato eva ca abhisaṅkhārato bhāvo
tika-abh08t0:1777_4: viya kammakārakasseva sattassa tato eva ca abhisaṅkharaṇato bhāvo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1778_8: na ca tāni aññassa honti taṃsantatipariyāpanne eva sadise uppajjanato.
tika-abh08t0:1778_9: Na ca yathā payuttena vijjāpariyāpuṇanādinā vinā tāni aññato honti tadabhāve abhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1779_2: Tattha ca yathāvuttadosapariharaṇe sati siddhepīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1779_3: Vijjamānanti padīpassa vaṭṭikāsneho viya vijjamānaṃ aniruddhanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1779_4: Avijjamānanti vaṭṭadukkhābhāvassa arahato cuticittaṃ viya avijjamānaṃ niruddhanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1782_3: Tenāha “kāmāvacarassa kusalassa kammassa katattā upacitattā vipākaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hotī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1782_4: Yadi evaṃ arahatā katakammampi kaṭattāpaccayo siyāti?
tika-abh08t0:1782_6: Yathā hi acchinnamūlasmiṃ rukkhe pupphitaṃ bījasamatthampi kusumaṃ mūle chinnamatte phaladāyakaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1782_7: evaṃ arahatopi kilesamūlassa abbocchinnakāle santāne pavattampi kammaṃ kilesamūlacchinnamatteyeva phaladāne asamatthabhāvaṃ āpannanti.
tika-abh08t0:1787_11: na ca taṃ niyyātanādīnaṃ niccameva paccayo hoti niyyātanādimhi kate paccayattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1787_15: karaṇamatte ca sati vipakkavipākānaṃ paccayo na hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1795_4: Na hi yathāsakaṃ paccayehi uppajjitvā ṭhitadhammānaṃ aññena kenaci vikārāpādanaṃ sakkā kātuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1795_5: tasmā purimuppannarūpasantati viya ahutvā pacchā uppajjamānānaṃ visabhāgapaccayasamavāyena visadisuppattiyeva idha “ruppana”nti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1795_6: Evañca katvā saṅghiyānaṃ vipariṇāmavādo paccakkhato hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1795_7: Nanu ca arūpadhammānampi virodhipaccayasamavāye visadisuppatti labbhatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1795_10: Vibhūtatarā hettha visadisuppatti adhippetā ukkaṭṭhagativasena yathā “abhirūpassa kaññā dātabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1796_0: Kuto etaṃ viññāyatīti ce? Sītādiggahaṇato. Tathā hi vuttaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1798_0: Ettha hi sītādiggahaṇaṃ sītādinā phuṭṭhassa ruppanaṃ vibhūtataraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1798_2: Itarathā ruppatīti sāmaññavacaneneva siddhe sītādiggahaṇaṃ niratthakaṃ siyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1799_2: Na hi tattha upaghātako sītādiphassaviseso labbhatīti? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1799_6: Atha vā kiñcāpi tattha upaghātako sītādiphassaviseso natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1799_9: tasmā attheva tattha ruppananti na koci tattha rūpasamaññāya vibandhoti.
tika-abh08t0:1800_0: Rūpayatīti vāti sayaṃ vijjamānameva attano santānaṃ vikāramāpādayatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1800_2: Iminā pana virodhipaccayasannipāte vijjamānasseva yo attano santāne visadisuppattihetubhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1800_4: Imasmiṃ pakkhe arūpassa rūpasamaññāpasaṅgo eva natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1800_5: Niruddhameva hi taṃ anantarādipaccayehi arūpaṃ uppādeti,
tika-abh08t0:1800_9: tasmā arūpadhammānaṃ ghaṭṭanābhāvato na tesu rūpasamaññāti keci.
tika-abh08t0:1800_12: atha kho avayavavohārena samudāyopi voharīyatīti sabbameva rūpaṃ rūpasamaññaṃ labhati.
tika-abh08t0:1800_16: Tayidaṃ upari vaṇṇāyatananiddese visuṃyeva vuccatīti na tassa idha saṃvaṇṇane payojanaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1800_21: tena dasabalacatuvesārajjādiasādhāraṇaguṇavisesasamāyogadīpanato satthu dhammakāyasampattiyāpi sobhanatā dassitā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1801_1: Bhūtopādāyabhedatoti ettha tadadhīnavuttitāya bhavati ettha upādārūpanti bhūtaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1801_2: Atha vā mahābhūtāyeva idha purimapadalopavasena bhūta-
tika-abh08t0:1801_6: na pana sayaṃ tehi aññehi vā upādiyatīti upādāyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1801_7: Evañca katvā catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya pavattamānānampi upādāyarūpatāpasaṅgo natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1801_8: Na hi te kevalaṃ aññamaññaṃ upādiyanteva,
tika-abh08t0:1801_12: Atha vā “catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanato catumahābhūtasannissitatāva upādāyarūpalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1801_17: Upādāti upādāyarūpāni “paṭisaṅkhā yoniso”tiādīsu viya ettha ya-
tika-abh08t0:1802_4: kathañca tāni “upādāyarūpānī”ti vuccantīti idaṃ codanaṃ hadaye katvā kamena sodhento āha “pathavīdhātū”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1802_6: Mahā ca so bhūto cāti mahābhūto,
tika-abh08t0:1802_7: tena mahābhūtena sadevake loke mahantabhāvena pātubhūtena sammāsambuddhenāti attho. Atha vā –
tika-abh08t0:1807_2: khīṇāsavesu ca pavattanato mahābhūtenāti mahatā sattena,
tika-abh08t0:1807_4: Khīṇāsavopi hi parikkhīṇapaṭisandhikattā bhūtoyeva na bhavati,
tika-abh08t0:1808_1: Mahantā pātubhūtāti upādinnakasantānepi anupādinnakasantānepi sasambhāradhātuvasena mahantā hutvā bhūtā jātā nibbattāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1812_2: mahantāni abbhutāni vā etesūti mahābhūtā, māyākārā,
tika-abh08t0:1812_3: yakkhādayo vā jātivaseneva mahantā bhūtāti mahābhūtā,
tika-abh08t0:1812_5: Ete hi yathā māyākārā amaṇiṃ eva udakaṃ maṇiṃ katvā dassenti,
tika-abh08t0:1812_7: yathā ca sayaṃ neva yakkhā na pakkhino samānā yakkhādibhāvampi dassenti,
tika-abh08t0:1812_8: evamevaṃ sayaṃ anīlāneva hutvā nīlaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ dassenti,
tika-abh08t0:1812_10: sayaṃ anodātāyeva hutvā odātaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ dassentīti māyākāramahābhūtasāmaññato mahābhūtā.
tika-abh08t0:1813_0: Yathā ca yakkhā mahābhūtā yaṃ gaṇhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1813_3: na ca tassa aṅgamaṅgaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1813_8: Yadi cassa aṅgamaṅgaṃ nissāya na ṭhitā,
tika-abh08t0:1813_9: yakkhaggahitake pahaṭe yakkhassa dukkhavedanuppatti na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1813_13: evametepi na aññamaññassa anto na bahi ṭhitā upalabbhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1813_14: na ca aññamaññaṃ nissāya na tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1813_15: Yadi hi te aññamaññassa anto ṭhitā,
tika-abh08t0:1813_22: Aniddisitabbaṭṭhānāpi cete patiṭṭhānādinā yathāsakakiccavisesena sesānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upakārakā hontā sahajātādinā
tika-abh08t0:1813_23: paccayena paccayo hutvā aññamaññaṃ nissāyeva tiṭṭhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1814_0: Vañcakattā abhūtenāti yakkhinīādayo viya abhūtena atacchena manāpavaṇṇasaṇṭhānādinā sattānaṃ vañcakattā
tika-abh08t0:1814_4: hatthabhamuādivikkhepehi ca attano bhayānakabhāvaṃ paṭicchādetvā satte vañcenti,
tika-abh08t0:1814_8: manāpena ca hatthapādaaṅgulibhamukavikkhepena attano kakkhaḷattādisarīralakkhaṇaṃ paṭicchādetvā bālajanaṃ vañcenti,
tika-abh08t0:1814_9: attano sabhāvaṃ daṭṭhuṃ na dentā taṃ attano vasaṃ nenti.
tika-abh08t0:1815_2: Hadayañca taṃ vatthu ca manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnanti hadayavatthu,
tika-abh08t0:1815_6: Kiñcāpi dhammasaṅgaṇiyaṃ rūpaniddese kabaḷīkāro āhāro osāne uddiṭṭho,
tika-abh08t0:1815_7: idha pana nipphannarūpānaṃ ekaṭṭhāne dassanatthaṃ hadayavatthuanantaraṃ uddiṭṭhoti.
tika-abh08t0:1815_14: Lahutādīnaṃ sayaṃ anipphannattā nipphannarūpavikārabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpassā”ti visesanaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1815_21: Catūhi upādānehi nimuttatāya nikkhantaṃ upādānato mānasaṃ etassāti nirupādānamānaso.
tika-abh08t0:1816_3: puthavī eva pathavīti niruttinayena saddasiddhi dīpitā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1816_8: Purimopi vā attho lakkhaṇapathaviyā vasena labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1816_25: Sopi hi pharusapācanavisosanākārena sesabhūtattayena pīyamāno viya pavattatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1816_33: Yasmā lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu dhammā āvi bhavissanti,
tika-abh08t0:1817_2: yesu ñātesu dhammā āvi bhavissantīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ lakkhaṇarasapaccupaṭṭhānapadaṭṭhānāni sarūpato kathento āha “sāmaññaṃ vā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1818_4: Tathā hi viññātāviññātasaddatthatāvasena asambhinnepi dhamme kappanāsiddhena bhedena evaṃ niddeso kato.
tika-abh08t0:1818_7: kakkhaḷā hutvā lakkhiyamānā dhātu kakkhaḷattalakkhaṇāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1818_11: Tato eva nesaṃ sampaṭicchanākārena ñāṇassa paccupaṭṭhātīti sampaṭicchanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1818_13: Padaṭṭhānaṃ panettha catunnampi ekato katvā vakkhati.
tika-abh08t0:1819_2: Tathā hi sā tesaṃ pīṇitabhāvaṃ dassetīti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1819_3: Saṅgahapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhirakaudakaṃ viya nahāniyacuṇṇassa sahajātadhammānaṃ vippakirituṃ adatvā sampiṇḍanavasena saṅgaṇhanapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1819_5: Maddavānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānāti bāhiraggi viya jatulohādīnaṃ sahajātadhammānaṃ mudubhāvānuppadānapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1819_9: nīharaṇaṃ vā bījato aṅkurādikassa viya. Ekekā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1819_11: āpodhātu pathavītejādibhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti evaṃ ekekā dhātu avasiṭṭhabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1820_0: Ārohapariṇāhavasena hi majjhime imasmiṃ sarīre pariggayhamānā paramāṇubhedasañcuṇṇā sukhumarajabhūtā pathavīdhātu doṇamattā siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1820_1: Sā ca tato upaḍḍhappamāṇāya āpodhātuyā yathā na vikirati,
tika-abh08t0:1820_3: Yathā pana paggharaṇasabhāvāya āpodhātuyā vasena kilinnabhāvaṃ picchalabhāvaṃ nāpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1820_5: Yathā pana tassā vasena na vikirīyati,
tika-abh08t0:1820_7: Evaṃ sukhumarajabhūtāpi ābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi āpotejovāyodhātūhi laddhapaccayā sinehena temitā,
tika-abh08t0:1820_9: vāyunā vitthambhitā piṭṭhacuṇṇāni viya na ito cito ca vikirīyati viddhaṃsīyati,
tika-abh08t0:1821_0: Yūsagatā ābandhanākārabhūtā panettha āpodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā tejānupālitā vāyovitthambhitā na gaḷati,
tika-abh08t0:1821_3: Evaṃ tīhi dhātūhi anupālitā apaggharamānā aparissavamānā piṇḍitabhāvaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:1822_0: Asitapītādiparipācitā cettha usumākārabhūtā uṇhattalakkhaṇā tejodhātu pathavīpatiṭṭhitā āposaṅgahitā vāyovitthambhitā imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti,
tika-abh08t0:1822_2: Sā hi yathānubhuttassa āhārassa sammā pariṇāmanena rasādisampattiyā hetubhāvaṃ gacchantī imaṃ kāyaṃ paripāceti,
tika-abh08t0:1822_4: Kammūpanissayāya hi cittapasādahetukāya ca sarīre vaṇṇasampadāya tejodhātu visesapaccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1822_6: Tāya ca pana paripācito ayaṃ kāyo na pūtibhāvaṃ gacchati.
tika-abh08t0:1823_0: Aṅgamaṅgānusaṭā cettha samudīraṇavitthambhanalakkhaṇā vāyodhātu pathavīdhātuyā attani patiṭṭhāpīyati.
tika-abh08t0:1823_5: Sā evaṃ tīhi dhātūhi yathārahaṃ anupāliyamānā imaṃ kāyaṃ vitthambheti.
tika-abh08t0:1823_6: Tāya pana vitthambhito ayaṃ kāyo na paripatati,
tika-abh08t0:1823_8: iccevaṃ ekekāya dhātuyā tissannaṃ dhātūnaṃ vaseneva pavattanato vuttaṃ “ekekā cettha sesabhūtattayapadaṭṭhānāti veditabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1824_0: Evaṃ bhūtarūpānaṃ saddhiṃ vacanatthehi lakkhaṇādayo dassetvā idāni upādāyarūpāni dassento āha “cakkhatī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1824_2: saddassa vibhāvanatthatāpi sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ “vibhāvetīti attho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1824_3: Cakkhatīti pana viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya,
tika-abh08t0:1824_5: Atha vā cakkhatīti viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ rūpaṃ assādentaṃ viya hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1824_15: saddārāma”ntiādivacanato sotādīnampi saddādiassādakabhāvo atthīti tesampi cakkhusaddābhidheyyatā āpajjatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1825_2: saddasāmaññato āgataṃ sabbampi cakkhuṃ pabhedato dassetuṃ “tattha cakkhū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1825_4: Paññāmaṃsappabhedatoti paññācakkhu maṃsacakkhūti evaṃ paññāmaṃsānaṃ vasena pabhedato.
tika-abh08t0:1825_9: Tattha buddhadhammasamantehīti buddhacakkhu dhammacakkhu samantacakkhūti imehi nāmehi.
tika-abh08t0:1826_3: buddhacakkhunā lokaṃ volokento satte apparajakkhe mahārajakkhe tikkhindriye”tiādinā āgataṃ buddhacakkhu nāmāti dassento āha “āsayānusaye”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1826_4: Tattha āsayānusayeti sattānaṃ āsaye ceva anusaye ca,
tika-abh08t0:1826_6: Tattha āgantvā seti cittaṃ etthāti āsayo.
tika-abh08t0:1826_8: Yathā hi byaggho gocaratthāya pakkantopi puna āgantvā vanagahaneyeva sayati,
tika-abh08t0:1826_9: teneva ca taṃ tassa āsayoti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1826_10: evaṃ aññatthāpi pavattaṃ cittaṃ āgantvā yattha sayati,
tika-abh08t0:1829_4: Idaṃ pana buddhacakkhu chasu asādhāraṇañāṇesu purimadvayanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1830_2: saññitanti “tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādī”ti evaṃ vuttaṃ heṭṭhā tīsu maggesu ñāṇaṃ dhammacakkhunti saññitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1830_5: buddhiyā ca pavattinimittatāya sabbaññubhāvo nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1830_6: Ñeyyaṃ samantacakkhunti khandhādivasena samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena samantacakkhunti ñeyyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1835_1: Yaṃ cakkhuṃ udapādīti āgatanti yaṃ ñāṇaṃ “idaṃ dukkhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1835_4: ñāṇaṃ udapādī”ti evaṃ tattha tattha suttesu āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1835_5: catūsu saccesu teparivaṭṭavasena “dukkhaṃ pariññeyyaṃ pariññāta”nti evamādinā dvādasavidhena ākārena pavattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1835_12: Catutthampi pana purimadvayamiva kāmāvacaranti ānandācariyena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1835_14: Aggamaggena saha vipassanāpaccavekkhaṇañāṇanti pana yuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-abh08t0:1836_1: Evaṃ paññācakkhussa pabhedaṃ dassetvā puna maṃsacakkhussāpi pabhedaṃ dassetuṃ “maṃsacakkhupī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1836_2: Sasambhārapasādatoti sasambhāracakkhu pasādacakkhūti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ vasena sambharīyati etehīti sambhārā, avayavā.
tika-abh08t0:1836_6: Akkhikūpaṭṭhinā heṭṭhāti heṭṭhāgataakkhikūpassa aṭṭhinā paricchinnoti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1836_9: Matthaluṅgena antatoti akkhikūpassa abbhantare ṭhitena matthaluṅgena.
tika-abh08t0:1836_10: Nhārusuttena ābandhoti nahārurajjūhi anto matthaluṅgena saha ābandho.
tika-abh08t0:1836_13: Kamalassa dalaṃ viyāti puthulavipulanīlatāya nīluppaladalaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:1836_15: Cakkhu nāma na taṃ hotīti tathā gayhamānaṃ taṃ cakkhu nāma na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1837_1: Taṃ pana sasambhāracakkhu yehi sambhārehi sambharīyati,
tika-abh08t0:1837_7: Saṇṭhānanti ca tena tenākārena sanniviṭṭhesu mahābhūtesu taṃtaṃsaṇṭhānavasena viññāyamānaṃ vaṇṇāyatanamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1837_8: Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanehi ca anatthantarabhūtānampi sambhavasaṇṭhānānaṃ visuṃ vacanaṃ tathābhūtānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1837_10: Āpodhātuvaṇṇāyatanānañhi santānavasena pavattamānānaṃ avatthāviseso sambhavo saṇṭhānañcāti.
tika-abh08t0:1838_3: purimāni ca catusamuṭṭhānānīti cattālīsañca cattāri ca rūpāni bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:1839_1: Imesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ vasenāti yathāvuttānaṃ saṅkhepato cuddasannaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1839_5: kaṇhampi lohitampi pathavīpi āpopi tejopi vāyopi,
tika-abh08t0:1839_13: Idaṃ sambhāravantatāya sambhāracakkhūti paṇḍitehi buddhādīhi pakāsitaṃ paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1839_14: Ettha sitoti etaṃ sasambhāracakkhuṃ nissito tadāyattabhūto.
tika-abh08t0:1839_16: Catunnaṃ pana bhūtānaṃ pasādoti catunnaṃ bhūtānaṃ pasannatāsabhāvo pasādo,
tika-abh08t0:1839_18: Potthakesu pana “sete tu maṇḍale tassā”ti likhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1839_19: Kaṇhamaṇḍalamajjheti idhāpi “kaṇhamaṇḍalassa majjhe”ti vattabbe “catutthadū”tiādīsu viya chandānurakkhaṇatthaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1839_21: Evañhi attho ca yojanā ca suṭṭhu upapannā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1839_23: Apare pana yathāṭhitavaseneva pāṭhaṃ gahetvā “sabbaso parikkhittassa tassa sasambhārassa cakkhuno majjhe setamaṇḍale kaṇhamaṇḍale majjhe”ti yojenti.
tika-abh08t0:1840_2: hutvānāti sandhāraṇanahāpanamaṇḍanabījanakiccāhi catūhi dhātīhi khattiyakumāro viya sandhāraṇābandhanaparipācanasamudīraṇakiccāhi
tika-abh08t0:1840_5: Ettha ca kalāpantaragatā utuāhārā adhippetāti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1840_14: Sampaṭicchanādīnaṃ pana tadārammaṇāvasānānaṃ aññanissitattā dvārabhāvameva sādheti,
tika-abh08t0:1840_16: Ūkāsirasamānena pamāṇenāti ūkāsirasamānena padesappamāṇena lakkhitaṃ hutvā ūkāsirasamānappamāṇe ṭhāneti vā attho.
tika-abh08t0:1840_17: Tiṭṭhatīti satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā sattasu picupaṭalesu āsittatelaṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:1840_18: Evañca katvā cakkhussa anekakalāpagatatā siddhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1840_22: āyuvaṇṇādīni ca satta akkhipaṭalāni byāpetvā ṭhitāneva avinibbhogavuttittāti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1841_7: Tathā hi “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”tiādīsu viya nissitakiriyaṃ nissaye viya katvā vohārasambhavato “cakkhupasādena passatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1841_8: Ācariyajotipālattherenāpi hi imināva adhippāyena idaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1841_28: tasmā taṃ anuppannattā antaritaṃ na passati.
tika-abh08t0:1841_32: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti.
tika-abh08t0:1841_34: Atha vā nissitakiriyā nissayassa pavuccati yathā “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1841_43: Idañca tattha nibbattantaṃ taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā eva nibbattati.
tika-abh08t0:1841_46: ekekassa ca cittassa tīsu tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ uppajjamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:1842_1: Suṇātīti sotanti ettha kiṃ sotaṃ suṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:1842_2: udāhu viññāṇantiādinā heṭṭhā vuttanayena yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1842_3: Tanutambalomāciteti sasambhārasotabilassa anto sukhumehi tambavaṇṇalomehi sañcite.
tika-abh08t0:1842_6: Āyunā paripāliyamānanti ettha vaṇṇādīhi parivāritanti sambandhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1842_7: Tiṭṭhatīti pubbe vuttanayena taṃ padesaṃ pūretvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:1842_11: Jīvitamavhāyatīti ettha rasaggahaṇamūlakattā ajjhoharaṇassa jīvitanimittaṃ ajjhoharaṇaraso jīvitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1842_12: taṃ avhāyati tasmiṃ ninnatāya avhāyantamiva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1842_13: Uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne padeseti majjhe chinnassa uppaladalassa aggabhāgasaṇṭhāne padese.
tika-abh08t0:1842_14: Malānanti kilesādimalānañceva malavisayānañca sāsavadhammānaṃ anuttariyabhāvaṃ gacchantesu kāmarāganidānakammajanitesu
tika-abh08t0:1842_15: kāmarāgassa ca visesapaccayesu ghānajivhākāyesu kāyassa visesato sāsavapaccayattā soyeva tesaṃ āyoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1842_16: Tena hi phoṭṭhabbasukhaṃ assādentā sattā methunampi sevanti.
tika-abh08t0:1842_17: Atha vā kāyindriyavatthukā cattāro khandhā balavakāmarāgādihetubhāvato visesato malā,
tika-abh08t0:1842_20: Sopi hi kucchitānaṃ kesādimalānaṃ āyabhāvato kāyoti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1842_21: Yāvatā upādinnakaṃ atthīti iminā kesagganakhaggādīsu kāyapasādassa abhāvamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1842_23: Ime ca pana cakkhādayo rūpādigocaraninnatāya vammikaudakaākāsagāmasivathikāsaṅkhātagocaraninnatāya ahisuṃsumārapakkhikukkurasigālā viya daṭṭhabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1842_29: Visamajjhāsayatāyāti cakkhussa visamajjhāsayaṃ viya hotīti katvā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1842_30: Cakkhumato vā puggalassa ajjhāsayavasena cakkhu visamajjhāsayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1843_1: lakkhaṇanti ettha daṭṭhuṃ kāmetīti daṭṭhukāmo tassa bhāvo daṭṭhukāmatā,
tika-abh08t0:1843_3: Sā pana anāgate cakkhādīsu ādīnavapaṭicchādikāvijjāmūlapatthanāsabhāvā pākaṭā apākaṭāti duvidhā.
tika-abh08t0:1843_4: Tattha yā ayaṃ “īdisaṃ īdisañca sukhumatamavisayaggahaṇasamatthaṃ cakkhu hotū”ti evaṃ kammāyūhanato pubbe,
tika-abh08t0:1843_6: Indriyavisesaṃ pana anāmasitvā avisesena paripuṇṇāyatanabhavasampattiṃ patthetvā,
tika-abh08t0:1843_7: apatthetvā vā tattha avigatataṇhāvasena kammaṃ karontassa appahīnabhāvena anusayitā api kammasāmatthiyavicittahetubhūtā apākaṭā.
tika-abh08t0:1843_8: Sā duvidhāpi nidānaṃ upanissayo yassa taṃ daṭṭhukāmatānidānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1844_2: Opapātikānaṃ pana paṭisandhikkhaṇeva paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃ nibbattamānānaṃ paṭisandhijanakameva kammaṃ paripuṇṇasakalamattabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1844_4: Kathaṃ pana ekakammunā nibbattamānānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ visesoti?
tika-abh08t0:1844_6: Taṃtaṃbhavapatthanābhūtā hi taṇhā taṃtaṃbhavapariyāpannāyatanābhilāsatāya sayaṃ vicittarūpā upanissayabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1844_8: Yato tadāhitavisesaṃ tathāvidhasamatthatāyogena anekarūpāpannaṃ viya anekavisiṭṭhasabhāvaṃ phalaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-abh08t0:1844_10: Kāraṇavisesena āhitavisesassa visiṭṭhaphalanipphādanasamatthatābhāvato ekasseva kammassa soḷasādivipākanibbattanahetubhāvena
tika-abh08t0:1844_16: kammavipāko ca sabbaso buddhānaṃyeva ñāṇassa visayo,
tika-abh08t0:1844_21: ummādassa vighātassa bhāgī assā”tiādīnavaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1845_3: Ālokādisannissayena kadāci uppajjamānānampi hi cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjanakāle cakkhuṃ nissāya eva uppajjatīti. Etthāha –
tika-abh08t0:1845_4: cakkhuviññāṇuppattisamaye sambhavantesu mandāmandamajjhimāyukesu ekūnapaṇṇāsacakkhūsu katamaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa ādhārabhāvaṃ paccanubhotīti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:1846_0: “Paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya dutiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1846_1: tena saddhiṃ uppannaṃ ṭhānappattaṃ purejātaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya tatiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1847_0: Maggāmaggañāṇaniddese vuttanayena ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ cakkhu rūpe ghaṭṭitvā viññāṇassa nissayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1847_1: tasmā dvīsu bhavaṅgacalanesu purimassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgacittena saha uppannanti ayamattho idha sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1848_1: tassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena vā saha uppannaṃ cakkhu”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1848_3: Evañhi sati aññasmiṃ ghaṭṭite aññaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa nissayo hotīti vuttaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1848_4: evañca bhavaṅgacalanato heṭṭhā tatiyacatutthehi yāva terasamacittena saha uppannampi nissayo hotīti āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1848_6: tatiyacatutthacittato paṭṭhāya uppannaṃ kesañci vīthicittānaṃ dvārabhāvaṃ na gacchati niruddhattā,
tika-abh08t0:1848_8: Yadi siyā “paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ vatthuṃ nissāya dutiyabhavaṅgaṃ uppajjatī”tiādivacanato
tika-abh08t0:1848_9: “ekacittakkhaṇātītameva nissayoti adhippeta”nti idampi ekacittakkhaṇātītaṃ nissayoti yujjatīti,
tika-abh08t0:1848_10: evaṃ sati “tassa anantarapaccayabhūtena bhavaṅgena vā”ti vacanaṃ yujjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1848_13: “Ekacittakkhaṇātikkamo”ti ca anatītekacittakkhaṇassa dubbalatāya ekacittakkhaṇātikkamena tassa balavabhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1848_15: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “sampaṭicchanādīni cutiāsannāni taduddhaṃ kammajarūpassa
tika-abh08t0:1848_17: tasmā taṃ therassa manorathamevāti na sārato paccetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1849_0: Sahajātesu bahūsu pasādesu kiṃ eko nissayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1849_2: Nanu vuttaṃ “pubbe ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hotī”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1849_5: Visuddhimaggasīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāyaṃ pana “sabbeyeva nissayā hontī”ti vatvā “yadi evaṃ ‘cakkhuñca paṭicca
tika-abh08t0:1849_6: rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇa’nti ettha ‘rūpe cā’ti vacanaṃ viya ‘cakkhūnī’tipi bahuvacanaṃ kattabbanti
tika-abh08t0:1849_7: anuyogaṃ katvā taṃvisodhanatthaṃ ‘sasambhāracakkhudvayanissitaṃ pasādadvayaṃ nissāya ekameva viññāṇaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1849_8: uppajjatīti gaṇheyyu’nti imaṃ vippaṭipattiṃ nirākarontena bhagavatā bahuvacanamakatvā ‘rūpāyatanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1849_9: taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo’tiādīsu viya sāmaññavasena ekavacanaṃ kata”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1849_10: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana tadeva sīhaḷasaṃvaṇṇanāvacanaṃ anicchantena “ekampi cakkhu viññāṇassa paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1850_2: Cakkhādīsu tejādiadhikatā nāma tannissayabhūtānaṃ tadadhikatāyāti dassento “tejādhikāna”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:1850_3: Tattha tejādhikānanti pamāṇavasena catunnaṃ dhātūnaṃ samānabhāvepi kiccavasena tejodhātuadhikānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1851_1: Evaṃ pana vadantānaṃ kiṃ uttaranti āha “te panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1851_2: Suttaṃ āharathāti na tumhākaṃ vacanamatteneva ayamattho sakkā saddhātuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1851_4: Sutte hi āhaṭe tassa neyyatthataṃ nītatthataṃ vicāretvā yadi tassa vasena ayamattho paññāyetha,
tika-abh08t0:1851_7: kiñcipīti ito cito ca suttaṃ gavesamānāpi addhā ekantena kiñcipi ekagāthāpadamattampi tadatthaparidīpakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1851_8: suttaṃ na dakkhissanteva tepiṭake buddhavacane tādisasseva suttantassa abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1852_4: Bhūtānañhi visese sati pasādo kathaṃ bhave,
tika-abh08t0:1852_9: Yasmā samānānameva bhūtānaṃ pasādo porāṇehi paridīpito,
tika-abh08t0:1852_14: vāyodhātuadhikakalāpassa ca vissaraṇato na tesu pasādo patiṭṭhātuṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1852_15: tasmā tesaṃ kiccato samānānaṃyeva pasādo uppajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1853_1: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ pasādānaṃ visesatāti āha “tasmā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1853_2: Yasmā vuttappakārena pasādavatthukānaṃ bhūtānaṃ visesena na bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1853_4: idamadhikanti etaṃ visesaparikappanaṃ sabbaso sabbākārena pahāya ñeyyā kammavisesena pasādānaṃ visesatā.
tika-abh08t0:1853_5: Yathā avisesepi bhūtānaṃ rūpānaṃ rasādayo aññamaññavisadisā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1853_8: Ekampi hi kammaṃ pañcāyatanikattabhāvapatthanānipphannaṃ cakkhādivisesahetutāya aññamaññassa asādhāraṇavisiṭṭhaṃ sāmatthiyavisesato.
tika-abh08t0:1853_9: Na hi yena visesena cakkhussa paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:1853_11: “Paṭisandhikkhaṇe mahaggatā cetanā kaṭattārūpānaṃ kammapaccayena paccayo”ti vacanato paṭisandhikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1853_12: vijjamānānaṃ sabbesaṃyeva kaṭattārūpānaṃ ekā cetanā kammapaccayo hotīti viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1853_13: Nānācetanāya hi tadā indriyuppattiyaṃ sati parittena ca mahaggatena ca kammena kaṭattārūpaṃ āpajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1853_14: na cekā paṭisandhi anekakammanibbattā hotīti siddhamekena kammena anekindriyuppatti hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1853_16: hoti tesaṃ visesatā”ti idaṃ nigamanavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1854_1: Evaṃ kammavisesato visiṭṭhesu ca etesu ārammaṇaggahaṇepi ayaṃ visesoti dassetuṃ “evametesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1854_2: Appattagāhakanti asampattaggāhakaṃ attano nissayena saha anallīyananissaye eva rūpādivisaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1854_4: taṃ na sundaraṃ sāntare adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1854_6: cakkhupasādato vicchinnadese ṭhitesu tārakādīsu nissayavasena ca pamāṇato adhikesu candamaṇḍalādīsu rūpāyatanesu
tika-abh08t0:1854_8: puthulesu ca samuddasaddādīsu saddāyatanesu viññāṇuppatti na siyā sampattaggāhakānaṃ kāyindriyādīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1855_1: adhiṭṭhānato bahindriyassa pavatti hotīti sampattavisayameva yattakaṃ visayaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1855_3: tasmā asiddhametaṃ “sāntare adhike ca visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato”ti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1855_5: Adhiṭṭhānadese eva hi indriyaṃ pavattati tattha kiccādippayogadassanato.
tika-abh08t0:1855_6: Sati ca etassa bahi pavattiyaṃ adhiṭṭhāne pihitepi visayaggahaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1855_7: tasmā adhiṭṭhānadese ṭhitānaṃyeva cakkhusotānaṃ asampattavisayasseva gahaṇato nāsiddhametaṃ “sāntare adhike ca viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1858_1: sabbesaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ gocarena rūpādinā yoge ekakāriyasādhakattā sambandhe ghaṭṭane vā samāne sati rūparavesu
tika-abh08t0:1858_2: rūpasaddāyatanesu visayabhūtesu cakkhādito dūrabhāvena ceva kenaci anantaritabhāvena ca vicchinnesu pamāṇato
tika-abh08t0:1858_3: puthulesu ca visayesu uppajjamānaṃ yaṃ viññāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1859_2: Tathā akkhipuṭe añjanaṃ pakhumamūle akkhivaṇṇaṃ pakhumamūle ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ añjanasalākampi passeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1859_4: tasmā tannissaye dese ṭhitameva visayaṃ gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1859_6: cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇassa kadācipi ārammaṇapaccayo na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1859_7: Na hi bahiddhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ uppatti atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1859_8: Paṭṭhāne ca “saddāyatanaṃ sotaviññāṇadhātuyā ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti aviseseneva saddassa sotaviññāṇārammaṇabhāvo vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1859_10: attano visayapadeseyeva gahetabbato gandhassa viya saddassāpi disādesavavatthānaṃ na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1859_11: Evañca saddānusārena kaṇḍaṃ pātentassa saddavedhino attano kaṇṇabileyeva sarapātanaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1860_0: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ dūre ṭhitehi rajakādisaddā cirena suyyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1860_1: Asampattaggāhakatte hi dūrāsannadesavattīnaṃ samakameva savanena bhavitabbanti?
tika-abh08t0:1860_3: Yathā hi dūrāsannānaṃ vacanasadde yathāpākaṭeva gahaṇavisesato akkharavisesanaṃ gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1860_5: evaṃ rajakādisaddepi āsannassa ādito pabhuti yāva avasānā kamena pākaṭībhūte,
tika-abh08t0:1860_7: majjhe vā piṇḍavasena pavattipākaṭībhūte yathāpākaṭaṃ nicchayaggāhakānaṃ sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato pavattānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1860_10: Sotaviññāṇappavatti pana ubhayattha samānā saddassa uppannadese ṭhitassa attano vijjamānakkhaṇeyeva sotāpāthagamanato.
tika-abh08t0:1860_11: Yadi saddassa bhūtaparamparāya samantato pavatti natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1860_14: bhājanādicalanassa ca paccayo hoti ayokanto viya ayocalanassāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1861_1: gāhakanti yaṃ pana avasesaṃ ghānajivhākāyasaṅkhātaṃ pasādattayaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1861_2: taṃ sampattaggāhakaṃ hoti nissayavasena ceva sayañca attano nissaye allīneyeva visaye viññāṇuppattihetubhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1861_3: Gandharasānaṃ nissayesu ghānajivhānissayehi saha allīnāyeva gandharasā viññāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1862_0: Vaṇṇavikāramāpajjamānanti dosādīhi kāraṇehi amanāpavaṇṇassa uppattivasena vaṇṇavikāraṃ āpajjamānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1862_4: Anekatthattā hi dhātūnaṃ pakāsanattho eva rūpa-
tika-abh08t0:1862_10: Paṭihananañcettha visayavisayīnaṃ aññamaññābhimukhabhāvo yogyadesāvaṭṭhānaṃ paṭighāto viyāti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:1862_11: Yathā paṭighāte sati dubbalassa calanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1862_12: evaṃ visayābhimukhabhāve sati visayino taṃsambandhassa ca vatthurūpassa,
tika-abh08t0:1862_16: Tenāha “yamhi cakkhumhi anidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi rūpaṃ sanidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ paṭihaññi vā,
tika-abh08t0:1862_17: yaṃ cakkhu anidassanaṃ sappaṭighaṃ rūpamhi sanidassanamhi sappaṭighamhi paṭihaññi vā”ti ca ādi.
tika-abh08t0:1862_22: sakehi vā paccayehi sotaviññeyyabhāvaṃ upanīyatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1863_4: Idaṃ pana niyamena itthiyā eva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1863_12: Etena ṭhapetvā liṅgaparivattanaṃ cakkhundriyādīni viya imassa apātubhāvamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1863_13: Yañcetaṃ itthiliṅgādīti yaṃ panetaṃ indriyaphalabhūtaṃ itthiliṅgādi. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1863_16: Itthīnañhi hatthapādagīvāuraādisaṇṭhānaṃ na purisānaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1863_24: Daharakālepi suppakamusalakādīhi kīḷā makacivākena suttakantananti ca evamādi itthikuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1863_27: Purisampi hi avisadaṃ disvā mātugāmo viya tiṭṭhati nipajjati nisīdati khādati bhuñjatīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1863_28: Idaṃ pana itthiliṅgādiparidīpanaṃ akusalanti vatvā aññathāpi vaṇṇenti ācariyā. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1863_33: Ettha ca adhippāyo nāma purisasmiṃ methunataṇhā.
tika-abh08t0:1863_34: Sā hi tāsaṃ niccaṃ balavatarā pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1863_35: ato sāpi itthīti sañjānanassa nimittatāya “itthinimitta”nti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1863_36: Kiñcāpi itthīti saññāṇassa nimittatāya kuttākappānampi nimitteyeva antogadhatā,
tika-abh08t0:1863_37: tathāpi tesaṃ visuṃ gahaṇato sarādhippāyā eva nimittabhāvena adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:1864_1: Kiṃ panetaṃ itthiliṅgādi itthindriyaṃ viya paṭisandhisamuṭṭhitaṃ hotīti āha “itthindriyaṃ paṭiccevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1864_2: Kiñcāpi hi itthiliṅgādīni yathāsakaṃ kammādinā paccayena samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:1864_3: yebhuyyena pana itthindriyasahiteyeva santāne taṃtadākārā hutvā sambhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:1864_4: itarattha ca na bhavantīti tesaṃ tabbhāvabhāvitaṃ upādāya “itthindriyaṃ paṭicceva jāyantī”ti vuttāni.
tika-abh08t0:1864_7: Īdiseneva kāraṇabhāvasaṅkhātena adhipatibhāvena tassa indriyatā vuttā indriyasahite santāne itthiliṅgādiākārarūpapaccayānaṃ aññathā anuppādanato,
tika-abh08t0:1864_9: Tathā hetaṃ jīvitindriyaṃ viya ekakalāpagatānaṃ āhāro viya kalāpantararūpānaṃ upatthambhakamanupālakaṃ vā na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1864_10: Evañca katvā jīvitindriyaāhārānaṃ viya imassa indriyapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t0:1864_15: Yasmā panete itthindriyaṃ paṭicca jāyantāpi gabbhaseyyakānaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ na samuṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:1865_1: Saṃsedajaopapātikānaṃ pana kiñci itthindriyena saha paṭisandhiyameva nibbattati.
tika-abh08t0:1865_7: Yasmā pana tato aññāni yathāyogaṃ sotaviññeyyāni ceva manoviññeyyāni ca,
tika-abh08t0:1865_9: Yathāvutto papañco purisindriyepi yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabboti atidesaṃ karonto āha “esevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1865_10: Sesepīti ettakeyeva vutte ito sesesu sabbesupīti kadāci koci cinteyyāti āha “purisindriye”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1865_12: Tesañhi ābhassaralokato cavitvā idhūpapannānaṃ dīghassa kālassa accayena oḷārikaṃ āhāraṃ āharataṃ muttakarīsesu
tika-abh08t0:1865_16: Tathā hi purimattabhāvesu pavattaupacārajhānānubhāvena yāva sattasantāne kāmarāgavikkhambhanavego na paṭipassambhati,
tika-abh08t0:1865_18: Yadā panassa vicchinnatāya balavakāmarāgo laddhāvasaro ahosi,
tika-abh08t0:1865_19: tadā tadūpanissayāni tāni sattānaṃ santāne sañjāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:1866_3: parivattatīti yathā taṃ soreyyakaseṭṭhiputtassa viyāti adhippāyo. Api-
tika-abh08t0:1866_5: bhikkhuniyā viya ca paṭisandhiyaṃ samuṭṭhitassapi pavatte parivattanaṃ dīpeti. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:1867_0: “Tena kho pana samayena aññatarassa bhikkhuno itthiliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1867_1: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarissā bhikkhuniyā purisaliṅgaṃ pātubhūtaṃ hotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1868_0: Yassa pana paṭisandhiyaṃ dvīsu ekampi na samuṭṭhitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1868_2: tassa pavattiyampi indriyuppatti na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1869_4: parivattatīti ca vuccatīti imaṃ anuyogaṃ manasi katvā āha “mahatā pāpakammenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1869_7: Mahatā kusalenevāti idaṃ sugatiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1870_1: Indriye vinaṭṭhe ekanteneva liṅgampi vinassatevāti āha “itthiliṅgaṃ vinassatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1870_5: purisindriyassa antaradhānaṃ mahantena akusalena kammena hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1870_12: kathañcarahi “paradārikakammaṃ katvā niraye paccitvā teneva pāpakammena pañcasatakkhattuṃ manussaloke itthī hutvā nibbattatī”tiādivacananti?
tika-abh08t0:1870_14: Tathā hi paṭisandhiyaṃ tāva purisindriyanibbattanārahampi kammaṃ kadāci paradārikādinā balavapāpakammena paṭibāhitasāmatthiyaṃ assa,
tika-abh08t0:1870_15: tadā attano purisindriyanibbattane asamatthatāya itthindriyameva nibbatteti.
tika-abh08t0:1870_16: Pavattiyaṃ pana attano balavabhāvena itthindriyūpanissayaṃ paradārikamakusalakammaṃ paṭibāhitvā paṭisandhito
tika-abh08t0:1870_17: paṭṭhāya purisindriyaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ kadāci laddhasāmaggitāsañjātabalavisesena paradārikādinā kammena
tika-abh08t0:1870_19: tadā attano dubbalatāya purisindriyaṃ na nibbatteti,
tika-abh08t0:1870_21: Evaṃ paradārikādikammūpanissayena itthindriyassa nibbattanato taṃ tena nibbattitaṃ katvā vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1871_1: Yadā pana taṃ kammaṃ puna sāmaggipaṭilābhato,
tika-abh08t0:1871_3: tadā dinnavedhaṃ viya rukkhaṃ tadapagame attano balānurūpaṃ purisindriyaṃ nibbatteti,
tika-abh08t0:1871_5: Ubhayassa pana nibbattiyampi visadisindriyanibbattanato pure sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikālamupādāya taṃtaṃsamuṭṭhāpakakammaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1871_7: Sattarasamacittena saha uppannaṃ visadisindriyuppattito purimacittena saha nirujjhati.
tika-abh08t0:1871_9: itaraṃ nuppajjati ekasmiṃ santāne dvinnaṃ sahuppattiyā anicchitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1871_10: Teneva hi “yassa vā pana purisindriyaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1871_11: tassa itthindriyaṃ uppajjatī”ti imasmiṃ pañhe “no”ti paṭikkhepo katoti.
tika-abh08t0:1871_13: Ekasmiñca niruddhe tappaṭibaddhāni liṅgādīni katipayadivasehi nirujjhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1871_14: tesu niruddhesu itarāni anukkamena jāyantīti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:1871_16: purisanimittuppādakakammato vāti ubhato duvidhaṃ byañjanamassāti ubhatobyañjano.
tika-abh08t0:1872_0: Nanu ca duvidhe byañjane sati indriyadvayenāpi bhavitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1872_1: byañjanañhi taṃ taṃ indriyaṃ paṭicca jāyatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1872_3: etthāpi itthiubhatobyañjanassa itthindriyaṃ paṭicca itthinimittameva yāvajīvaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:1872_5: itaraṃ pana na tassa itthindriyapurisindriyahetuto jāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1872_7: taṃ dassetuṃ “evaṃ sante”ti anuyogaṃ katvā “na cābhāvo”tiādinā sodhanaṃ tu vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1872_12: Na cābhāvo siyāti neva dutiyabyañjanassa abhāvo siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1872_13: Na taṃ byañjanakāraṇanti taṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ na hoti. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:1872_15: Itthiubhatobyañjanassa hi yadā itthiyā rāgacittaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1872_19: Yadi ca tesaṃ indriyaṃ dutiyabyañjanakāraṇaṃ bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1872_32: tasmā itthiubhatobyañjanako sayampi paraṃ uddissa gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1872_36: Purisaubhatobyañjanako paresu upakkamakaraṇato paraṃ gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1872_37: sayaṃ pana purisindriyavantatāya gabbhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1873_1: tesu ca santesu itthīti pakāso hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1873_2: tasmā taṃ tassa pakāsanakāraṇanti āha “itthīti pakāsanarasa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1873_3: Duvidhampi panetaṃ indriyaṃ kāyapasādo viya sakalasarīrabyāpakameva,
tika-abh08t0:1874_1: Sahajarūpaparipālanalakkhaṇanti yathā attanā sahajātarūpāni tīsu khaṇesu pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1874_3: Jīvitindriyassa ekantakammajattā sahajaggahaṇeneva anupāletabbānampi kammajabhāvova siddhoti kammajaggahaṇaṃ na kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1874_4: Yathāsakaṃ khaṇattayamattaṭṭhāyīnampi kammajarūpānaṃ pavattihetubhāveneva taṃ anupālakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1874_6: Pavattanañcettha vuttanayena tesaṃ yāpanaṃ ṭhapanaṃ ṭhitihetukatā.
tika-abh08t0:1874_7: Na hi kammajānaṃ kammameva ṭhitihetu bhavituṃ sakkoti āhārajādīnaṃ āhārādi viya.
tika-abh08t0:1874_11: tato taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpāni matapitikā viya puttā cūḷapituādinissayena aññanissayeneva pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1874_12: aññañca tesaṃ yāpanasamatthaṃ natthi aññatra jīvitindriyenāti tadeva tesaṃ pavattanarasaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1874_13: Āhārajādayo pana dharamānakapitikā viya puttā aññanirapekkhā sakasakapaccayavaseneva pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1874_14: Āhārādayo hi attano atthikkhaṇeyeva rūpāni samuṭṭhāpetvā tesaṃ ṭhitipavattiyāva tiṭṭhanti,
tika-abh08t0:1874_16: Sesānipi taṃtaṃpaccayavaseneva tiṭṭhantīti na aññaṃ ṭhapanakāraṇaṃ paccāsīsanti.
tika-abh08t0:1875_4: manoviññāṇadhātuyo ca yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1876_0: “Yaṃ rūpaṃ nissāya manodhātu ca manoviññāṇadhātu ca pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1876_1: taṃ rūpaṃ manodhātuyā ca manoviññāṇadhātuyā ca taṃsampayuttakānañca dhammānaṃ nissayapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1877_4: taṃ taṃ nipphannaupādāyarūpanissayaṃ dissati yathā cakkhuviññāṇadhātu.
tika-abh08t0:1877_6: ojāya ca tannissayatā yujjati indriyapaṭibaddhato bahipi tesaṃ pavattidassanato,
tika-abh08t0:1877_8: Jīvitindriyassāpi sahajaparipālanalakkhaṇakiccantaraṃ vijjatīti na tannissayatā yujjati.
tika-abh08t0:1877_9: Tañhi kiccantare pasutaṃ na imāsaṃ nissayo bhavituṃ sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1877_10: tasmā pārisesato tesaṃ nissayo hadayavatthu nāma atthīti viññātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1877_13: taṃ panetaṃ kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ paṭiniyatakiccaṃ hadayappadese ṭhitamekanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1877_18: tato eva paṭiniyatakiccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā manasi katvā sabbaṃ cetasā samannāharitvā kiñci cintentassa hadayappadesassa
tika-abh08t0:1879_0: Cintāya ca urokhedā, tatra tiṭṭhanti vijāniya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1880_0: Yadi manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhūtaṃ hadayavatthu nāma atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1880_2: Na hi labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ atthīti?
tika-abh08t0:1880_7: na evaṃ manoviññāṇaṃ ekantena hadayavatthunissitaṃ pañcavokārabhaveyeva tannissayattā,
tika-abh08t0:1880_10: atthi rūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa na vatthū”tiādinā cakkhuviññāṇādīhi nissitehi visesitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1880_11: Yampi ekantena hadayavatthunissayaṃ tassa vasena “atthi rūpaṃ manoviññāṇassa vatthū”tiādinā dukādīsu
tika-abh08t0:1880_14: atthi rūpaṃ na manoviññāṇassa ārammaṇa”nti sakkā vattunti vatthārammaṇadukā bhinnagatikā siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1880_16: ekarasañca desanaṃ desetuṃ tattha bhagavato ajjhāsayo,
tika-abh08t0:1880_20: yaṃ ekaraseneva desanaṃ desetuṃ labbhamānassāpi kassaci aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1880_21: Tathā hi nikkhepakaṇḍepi cittuppādavibhāgena avuccamānattā avitakkāvicārapadavisajjane vitakko vicāro
tika-abh08t0:1880_22: cāti vattuṃ na sakkāti avitakkavicāramattapadavisajjane labbhamānopi vitakko na uddhaṭo,
tika-abh08t0:1880_24: Nissayabhāvato upari āropetvā vahantaṃ viya paccupaṭṭhātīti ubbāhanapaccupaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1881_1: Catūsu āhāresu idha rūpādhikārato kabaḷīkāro āhāro gahetabboti āha “āhāratāti kabaḷīkāro āhāro”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1881_5: Idañca savatthukaṃ katvā āhāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1881_6: Kabaḷīkārāhārassa pana ojā idha āhāro nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1881_8: So ca rūpāharaṇasabhāvo upatthambhanabalakaro aṅgamaṅgānusārīrasāharaṇabhūto bhūtanissito eko viseso.
tika-abh08t0:1881_9: Bāhirāhārapaccayaṃ paṭilabhitvā eva ajjhattikāhāro rūpaṃ uppādetīti ayaṃ ajjhattikāhārassa upanissayabhāvenāpi
tika-abh08t0:1881_12: Yāya ojāyāti attano udayānantaraṃ rūpajananato ojāsaṅkhātāya odanakummāsādivatthugatāya yāya pharaṇaojāya.
tika-abh08t0:1882_6: Antokucchiyañhi odanādivatthusmiṃ asati kammajatejo uṭṭhahitvā udarapaṭalasaṅkhātamupādinnarūpaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1882_11: Yathā hi chāyārakkhaso chāyāpaviṭṭhaṃ disvā gahetvā devasaṅkhalikāya bandhitvā attano bhavane modanto chātakāle āgantvā sīse daṃsati,
tika-abh08t0:1882_13: taṃ viravaṃ sutvā sace aññepi manussā āgacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:1882_14: so āgatāgate gahetvā khāditvā sakabhavane modati,
tika-abh08t0:1882_16: taṃ taṃ kammajatejo gahetvā jīrāpetvā puna udarapaṭalaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:1882_17: tasmā annapānādikaṃ vatthu attano udarapaṭalaṃ paviṭṭhakāle upādinnakāyaṃ gahetvā ṭhitaṃ tato mocetvā
tika-abh08t0:1882_18: attānaṃ gaṇhāpanavasena taṃ attano santikaṃ harati.
tika-abh08t0:1882_19: Kevalanti ojāviyuttaṃ vatthu jīvitaṃ kammajabhūtaṃ taṃ pāletuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:1883_2: kammajaṃ tejaṃ harituṃ na sakkoti āmāsayassa apuṇṇatoti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1883_3: Upatthambhanapaccupaṭṭhānoti ojaṭṭhamakarūpaharaṇavaseneva imassa kāyassa upatthambhanavasena paccupaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1883_8: nicchayaggahaṇasaṅkhātānaṃ manodvārikajavanānaṃ anussaraṇena tesaṃ anantaranti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1883_9: Pañcadvāre hi rūpādiārammaṇe āpāthagate yathāpaccayaṃ kusalākusalajavane uppajjitvā bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇe
tika-abh08t0:1883_11: puna tasmiṃyeva dvāre visayaṃ vavatthāpetvā javanaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otarati,
tika-abh08t0:1883_12: tasmā cakkhudvārikajavanānantarappavattānaṃ dvinnaṃ javanavārānamanantaraṃ tatiyavāre pavattāya manodvārajavanavīthiyā
tika-abh08t0:1883_13: eva gahitāya etāya karaṇabhūtāya catutthavāre manodvāre javaneneva bhāvo viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:1884_1: saddassa kārakadvaye sambhavaṃ dassetvā idāni kāya-
tika-abh08t0:1884_3: “kāyo”ti vohārassa viññattiyampi ca pavattiṃ dassento “kāyena saṃvaro”tiādisuttamāha.
tika-abh08t0:1884_7: viññattiyā kāyavipphandanassa hetubhāvato taṃhetukaṃ kāyavipphandanasaṅkhātaṃ kāyaṃ gahetvā adhippāyajānanato
tika-abh08t0:1884_8: viññatti adhippāyaviññāpanassa kāraṇabhāvena gayhatīti kāyena adhippāyaṃ viññāpetīti.
tika-abh08t0:1884_9: Tathā kāyavipphandanaṃ gahetvā tassa kāraṇamettha atthīti viññattiyā gayhamānattā sayañca kāyena viññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1885_9: Atha vā cittajāniladhātuyā ekā ākāravikāratāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1886_2: “Cittajāniladhātuyā”ti hi vacanena vāyodhātuyāva ākāravikāratā viññatti āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1886_3: na ca ekabhūtanissitaṃ upādāyarūpaṃ nāma atthi “catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ upādāyarūpa”nti vacanatoti?
tika-abh08t0:1886_5: catunnaṃ vikāratā catūsu ekassapi hoti catusādhāraṇadhanaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:1886_7: tadadhike taṃvohārato yathā sambhāradhātuyā adhikabhāvena pathavīvohāro,
tika-abh08t0:1886_8: tasmā vāyodhātuadhikānaṃ cittajamahābhūtānaṃ ekā ākāravikāratā kāyaviññattīti na koci virodho.
tika-abh08t0:1886_11: Itarathā hi tesaṃ avinibbhogavuttitā na yujjeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1886_12: Adhikatā hi attano adhikavasena itarehi vinibbhogappavattito hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1886_15: taṃ calanādhippāyasabhāvaṃ tato samuṭṭhite kalāpe anukaronte vāyodhātuyā eva adhikattaṃ yuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:1886_18: Na hi ekassa vikāro catunnaṃ upādārūpanti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1887_0: Kīdisī panāyaṃ vikāratāti āha “sahajātassa rūpassa calane hetū”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1887_13: atha kho mahantaṃ pāsāṇaṃ ukkhipantassa sabbathāmena gahaṇakāle sarīrassa ussāhanavikāro viya rūpakāyassa
tika-abh08t0:1887_14: paripphandanapaccayabhāvena labbhamāno eko ākāravikāro kāyaviññatti nāmāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1888_0: Nanu ca phandamānavaṇṇādivinimutto koci vikāro atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1888_1: tassa vaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ gahaṇaṃ hotīti kathametaṃ viññāyatīti?
tika-abh08t0:1888_3: Na hi viññattivikārarahitesu rukkhacalanādīsu adhippāyaggahaṇaṃ diṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1888_5: tasmā phandamānavaṇṇādivinimutto koci vikāro atthi adhippāyassa viññāpakoti sampaṭicchitabbametaṃ ekantena.
tika-abh08t0:1888_6: Ñāpako ca hetu sayaṃ gahitoyeva attano ñāpetabbamatthaṃ ñāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1893_2: Na kevalaṃ vikāraggahaṇameva adhippāyassa gahaṇassa kāraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1893_3: atha kho purimasiddhasambandhaggahaṇañca imassa upanissayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1893_4: Yathā hi araññe udakatitthe ussāpetvā ṭhapitagosīsādīni udakanimittāni disvā tadanantarappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya
tika-abh08t0:1893_5: manodvārajavanavīthiyā gosīsādīnaṃ udakasahacārīpakārasaññāṇākāraṃ gahetvā “udakamettha atthī”ti jānanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1893_6: evaṃ phandamānavaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tadanantappavattāya aviññāyamānantarāya manodvāravīthiyā purimaggahitasambandhūpanissayasahitāya
tika-abh08t0:1894_2: kiṃ sabbā eva vāyodhātu sahajarūpaṃ cāletīti imaṃ codanaṃ sodhetuṃ “labhitvā panupatthambha”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1894_6: Heṭṭhāhi chahi ca cittehīti sattasu javanesu heṭṭhimehi chahi javanehi samuṭṭhitaṃ vāyodhātuṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1894_7: Keci pana potthakesu “vāyodhātusamuṭṭhita”nti pāṭhaṃ disvā upatthambhanti bhāvasādhanavasena gahetvā
tika-abh08t0:1894_8: heṭṭhā chahi cittehi uppannavāyodhātusamuṭṭhitaṃ upatthambhaṃ labhitvāti yojenti.
tika-abh08t0:1894_9: Viññattisahitattanāti sayaṃ viññattisahitā attanā sahajātaṃ cittajarūpaṃ desantaruppattihetubhāvena calayati,
tika-abh08t0:1895_1: yathā nāma sattahi yugehi ākaḍḍhitabbasakaṭe sattamayugayuttā eva goṇā heṭṭhā chasu yugesu yuttagoṇehi laddhupatthambhā sakaṭaṃ cālenti,
tika-abh08t0:1895_2: paṭhamayugādiyuttā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattameva sādhentā tesaṃ upatthambhakā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1895_3: evamevaṃ sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitā vāyodhātu heṭṭhā chahi javanehi samuṭṭhitavāyodhātuto laddhupatthambhā cittajarūpaṃ cāleti.
tika-abh08t0:1895_4: Paṭhamajavanādisamuṭṭhitā pana santhambhanasandhāraṇamattaṃ sādhentā tassa upatthambhakā honti,
tika-abh08t0:1895_5: desantaruppattiyeva cettha calanaṃ uppannadesato kesaggamattampi dhammānaṃ calanābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1895_9: Yathā attanā sahajarūpāni heṭṭhimajavanādisamuṭṭhitarūpehi patiṭṭhitaṭṭhānato aññattha uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1895_10: evaṃ tehi saha tattha uppattiyevassa desantaruppattihetubhāvoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1896_0: Atha phandamānavaṇṇaggahaṇānantaraṃ viññattiggahaṇassa vuttattā viññattisahitāti sattamajavanasamuṭṭhitāya
tika-abh08t0:1896_1: eva ca visesitattā calanākārasahitāyeva vāyodhātu vikārasahitāti?
tika-abh08t0:1896_4: Yena disābhāgena gantvā abhikkamādīni pavattetukāmo tadabhimukhabhāvavikārasambhavato.
tika-abh08t0:1896_6: Teneva hi bhagavatā “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññatti?
tika-abh08t0:1896_9: pasārentassa vā kāyassa thambhanā santhambhanā santhambhitattaṃ viññatti viññāpanā viññāpitattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1896_10: Idaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ kāyaviññattī”ti santhambhanasandhāraṇānampi paccayabhāvākāro kāyaviññattīti vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1896_11: Evañca katvā manodvārāvajjanassāpi viññattisamuṭṭhāpakatāvacanaṃ suṭṭhu upapannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1897_1: Cittajātāya pathavīdhātuyā upādinnakaghaṭṭane paccayo yo ākāravikāro,
tika-abh08t0:1897_4: Upādinnakaghaṭṭaneti upādinnakakalāpasaṅkhātassa akkharuppattiṭṭhānassa ghaṭṭanasaññite kicce ghaṭṭanassāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1897_7: ghaṭṭanti yā pathavīdhātuto ca vinivaṭṭo pathavīdhātuyā upādinnaghaṭṭanapaccayasabhāvarūpo eko ākāravikāravisesoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1897_12: Idañca santhambhanādīnaṃ abhāvena ghaṭṭanena saddhiṃyeva saddassa uppajjanato “labhitvā panupatthambha”ntiādinayo na labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:1897_20: Sakyakulindunāti suparisuddhagaganatalassa sakkarājakulassa avabhāsakaṭṭhena tassa nisākarabhūtena.
tika-abh08t0:1897_21: Atha vā indati paramissariyaṃ karotīti indu. Indu-
tika-abh08t0:1898_2: saddo pana cittajo aviññattiko atthīti ce?
tika-abh08t0:1898_9: Anena ca ye vadanti “vitakkavipphārasaddo na sotaviññeyyoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā cittasamuṭṭhāno
tika-abh08t0:1898_11: ‘Yā tāya vācāya viññatti viññāpanā’ti hi vacanato asotaviññeyyena saddena saha viññatti na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:1898_15: na sotaviññeyyoti viruddhametanti maññamānehi saṅgahakārehi paṭikkhittova.
tika-abh08t0:1898_16: Ānandācariyo pana mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ appaṭikkhipitvāva tattha adhippāyaṃ vaṇṇeti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1898_17: “Jivhātālucalanādikaravitakkasamuṭṭhitaṃ viññattisahajameva sukhumasaddaṃ dibbasotena sutvā ādisatī”ti sutte,
tika-abh08t0:1898_18: paṭṭhāne ca oḷārikaṃ saddaṃ sandhāya sotaviññāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayabhāvo vuttoti iminā adhippāyena vitakkavipphārasaddassa asotaviññeyyatā vuttāti.
tika-abh08t0:1899_2: Sayaṃ viññeyyatoti gahaṇānusārena vacīghosena vā hetunā sayaṃ viññeyyattā.
tika-abh08t0:1899_6: kammani vā tassa sambhavo nibbatti hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1899_10: viññattidvayassa ekato vuccamānattā kāyaviññattisahajakalāpe saddo na labbhatīti vacīviññattikalāpe labbhamānampi taṃ hitvā “aṭṭha”icceva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1900_0: Yathāvuttavikāraggahaṇamukhena “ayaṃ idaṃ nāma kātukāmo”ti taṃsamaṅgino adhippāyo viññāyatīti āha “adhippāyappakāsanarasā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1900_1: Kāyavipphandanahetubhūtāya vāyodhātuyā vikārattā tassā kāyavipphandanassa hetubhāvākārena paccupaṭṭhānanti vuttaṃ “kāya…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1900_4: Vacīghosassa hetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānāti vuttanayeneva vacīghosasaṅkhātassa cittajasaddassa hetubhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1901_0: Keci panettha “ghaṭṭane paccayoti vuttattā ghaṭṭanānantaraṃ saddassa uppatti hotīti gahetvā cittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātu
tika-abh08t0:1901_3: so pana cittapaccayattā pariyāyena cittasamuṭṭhānoti vuccatī”ti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1901_5: tasmā evaṃ aggahetvā udakatāpanakāle antoudakeyeva uppajjanakasaddo viya upādinne ghaṭṭetvā uppajjamānacittasamuṭṭhānapathavīdhātuyā
tika-abh08t0:1901_6: uppattisamakālameva tasmiṃ kalāpe navamaṃ hutvā antoyeva bhūtikasaddo uppajjatīti gahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1903_4: Ayañhi taṃ taṃ rūpakalāpaṃ paricchindanto viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1903_8: Atthato pana yasmā rūpānaṃ paricchedamattaṃ hutvā gayhati,
tika-abh08t0:1903_10: kiṃ panesa rūpe paricchindanto catusamuṭṭhānakalāpato paricchindati,
tika-abh08t0:1904_3: ekakalāpagatarūpānaṃ viya nānākalāpagatarūpānampi avinibbhogavuttitā vā āpajjeyya.
tika-abh08t0:1904_5: evaṃ sati ekekakalāpagatarūpānampi nānākalāpagatarūpānaṃ viya aññamaññavinibbhogavuttitāpasaṅgo siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1905_0: Asamphuṭṭhabhāvachiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vāti asamphuṭṭhabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vā chiddavivarabhāvapaccupaṭṭhāno vāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1905_3: Kiñcāpi hi kalāpantarabhūtā kalāpantarabhūtehi samphuṭṭhāva ekaghanapiṇḍabhāvena pavattattā,
tika-abh08t0:1905_4: tathāpi dhammato aññamaññaṃ vivittattā asaṃkiṇṇā eva.
tika-abh08t0:1905_8: itarathā paricchinnatā na siyā tesaṃ bhūtānaṃ byāpibhāvāpattito.
tika-abh08t0:1905_10: Tenāha bhagavā imassa niddese “asamphuṭṭhaṃ catūhi mahābhūtehī”ti.
