tika-abh08t0:1906_0: Atha vā kalāpantarabhūtānaṃ aññamaññaṃ asaṃkiṇṇabhāvena paccupaṭṭhānato asamphuṭṭhatāpaccupaṭṭhānabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1907_1: Rūpassalahutādittayaniddeseti rūpassalahutā rūpassamudutā rūpassakammaññatāti imassa rūpalahutādittayassa niddese sampatte idaṃ vuccatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1907_2: Heṭṭhā vuttanayenevāti arūpassa lahutādīsu “kāyalahubhāvo kāyalahutā”tiādinā vuttanayānusāreneva “rūpassa
tika-abh08t0:1907_19: Attho panettha tattha tattha amhehi vuttānusārena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1907_20: Imā pana tisso rūpānaṃ vikārabhāvato “rūpavikārā”ti vuccantīti dassetuṃ “tisso…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1908_5: dvidhā vuttāpi atthato pathavīdhātuādīnaṃyeva vikāroti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1908_9: tathā hi te kadācipi aññamaññaṃ na vijahanti.
tika-abh08t0:1908_10: Tathā avijahantānaṃ pana dubbijānīyaṃ nānattanti taṃpakāsanatthaṃ “etāsa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1909_0: Nanu cettha arogino tāva nidassanaṃ yuttaṃ tassa indriyabaddhasantānattā,
tika-abh08t0:1909_2: Na hi anindriyabaddharūpasantāne lahutādīni sambhavanti tathā dhātukkhobhapaṭipakkhapaccayābhāvato? Saccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1910_0: Kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti ekantena tāsaṃ paccuppannapaccayāpekkhattā,
tika-abh08t0:1910_3: Garubhāvassa vinodanaṃ khipanaṃ apanayanaṃ kiccametissāti garubhāvavinodanarasā.
tika-abh08t0:1910_4: Kiñcāpi hi ayaṃ rūpānaṃ garubhāvaṃ vinodetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:1910_5: garurūpapaṭipakkhānaṃ pana adandharūpānaṃ vikārattā “jāti naṃ uppādetī”tiādīsu viya pariyāyena garubhāvaṃ vinodeti nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1910_8: Cetasikalahutādayo pana attano attano paccanīkānaṃ taṃtaṃakusaladhammānaṃ viddhaṃsakabhāvena pavattantīti
tika-abh08t0:1910_9: vikāramattabhāvato nippariyāyeneva tāsaṃ taṃkiccatā labbhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1910_10: Lahuparivattitapaccupaṭṭhānāti adandhassa arogīpurisassa aparāparaṃ saṅkanti parivattanaṃ viya adandhaparivattanaṃ hutvā paccupaṭṭhānāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1910_15: Attano mudubhāveneva sabbakiriyāsu aviruddhā hutvā paccupaṭṭhātīti avirodhitāpaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh08t0:1910_20: Sarīrena kattabbakiriyānaṃ anukūlatāsaṅkhāto kammaññabhāvo lakkhaṇametissāti sarīrakiriyānukūlakammaññabhāvalakkhaṇā.
tika-abh08t0:1910_21: Akammaññaṃ dubbalaṃ nāma hotīti kammaññatā adubbalabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1911_1: Rūpānamācayo yotiādīsu yo nipphannarūpānaṃ ādito cayo,
tika-abh08t0:1911_2: yathāpaccayaṃ tato tato āgatassa viya cayoti vā ācayasaṅkhāto rūpānaṃ paṭhamuppādo vaḍḍhi ca,
tika-abh08t0:1911_3: so upacayoti uddese vutto “upaññattaṃ upasitta”ntiādīsu viya upa-
tika-abh08t0:1911_5: Yā pana tesaṃyeva rūpānaṃ anuppabandhatā anuppabandhavasena pavatti,
tika-abh08t0:1911_8: tato paraṃ yāva sattarasamacittuppādā vaḍḍhibhāvato upacayo nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1911_9: Tadā hi rūpassa kammacittautūhi cayoyeva, na hāni.
tika-abh08t0:1911_13: tato paraṃ pana cutipariyosānaṃ santati nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1912_0: “Yo āyatanānaṃ ācayo, so rūpassa upacayo. Yo rūpassa upacayo, sā rūpassa santatī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:1913_0: Evaṃ upacayasantatīnaṃ atthato nānattābhāvadīpanatthaṃ vuttāya pāḷiyā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1914_2: santati nāma pavattī”ti vatvā “nadītīre khatakūpasmiñhi udakuggamanakālo viya ācayo nibbatti,
tika-abh08t0:1915_1: “Rūpānamācayo”ti cettha bahuvacananiddesena uppādo nāma uppajjamānānaṃ vikāro.
tika-abh08t0:1915_2: Vikāratte ca sati attano vikāravantadhammabhedabhinnattā ekakkhaṇepi uppajjamānānaṃ bahūnampi rūpānaṃ visuṃ visuṃyeva uppādavikārabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1915_5: atha kho arūpadhammānampi uppādo rūpārūpadhammānaṃ jaratā, aniccatā,
tika-abh08t0:1916_1: Jātirūpanti dīpitaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu ubhayassapi rūpuppādasabhāvattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1916_9: Evaṃ tisamuṭṭhānarūpānampi daṭṭhabbanti evaṃ tesaṃ ākāranānattaṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t0:1916_10: Veneyyānaṃ vasena vāti tadā kira sotūnaṃ evaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1916_14: Tesaṃ micchāgāhaṃ vidhamento “jāti nāma na aññā,
tika-abh08t0:1916_15: upacayasantativasena ṭhitā rūpuppattiyeva pana tathā vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1916_17: tassa paccayeheva jātapariyāyaṃ labbhatī”ti dassanatthaṃ upacayo santatīti dvidhā bhinditvā desetīti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:1917_2: Uppajjamāne rūpadhamme uppādo anāgatakkhaṇato ummujjāpento viya hotīti vuttaṃ “ummujjāpanaraso”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1917_3: “Ime rūpadhammā sampaṭicchatha ne”ti niyyātento viya gayhatīti vuttaṃ “niyyātanapaccupaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1917_4: Paripuṇṇabhāvapaccupaṭṭhānatā upari cayo upacayoti imassa atthassa vasena veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1917_5: Yathā uppādakkhaṇappattaṃ uppannaṃ nāma hoti ādikamme tappaccayavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1917_6: evaṃ uppādakkhaṇagataṃ upacitaṃ nāma hotīti vuttaṃ “upacitarūpapadaṭṭhāno”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1918_0: Pavattilakkhaṇāti anuppabandhato uppattivasena pavattamānarūpānaṃ pavattananti lakkhitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:1918_2: Asati hi uppāde pubbāparavasena anuppabandho na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1920_4: Arūpadhammānaṃ pana jarāya suṭṭhu paṭicchannabhāvadassanatthaṃ “pākaṭā rūpadhammesū”ti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1920_14: Vīhipurāṇabhāvo viyāti vīhibhāvānapagamepi abhinavabhāvāpagamanakaro vīhipurāṇabhāvo viya.
tika-abh08t0:1920_19: rūpaṃ pana khaṇabhaṅgitāya na niccanti aniccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1920_21: Sā pana ṭhitippattarūpaṃ ṭhitiyameva vināsanabhāvena saṃsīdentī viya hotīti saṃsīdanarasā.
tika-abh08t0:1920_22: Yasmā ca sā bhaṅgabhāvato khayavayākāreneva gayhati,
tika-abh08t0:1920_25: dīpavaṭṭikāya saha telassa viya saha nirodho vayoti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1921_5: Middharūpaṃ nāmāti utucittāhāravasena tisamuṭṭhānaṃ middhaṃ nāma rūpaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1921_14: Rūpakkhandho abhiññeyyo pariññeyyo na pahātabbo na bhāvetabbo na sacchikātabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1921_20: ime dhammā nevadassanenanabhāvanāyapahātabbā”ti vacanena rūpadhammānaṃ pahānābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1921_21: Evañca sati tassa nīvaraṇabhāvo virujjheyya nīvaraṇānaṃ pahātabbattā.
tika-abh08t0:1922_0: “Yā me kaṅkhā pure āsi, taṃ me akkhāsi cakkhumā;
tika-abh08t0:1923_0: Addhā munīsi sambuddho, natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti. –
tika-abh08t0:1924_4: taṃ pajahathātiādivacanato rūpassa pahātabbatāpi paññāyatīti? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:1924_10: Na ca panetaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ etthāpi “tabbisayachandarāgappahānavaseneva vutta”nti sādhakavacanabhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1924_12: tasmā “natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”tiādivacanehi virujjhanato na middhaṃ rūpanti.
tika-abh08t0:1925_0: Yadi pana paro daḷhamūḷhaggāhitāya taṃvisayachandarāgappahānavaseneva nīvaraṇappahānaṃ adhippetanti sakavādaṃ oḍḍeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1925_1: tassa tannisedhanatthaṃ puna thinamiddhanīvaraṇassa avijjānīvaraṇena saha sampayogavacanañca āharanto āha “thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1925_4: “catūhi sampayogo”ti vacanato arūpadhammānameva aññamaññassa sampayogo labbhati,
tika-abh08t0:1925_11: Yathā hi “sakkharakathalikaṃ macchagumbampi carantampi tiṭṭhantampī”tiādīsu sakkharakathalikassa caraṇāyogato macchagumbāpekkhāya caraṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1925_16: Siddhe hi rūpabhāve asambhavato yathālābhayojanā yujjeyyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1925_17: Ettakeneva middhassa arūpabhāve siddhepi yathā dvikkhattuṃ bandhaṃ subandhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1925_18: evamanekasuttasādhitaṃ appadhaṃsiyaṃ hotīti paṭṭhānappakaraṇe “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1925_21: Jhānanikantiādīnampi dhammato lobhādibhāvato kāmacchandanīvaraṇādīhi abhinnattā vuttaṃ “kāmacchandanīvaraṇa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1926_2: āvaraṇā nīvaraṇā”tiādīsu thinamiddhassa nīvaraṇabhāvena ekato āgatattā idhāpi “thinamiddhanīvaraṇa”nti ekato vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1926_3: thinameva ca pana arūpabhave uppajjati thinamiddhanti?
tika-abh08t0:1926_6: Yadi hi ekato gahitamatteneva idhāpi ekato gahaṇaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1926_7: kukkuccassapi tattha ekato vuttassa idha gahaṇaṃ sambhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:1926_8: na ca panevaṃ atthi uddhaccanīvaraṇantveva vuttattā,
tika-abh08t0:1926_9: tasmā na tassa arūpabhavuppattiṃ sakkā paṭibāhitunti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:1926_15: vigatathinamiddhoti tassa thinamiddhassa cattattā vantattā muttattā pahīnattā paṭinissaṭṭhattā,
tika-abh08t0:1926_17: idaṃ cittaṃ imamhā thinamiddhamhā sodheti visodheti parisodheti moceti vimoceti parimoceti vā”ti evamādiṃ pāḷiṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1927_0: Yadipi siyā duvidhaṃ middhaṃ rūpaṃ, arūpañca.
tika-abh08t0:1927_5: Na hi visesetvā middhaṃ nīvaraṇesu desitaṃ “yadapi,
tika-abh08t0:1927_10: thinamiddhaṃ nīvaraṇanti iti hidaṃ uddesaṃ āgacchatī”ti avisesena vuttattā,
tika-abh08t0:1927_11: tasmā middhassa duvidhataṃ parikappetvāpi na sakkā nīvaraṇabhāvaṃ nivattetuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1927_12: Sakkā hi vattuṃ yaṃ taṃ arūpato aññaṃ middhaṃ parikappitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1927_13: tampi nīvaraṇaṃ middhasabhāvattā itaraṃ nīvaraṇaṃ viyāti.
tika-abh08t0:1927_16: nanu middhassa “niddā pacalāyikā”tiādinā vibhaṅge vuttattā niddābhāvo siddhoti?
tika-abh08t0:1927_18: itthiliṅgādīsu viya niddāhetuno middhassa niddābhāvena vibhattattā.
tika-abh08t0:1927_19: Evampi niddāhetuno middhassa abhāvato kathaṃ bhagavato niddāti ce?
tika-abh08t0:1927_20: Sā bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ aggivessana…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1927_21: divā supitā”tiādivacanato na niddā bhagavato middhena,
tika-abh08t0:1927_23: tañca bhagavato natthīti na sakkā vattuṃ “piṭṭhi me āgilāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1927_29: tasmā na bhagavato niddā middhahetukāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1928_1: Visuṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvāti vāyodhātuādito visuṃ visuṃ natthibhāvaṃ dassetvā.
tika-abh08t0:1928_3: Tattha kāyabalaṃ nāma atthato vāyodhātuyā pavattiākāraviseso tassā vipphārabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:1928_4: Yato bālānaṃ balanti vadantīti vuttaṃ “vāyodhātuyā gahitāya balarūpaṃ gahitamevā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1928_5: Sambhavo kāmadhātuyaṃ ekaccasattānaṃ indriyaparipākapaccayo āpodhātuyā pavattiākāravisesoti āha “āpodhātuyā sambhavarūpa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1928_8: uppādāvatthāya ca aññā jāti nāma natthevāti vuttaṃ “upacayasantatīhi jātirūpa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1928_11: So atthato rūpadhammānaṃ pākāvatthā ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu eva siyāti vuttaṃ “jaratāaniccatādīhi rogarūpaṃ gahita”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1930_2: utu ca cittañca āhāroti ime rūpahetuyoti.
tika-abh08t0:1930_6: Nanu ekato eva paccayato paccayuppannassa uppatti natthīti?
tika-abh08t0:1931_2: Na hi ekasseva dve ekakkhaṇe paccayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:1932_1: Idāni missakasamuṭṭhānānipi gahetvā taṃtaṃpaccayajātānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ dassetuṃ “kammenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1932_2: Tattha aṭṭhindriyāni vatthu suddhaṭṭhakaṃ santatyūpacayākāsāti vīsati kammajā.
tika-abh08t0:1932_3: Viññattidvayaṃ saddo lahutādittayaṃ suddhaṭṭhakādayo ekādasāti sattarasa cetasā jāyare,
tika-abh08t0:1932_5: Saddo lahutādittayaṃ suddhaṭṭhakādayo ekādasāti dasapañceva pannarasa utunā jāyare.
tika-abh08t0:1932_7: Jaratāaniccatāhi te aṭṭhasaṭṭhi ca hontevāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:1933_2: samuṭṭhitā”ti vatvā puna tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “jātassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1933_3: Tattha jātassa pākabhedattāti jaratāya jātadhammassa pākattā,
tika-abh08t0:1933_10: Uppannadhammassa pana jātito paraṃ imāsaṃ sambhavato na jāyantīti vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1933_11: Yadi pana koci tesampi jātabhāve ko virodhoti paṭipajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1933_18: Bhedo vā na ca bhijjatīti etthāpi pākabhāvopi vuttova.
tika-abh08t0:1933_21: Natthi tanti pākabhedānaṃ paccanaṃ bhijjanaṃ natthīti vuttamevatthaṃ saṅkhipitvā āha.
tika-abh08t0:1934_3: bhaṅgena ca bhavitabbanti tesaṃ jaratāaniccatāpi siyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1934_7: na ca bhaṅgo aññena bhaṅgena bhijjati,
tika-abh08t0:1935_12: yathā kammādīhi uppajjanakarūpaniddese “katamaṃ taṃ rūpaṃ upādinnaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:1935_15: yaṃ vā panaññampi atthi rūpaṃ kammassa katattā rūpāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:1935_16: phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ ākāsadhātu rūpassa upacayo rūpassa santati kabaḷīkāro āhāro”tiādinā upacayasantatīnaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1935_17: niddiṭṭhattā jāti jāyatīti dīpitaṃ hoti tassā aparajātiyā abhāvepi.
tika-abh08t0:1936_3: evañca sati niddese kasmā vuttanti āha “jāyamānassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1936_5: asatipi jātiyā jāyamānatte jāyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbattibhāvato tassā tappaccayabhāvavohāro anumatoti tattha vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:1937_11: Abhinibbattisammutinti abhinibbattati jāyatīti evaṃ abhinibbattivasena pavattasammutiṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1937_16: tesaṃ taduppādanaṃ pati anuparatabyāpārānaṃ yo so paccayūpalakkhaṇiyo kiccānubhāvakkhaṇo,
tika-abh08t0:1937_17: tadā jāyamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ vikārabhāvena labbhamānataṃ sandhāya vineyyapuggalavasena jātiyā paccayato jātattaṃ anuññātaṃ tato pure,
tika-abh08t0:1937_20: Jarābhaṅgānaṃ pana paccayānubhāvakkhaṇato uttari ṭhitibhaṅgakkhaṇesu labbhamānattā na evaṃ anuññātuṃ sakkāti,
tika-abh08t0:1937_21: jātiyā pana labbhati so vohāroti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:1938_6: jaratā aniccatā ceva na kehici samuṭṭhitāti yo vadeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1938_8: Kasmā na vattabbanti āha “sā hi pariyāyadesanā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1939_8: tasmā taṃ jātipaccayataṃ sandhāya “jarāmaraṇaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1939_9: tatoyeva ca anicca”nti pariyāyena sutte āgataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1939_10: Yathā viññattiādīnaṃ nippariyāyato cittasamuṭṭhānatābhāvepi cittajānaṃ vikārattā cittasamuṭṭhānabhāvoti.
tika-abh08t0:1939_11: Viññattiyo viyāti ca nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ lahutādīnampi cittajādibhāvassa pariyāyeneva icchitattā.
tika-abh08t0:1940_3: Niccaṃ vāsaṅkhataṃ viyāti yathā asaṅkhataṃ nibbānaṃ kenaci asaṅkhatattā niccaṃ dhuvaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1940_4: evamidampi kenaci asaṅkhatattā niccaṃ sassataṃ vāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1940_5: Nobhayaṃ panidanti idaṃ pana ubhayampi khaṃpupphaṃ viya no natthi,
tika-abh08t0:1940_6: na ca nibbānaṃ viya asaṅkhataṃ vāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1940_12: yasmā ca tesaṃ abhāve na paññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1940_13: tasmā na niccanti imameva ca abhinivesaṃ nisedhetuṃ bhagavatā jātiyā catujattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1941_3: rūpassa lakkhaṇa”ntiādinā paricchedādibhāvaṃ atikkamitvā attano kakkhaḷattādinā sabhāvena paricchijja gahetabbattā,
tika-abh08t0:1941_4: apariyāyeneva kammādipaccayehi nipphannattā vā nipphannāni nāma.
tika-abh08t0:1942_0: Sesakā anipphannāti sutvā paro aniṭṭhaṃ āpādento āha “yadi hontī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1942_11: hutvā abhāvākāro aniccatā nāmāti evaṃ tesaṃyeva aṭṭhārasannaṃ nipphannarūpānaṃ vikārabhūtattā nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā ca,
tika-abh08t0:1942_12: tesaṃyeva ca rūpānaṃ vikārattā te asaṅkhatā nāma kathaṃ bhaveyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1942_13: nipphannā ceva saṅkhatāti sambandhaṃ katvā yadi anipphannarūpānaṃ nissayabhūtā nipphannarūpā saṅkhatā,
tika-abh08t0:1942_14: tesaṃ pana vikārabhūtā kathaṃ asaṅkhatā nāma hontīti atthaṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t0:1943_8: itarassa ca rūpāvabhāsanaṃ hotīti cakkhukāyapasādānaṃ ekībhāvo bhaveyyāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1944_1: Aññaṃ pana aññasmiṃ na catthīti ṭhapetvā aññamaññāvinibbhogavasena pavattiṃ aññaṃ rūpaṃ aññasmiṃ rūpe
tika-abh08t0:1944_9: Vinibbhujitvā hi nesaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ paññāpetuṃ na sakkā,
tika-abh08t0:1944_12: pavattitoti aññamaññaṃ santānato avinibbhujjanavasena avisaṃsaṭṭhavasena pavattanato.
tika-abh08t0:1944_14: Na hi cakkhukāyapasādānaṃ ekakalāpagataavinibbhogarūpā ṭhānantaraṃ vattuṃ sakkāti.
tika-abh08t0:1944_15: Yathā rūparasādīnaṃ vivecetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya aññamaññabyāpitā vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:1944_16: na ca paramatthato rūpe raso atthi.
tika-abh08t0:1944_19: Evaṃ kāyāyatanādīnampi paramatthato na sabbattha atthitā,
tika-abh08t0:1944_21: idaṃ etthā”ti ṭhānantaraṃ pana samayaññunā kenaci na sakkā vattunti.
tika-abh08t0:1945_3: gatāti pañcavaṇṇānaṃ nīlādipañcavaṇṇasuttamayānaṃ ekamekassa vā ekekavaṇṇavasena dhajānaṃ chāyā tesaṃ upamataṃ upamābhāvaṃ gatā sampattāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1945_7: Taṃ pana tehi “chāyāupamataṃ gatā”ti ettha bahubbīhivaseneva rassattanti maññamānehi vuttaṃ bhaveyya.
tika-abh08t0:1945_9: “Catutthadū”tiādīsu hi vibhattilopampi katvā dassento ācariyo na īdisesu ṭhānesu byañjane ādaraṃ janeti.
tika-abh08t0:1945_11: “dhammāna”nti uparipadaṃ vā sambandhituṃ anicchantehi vuccati tattha “nānattaṃ samupāgata”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1945_13: Na hi nānattaṃ samupāgataṃ tesanti nāpekkhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1945_15: hotu tāva potthakesu adissamānampi pāṭhaṃ parikappetvā tesaṃ tuṭṭhi.
tika-abh08t0:1945_17: yathā pañcavaṇṇānaṃ dhajānaṃ ekato katvā ussāpitānaṃ kiñcāpi chāyā ekābaddhā viya hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1945_19: evameva ime sabbaṭṭhānikarūpā kiñcāpi ekābaddhā viya honti,
tika-abh08t0:1946_5: mūlaṭṭhena upakārako lobhādiko ca alobhādiko ca,
tika-abh08t0:1946_12: Paccayāyattavuttitoti attano attano paccayādhīnappavattitāya sappaccayattāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1946_14: Kāmāvacarattā ahetukattā hetuvippayuttattā saṃyojaniyattā ganthaniyattā upādāniyattā oghaniyattā yoganiyattā
tika-abh08t0:1946_15: nīvaraṇiyattā saṃkilesikattā parāmaṭṭhattā acetasikattā cittavippayuttattā na rūpāvacarattā na arūpāvacarattā
tika-abh08t0:1946_16: na apariyāpannattā aniyyānikattā aniccattāti evamādināpi kāraṇena ekavidhamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:1947_3: Tattha ajjhattikaduke tāva āhito ahaṃ māno etthāti attā,
tika-abh08t0:1947_5: taṃ attānaṃ adhikicca uddissa pavattattā ajjhattā,
tika-abh08t0:1947_12: tvaṃ kaṭṭhakaliṅgarūpamo bhavissasī”ti vadantā viya attabhāvassa sātisayaṃ upakārakānīti tāneva visesato ajjhattikanāmaṃ labhanti.
tika-abh08t0:1947_15: Tattha cakkhādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ cakkhuviññāṇādīsu adhipateyyaṃ tesaṃ paṭumandabhāvādianuvattanato,
tika-abh08t0:1947_21: Kammanibbattañhi “mametaṃ phala”nti tena kammunā gahitaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1948_4: Kammato jātanti ettha yaṃ ekantato kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ aṭṭhindriyāni,
tika-abh08t0:1948_6: Yañca ekādasavidhe catusamuṭṭhāne kammasamuṭṭhānaṃ ekādasavidhameva rūpanti evaṃ vīsatividhampi kammato uppajjanato kammajaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1948_17: Cittajattikādīni vuttānusārena yojetuṃ sakkāti na dassitāni.
tika-abh08t0:1949_5: taṃ sabbaṃ diṭṭhaṃ nāma taṃsabhāvānativattanato yathā “iṭṭha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1949_9: Mutaṃ nāma gandharasaphoṭṭhabbāyatanattayaṃ mutvā patvā gahetabbato,
tika-abh08t0:1950_1: aññanissitānaṃ sampaṭicchanādīnañca pavattimukhabhāvato dvārañceva attanissitānaṃ ādhārabhāvato vatthu ca.
tika-abh08t0:1950_2: Dvārameva hutvā na vatthūti kevalaṃ kammadvārabhāvato dvārameva,
tika-abh08t0:1950_4: Vatthumeva hutvā na dvāranti manodhātumanoviññāṇadhātūnaṃ nissayabhāvato vatthumeva,
tika-abh08t0:1950_5: cakkhādayo viya saparanissitānaṃ pavattidvārābhāvato na dvāraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1950_6: Sesaṃ ekavīsatividhaṃ rūpaṃ vuttavipariyāyato neva dvāraṃ na vatthu ca.
tika-abh08t0:1951_0: 739-40. Puna pañcavidhanti sambandho. Catujanti pakāsitaṃ catūhiyeva samuṭṭhānato.
tika-abh08t0:1952_2: Tathā hetaṃ āvajjanādīhi ceva manodvārikajavanehi ca viññāyatīti.
tika-abh08t0:1952_5: Na hi rūpādito aññattha cakkhuviññāṇādīni pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:1954_0: Manāyatanassa arūpattā, dhammāyatanassa ca ekadesato rūpattā āha “āyatanabhedato ekādasavidha”nti.
tika-abh08t0:1955_3: Bhummavajjesūti bhummadevānaṃ vajjanaṃ yonivibhāgaṃ patvā tesaṃ manussasadisattā.
tika-abh08t0:1955_6: tāsañca paṭikkhepena pacchimā opapātikayoni anuññātāti atthato āpannameva hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:1955_7: Tattha nirayeti ussadānampi gahaṇato avīcimahāniraye kīṭapāṇakānampi sarīraṃ pacchā vaḍḍhanakaṃ hutvāva nibbattati,
tika-abh08t0:1955_8: nijjhāmataṇhikapetānaṃ niccāturatāya kāmassa abhāvato gabbhaggahaṇaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1955_10: ādittattā kucchiyaṃ gabbhaṃ na patiṭṭhātīti keci.
tika-abh08t0:1955_11: Nibbattamānānañca pāpakammānubhāvena mahādukkhassa pattabbatāya mahanteneva sarīrena bhavitabbanti saṃsedajayonipi tesaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1955_12: aggijālāya santappamānasarīrattā tesaṃ nibbattakāle allaṭṭhāne pupphādīsu sambhavābhāvato saṃsedajatā natthevātipi vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1955_15: Saṃsedajo tāva khuddakasarīro hutvā padumagabbhādiṃ nissāya nibbatto kamena vaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t0:1955_17: tattha tattha paricchinnappamāṇasarīrova soḷasavassuddesiko viya paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgo pāturahosi.
tika-abh08t0:1956_2: Manussesu hi keci aṇḍajāpi honti kuntaputtadvebhātikattherā viya,
tika-abh08t0:1956_3: keci saṃsedajāpi honti padumagabbhe nibbattapokkharasātibrāhmaṇādayo viya,
tika-abh08t0:1956_5: Nijjhāmataṇhikāvasesapetā pana sabbacatuppadapakkhijātidīghajātiādayo sabbepi tiracchānā ca catuyonikāvāti.
tika-abh08t0:1957_5: Tadā hi neva cittajarūpamatthi paṭisandhicittassa rūpasamuṭṭhāpakattābhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1957_8: na ca āhārajaṃ tasmiṃ kāye ajjhohaṭassa abhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:1957_9: tasmā kammasamuṭṭhānāniyeva tiṃsa rūpāni paṭisandhikkhaṇe nibbattanti,
tika-abh08t0:1957_11: paripiṇḍitāni ca tāni jātiuṇṇāya ekassa aṃsuno pasannatilatele pakkhipitvā uddhaṭassa paggharitvā agge
tika-abh08t0:1957_12: ṭhitabindumattāni acchāni vippasannāni pasannatelabindusamānāni honti. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t0:1962_0: Sabhāvassevāti avadhāraṇena abhāvakassa bhāvadasakābhāvato tiṃsarūpānaṃ asambhavaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1962_3: Abhāvagabbhaseyyānanti iminā abhāvaopapātikānaṃ na evanti dassetīti keci.
tika-abh08t0:1962_4: Pubbe sabhāvakagabbhaseyyakassa pana vatvā tato nivattanatthaṃ “abhāvagabbhaseyyakasattāna”nti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1962_6: ggahaṇena aṇḍajānampi gahaṇe idha visuṃ vacanaṃ gobalībaddañāyavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1963_2: ekādasa bhavanti teti ekasmiṃ kalāpe gahitarūpānaṃ aparakalāpe aggahaṇavasena suddhaṭṭhakaṃ, jīvitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1963_4: vatthurūpanti abhāvakassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe ekādasa rūpāni bhavanti,
tika-abh08t0:1963_5: sabhāvakassa pana dvīsu bhāvesu ekena saha dvādasa rūpāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:1963_7: vakkhamānesu ca paṭisandhikkhaṇikakalāpesu aggahitaggahaṇena rūpaggahaṇe nayo eseva ñeyyo.
tika-abh08t0:1964_2: kathaṃ pana te dasakā jānitabbāti āha “jīvitenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1964_4: tannissitā ca vaṇṇagandharasaojāti idaṃ jīvitādinā asammissaṃ suddhaṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1964_5: Imāniyeva hi aṭṭha katthaci avinibbhogavasenapi pavattito avinibbhogarūpāni avakaṃsato eko kalāpoti ca vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1964_6: Ācariyajotipālattherena pana “nipphannānipphannavasena dasa rūpāni avinibbhogavuttikāni eko kalāpo”ti vatvā puna taṃsamatthanatthaṃ idaṃ vuttaṃ –
tika-abh08t0:1967_2: asādhāraṇena vā kāyena lakkhitaṃ dasakaṃ kāyadasakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1968_1: Kāmāvacaradevesu sabbakālaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu sattatiyā rūpānaṃ labbhanato vuttaṃ “niccaṃ rūpāni sattatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1968_4: “Manussesu opapātikasattāna”nti avisesena vuttepi ādikappikānaṃ bhāvadasakassa paṭisandhikkhaṇe abhāvato tesaṃ saṭṭhi rūpānīti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1968_6: saṃsedajānañca kāmāvacarasattānaṃ pavatteyeva hoti tassa pācakagginā sahavuttittā,
tika-abh08t0:1968_8: Saṃsedajānampi paripuṇṇaṅgapaccaṅgānaṃ nibbattanato opapātikehi viseso natthīti tesaṃ visuṃ aggahaṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1970_4: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:1970_5: Padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaparipuṇṇāyatanayoniṃ dassetuṃ “opapātikasattāna”nti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1971_2: Ānandācariyo panettha “rūpadhātuyaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇena saha cakkhusotavatthusattakānaṃ jīvitachakkassāti
tika-abh08t0:1971_3: catunnaṃ kalāpānaṃ vasena sattavīsati rūpāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1971_4: tattha gandharasāhārānaṃ paṭikkhittattā”ti vatvā puna taṃ samatthento “pāḷiyañhi ‘rūpadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe
tika-abh08t0:1971_7: Tathā ‘rūpadhātuyā cha āyatanāni nava dhātuyo’ti sabbasaṅgāhakavasena tattha vijjamānāyatanadhātuyo dassetuṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1971_8: Kathāvatthumhi ca ghānāyatanādīnaṃ viya gandhāyatanādīnañca tattha bhāvo paṭikkhitto ‘atthi tattha ghānāyatananti? Āmantā.
tika-abh08t0:1971_11: Na ca aphoṭṭhabbāyatanānaṃ pathavīdhātuādīnaṃ viya agandharasāyatanānaṃ gandharasānaṃ tattha bhāvo sakkā
tika-abh08t0:1971_12: vattuṃ phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāvinimuttassa pathavīādisabhāvassa viya gandharasāyatanabhāvavinimuttassa
tika-abh08t0:1971_14: Yadi ca ghānasamphassādīnaṃ kāraṇabhāvo natthīti tāni āyatanānīti na vucceyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1971_15: dhātusaddo pana nissattanijjīvavibhāvakoti gandhadhāturasadhātūti avacane kāraṇaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1971_16: Dhammasabhāvo ca nesaṃ ekantena icchitabbo sabhāvadhāraṇādilakkhaṇato aññassa abhāvā.
tika-abh08t0:1971_17: Dhammānañca āyatanabhāvo ekantato yamake vutto ‘dhammo āyatananti?
tika-abh08t0:1971_19: tasmā tesaṃ gandharasāyatanabhāvābhāvepi koci āyatanabhāvo vattabbo.
tika-abh08t0:1971_20: Yadi ca phoṭṭhabbabhāvato añño pathavīādibhāvo viya gandharasabhāvato añño tesaṃ koci sabhāvo siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1971_23: pana āyatanabhāve ca sati gandho ca so āyatanañca gandhāyatanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1971_24: raso ca so āyatanañca rasāyatananti idamāpannamevāti gandharasāyatanabhāvo ca na sakkā nivāretuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1971_25: ‘tayo āhārā’ti vacanato kabaḷīkārāhārassa tattha abhāvo viññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1971_28: Evañhi dhammatā na vilomatā hotī”ti vadati.
tika-abh08t0:1972_1: Tathā ca vuttaṃ tehi “rūpāvacarasattānaṃ ghānajivhāyatanābhāvato vijjamānāpi gandharasā āyatanakiccaṃ na karontī”ti,
tika-abh08t0:1972_2: te anāmasitvā pāḷiyaṃ “pañcāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti “cha āyatanānī”ti ca ādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1972_3: “Tayo āhārā”ti ca ajjhoharitabbassa āhārassa abhāvena ojaṭṭhamakarūpasamuṭṭhāpanasaṅkhātassa āhārakiccassa akaraṇato,
tika-abh08t0:1972_6: Iti visayino kiccassa abhāvena visayo kiccabhāvadhammo na vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1972_8: tasmiṃ taṃhetuko nippariyāyena visayassa āyatanabhāvo natthīti vijjamānassāpi avacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1972_11: tassa tattha visayīsabbhāvahetuko nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1972_18: Yena adhippāyena rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhāyatanādīnaṃ avacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1972_19: tena na rūpāyatanassāpi avacananti asaññīnaṃ ekaṃ āyatanaṃ na vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1972_20: Yathāsakañhi indriyagocarabhāvāpekkhāya yesaṃ nippariyāyena āyatanabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh08t0:1972_21: tesu niddisiyamānesu tadabhāvato rūpadhātuyaṃ saññīnaṃ gandhādike visuṃ āyatanabhāvena avatvā dhammasabhāvānativattanato,
tika-abh08t0:1972_22: manoviññāṇassa ca visayabhāvūpagamanato dhammāyatanantogadhe katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti pāḷiyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1972_23: Etadatthañhi dhammāyatananti sāmaññato nāmakaraṇaṃ piṭṭhivaṭṭakāni vā tāni katvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1972_24: Yena ca pana adhippāyena asaññīnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1972_26: asaññīnampi gandhāyatanādīnaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ kātabbanti imassa nayassa dassanatthaṃ “asaññasattānaṃ devānaṃ dve āyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1973_0: Asatipi hi tattha attano indriyesu rūpassa vaṇṇāyatanasabhāvātikkamo natthevāti taṃ rūpāyatanantveva vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:1973_1: Iminā ca nayadassanena gandhādīni tīṇi pakkhipitvā saññīnaṃ aṭṭha āyatanāni,
tika-abh08t0:1973_4: aññathā rūpaloke phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya pathavīādīnaṃ brahmūnaṃ vacīghoso eva ca na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1973_6: na ca phusanasabhāvānaṃ katthaci aphusanasabhāvatā sakkā viññātuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1973_7: phoṭṭhabbāyatanassa ca bhūtattayassa abhāve rūpabhave rūpāyatanādīnampi sambhavo eva na siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1973_8: tasmā phusituṃ sakkuṇeyyatāyapi pathavīādīnaṃ tattha kāyindriyābhāvena tesaṃ phoṭṭhabbabhāvo na vutto.
tika-abh08t0:1973_9: Evañca katvā rūpadhātuyaṃ tesaṃ sappaṭighatāvacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:1974_0: Paṭigho ca nāma bhūtattayassa kāyapasādaṃ pati tannissayabhūtaghaṭṭanaṃ dvārena abhimukhabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:1974_2: so ca phusituṃ asakkuṇeyyabhāvo ghaṭṭanāya abhāvato natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1974_3: Yadi tattha asatipi visayimhi rūpāyatanampi gahetvā “dve āyatanānī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1974_4: atha kasmā gandhāyatanādīni gahetvā “pañcāyatanānī”ti na vuttanti?
tika-abh08t0:1974_6: Atha vā tattha rūpāyatanasseva vacanaṃ kadāci aññabhūmikānaṃ pasādassa visayabhāvaṃ sandhāya,
tika-abh08t0:1975_2: na pana gandharasāti tesaṃyeva tattha avacanaṃ yuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1975_3: Kathāvatthumhi ca nippariyāyena gandhāyatanādīnaṃ atthibhāvaṃ parijānantaṃ sandhāya paṭisedho kato.
tika-abh08t0:1975_4: Yadipi cetaṃ vacanaṃ tattha gandhāyatanādīnaṃ abhāvavibhāvanaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:1975_6: Nayidamevaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu tattha tesaṃ atthibhāvassa niddhāretvā vuttattā.
tika-abh08t0:1975_8: taṃ pāḷi viya pamāṇabhūtaṃ avigarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā āgatattā.
tika-abh08t0:1975_9: Tattha siyā “yaṃ pāḷiyā na virujjhati aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1975_16: tannissayānañca viññāṇānaṃ sattasuññatāsandassanatthaṃ bhagavato dhātudesanāti āyatanabhāvena vuttānaṃyeva
tika-abh08t0:1975_17: dhātubhāvadīpanato dhātubhāvassāpi tesaṃ avacanaṃ yujjati eva,
tika-abh08t0:1975_19: tathā cakkhudasakādivasena idha rūpagaṇanā katāti na ettha dhammatāvilomanāsaṅkāya okāsoti veditabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:1976_2: Na hi jaccandhabadhiraaghānarahite napuṃsake vatthukāyajivhādasakavasena idha tiṃsāti yujjati,
tika-abh08t0:1976_3: idañca “opapātikassa jaccandhabadhiraghānarahite napuṃsake jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsa rūpāni uppajjantī”ti aṭṭhakathāvādaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1976_4: Ānandācariyo pana taṃ “pāḷiyā na sametī”ti vatvā paṭikkhipati.
tika-abh08t0:1976_6: Na hi pāḷiyaṃ kāmāvacarānaṃ saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ aghānakānaṃ uppatti vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:1979_6: Yamake ca ghānajivhānaṃ sahappavatti vuttāti taṃ upaparikkhitvā gahetabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:1979_17: Sati aghānakaupapattiyaṃ punapi “kassaci aparāni dasāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti vattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:1979_18: Tathā ca sati yathā andhabadhirassa vasena “kassaci navāyatanāni pātubhavantī”ti ekavāraṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1979_23: ghānajivhāyatanānaṃ sahappavattivacanato ca tattheva kāmadhātuyaṃ aghānakassāsambhavoti.
tika-abh08t0:1980_0: Jotipālattherādayo pana “saṃsedajassa jaccandhabadhiraaghānakanapuṃsakassa jivhākāyavatthudasakānaṃ vasena tiṃsarūpāni uppajjantīti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1980_2: Dhammahadayavibhaṅgapāḷiyañca ‘upapattikkhaṇe’ti vuttattā opapātikasseva vasena nayo nīto.
tika-abh08t0:1980_6: yampi dhammahadayavibhaṅge ‘kāmadhātuyā upapattikkhaṇe kassaci ekādasāyatanāni pātubhavantī’tiādīnaṃ niddese ‘opapātikānaṃ petāna’ntiādinā opapātika-
tika-abh08t0:1980_9: taṃ paripuṇṇāyatanānaṃyeva saṃsedajānaṃ opapātikesu saṅgahavasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1980_10: Tathā hi vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ‘saṃsedajayonikā paripuṇṇāyatanabhāvena opapātikasaṅgahaṃ katvā vuttā’ti,
tika-abh08t0:1980_11: padhānāya vā yoniyā sabbaṃ paripuṇṇāyatanaṃ yoniṃ saṅgahetvā dassetuṃ ‘opapātikāna’nti vuttanti ca,
tika-abh08t0:1981_3: kassaci aṭṭhāyatanāni pātubhavantīti vadeyyāti idaṃ manussesu saṃsedajopapātikānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1981_5: Kesañci pana aghānakakīṭānaṃ atthibhāvato apāyesu saṃsedajopapātike sandhāyetaṃ vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:1982_6: andhabadhirassa pana paṇṇāsa cakkhusotadasakābhāvatotiādinā nayena aññamaññāpekkhāya paripuṇṇā paripuṇṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:1982_7: rūpānaṃ pāṇīnaṃ vasena rūpānaṃ samuppatti viññātabbāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:1983_1: Evaṃ tīsu bhavesu paṭisandhiyaṃ rūpappavattiṃ dassetvā idāni pavattiyaṃ dassetuṃ “sattavīsati rūpānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1983_2: Kāmāvacarasattassa hi paripuṇṇāyatanassa asati andhabadhirādipasādavighāte yāva maraṇacittassa heṭṭhā sattarasamacittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1983_4: Aparipuṇṇāyatanassa pana jaccandhādikassa heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpānaṃ hāyanavaḍḍhanāni veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:1983_5: Nanu aṭṭhavīsatiyeva rūpāni kāmabhave pavattantīti āha “appavattanato”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1984_1: na vijjareti kāmavirāgabhāvanāvasena gandhādiggāhakesu pasādesu virattā hontīti ghānādittayaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:1984_2: Cakkhusotesu pana anuttaradassanādiatthaṃ virattā na hontīti tāni tesaṃ uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1984_5: Sati hi tādise dhātukkhobhe tappaṭipakkhehi lahutādīhi bhavitabba”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:1984_8: Tathā sati sahetukakiriyacittuppādesu kāyalahutādīnaṃ abhāvo eva siyā,
tika-abh08t0:1984_9: tasmā pañceva rūpāni saññībrahmānaṃ na uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1984_15: lahutādittayanti terasa rūpāni vajjetvā avasesāni pannarasa uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1985_2: Rūpe honti tisantatīti brahmānaṃ anāhārabhāvena āhārajarūpānaṃ abhāvato tisso santatiyo.
tika-abh08t0:1985_4: Bahiddhā ekasantatīti kammajādīnaṃ tissannampi abhāvato utujasantatiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1986_1: Evaṃ paṭisandhipavattīsu rūpānaṃ gaṇanaparicchedaṃ vatvā idāni tattha nesaṃ uppattikkamaṃ dassetuṃ “rūpaṃ nibbattamāna”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1986_3: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe panāti ettha dasakattayaṃ hotīti pāṭhaseso.
tika-abh08t0:1986_5: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe dasakattayaṃ heṭṭhā vuttampi “tañca kho sandhicittassā”tiādikaṃ visesaṃ dassetuṃ puna vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1986_6: Cittassa tīsu khaṇesu kammajarūpānaṃ samuppattito āha “tathevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:1987_1: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca rūpuppādo natthīti catusamuṭṭhānikānipi rūpāni cittassa uppādakkhaṇeyeva hontī”ti āha.
tika-abh08t0:1987_5: Cittayamake hi “uppannaṃ uppajjamāna”nti etassa vibhaṅge “bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ no ca uppajjamāna”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1987_7: Tathā”na uppajjamānaṃ na uppanna”nti ettha “bhaṅgakkhaṇe na uppajjamānaṃ no ca na uppanna”nti ettakameva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1987_9: Evaṃ “na niruddhaṃ na nirujjhamāna”nti etesaṃ paripuṇṇavissajjane “uppādakkhaṇe anāgatañcā”ti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1987_10: atikkantakālavāre ca “bhaṅgakkhaṇe cittaṃ uppādakkhaṇaṃ vītikkanta”nti vatvā “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ ṭhitikkhaṇābhāvaṃ cittassa dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1987_11: Suttepi hi “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti tasseva ekassa aññathattābhāvato yassā aññathattaṃ paññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:1987_12: sā santatiṭṭhitīti na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1987_14: Yo cettha cittassa nirodhakkhaṇe rūpuppādo vutto,
tika-abh08t0:1987_19: na ca cittasamuṭṭhānarūpameva sandhāya paṭikkhepo katoti sakkā viññātuṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpādhikārassa abhāvāti.
tika-abh08t0:1988_1: uppannauppajjamānavārādīsu “ṭhitikkhaṇe”ti avacanaṃ “cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇaṃ nāma natthī”ti imamatthaṃ dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:1988_2: Na hi yathādhammasāsane abhidhamme labbhamānassa avacane kāraṇaṃ dissati.
tika-abh08t0:1988_3: Na kevalaṃ abhidhamme avacanameva cittassa ṭhitikkhaṇabhāvajotakaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1988_4: apica kho “ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī”ti evamāgatā suttantapāḷipi.
tika-abh08t0:1988_12: añño eva soti sabbathāpi ṭhitikkhaṇassa abhāvoyeva.
tika-abh08t0:1988_13: Yadi ca cittassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe rūpaṃ uppajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:1988_14: taṃ dukkhasaccanti katvā “no”ti vattuṃ na sakkā, vuttañca,
tika-abh08t0:1989_5: Uppādāvatthāya ca bhinnā nirodhāvatthāti ekasmiṃyeva ca sabhāvadhamme yathā icchitabbā,
tika-abh08t0:1990_4: yathā rūpassa uppādo “upacayo santatī”ti bhinditvā desito.
tika-abh08t0:1990_6: “Yassa vā panā”tiādipucchāya vissajjane ca arūpalokaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānarūpaṃ vā sandhāya “no”ti sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:1990_9: Atha vā paccāsattiñāyena yaṃ samudayasaccaṃ nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1991_0: Utujarūpāni pana paṭisandhicittassa ṭhitikkhaṇato paṭṭhāya aṭṭhakanavakavasena uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:1991_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe hi uppannānaṃ kammajarūpānaṃ abbhantare sahuppādaekanirodhatejodhātu ṭhānaṃ patvā tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe aṭṭha rūpāni samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1991_3: tattha uppannā paṭhamabhavaṅgassa uppādakkhaṇeti evamādinā aṭṭhakaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1991_4: kadāci saddapātubhāvakāle tena saha saddanavakañca uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1991_5: Cittajarūpāni ca paṭisandhito anantaraṃ paṭhamabhavaṅgato paṭṭhāya rūpajanakacittānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe aṭṭhakavasena,
tika-abh08t0:1991_9: Nanu ca ajjhohaṭāhārapaccayena āhāro rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1991_10: gabbhe sayantassa ca kuto ajjhoharaṇāhāroti? Samātito.
tika-abh08t0:1991_11: Mātarā hi bhuttaṃ kucchigatassa sarīre abbhañjanaṃ viya āhārakiccaṃ karoti.
tika-abh08t0:1996_0: Tasmā mātarā ajjhohaṭāhārena anuggahite sarīre abbhantarikā ojā laddhappaccayā rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti,
tika-abh08t0:1996_1: cakkhusotaghānajivhādasakā pana pañcapasādāvatthaṃ atikkamma pacchā sattame sattāhe uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1997_0: Opapātikānampi paṭisandhicittassa uppādakkhaṇe kammasamuṭṭhānāni sattati rūpāni uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:1997_2: bhaṅgakkhaṇe ca sattati sattatītiādinā vuttanayena ukkaṃsāvakaṃsato kāmabhavikasattānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1997_5: Āhārajarūpaṃ pana kāmāvacarānaṃ sabbapaṭhamaṃ attano mukhagatakheḷaṃ ajjhoharaṇakāle uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:1997_8: Evaṃ uppajjamānesu ca panetesu rūpesu yaṃ cittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1997_9: taṃ attanā sahuppannacittaṃ ādiṃ katvā sattarasamacittassa nirodhakkhaṇe nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:1997_11: bhaṅgakkhaṇe uppannaṃ imassa ṭhitikkhaṇe nirujjhatīti evaṃ uppajjantaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:1997_14: Āsannamaraṇassa pana cutito sattarasamacittassa ṭhitikkhaṇamādiṃ katvā kammajarūpaṃ na samuṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t0:1998_0: “Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh08t0:2000_0: Sattarasamena saha uppannañca taṃ cuticittena saha nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:2000_5: upakkamena vā kassacīti evaṃ kammajarūpasseva hi maraṇaṃ hoti satipi āhāraje,
tika-abh08t0:2000_10: opapātikānaṃ pana sarīranikkhepābhāvato tampi na pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:2001_1: Uppādavayavantatāya nicco dhuvo na hotīti anicco,
tika-abh08t0:2001_2: niccakhaṇikatāya vā na icco sassatādivasena anupagantabboti anicco.
tika-abh08t0:2001_3: Ayañhi vināso janakapaccayato aññahetunirapekkhatāya niccakhaṇikova hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2001_7: dukkhavatthutāya ca dukkhānaṃ khandho samūhoti dukkhakkhandho.

tika-abh08t0:2169_9: aṅgātikkamo pana arūpe natthi catunnañcāpi aṅgānaṃ vasena samānattā.
tika-abh08t0:2169_10: Rūpe jhānaṅgatikkamoti rūpāvacarikakammaṭṭhānesu vitakkādīnaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ atikkamo,
tika-abh08t0:2169_13: nīvaraṇasamatikkamo idha aṭṭhannampi samāpattīnaṃ sādhāraṇattā na gahito.
tika-abh08t0:2170_1: Evaṃ samatikkamavasena dassetvā puna vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanavasena dassetuṃ “daseva kasiṇānī”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2170_2: Imesu cattālīsāya kammaṭṭhānesu dasa kasiṇāneva vaḍḍhetabbāni. Na ca…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2170_3: asubhādayoti sesā asubhādayo pana neva vaḍḍhetabbā. Kasmā?
tika-abh08t0:2170_7: kāyagatāsati ca attano ṭhitokāsena paricchinnattā paricchinnākāreneva upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-abh08t0:2170_8: Vaḍḍhitesupi kuṇaparāsi eva upaṭṭhātīti na koci ānisaṃso atthi.
tika-abh08t0:2170_13: Ekacco hi uddhumātake vā aṭṭhike vā mahante nimittaṃ gaṇhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2170_14: ekacco appaketi iminā pariyāyena ekaccassa parittārammaṇajjhānaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2170_16: Yo vā etaṃ ānisaṃsābhāvaṃ apassanto vaḍḍheyya,
tika-abh08t0:2170_22: na ca tena koci attho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2170_24: Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ pharitvā viharatī”tiādi,
tika-abh08t0:2170_30: Āruppārammaṇesu ākāsaṃ kasiṇugghāṭamattattā kasiṇāpagamavaseneva manasi kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2170_31: tato paraṃ vaḍḍhayato na kiñci hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2170_41: tasmā ime asubhādayo tiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni paricchinnokāsattā,
tika-abh08t0:2171_1: Evaṃ vaḍḍhanāvaḍḍhanato dassetvā puna ārammaṇato dassetuṃ “daseva kasiṇānī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2171_2: Paṭibhāganimittāni honti ārammaṇānīti imāni dvāvīsa paṭibhāganimittabhūtāni ārammaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:2171_3: Sesāti avasesā aṭṭhārasa neva paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā siyuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2172_4: Tacapañcakampi hi tattha pavattamānaṃ dibbānubhāvena paṭikkūlākārena nopaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2172_6: Jhānānubhāvanibbattānañhi atthassa abhāvato natthi brahmaloke assāsapassāsā.
tika-abh08t0:2173_3: diṭṭheneva gahetabbāti vāyokasiṇaṃ vajjetvā sesā nava kasiṇā,
tika-abh08t0:2173_4: dasa asubhānīti imāni ekūnavīsati diṭṭheneva vatthunā karaṇabhūtena gahetabbāni uggahetabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:2173_6: pubbabhāge cakkhunā oloketvā nimittaṃ nesaṃ gahetabbanti attho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2174_3: Sesamettha sutenevāti ettha kāyagatāsatiyaṃ sesaṃ vakkapañcakādi suteneva gahetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2174_5: Uttaroṭṭhanāsikaggesu phuṭṭhassa assāsapassāsassa gahetabbato vuttaṃ “ānāpānassati ettha,
tika-abh08t0:2174_10: Āditova gahetabbā na hontītiādikammikena bhāvanārambhavasena na paṭṭhapetabbāni,
tika-abh08t0:2175_1: Evaṃ gahaṇavasena dassetvā idāni paccayato dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānesu hetesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2175_2: Tattha etesu kammaṭṭhānesūti ettha yathārahaṃ ārammaṇānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2175_5: Mettādiekekasmiṃ brahmavihāre tīṇi tīṇi jhānāni paṭilabhitvā ṭhitasseva upekkhābrahmavihāravasena pañcamajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2175_7: Dvinnaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajavanānaṃ samanantarā nirodhaṃ phusatīti katvā vuttaṃ “catutthamāruppa”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2176_1: Evaṃ pasaṅgena āgataṃ kammaṭṭhānavibhāgaṃ dassetvā puna ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2176_10: Na hi ekavārameva āgatassa tasmiṃ khaṇe kathetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2177_1: ativitthārañca akatvā tassa sukhena uggaṇhanappamāṇaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2177_2: Sace pana so pakatiyāva uggahitakammaṭṭhāno hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2177_5: dve vā nisajjā attano sammukhāva sajjhāyaṃ kāretvā dātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2177_6: Evaṃ ācariyena paṭipajjitabbavidhiṃ dassetvā puna gahitakammaṭṭhānena tena yoginā uttari kātabbavidhānaṃ dassento āha “tenapī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2177_10: Yathā hi sammaṭṭhāne gahite puggalaṃ attano verī abhibhavituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:2177_11: evaṃ kammaṭṭhāne gahite manobhusaṅkhāto kāmarāgo taṃsamaṅgipuggalaṃ abhibhavitvā attano vase kātuṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:2179_0: Soṇḍiṃ paṇṇañca pupphañca, phalaṃ patthitameva ca.
tika-abh08t0:2184_1: Anurūpeti imesu aṭṭhārasasu dosesu aññatarenapi samannāgato ananurūpo nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2184_3: Mahāvihārādayo hi yogakammassa anukūlā na honti,
tika-abh08t0:2184_4: tasmā mahāvihāre tāva vattakaraṇādinā palibodho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2184_9: tasmā so asati aññasmiṃ anukūle kāraṇe ananurūpo hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2184_16: Patthanīye lokasammate vihāre viharantaṃ “arahā”ti sambhāventā bahū āgacchanti.
tika-abh08t0:2184_21: Paṭṭanasannissite abhiṇhaṃ nāvāsatthehi āgatamanussehi aphāsu hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2184_23: Rajjasīmasannissite dvinnaṃ rājūnaṃ kalahe sati dvinnaṃ vijitesu piṇḍāya vicarantaṃ bhikkhuṃ “ayaṃ carapuriso”ti gahetvā bandhanādikaṃ pāpeyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2184_25: Kalyāṇamittānadhivutthe uppannakaṅkhāya vinodake asati mahādosoyevāti etepi vihārā ananurūpā,
tika-abh08t0:2184_26: tasmā tādise vihāre parivajjetvā vuttadosavirahite anurūpe vihāre vihātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2185_0: Tassa pana vihārassa anurūpabhāvo evaṃ veditabboti dassetuṃ “gāmato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2185_2: Nātidūreti gocaragāmassa aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya na atidūre.
tika-abh08t0:2185_3: Naccāsanneti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaragāmato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atisanne.
tika-abh08t0:2185_5: Gocaragāmassa pana uttaradisāya vā dakkhiṇadisāya vā nātidūraṃ naccāsannaṃ senāsanaṃ visesena gamanāgamanasampannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2185_7: Pañcaṅgasaṃyuteti pana vuttattā nātidūranaccāsannatāya saha divā appakiṇṇatādīni cattāri samodhānetvā pañcaṅgasaṃyuttatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2186_4: senāsanaṃ nātidūraṃ hoti naccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannaṃ divā appakiṇṇaṃ rattiṃ appasaddaṃ appanigghosaṃ appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapasamphassaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2186_5: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa appakasireneva uppajjanti cīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanagilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:2186_6: tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane therā bhikkhū viharanti bahussutā āgatāgamā dhammadharā vinayadharā mātikādharā,
tika-abh08t0:2186_7: te kālena kālaṃ upasaṅkamitvā paripucchati pañhaṃ ‘idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ;
tika-abh08t0:2186_11: anekavihitesu ca kaṅkhāṭṭhāniyesu dhammesu kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti. Evaṃ kho,
tika-abh08t0:2187_0: Ettha ca nātidūranaccāsannabhāvena gamanāgamanasampannatā paṭhamaṃ aṅgaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2187_6: bahussutatādiguṇasamannāgatānaṃ therānaṃ vasanabhāvo pañcamanti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi saṃyutte samannāgate vihārasmiṃ vihātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2188_2: idāni taṃ palibodhaṃ sarūpato dassetvā tassa upacchindanākāraṃ āvi kātuṃ “dīghā kesā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2189_8: Bahiddhā vāpi tādiseti bahiddhāpi vihārapaccante paṭicchannaṭṭhāne.
tika-abh08t0:2190_3: Tanti taṃ cammaṃ vā kaṭasāraṃ vā dussapaṭṭaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t0:2190_9: Etadeva hi pamāṇaṃ sandhāya aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2190_11: Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontopi hi ettakeyeva aṭṭhatvā nibbānatthāyeva vāyamati.
tika-abh08t0:2190_12: Bherītalasamaṃ katvāti pāṇikāya ghaṃsetvā ninnatunnataṭṭhānābhāvena bherītalaṃ viya samaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2190_13: Sammajjitvāna taṃ ṭhānanti yasmiṃ ṭhāne nisīditvā taṃ kasiṇaṃ oloketi,
tika-abh08t0:2191_1: Tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalā hatthapāsappamāṇasmiṃ padeseti tamhā kasiṇamaṇḍalassa,
tika-abh08t0:2191_4: pīṭhassa ca majjhaṃ hatthapāsappamāṇaṃ katvā paññatteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2191_7: Dūre nisinnassa hi kasiṇaṃ na upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2191_9: Uccatare nisinnena ca gīvaṃ paṇāmetvā oloketabbaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2191_11: tasmā hatthapāsappamāṇe padese vidatthicaturaṅgulapādake pīṭhe nisīditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2191_20: Uparimaṃ sarīraṃ ujukaṃ ṭhapetvā aṭṭhārasapiṭṭhikaṇṭake koṭiyā koṭiṃ paṭipādetvāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2191_22: athassa yā tesaṃ oṇamanapaccayā khaṇe khaṇe vedanā uppajjeyyuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2191_26: Tato ca pubbenāparaṃ visesappattiyā vuddhiṃ phātiṃ upagacchati.
tika-abh08t0:2191_27: Idāni ārammaṇapariggahupāyaṃ dassento āha “katvā parimukhaṃ sati”nti,
tika-abh08t0:2191_29: saddena hi samānattho idha pari- saddo,
tika-abh08t0:2191_31: saddena mukhassa samīpe satiṃ katvāti attho. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:2191_32: “ayaṃ sati upaṭṭhitā hoti supaṭṭhitā nāsikagge vā mukhanimitte vā.
tika-abh08t0:2191_37: Tena vuccati ‘parimukhaṃ sati”nti vacanato “pariṇāyikā”tiādīsu viya pari-
tika-abh08t0:2191_40: saddo niyyānaṭṭhoti katvā pariggahitaniyyānasatiṃ katvā sabbathā gahitāsammosaṃ pariccattasammosaṃ satinepakkaṃ upaṭṭhapetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2192_1: Kāmesvādīnavaṃ disvāti “kāmā nāmete aṭṭhikaṅkhalikūpamā nirassādaṭṭhenā”tiādinā vatthukāmakilesakāmesu ādīnavaṃ paccavekkhitvā.
tika-abh08t0:2192_2: Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhu khematoti nekkhammaṃ khemato disvā kāmanissaraṇaṃ sabbadukkhasamatikkamassa upāyabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2192_5: sabbepi vā kusaladhamme khemato nibbhayato disvā,
tika-abh08t0:2192_8: ratanattayeti buddhādiratanattaye ratanattayaguṇānussaraṇena balavapītipāmojjaṃ janayitvā. Bhāgī…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2192_9: muttamanti “ahaṃ imāya sabbabuddhapaccekabuddhaariyasāvakehi paṭipannāya nekkhammapaṭipattiyā cittavivekādippavivekajassa
tika-abh08t0:2192_11: lābhī bhaveyya”nti evaṃ paṭipattiyaṃ ānisaṃsadassanena tabbisayaṃ uttamaṃ mahantaṃ ussāhaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2192_12: Ākārena samenevāti atiummīlitaatimandālocanāni vajjetvā nātiummīlitanātimandālocanasaṅkhātena samena ālocanākārena.
tika-abh08t0:2192_14: avibhūtañca rūpagataṃ upanijjhāyato viya cakkhu kilamati,
tika-abh08t0:2192_15: attano sabhāvavibhāvanato ca maṇḍalaṃ ativibhūtaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2192_19: Atimandaṃ ummīlayato ca gajanimīlakena pekkhantassa viya rūpagataṃ maṇḍalaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2192_20: Dassane mandabyāpāratāya kosajjapātato cittañca līnaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2192_22: tasmā yathā nāma ādāsatale mukhanimittaṃ gaṇhanto na tattha atigāḷhaṃ ummīlati,
tika-abh08t0:2192_25: evameva nātiummīlanādinā samena ākārena gaṇhantena bhāvetabbanti.
tika-abh08t0:2192_26: Nimittaṃ gaṇhatāti pathavīkasiṇe cakkhunā gahitaṃ nimittaṃ manasā gaṇhantena.
tika-abh08t0:2193_1: Idāni nimittaggahaṇopāyaṃ dassetuṃ “na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2193_2: Na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo soti yo tattha pathavīkasiṇe aruṇavaṇṇo,
tika-abh08t0:2193_3: so na cintetabbo vaṇṇavasena manasikaroto vaṇṇakasiṇabhāvūpagamanato.
tika-abh08t0:2193_4: Cakkhuviññāṇena pana gahitaggahaṇaṃ na sakkā vāretuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2193_5: tenevettha “na oloketabbo”ti avatvā “manasānupekkhitā hotī”tiādīsu viya manasā cintanavasena pekkhanaggahaṇaṃ kataṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2193_6: Daṭṭhabbaṃ na ca lakkhaṇanti yaṃ tattha pathavīdhātuyā thaddhalakkhaṇaṃ na manasikātabbaṃ tassa manasikāre dhātukammaṭṭhānassa gahitattā.
tika-abh08t0:2193_7: Vaṇṇaṃ pana amuñcitvāti disvā gahetabbattā pana vaṇṇaṃ amuñcitvā.
tika-abh08t0:2193_8: Ussadassa vasena hi cittaṃ paṇṇattidhammasminti pathavīdhātuyā sattito adhikabhāvena sasambhārapathaviyā “pathavī”ti vohāro,
tika-abh08t0:2193_9: tasmiṃ sasambhārapathaviṃ upādāya paññatte paṇṇattidhamme ādāsatalagatamukhanimitte viya cittaṃ ṭhapetvā.
tika-abh08t0:2193_10: Ekaggamānasoti puna nānārammaṇe cittaṃ avisāretvā ekaggamānaso hutvā.
tika-abh08t0:2193_11: Pathavī pathaviccevaṃ vatvāti ettha paṭhamasamannāhāre kassaci vacībhedopi siyāti vuttanti ācariyadhammapālatthero āha.
tika-abh08t0:2194_4: Atha vā kiṃ pathavīnāmeyeva vutte bhāvanā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2194_6: Ekaṃ vattumpi vaṭṭatīti etesu yaṃ icchati,
tika-abh08t0:2194_7: taṃ attano paguṇatāya vā pacuratāya vā āgacchantaṃ ekaṃ vattuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:2195_2: tāva soti yāva vakkhamānākārena uggahanimittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2195_3: tāva kiñci kālaṃ cakkhuṃ ummīlitvā nimittaggahaṇavasena pathavīmaṇḍalaṃ oloketvā puna kiñci kālaṃ cakkhūni
tika-abh08t0:2195_4: nimīlitvāti evaṃ vārasatampi vārasahassampi tato bhiyyopi ummīlitvā so yogī āvajjeyya,
tika-abh08t0:2196_1: Āpāthaṃ tu yāti ceti yadi manodvārikajavanānaṃ gocarabhāvaṃ upagacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2196_2: taṃ uggahanimittaṃ tadā uppannanti pavuccatīti yojanā.
tika-abh08t0:2196_5: Samīpaṭṭhena ca na sakkā anoloketunti vuttaṃ “nisīditabbaṃ no ceva”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2197_2: dhovaneti passāvādinā kenaci karaṇīyena nisinnaṭṭhānato aññattha gantvā puna āgamma nisīdantena pādā dhovitabbā honti.
tika-abh08t0:2197_3: Adhotapādena hi senāsanaṃ akkamato āpatti hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2197_4: khaṇe khaṇe pādadhovane ca papañco hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2197_5: tasmā tassa parihāratthaṃ dve upāhanāyeva icchitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2197_9: Tathā “parissayavinodanatthaṃ kattaradaṇḍo ca icchitabbo”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2197_10: Asappāyena kenacīti vakkhamānena āvāsādiasappāyesu kenacideva asappāyena.
tika-abh08t0:2197_12: Ādāya taṃ punāti yathājātaṃ uggahanimittaṃ puna gahetvā,
tika-abh08t0:2198_1: Pīṭhe sukhanisinnenāti puna vasanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vuttaniyāmena pīṭhe sukhanisinnena.
tika-abh08t0:2198_5: Takkāhatanti “takkanato takko”ti evaṃ laddhanāmena bhāvanācittasampayuttena sammāsaṅkappena āhananapariyāhananakiccena
tika-abh08t0:2199_1: Taṃ icchatīti taṃ nimittaṃ manasikātuṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t0:2199_2: Evaṃ karontassāti evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ takkāhataṃ karontassa.
tika-abh08t0:2199_5: evaṃ karoto pana yadā saddhādīni indriyāni suvisadāni tikkhāni pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:2199_6: tadā assaddhiyādīnaṃ dūrībhāvena sātisayaṃ thāmappattehi sattahi balehi laddhupatthambhāni vitakkādīni
tika-abh08t0:2199_8: Tato ca tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtā kāmacchandādayo saddhiṃ tadekaṭṭhehi pāpadhammehi dūrībhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:2199_12: yoginoti tassa yogino paṭibhāganimittaṃ ārabbha uppannaupacārasamādhinā upacārajjhānena cittampi samādhiyati,
tika-abh08t0:2199_13: paṭibhāganimittampi uppajjati upacārajjhānassa tena vinā abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2200_4: Balākā viya toyadeti meghasamīpe balākā viya.
tika-abh08t0:2200_5: Sā hi meghassa nīlattā sayaṃ atiparisuddhā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2200_11: idaṃ pana vuttanayena tatopi sataguṇaṃ sahassaguṇaṃ suvisuddhaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhātīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2200_23: kevalaṃ samādhilābhino bhāvanāvisesajanitaṃ tammayaṃ upaṭṭhānākāramattameva bhāvanāvisesānubhāvena upaṭṭhātīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2201_1: Vikkhambhitāneva sannisinnāneva na puna tadatthaṃ ussāho kātabboti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2201_2: Paṭibhāganimitte hi uppajjamāneyeva taṃvisayaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ nīvaraṇe vikkhambhentameva uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2201_3: Kilesā sannisinnāvāti avasesā tadekaṭṭhakilesā ca sammadeva nisinnā,
tika-abh08t0:2201_5: “Upacārasamādhinā”ti vutte itaropi samādhi atthīti atthato āpannanti tampi dassetuṃ “ākārehi pana dvīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2201_8: Idāni tāni kāraṇāni samādhiavatthāmukhena dassetuṃ “upacārakkhaṇe”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2201_14: Upacārakkhaṇe yadipi jhānaṅgāni paṭutarāni mahaggatabhāvappattāni na honti,
tika-abh08t0:2201_16: paṭilābhabhūmiyampi appanāpattānaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ pātubhāvena samādhiyatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2202_2: na cāti upacārakkhaṇe aṅgāni na ca thāmajātāni neva bhāvanābalappattāni hontīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2202_4: Tasmāti yasmā aṅgāni thāmajātāni jāyare, tasmā.
tika-abh08t0:2202_5: Appanācittaṃ divasampi pavattatīti yathā nāma balavā puriso āsanā vuṭṭhāya divasampi tiṭṭheyya,
tika-abh08t0:2202_6: evamevaṃ appanāsamādhimhi uppanne jhānacittaṃ sakiṃ bhavaṅgavāraṃ chinditvā uppannaṃ kevalaṃ rattimpi
tika-abh08t0:2202_8: “Appanāpattaṃ divasampi pavattatī”ti vadatā upacārakkhaṇe na tathāti dassitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2202_9: Tattha hi aṅgānaṃ athāmajātattā yathā nāma daharo kumāro ukkhipitvā ṭhapiyamāno punappunaṃ bhūmiyaṃ patati,
tika-abh08t0:2202_10: evamevaṃ cittaṃ kālena nimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2203_1: Teneva pallaṅkenāti yasmiṃ nisinno paṭibhāganimittaṃ adhigacchi,
tika-abh08t0:2203_5: Cakkavattiyagabbhovāti cakkavatti bhavituṃ puññavā gabbho viya.
tika-abh08t0:2203_6: Parihāni na vijjatīti laddhūpacārajjhānassa parihāni na vijjati.
tika-abh08t0:2203_7: Nimitte hi aparihīne tadārammaṇaṃ jhānaṃ aparihīnameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2203_8: nimitte pana ārakkhābhāvena vinaṭṭhe laddhajjhānampi vinassati tadāyattavuttittā.
tika-abh08t0:2204_1: Āvāsoti yasmiṃ āvāse vasantassa anuppannaṃ nimittaṃ nuppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2204_6: tasmā yasmiṃ vihāre bahū āvāsā honti,
tika-abh08t0:2204_7: tattha ekekasmiṃ tīṇi tīṇi divasāni vasitvā yattha cittaṃ ekaggaṃ na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2204_10: so senāsanato atidūre accāsanne pubbadisāya vā pacchimadisāya vā asulabhabhikkho asappāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2204_15: yaṃ nissāya asamāhitaṃ vā cittaṃ na samādhiyati,
tika-abh08t0:2204_16: samāhitaṃ vā thiraṃ na hoti, evarūpo.
tika-abh08t0:2204_17: So hi taṃ kaddamodakamiva acchaṃ udakaṃ malīnameva karoti.
tika-abh08t0:2204_22: Tasmā yaṃ bhojanaṃ vā utuṃ vā sevantassa phāsu na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2204_23: taṃ bhojanaṃ so ca utu asappāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2204_24: Iriyāpathoti ṭhānacaṅkamanādīsu yo imassa asamāhitacittassa samādhānāya,
tika-abh08t0:2204_27: tasmā tampi āvāsaṃ viya tīṇi divasāni upaparikkhitvā vajjetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2205_1: Sappāye satta seveyyāti vuttaviparītavasena sappāye āvāsādike satta seveyya.
tika-abh08t0:2205_4: Evañhi paṭipajjatoti evaṃ vuttappakārena satta asappāye vajjetvā satta sappāye sevanavasena paṭipajjantassa nimittāsevanabahulassa.
tika-abh08t0:2206_1: Yena vinā appanāya kusalo na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2206_4: tannibbattaṃ vā ñāṇaṃ ganthavitthārabhayena idha na dassitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2206_7: evañhi sampādayato appanākosallaṃ appanā sampavattatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2207_5: tasmā cittappavattiākāraṃ bhāvanācittassa līnuddhatādivasena pavattiākāraṃ sallakkhayaṃ upadhārento samataṃ
tika-abh08t0:2208_2: paṭipannabhāvanāmānasaṃ paṭibhāganimitteyeva ṭhapanavasena nimittābhimukhaṃ paṭipādayato tassa yogino.
tika-abh08t0:2208_4: Pathavīkasiṇanti pathavīti bhāvanāvasena upaṭṭhitaṃ tadeva paṭibhāganimittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2208_20: catutthaṃ vā gotrabhūti pavuccati parittagottassa abhibhavanato,
tika-abh08t0:2209_1: Avisesena sabbesaṃ sabbā samaññāti paṭhame naye gahitāgahaṇaṃ hotīti āha “gahitāgahaṇenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2209_3: ekekanāmavasena gahitassa itaranāmavasena aggahaṇato vā nānāvajjanaparikammameva parikammanti adhippāyena “paṭhamaṃ upacāraṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2209_12: Cittaniyāmavasena hi uppajjitabbesu sattasu javanesu chaṭṭhasattamajavanavāragaḷanaṭṭhānabhūtattā bhavaṅgassa āsannaṃ javanaṃ patati.
tika-abh08t0:2209_14: sattamaṃ vā javanaṃ patantaṃ viya hoti parikkhīṇajavanattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2210_1: Atha kimetaṃ vuccati “chaṭṭhe sattame vāpi appanā na jāyatī”ti?
tika-abh08t0:2210_2: Ābhidhammikagodattatthero hi “purimā purimā kusalā dhammā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2210_3: āsevanapaccayena paccayo”ti imaṃ suttaṃ vatvā yathā aladdhāsevanaṃ paṭhamajavanaṃ gotrabhuṃ na uppādeti,
tika-abh08t0:2210_8: sattamampi vā appanā hotīti vadatī”ti imaṃ codanaṃ manasi nidhāya therassa taṃ mataṃ paṭikkhipitvā yathāvuttamatameva
tika-abh08t0:2211_0: Pariyante ṭhātuṃ neva sakkotīti papāte eva patatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2211_1: Appetuṃ na sakkotīti patiṭṭhātuṃ appanāvasena uppajjituṃ na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:2211_2: Na cettha “purimā purimā”tiādisuttapadaṃ sādhakaṃ āsevanapaccayalābhassa balavabhāve anekantikattā.
tika-abh08t0:2211_3: Tathā hi aladdhāsevanāpi paṭhamacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2211_5: tasmā laddhāsevanepi chaṭṭhasattame appanā na hoti āsannabhavaṅgatāya dubbalattāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2211_6: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ sattamajavanacetanā upapajjavedanīyā ānantariyā hoti?
tika-abh08t0:2212_1: panāti ayaṃ appanā ekacittakkhaṇāyeva ekavārameva uppajjitvā nirujjhati,
tika-abh08t0:2212_3: Sattasu hi ṭhānesu kālaparicchedo nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2212_8: rūpārūpabhavesu bhavaṅgaṭṭhāne nirodhassa paccaye nevasaññānāsaññāyatane nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa phalasamāpattiyanti.
tika-abh08t0:2212_12: Tathā hi maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ tiṇṇaṃ upari na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2212_13: nirodhassa paccayo nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ dvinnaṃ upari na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2212_15: sesesu pana catūsu ṭhānesu ekameva cittanti tasmā ekacittakkhaṇikāyeva appanā hotīti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2213_6: Na hi asati paccavekkhaṇe sā hoti nirodhassa paccayabhūtajhānantaramiva,
tika-abh08t0:2213_9: Tassā paccavekkhaṇahetukatāti na na yujjati “paccavekkhaṇahetuka”nti vacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2214_2: ito cito ca bhamantassa cetasoti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2214_6: Atha vā byāpādena ghaṭṭiyamānassa cittassa pamuditabhāvakaraṇato pītiyeva “pāmojja”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:2214_9: Sītalattasabhāvatoti byāpādagginā santāpiyamānassa cittassa nibbāpanavasena sītalattasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:2215_1: Savipphārikabhāvenāti yoniso saṅkappavasena kāmavitakkādiṃ madditvā pavattanato savipphārikasabhāvena.
tika-abh08t0:2215_4: saddena tīsu brahmavihāresu paṭhamajjhānaṃ gahitanti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2215_5: Avūpasantabhāvassāti uddhaccassa sarūpakathanena taṃsahavattino anutāpasabhāvassa kukkuccassāpi sarūpaṃ kathitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2215_9: Tathā ca vuttaṃ ācariyadhammapālattherena “vicāro vicikicchāya paṭipakkho ārammaṇe anumajjanavasena paññāpatirūpakasabhāvattā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2215_11: tassa ca vicāro anumajjanasabhāvavantatāya pīti viya ārammaṇe anivattanto ogāhetvā pavattatīti pītiyā
tika-abh08t0:2215_12: anurūpattā sandehasabhāvattā ārammaṇaṃ anajjhogāhetvā pavattamānāya vicikicchāya paṭipakkhoti atthaṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2216_5: Tattha pubbabhāgapaṭipadāvasena jhānassa paripanthato visujjhanaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhi nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2216_6: sā pana yasmā jhānassa uppādakkhaṇe labbhati,
tika-abh08t0:2216_8: Visodhetabbatādīnaṃ abhāvato jhānapariyāpannāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccanipphattiyā anubrūhanā upekkhānubrūhanā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2216_9: Sā panāyaṃ visesato jhānassa ṭhitikkhaṇe labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:2216_11: Tattha dhammānaṃ anativattanādisādhakassa ñāṇassa kiccanipphattivasena pariyodapanā sampahaṃsanā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2216_12: Sā jhānassa osānakkhaṇe pākaṭā hotīti vuttaṃ “sampahaṃsanā pariyosāna”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2217_2: sampahaṃsanā nāma paccavekkhaṇā”ti evaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhiādike vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh08t0:2217_4: Evañhi sati ajhānadhammehi jhānadhammassa guṇasaṃkittanaṃ nāma kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2217_8: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ bhagavatā “ekattagataṃ cittaṃ paṭipadāvisuddhipakkhantarañceva hoti upekkhānubrūhitañca ñāṇena sampahaṃsita”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2217_9: Ettha hi ekattagataṃ cittanti indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:2218_2: pariyosāne cattārī”ti evaṃ dasaparimāṇehi appanāya lakkhitabbabhāvena lakkhaṇasaṅkhātehi paripanthato visuddhijhānādīhi saṃyuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2219_8: yañca visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimaṃ samathanimittaṃ paṭipajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2219_12: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ ādikalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañca.
tika-abh08t0:2220_11: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ majjhekalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañca.
tika-abh08t0:2221_9: Tena vuccati paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pariyosānakalyāṇañceva hoti lakkhaṇasampannañcā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2222_0: Ettha ca gotrabhucittassa nānāvajjanavīthiyaṃ uppajjanārahaparipanthato visujjhanato tadāgamanavasena
tika-abh08t0:2222_3: Gotrabhucittasseva tathā visuddhattā āvaraṇavirahitaṃ hutvā ekattanayena majjhimasamathanimittasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2222_4: samappavattaṃ appanāsamādhipaṭipajjanaṃ sandhāya “visuddhattā cittaṃ majjhimasamathanimittaṃ paṭipajjatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2222_5: Tathā hi khīrasseva dadhibhāvābhāvepi tadeva khīraṃ dadhisampannantiādīsu viya gotrabhucittassa appanābhāvābhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:2222_7: majjhimaṃ paccanīkavūpasamanato yathā samathasaṅkhātaṃ yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato nimittabhūtaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2222_9: tathā paṭipannattā pana samāhitabhāvūpagamanena ekattanayavaseneva tattha pakkhandanaṃ sandhāya “paṭipannattā tattha cittaṃ pakkhandatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2222_11: Evaṃ tāva purimacitte vijjamānākārassa idha nibbattiyā jhānaṃ uppādakkhaṇe tividhalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2222_12: Yathā hi lokiyavipassanāya kiccanipphattiyā lokuttaramaggo “vipassanā”ti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:2222_13: evaṃ visuddhassa pana tassa puna visodhane byāpārākaraṇato tatramajjhattupekkhākiccavasena puggalassa
tika-abh08t0:2222_15: Appanāsamādhibhāvūpagamanena samathavippaṭipannassa puna samādhāne byāpārākaraṇato vuttaṃ “samathapaṭipannaṃ cittaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2223_0: Evaṃ samathapaṭipannabhāvatoyeva pubbe “kathaṃ nu kho kilesasaṃsaggaṃ pajaheyya”nti paṭipannassa idāni
tika-abh08t0:2223_1: samathapaṭipattiyā tassa pahīnattā pāpamittasaṃsaggaṃ pahāya ekassa viharato sappurisassa viya ekattena
tika-abh08t0:2223_2: upaṭṭhitassa jhānacittassa puna ekattupaṭṭhāne byāpārākaraṇaṃ sandhāya “ekattupaṭṭhānaṃ ajjhupekkhatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2223_3: Evaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhāya kiccavasena jhānaṃ majjhe tividhalakkhaṇasampannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2223_4: Pubbabhāgappavattapārihāriyañāṇena cittassa saṃkilesavodānakaradhammesu ādīnavānisaṃsaṃ disvā yathā tattha
tika-abh08t0:2223_6: tathā bhāvanāya sampahaṃsitattā visodhitattā tatramajjhattupekkhāya vasena anubrūhite citte samādhipaññāsaṅkhātayuganaddhadhammānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2223_7: aññamaññānativattiyā pavattanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “tattha jātānaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2223_8: Saddhāpañcamakānaṃ indriyānaṃ nānākilesehi vimuttattā vimuttivasena ekarasataṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “indriyānaṃ ekarasaṭṭhena sampahaṃsanā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2223_9: Tesaṃ anativattanasampahaṃsanānaṃ anurūpavasena alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ hutvā vīriyassa pavattiṃ sandhāya “tadupagavīriyavāhanaṭṭhena
tika-abh08t0:2223_11: Yā panassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pavattā āsevanā,
tika-abh08t0:2223_14: Evaṃ dhammānaṃ anativattanādibhāvasādhanena pariyodāpakassa ñāṇassa kiccavasena jhānapariyosāne catūhi lakkhaṇehi sampannaṃ nāmāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2224_1: Visodhetvāna pāpaketi pāripanthike dhamme visesena sodhetvā sayaṃ pahānamatte aṭṭhatvā atisayappahānavasena puna sodhetvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2224_5: tasmā ekaṅgulādivasena nimittaṃ vaḍḍhayantassa punappunaṃ bahulīkārena jhānabhāvanāpi vuḍḍhiṃ viruḷhiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2225_2: Dvīsu ṭhānesu avassaṃ ekattaṃ vaḍḍhetabbanti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:2225_7: yathicchakanti yathā nāma kassako kasitabbaṭṭhānaṃ naṅgalena paricchinditvā paricchedabbhantaraṃ kasituṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ paricchindati,
tika-abh08t0:2225_8: evamevaṃ ekaṅguladvaṅgulativaṅgulacaturaṅgulamattaṃ manasā paricchinditvā paricchinditvā yathāparicchedaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2225_10: gāmanigamajanapadarajjasamuddasīmānañca paricchedavasena vaḍḍhayantena cakkavāḷaparicchedaṃ katvā vā tato vāpi uttari paricchinditvā vaḍḍhetabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2225_15: Evaṃ vaḍḍhitañca taṃ nimittaṃ vaḍḍhitavaḍḍhitaṭṭhāne pathaviyā ukkūlavikūlanadīviduggapabbatavisamesu saṅkusatasamabbhāhataṃ usabhacammaṃ viya hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2226_1: Tasmiṃ pana nimitte pattapaṭhamajjhānena ādikammikena idāneva dutiyajjhānādiadhigamāya ussāhaṃ akatvā
tika-abh08t0:2226_2: tasmiṃyeva paṭhamajjhāne pañcahākārehi suciṇṇavasinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṃ “pattepī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2226_7: Tattha āvajjananti na āvajjanamattameva adhippetaṃ āvajjanavasitāya adhippetattā.
tika-abh08t0:2226_9: Tāni ca kho āvajjanakapparatāya cittābhinīhārassa yathāvajjitavasena honti.
tika-abh08t0:2226_11: sasampayuttassa jhānassa sammā āpajjanaṃ paṭipajjanaṃ samāpatti.
tika-abh08t0:2227_0: Tattha paṭhamajjhānato vuṭṭhāya paṭhamaṃ vitakkaṃ āvajjayato bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ vitakkārammaṇāneva cattāri,
tika-abh08t0:2227_3: tato puna vicārārammaṇaṃ āvajjanaṃ vuttanayeneva javanānīti evaṃ pañcasu jhānaṅgesu paṭipāṭiyā nirantaraṃ cittaṃ pesetuṃ samatthabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2227_5: Samāpajjitukāmatānantaraṃ dvīsu bhavaṅgesu uppannesu bhavaṅgaṃ upacchinditvā uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ samāpajjituṃ samatthatā samāpajjanavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2227_6: Ayañca matthakappattā āvajjanasamāpajjanā satthu yamakapāṭihāriyakāladhammadesanādīsu labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:2227_10: setu viya sīghasotāya nadiyā oghaṃ bhavaṅgavegaṃ upacchinditvā yathāparicchinnakālaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatā,
tika-abh08t0:2227_12: Yathāparicchinnakālaṃ atikkamituṃ adatvā jhānato vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2228_0: Atha vā yathāparicchinnakālato upari gantuṃ adatvā ṭhapanasamatthatā adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2228_1: Paricchinnakālato anto avuṭṭhahitvā yathākālavaseneva vuṭṭhānasamatthatā vuṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2228_2: Atha vā vuttanayeneva paricchinnakālato anūnaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ ṭhapetuṃ samatthatāva adhiṭṭhānavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2228_3: Kālaparicchedaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhitassapi niddālukassa paṭibujjhitvā punappunaṃ niddokkamanaṃ viya vuṭṭhitasamāpattimeva
tika-abh08t0:2229_1: Paccavekkhaṇajavanāneva hi tesaṃ tesaṃ jhānaṅgānaṃ āvajjanānantaraṃ pavattāni,
tika-abh08t0:2229_4: Keci pana jhānaṅgānaṃ apākaṭabhāvepi tesu nirantaraṃ āvajjanāya pavattanasamatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2229_6: Atha vā satipi sattannaṃ javanānaṃ pavattiyaṃ nirantaraṃ āvajjanasamatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2229_7: vasitābalena sattamajavanaṃ appatvā catupañcajavaneheva paccavekkhaṇasamatthatā paccavekkhaṇavasitā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2229_8: Atha vā ñāṇavippayuttacittehi paccavekkhituṃ asamatthabhāvepi “paccavekkhissāmī”ti uppannaāvajjanānantarameva
tika-abh08t0:2229_9: bhavaṅgesu kālaṃ avītināmetvā sīghameva āvajjituṃ samatthatā āvajjanavasitā nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2229_11: paccavekkhaṇabalena ñāṇavippayuttacittehipi paccavekkhituṃ samatthatā paccavekkhaṇavasitā nāmāti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2229_12: Yasmā panetā yathāvuttaniyāmena punappunaṃ āvajjanādinā sādhetabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2230_3: Paccavekkhaṇabahulassa hi jhānaṅgāni thūlāni dubbalāni hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:2230_4: athassa tāni eva upaṭṭhitattā upari ussukkanāya paccayataṃ nāpajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2230_5: so appaguṇe jhāne ussukkamāno paṭhamajjhānāva parihāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2230_8: Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti puna paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjituṃ na sakkotīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2231_0: “Idhekacco bhikkhu bālo abyatto akhettaññū akusalo vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2231_1: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharati,
tika-abh08t0:2232_2: carantīti ārammaṇavasena kāmasahagatā hutvā saññā ceva manasikārā ca samudācaranti.
tika-abh08t0:2232_6: Kāmānupakkhandānaṃ saññāmanasikārānaṃ vasena hānaṃ parihāniṃ bhajatīti hānabhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2232_7: Keci pana “saṃkilesanti hānabhāgiyo dhammo’ti vacanato hānabhāgiyā kāmasaññādikāti tehi parihāpiyamānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2232_9: Tadanudhammatā satīti tasseva jhānassa anudhammatā ārammaṇavasena tadanugatā satipatirūpakā nikanti.
tika-abh08t0:2232_10: Atakkasahitāti avitakkaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ pattukāmassa taṃ santato,
tika-abh08t0:2232_12: Visesabhāgiyanti visesabhūtassa dutiyajjhānassa padaṭṭhānatāya taṃ bhajatīti visesabhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2233_3: Thūlaṃ nāma vipulampi pheggu viya sukhabhañjanīyanti āha “thūlattā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2233_7: Santato cintayitvāti paṭhamajjhāne viya oḷārikaṅgānaṃ abhāvato,
tika-abh08t0:2233_8: santadhammasamaṅgitāya ca santanti evaṃ santavasena manasi katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2233_9: Kiñcāpi hi ye dhammā dutiyajjhāne pītisukhādayo,
tika-abh08t0:2234_1: Sampasādananti sampasādanasaṅkhātāya saddhāya yogato jhānampi sampasādanaṃ nīlavaṇṇayogato nīlavatthaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:2234_4: paṭhamajjhānaṃ vitakkavicārakkhobhena vīcitaraṅgasamākulamiva jalaṃ na suppasannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2234_5: tasmā satipi saddhāya taṃ sampasādananti na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2234_6: Imasmiṃ pana vitakkavicārakkhobhābhāvena laddhokāsā balavatī saddhā,
tika-abh08t0:2234_17: tato jhānapaccavekkhaṇanti idaṃ sabbaṃ vuttāvasesaṃ heṭṭhā paṭhamajjhāne vuttanayeneva samupalakkhitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2235_2: Uppilāpananti kāmañcāyaṃ pariggahesu apariccattapemassa anādīnavadassino taṇhāsahagatāya pītiyā pavattiākāro,
tika-abh08t0:2235_4: tathāpi sabbaso pītiyaṃ avirattassāpi anubandheyyāti uppilāpanaṃ idha ādīnavavasena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2235_5: Atha vā dutiyajjhānasseva tatiyajjhānaṃ viya ahutvā uppilāpanākārena pavatti uppilāpanaṃ viyāti uppilāpananti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2236_7: yebhuyyena pana avippayogībhāvena pavattamānesu pītisukhesu pītisaṅkhātassa oḷārikaṅgassa pahāne sukhumatāya
tika-abh08t0:2236_8: idha sātisayo satisampajaññabyāpāroti idheva satisampajaññasampannatā vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2236_10: Sā panesā dutiyajjhānassa vitakkavicārā viya appanākkhaṇeyeva pahīyati.
tika-abh08t0:2237_2: Tañca pana somanassaṃ ekavīthiyaṃ purimajavanesuyeva pahīyati.
tika-abh08t0:2238_1: Purimajjhānesu parikammādivasena pavattānaṃ kāmāvacarajavanānaṃ ekasadisattā idha labbhamānaṃ kañci visesaṃ dassetuṃ “yasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2238_2: Āsevanaṃ na hotīti āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2238_4: yasmā padantarasaṅgahitassa attano sabhāvaggāhāpanasaṅkhātaāsevanapaccayattābhāvato sukhavedanā upekkhāvedanāya āsevanapaccayena paccayo na hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2239_1: Evaṃ catukkanayavasena jhānappabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni pañcakanayampi dassetuṃ “yaṃ catukkanaye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2239_2: Dvidhā pana katvānāti vitakkavicārānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pahānaṅgavasena gaṇanato dvidhā katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2239_3: Dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ katanti avitakkavicāramattaṃ avitakkaavicāranti evaṃ dutiyajjhānañceva tatiyajjhānañca kataṃ abhidhammeti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2239_4: Suttantesu hi pañcakanayo sarūpato na gahito,
tika-abh08t0:2239_7: sannisinnadevaparisāya hi yesaṃ paṭhamajjhāne vitakko eva oḷārikato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2239_9: tesaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ avitakkavicāramattaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ katvā pañcakanayena desesi.
tika-abh08t0:2239_11: tato tesaṃ avitakkaavicāraṃ tivaṅgikaṃ katvā catukkanayena desesi.
tika-abh08t0:2239_13: tehi taṃ atikkamitvā caturaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t0:2239_15: tehi dvepi ekato atikkamitvā tivaṅgikaṃ dutiyajjhānaṃ uppādetuṃ sakkā.
tika-abh08t0:2240_2: tatoyeva varataraṃ vacanaṃ yassa soyaṃ sumadhuravarataravacano.
tika-abh08t0:2240_6: nīyoyanti atitikhiṇabuddhippasādehi janehi vedanīyo ayaṃ gantho,
tika-abh08t0:2246_1: Evaṃ pathavīkasiṇavasena catukkapañcakajjhānāni dassetvā yasmā sesakasiṇavasena niddisiyamāne ganthagāravo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2246_2: tasmā taṃ sabbaṃ ṭhapetvā arūpāvacaraṃ vibhāvetuṃ “rūpārūpa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2247_1: Yasmā ayaṃ arūpāvacarasamādhi nāma rūpavirāgabhāvanā rūpavirāgavaseneva abhinipphādetabbāva,
tika-abh08t0:2247_3: virattamānasena ca tadatthāya paṭipajjanavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “rūpe kho”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2247_11: Rūpe ādīnavaṃ disvāti karajarūpādioḷārikarūpe tannidānaṃ dosaṃ disvā.
tika-abh08t0:2247_15: Nanu cāyaṃ rūpe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ samatikkamatthāya paṭipajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2247_16: paṭibhāganimittañca arūpaṃ paṇṇattimattattāti kathaṃ tasmā nibbijjatīti anuyogaṃ sandhāya opammavasena tamatthaṃ dassento āha “sūkarābhihatova sā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2247_17: Yathā hi vane sūkarena pahatamatto sunakho tato bhīto rūpadassanavelāyaṃ bhattapacanaukkhaliṃ dūrato
tika-abh08t0:2247_18: disvā sūkarapaṭibhāgatāya tassaṃ sūkarāsaṅkaṃ uppādetvā utrasto palāyateva,
tika-abh08t0:2247_19: evameva rūpe nibbindamānaso taṃ atikkamitukāmo tappaṭibhāge kasiṇarūpepi nibbijjati,
tika-abh08t0:2248_1: Catutthe pana jhānasminti ṭhapetvā paricchinnākāsakasiṇaṃ navasu pathavīkasiṇādīsu aññatarasmiṃ paṭiladdhacatutthajjhāne.
tika-abh08t0:2248_2: Keci pana ālokakasiṇampi ṭhapetvā aṭṭhasūti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2248_3: Tassa pana ṭhapane kāraṇaṃ na dissati.
tika-abh08t0:2248_4: Suṭṭhu ciṇṇo carito atippaguṇikato āvajjanādilakkhaṇo vasībhāvo etenāti suciṇṇavasī.
tika-abh08t0:2248_6: yatoti yasmā idaṃ catutthajjhānacittaṃ mayā nibbindakasiṇarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti.
tika-abh08t0:2248_8: Thūlasantavimokkhatoti santavimokkhasaṅkhātaarūpajjhānato etaṃ yato thūlaṃ oḷārikaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2248_9: Arūpajjhānañhi ye te santā vimokkhā atikkamma rūpe āruppantiādīsu “santavimokkha”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:2249_5: sukhumato ca manasikāro siddhova hotīti na te visuṃ gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:2249_9: Tena naṃ ugghāṭetvā pacchā na vaḍḍhitabbanti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2249_10: Na hi taṃ pacchā vaḍḍhanatthāya vāyamiyamānampi vaḍḍhatīti.
tika-abh08t0:2250_0: Idānissa ugghāṭanākāraṃ dassetuṃ “ākāso iti vā”tiādiṃ vatvā puna taṃ samatthetuṃ “ugghāṭento hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2250_3: Na saṃvelletīti kaṭasārakakilañjādayo viya na paṭisaṃharati.
tika-abh08t0:2250_5: Aññadatthu tena phuṭṭhokāsaṃ vuttanayena manasikarontoyevāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2250_7: rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇarūpaṃ sabbena sabbaṃ amanasikaroto,
tika-abh08t0:2250_8: tena ca phuṭṭhokāsaṃ “ākāso ākāso”ti manasikaroto yadā taṃ bhāvanānubhāvena ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2251_1: Evaṃ kasiṇugghāṭanavasena paṭiladdhe ākāsanimitte puna paṭipajjanavidhiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2251_4: Ākāsassa animittabhāvepi nimittena phuṭṭhokāsabhāvato “nimitta”nti vuttaṃ. Pañca…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2251_5: vikkhambhantīti nanu rūpāvacarapaṭhamajjhānassa upacārakkhaṇeyeva nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhitāni,
tika-abh08t0:2251_6: tato paṭṭhāya ca na tesaṃ pariyuṭṭhānaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t0:2251_10: imassa pana jhānassa vaṇṇabhaṇanavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ yathā aññatthāpi heṭṭhā pahīnānaṃ upari pahānavacananti.
tika-abh08t0:2251_11: Ye pana “sabbe kusalā dhammā sabbesaṃ akusalānaṃ paṭipakkhāti katvā evaṃ vutta”nti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:2251_12: tehi dutiyajjhānūpacārādīsu nīvaraṇavikkhambhanāvacanassa kāraṇaṃ vattabbaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2251_16: Na hi mahaggatakusalesu lokuttarakusalaṃ viya odhiso pahānaṃ nāma atthi.
tika-abh08t0:2251_18: so bhāvanāvisesena santatarappaṇītatarabhāvena tesuyeva purimapurimehi pacchimapacchimānaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2251_20: “sesāni kāmāvacarānī”tiādīsu pana idha yaṃ vattabbaṃ avuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2252_1: “Puna bhāvetukāmenā”ti vutte paṭhamameva paṭhamāruppassa bhāvitattā kiṃ bhāvetukāmenāti anuyoge “dutiyāruppamānasa”nti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2252_4: Rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ anatikkamitvā anadhigantabbato taṃ manasikārasamudācārassa hānabhāgiyabhāvāvahanato
tika-abh08t0:2252_8: paṇītabhāvasiddhito ca paṭhamāruppato dutiyāruppaṃ santatarasabhāvanti āha “dutiyāruppa…pe… panā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2252_11: Viññāṇamiccevaṃ manasā kātabbanti viññāṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ iccevaṃ manasā kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2252_12: kevalaṃ anantaṃ anantanti na manasi kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2252_15: Anantaṃ viññāṇaṃ anantaṃ viññāṇanti pana manasi kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
tika-abh08t0:2253_1: Tasmiṃ pana nimittasminti tasmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇasaṅkhāte viññāṇanimitte.
tika-abh08t0:2253_3: Ākāsaphuṭaviññāṇeti kasiṇugghāṭimākāsaṃ pharitvā pavatte paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ārammaṇabhūte.
tika-abh08t0:2253_5: Sabhāvadhammepi ārammaṇasamatikkamabhāvanāvisesabhāvato idaṃ appanāpattaṃ hoti catutthāruppaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:2253_8: cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni upekkhāvedanāsampayuttāneva honti.
tika-abh08t0:2253_10: pañcamaṃ vā āruppamānasantiādinā appanānayo paṭhamāruppajjhāne vuttanayova.
tika-abh08t0:2253_11: Pharitvā pavattaviññāṇanti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ viññāṇañcanti vuccatīti ruḷhīsaddavasena vuttabhāvameva pakāsetuṃ “viññāṇā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2253_13: Pubbe anantassa ākāsassa ārammaṇakaraṇavasena anantatāya “viññāṇañca”nti vuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:2253_14: Puna manasikāravasena vā anantatāya tathā vuttanti dassetuṃ “manakkāravasenāpī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2253_15: Dutiyāruppaṃ bhāvento hi paṭhamāruppaṃ anantato anavasesato manasi karonto anantanti manasi karoti.
tika-abh08t0:2254_1: Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvoti kasiṇaṃ ugghāṭetvā ākāso viya ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ pahāya tassa abhāvo manasi kātabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2254_2: Kasmā panettha dutiyāruppaviññāṇābhāvaṃ amanasikatvā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvo manasi kātabboti? Vuccate –
tika-abh08t0:2254_5: Tathā ca sati ārammaṇeyeva sātisayaṃ dosadassanena taṃ samatikkamitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2254_7: tasmā kasiṇe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ ugghāṭetvā tabbivittākāsassa viya paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe ādīnavaṃ disvā taṃ pahāya tadabhāvasseva manasikaraṇaṃ yuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:2254_9: te pana imesaṃ ārammaṇātikkamanavasena pattabbabhāvaṃ asallakkhetvā kathenti.
tika-abh08t0:2254_11: aññattha dosaṃ disvā aññassa samatikkame atippasaṅgadosato na muccanti.
tika-abh08t0:2255_3: sato vuṭṭhahitvā taññeva viññāṇaṃ bhāvetī’ti vacanato viññāṇañcāyatanābhāvoyeva manasi kātabbo”ti,
tika-abh08t0:2255_5: Na hettha taññeva viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ adhippetaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2255_7: viññāṇañcāyatananti tassa padhānabhāvena niddiṭṭhattā taññevāti vacaneneva pariyattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2255_10: evaṃ sati taññeva viññāṇañcāyatananti vuttaṃ siyā,
tika-abh08t0:2255_11: tasmā viññāṇanti vacanena yaṃ ārabbha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pavattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2256_1: Paṭhamāruppaviññāṇābhāvomanasikātabboti vatvā manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “taṃ panā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2256_2: Akatvā manasāti manasā ārammaṇaṃ akatvā sabbena sabbaṃ taṃ acintetvā.
tika-abh08t0:2256_3: “Ākāsaṃ ākāsa”nti manasi karontassa kasiṇavivittākāsaṃ viya “natthi natthī”ti,
tika-abh08t0:2256_4: “suññaṃ suñña”nti vā manasi karontassa viññāṇavivittaṃ abhāvamattameva upaṭṭhātīti āha “natthī”tiādi. Vā-
tika-abh08t0:2256_6: tena dvīsu pakāresu ekenapi atthasiddhi hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2256_9: Aniyamo panettha tiṇṇampi visuṃ visuṃ pariyāyabhāvatova siddho.
tika-abh08t0:2256_10: Pariyāyasaddā hi visuṃ visuṃyeva atthaṃ sādhentā pariyāyāti loke niruḷhā. Yathāhu –
tika-abh08t0:2259_1: Tasmiṃ nimitteti paṭhamāruppaviññāṇassa abhāvasaṅkhāte jhānuppattikāraṇabhūte nimitte.
tika-abh08t0:2259_2: Sati santiṭṭhatīti abhāvanimittārammaṇā sati sammā suppatiṭṭhitā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:2259_3: Satisīsena cettha upacārajjhānānuguṇānaṃ saddhāpañcamānaṃ indriyānaṃ sakiccayogaṃ dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2259_4: Upacārajjhānaṃ pana “bhiyyopi samādhiyati mānasa”nti iminā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2259_6: abhāvaketi evaṃ pavattaviññāṇassa natthibhāvasaṅkhāte vināsābhāvake na pure abhāvādike.
tika-abh08t0:2259_7: Appanānayo panettha pathavīkasiṇe vuttanayānusārena veditabboti āha “appanāya nayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2260_2: taṃ atidisitvā idāni visesaṃ dassetuṃ “ākāsagataviññāṇa”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2260_3: Parikammamanakkāre tasmiṃ antarahiteti “natthi natthī”ti pavattaparikammamanasikāre amanasikaraṇena asmiṃ paṭhamāruppaviññāṇe antarahite,
tika-abh08t0:2260_6: Khaṇabhaṅgavasena hi antaradhānaṃ khaṇe khaṇe upalabbhati.
tika-abh08t0:2260_7: Parihānivasena ca antaradhāne puna taṃ anuppādetvā uttari ñāṇādhigamoyeva natthīti.
tika-abh08t0:2260_8: Tassāpagamamattaṃva passanto vasatīti tassa paṭhamāruppassa abhāvamattaṃ passanto so yogāvacaro viharati.
tika-abh08t0:2260_11: yathā nāma koci puriso maṇḍalamāḷādīsu katthaci kenacideva karaṇīyena sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā
tika-abh08t0:2260_12: katthaci gantvā sannipātakiccāvasāne uṭṭhāya pakkantesu bhikkhūsu puna taṃ ṭhānaṃ gantvā olokento suññameva passati,
tika-abh08t0:2260_15: yathā so puriso sannipatitaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ disvā gato,
tika-abh08t0:2260_16: tato sabbesu bhikkhūsu apagatesu taṃ ṭhānaṃ tehi suññameva passati,
tika-abh08t0:2260_18: evamayaṃ yogāvacaro pubbe viññāṇañcāyatanajjhānacakkhunā paṭhamāruppaviññāṇaṃ disvā natthīti manasikārena
tika-abh08t0:2260_19: tasmiṃ apagate tatiyāruppacakkhunā tassa natthibhāvameva passati,
tika-abh08t0:2260_20: na tassa apagatakāraṇaṃ vīmaṃsati jhānassa tādisābhogābhāvatoti.
tika-abh08t0:2261_2: na ca santanti yathā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanacittaṃ saṅkhārāvasesasukhumabhāvappattiyā savisesaṃ santaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2261_3: evamayaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti na ca santā tadabhāvatoti adhippāyo. Ca-
tika-abh08t0:2261_14: Vibhaṅgepi hi taṃyeva ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ santato manasi karotīti ayameva bhāvanākāro gahito.
tika-abh08t0:2261_15: Apare pana “pāḷiyaṃ imassa bhāvanākāro na gahito”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:2263_8: Asati ca ādīnavadassane na samatikkamo eva siyāti “santato ce manakkāro kathañca samatikkamo”ti āha.
tika-abh08t0:2263_15: Tathā hesa kiñcāpi taṃ santato manasi karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2263_17: samāpajjissāmī”ti ābhogo samannāhāro na hoti. Kasmā?
