tika-abh08t0:2263_19: Yathā hi rājā mahatā rājānubhāvena nagaravīthiyaṃ caranto dantakārādayo kammakāre cheke anekāni dantavikatiādīni
tika-abh08t0:2263_20: sippāni karonte disvā “aho vata re chekā ācariyā,
tika-abh08t0:2263_21: īdisāni sippāni karissantī”ti evaṃ tesaṃ chekatāya tussati,
tika-abh08t0:2263_22: na cassa evaṃ hoti “aho vatāhampi rajjaṃ pahāya evarūpo sippiko bhaveyya”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2263_25: so tesaṃ jīvitaṃ tiṇāyapi amaññamāno te samatikkamitvā gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2264_2: paṭhamajjhānūpacārato paṭṭhāya hi tacchentiyā viya pavattamānāya bhāvanāya anukkamena saṅkhārā tattha antimakoṭṭhāsataṃ pāpitāti.
tika-abh08t0:2264_3: Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ bhāvanā attano kiccaṃ sādheti,
tika-abh08t0:2264_4: nanu cesā tadavatthaṃ pāpitā ārammaṇaṃ na sammā upanijjhāyatīti?
tika-abh08t0:2264_6: Bhāvanābalena sukhumabhāvaṃ pāpitāpi cesā attano kicce dubbalattaṃ na pāpitā,
tika-abh08t0:2264_8: tena tathā sukhumāpi attano kicce na dubbalā evāti na tattha tassā asāmatthiyaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2265_3: Nevasaññī ca nāsaññī hoti nevasaññānāsaññāsamaṅgī hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2265_4: Na kevalaṃ tu saññāva edisī sukhumā nevasaññānāsaññā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2265_14: kathaṃ nāsaññāti anuyogaṃ sandhāya imamatthaṃ upamāhi sādhetuṃ “pattamakkhanatelenā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2265_15: Tattha pattamakkhaṇatelenāti antovutthatāya yāguyā saddhiṃ akappiyaṭṭhena telaṃ atthīti,
tika-abh08t0:2265_16: nāḷipūrādīnaṃ vasena natthīti ca vattabbena patte makkhitatelena.
tika-abh08t0:2265_17: Maggasmiṃ udakena cāti upāhanatemanamattaṭṭhena udakaṃ atthīti,
tika-abh08t0:2265_18: nahānavasena natthīti ca vattabbena maggasmiṃ udakena.
tika-abh08t0:2266_1: Ayaṃ atthoti kiñci visesaṃ upādāya sabhāvato atthīti vattabbasseva dhammassa kiñci visesaṃ upādāya natthīti vattabbatāsaṅkhāto ayamattho.
tika-abh08t0:2266_5: Ārammaṇasañjānanañceva vipassanāya visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananañca paṭusaññākiccaṃ kathamayaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2266_6: saññāva samānā saññākiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti āha “yathā dahanakicca”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2266_7: Nhātukāmassa uṇhasītabhāvaṃ akatvā sukhajananatāya sukhodakaṃ, tasmiṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2266_8: Tejodhātu yathā dahanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:2266_9: evamesā atisantārammaṇe pavattattā ārammaṇasañjānanaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:2266_11: Teneva hesā akatābhinivesassa vipassanāñāṇena sukhaggayhā na hotīti sesasamāpattīsu saññā viya vipassanāya
tika-abh08t0:2266_12: visayabhāvaṃ upagantvā nibbidājananampi kātuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:2266_13: aññesu hi khandhesu akatavipassanābhiniveso bhikkhu nevasaññānāsaññāyatanakkhandhe sammasitvā nibbidaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2266_15: Pakativipassako pana sāriputtasadiso bhikkhu khandhādimukhena vipassanaṃ abhinivisitvā dvārārammaṇehi
tika-abh08t0:2266_16: saddhiṃ dvārappavattadhammānaṃ vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā ṭhito sakkuṇeyya tabbisayaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādetuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2266_19: Na hi sāriputtasadiso bhikkhu catutthāruppapariyāpannesu phassādidhammesu vinibbhujitvā visuṃ visuṃ sarūpato
tika-abh08t0:2266_21: Kevalaṃ pana avinibbhujja ekato gahetvā kalāpato samūhatoyeva sammasituṃ samattho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2267_6: Attanā vuttamatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāvacanaṃ āharitvā sādhento “āha cā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2267_8: Pacchimā pacchimā samāpattiyo hi purimāpurimāhi samāpattīhi supaṇītatarā suṭṭhu paṇītatarā,
tika-abh08t0:2267_10: Pāsādatalasāṭikāti catubhūmakapāsādassa heṭṭhimaheṭṭhimato uparūpari savisesā pañca kāmaguṇā,
tika-abh08t0:2267_11: cattāro pāsādatalā ca thūlasaṇhasaṇhatarasaṇhatamasuttehi vihitā āyāmavitthārato samappamāṇā sāṭikā ca.
tika-abh08t0:2268_2: atha vā nīvaraṇe abhibhuyya rūpārūpabhavaṃ yātīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2274_5: Arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ appaṭiladdhopi hi katādhikāro bhikkhu abhiññā sampādetuṃ samattho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2274_6: Ettha catutthajjhānaggahaṇeneva heṭṭhā tīṇi jhānāni gahitāni.
tika-abh08t0:2274_7: Tesu hi aciṇṇavasī catutthajjhānaṃ uppādetumpi na sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:2274_8: Abhiññāsu anuyogaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vatvā tattha payojanaṃ dassetuṃ “abhiññā nāmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2274_9: Niṭṭhaṅgatāti adhigatānisaṃsatāya ceva bhāvanāsukhatāya ca niṭṭhaṃ nipphattiṃ gatā.
tika-abh08t0:2274_11: So abhiññāya ca samādhinā ca samannāgato sukheneva paññābhāvanaṃ sampādessati.
tika-abh08t0:2275_5: Imā pana abhiññāyo pattukāmena ādikammikena yoginā yasmā odātakasiṇapariyantesu aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu catutthajjhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2275_6: tabbasena ca arūpasamāpattiyo nibbattetvā vā na vā kasiṇānulomatādīhi cuddasahi ākārehi cittaṃ dametabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2275_7: Na hi evaṃ adametvā pubbe abhāvitabhāvano ādikammiko yogāvacaro pañca abhiññāyo nipphādessatīti tasmā
tika-abh08t0:2275_8: taṃ cittaparidamanaṃ avassaṃ kātabbanti dassetuṃ “kasiṇānulomatādīhī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2275_9: Kasiṇānulomatādīhīti kasiṇānulomatā kasiṇapaṭilomatā kasiṇānulomapaṭilomatā jhānānulomatā jhānapaṭilomatā
tika-abh08t0:2275_10: jhānānulomapaṭilomatā jhānukkantikatā kasiṇukkantikatā jhānakasiṇukkantikatā aṅgasaṅkantikatā ārammaṇasaṅkantikatā
tika-abh08t0:2275_11: aṅgārammaṇasaṅkantikatā aṅgavavatthāpanatā ārammaṇavavatthāpanatāti imehi cuddasahi ākārehi.
tika-abh08t0:2276_0: Tattha aṭṭhasu kasiṇesu paṭipāṭiyā satakkhattuṃ sahassakkhattumpi samāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2276_2: paṭipāṭiuppaṭipāṭivasena ca samāpajjananti imesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ākārānaṃ vasena kasiṇānulomatādayo vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2277_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva tatiyaṃ samāpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2277_2: tato ākiñcaññāyatananti evaṃ kasiṇaṃ anokkamitvā jhānasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ jhānukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2277_4: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā puna tadeva tejokasiṇe,
tika-abh08t0:2277_6: tato lohitakasiṇeti jhānaṃ anukkamitvā kasiṇasseva ekantarikabhāvena ukkamanaṃ kasiṇukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2277_10: lohitakasiṇato ākiñcaññāyatananti iminā nayena jhānassa ceva kasiṇassa ca ukkamanaṃ jhānakasiṇukkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2278_0: Pathavīkasiṇe paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tattheva itaresampi samāpajjanaṃ aṅgasaṅkantikatā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2279_0: Paṭhamajjhānaṃ nāma pañcaṅgikanti vavatthapetvā dutiyaṃ caturaṅgikaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2279_4: nevasaññānāsaññāyatananti evaṃ jhānaṅgamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ aṅgavavatthāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2279_6: idaṃ āpokasiṇa”ntiādinā ārammaṇamattasseva vavatthāpanaṃ ārammaṇavavatthāpanaṃ nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2279_8: Aṭṭhakathāsu pana anāgatattā addhā taṃ bhāvanāsukhaṃ na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2279_9: Imehi pana cuddasahi ākārehi cittaparidamanaṃ kātuṃ aṭṭhasamāpattilābhīnaṃ satesu,
tika-abh08t0:2280_4: paccanīkasamanepi abyāvaṭāya tatramajjhattupekkhāya sampāditasatipārisuddhiyā sabbhāvena vā suparisuddhe.
tika-abh08t0:2280_5: Pariyodāteti sudhantasuvaṇṇassa nighaṃsanena viya parisuddhattāyeva pariyodāte,
tika-abh08t0:2280_7: Atha vā vitakkavicārakkhobhavirahavasena pariyodāteti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2280_8: Anaṅgaṇeti “mādisassa samādhisampannassa īdisena bhavitabba”nti evaṃ jhānapaṭilābhapaccayānaṃ “aho vata
tika-abh08t0:2280_9: mameva satthā paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ deseyyā”tiādinayappavattānaṃ pāpakānaṃ icchāvacarānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2280_13: kodho”tiādinā āgatānaṃ cittupakkilesānaṃ vā vigatattā vigatupakkilese.
tika-abh08t0:2280_16: Vasibhāvappattañhi cittaṃ suparimadditaṃ viya cammaṃ suparikammakatā viya ca lākhā mudūti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2280_24: yaṃ evaṃ bhāvitaṃ bahulīkataṃ muduñca hoti kammaniyañca,
tika-abh08t0:2280_32: Mudukammaññabhāvehi vā attano vase ṭhitattā ṭhite,
tika-abh08t0:2281_0: Aṭṭhaṅgasampanneti ṭhitiacalatānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ aggahaṇena samāhiteti visuṃ ekaṅgaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2281_1: Tāsaṃ pana visuṃ visuṃ gahaṇe suvisuddhatādīnaṃ samāhitacittassa aṅgabhūtattā samāhiteti imaṃ aṅgabhāvena
tika-abh08t0:2281_2: aggahetvā suvisuddhatādīhi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi sampannatā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2281_5: Atthato pana iddhividhā nāma ekassa bahubhāvādianekavidhānapaccayabhūtaṃ abhiññāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2281_6: Abhinīharatīti abhiññādhigamatthāya parikammacittaṃ kasiṇārammaṇato apanetvā abhiññābhimukhaṃ peseti.
tika-abh08t0:2284_3: Ettha ca “anupubbena cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitvā catutthajjhānato vuṭṭhāyā”ti keci,
tika-abh08t0:2284_16: punāti ettha pubbe abhiññāpādakajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ parikammacittassa samādhānatthaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2284_18: Adhiṭṭhātīti sataṃ āvajjetvā tato paraṃ pavattānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2284_19: catunnaṃ vā pubbabhāgacittānaṃ anantarā uppannena sanniṭṭhāpanavasena adhiṭṭhānanti laddhanāmena abhiññāñāṇena sanniṭṭhānaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2285_2: Parikammamanānettha satārammaṇikānīti ettha etesu parikammādhiṭṭhānesu parikammamānasāni “sataṃ homī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2285_3: pavattāni kāmāvacaramānasāni satārammaṇikāni ekekassa cittassa vasena satārammaṇikāni honti paccekaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2285_9: Rūpañhi sataṃ vā sahassaṃ vā katvā dassetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2285_11: Ettha ca yadi nīlavaṇṇameva sataṃ abhinipphādeti,
tika-abh08t0:2285_12: vaṇṇassa taṃtaṃsantānavasena nānattepi nīlavasena ekattā ekamekaṃ parikammacittaṃ sabbaṃ nīlajātaṃ ālambati.
tika-abh08t0:2286_3: Adhiṭṭhānacittaṃ pana vaṇṇasāmaññaṃ gahetvāpi parikammārammaṇaṃ nānāvaṇṇavantaṃ abhinipphādeti acinteyyānubhāvattā iddhivisayassa.
tika-abh08t0:2286_13: Na hettha parikammavisesaṃ vinā añño viseso atthi.
tika-abh08t0:2286_14: Appanāya pubbabhāgappavattānipi tīṇi cattāri javanāni gahitaggahaṇena,
tika-abh08t0:2286_15: aggahitaggahaṇena vā parikammopacārānulomāni sabbapacchimaṃ gotrabhunāmakantiādi sesaṃ samānameva.
tika-abh08t0:2287_1: Dibbasotanti devatānaṃ pittasemhādīhi apalibuddhehi dūrepi ārammaṇaggahaṇasamatthehi dibbasotapasādehi samānattā,
tika-abh08t0:2287_6: Idanti yaṃ uddese “dibbāni cakkhusotānī”ti dibbasotaṃ uddiṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2288_1: Paṭhamaṃ oḷārikasaddaṃ āvajjetvā pacchā sukhumasaddassa āvajjitabbato āha “mahanto sukhumopi cā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2288_2: Paricayakaraṇatthañhi paṭhamaṃ araññe sīhādīnaṃ sadde ādiṃ katvā sabbe oḷārikato paṭṭhāya yathānukkamena sukhumasaddā āvajjitabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2288_3: tathā puratthimādīsu disāsu oḷārikānampi sukhumānampi saddānaṃ saddanimittaṃ manasi kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2288_4: Tassa te saddā pakaticittassapi pākaṭā honti,
tika-abh08t0:2288_8: sukhumassa vā saddassa yathāvuttaṃ upādāyupādāya labbhamānaoḷārikasukhumākāraṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2288_9: Manasi kubbatoti “imissā disāya ayaṃ saddo oḷāriko,
tika-abh08t0:2288_10: sukhumo vā”ti evaṃ parikammacittena manasi karontassa.
tika-abh08t0:2288_13: Aññataranti yattha parikammakaraṇavasena abhiṇhaṃ manasikāro pavatto,
tika-abh08t0:2288_15: Yadi abhiññācittampi parikammena gahitameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2288_19: abhiññācittaṃ pana asutampi gaṇhantaṃ savanākārena gahaṇato atthāvabodhassa paccayabhāveneva gaṇhātīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:2289_4: Pādakajjhānassa hi ārammaṇabhūtaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ “ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharatū”ti manasi karitvā pādakajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2289_5: samāpajjantassa kasiṇanimittaṃ tattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:2289_6: So samāpattito vuṭṭhāya puna pādakajjhānaṃ asamāpajjitvāpi anekappabhedepi sadde āvajjati subhāvitabhāvanattā.
tika-abh08t0:2289_7: Tattha aññataraṃ saddaṃ ārabbha uppannāvajjanānantaraṃ cattāri,
tika-abh08t0:2289_11: tattakaṃ tattha gataṃ āvajjitvā abhiññāñāṇena jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:2289_14: So hi taṃ ṭhānagatasaddaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva tato vuṭṭhāya abhiññācittena suṇāti.
tika-abh08t0:2289_17: Iddhividhalābhī pana sesābhiññalābhino viya vijjamānasaddādiārammaṇamattameva akatvā āgantukarūpanimmāpanato
tika-abh08t0:2289_18: sabbathāpi dvikkhattuṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvāva taṃ nipphādeti.
tika-abh08t0:2290_1: Suṇantoti evaṃ paricchinditvā paricchinditvā savanena vasikatābhiñño hutvā yathāvajjite suṇanto.
tika-abh08t0:2290_2: Pāṭiyekkampīti ekajjhaṃ pavattamānepi yāva brahmalokā ekakolāhalaṃ katvā uṭṭhite saṅkhabherīpaṇavādisadde
tika-abh08t0:2291_10: Tasmāti yasmā idaṃ dibbacakkhuvaseneva pavattati, tasmā.
tika-abh08t0:2291_11: Dibbena cakkhunāti dibbasadisatādīhi “dibbacakkhū”ti laddhavohārena dibbacakkhuñāṇena disvāti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2291_14: Yaṃ bahi kamalamakuḷasaṇṭhānaṃ anto kosātakīphalasadisanti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2291_15: Tañhi nissāya idāni vuccamānaṃ lohitaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:2291_16: Hadayavatthu pana imaṃ lohitaṃ nissāya pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:2291_21: Yathā hi yo paro na hoti, so attā,
tika-abh08t0:2291_22: evaṃ yo attā na hoti, so paro.
tika-abh08t0:2291_23: Kathaṃ pana dibbacakkhunā lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena paracittaṃ viññeyyanti āha “somanassayute”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2292_0: Kathaṃ pana citte somanassa sahagatādimhi sati kammajassa lohitassa vividhavaṇṇabhāvāpattīti?
tika-abh08t0:2292_2: taṃ pana lohitaṃ kammajamevāti natthi catusantatirūpassapi tattha labbhamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:2292_5: idaṃ upekkhindriyasamuṭṭhānanti parassa hadayalohitavaṇṇaṃ passitvā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2292_9: Yathā hi gamanādīsu cittajarūpāni utujakammajāhārajarūpehi anuvattīyanti,
tika-abh08t0:2292_12: pasādakodhavelāsu ca cakkhussa vaṇṇabhedāpattiyeva tassatthassa nidassanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2292_15: Disvā hadayalohitanti paṭhamaṃ tāva anumānañāṇena lohitaṃ disvā.
tika-abh08t0:2292_16: Kātabbaṃ thāmataṃ gatanti uppādetvā thāmabhāvaṃ gataṃ kātabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2293_0: Cetopariyañāṇañhi uppādetukāmena yoginā dibbacakkhulābhinā eva satā heṭṭhā vuttanayena rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2293_1: aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvā ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā parassa hadayamaṃsapesiṃ
tika-abh08t0:2293_2: nissāya vattamānassa lohitassa vaṇṇadassanena idāni imassa cittaṃ “somanassasahagata”nti vā “domanassasahagata”nti
tika-abh08t0:2293_3: vā “upekkhāsahagata”nti vā nayaggāhavasena vavatthāpetvā pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “imassa
tika-abh08t0:2293_5: Kālasatampi kālasahassampi punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2293_6: Tassevaṃ dibbena cakkhunā hadayalohitavaṇṇadassanādividhinā paṭipajjantassa “idāni cetopariyañāṇaṃ uppajjissatī”ti
tika-abh08t0:2293_8: taṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ tīṇi cattāri vā javanāni kāmāvacarāni javanti.
tika-abh08t0:2293_11: Tattha yaṃ tena appanācittena sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2293_14: taṃ parassa cittaṃ paccakkhato paṭivijjhantaṃ vibhāventameva hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2293_17: Tato paraṃ pana kāmāvacaracittehi sarāgādivavatthāpanaṃ hoti nīlādivavatthāpanaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:2294_10: Puthujjanassa vasenāyaṃ abhiññākathāti lokuttaracittaṃ idha anuddhaṭaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2294_14: heṭṭhimo pana uparimassa cittaṃ na jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:2294_18: Aṭṭhasamāpattikassa pana vasena idhārūpāvacaracittassāpi jānanaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2294_19: Arahā pana āruppe akatābhinivesopi tappaṭicchādakaavijjāya vihatattā tampi jānātiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:2295_1: Pubbe atītajātīsu nivāsā nivutthā attano santāne pavattā,
tika-abh08t0:2295_2: saparaviññāṇehi gocarāsevanāya āsevitā ca khandhā pubbenivāsā.
tika-abh08t0:2295_3: Paraviññāṇaviññātāpi hi pubbe nivasiṃsu etthāti pubbenivāsāti vuccanti,
tika-abh08t0:2295_5: pubbe nivāsesu sarūpavibhāvakaṃ ñāṇaṃ pubbenivāsañāṇaṃ. Tena.
tika-abh08t0:2295_7: Heṭṭhā tīsu jhānesu yathārahaṃ pītisukhehi kāyacittānaṃ sampīṇanāya cattāri jhānāni samāpajjitabbānīti āha “jhānāni panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2296_2: kkamāti tasmiṃ bhave purimabhavādīsu kataṃ sabbampi saṅgahetvā sabbamāvajjitabbantiādinā visuṃ visuṃ rattindivādivasena dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2296_3: Divase rattiyaṃ katanti sabbapacchimanisajjāto paṭṭhāya āsanapaññāpanaṃ senāsanappavesananti paṭilomena sakalaṃ rattindivaṃ katakiccaṃ āvajjitabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2296_8: Sace panettha kiñci na pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2296_10: ettakena dīpe jalite viya pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2296_11: Pādakajjhānasamāpajjanañhi satthakassa viya nisānasilā satipaññānaṃ nisitabhāvāvahaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2296_13: Purimasmiṃ bhaveti imamhā bhavā anantare purimasmiṃ bhave.
tika-abh08t0:2297_3: Pahoti hi imissā abhiññāya katādhikāro bhikkhu paṭhamavāreneva paṭisandhiṃ ugghāṭetvā cutikkhaṇe nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ kātuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2297_4: tathā asakkontenāpi dhuranikkhepaṃ akatvā pādakajjhānameva punappunaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2297_6: Āvajjantena ca pana paṭhamaṃ rūpaṃ āvajjitvā pacchā nāmaṃ āvajjitabbanti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:2298_0: Tattha pacchimanisajjāto pabhuti yāva paṭisandhito ārammaṇaṃ katvā pavattañāṇaṃ atītajātīsu nivutthadhammārammaṇābhāvato
tika-abh08t0:2298_3: Yadā panassa paṭisandhiṃ atikkamma cutikkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmarūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā manodvārāvajjanaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2299_1: kiṃ ekeneva abhiññācittena cutikkhaṇe pavattanāmarūpaṃ sabbampi ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2299_4: dūrato cittapaṭaṃ pekkhantassa viya anirūpitarūpena vavatthānaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2299_8: Iddhivisayassa hi acinteyyattā ekenapi abhiññācittena nāmarūpe passanto nirūpitarūpeneva passati,
tika-abh08t0:2299_10: aññenapi vā paṭhamameva pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya samāhitacittena kataparikammassa pavattitattā
tika-abh08t0:2299_11: puna samāpajjanaṃ vinā āvajjitvā ārammaṇaṃ karotiyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:2300_3: attanā ca dibbavihārasannissitattā mahājutikatādīhi vā dibbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2300_5: Yathā hi maṃsacakkhu viññāṇādhiṭṭhitaṃ samavisamaṃ ācikkhantaṃ viya pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2300_6: idaṃ pana tato sātisayaṃ cakkhukiccakārīti dibbañca taṃ cakkhu cāti dibbacakkhu,
tika-abh08t0:2300_9: Abhinīhārakkhamaṃ katvāti cuddasavidhena cittaparidamanena aṭṭhaṅgasampannatākaraṇena abhinīhārakkhamaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2300_12: Āsannaṃ kātabbanti dibbacakkhuñāṇuppattiyā samīpabhūtaṃ kāraṇabhūtaṃ kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2300_13: tattha upacārajjhānaṃ paguṇataraṃ katvā taṃ vaḍḍhetvā icchitakkhaṇe upaṭṭhānayogyaṃ katvā ṭhapetabbanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2300_15: Seṭṭhanti paridīpitanti ālokakasiṇasseva pabhāvissajjanasabhāvena ālokakaraṇena itarehi visiṭṭhattā visiṭṭhanti paridīpitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2301_3: Yasmā pādakajjhānaṃ vijjamāneyeva āloke appanāvasena pavattimattaṃ vinā attano balena ālokaṃ pharituṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh08t0:2301_7: Upacārabhūmīti cettha ālokassa thāvarakaraṇavasappavattaṃ parikammacittamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2301_9: Na hi akataparikammassa abhiññāvasena appanā sijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:2301_13: tathā ca sati ālokavaḍḍhanābhāvato rūpadassanaṃ na siyāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2302_2: na bahiddhā vikkhepuppattihetubhāvato passitabbaṃ dibbacakkhunāti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2302_3: Na hi āloke pharitepi maṃsacakkhussa āpāthaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2302_4: Parikammassa vāro hi atikkamati tāvadeti idha parikammaṃ nāma yathāvuttakasiṇārammaṇaṃ upacārajjhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2302_6: kasiṇālokavasena ca rūpagatadassanaṃ kasiṇāloko ca parikammavasenāti tadubhayampi parikammassa appavattiyā na hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2302_8: Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpagatampi na ca dissati,
tika-abh08t0:2303_1: Evaṃ anukkamenāti punappunaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā tato vuṭṭhāya abhiṇhaṃ ālokapharaṇena.
tika-abh08t0:2303_3: tathā ca sati tattha sucirampi rūpagataṃ passateva.
tika-abh08t0:2303_6: Eko kira rattiyaṃ tiṇukkāya maggaṃ paṭipajji,
tika-abh08t0:2303_9: so taṃ tiṇukkaṃ bhūmiyaṃ ghaṃsitvā puna ujjālesi,
tika-abh08t0:2303_11: evaṃ punappunaṃ vijjhātaṃ ujjālayato kamena sūriyo uṭṭhāsi,
tika-abh08t0:2303_12: sūriye uṭṭhite “ukkāya kammaṃ natthī”ti taṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi agamāsi.
tika-abh08t0:2303_14: ukkāya vijjhātāya samavisamānaṃ adassanaṃ viya rūpagataṃ passato parikammassa vārātikkamena āloke antarahite rūpagatānaṃ adassanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_16: ukkāya purimālokato mahantatarālokakaraṇaṃ viya puna parikammaṃ karoto balavatarālokapharaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_17: sūriyuṭṭhānaṃ viya thāmagatālokassa yathāvaḍḍhitaparicchedaṃ pharitvā avaṭṭhānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_18: tiṇukkaṃ chaḍḍetvā divasampi gamanaṃ viya padittālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā thāmagatenālokena divasampi rūpadassanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2303_19: Ettāvatā ca dibbacakkhussa nānāvajjanaparikammañceva dibbacakkhuñāṇañca dassitaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2303_20: na tassa uppattikkamoti taṃ dassetuṃ “uppādanakkamopī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2303_22: Tāni cattāri pañca vāti potthakesu likhanti.
tika-abh08t0:2304_3: Tasmiñhi uppanne maṃsacakkhussa anāpāthayogyaṃ antokucchigataṃ hadayavatthunissitaṃ heṭṭhāpathavītalanissitaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2304_4: tirokuṭṭapabbatapākāragataṃ paracakkavāḷagatanti idaṃ rūpaṃ āpāthaṃ āgacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2304_6: Tadeva cettha rūpaṃ sarūpato vibhāvanasamatthaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ viya.
tika-abh08t0:2304_8: Tāni hi ārammaṇaṃ karontānipi na yāthāvato taṃ vibhāvetvā pavattanti āvajjanasampaṭicchanādicittāni viyāti.
tika-abh08t0:2305_1: Nanu ca anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ yathākammūpagañāṇanti dve abhiññāñāṇāni atthi,
tika-abh08t0:2305_2: kasmā tāni idha na dassitānīti āha “anāgataṃsañāṇassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2305_3: Ijjhanti dibbacakkhunāti visuṃ parikammassa abhāvato dibbacakkhuñāṇapaṭilābheneva tassa parivārāni hutvā paṭiladdhāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:2305_4: Tatoyeva hi tāni tassa paribhaṇḍañāṇānīti vuccanti.
tika-abh08t0:2305_5: Yathā hi sinerussa parivāraṭṭhāniyāni taṃsiddhiyā siddhāni mekhalaṭṭhānāni paribhaṇḍānīti vuccanti,
tika-abh08t0:2305_6: evaṃ imānipi dibbacakkhusiddhiyā siddhāni tassa paribhaṇḍānīti veditabbāni.
tika-abh08t0:2306_1: cutūpapātañāṇaṃ pana kiṃ na dassitanti āha “cutūpapātañāṇampī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2306_3: upapattiyañca rūpaṃ vibhāventaṃ cutūpapāte pavattattā “cutūpapātañāṇa”nti vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:2306_5: tasmā paramatthato nāmadvayena āgataṃ ekameva ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2307_0: 1103. Idhāti imasmiṃ sāsane. Anena tarenāti anena abhidhammāvatāranāmakena tarena.
tika-abh08t0:2316_3: Atītaṃsañāṇaṃ nāma paresaṃ paccuppannabhave yāva paṭisandhipariyosānaṃ pavattacittārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2317_1: Idāni imesaṃ abhiññāñāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavinicchaye asammohatthaṃ taṃ dassetumārabhanto āha “sattanna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2317_2: Cattāro ārammaṇattikāti parittārammaṇattiko maggārammaṇattiko atītārammaṇattiko ajjhattārammaṇattikoti ime cattāro ārammaṇattikā.
tika-abh08t0:2317_11: Na hi aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ yuttanti.
tika-abh08t0:2317_18: nanu vuttaṃ “aññaṃ uddisitvā aññassa paccāmasanaṃ ayutta”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2318_1: Parittādīsu sattasūti asatipi vatthubhede bhūmikālasantānabhedavasena bhinnesu parittamahaggataatītānāgatapaccuppannaajjhattabahiddhārammaṇavasena
tika-abh08t0:2318_3: Iddhividhañāṇassa maggārammaṇatāya abhāvato idha maggārammaṇattiko na labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:2318_4: Kāyaṃ cittasannissitaṃ katvā adissamānena kāyena gantukāmoti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2318_5: Cittasannissitakaraṇañca taṃ viya kāyassa adissamānasīghagatikatāvasena taggatikatāpādanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2318_8: sīghagamanañca katvā yathicchitaṭṭhānaṃ gantukāmoti ayañhettha attho.
tika-abh08t0:2318_11: Pādakajjhānañhi samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya “ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya adissamāno,
tika-abh08t0:2318_13: parikammaṃ pana katvā puna samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva parikammaṃ karonto kāyaṃ gahetvā mahaggate pādakacitte samāropeti,
tika-abh08t0:2318_17: Taṃ pana sīghagamanatthaṃ abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ appavattitvā katipayacittavāreheva icchitaṭṭhānappattivasena daṭṭhabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2318_25: ggahaṇeneva rūpadhammānaṃ gahitattā cittakkhaṇavasena rūpappavatti na yuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2318_28: na ca iddhibalena dhammānaṃ kenaci lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ sakkā kātunti.
tika-abh08t0:2318_29: Cittavasena rūpakāyaṃ pādakajjhāne samāropentassa kāyameva ārammaṇanti āha “kāyārammaṇato”ti,
tika-abh08t0:2318_31: Kāyasannissitaṃ katvā cittanti ettha na cittaṃ kāyaṃ viya dandhaṃ dissamānaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2319_1: Anāgatamatītañca karoti visayaṃ yadāti mahādhātunidhāne mahākassapattherādīnaṃ viya anāgataṃ adhiṭṭhahantānaṃ anāgataṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2319_2: kāyavasena cittapariṇāmanakāle tadeva ciraniruddhaṃ pādakajjhānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karontānaṃ atītaṃ ārammaṇaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2319_6: Hatthiādayo abhinimminantassāpi hi kiñcāpi parikammaṃ anāgatārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2319_8: Upacārārammaṇaṃ viya hi paṭibhāganimittaṃ tena saha pātubhūtameva tassārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2320_2: siyāti attano kāyaṃ cittavasena pariṇāmanakāle ajjhattassa kāyassa ārammaṇakaraṇato,
tika-abh08t0:2320_3: attano cittaṃ kāyavasena pariṇāmanakāle cittassa ārammaṇakaraṇato. Vā-
tika-abh08t0:2320_4: saddena avuttasamuccayatthena gahite attano kumāravaṇṇādiabhinimmānakāle kāyassa ārammaṇakaraṇato ca ajjhattārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:2321_2: Dibbasotassa hi paccuppannova saddo ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2321_7: taṃ pana ekādasabhavaṅgacittato upari bhavaṅgaṃ pavattitumadatvā bhavaṅgato vuṭṭhāya āvajjanasamatthatāvasena vasitāpattasseva yujjati.
tika-abh08t0:2321_9: Na hi parassa kucchisaddasavaneyeva bahiddhārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2322_3: Majjhimānanti parittaappamāṇānaṃ majjhe bhavattā majjhimasaṅkhātānaṃ rūpārūpāvacaracittānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2322_7: avasesakkhandhattayaṃ pana na jānātīti imaṃ mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ sandhāyāha “maggacittassa jānane”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2322_11: maggasampayuttacittajānanato pana pariyāyena maggārammaṇatā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ anuññātāti.
tika-abh08t0:2323_0: “Kusalā khandhā iddhividhañāṇassa cetopariyañāṇassa pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa anāgataṃsañāṇassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo”ti –
tika-abh08t0:2324_0: Vuttattā cattāropi khandhā cetopariyañāṇassa ārammaṇaṃ honti,
tika-abh08t0:2324_1: tasmā nippariyāyeneva maggārammaṇatā labbhatīti idamettha saṅgahakārānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2325_2: anāgatasattadivasabbhantareyeva ca pavattaṃ paracittaṃ cetopariyañāṇaṃ jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:2325_7: paccuppannassa pana na sambhavatīti pucchati “kathañca panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2325_9: taṃ dassetuṃ paccuppannaṃ tāva vibhajitvā dassento “paccuppannaṃ tidhā vutta”ntiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2325_10: Khaṇasantatiaddhatoti khaṇapaccuppannaṃ santatipaccuppannaṃ addhāpaccuppannanti evaṃ khaṇasantatiaddhāvasena tidhā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2326_4: Ekadvesantativārapariyāpannanti ettha andhakāre nisīditvā ālokaṭṭhānaṃ gatassa na ca tāva ārammaṇaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2326_8: “Ālokaṭṭhāne vicaritvā ovarakaṃ paviṭṭhassāpi na tāva sahasā rūpaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2326_10: pubbeva tattha nisinnassa viya etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2326_12: ghaṇṭibherīādiākoṭanahatthavikārañca disvā na pana tāva saddaṃ suṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:2326_14: etthantare ekadvesantativārā veditabbā”ti evaṃ tāva majjhimabhāṇakattherā vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2327_0: Saṃyuttabhāṇakā pana “rūpasantati arūpasantatīti dve santatiyo vatvā udakaṃ akkamitvā gatassa yāva tīre akkantaudakalekhā na vippasīdati,
tika-abh08t0:2327_1: addhānato āgatassa yāva kāye usumabhāvo na vūpasammati,
tika-abh08t0:2327_2: ātapā āgantvā gabbhaṃ paviṭṭhassa yāva andhakārabhāvo na vigacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2327_3: antogabbhe kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikatvā divā vātapānaṃ vivaritvā olokentassa yāva akkhīnaṃ phandanabhāvo na vūpasammati,
tika-abh08t0:2327_5: Dve tayo javanavārā arūpasantati nāmāti vatvā tadubhayampi santatipaccuppannaṃ nāmā”ti evaṃ ekameva santativāraṃ vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2327_6: Tattha majjhimabhāṇakavāde ekaccassa sīghampi pākaṭaṃ hotīti ekadvesantativārāti eka-
tika-abh08t0:2327_8: Ācariyadhammapālatthero pana “atiparittasabhāvautuādisamuṭṭhānā vā ekadvesantativārā veditabbā”tipi āha.
tika-abh08t0:2328_1: Ekabbhavaparicchinnanti ekasmiṃ bhave paṭisandhicutivasena paricchinnaṃ ekabhavapariyāpannaṃ dhammajātaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2328_5: tasmiṃ ce paccuppanne chandarāgapaṭibaddhaṃ hoti viññāṇa”ntiādi,
tika-abh08t0:2329_2: Ekapupphaṃ attano vaṇṭena ekassa vaṇṭaṃ vijjhatīti sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2329_7: asukassa citta”nti evaṃ vibhāgaṃ akatvā parassa cittaṃ jānāmicceva rāsivasena mahājanassa citte āvajjite
tika-abh08t0:2329_8: ekassa cittaṃ ekena cittena uppādakkhaṇe vā ṭhitikkhaṇe vā bhaṅgakkhaṇe vā ekantena paṭivijjhatīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2330_1: Taṃ pana tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttanti dassetuṃ “yenāvajjatī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2330_2: Vassasahassampi hi evaṃ āvajjayato āvajjanajavanānaṃ ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe ṭhānaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2330_6: tasmā tesaṃ āvajjanajavanānaṃ dvinnaṃ saha ekasmiṃ ārammaṇe aṭṭhānābhāvato taṃ na yujjati.
tika-abh08t0:2330_7: Bhavatu tāva ko ettha dosoti ce āha “āvajjanajavanāna”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2330_12: tasmā aniṭṭhe ṭhāne javanāvajjanānaṃ nānārammaṇatāpattidoso ayuttoti taṃ tesaṃ vacanaṃ ayuttanti pakāsitaṃ aṭṭhakathāsūti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2331_5: Idaṃ pana khaṇapaccuppannānantaraṃ lahukaṃ katvā paccuppannadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2331_6: yaṃ pana vattamānajavanavīthito atītānāgatavasena dvitijavanavīthiparimāṇakāle pavattaṃ paracittaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2331_11: Tatrāyaṃ dīpanātiādi javanavārassa addhāpaccuppannabhāvadīpanamukhena iddhicittassa pavattiākāradīpanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2332_2: Ānandācariyo panettha abhidhammamātikāya āgatassa paccuppannapadassa addhāsantatipaccuppannapadatthatā na katthaci pāḷiyaṃ vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:2332_3: tasmā cittasāmaññena cittaṃ āvajjayamānaṃ abhimukhībhūtaṃ vijjamānacittaṃ āvajjeti,
tika-abh08t0:2332_4: parikammāni ca taṃ taṃ vijjamānacittaṃ cittasāmaññeneva ārammaṇaṃ katvā cittajānanaparikammāni hutvā pavattanti.
tika-abh08t0:2332_5: Cetopariyañāṇaṃ pana vijjamānacittaṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ tena saha ekakkhaṇe uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2332_6: Tattha yasmā santānaggahaṇato ekattavasena āvajjanādīni cittanteva pavattāni,
tika-abh08t0:2332_9: tasmā samānākārappavattito na aniṭṭhe ṭhāne nānārammaṇatā hotīti khaṇapaccuppannavaseneva imassa paccuppannārammaṇataṃ icchati.
tika-abh08t0:2333_1: Parittādīsu aṭṭhasūti cetopariyañāṇassa vuttesu paccuppannārammaṇaṃ hitvā navattabbārammaṇañca pakkhipitvā aṭṭhasu parittādīsu. Atīte…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2333_5: saddena vā avuttasamuccayatthena attanā bhāvitaṃ maggaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2334_5: eko vā nipāto visesānabhidhānanimitte upagamane daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2334_8: Atīte cetanāmattanti idampi pubbe viya mahāaṭṭhakathāvādaṃ sandhāyeva vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2334_9: Tattha hi yathākammūpagañāṇassa cetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2334_12: yato taṃ yathākammūpaganti vuccatīti iminā adhippāyena yathākammūpagañāṇaṃ atītacetanāmattameva ārammaṇaṃ karotīti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2334_13: heṭṭhā dassitapāḷivasena sabbe cattāropi khandhā yathākammūpagañāṇassa ārammaṇanti saṅgahakārānaṃ sanniṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2334_14: Natthi kiñci agocaranti kiñci khandhaṃ vā khandhapaṭibaddhaṃ nāmagottādiṃ vā agocaraṃ nāma natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2335_8: ajjhattārammaṇattikavasena pana ākiñcaññāyatanajjhānassa ārammaṇabhūtadhammārammaṇakāle navattabbārammaṇaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2337_1: Parittādīsu aṭṭhasūti pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇassa vuttesu atītārammaṇaṃ vajjetvā anāgatārammaṇaṃ pakkhipitvā aṭṭhasu.
tika-abh08t0:2338_1: Jānane nāmagottassāti “anāgate metteyyo nāma sammāsambuddho uppajjissati,
tika-abh08t0:2346_1: Idāni yasmā evaṃ abhiññāvasena adhigatānisaṃsāya thiratarāya samādhibhāvanāya samannāgatena bhikkhunā paññā bhāvetabbā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2346_2: Evañhi sā sabbākārena thiratarā sikhappattā ca hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2346_6: Paññāti padaṃ kaṃ abhidheyyatthaṃ nissāya vattatīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2347_6: tathā “atthi saṃkiliṭṭhā”ti evaṃ pavattaṃ micchāvādaṃ paṭisedheti.
tika-abh08t0:2347_9: Jānanā vā pakāratoti vutte “kimidaṃ pakārato jānanaṃ nāmā”ti anuyogaṃ manasi nidhāya sañjānanavijānanākāravisiṭṭhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2347_11: ko viseso kimantara”nti kathetukamyatāpucchaṃ katvā vissajjanamāha “saññāviññāṇapaññāna”ntiādinā.
tika-abh08t0:2348_5: kārena kadācipi imissā te visesā na santiyevāti avadhāreti.
tika-abh08t0:2348_9: saññā kuto paññākiccaṃ kareyyāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoticceva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2349_1: Viññāṇaṃ pana ārammaṇe pavattamānaṃ na tattha saññā viya nīlapītādikassa sañjānanavaseneva pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2349_3: aññañca tādisaṃ visesaṃ jānantameva pavattatīti āha “viññāṇaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2349_6: Lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāya hi anekavāraṃ lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā pavattamānāya paguṇabhāvato paricayavasena
tika-abh08t0:2349_8: yathā taṃ paguṇassa ganthassa sajjhāyane ñāyāgatāpi vārā na viññāyanti.
tika-abh08t0:2349_9: Lakkhaṇaṃ paṭivijjhitunti ca lakkhaṇānaṃ ārammaṇakaraṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2350_1: Ussakkitvāti 220 udayabbayādiñāṇapaṭipāṭiyā ārabhitvā maggaṃ pāpetumeva taṃ viññāṇaṃ na sakkoti asambodhasabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:2350_5: Attano pana anaññasādhāraṇena ānubhāvena maggaṃ pāpetuñca sakkoti.
tika-abh08t0:2350_6: Bālagāmikaheraññikānaṃ kahāpaṇajānanamiva ca nesaṃ ārammaṇajānanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2350_7: Yathā hi heraññikaphalake ṭhapitaṃ kahāpaṇarāsiṃ eko asañjātavohārabuddhi bāladārako,
tika-abh08t0:2350_9: eko heraññikoti tīsu janesu passamānesu bāladārako kahāpaṇānaṃ cittavicittadīgharassacaturassaparimaṇḍalabhāvamattameva jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:2350_15: ayaṃ pādasāro”tiādikaṃ pana vibhāgaṃ na jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:2350_19: gandhaṃ ghāyitvāpi rasaṃ sāyitvāpi hatthena dhārayitvāpi “asukasmiṃ gāme vā nigame vā nagare vā pabbate
tika-abh08t0:2350_20: vā nadītīre vā kato”tipi “asukaācariyena kato”tipi jānāti.
tika-abh08t0:2350_21: Tattha saññā asañjātavohārabuddhino bāladārakassa kahāpaṇadassanaṃ viya vibhāgaṃ akatvā piṇḍavaseneva
tika-abh08t0:2351_4: Ghaṭapaṭādipaṭicchādakassa bāhirandhakārassa dīpāloko viya yathāvuttadhammasabhāvapaṭicchādakassa viddhaṃsanarasā.
tika-abh08t0:2351_5: Uppajjamānoyeva hi ñāṇāloko hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento uppajjatīti āha “sammohanandhakārassa,
tika-abh08t0:2351_8: kāraṇabhūtā vā sayaṃ phalabhūtaṃ asammohaṃ paccupatiṭṭhāpetīti āha “asammohapaccupaṭṭhānā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2351_10: Tathā hi “samāhito yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī”ti suttapadanti āha “samādhāsannakāraṇā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2352_2: na tenassā koci vibhāgo labbhatīti āha “lakkhaṇenekadhā vuttā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2352_10: Visesato pana diṭṭhivisuddhiādivisuddhicatukkasaṅgahitamaggasaṃyuttā samudāye pavattā paññā tadekadesesupi pavattatīti magga-
tika-abh08t0:2353_1: Attanova cintāyāti tassa tassa anavajjassa atthassa sādhane paropadesena vinā attano upāyacintāvaseneva.
tika-abh08t0:2353_4: Parato pana sutvānāti parato upadesaṃ sutvā.
tika-abh08t0:2353_8: Yathā vāpi tathā vāti parato sutvā vā asutvā vā.
tika-abh08t0:2353_9: Appanāpattāti idaṃ sikhāpattaṃ bhāvanāmayaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2353_11: Tissopi panetā paññā pāḷivasena evaṃ veditabbā –
tika-abh08t0:2354_1: Yogavihitesu vā kammāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā sippāyatanesu yogavihitesu vā vijjāṭhānesu kammassakataṃ vā saccānulomikaṃ vā rūpaṃ aniccanti vā, vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā,
tika-abh08t0:2354_3: yaṃ evarūpaṃ anulomikaṃ khantiṃ diṭṭhiṃ ruciṃ mudiṃ pekkhaṃ dhammanijjhānakkhantiṃ parato asutvā paṭilabhati,
tika-abh08t0:2355_0: Ettha ca kiñcāpi kammāyatanādivasena cintāmayasutamayapaññā mahaggatalokuttaravasena bhāvanāmayapaññā ca vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:2355_1: idha pana antimabhavikānaṃ dvinnaṃ bodhisattānameva labbhamānā cintāmayabhūtā saccānulomikā paññā,
tika-abh08t0:2355_2: pūritapāramīnaṃ avasesamahāpaññānaṃ labbhamānā sutamayā saccānulomikā paññā,
tika-abh08t0:2356_4: Vipassakānaṃ ñāṇapāṭavatthaṃ paññāppabhede niddisiyamāne paṭisambhidāpaññāpi vattukāmatāya,
tika-abh08t0:2356_5: paṭisambhidāpaññāya vā vipassanāphalabhūtattā lokiyalokuttarapaññādhikāre vā lokuttarapaññāya saha pāpuṇitabbaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2356_9: tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti evamāgataṃ atthādīsu tīsu pabhedagataṃ ñāṇattayaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2356_11: te ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti evaṃ pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2356_15: aṭṭhakathāya ca “sabbatthakañāṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā ñāṇaṃ paccavekkhantassa pabhedagataṃ ñāṇa”nti avisesena vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2356_16: Evañca katvā mahaggatapaṭisambhidāñāṇassa abhāvepi niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā,
tika-abh08t0:2356_19: siyā appamāṇārammaṇāti paṭibhānapaṭisambhidāya mahaggatārammaṇatāpi pañhāpucchakapāḷiyaṃ vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2358_0: “Yasmiṃ samaye kāmāvacaraṃ kusalaṃ cittaṃ uppannaṃ hoti somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2358_5: Ye vā pana tasmiṃ samaye aññepi atthi arūpino dhammā,
tika-abh08t0:2358_9: Yāya niruttiyā tesaṃ dhammānaṃ paññatti hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2358_11: Yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānāti ‘imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānī’ti,
tika-abh08t0:2359_0: Cittuppādakkamena desanāya pavattattā sāvaseso pāṭho kato.
tika-abh08t0:2359_1: Cittuppādasaṅgahite atthe asesetvā desanā hi abhidhammabhājanīye pavattā,
tika-abh08t0:2359_2: na sabbañeyyeti yathādassitavisayavacanavasena “yena ñāṇena tāni ñāṇāni jānātī”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2359_3: na taṃ aññārammaṇataṃ paṭisedheti desanāya atapparabhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2359_5: anāgatepi atthapaṭisambhidā siyā na vattabbā atītārammaṇātipi anāgatārammaṇātipi paccuppannārammaṇātipīti atthapaṭisambhidāya nibbānārammaṇatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2359_6: Ettha ca atthoti saṅkhepato hetuphalassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2359_7: Hetuphalañhi yasmā hetuanusārena arīyati adhigamīyati sampāpuṇīyati,
tika-abh08t0:2359_10: So hi yasmā taṃ taṃ dahati pavatteti,
tika-abh08t0:2360_3: tasmā taṃ saṅgahetvā pabhedatova atthādike dassetuṃ “yaṃ kiñci paccayuppanna”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2360_4: Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannanti yaṃ kiñci hetādipaccayato samuppannaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2360_5: Taṃ pana “idaṃ ito nibbatta”nti evaṃ hetuanusārena viññāyamānameva idha adhippetaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2360_9: buddhavacanatthabhūto khandhādiparamatthadhammo imāya ayaṃ dīpitoti evaṃ pāḷianusārena viññāyamānova
tika-abh08t0:2360_14: sesaṃ sakasakabhāvavaseneva viññāyatīti nippariyāyatova attho nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2360_18: Sesaṃ atthapañcakesu vuttanayena yathārahaṃ yojetvā veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2361_2: itaro nibbattetabbo atthoti tividho hoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2361_5: itaraṃ nibbattako hetūti evaṃ tividho hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2361_7: Yadi evaṃ vipākā na hontīti atthabhāvo na vattabbo? Na,
tika-abh08t0:2361_9: Evaṃ sati kusalākusalānampi paccayuppannattā atthabhāvo āpajjati?
tika-abh08t0:2361_11: Vipākassa pana padhānahetutāya pākaṭabhāvato dhammabhāvo eva tesaṃ vutto,
tika-abh08t0:2361_14: Kammaphalasambandhassa pana hetubhāvābhāvato dhammabhāvo na yuttoti.
tika-abh08t0:2361_16: ayaṃ paccayuppanno”ti evaṃ bhedamakatvā kevalaṃ kusalākusale vipākakiriyadhamme ca paccavekkhantassa
tika-abh08t0:2361_17: dhammatthapaṭisambhidā na hontīti tesaṃ atthadhammatā vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2362_2: aviparītaniruttīti tassa tassa atthassa bodhane sabbakālaṃ paṭiniyatasambandho abyabhicāravohāro māgadhabhāsāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2364_4: evañca sati “tatra dhammaniruttābhilāpe ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā”ti idaṃ na sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2364_6: Na hi vacanato aññaṃ abhilapitabbaṃ uccāretabbaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t0:2364_8: evañca sati atthadhammānampi bodhetabbattā tesampi niruttibhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2364_10: phassā phassanti na sabhāvaniruttī”ti vacanato viññattivikārasahito saddo niruttīti dassitameva,
tika-abh08t0:2364_11: “taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassa tasmiṃ sabhāvaniruttābhilāpe pabhedagataṃ ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidā,
tika-abh08t0:2364_13: na paññattiārammaṇā”ti ca aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttattā niruttisaddārammaṇāya sotaviññāṇavīthiyā parato manodvāre niruttipaṭisambhidā pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2364_14: evañca katvā “niruttipaṭisambhidā parittārammaṇā”ti vacanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2364_16: “niruttipaṭisambhidā paccuppannārammaṇā”ti vacanaṃ paccuppannaṃ saddaṃ gahetvā pacchājānanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2364_17: evañca sati aññasmiṃ paccuppannārammaṇe aññaṃ paccuppannārammaṇanti vuttanti āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2364_18: yathā pana dibbasotañāṇaṃ manussādisaddabhedanicchayassa paccayabhūtaṃ taṃtaṃsaddavibhāvakaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2364_20: ñāṇaṃ niruttipaṭisambhidāti vuccamāne na koci pāḷivirodho,
tika-abh08t0:2364_21: taṃ sabhāvaniruttisaddaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā paccavekkhantassāti ca paccuppannasaddārammaṇapaccavekkhaṇaṃ pavattentassāti na na sakkā vattuṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2364_22: Tampi hi ñāṇaṃ sabhāvaniruttiṃ vibhāventameva taṃtaṃsaddapaccavekkhaṇānantaraṃ taṃtaṃpabhedanicchayassa
tika-abh08t0:2364_23: hetubhāvato niruttiṃ bhindantaṃ paṭivijjhantameva uppajjatīti ca pabhedagatampi hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2365_2: Paccavekkhatoti imāni ñāṇāni idamatthajotakānīti asammohavasena paccavekkhantassa.
tika-abh08t0:2365_3: Nanu ca tīṇi ñāṇānipi atthadhammasabhāvaṃ nātivattantīti ñāṇesu ñāṇaṃ atthapaṭisambhidā,
tika-abh08t0:2365_8: Yañhi ñāṇārammaṇaṃ ñāṇaṃ tassa ārammaṇampi asammohavasena paṭivijjhantameva pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2365_12: Ettha ca kiñcāpi ayaṃ paṭisambhidā sārammaṇesu ñāṇesu pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2365_13: ārammaṇānaṃ pana pabhedaṃ heṭṭhā ñāṇattayameva vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t0:2365_15: Yathā dhammadesanāya asamattho bahussuto kiñcāpi dhammakathikena kathetabbaṃ dhammaṃ jānāti,
tika-abh08t0:2365_18: Imāsu pana pacchimānaṃ tissannaṃ sekhāsekhamaggakkhaṇe asammohavasena paṭivedho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2367_0: Atthapaññā yathālambā, sā dvidhāññā tu sāsavā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2368_1: Imā pana catasso paṭisambhidā pañcahi ākārehi visadabhāvaṃ gacchantīti dassetuṃ “pariyattī”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2368_3: pāḷiaṭṭhakathāsu gaṇṭhipadaatthapadavinicchayakathā paripucchā parito sabbato ñātuṃ pucchāti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2368_4: Savanaṃ sakkaccaṃ aṭṭhiṃ katvā sotaviññāṇavasena gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2368_10: Sekhena pattānampi hi imāsaṃ arahattappattiyā visadabhāvādhigamoti.
tika-abh08t0:2368_11: Pubbayogo viya pana arahattappatti arahatopi paṭisambhidāvisadatāya paccayo na na hotīti pañcannampi
tika-abh08t0:2368_13: Pubbayogo nāma pubbabuddhānaṃ sāsane gatapaccāgatikabhāvena yāva anulomagotrabhusamīpaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2369_1: Evaṃ ekavidhādivasena paññāya pabhedaṃ dassetvā idāni bhāvanāvidhānaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “kathaṃ bhāvetabbā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2369_2: Tattha yasmā imāya paññāya khandhādayo dhammā bhūmi,
tika-abh08t0:2369_3: sīlavisuddhi ceva cittavisuddhi cāti imā dve visuddhiyo mūlaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2369_4: diṭṭhivisuddhi kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhi maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi paṭipadāñāṇadassanavisuddhi ñāṇadassanavisuddhīti imā pañca visuddhiyo sarīraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2369_5: tasmā tesu bhūmibhūtesu dhammesu uggahaparipucchāvasena ñāṇaparicayaṃ katvā mūlabhūtā dve visuddhiyo
tika-abh08t0:2369_6: sampādetvā sarīrabhūtā pañca visuddhiyo sampādentena bhāvetabbāti dassetuṃ “khandhādīsū”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2369_12: cittavisuddhiyañca ayaṃ paññā mūlajātā nāma hoti, nāsatīti.
tika-abh08t0:2369_13: Diṭṭhivisuddhādayo pañcāti upabrūhetabbattā sarīrabhūtā diṭṭhivisuddhiādayo pañca.
tika-abh08t0:2369_14: Imissā hi paññāya santānavasena pavattamānāya pādapāṇisīsaṭṭhāniyā diṭṭhivisuddhiādayo imā pañca visuddhiyo
tika-abh08t0:2369_16: Tāya paññāyāti uggahaparipucchādivasena khandhādīsu dhammesu pavattapaññāya.
tika-abh08t0:2370_1: “Bhāvetabbā”ti vatvā idāni yasmā khandhādibhūmīsu sīlavisuddhicittavisuddhisaṅkhātehi mūlehi suppatiṭṭhitena
tika-abh08t0:2370_3: tasmā vipassanāpaññāya bhūmibhūtesu khandhādīsu ekadesadassanatthaṃ “rūpañcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2370_6: Atītānāgatādikantiādinā pana tadeva ekādasasu okāsesu pakkhipitvā dasseti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:2371_7: Sabbaṃ taṃ ekato katvāti atītādivibhāgabhinnaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ rūparāsivasena buddhiyā ekajjhaṃ gahetvā “mahāudakakkhandho”tiādīsu
tika-abh08t0:2371_11: Ekekesu pana vedanādīsu “samuddo mayā diṭṭho”tiādīsu viya samudāyavohārassa avayavepi dissanato khandha-
tika-abh08t0:2371_17: sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe rāsikaraṇalakkhaṇaṃ sampiṇḍanalakkhaṇanti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2371_18: Atha vā “saṅkhatamabhisaṅkharontī”ti vuttattā yathā attano phalasaṅkhataṃ sammadeva nipphannaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2372_1: Evaṃ vipassanāpaññāya bhūmibhūte dhamme ekadesato dassetvā idāni sīlacittavisuddhīnaṃ heṭṭhā vuttattā
tika-abh08t0:2372_2: tā avatvā idaṃ paññābhāvanāya ādibhūtaṃ diṭṭhivisuddhiṃ dassetuṃ “cattāro ca mahābhūtā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2372_3: Taṃ sampādetukāmena ca yogāvacarena catudhātuvavatthānavasena vā dvādasāyatanavasena vā pañcakkhandhavasena
tika-abh08t0:2372_4: vā ubhinnaṃ saṅkhepakoṭṭhāsānaṃ vasena vā paṭiladdhajjhānavasena vā nāmarūpassa vavatthāpetabbabhāvepi
tika-abh08t0:2372_5: tena tena mukhena vavatthānappakāsanassa atipapañcāvahattā yathādhigatakkhandhavaseneva idha vavatthānaṃ dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2373_1: Tālassa kandaṃ tu yamakanti dvīhi bījehi nibbattitaṃ ekībhūtaṃ yamakatālakandaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2373_2: Tañhi yamakaṃ bhinnasantānampi abhinnaṃ viya upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2373_4: Nāmañca rūpañcāti eteneva tassa duvidhabhāve siddhe “dvidhā vavatthapetī”ti idaṃ nāmarūpavinimuttassa aññassa abhāvadassanatthaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2373_7: santānādighanabhedassa ca akatattā abhinivesena vinā samūhekattaggahaṇavasena “satto”ti pavatto sammoho sattasammoho,
tika-abh08t0:2373_12: nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti evamādīnaṃ sambahulānaṃ suttantānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh08t0:2374_1: Aṅgasambhārāti aṅgasambhārahetu tannimittaṃ amuñcitvā sati eva tasminti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2374_3: Khandhesūti pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu santesu te amuñcitvāva sattoti sammuti vohāro.
tika-abh08t0:2374_5: yathā akkhacakkapañjaraīsādīsu aṅgasambhāresu ekenākārena ekajjhaṃ rāsi hutvā saṇṭhitesu “ratho”ti vohāramattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2374_6: paramatthato pana ekekasmiṃ aṅge upaparikkhiyamāne ratho nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2374_7: evameva upādānakkhandhasaṅkhātesu rūpārūpadhammesu santānavasena pavattamānesu “satto”ti vā “puggalo”ti vā “jīvo”ti vā vohāramattaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2374_8: paramatthato pana ekekasmiṃ dhamme upaparikkhiyamāne “asmī”ti vā “aha”nti vā gāhassa vatthubhūto satto nāma natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2374_10: Evaṃ passato hi dassanaṃ yathābhūtadassanaṃ nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2374_13: kathañcarahi nāmarūpamatte gamanādiatthakiccasiddhatā hotīti anuyogaṃ sandhāyāha “yathāpī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2374_15: yathā dārumayaṃ yantaṃ nijjīvaṃ jīvavirahitaṃ abbhantare vattamānassa jīvassa abhāvato tatoyeva nirīhakaṃ nibyāpāraṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2374_16: atha ca pana dārurajjusamāyoge paccayavisesavasena taṃ dāruyantaṃ gacchatipi tiṭṭhatipi,
tika-abh08t0:2374_17: sajīvaṃ sabyāpāraṃ viya gamanādikiccaṃ sādhentamiva khāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2374_18: tathā idaṃ nāmarūpampi kiñcāpi nijjīvaṃ nirīhakañca,
tika-abh08t0:2374_19: atha ca pana aññamaññasaṅkhatapaccayavisesassa samāyoge sajīvaṃ sabyāpāraṃ gacchantaṃ tiṭṭhantañca khāyatīti.
tika-abh08t0:2375_3: Idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ abhisaṅkhataṃ yantamiva suññaṃ jīvādinā.
tika-abh08t0:2375_4: Paccayehi abhisaṅkhataṃ idaṃ nāmarūpaṃ yantamiva suññanti vā sambandho.
tika-abh08t0:2376_2: So ca yamakabhāvo aññamaññanissitabhāvenāti āha “ubho aññoññanissitā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2376_3: Tato eva ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjanti.
tika-abh08t0:2376_4: Na hi kadāci pañcavokārabhave maraṇavasena rūpe nirujjhante arūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2376_5: arūpe vā nirujjhante rūpaṃ anirujjhantaṃ atthi.
tika-abh08t0:2376_6: Ekavokārabhavacatuvokārabhavesu pana tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ anissāya pavattiyā kāraṇaṃ heṭṭhā vuttamevāti.
tika-abh08t0:2376_10: aññamaññassa paccayā hontāpi ekasmiṃ bhijjamānasmiṃ ubho bhijjantiyevāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2377_4: Na hi aññathā saddahanussāhanādīsu nāmaṃ nittejanti sakkā vattuṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2378_1: Nāmaṃ nissāyātiādinā byatirekavasenapi nāmarūpānaṃ nittejataṃyeva vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t0:2378_4: Aññamaññaṃ sannissāya cassa attakiccasiddhipi paccekaṃ asamatthataṃ vibhāveti.
tika-abh08t0:2378_7: Kathaṃ pana paccekaṃ asamatthānaṃ samuditabhāve sati samatthatā hoti asāmaggiyaṃ ahetūnaṃ sāmaggiyampi ahetukabhāvāpattito.
tika-abh08t0:2378_8: Na hi paccekaṃ daṭṭhuṃ asakkontānaṃ satampi sahassampi samuditaṃ daṭṭhuṃ sakkotīti codanaṃ hadaye katvā āha “imassa panā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2378_11: upamāyapi idhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ jānantī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2378_13: yathā jaccandho ca pīṭhasappī ca disā pakkamitukāmā assu.
tika-abh08t0:2378_22: So tuṭṭhahaṭṭho jaccandho pīṭhasappiṃ aṃsakūṭaṃ āropesi,
tika-abh08t0:2378_23: pīṭhasappī jaccandhassa aṃsakūṭe nisīditvā evamāha “vāmaṃ muñca,
tika-abh08t0:2378_27: Tattha jaccandhopi nittejo dubbalo na sakena balena gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2378_28: tatheva pīṭhasappī na sakena balena gacchati,
tika-abh08t0:2378_29: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya gamanaṃ na pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2378_30: evameva nāmampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2378_32: rūpampi nittejaṃ na sakena tejena uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2378_34: na ca tesaṃ aññamaññaṃ nissāya uppatti vā pavatti vā na hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2385_1: Idāni nāvāyantikūpamāyapi nāmarūpānaṃ avasavattitaṃ vibhāvetuṃ “yathā hī”tiādigāthādvayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2385_5: Na hi tesaṃ araṇaggahaṇalaṅkārasaṇṭhāpanaudakasiñcanādikiriyāya vinā nāvā icchitadesaṃ pāpuṇāti,
tika-abh08t0:2385_6: yathā pana ubhopi aññamaññaṃ nissāya aṇṇave gacchanti,
tika-abh08t0:2385_7: evaṃ nāmañca rūpañca ubho aññamaññaṃ nissitā pavattantīti adhippāyo.
tika-abh08t0:2386_1: Sattasaññaṃ vinodetvāti yathāvuttanayehi anādikālabhāvitaṃ khandhapañcake sattaggāhaṃ vikkhambhetvā. Nāma…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2386_7: na ito bhiyyo”ti ca evaṃ sabbākārena tesaṃ lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇamukhena tamatthabhāvadassanaṃ etaṃ attadiṭṭhimalavisodhanato
tika-abh08t0:2386_22: Paramatthato anupalabbhanato hi satto atthīti vajjitabbameva,
tika-abh08t0:2386_26: Asesaṃ nissesato nāsaṃ vināsaṃ vikkhambhanaṃ upenti.
tika-abh08t0:2392_1: Anantaraṃ niddiṭṭhāya diṭṭhivisuddhiyā visayabhāvena dassitattā “etassā”ti vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2392_2: na tadaññato visesanatthaṃ tadaññassa ca abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2392_3: Ajjhattaṃ vā hi vipassanābhiniveso hotu bahiddhā vā,
tika-abh08t0:2392_4: atthasiddhiyaṃ pana lakkhaṇato sabbampi nāmarūpaṃ anavasesato pariggahitameva hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2392_10: Taṃ pana ñāṇaṃ tathāvigataṃ vasibhāvappattaṃ jhānaṃ viya yogino santāne pabandhavasena pavattatīti katvā vuttaṃ “ṭhita”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2393_2: āvajjitvāti yathā nāma kusalo bhisakko rogaṃ disvā tassa samuṭṭhānaṃ pariyesati,
tika-abh08t0:2393_3: yathā vā pana anukampako puriso kumāraṃ uttānaseyyaṃ rathikāya nipannaṃ disvā “kassa nu kho ayaṃ puttako”ti tassa mātāpitaro āvajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2393_8: na issarādihetukaṃ nāmarūpato uddhaṃ issarādīnaṃ abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2393_9: Yepi nāmarūpamattameva issarādayoti vadanti tesaṃ issarādisaṅkhātanāmarūpassa ahetubhāvāpattito,
tika-abh08t0:2393_11: “ko nu kho”ti nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye āvajjitvāti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2393_12: Evaṃ tāva katvā imassa nāmarūpassa hetupaccaye pariggaṇhantena oḷārikattā,
tika-abh08t0:2393_13: supākaṭattā ca rūpassa paccayapariggaho sukaroti paṭhamaṃ tassa paccayapariggaho kātabboti dassento āha “rūpakāyassā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2393_14: Tattha yathā nāmarūpassa paccayapariggaho ahetuvisamahetuvādanivattiyā hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2393_15: evaṃ nibbidāvirāgāvahabhāvena tattha tattha abhiratinivattiyāpi icchitabboti taṃ dvattiṃsākāravasena dassetuṃ “kesā lomā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2394_2: matoti avijjā taṇhā upādānaṃ kammanti idaṃ catubbidhaṃ dhammajātaṃ etassa yathāvuttassa rūpakāyassa hetu,
tika-abh08t0:2394_5: itaro paccayoti codanaṃ sandhāya “janako”tiādiṃ vatvā taṃ lokavasena samatthetuṃ “hetvaṅkurassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2394_11: Iminā bījaṃ viya aṅkurassa avijjādayo rūpakāyassa asādhāraṇakāraṇatāya hetūti dassitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2394_13: Iminā pana aṅkurassa pathavīsalilādayo viya āhāro sādhāraṇakāraṇatāya paccayoti dassitanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2395_1: gatāti evamete avijjādayo pañca dhammā yathārahaṃ hetubhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2395_5: upādānaṃ daḷhaggāhabhāvenāti evaṃ saṅkhārabhavānaṃ hetubhūtā janakasahāyatāya bhavanikantitaṃsahajātaāsannakāraṇattā abhisaṅkhārikā,
tika-abh08t0:2395_6: apassayabhūtā vāti mātā viya upanissayā honti.
tika-abh08t0:2395_7: Yathā pitujanitasukke puttassa uppattīti pitā janako,
tika-abh08t0:2395_8: evaṃ kammaṃ sattassa uppādakattā janakanti āha.
tika-abh08t0:2395_9: Yathā dhātī jātassa kumārassa vaḍḍhitā sandhārikā,
tika-abh08t0:2395_13: pakārantarena pana tassa pākaṭaṃ paccayapariggahavidhiṃ dassetuṃ “cakkhuñcā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2395_16: tena cakkhuviññāṇassa āvajjanādiṃ ajjhattaṃ sabbaṃ paccayajātaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2395_24: itaresañca saddasaṅgahitānaṃ anantarādisahajātādivasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:2395_25: saddena phassādīnaṃ viya saha paccayehi sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2395_26: Evaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ sabbaṃ nāmaṃ saha paccayena saṅgahitaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2396_2: Tathevidanti iminā na kevalaṃ sappaccayatāmattameva paccāmaṭṭhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2396_4: tādisehi avijjādipaccayeheva atītepi pavattitthāti paccayasahitatāpi paccāmaṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2397_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ ahosiṃ nu kho ahamatītamaddhāna”nti –
tika-abh08t0:2399_4: kiṃ hutvā kiṃ bhavissāmi nu kho ahamanāgatamaddhāna”nti –
tika-abh08t0:2401_1: Paccuppannepi addhāneti etarahi paṭisandhiṃ ādiṃ katvā cutipariyante addhānepi. Addhāna-
tika-abh08t0:2401_3: Na hi tabbinimutto añño koci kālo nāma atthīti.
tika-abh08t0:2402_4: ayaṃ nu kho satto kuto āgato,
tika-abh08t0:2403_4: soḷasavidhāpi cesā ekakaṅkhāvasenāpi anavasiṭṭhā hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2403_6: Kāmaṃ nāmarūpamattaṃ vinā sattassa adassanena diṭṭhivisuddhiyāva paccuppanne kaṅkhā pahīnā,
tika-abh08t0:2403_7: atītānāgate kaṅkhānaṃ pahānena pana paccuppanne kaṅkhāya atisayappahānaṃ dassetuṃ idheva sā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2403_8: Atha vā paccuppanne nissattanāmarūpassa paccayesu pavattakaṅkhāya idheva tīraṇato sā idha vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2403_9: Vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ vā etaṃ idha paccuppannakaṅkhāya pahānavacanaṃ yathā taṃ sotāpattimaggādīsu pahīnānampi
tika-abh08t0:2403_10: ca pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ pahānātiādinā anāgāmimaggādīsu vacananti.
tika-abh08t0:2404_5: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā purimakammabhavasmiṃ idha paṭisandhiyā paccayā,
tika-abh08t0:2404_10: vedayitaṃ vedanā iti ime pañca dhammā idhūpapattibhavasmiṃ pure katassa kammassa paccayā,
tika-abh08t0:2404_12: cetanā bhavo iti ime pañca dhammā kammabhavasmiṃ āyatiṃ paṭisandhiyā paccayāti evaṃ vuttānaṃ kammavaṭṭavipākavaṭṭānaṃ vasena.
tika-abh08t0:2404_13: Kilesavaṭṭopi cettha kammasahāyatāya kammavaṭṭeneva saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2405_1: Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti ettha diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto paccuppanno attabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2405_5: Tattha paccuppannabhavato anantaraṃ upapajjitvā veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2405_6: Apare apare diṭṭhadhammato aññasmiṃ aññasmiṃ yatthakatthaci attabhāve veditabbaphalaṃ kammaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2406_1: paccayavisesena paṭiladdhavisesatāya ca balavabhāvappattā tādisassa pubbābhisaṅkhārassa vasena sātisayā
tika-abh08t0:2406_2: hutvā pavattā paṭhamajavanacetanā tasmiṃyeva attabhāve phaladāyinī diṭṭhadhammavedanīyā nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2406_3: Sā hi vuttākārena balavati javanasantāne guṇavisesayuttesu upakārānupakāravasappavattiyā,
tika-abh08t0:2406_4: āsevanālābhena appavipākatāya ca itaradvayaṃ viya pavattasantānuparamāpekkhaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2406_5: okāsalābhāpekkhañca kammaṃ na hotīti idheva pupphamattaṃ viya pavattivipākamattaṃ ahetukaphalaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t0:2406_7: Tathā asakkontanti kammassa vipākadānaṃ nāma upadhippayogādipaccayantarasamavāyeneva hotīti tadabhāvato tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ dātuṃ asakkontaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2406_9: vipākoti ettha “ahosi kamma”nti padaṃ visuṃ visuṃ yojetabbaṃ “ahosi kammaṃ nāhosi kammavipāko,
tika-abh08t0:2406_15: vipākakālassa ca atītattā tathā vattabbattaṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t0:2406_16: dutiyaṃ anāgate arahattaṃ pāpuṇantassa purimabhavesu kataṃ adinnavipākaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2406_18: arahato atītabhavesu kataṃ aparāpariyavedanīyañca sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2406_19: Apare pana “ekameva atītaṃ kammaṃ addhattaye vipākābhāvaṃ sandhāya tidhā vibhajitvā vutta”nti vadanti.
tika-abh08t0:2407_3: paṭisandhiyā anantarapaccayabhāvino vipākasantānassa anantarapaccayabhāvena vā tathā abhisaṅkhatā samānā
tika-abh08t0:2407_7: Vipākaṃ detīti paṭisandhiṃ datvā pavattivipākaṃ deti,
tika-abh08t0:2407_10: Paṭisandhiyā pana dinnāya jātisatepi pavattivipākaṃ deti.
tika-abh08t0:2407_11: Tenāha bhagavā “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā sataguṇā pāṭikaṅkhitabbā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2407_13: detīti yathāvuttakāraṇavirahato diṭṭhadhammūpapajjavedanīyabhāvaṃ asampattā pañca cetanā vipākadānasabhāvassa anupacchinnattā yadā okāsaṃ labhati,
tika-abh08t0:2407_16: Sati saṃsārappavattiyāti iminā asati saṃsārappavattiyaṃ ahosikammapakkhe tiṭṭhati vipaccanokāsassa abhāvatoti dīpeti.
tika-abh08t0:2408_1: Evaṃ tāva vipākadānakālavasena catubbidhaṃ dassetvā idāni vipākadānapariyāyato,
tika-abh08t0:2408_9: Kaṭattākammanti garukādibhāvaṃ asampattaṃ katamattatoyeva kammanti vattabbakammaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2408_10: Tattha kusalaṃ vā hotu akusalaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t0:2408_11: garukāgarukesu yaṃ garukaṃ mātughātakādikammaṃ vā mahaggatakammaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t0:2408_13: Tathā bahulābahulesu yaṃ bahulaṃ susīlyaṃ dussīlyaṃ vā,
tika-abh08t0:2408_18: Kaṭattā pana kammaṃ punappunaṃ laddhāsevanaṃ purimānaṃ abhāve paṭisandhiṃ ākaḍḍhati.
tika-abh08t0:2408_23: tasmimpi asati kaṭattākammanti vuttaṃ “purimajātīsu katakammaṃ vipaccatī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2409_6: Sukhadukkhe pavattamāne bavhābādhatādipaccayūpanipātanena saṇikaṃ saṇikaṃ tassa vibādhakaṃ upapīḷakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2409_9: Tathā paṭipakkhakammavipākassa appavattikaraṇavasena upacchedakaṃ paṭibāhakaṃ upaghātakaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2410_2: Aññena kammenāti kusalena vā akusalena vā aññena kammena kattubhūtena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā vipāke janite.
tika-abh08t0:2410_5: Uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambhetīti upatthambhakakammaṃ kusalaṃ samānaṃ aññenapi kusalakammena uppajjamānakaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2410_7: Akusalaṃ aññena akusalakammena upapajjamānaṃ dukkhaṃ tatheva upatthambheti.
tika-abh08t0:2410_8: Evañca upatthambhentaṃ taṃ dīghakālaṃ pavatteti nāmāti āha “addhānaṃ pavattetī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2410_9: Uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷetīti upapīḷakaṃ akusalaṃ samānaṃ sukhitassa rogādiantarāyakāraṇasampādakabhāvena sukhasantānaṃ upacchindantaṃ pīḷeti,
tika-abh08t0:2410_10: kusalañca rogādinā dukkhitassa bhesajjādisukhādikāraṇasampādakabhāvena dukkhasantānaṃ vicchindantaṃ pīḷeti.
tika-abh08t0:2410_11: Keci pana “sukhadukkhassa kāraṇaṃ asampādentampi paṭisandhidāyakakammassa pavattivipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
tika-abh08t0:2410_13: Evaṃ sante pana paṭisandhidāyakameva janakakammanti vuttaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:2411_0: Apica upaghātakena saha imassa visesabhāvo āpajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2411_1: taṃ paṭisandhivipākassa paṭibāhakanti ce? Taṃ na,
tika-abh08t0:2411_3: “Dubbalaṃ kammaṃ ghātetvā”ti vutte “nanu tassa pubbeyeva siddhattā,
tika-abh08t0:2411_4: niruddhattā ca kathamidaṃ tadupaghātakaṃ hotī”ti āpannaṃ codanaṃ sandhāya kammassa ghātanaṃ nāma tassa
tika-abh08t0:2411_6: Taṃpaṭibāhanañca attano vipākuppattiyā okāsakaraṇanti vuttaṃ “attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karotī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2411_7: Vipaccanāya katokāsaṃ kammaṃ vipakkameva nāma hotīti āha “evaṃ…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2412_2: upaghātakaṃ pana dubbalakammaṃ upacchinditvā attano vipākaṃ uppādetīti ayametesaṃ viseso.
tika-abh08t0:2412_3: Keci pana ācariyā aparenāpi nayena janakādikammaṃ icchanti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:2412_7: Yasmiṃ pana kate aññena janitassa iṭṭhassa vā aniṭṭhassa vā phalassa vibādhakavicchedakapaccayānuppattiyā,
tika-abh08t0:2412_11: akusalaphalaṃ vā yena paccanīkabhūtena rogadhātuvisamatādinimittatāya bādhīyati,
tika-abh08t0:2412_13: Yena pana kammunā janakasāmatthiyavasena ciratarappabandhārahampi samānaṃ phalavicchedakapaccayuppattiyā upahaññati vicchijjati,
tika-abh08t0:2413_0: Ettha ca keci appābādhadīghāyukatāsaṃvattanavasena dutiyassa kusalabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2413_3: ito anuppadinnayāpanakapetānañca apāyesu akusalavipākassa upatthambhanūpapīḷanūpaghātakāni kammāni santīti catunnampi kusalākusalabhāvo na virujjhati.
tika-abh08t0:2413_4: Kiñcāpi kammānaṃ kammantarañceva vipākantarañca buddhānaṃ kammavipākañāṇasseva yāthāvasarasato pākaṭaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2413_7: Na hi sabbena sabbaṃ ajānantassa paccayapariggaho paripūrati,
tika-abh08t0:2413_8: tasmā tādisaṃ pariggahaṃ sandhāya “iti ima”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2413_9: Yādisehi paccayehi paccuppanne addhāne nāmarūpassa pavatti,
tika-abh08t0:2413_10: tādiseheva itarasmimpi addhadvayeti evaṃ yathā atītānāgate nayaṃ neti,
tika-abh08t0:2413_15: pahiyyatīti tassevaṃ samanupassato yā sā pubbantādayo ārabbha “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinā nayena pavattā vicikicchā pahiyyati.
tika-abh08t0:2414_1: Pahīnāya pana tāya sabbabhavayonigatiṭhitisattāvāsesu hetuphalasambandhavaseneva pavattanāmarūpamattameva khāyati.
tika-abh08t0:2414_3: Kāraṇasāmaggiyaṃ dānādīhi sādhitakiriyāya pavattamānāya kāraṇamatte kattuvohāroti āha “kāraṇato uddhaṃ kāraṇaṃ na ca passatī”ti. Pāka…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2414_6: Evaṃ apassanto pana kāraṇe sati kārakoti,
tika-abh08t0:2414_7: vipākappavattiyā sati paṭisaṃvedakoti samaññāmatteneva paṇḍitā voharanti.
tika-abh08t0:2414_9: Suddhadhammāti kenaci sattena vā puggalena vā amissadhammā.
tika-abh08t0:2415_2: rukkhato bījanti evaṃ kāraṇaparamparagavesane anādikālikattā bījarukkhasantānassa pubbā koṭi natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2415_4: vipākapaccayā kammanti pariyesane anādikālikattā kammavipākasantānassa pubbā koṭi na paññāyati. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:2416_2: evaṃ anāgatepi addhāne khandhānaṃ paṭipāṭītiādinā vuttasaṃsāre sati.
tika-abh08t0:2416_3: Appavatti na dissatīti kammato vipāko bhavissati,
tika-abh08t0:2416_4: vipākato kammanti anāgate kāriyaparamparāya gavesiyamānāya aparikkhīṇasaṃyojanassa kammavipākānaṃ appavattanaṃ na dissati,
tika-abh08t0:2416_6: Hetuphalasambandhavasena pavattamāne saṃsāre “pubbā koṭi na paññāyatī”ti vacanena kāraṇe ādissa abhāvo vutto,
tika-abh08t0:2416_7: “appavatti na dissatī”ti vacanena phalassa avasānābhāvo vuttoti.
tika-abh08t0:2416_11: Aññamaññavirodhinoti itarītaraviruddhā diṭṭhiyo vā diṭṭhiyā vā aññamaññena saha virodhino.
tika-abh08t0:2417_1: Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhīti kuṭṭādīsu rajādi viya vipāke santiṭṭhamānaṃ kammaṃ natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2417_2: Pāko kamme na vijjatīti tathā kamme santiṭṭhamāno vipāko natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2417_3: Yathāvuttamevatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ “yathā na sūriye”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2417_5: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthīti te muñcitvā tehi bahi so aggi natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2417_7: Na anto kammassātiādi atthato heṭṭhā vuttampi upamānigamanatthaṃ punapi vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2418_3: kathaṃ hetuto phalaṃ nibbattatīti āha “kammañca kho upādāyā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2418_5: sabbampi dhammajātaṃ kārakarahitanti dassetuṃ “na hettha devo”tiādigāthā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2419_1: Addhāsu taritvā kaṅkhanti tīsu addhāsu soḷasavidhaṃ kaṅkhaṃ vitaritvā.
tika-abh08t0:2419_3: atha kho “satthari kaṅkhatī”tiādinayappavattaṃ aṭṭhavidhaṃ kaṅkhampi pajahati.
tika-abh08t0:2419_4: Tathā hettha buddho dhammo saṅgho sikkhāti kaṅkhāya gocarabhūtā lokiyā dhammā adhippetā.
tika-abh08t0:2419_5: Na hi lokuttaradhamme ārabbha kilesā pavattituṃ sakkonti.
tika-abh08t0:2419_13: tasmā soḷasavatthukāya pahīnāya aṭṭhavatthukā kaṅkhā appatiṭṭhāva hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2419_14: Etāsañca pahānena dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatānipi vikkhambhanti diṭṭhekaṭṭhattā vicikicchāya.
tika-abh08t0:2419_15: Yathā hi diṭṭhi samucchijjamānā vicikicchāya saddhiṃyeva samucchijjati,
tika-abh08t0:2419_16: evaṃ vicikicchā vikkhambhiyamānā diṭṭhiyā saddhiṃyeva vikkhambhīyati.
tika-abh08t0:2419_17: Attābhinivesūpanissayā hi “ahosiṃ nu kho aha”ntiādinayappavattā soḷasavatthukā kaṅkhā,
tika-abh08t0:2420_4: Ettha ca dharīyanti attano paccayehīti dhammā,
tika-abh08t0:2420_10: dhammato ca añño sabhāvo natthīti paccayadhammānaṃ paccayabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2420_16: Ayaṃ pana taṃ anadhigatopi tadadhigamupāyapaṭipattiyaṃ ṭhitattā laddhappatiṭṭho viya hotīti “laddhappatiṭṭho”ti vutto.
tika-abh08t0:2420_18: lokiyāhi sīlasamādhipaññāhi samannāgatattā uttari appaṭivijjhanto sotāpanno viya niyato,
tika-abh08t0:2420_23: dhammappavattiṃ ñatvā sāsane patiṭṭhitasaddho laddhappatiṭṭho nāma hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2420_26: tasseva aparabhāge aniccato manasikārādividhinā maggasaccañca abhiññāya pavattiyā dukkhabhāvaṃ disvā
tika-abh08t0:2420_27: tassa appavatte nirodhe ekaṃseneva ninnajjhāsayatāya lokiyeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ adhigatattā
tika-abh08t0:2420_29: sotāpannabhūmiyañca bhabbuppattiko hotīti cūḷasotāpanno nāmāti vuttaṃ “sotāpanno hi cūḷako”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2426_1: Idāni kaṅkhāvitaraṇavisuddhiyā anantaraṃ uddiṭṭhāya maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddesakkamo anuppatto,
tika-abh08t0:2426_2: sā pana yasmā obhāsādiupakkilesasambhave sati hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2426_6: Tañhi atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena pavattanato ādikammikassa sukarasammasanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2426_7: tasmā paṭhamaṃ tattheva abhiyogaṃ karontena kamato taṃ sampādetabbanti dassetuṃ “kalāpasammasanenevā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2426_8: Atha vā dvinnaṃ visuddhīnamantare kalāpasammasanaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2426_9: tañca kho dvīsu ekāya visuddhiyā saṅgahetabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2426_10: maggāmaggañāṇassa ca ādibhūtattā tatthevassa saṅgaho yuttoti ettheva naṃ saṅgahitukāmatāya vuttaṃ “kalāpasammasanenevā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2426_11: Keci pana kalāpasammasanaṃ nāma ekavisuddhiyampi na antogadhanti taṃ anāmasitvāva vipassanācāraṃ vaṇṇenti.
tika-abh08t0:2426_12: Kalāpasammasanenevāti atītādibhedabhinnānaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhipitvā vavatthānavasena kalāpato,
tika-abh08t0:2426_13: kalāpānaṃ vā sammasanena maggāmaggañāṇadassanavipassanāya yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-abh08t0:2426_14: Atha vā bhummatthe karaṇaniddesavasena kalāpasammasane yogo karaṇīyoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2426_15: “Kalāpasammasaneneva yogo karaṇīyo”ti vatvāpi taṃ pana visuddhimaggato gahetabbanti ganthavitthāraparihāratthaṃ idha na dassitanti.
tika-abh08t0:2427_5: Nibbattīti dvinnaṃ paccuppannānaṃ vasena paṭhamābhinibbatti ca khaṇanibbatti ca.
tika-abh08t0:2428_1: Anupassanāpi ñāṇanti yā udayassa ca vayassa ca anupassanā,
tika-abh08t0:2429_0: “Kathaṃ paccuppannānaṃ dhammānaṃ vipariṇāmānupassane paññā udayabbayānupassane ñāṇaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:2430_0: Ettha pana udayadassanaṃ yāvadeva khayadassananti vayadassanassa padhānataṃ dassetuṃ “vipariṇāmānupassane
tika-abh08t0:2430_1: paññā”ti vatvā taṃ pana vayadassanaṃ udayadassanapubbakanti vuttaṃ “udayabbayānupassane ñāṇa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2431_1: Pubbe uppattitoti jananato pubbe anuppannassāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2431_3: yato āgaccheyya uppajjamānaṃ aladdhattabhāvassa sabbena sabbaṃ avijjamānattā.
tika-abh08t0:2431_5: Yathā anāgate addhāne ime dhammā sabbena sabbaṃ natthi,
tika-abh08t0:2431_6: evaṃ atītepi addhānanti dassento “tathā nirujjhamānassā”tiādiṃ vatvā avijjamānānaṃyeva rūpārūpadhammānaṃ hetupaccayasamavāye uppādo,
tika-abh08t0:2431_7: uppajjitvā ca sabbaso abhāvūpagamoti imamatthaṃ samudāyagataṃ tadekadesabhūtāya upamāya vibhāvetuṃ imasmiṃ ṭhāne aṭṭhakathāya vīṇūpamā āgatā.
tika-abh08t0:2431_8: Sā idhāpi āharitvā vattabbāti adhippāyena “ettha vīṇūpamā”tiādimāha.
tika-abh08t0:2431_10: uppannānañca parato abhāvoti imassa atthassa pakāsane.
tika-abh08t0:2431_13: yathā vīṇāya vādiyamānāya uppannassa saddassa neva uppattito pubbe sannicayo atthi,
tika-abh08t0:2431_17: atha kho vīṇañca vīṇavādanañca purisassa ca tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicca ahutvā sambhoti,
tika-abh08t0:2432_1: Evaṃ saṅkhepato udayabbayamanasikāravidhiṃ dassetvā puna yāni etasseva udayabbayañāṇassa vibhaṅge “avijjāsamudayā
tika-abh08t0:2432_5: āhārasamudayā rūpasamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_7: rūpakkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-abh08t0:2432_11: āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”ti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_13: rūpakkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-abh08t0:2432_14: Tathā “avijjāsamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_17: phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”ti paccayasamudayaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_19: vedanākkhandhassa udayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati.
tika-abh08t0:2432_23: phassanirodhā vedanānirodho”ti paccayanirodhaṭṭhena vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2432_25: vedanākkhandhassa vayaṃ passanto imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni passati,
tika-abh08t0:2433_0: Evaṃ ekekassa khandhassa udayabbayadassane dasa dasa katvā samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni vuttāni,
tika-abh08t0:2433_4: evampi rūpaṃ vetī”ti paccayato ceva khaṇato ca vitthārena ca manasikāravidhiṃ dassetuṃ “tasseva ñāṇassā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2433_8: tasmā purimabhavasiddhāya avijjāya sati imasmiṃ bhave rūpasamudayo rūpassa uppādo hotīti attho. Ādi-
tika-abh08t0:2433_15: āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho”ti ca ādīsu avijjādīhi tīhi atītakālikāni tesaṃ sahakārīkāraṇabhūtāni upādānādīnipi gahitānevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2434_0: Pavattipaccayesu kabaḷīkārāhārassa balavatāya so eva gahito “āhārasamudayā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2434_1: Tasmiṃ pana gahite pavattipaccayatāsāmaññena utucittānipi gahitāneva hontīti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpassa
tika-abh08t0:2434_4: asati ca avijjūpanissayāya bhavanikantiyā jātiyā asambhavoyevāti.
tika-abh08t0:2434_7: Āhāro pana uppannassa rūpassa posako kabaḷīkārāhārassa adhippetattā,
tika-abh08t0:2434_10: Avijjānirodhāti aggamaggañāṇena avijjāya anuppādanirodhato anāgatassa rūpassa anuppādanirodho hoti paccayābhāve abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2434_21: saññā cetanā”ti vacanato phasso vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhānaṃ pavattipaccayo,
tika-abh08t0:2434_24: abhidhamme ca aññamaññapaccayavāre “nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇa”nti vacanato nāmarūpaṃ viññāṇassa pavattipaccayo,
tika-abh08t0:2434_25: tannirodhā ca tassa nirodhoti vuttaṃ “phassasamudayā vedanāsamudayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2435_1: Dasa dasāti rūpakkhandhassa udayadassane avijjā taṇhā kammaṃ āhāroti imesaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitāsaṅkhatalakkhaṇāni
tika-abh08t0:2435_2: ceva rūpassa nibbattilakkhaṇañcāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:2435_4: rūpassa khaṇanirodho cāti imāni pañca lakkhaṇānīti rūpakkhandhassa dasa lakkhaṇāni,
tika-abh08t0:2435_5: tathā vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ catunnaṃ cattālīsa lakkhaṇānīti evaṃ samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni honti.
tika-abh08t0:2435_7: Lakkhaṇaṭṭho pana tesaṃ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ atthitā,
tika-abh08t0:2435_8: anuppādanirodho cāti aṭṭha lakkhīyati etehi rūpādīnaṃ udayo ca vayo cāti lakkhaṇāni.
tika-abh08t0:2435_12: Dhamme samanupassatīti rūpādike dhamme udayabbayavante samanupassati.
tika-abh08t0:2435_13: Ettha ca keci tāva āhu “arūpakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayadassanaṃ addhāsantativasena,
tika-abh08t0:2435_15: tesaṃ matena khaṇato udayabbayadassanameva na siyā.
tika-abh08t0:2435_16: Apare panāhu “paccayato udayabbayadassanena atītādivibhāgaṃ anāmasitvā sabbasādhāraṇato avijjādipaccayā vedanāya sambhavaṃ labbhamānataṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2435_18: Avijjādiabhāve ca tassā asambhavaṃ alabbhamānataṃ passati,
tika-abh08t0:2435_23: Santativasena hi rūpārūpadhamme udayabbayato manasi karontassa anukkamena bhāvanāya balappattakāle ñāṇassa
tika-abh08t0:2436_1: Ayañhi paṭhamaṃ paccayato udayabbayaṃ manasi karonto pacchā avijjādike paccayadhamme vissajjetvā udayabbayavante
tika-abh08t0:2436_2: khandhe gahetvā tesaṃ paccayato udayabbayadassanamukhena khaṇatopi udayabbayaṃ manasi karoti.
tika-abh08t0:2436_3: Tassa yadā ñāṇaṃ tikkhaṃ visadaṃ hutvā pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2436_7: Tattha evaṃ rūpudayoti evaṃ vuttanayena avijjāsamudayā…pe…
tika-abh08t0:2436_12: āhāranirodhā rūpassa vayo anuppādoti ayaṃ paccayato vitthārena manasikāro.
tika-abh08t0:2436_13: Udeti evaṃ rūpampīti evaṃ samudayato kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi udeti uppajjati nibbattati.
tika-abh08t0:2436_14: Evaṃ rūpaṃ tu vetīti kammasamuṭṭhānarūpampi āhārautucittasamuṭṭhānarūpampi evaṃ veti nirujjhatīti ayaṃ khaṇato vitthārena manasikāro.
tika-abh08t0:2436_16: Sabbadhammā pākaṭā hontīti iti ime dhammā ahutvā sambhonti,
tika-abh08t0:2436_19: evaṃ atītānāgatepīti nayavasena atītādidhammānaṃ dvedhā udayabbayaṃ passato saccapaṭiccasamuppādanayalakkhaṇabhedā pākaṭā honti.
tika-abh08t0:2436_20: Tassevaṃ pākaṭībhūtasabbadhammasabhāvassa “evaṃ kira nāmime dhammā anuppannapubbā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2436_21: uppannā nirujjhantī”ti niccanavāva hutvā saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti.
tika-abh08t0:2436_27: Udake daṇḍarājiādayova kiñcāpi uttaruttari atiparittaṭṭhāyibhāvanidassanatthaṃ dassitā,
tika-abh08t0:2436_30: Tathā hi gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyena parimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi,
tika-abh08t0:2436_31: pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsannipātatopi sīghataro rūpanirodho vutto,
tika-abh08t0:2437_1: Ettāvatāti yvāyaṃ kalāpasammasananiyojanato paṭṭhāya yāva udayabbayapaṭivedhāya bhāvanā vidhi āraddho,
tika-abh08t0:2437_6: uppannañca vayaṃ upetīti iminā ākārena samapaññāsa lakkhaṇāni paṭivijjhitvā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2437_7: Adhunā uppannaṃ na tāva balappattanti āha “taruṇa”nti.
tika-abh08t0:2438_1: Athassa imāya taruṇavipassanāya vipassantassa dasa vipassanupakkilesā uppajjantīti dassento āha “vipassanāyā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2438_11: so ca sotāpannādīnaṃ aññataro hotīti āha “sotāpannādino”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2438_15: Sopi hi paṭivedhappattiyā āsannārahadese ṭhitattā sampattapaṭivedho nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2438_21: Vipassanaṃ ārabhitvā antarā vosānaṃ āpannassāpi vipassanupakkilesā na uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:2438_24: Atha vā vippaṭipannassāti vipassanābhāvanāsaṅkhātāya sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvena virahitapaṭipattikassa.
tika-abh08t0:2439_4: Sā ca nikkhittadhurassāpi hotīti imasmiṃ pakkhe nikkhittakammaṭṭhānopi imināva saṅgahito hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2439_5: Sammāva paṭipannassāti heṭṭhā vuttavidhānena sammā eva paṭipannassa,
tika-abh08t0:2439_9: Sā pana yuttayogitā samathavasenāpi hotīti tannivattanatthamāha “sadā vipassakassevā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2439_15: Sā panesā anussuti pāḷivaseneva āgatāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Yathāha –
tika-abh08t0:2440_4: tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-abh08t0:2440_8: pīti passaddhi sukhaṃ adhimokkho paggaho upaṭṭhānaṃ upekkhā nikanti uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2440_11: tena uddhaccena viggahitamānaso aniccato upaṭṭhānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti.
tika-abh08t0:2441_1: Idāni tesaṃ obhāsādīnaṃ sarūpavibhāvanatthaṃ tesu uppannesu vipassanāya upakkilissanākārañca dassetuṃ “vipassanāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2441_4: Tattha vipassanācittasamuṭṭhānaṃ yogino sarīraṭṭhameva pabhassaraṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati,
tika-abh08t0:2441_5: itaraṃ sarīraṃ muñcitvā ñāṇānubhāvānurūpaṃ samantato pharati,
tika-abh08t0:2441_10: Ācariyadhammapālattherena pana “dibbacakkhulābhino viya taṃ manoviññāṇaviññeyyamevāti yuttaṃ viya dissatī”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2442_2: ahamasmīti gaṇhatīti “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpo obhāso uppannapubbo,
tika-abh08t0:2442_5: Tassevaṃ pana gaṇhatoti tassa amaggaṃyeva “maggo”ti gaṇhantassa.
tika-abh08t0:2442_6: Vipassanāvīthīti paṭipāṭiyā pavattamānā vipassanāva ukkantā nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2442_9: tassevaṃ gaṇhato vipassanā tatoyeva vīthiṃ ukkantā nāma hotīti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2442_11: assādento nisīdatīti so bhikkhu attanā āraddhaṃ vipassanaṃ vissajjetvā obhāsameva lobhavasena vā diṭṭhivasena vā assādento nisīdati.
tika-abh08t0:2442_12: So kho panāyaṃ obhāso kassaci bhikkhuno pallaṅkaṭṭhānamattameva obhāsento uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2442_15: kassaci sakalavihāraṃ gāvutaṃ aḍḍhayojanaṃ yojanaṃ dviyojanaṃ tiyojanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2442_16: kassaci pathavītalato paṭṭhāya yāva akaniṭṭhabrahmalokā ekālokaṃ kurumāno,
tika-abh08t0:2443_3: ayañca pañcavidhā pīti udayabbayānupassanāya vīthipaṭipannāya anukkamena uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2443_4: Matthakappattena pana udayabbayañāṇena saddhiṃ pharaṇāpītiyeva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2444_3: tassa yogino rattiṭṭhāne vā divāṭṭhāne vā nisinnassa kāyacittāni passaddhāneva honti,
tika-abh08t0:2444_5: Passaddhiādīni cha yugaḷāni aññamaññayogīnīti passaddhiyā uppannāya itarāpi uppannāyeva hontīti kiccadassanamukhena
tika-abh08t0:2444_11: Kammaññāneva hontīti na kevalaṃ kammaññāneva suvisadāni ujukāniyeva honti,
tika-abh08t0:2444_12: avinābhāvitāya pana tadubhayaṃ visuṃ na vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2445_12: Cittassa anupasamakarānaṃ kilesānaṃ vigamena santacittassa saṃsāre bhayassa ikkhanena bhikkhuno sammā
tika-abh08t0:2445_13: ñāyena rūpārūpadhammānaṃ udayabbayānupassanādivasena te vipassato sammasato sammāraddhavipassanānaṃ manussānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2445_14: visayatāya amānusī vipassanāpītisukhasaññitā rati hotīti ayamettha gāthāya saṅkhepattho.
tika-abh08t0:2446_3: saddhāti vipassanācittasampayuttā saddhā”tiādinā vuttanayānusārena vipassanāvaseneva ñeyyā.
tika-abh08t0:2446_4: Tattha ñāṇaṃ rūpārūpadhamme udayabbayānupassanāvasena tulayantassa tīrentassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva
tika-abh08t0:2446_6: Tathā hi tena yogī “maggaṃ pattosmī”ti maññati.
tika-abh08t0:2446_7: Saddhāti kilesakālusiyāpagamena cittacetasikānaṃ atisayapasādabhūtā balavatī saddhā,
tika-abh08t0:2446_11: Imissā ca uppannāya so yaṃ yaṃ ṭhānaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2446_12: taṃ taṃ ṭhānamassa anupavisitvā okkhanditvā pakkhanditvā paribhaṇḍabhūtassa yathākammūpagañāṇassa upaṭṭhahante
tika-abh08t0:2446_13: paralokavisayattā vaṇṇāyatanavisayamatītanti dibbacakkhuno paraloko viya satiyā upaṭṭhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2446_14: Sukhaṃ pana sakalasarīraṃ abhisandamānaṃ atipaṇītaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2446_15: Tasmiñhi uppanne taṃsamuṭṭhitehi atipaṇītehi rūpehi sabbo kāyo pariphuṭo,
tika-abh08t0:2446_17: Upekkhā pana vipassanupekkhā ceva āvajjanupekkhā ca.
tika-abh08t0:2446_18: Tattha vicinitavicayattā saṅkhārānaṃ vicinane majjhattabhāvena ṭhitā vipassanupekkhā.
tika-abh08t0:2446_20: Manodvārāvajjanacittasampayuttā vedanā āvajjane ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattiyā āvajjanupekkhāti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2446_22: Tathā hi tasmiṃ samaye sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ udayabbaye majjhattabhūtā vipassanupekkhā balavatī uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2446_24: Sā hissa taṃ taṃ ṭhānaṃ āvajjantassa vissaṭṭhaindavajiramiva,
tika-abh08t0:2446_25: pattapuṭe pakkhandatattanārāco viya ca sūrā tikhiṇā hutvā pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:2446_26: Vīriyampi asithilamanaccāraddhaṃ sampayuttadhamme kilesapakkhato kosajjapakkhato paggaṇhantaṃ supaggahitamuppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2446_27: nikanti ca obhāsādipaṭimaṇḍitāya vipassanāya ālayaṃ kurumānā bhāvanāya sātisayappavattiyā sukhumā santākārā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2446_30: evaṃ etesupi aññasmiṃ uppanne yogāvacaro “na vata me ito pubbe evarūpā pīti uppannapubbā,
tika-abh08t0:2446_31: evarūpā passaddhi ñāṇaṃ saddhā sati sukhaṃ upekkhā vīriyaṃ nikanti uppannapubbā,
tika-abh08t0:2446_33: tassevaṃ gaṇhato vipassanā vīthiukkantā nāma hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2446_35: Ime ca pana vipassanupakkilesā yebhuyyena samathavipassanālābhino uppajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:2446_36: So samāpattivikkhambhitānaṃ kilesānaṃ asamudācārato “arahā aha”nti cittaṃ uppādetīti.
tika-abh08t0:2447_1: Upaklesassa vatthutoti nippariyāyato diṭṭhimānataṇhā idha upakkilesā tesaṃ vatthuto uppattiṭṭhānatāya,
tika-abh08t0:2447_4: evaṃ nikantipi diṭṭhiggāhādīnaṃ ṭhānaṃ hotīti vatthubhāvopissā yujjateva.
tika-abh08t0:2447_6: bhāvanā parihāyatīti taṃ taṃ obhāsādikaṃ āvajjamānassa diṭṭhimānataṇhāvasena “mama obhāso”tiādiggāhaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2448_1: Bahussuto pana obhāsādīsu uppannesu “ayaṃ kho me obhāso uppanno,
tika-abh08t0:2448_2: so kho panāyaṃ anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo”ti vā,
tika-abh08t0:2448_9: so evaṃ samanupassanto upakkilesajaṭaṃ vijaṭetvā obhāsādayo dhammā na maggo,
tika-abh08t0:2448_10: upakkilesavinimuttaṃ pana vīthipaṭipannaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ maggoti maggañca amaggañca vavatthapeti.
tika-abh08t0:2448_14: Maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhipattiyā ca tena yoginā tiṇṇaṃ saccānañca vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh08t0:2448_15: Diṭṭhivisuddhiyā tāva nāmarūpavavatthāpanena dukkhasaccavavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2448_19: imissaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhiyaṃ sammā maggassa avadhāraṇena maggasaccaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2448_20: Tadupāyabhūtassa hi maggassa avadhāraṇena taṃ avadhāritamevāti evaṃ lokiyeneva tāva ñāṇena tiṇṇaṃ saccānaṃ vavatthānaṃ kataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2454_3: Sikhāpatti panassā udayabbayañāṇādīnaṃ aṭṭhañāṇānaṃ vasenāti āha “aṭṭhañāṇavasenā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2455_1: Tāni pana ñāṇāni sarūpato dassetuṃ “aṭṭha ñāṇānī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2455_3: tathāpi yathāvuttaṭṭhena paṭipadāñāṇadassanampi hotiyevāti tampi idha vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2455_4: Itarattha pana uppannamattaṃ appaguṇaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2455_6: Yato tadadhigamena aṭṭhārasasu mahāvipassanāsu ekaccā adhigatāva honti.
tika-abh08t0:2455_7: Na hi udayabbayānaṃ paccakkhato paṭivedhena vinā sāmaññākārānaṃ tīraṇamattena sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhappahānaṃ sambhavati.
tika-abh08t0:2455_8: Asati ca paṭipakkhappahāne kuto ñāṇādīnaṃ vajiramiva avihatavegatā tikhiṇavisadāditā vā,
tika-abh08t0:2456_11: Nirapekkhatāya saṅkhārānaṃ upekkhanavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2457_1: Nanu ca udayabbayañāṇassa pageva siddhattā kimatthaṃ puna tatthāpi abhiyogoti ce?
tika-abh08t0:2457_3: Udayabbayañāṇañhi heṭṭhā dasahi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhaṃ hutvā yāthāvasarasato tilakkhaṇaṃ sallakkhetuṃ nāsakkhi,
