tika-abh08t0:2457_5: tasmā lakkhaṇasallakkhaṇatthaṃ puna tattheva yogo kātabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2457_8: tasmā udayabbayaṃ manasi katvā santatiṃ ugghāṭetvā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2457_10: dhātuyo vinibbhujitvā ghanavinibbhogaṃ katvā anattalakkhaṇañca sallakkhetvā “aniccā dukkhā anattā”ti saṅkhārā punappunaṃ sammasitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2457_11: Tassevaṃ tulayato tīrayato yadā saṅkhāragataṃ attano lahuupaṭṭhānena,
tika-abh08t0:2457_12: ñāṇassa ca tikkhatāya tirohituppādādibhedaṃ bhijjamānameva upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2457_14: tadā bhaṅgānupassanā nāma vipassanāñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2457_15: Tassa tadeva saṅkhāranirodhārammaṇabhaṅgānupassanaṃ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavayonigatiṭṭhitinivāsesu
tika-abh08t0:2457_16: saṅkhārā bhijjanasabhāvatāya yakkharakkhasādayo viya mahābhayaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:2457_23: byasanāpannānaṃ pana sabbasaṅkhārānaṃ bhayato upaṭṭhitānaṃ gahaṇena bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇanti vuccatīti.
tika-abh08t0:2458_0: Tassa taṃ bhayatupaṭṭhānañāṇaṃ āsevantassa yadā sabbabhavagatesu saṅkhāresu tāṇaṃ vā leṇaṃ vā parāyaṇaṃ vā na paññāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2458_1: ukkhittāsiko viya paccāmitto sādīnavā eva saṅkhārā upaṭṭhahanti,
tika-abh08t0:2458_2: tassa saṅkhārānaṃ ādīnavameva passantassa ādīnavañāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2458_3: Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhāre ādīnavato passantassa yadā tibhavapariyāpannesu nibbedo uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2458_6: tadāssa nibbidānupassanaṃ nāma ñāṇaṃ uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2458_7: Tassa yadā iminā nibbidāñāṇena sabbasaṅkhāresu nibbindantassa ekasaṅkhārepi cittaṃ na sajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2458_8: sabbasmā saṅkhārato sappamukhagatassa viya maṇḍūkassa muccitukāmatā uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2458_10: Tassevaṃ sabbasaṅkhārehi muccitukāmassa niccasukhasubhaattākārena pana upaṭṭhituṃ asamatthataṃ pāpetvā
tika-abh08t0:2458_14: tucchatādīhi anattalakkhaṇañca āropetvā sabbasaṅkhāragataṃ pariggaṇhantassa paṭisaṅkhānupassanāñāṇaṃ nāma uppannaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2458_15: Tena panevaṃ pariggahitasaṅkhārena yā sā “suññamidaṃ attena vā attaniyena vā”tiādinā dvikoṭikādibhedā suññatā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:2458_17: Tassevaṃ suññato disvā tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sammasantassa yadā bhayañca nandiñca vippahāya vissaṭṭhabhariyassa
tika-abh08t0:2458_21: Taṃ panetaṃ yāva nibbānaṃ na passati,
tika-abh08t0:2458_22: tāva disākāko viya kūpakayaṭṭhiṃ punappunaṃ saṅkhārameva anabhimatampi nissāya saṅkhāravicinanepi majjhattameva hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh08t0:2459_4: “Vuṭṭhāna”nti hi bahiddhā nimittabhūtā abhiniviṭṭhavatthuto ceva ajjhattappavattato ca vuṭṭhahanato maggo vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:2460_1: Tanti yaṃ sikhāpattā vipassanā saccānulomañāṇanti ca vuccati,
tika-abh08t0:2460_3: Āsevantassāti punappunaṃ sammasanavasena sevantassa bhāventassa bahulīkarontassa.
tika-abh08t0:2460_4: Tassa hi adhimokkhasaddhā bhāvanāvasena balavatarā nibbattissati,
tika-abh08t0:2460_8: tatova anulomañāṇuppattiyā paccayo bhavituṃ samatthā tikkhatamā saṅkhārupekkhā uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2461_2: votarateva sāti aniccādīsu ekena ākārena sammasantī sattakkhattuṃ pavattitvā bhijjantī bhavaṅgaṃ otiṇṇā nāma hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2461_8: Bhavaṅgāvaṭṭanaṃ katvāti bhavaṅgassa nivattanaṃ katvā cittassa bhavaṅgavasena pavattituṃ adatvā.
tika-abh08t0:2462_3: “udayabbayavantānaṃyeva vata dhammānaṃ udayabbayañāṇaṃ uppādavaye addasā”ti ca “bhaṅgavantānaṃyeva vata
tika-abh08t0:2462_4: bhaṅgānupassanaṃ bhaṅgamaddasā”ti ca “sabhayaṃyeva vata bhayatupaṭṭhānassa bhayato upaṭṭhita”nti ca “sādīnaveyeva
tika-abh08t0:2462_5: vata ādīnavānupassanaṃ ādīnavamaddasā”ti ca “nibbinditabbeyeva vata nibbidāñāṇaṃ nibbinda”nti ca “muccitabbamhiyeva
tika-abh08t0:2462_6: vata muccitukamyatāñāṇaṃ muccitukāmaṃ jāta”nti ca “paṭisaṅkhātabbameva vata paṭisaṅkhāñāṇena paṭisaṅkhāta”nti
tika-abh08t0:2462_7: ca “upekkhitabbaṃyeva vata saṅkhārupekkhāya upekkhita”nti ca atthato vadamānaṃ viya imesañca aṭṭhannaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2462_8: ñāṇānaṃ katakiccatāya anulometi sabbāsaṃyeva vipassanānaṃ lakkhaṇattayasammasanakiccattā,
tika-abh08t0:2462_9: tathā upari ca ariyamagge sattatiṃsāya bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ tāya paṭipadāya pattabbatāya.
tika-abh08t0:2462_10: Na hi anulomañāṇe thūlathūlasaccapaṭicchādakasaṃkilesavikkhambhanavasena appavattante gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2462_11: gotrabhuñāṇe ca anuppanne maggañāṇaṃ na uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2462_19: Asaṅkhatārammaṇaṃ pana sabbena sabbaṃ ariyamaggasaṅkhātaṃ vuṭṭhānaṃ gacchati upetīti.
tika-abh08t0:2462_20: Tatopi hi visesato “vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā”ti vattabbataṃ labhatīti āha “ñeyyaṃ sabbappakārenā”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2463_2: ariyamaggādhiṭṭhānatāya mahantānaṃ sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ esanato gavesanato mahesinā sammāsambuddhena.
tika-abh08t0:2469_1: Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṃ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t0:2469_4: Āvajjaniyaṭhānattāti āvajjanakiccaṃ karontaṃ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abbohārikameva ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2469_6: tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya pariyosānattā vipassanāpakkhiyamevāti āha “vipassanāya sotasmiṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2470_2: tadeva gottaṃ ariyehi asammissā puthujjanasamaññāti pothujjanikagottaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2470_10: Tato bhavatīti tato gottato ārammaṇapaccayato bhavati. Iti-
tika-abh08t0:2471_2: Taṃ sampādetuṃ panicchatā tena bhikkhunā yaṃ aññaṃ kiñcipi kātabbaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2471_5: “Katamevā”ti vutte “katha”nti anuyogassa upaṭṭhitattā “anulomāvasānaṃ hī”tiādinā taṃ samattheti.
tika-abh08t0:2472_1: Evaṃ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa etehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādakatamamhi
tika-abh08t0:2472_5: sabbaṃ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṃ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t0:2472_6: athassa sabbasmiṃ nimittappavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṃ gotrabhuñāṇaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2473_3: Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato punarāvattābhāvena pana anāvattaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2473_5: Saññaṃ datvā viyāti “evaṃ uppajjāhī”ti saññaṃ datvā viya.
tika-abh08t0:2473_10: eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṃ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṃ veṭhetvā saraṃ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi,
tika-abh08t0:2473_11: añño puriso cakkayantaṃ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṃ abhimukhaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2473_13: Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva saraṃ khipitvā phalakasatanibbijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:2473_16: daṇḍakasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva phalakasataṃ nibbijjhanaṃ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṃ amuñcitvāva
tika-abh08t0:2473_17: nibbānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṃ apadālitapubbānaṃ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṃ nibbijjhananti.
tika-abh08t0:2474_2: mahodadhinti aṭṭhamabhavato paṭṭhāya nibbattakaṃ aññātakoṭiṃ saṃsāravaṭṭadukkhamahāsamuddaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2474_3: Pāṇātipātādipañcaverāni ceva pañcavīsati mahābhayāni cāti sabbaverabhayāni.
tika-abh08t0:2476_1: “Ajānitvā vadanti te”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṃ dassetuṃ “ekassā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2476_2: Pañcamaṃ maggacittanti imināva chaṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena “ekaṃ phalacitta”nti vadato godattattherassa vādopi paṭikkhitto.
tika-abh08t0:2477_2: Sotāpannoti vuccatīti sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggaloti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2477_3: So devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṃ āgamma bhusaṃ pamattopi hutvā kāmasugatiyaṃ sattakkhattumeva
tika-abh08t0:2480_0: Rūpārūpalokesu pana na tathā niyamoti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t0:2481_3: Tathā ca “iminā vatāhaṃ maggena āgato”ti paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2481_4: tato “ayaṃ me ānisaṃso laddho”ti phalaṃ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2481_5: tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2481_6: tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2481_7: avasāne “ayaṃ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh08t0:2482_4: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇañhi sekhānampi hoti vā na vā.
tika-abh08t0:2482_5: Na hi sabbeva tattha samatthā honti.
tika-abh08t0:2482_6: Teneva hi mahānāmo bhagavantaṃ pucchi “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṃ appahīno,
tika-abh08t0:2482_7: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2482_9: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṃ tanubhāvakarāya sakadāgāmimaggasaṅkhātāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya vipassanāyogaṃ karoti,
tika-abh08t0:2482_12: Sampayuttānaṃ pana nissayabhāvena te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi,
tika-abh08t0:2482_13: yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati,
tika-abh08t0:2482_16: Ñāṇena parimajjatīti tena tenākārena indriyānaṃ tikkhatarataṃ sampādetvā,
tika-abh08t0:2482_17: balabojjhaṅgānañca paṭutarabhāvaṃ sādhetvā lakkhaṇattayaṃ tīraṇavasena parimajjati.
tika-abh08t0:2483_4: Gotrabhussa anantaranti ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu.
tika-abh08t0:2483_11: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidāmagge “uppādādiabhibhavanaṭṭhaṃ upādāya aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2483_12: dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”tiādīsu gotrabhunāmavaseneva āgataṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2483_13: tasmā idhāpi “gotrabhussa anantara”nti vuttaṃ gottasaṅkhātanibbānato bhūtanti katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2484_3: Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
tika-abh08t0:2484_4: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2484_7: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatīti ime cattāropi idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t0:2484_8: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t0:2484_11: bhave vā antakaro bhavassa antakaroti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2484_13: Byāpādakāmarāgānaṃ pahānāyāti tesaṃyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukarānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ niravasesappahānāya.
tika-abh08t0:2485_3: Tatthevāti suddhāvāse vā aññattha vā yattha uppanno,
tika-abh08t0:2485_5: Anāvattisabhāvoti tasmā lokā idha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṃ lokaṃ punarāgamanābhāvato anāvattanasabhāvo,
tika-abh08t0:2486_9: attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā “sadattho”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t0:2486_12: Catassopīti sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti catassopi.
tika-abh08t0:2492_1: Idāni imissāyeva catutthañāṇāya ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā ānubhāvavijānanatthaṃ yena ye dhammā pahātabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2492_2: tesaṃ pahānañca abhisamayakāle pariññādikiccāni ca dassetuṃ “etesu yena ye dhammā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2492_6: dukkhena vā sattānaṃ saṃyojanaṭṭhena bandhanaṭṭhena saṃyojanāni.
tika-abh08t0:2492_17: Nāmakāyassa ca rūpakāyassa ca ganthanato ganthā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_22: āgotrabhuto sabbe dhamme byāpetvā pavattantīti attho,
tika-abh08t0:2492_24: cakkhādīhi vā saṃvarāsaṃvaradvārehi sattasantāne āsavanti vaṇato yūsāni sandanti viyāti āsavā,
tika-abh08t0:2492_25: āsavanti vā etehi cittāni visayesūti āsavā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_29: Aniccādidhammasabhāvaṃ atikkamma parato asabhāvato āmasantīti parāmāsā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_30: Maṇḍūkaṃ pannago viya ārammaṇaṃ bhusaṃ ādiyantīti upādānāni.
tika-abh08t0:2492_31: Appahīnabhāvena sattasantāne anusenti mūsikavisaṃ viya anurūpakāraṇaṃ labhitvā uppajjantīti anusayā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_33: Akusalakammāni ca tāni duggatīnaṃ pathā cāti akusalakammapathā.
tika-abh08t0:2492_34: Idha pana kammapathabhāvaṃ appattānaṃ taṃsabhāvato gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2492_37: akusalo ca so cittuppādo cāti akusalacittuppādo.
tika-abh08t0:2493_5: Rūpārūpabhavato heṭṭhimakoṭṭhāsabhāvato tatthuppādakilesānaṃ appahīnabhāvena tatiyamaggappattiyā heṭṭhā bhajitabbato vā adhobhāgā,
tika-abh08t0:2495_0: Micchāsaṅkappo micchāvāyāmo micchāsamādhīti tathā pavattānaṃ vitakkavīriyasamādhīnamadhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2498_0: “Tayo”ti vatthuṃ abhinditvā vuttaṃ, bhinditvā ca pana vuccamāne dvādasa honti.
tika-abh08t0:2499_1: “Idameva saccaṃ moghamañña”nti evaṃ avatthumhi pavatto abhiniveso idaṃsaccābhiniveso.
tika-abh08t0:2501_0: Āsavesu kāmarāgabhavarāgā atthato lobhoti dhammato tayo āsavā.
tika-abh08t0:2502_1: Te hi ogho viya attani patite apāyasamuddaṃ pāpenti,
tika-abh08t0:2502_2: saṃsāradukkhato ca sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ na denti,
tika-abh08t0:2504_0: Sattānusayāti ettha yadi appahīnaṭṭhena sattasantāne anusentīti anusayā.
tika-abh08t0:2504_5: thāmagamanañca nesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇo sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2504_6: Tathā hi dhammasabhāvavedinā tathāgatena imeyeva anusayā vuttā,
tika-abh08t0:2504_9: Apare pana “kāmarāgassa anusayo”tiādinibbacanaṃ vatvā kāmarāgādīnaṃ bījabhūtā attabhāvassa kilesasambhūtā kilesuppādanasatti anusayāti vaṇṇenti,
tika-abh08t0:2505_3: Tasmiṃ pāṇe pāṇasaññino jīvitindriyupacchedakappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā vadhakacetanā pāṇātipāto.
tika-abh08t0:2505_6: Abhūtaṃ vatthuṃ bhūtato paraṃ viññāpetukāmassa tathā viññāpanappayogasamuṭṭhāpikā cetanā musāvādo.
tika-abh08t0:2505_14: So pana parehi gahiteyeva kammapatho hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2505_15: “Aho vatedaṃ mama hotū”ti evaṃ parabhaṇḍābhijjhāyanalakkhaṇā abhijjhā.
tika-abh08t0:2505_16: “Aho vatāyaṃ satto vinasseyyā”ti evaṃ manopadosalakkhaṇo byāpādo.
tika-abh08t0:2506_9: Mahāsāvajjaappasāvajjappayogādibhedo pana tattha tattha vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2509_1: saddena avadhāraṇaṃ akatvā yaṃ yaṃ dutiyañāṇavajjhanti vā tatiyañāṇavajjhanti vā catutthañāṇavajjhanti vā vakkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2509_2: tattha tattha so so purimañāṇehi hatāpāyagamanīyādibhāvova hutvā upariñāṇavajjho hotīti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2512_0: Agatiyo paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhāti kiñcāpi chandādayo taṇhādisabhāvā uparimaggavajjhā,
tika-abh08t0:2513_2: Yaṃ pana “kukkuccapakatatāya āpattiṃ āpajjatī”ti vuttaṃ kukkuccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2513_3: taṃ sandhāya “kukkuccavicikicchā sotāpattimaggena pahīyantī”ti dhammasaṅgaṇīaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2513_4: tasmā dvinnaṃ vacanānaṃ ayaṃ adhippāyo veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2513_7: Oḷārikānavasesappahānaṃ vā sandhāya kukkuccassa paṭhamatatiyañāṇavajjhatā vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2513_8: Yaṃ pana arahato uppajjamānaṃ “bhagavatā paṭikkhittaṃ anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjitunti
tika-abh08t0:2513_12: nīvaraṇapatirūpakaṃ pana kappatīti vīmaṃsanabhūtaṃ vinayakukkuccaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2516_1: Tena tenāti tena tena ghātakena saddhiṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2516_2: Kiṃ panetāni ete dhamme ghātentāni atītānāgate ghātenti,
tika-abh08t0:2516_9: tathāpi aphalo vāyāmena saddhiṃ pahātabbānaṃ atthitāya.
tika-abh08t0:2516_13: ye pana maggena asamugghāṭitattā kāraṇalābhe sati avassaṃ uppajjanārahā kilesā,
tika-abh08t0:2516_14: te attano uppattiyā anuppattidhammataṃ āpādentāni etāni te anāgate ghātenti nāma.
tika-abh08t0:2518_2: kathaṃ nāma ekekassa ñāṇassa ekakkhaṇe cattāri kiccāni sambhavanti.
tika-abh08t0:2518_3: Na hi tādisaṃ kiñci loke diṭṭhaṃ atthi,
tika-abh08t0:2518_4: na ca vacanaṃ labbhatīti codanaṃ manasi nidhāya tesaṃ jānanavidhiṃ upamāvasena tāva dassetuṃ “padīpo hī”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2519_7: Tañhi sampayuttadhammesu sammohaṃ viddhaṃsentaṃ attanipi sammohaṃ viddhaṃsetiyeva.
tika-abh08t0:2519_10: “Nirodhaṃ sacchikarotī”ti nirodhasaccamekaṃ ārammaṇapaṭivedhena cattāripi saccāni asammohapaṭivedhena maggañāṇaṃ paṭivijjhati.
tika-abh08t0:2520_0: Evaṃ yuttivasena vibhāvitaṃ ekapaṭivedhaṃ āgamenapi sādhetuṃ “vuttampi ceta”ntiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2520_1: Maggasamaṅgissa ñāṇanti hi “yo nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh08t0:2520_7: Aññathā kamābhisamaye sati purimadiṭṭhassa puna adassanato samudayādipassato dukkhādidassanaṃ puna avattabbaṃ siyā.
tika-abh08t0:2520_12: tena tena maggena yathā yathā nirodhassa sacchikiriyā,
tika-abh08t0:2520_13: tathā tathā kilesasnehapariyādānaṃ hotīti nirodhasacchikiriyāya snehapariyādānasadisatā kāraṇūpacārena vuttā.
tika-abh08t0:2522_4: ettāvatā paññābhāvanāya nānākilesaviddhaṃsanavasappavatto ānisaṃso dassito hotīti.
tika-abh08t0:2523_2: “ariyaphalasamāpattī”ti hi catunnampi phalaṭṭhānaṃ attano attano ariyaphalassa diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ nirodhe appanā.
tika-abh08t0:2523_3: Cattāropi hi ariyapuggalā sakaṃ sakaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:2523_4: Keci pana “anāgāmiarahantova samāpajjanti samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāyā”ti vadanti,
tika-abh08t0:2523_5: taṃ akāraṇaṃ attanā paṭiladdhasamāpattisamāpajjane samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāya kātabbābhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2523_6: Sabbaso asamucchinnakilesassa hi puthujjanassāpi attanā paṭiladdhalokiyasamāpattisamāpajjanaṃ labbhati,
tika-abh08t0:2523_8: Uparimā pana heṭṭhimaṃ pubbe paṭiladdhampi na samāpajjanti puggalantarabhāvaṃ upagatattā.
tika-abh08t0:2523_11: anantaraphalattā ca lokuttarakusalānaṃ heṭṭhimato uparimo bhavantaragato viya hotīti tassa tassa ariyassa taṃ taṃ phalaṃ bhavaṅgasadisaṃ hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2523_12: tasmā puggalantarabhāvūpagamanena paṭippassaddhattā natthi uparimassa heṭṭhimaphalasamāpattiyā samāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2523_13: heṭṭhimo pana uparimaṃ na samāpajjati anadhigatattāti cattāropi puggalā sakasakaphalameva samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:2523_14: Taṃ pana samāpajjitukāmena ariyasāvakena rahogatena paṭisallīnena udayabbayādivasena saṅkhārā vipassitabbā.
tika-abh08t0:2523_15: Tassa pavattānupubbavipassanassa saṅkhārārammaṇagotrabhuñāṇānantaraṃ phalasamāpattivasena nirodhe cittaṃ appeti.
tika-abh08t0:2523_16: Phalasamāpattininnacittatāya cettha sekhassa phalameva uppajjati, na maggo.
tika-abh08t0:2524_0: Tathā hi ariyamaggavīthiyaṃ anulomañāṇāni anibbiddhapubbānaṃ thūlathūlalobhakkhandhādīnaṃ sātisayaṃ padālanena
tika-abh08t0:2524_2: phalasamāpattivīthiyaṃ pana tāni tena tena maggena tesaṃ tesaṃ kilesānaṃ samucchinnattā kilesavikkhambhane
tika-abh08t0:2524_3: nirussukkāni kevalaṃ ariyānaṃ phalasamāpattisukhasamaṅgibhāvassa parikammappattāni hutvā uppajjantīti
tika-abh08t0:2524_5: Yato nesaṃ pacchimo saṅkhāranimittato vuṭṭhahitvā maggassa anantarapaccayo bhaveyya,
tika-abh08t0:2524_6: teneva ca phalasamāpattiyā anantarapaccayabhūtaṃ ñāṇaṃ saṅkhārārammaṇameva hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2524_8: Pubbābhisaṅkhāravasena cassā pabandhavasena pavattiparicchinnakālāpagame bhavaṅgavasena tato vuṭṭhānañca veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2525_0: Nirodhasamāpatti pana tatiyacatutthaphalaṭṭhānaṃ anupubbanirodhavasena cittacetasikānaṃ dhammānaṃ appavatti.
tika-abh08t0:2525_1: Anāgāmiarahantoyeva hi kāmacchandādisamucchindanena samādhismiṃ paripūrakāritāya samathaphalasamannāgatattā nirodhaṃ samāpajjanti.
tika-abh08t0:2525_2: Tathā hetaṃ samathavipassanānaṃ yuganandhabhāvappavattanavasena dvīhi balehi samannāgatasseva sambhavati,
tika-abh08t0:2525_4: khīṇāsavena vā aṭṭhasamāpattilābhinā rahogatena paṭisallīnena paṭhamajjhānaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tattha
tika-abh08t0:2525_6: tato dutiyaṃ tatiyaṃ catutthaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya tatheva tattha saṅkhārā sammasitabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2525_7: atha ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya nānābaddhāvikopanaṃ saṅghapaṭimānanaṃ satthupakkosanaṃ addhānaparicchedoti
tika-abh08t0:2526_0: Tattha sarīrato visaṃyuttā mañcapīṭhādayo sattāhabbhantare yathā na nassanti,
tika-abh08t0:2526_3: Saṅgho pana ñattikammādīsu kiñcideva kammaṃ kattukāmo “yāva maṃ na pakkosati,
tika-abh08t0:2526_5: Satthā ca “sikkhāpadapaññāpanādīsu yāva maṃ na pakkosati,
tika-abh08t0:2526_9: Athekaṃ vā dve vā cittavāre atikkamitvā acittako hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2526_11: tato yathāparicchedaṃ tatiyacatutthaphalānaṃ aññatarena nirodhā vuṭṭhahissatīti.
tika-abh08t0:2527_9: Aviggahakampadanti viggahañca kampañca na detīti aviggahakampadanti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2534_6: hinoti vā etena kammanidānabhūtena uddhaṃ ojaṃ atiharantena mūlena viya pādapo tappaccayaṃ phalaṃ gacchati viruḷhiṃ āpajjatīti hetu,
tika-abh08t0:2534_9: hetu hutvā paccayo hetubhāvena paccayoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2535_4: Sabbalokiyalokuttaranti iminā paññattiyāpi loke viditabhāvena lokiyapadena saṅgahitattā rūpādibhedesu
tika-abh08t0:2535_5: chabbidhesu saṅkhatāsaṅkhatapaññattidhammesu na koci dhammo ārammaṇapaccayo na hotīti dasseti.
tika-abh08t0:2535_6: Teneva “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbhā”ti aniyato katoti.
tika-abh08t0:2535_7: Nanu ca “yaṃ yaṃ dhamma”nti vuttattā paññattiyā gahaṇaṃ na hotīti?
tika-abh08t0:2535_12: Te pana taṃ ārabbha uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti ca.
tika-abh08t0:2535_13: Yathā hi dubbalo puriso daṇḍaṃ vā rajjuṃ vā ālambitvā uṭṭhahati ceva tiṭṭhati ca,
tika-abh08t0:2535_14: evaṃ cittacetasikā dhammā rūpādiārammaṇaṃ ālambitvā uppajjanti ceva tiṭṭhanti cāti.
tika-abh08t0:2536_2: Attādhīnānañhi patibhūto dhammo adhipatīti so tesaṃ pamukhabhāvena pavattati.
tika-abh08t0:2536_3: “Chandādhipati chandasampayuttakānaṃ dhammānaṃ taṃsamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato
tika-abh08t0:2536_4: chandādayo cattāro dhammā sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ sahajātādhipatīti dassento āha “tattha sahajātādhipatī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2536_5: “Chandavato kiṃ nāma kammaṃ na sijjhatī”tiādikaṃ purimābhisaṅkhārūpanissayaṃ labhitvā uppajjamāne cittuppāde
tika-abh08t0:2536_7: taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpe ca sādhayamānā vase vattayamānā hutvā pavattanti,
tika-abh08t0:2536_8: te ca tesaṃ vasena vattanti hīnādibhāvena tadanuvattanato.
tika-abh08t0:2536_11: Yadā hi chandaṃ dhuraṃ chandaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā cittaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2536_14: Adhipatibhāvopi hi nesaṃ attano pavattinivārake abhibhuyya pavattanato hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2536_17: Vuttañhetaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ garuṃ katvā ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
tika-abh08t0:2536_18: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ adhipatipaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2536_19: Tattha garuṃ katvāti garukāracittīkāravasena vā assādanavasena vā garuṃ bhārikaṃ laddhabbaṃ anavaññātaṃ katvā.
tika-abh08t0:2536_20: Garukātabbañhi ārammaṇaṃ tanninnapoṇapabbhārānaṃ assādanapaccavekkhaṇamaggaphalānaṃ attano vase vattayamānaṃ viya paccayo hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2536_21: tasmā ayaṃ attādhīnānaṃ patibhāvena upakārakattā adhipatipaccayo daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2537_5: Anantaraniruddhāti attano nirodhānantaraṃ anurūpacittuppādassa uppattipaccayabhāvena tassa uppattiyā purimabhāge anantaraṃ hutvā niruddhā,
tika-abh08t0:2538_1: tathā samanantarapaccayopīti ṭhapetvā upasaggamattaṃ na ettha koci viseso.
tika-abh08t0:2538_5: rūpakalāpānaṃ viya saṇṭhānābhāvato paccayapaccayuppannānaṃ sahaṭṭhānābhāvato ca “idamito uddhaṃ heṭṭhā
tika-abh08t0:2538_6: tiriya”nti vibhāgābhāvā attano ekattamiva upanetvā suṭṭhu anantarabhāvena uppādetuṃ samatthatā samanantarapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t0:2538_7: tasmā dhammato avisesepi vineyyavasena byañjanatthamattato visesaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ visuṃ desanā katā.
tika-abh08t0:2538_10: taṃ “nirodhā vuṭṭhahantassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ kusalaṃ phalasamāpattiyā samanantarapaccayena paccayo”tiādīhi virujjhatītiādinā paṭikkhittaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2539_0: Uppajjamānova sahuppādanavasena upakārako dhammo sahajātapaccayo pakāsassa padīpo viya,
tika-abh08t0:2539_5: paṭisandhikkhaṇe vatthuvipākā aññamañña”nti ca tividho hoti,
tika-abh08t0:2539_7: Yampi hi pāḷiyaṃ arūpakkhandhādivasenassa chabbidhataṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2540_0: Aññamaññaṃ uppādanupatthambhanabhāvena attano upakārakassa upakārako dhammo aññamaññapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2540_1: Aññamaññupatthambhakatidaṇḍakaṃ viya upakārakatā ca aññamaññatāvaseneva daṭṭhabbā,
tika-abh08t0:2540_3: Sahajātādipaccayo hontoyeva hi koci kassaci aññamaññapaccayo na hoti cittacetasikānaṃ cittajarūpe sati,
tika-abh08t0:2540_8: Ācariyena pana paccayuppannadhamme aparāmasitvā vuccamānattā avisesena vuttaṃ “tathā aññamaññapaccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2541_1: cittakammādīnaṃ paṭādayo viya ca nissayākārena upakārako dhammo nissayapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2541_2: Vatthurūpānīti sattannaṃ viññāṇadhātūnaṃ adhiṭṭhānākārena nissayapaccayabhūtāni vatthurūpāni.
tika-abh08t0:2541_6: tadadhīnavuttitāya attano phalena nissito na paṭikkhittoti nissayo.
tika-abh08t0:2542_3: tasmā balavakāraṇabhāvena upakārako dhammo upanissayapaccayoti veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2542_4: So ārammaṇūpanissayo anantarūpanissayo pakatūpanissayoti tividhoti āha “ārammaṇā”tiādi. Tattha –
tika-abh08t0:2543_0: “Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā taṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2543_2: jhānā vuṭṭhahitvā jhānaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t0:2543_5: sekhā maggā vuṭṭhahitvā maggaṃ garuṃ katvā paccavekkhantī”ti –
tika-abh08t0:2544_0: Evamādinā nayena ārammaṇūpanissayo tāva ārammaṇādhipatinā saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhatto.
tika-abh08t0:2544_4: yaṃ ārammaṇaṃ garuṃ katvā cittacetasikā uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t0:2544_5: taṃ niyamato tesaṃ ārammaṇesu balavārammaṇaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2544_7: balavakāraṇaṭṭhena ārammaṇūpanissayoti ca evametesaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2545_0: Anantarūpanissayopi “purimā purimā kusalā khandhā pacchimānaṃ pacchimānaṃ kusalānaṃ khandhānaṃ upanissayapaccayena
tika-abh08t0:2545_1: paccayo”tiādinā nayena anantarapaccayena saddhiṃ nānattaṃ akatvāva vibhattoti āha “anantarūpanissayo
tika-abh08t0:2545_3: Evaṃ santepi attano anantarā anurūpacittuppādavasena anantarapaccayo,
tika-abh08t0:2546_0: Pakatiyā eva paccayantararahitena attano sabhāveneva upanissayo pakatūpanissayo,
tika-abh08t0:2546_1: ārammaṇaanantarehi amissova puthageva koci upanissayoti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2546_5: so attano phalassa uppādanasamatthabhāvena santāne nipphāditabhāvaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2546_7: tasmā attano santāne nipphanno vā kāyikasukhadukkhasaddhāsīlādi upasevito vā utubhojanādi pakatūpanissayoti attho.
tika-abh08t0:2546_9: Evañca katvā anāgatassāpi upanissayapaccayatā laddhā hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2546_14: saddena yaṃ yaṃ upanissāya yassa yassa sambhavo,
tika-abh08t0:2546_15: taṃ taṃ tassa tassa upanissayapaccayabhūtaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
tika-abh08t0:2547_0: Paccayuppannato paṭhamataraṃ uppajjitvā vattamānabhāvena upakārako dhammo purejātapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2547_1: So ca rūpadhammova samāno arūpadhammasseva hoti.
tika-abh08t0:2547_8: pañhāvāre pana “sekhā vā puthujjanā vā cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantī”tiādinā avisesena
tika-abh08t0:2547_9: paccuppannacakkhādīnampi gahitattā dhammārammaṇassa ārammaṇapurejātabhāvo na sakkā paṭibāhituṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2547_10: Atthatopi hetaṃ siddhaṃ “yaṃ yaṃ paccuppannaṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā manodvāre cittaṃ pavattati,
tika-abh08t0:2547_12: Ettha ca nissayārammaṇākārādīhi visiṭṭhā purejātabhāvena vinā upakārabhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ vatthārammaṇānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2547_13: purejātākārena upakārakatā purejātapaccayatāti ayamassa nissayārammaṇapaccayatāhi viseso.
tika-abh08t0:2548_0: Gijjhapotakasarīrānaṃ āhārāsā cetanā viya purejātānaṃ rūpānaṃ upatthambhakabhāvena upakārako dhammo pacchājātapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2548_1: Manosañcetanāhāravasena hi pacchājātacittacetasikehi vinā santānaṭṭhitihetubhāvaṃ agacchantānaṃ pacchājātākārena
tika-abh08t0:2548_2: cittacetasikānaṃ upakārakatā vippayuttākārādīhi visiṭṭhā pacchājātapaccayatāti evaṃ sabbapaccayānaṃ paccayantarākāravisiṭṭhā
tika-abh08t0:2548_4: So pana “pacchājātā cittacetasikā dhammā purejātassa imassa kāyassa pacchājātapaccayena paccayo”ti āgatattā ekavidhoti āha “cittacetasikāvā”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2549_0: Purimapurimaparicitagantho viya uttaruttarassa ganthassa kusalādibhāvena attasadisapaguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ attasajātiyatāgāhakaṃ āsevanaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2549_2: Bhinnajātikā hi bhinnajātikānaṃ āsevanaguṇena paguṇabalavabhāvavisiṭṭhaṃ kusalādibhāvasaṅkhātaṃ attano gatiṃ gāhāpetuṃ na sakkonti,
tika-abh08t0:2549_4: Te pana anantarātītāni lokiyakusalākusalāni ceva anāvajjanakiriyājavanāni cāti āha “ṭhapetvā āvajjanadvaya”ntiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2549_5: “Na maggapaccayā āsevane eka”nti vacanato ahetukakiriyāsu hasituppādasseva āsevanabhāvena,
tika-abh08t0:2549_7: lokuttarampi kusalaṃ bhinnajātikasseva phalassa purecarattā na tena,
tika-abh08t0:2549_10: Vipākabhāvappattaṃ kammapariṇāmitaṃ kammavegakkhittaṃ patitaṃ viya hutvā pavattamānaṃ attano sabhāvaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2549_19: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhānaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “lokuttaro pana āsevanapaccayo nāma natthī”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2549_20: Maggo pana gotrabhuto āsevanaṃ na gaṇhātīti natthi bhūmiādivasena nānājātikatāya anadhippetattā.
tika-abh08t0:2549_21: Tathā hi vuttaṃ paṭṭhāne “gotrabhu maggassa āsevanapaccayena paccayo,
tika-abh08t0:2550_10: Sāsavakusalākusalacetanāti attano uppādavisiṭṭhe santāne sesapaccayasamāgame pavattamānānaṃ vipākakaṭattārūpānaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2550_13: Tassā hi tathā kiriyābhāvena pavattattā tesaṃ pavatti,
tika-abh08t0:2550_15: Itarā pana sahajātānaṃ āyūhanakiriyābhāvena pavattamānā upakārikāti vattabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2550_16: Avadhāraṇena panettha cetanāsampayuttaṃ abhijjhādikammaṃ paṭikkhipati satipi vipākadhammasabhāve cetanāvajjānaṃ ataṃsabhāvattā.
tika-abh08t0:2550_21: pana lokuttaracetanā ca uppajjitvā niruddhā attano attano vipākakkhandhānaṃ nānakkhaṇikakammapaccayena paccayo”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2551_0: Attano nirussāhasantabhāvena sahajātanāmarūpānaṃ nirussāhasantabhāvāya upakārakā arūpadhammāva vipākapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2551_2: Te hi payogena asādhetabbatāya kammassa katattā nipphajjanamattato nirussāhasantabhāvā honti,
tika-abh08t0:2551_5: Pañcadvārepi hi javanappavattiyāva rūpādīnaṃ gahitatā viññāyati.
tika-abh08t0:2552_1: Satipi hi janakabhāve upatthambhakattameva āhārassa padhānakiccaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2552_2: janayantopi ca āhāro avicchedavasena upatthambhentova janetīti upatthambhanabhāvova āhārabhāvoti.
tika-abh08t0:2553_0: Tesu tesu kiccesu paccayuppannadhammehi attānaṃ anuvattāpanakasaṅkhātaādhipaccaṭṭhena paccayo indriyapaccayo.
tika-abh08t0:2553_1: Adhipatipaccayadhammānañhi pavattivinivārake abhibhavitvā pavattanena garubhāvo adhipatiyaṭṭho,
tika-abh08t0:2553_4: arūpadhammehi ca jīvantehi sukhitādibhāvesu sukhitādīhi adhimokkhapaggahaupaṭṭhānāvikkhepappajānanesu “anaññātaṃ ñassāmī”ti pavattiyaṃ ājānane,
tika-abh08t0:2553_5: aññātāvibhāve ca saddhādisahajātehīti evaṃ taṃtaṃkiccesu cakkhādipaccayehi dhammehi cakkhādīnaṃ anuvattaniyatāmattaṃ
tika-abh08t0:2553_10: Jīvitindriyaṃ pana arūpajīvitindriyena saddhiṃ ekato katvā jīvita-
tika-abh08t0:2553_14: nibbānameva vā ñassāmī”ti pavattassa indriyaṃ anaññātaññassāmītindriyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2553_16: Ājānato paṭhamamaggena diṭṭhamariyādaṃ anatikkamitvā jānato indriyaṃ aññindriyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2553_18: aññātāvino catūsu saccesu pariniṭṭhitakiccassa indriyaṃ aññātāvindriyaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2553_21: ggahaṇena gahetvāpi puna kathañci upakārakattābhāvato itthipurisindriyānaṃ ettha aggahaṇaṃ dassetuṃ “tesū”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2553_22: Tāni hi yebhuyyena liṅgādīhi anuvattiyamānānipi paccayabhāvato nānuvattīyantīti vuttovāyamattho.
tika-abh08t0:2554_1: so ca vitakkādīnameva āveṇiko sabhāvoti āha “jhānapaccayo”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2555_2: akusalato vā niyyānaṭṭhena sahajātānaṃ upakārakatā maggapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t0:2555_10: ayampi jhānapaccaye vuttānameva paccayuppannānaṃ paccayoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2556_0: Paramatthena bhinnānampi ekībhāvagatānaṃ viya ekuppādādibhāvasaṅkhātasampayogalakkhaṇena upakārakatā sampayuttapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t0:2557_0: Aññamaññasambandhatāya yuttānampi samānānaṃ vippayuttabhāvena visaṃsaṭṭhatāya nānattūpagamanena upakārakatā vippayuttapaccayatā,
tika-abh08t0:2557_3: Cha vatthūni hi sattannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ yathārahaṃ paṭisandhiyaṃ, pavatte,
tika-abh08t0:2557_7: hadayavatthu pana paṭisandhiyampi paccayabhāvato sahajātampi labbhati.
tika-abh08t0:2557_8: Vuttampi hetaṃ abyākatapadassa sahajātavibhaṅge “paṭisandhikkhaṇe vipākābyākatā khandhā kaṭattārūpānaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2557_11: Tathā pacchājātā cittacetasikāti ca cakkhuviññāṇādivaseneva vuttaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2557_12: “sahajātā kusalā khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānānaṃ rūpānaṃ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo”tiādivacanato pana sahajātāpi labbhanti.
tika-abh08t0:2557_13: Evañca katvā vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ “vippayuttapaccayo sahajātapurejātapacchājātavasena tividho”ti.
tika-abh08t0:2557_14: Ayaṃ pana rūpadhammo samāno rūpadhammassa paccayo na hoti sampayogāsaṅkāya abhāvato.
tika-abh08t0:2558_0: Yesañhi nāmānaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ abbhantarato nikkhamantānaṃ viya pavatti,
tika-abh08t0:2558_4: vatthusannissayeneva ca jāyantānaṃ nāmānaṃ visayamattaṃ ārammaṇanti tenāpi tesaṃ sampayogāsaṅkā natthi.
tika-abh08t0:2558_5: Paccuppannasabhāvena atthibhāvena tādisasseva dhammassa upatthambhakattena upakārakatā atthipaccayatā.
tika-abh08t0:2558_6: Satipi hi janakatte ṭhitiyaṃyeva sātisayo atthipaccayānaṃ byāpāroti upatthambhakatā tesaṃ gahitā,
tika-abh08t0:2558_12: Nissayapaccaye vuttadhammāti ca vatthurūpamahābhūtacittacetasikānaṃ dhammasāmaññeneva gahaṇaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2558_14: Pacchājātānampi cittacetasikānaṃ purejātassa kāyassa pañhāvāre paccayabhāvena niddiṭṭhattā.
tika-abh08t0:2558_15: Ettha ca atthibhāvābhāvena anupakārakānameva atthibhāvena upakārakatāya atthipaccayatābhāvato natthi nibbānassa sabbadā bhāvino atthipaccayatā,
tika-abh08t0:2558_16: uppādādiyuttānaṃ vā natthibhāvopakāratāviruddho upakārakabhāvo atthipaccayatāti na tassa tappaccayattappasaṅgo.
tika-abh08t0:2559_2: Ekasmiṃ phassādidhammasamudāye pavattamāne dutiyassa abhāvato attano ṭhitiyā okāsamalabhantānaṃ anantaraṃ
tika-abh08t0:2559_4: Attano sabhāvāvigamena appavattamānānaṃ vigatabhāvena upakārakatā vigatapaccayatā.
tika-abh08t0:2559_5: Atthato pana dvinnampi anantarapaccayabhāvīdhammattā aviseso vutto.
tika-abh08t0:2559_7: nirodhānupagamanavasena upakārakatā avigatapaccayatāti paccayaviseso tesaṃ dhammāvisesepi veditabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2559_8: Dhammānañhi samatthatāvisesaṃ sabbākārena ñatvā bhagavatā catuvīsatipaccayā desitāti bhagavati saddhāya
tika-abh08t0:2559_9: “evaṃ visesā ete dhammā”ti sutamayañāṇaṃ uppādetvā cintābhāvanāmayañāṇehi tadabhisamayāya yogo karaṇīyo.
tika-abh08t0:2559_10: Avisesepi dhammasāmatthiyassa tathā tathā vinetabbapuggalānaṃ vasena heṭṭhā vuttopi paccayo puna pakārantarena
tika-abh08t0:2559_11: vuccati yathā ahetukadukaṃ vatvāpi hetuvippayuttadukaṃ viyāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2561_0: Rūpaṃ arūpassātiādīsupi heṭṭhā vuttapaccayuppannadhamme suṭṭhu upalakkhetvā paccayo yojetabbo.
tika-abh08t0:2561_1: Rūpaṃ rūpārūpassāti natthīti idaṃ sahajātapaccayabhūtampi rūpaṃ rūpārūpadvayassa paccayabhāvena anāgatanti katvā vuttaṃ.
tika-abh08t0:2562_2: sahajātapurejātapacchājātādibhedassa atthipaccaye ca samodhānato sabbepi paccayā saṅkhepato catubbidhāyevāti dassento āha “sabbe panime”tiādi.
tika-abh08t0:2567_1: Sabbadhammesu appaṭihatagatitāya sundarā mati imassāti sumati,
tika-abh08t0:2567_2: tassa sumatissa bhagavato mativicāraṃ ñāṇacāraṃ bodhetīti sumatimativicārabodhano.
tika-abh08t0:2567_6: Yato yasmā nāmato sumatinā bhikkhunā mānato bahumānena āyācitasammānato āyācito hutvā sammā avanato sadāyeva mato ayaṃ,
tika-abh08t0:2567_8: Tathā hi bhāvanā sādhūnaṃ sambhāvanā hitavibhāvanā hitappakāsanato sadā tosadāti yojanā.
tika-abh08t0:2568_1: Ayuttaṃ vā viruddhaṃ vāti ettha “aṭṭhakathāya vimukhabhūtaṃ ayuttaṃ nāma,
tika-abh08t0:2568_13: so hi himavato caturāsītiyā kūṭasahassānaṃ pāmokkho rajatamayo mahāsikharo.
tika-abh08t0:2568_14: Tadākārehi sabbasetehi pāsādehi paṭimaṇḍitattā kelāsa…pe… maṇḍito.
